chapter.verse: He tah Jesuh Khrih kah Patuer thli thoepna ni. Ahih tah Devid cadil la awm tih Devid tah Abraham cadil la awm.
Tedawngah Abraham kalawng Devid toe dung thlailii, Devid kalawng Babilon ah tamnaa la a awm toe dung thlailii, tamnaa la a awmna kalawng Messiah a cuun toe ah dung thlailii awm.
Jesuh Khrih a cuunna tah hetila ni. A manu Meri te Josep ham a kang pe, tede yuvaa la a awm haih hih thlan ah Ciim Muithla rang oen camaw ka cuun ai tila a ming,
Josep tah thaihu adoengla aka sai thlaang la awm tih Meri te thlaang lak ah yah lawh sak ham ngaih nawh tih ahuepla toeng ham kamthlah.
He kawng he a poek lii vengah Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng ahih tengla a mang ah a pho pe tih “Devid cadil Josep, Meri te yuna ham rih boel, Metihtiah a bung a vawn he Ciim Muithla rang oen ni.
Ahih lawng capa a cuun vetih a miing ah Jesuh tila na sak ai, metihtiah a thlaang thli te a thawlhna kalawng a thlawn ai.” a tina.
Bawipa lawng tawngha hawna oen a thui oepsoeh te a soepna hamla he thaihu boeih he va thoeng hang.
Hulaa cuem pakhat tah vawn vetih capa a cuun ai, a miing tah Immanu-el a sak u ai” (Immanu-el thuingaihna tah “Pathen mami tengah tengah awm” tina ni.)
Josep tah a ihna kalawng tho tih Bawipa kah vanthlaang lawng a thui pe angla Meri te a yuna.
Tede a capa a cuun thlan ah tengcehna nawh. Josep lawng a capa te Jesuh tila miing a sak.
Herod he Sengpahrang la a awm vengah Judia ram Bethlehem khawpui ah Jesuh tah thang, Adiw raih thlan ah aisi aka noek thai thlaang khatsut khawlaw ben kalawng Jerusalem la law u tih.
“Judah sengpahrang la aka awm ham camawca te meah a awm? Ahih kah aisi khawlaw ben ah a thoeng te ka huh u tih ahih te bok hamla ka law” tila a doet u.
Herod sengpahrang lawng he awl he a yaak vengah lakueng tangkiik, Jerusalem khaw kah thlaang boeih khaw lakueng u.
Herod lawng khawsoeih ahaamca boeih oen phungawl cangpueikung boeih te a khue tun tih, “me ah nuem Messiah te a thang?” tila ahimi te a doet.
Ahimi lawng, “Judia ram Bethlehem khawpui ah thang ai “tila a thui pe u.” Tawngha lawng a thut oepsoeh tah he tila awm.
“Judah ram kah Bethlehem khawpui, nang tah Judah ram khawpui thli la kah ayiit koek la na awm roe nawh, na khui kalawng uktemkung pakhat law vetih ka thlaang Israel thli te a uk ai,” ti.
Tedawngah Herod lawng khawlaw thlaangcuih thli te ahuepla a khue tih aisi a thoengna atue atang te acek aneh la a doet.
Tecoengah Herod lawng ahimi te Bethlehem la a tuih tih, “Cet u lang camawca te atheenla tlap uh, na huh u atah van thui uh, kai khaw ka cet silang ahih te ka bok van ai,” tila awl a uen.
Im khuila kuun u tih camawca oen a manu Meri te a huh u vengah khuklu oen cuengkueng u tih buekuep ruila ahih te a bok u. A khuen u kutdo khawhbu te a awng u tih sui, frankinsen oen mura te a peek u.
Pathen lawng ahimi te Herod tengla mel koep nawh ham a mang ah ngaithuen awl a thui pe dawngah lawngpui tloe kalawng amah ram la voei koep u.

Ahimi a ceh coengah, Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat Josep mang ah a tueng pe tih, “Herod lawng camawca te ngawn hamla a tlap poen ai. Tedawngah tho lang camawca oen a manu te lo langtah Iyipt ram la pooeng puei loeih, kai lawng mel koep ham kavan thui thlantoe te ah awm uh,” a tina.
Josep lawng tho tih camawca oen a manu te a lawh tih yiinthuem ah Iyipt ram la a pooeng puei,
Herod a duek thlantoe Iyipt ram ah awm u. He tila a awmna he tah, Bawipa lawng tawngha hawna oen a thui oepsoeh, “Ka Capa te Iyipt ram kalawng ka khue koep” a ti te asoepna ham ni.

Khawlaw thlaangcuih thli lawng a thai a latna te Herod lawng a ming vengah caalla a thin sa. Khawlaw thlaangcuih thli lawng a thui aisi a thoengna tue kalawng a tuemtang heet tih Bethlehem khawpui oen khaaw teng khaaw vai kah camaw tawngpaca kumhih hui boeih te ngawn hamla awl a peek.
He tila tawngha Jeremiah lawng a thui oepsoeh awl te soep. A thui oepsoeh awl tah,:
“Ramah khaaw ah awl a yaak u, thinphat lungnat rungrahna awl ni. Rachel lawng a ca thli te a rah, A ca thli a duek boeih poen dawngah rap tih a reemhalna ham thloepthloei thai la awm tlaih nawh.”
Herod a duek coengah, Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat tah Iyipt ram ah aka awm Josep mang ah a tueng pe tih,
“Tho langtah camaw oen a manu te Israel ram la meel puei koep loeih, camaw ngawn ham aka tlap hue te duek boeih poen,” a tina.
Tedawngah Josep lawng tho tih Camaw oen a manu te a lawh tih Israel ram la a mel puei.
Tede Arkhelas lawng ana pa Herod yuengla Judia ram ah Sengpahrang a bi tite Josep lawng a yaak vengah te huen la ceh ham a rih. A mang ah a thuituen angla Galili peng la te cet,
Nazaret a ti u khawpui ah te poe awm. “Ahih te Nazaret thlaang ti u ai,” tila tawngha thli lawng a thui oepsoeh te soep.
Teveng tue ah Baptisma pekung Johan tah Judia ram ramhum huhang la law tih phungthui a tong.
“Vaan ram ayoeii poen dawngah na thawlhna yut u loeih,” tila a thui.
Tawngha Isaiah lawng, “Thlaang pakhat lawng ramhum huhang ah paang tih, ‘Bawipa hamla lawngpui te roekbah uh, A cehna ham lawngpui te adoengla sai uh,” tila a thui. oepsoeh te tah Johan he poen ni.
Johan lawng kala-uk mul oen a tah hiacuu te a buen a naak tih, a hingcen ah saphaw cihin a naak, khaurang oen khawitui te buh la a caak.
Jerusalem kah thlaang thli Judia ram tawm kah thlaang thli oen Jordan tuiva tengvaai ram tawm kah thlaang thli a tengla law u.
Ahimi lawng a thawlhna boeih te a phawng u tih, Jordan tuiva ah ahimi te Johan lawng Baptisma a peek.

Farasi thlaang oen Sadusi thlaang thli Baptisma dang ham a law u te Johan lawng a huh vengah ahimi te, “Ruul hue, aka law ham koei Pathen kah dantatna kalawng na loeih u thai ai tila a-u lawng avan thui u?
Na thawlhna na yut u te athaih theen oen tueng sak uh.
Abraham tah cuunkung patuer ni tila thui mailai oen dantatna kalawng ka loeih ai tila poek hau u boel. Pathen lawng he kah lungto thli he a lawh vetih Abraham cadil la a sai thai ti he kavan thui u.
Thingkung boeih te ayung ah vungna hamla haica tah a toen sut poen. Thaih theen aka thaih nawh thingkung boeih te a vung vetih hai dawngah a phuum ai.

Thawlhna na yut poen tite tuengna ham kai lawngtah tui oen Baptisma kan peek u. Tede kai hu ah aka law thlaang lawngtah Ciim Muithla oen hai oen ah Baptisma m'peek u ai. Ahih tah kai lak ah lenduet tih kai tah ahih kah khawmuek pawm ham pateng ka koeih nawh.
A kut dawngah caang yahna raa a pawm vetih caang te aciimla a yah ai, caangtak te thaidi dawng a khueh ai, tede caanghii te tah aka duek thai tlaih nawh hai dawngah a phuum ai,” a tina.
Teveng tue ah Jesuh tah Jordan tuiva ah Baptisma dang hamla Galili kalawng Johan tengla va law.
Tede Johan lawng a thana tih, “Kai he man nang lawng Baptisma nan peek sui, kai tengla nang na law lat oh kai,” a tina.
Tede Jesuh lawngah, “tahe ah sai hawn, “Pathen lawng khuek te sai hawn sih,” a tina. Tedawngah Johan lawng a roei.
Jesuh tah Baptisma a huh coeng khoeng ah tui dawng kalawng tho hang. Tevengah ahih ham vaan te awng u tih, Pathen kah Muithla tah akhuu angla rum thuk tih ahih sawah a cuuk te a huh.
Tecoengah vaan kah awl lawng, “He tah ka lungvatna ka Capa ni, ahih sawah ka kaw hoe tangkiik.” tila a thui.
Tecoengah Muithla lawng Jesuh te Seitan kah suek-halhna tawng ham ramhum huhang la a ceh puei.
Khawhin sawmlii yiin daai buh a mueh dawngah Jesuh tah a bung pawng poen.
Tecoengah Seitan lawng ahih tengla law tih, “Nang he Pathen Capa tangtang la na awm atah, lungto thli he buh la coeng sak lah” a tina.
Tede Jesuh lawng, “Caciim lawngah, ‘thlaang he buh bueng oen hing thai nawh, tede Pathen huikaa khui kalawng aka thoeng awl oen ni a hing’ ti;” a tina.
Tecoengah Seitan lawng Jesuh te aciim Jerusalem khawpui kah Tempal bok-im imphu ah a ceh puei tih.

Ahih tengah, “Nang he Pathen Capa la na awm tang atah sungpung thuk lah, metihtiah Caciim dawngah, ‘Pathen lawng amah kah vanthlaang hue te nang ham awl a peek vetih na khow pateng lungto dawngah na khuek nawh ham nang te a kut oen n'dawm u ai,’ tila awm” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Caciim lawng, ‘Bawipa na Pathen te noekdak boel, ti de lah koen,’ a tina.
Tecoengah Seitan lawng Jesuh te a sanghlang tlaangsawm pakhat la a luui puei tih, dilai dawngkah ram boeih oen te ram kah a bawilenna boeih te a huh sak.
Seitan lawngah, “Khuklu oen na cuengkueng tih kai he nan bok atah he thli boeih he kan pe ai,” a tina.
Tevengah Jesuh lawng, “Seitan, atloela cet! Caciim lawngah, ‘Na Bawipa Pathen bueng te bok lang, amah kah bii bueng te bi peh,’ ti” a tina.
Tecoengah Seitan lawng Jesuh te a ceh taak, vanthlaang thli law-u tih Jesuh te a bawm a ceem u.
Johan thawngim ah a thlaak u tite Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah Galili peng la cet.
Ahih lawng Nazaret ah awm ohla Kapernaum khaaw ah awm hamla cet. Kapernaum khaaw tah Zebulun oen Naptali thlaangphun kah ram khui Galili tuilii keeng ah awm.
He tila a awm he tah Tawngha Isaiah lawng a thui oepsoeh te asoepna ham ni. A thui oepsoeh tah,
“Zebulun oen Naptali ram Tuitunlii la cehna lawngpui, Jordan tuiva khatben rall, Gental thli kah ram Galili!
Yiinna khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih lawng aang abohlang a huh u ai. Duekna yiin khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih sawah aangna va pai ai,” tila a thui te ni.
Teveng tue kalawng ah Jesuh lawng, “Vaan ram tah ayoeica poen dawngah, na thawlhna yut u loeih,” tila phungthuina a tong cuek.
Jesuh lawng Galili tuiliikeeng ah a yingyawi vengah tui aka hawi boeinau rawi Simon (Piter a ti u te) oen a manau Andru, tuilii ah lok oen nga a heeng hih te a huh.
Jesuh lawng te rawi te, “Ka hu ah bang hih lah, thlaang tukung la kan coengg sak hih ai,” a tina.
Ahih rawi lawng lok te a voeih pak tih a hu ah bang pahoei hih.
Te kalawng cet phai tih thlaangtloe boeinau rawi Zebedi capa Jeem oen Johan te a huh. Te rawi boeinau tah ana pa Zebedi oen lowng khuiah awm haih tih lok a baw u. Te rawi te Jesuh lawng a khue;
Te rawi lawng ana pa oen lowng te a ceh tak tih a hu ah bang pahoei hih.
Jesuh tah Galili peng tawm ah cet tih Sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei, Vaan ram kawng Awlthang Theen a thui, thlaangtlo oen natna soeprep aka tlo thli te a hoeih sak.

Ahih kawng awlthang te Siria ram pum ah thaang khok tih aka tlo thli, tlawhnatna oen patang raina soeprep aka khang, raaithe lawng a kuun thil thlaang thli, raaihum tlawhna aka tlo, aka khawn thli boeih te avan law puei u tih Jesuh lawng a hoeih sak boeih.
Galili peng oen Dekapolis peng (khaaw paha a ti u peng), Jerusalem Judia peng oen Jordan tuiva khatben rall kah thlaangping broe lawng ahih hu ah bang u.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te a huh vengah, tlaangsawm la luui hang tih te ah te ngawl. A hubang hue lawng ahih te a veel u.
Tecoengah ahimi te riingtuuk thaihoen hamla a tong:
“Thlaang soep nawh la ka awm tila aka ming tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm; Vaan ram tah ahimi kah ni!
“Kawthe oen aka rung aka rap thli tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm; Pathen lawng ahimi te a thloep a hoelh ai!
“A kaw aka daw thlaang tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm; Pathen lawng a kam pe tangte te a paang ai!
“Pathen kawngaih te amami ngaihna bo koek la sai ham aka khueh tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm; Pathen lawng ahimi kah kawngaihna te a soep pe sak ai!
“Thlaang reenna kaw aka poek tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm; Pathen lawng ahimi te a reen van ai!
“Thinkaw lungbui aka ciim tah yotheen kam-awmna aka lawng thlaang la awm; Ahimi lawng Pathen te a huh u ai!
“Roeproeina aka sai tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm; Pathen lawng ahimi te ka ca a tina ai!
“Pathen kawngaihna a sai dawngah heemtekna aka ming thli tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm; Vaan ram tah ahimi kah ni!
“Kai kah hubang la na awm u dawngah nangmi te thlaang lawng thuitheetna, heemtekna, athe thaihu soeprep oen hoem awl n'peel u vengah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u.
“Awmngaih u langtah na kaw hoe sak uh, nangmi ham vaan ah kutdo abohlang awm, he tila ni nangmi na awm thlan vengkah tawngha thli khaw aheem atek u roe poen.

“Nangmi tah thlaangphun boeih ham lungkeh la na awm u. Tede lungkeh he a aalna a moelh atah aal sak koep ham coengg thai tlaih nawh, apoeila awm poen, tedawngah ram la voeih tih thlaang lawng a caawt mailai ham ni a awm poen.
“Nangmi tah dilai pum boeih ham aangna la na awm u. Tlaangsawm ah a phueng u khawpui tah n'tu lawngkhaw thlipdah thai nawh.
A-u lawngkhaw hai a vaang vengah beelphai oen muek khoep vai nawh, haivangna dawngah a vaang tih im khuiah aka awm boeih te a thue.
Tetihvan la nangmi kah aangna te thlaang haiah aang sak ham awm, te tila thaihu theen na sai u te ahimi lawng a huh u vetih vaan ah aka awm nangmi na Pa te a thangpawm u thai ai.
“Mosi kah phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cangpueina te phe hamla kai he va law tila poek u boel. Te thli te phe hamla ka law nawh tih soep sak ham ni ka law.
He he poek khuep uh. Vaan oen Dilai aboet thlantoe phungawl dawngah ayiitkoek awllung pakhat mai te khaw ha-ata manawh. Te phungawl dawngah aka awm boeih te soep ai.

Tedawngah a-u khaw phungawl dawngkah ayiitkoek te khaw vai ohla awm tih thlaangtloe te khaw vai nawh ham a cang puei atah Vaan Ram ah ayiitkoek la awm van ai. Tede a-u khaw Phungawl te a vai tih thlaangtloe te khaw vai hamla a cang puei atah Vaan Ram ah abokoek la awm van ai.
Tecoengah kavan thui u, Pathen kawngaih saina dawngah phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thli lak ah uep-awm ngaai la na awm u nawh atah Vaan ram khuiah na kuun thai manawh.
“Thlaang ngawn boel, na ngawn atah awlcekbawi haiah na pha ai,” tila yan vengkah awl te na yaak u poen.

Tede tahe ah kavan thui u, “A-u khaw a maya manau tengah a thin a sa atah awlcekna ah a pha ai. A-u khaw a maya manau te tula na thuum nawh a tina atah awlcekna yung a pha ai, a-u khaw a maya manau te thlaangngau paathuu a tina atah rih awmna hell hai khuiah a thlaak ai.
Tedawngah Pathen tengla bokna-thaang dawngah na kutdo te ka pe ai na ti vengah na maya manau pakhat khat lawng na sawah thinsana a khueh te na ming atah,
Bokna-thaang haiah na kutdo te khueh de langtah, aloela cet lang na maya manau oen roeproeina sai, tecoengah law koep langtah na kutdo te Pathen tengah peh.

“Thlaang pakhat khat lawng taya n'cawi tih awlcekna yung la n'ceh puei atah yung na pha thlan atue a awm vengah ahih oen roepna sai. Te huen na pha atah nang te awlcekbawi tengah m'peek vetih awlcekbawi lawng palik tengah patoeng m'peek vetih thong ah n'thlaak ai.
Atak tang kavan thui u, sah ham koei laiba na sah boeih thlantoe thong khuiah na awm ai.
“Hutaa tawngpa thawlhna sai boel tila a thui te na yaak u poen;’
Tede kai lawng tahe kavan thui u, A-u khaw hutaa te samphaih ngaihna mik oen a dan atah a thinkaw oen hutaa te a samphaih puei poen.
Tedawngah na bantang mik lawng n'thawlh sak atah koeih lang voei hawn! na pum boeih hell la atlaak lak atah na mik na taal te nang hamla theen ngaai.
Na bantang kut lawng n'thawlh sak atah, tloek poet lang voei hawn! na pum boeih hell la a tlaak lak atah na kut na khow pakhat khat a taal te nang hamla theen ngaai.
“A-u lawngkhaw a yu te a thlaak atah yu thlaakna ca te pe seh! tila a thui te na yaak u poen,”

Tede tahe ah kavan thui u, a-u lawngkhaw a yu te acuk ahalh nawh maiah a thlaak tih te hutaa lawng vaa a sak koep atah ahih lawng a yu te a samphaih sak. Te hutaa aka yuna thlaang te khaw thlaang yu sawah samphaih poen.
“Na awlkam te phe boel, Tede Bawipa tengah na awlkam angla sai uh, tila yan vengkah thlaang thli lawng a thui te na yaak u poen.
Tede tahe ah kavan thui u, awl na kam u vengah tapvoepna oen awl kam u boel, vaan phoei oen tapvoep boel. Metihtiah vaan tah Pathen kah ngawlhcoen ni.
Dilai miing phoei oen khaw tapvoep boel,’ dilai tah Pathen kah khowtloengna huen ni. Jerusalem phoei oen khaw tapvoep boel, metihtiah aka lenduet Sengpahrang kah khawpui ni.
Na luu phoei oen khaw tapvoep boel, metihtiah na luu dawngkah samthaam pakhat pateng abawk oen amuuem la na sai thai u nawh.
Soeng, soeng nawh ti bueng mah te thui uh, te voel tah Seitan tengkah awl poen ni.
“Mik yuengah mik van, naw yuengah naw van,” a ti te na yaak u poen.
Tede tahe ah kavan thui u, “Nangmi sawah athe aka sai te thung u boel. Thlaang pakhat khat lawng bantang ben na beeng te avan bel atah banvoei ben na beeng te khaw bel sak.
Thlaang pakhat khat lawng na angki te lawh ham a ngaih tih awlcekna yung ah m'pha puei atah, na khawtt-angki oen tawm pe baal de.
Thlaang pakhat khat lawng nang te amangkhak la thalrih te meng khat m'phueih sak atah meng hih toe phueih pe hawn uh.
Thlaang lawng thaihu avan bih atah pe uh, thaihu pu ham aka ngaih te pu uh.
“Na paya thli lungna uh, na raal thli thina uh! a ti awl te na yaak u poen.
Tede kavan thui u, Na raal thli te lungna lang nangmi aka thekhana thlaang thli ham thangthui pe uh.
Te atah Vaan ram ah aka awm na Pa kah a ca la na awm u ai. Ahih lawng atah thlaangthe thlaang theen sawah avan at la khaw a see sak, atheen aka sai oen athe aka sai sawah avan at la khaw a tlan sak.
Nang aka lungna bueng te na lungna atah metila Pathen lawng kutdo m'peek ai? Mangmu cawikung hue lawng pateng te tila a sai u van!
“Nang lawng na paya bueng te na voemtoei atah thlaang mailai lak ah athloeila na sai n'tu aka awm? Pathen aka bok nawh thlaang thli lawng pateng te ang te a sai van!
Vaan kah na Pa a soep van angla nangmi khaw na soep u van ham awm.”

“Thaihu theen na sai u boeih te thlaang yahawh lawng hu seh tila rangpui haiah sai nawh ham ngaithuen uh. He ang thli he rangpui haiah na sai u atah vaan ah aka awm na Pa tengkah kutdo n'tu khaw na dang u manawh.

Tedawngah thlaang kah angoe angaih thaihu te na do na dan vengah thlaangthaipalat hue lawng sinakok oen lawngpui cumruum ah oekthloen ruila a sai u angla nangmi lawng na sai boeih te tueng sak u boel. Ahimi lawng thlaang kah koeh ngaih ah a sai ni. Atak tang kavan thui u, ahimi lawng a ngaih te asoepla a dang poen.
Tede thlaang lawng angoe angaih te nangmi lawng na peek u vengah na paya theenkoek lawng pateng te kawng te ming boel seh.
Namah bueng lawng ming ham sai u lang, te tila ahuepla na sai boeih aka hukung na Pa lawng kutdo m'peek u badai.

“Na thangthui u vengah thlaangthai-palat hue angla thangthui u boel! Ahimi lawng thlaang boeih kah huhna koei sinakok oen lawngpui cumruum ah pai tih thangthui ham a ngaih u tangkiik. Atak tang kavan thui u, a sai phu dang ham koei te asoepla a dang u poen.
Tede nangmi lawng na thangthui u vengah im khuila kuun uh, thawh khai u lang mik oen huh nawh na Pa tengah thangthui uh. Ahuepla na sai boeih hukung na Pa lawng kutdo m'peek u badai.
“Na thangthui u vengah Pathen aka ming nawh hue angla awl mailai yahawh thui u boel, ahimi lawngtah asanhlang thangthui dengah Pathen lawng a yaak ai” tila a poek u.
Ahimi angla sai u boel; Nangmi lawng na ngoe boeih te na bih thlan ah na Pa lawng a ming boeih poen.
Tedawngah na thangthui u vengah: ‘Vaan ah aka awm kaimi na Pa, Na miing ciim tah hinyah la awm hawn seh;
Na ram va pai hawn seh! Vaan ah na kawngaih a sai u angla dilai dawngah na kawngaih sai u van hawn seh,
Tihin kah angoe caak awkk te kaimi m'pe lah.
Thlaangtloe lawng kaimi sawah a saithawlh te khawdawp ka ngaai u angla, Kaimi kah saithawlh he khawdawp van ngaai lah.
Noekdakna aka rai hlang kaimi sawah pha sak ohla, Seitan kut khui kalawng n'deem sak u lah, tila thangthui uh.’
“Nangmi sawah thlaangtloe lawng a sai thawlh te khawdawp na ngaai u atah vaan ah aka awm na Pa lawng na saithawlh te khawdawp avan ngaai van ai.
Tede thlaangtloe kah saithawlh te khawdawp na ngaai nawh atah vaan kah na Pa lawng na saithawlh te khawdawp van ngaai manawh.

“Buh na yeh u vengah thlaang-thaipalat hue angla haithelatt la awm u boel. Ahimi lawng buh a yeh u te thlaang lawng ming seh a ti u dawngah haithelatt la awm u. Atak tang kavan thui u, ahimi lawng kutdo te asoepla a dang poen.
Buh na yeh u vengah na mik-hai khaw sil u lang na sam khaw thiik uh,
Te tila buh na yeh u te a-u lawngkhaw ming nawh vetih mik huh nawh na Pa bueng lawng a ming ai. Ahuepla saina boeih hukung na Pa lawng kutdo m'peek u badai.
“Kuum-akett oen thii-ekk lawng a caak thai; thlaanghuuen lawng a muk tih a huen thaina dilai ah na kaawn tung u boel;
Kuum-akett oen thii-eek lawng a caak thaina nawh thlaanghuuen lawng a muk tih a huuen thaina nawh vaan ah na kaawn te tung uh.
Na kaawn a awmna huen ah na kawpoek khaw awm van ai.
“Mik he tah pum boeih kah haithoei la awm. Na mik acaih atah na pum boeih aangna oen be ai;
Tede na mik a theen nawh atah na pum boeih yiinna khuiah awm ai. Tedawngah na khuikah aangna lawng a yiin khoep boeih atah te yiinna tah metila rih ham a awm tangkiik ai.

“A-u lawngkhaw bawi pahih kah bii te bi thai manawh. Pakhat te a thina vetih pakhat te a lungna ai. Pakhat te a hinyah vetih pakhat te a huhsit ai. Pathen oen tangka kah bii te pahih bokla na bi thai manawh.

Tedawngah kavan thui u; Na hingna ham caak awkk oen na pum ham himbai hinaak poek oen lakueng u boel. Atak tang atah; caak awkk lak ah hingna he awlpui ngaai nawh aw? Himbai hinaak lak ah pum he awlpui ngaai nawh aw?

Vaan ah aka sawng va thli ke bueh u lah! ati amu khaw tue u nawh; caang khaw aat nawh tih thaidi khuiah khaw tung u nawh. Tede vaan ah aka awm nangmi na Pa lawng te thli te a cawm acah! Va lak ah nangmi he awlpuila na awm u nawh aw?
Nangmi lawng lakuengna oen na hingna na cot sak u thai bet aw?
“N'tu ah himbai hinaak kawngah na lakueng u? Bueh u lah! ramhum kah raipai ke metila a roeng hang: bii khaw bi u nawh; Himbai hinaak khaw tak u nawh.
Tede, kavan thui u, bawilenkoek Solomon sengpahrang kah a bawilenna oen himbai hinaak lawngah raipai pakhat kah a theenna te pha nawh.

Tihin ah po tih thangvuen ah tlumtloei, hai dawngah phuum ham aka awm ramhum ah aka po mailai sul-aram Pateng khaw thoekcaukung tah Pathen ni; Ahih lawng nangmi tare te thoekcau muehla awm ai aw? Na oengna yawl tangkiik u nawh pai he!
“Tedawngah n'tu nuem ka caak vetih n'tu nuem ka awkk ai, n'tu ka bai ka naak ai tila lakueng u boel?
He ang thaihu he Pathen aka bok nawh hue kah thoehtham thaihu ni, he ang thaihu na ngoe boeih te vaan kah nangmi na Pa lawng a ming boeih.
Tedawngah thaihu tloe boeih lak ah Pathen Ram oen Pathen lawng sai sak ham a ngaih te lamhacuekla tlap u lang tecoengah na ngoe thaihu tloe boeih te Pathen lawng avan tawm badai.
Tedawngah thangvuen ham lakueng u boel; thangvuen lawng amah ham khoekla lakueng badai. Hin at kah arai acaangna sawah atloe thap patoeng ngoe nawh.
“Pathen lawng awl n'cekna nawh hamla thlaangtloe te awl cek boel,
Thlaangtloe awl na cek van angla Pathen lawng nang te awl n'cek van ai, Thlaangtloe sawah nuehtahna na hawna van angla na sawah Pathen lawng a hawna van ai.
N'tu ah namah mik ah thingboeng aka awm te huh ohla na maya manau mik ah aka awm muenmawi adiikca mai te na huh.
Namah mik ah thingboeng a awm lal maiah metila na maya manau mik ah aka awm muenmawi te kavan lo ai na tina mai lauh?
Nang thlaangthaipalat Namah mik kah thingboeng te lamhala lo de langtah tecoengah na maya manau mik kah muenmawi adiik te aciimcala na huh vetih na lawh pe thai ai.
“Aciim thaihu te ui pe boel. Te thli lawng va meel vetkat vetih namah te ng'ngeh ai. Awk haiah latha te tloeng pe boel. A khow oen ni a caawt mailai poen ai.
“Bih lah m'peek ai, tlap lah na huh ai, khooek lah thawhka avan awng ai.
A-u khaw aka bih tah a peek ai, aka tlap lawngtah a huh vetih thawhka aka khooek tah a awng pe ai.
Na ca lawng buh avan bih vengah lungto aka pe thlaang pakhat mai khaw na awm ai aw?
Nga avan bih vengah ruul na peek ai aw?
Thlaangthe la na awm u de na ca thli te thaihu theen peek ham na ming u atah van ah aka awm nangmi na Pa lawng aka bih thli tengah metihtlukla thaihu theen te a peek tare ai.
“Thlaangtloe lawng na sawah thaihu theen sai seh tila na ngaih van angla thlaangtloe tengah sai van lah; He tah Mosi Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah thuituen ngaihna tangtang ni.
“Thawhka ceek khuiah kuun u lah, metihtiah hell thawhka tah kau tih cehna lawngpui khaw yoei koek doek la a awm dawngah thlaang yahawh lawng a vai u.
Tede hingna thawhka tah ceek tih a cehna lawngpui khaw rai tangkiik tih thlaang ayawlca bueng lawng a huh.
“Tawngha rawlrap hue te ngaithuen uh; Ahimi lawngah nangmi tengla te ahan huhna atah tuu angla law u vetih a thinkaw khui atah metaang tluung angla awm u ai.
Nangmi lawng ahimi te athaih oen na noek ai. Thliingkung lawng misur thaih nooek nawh tih thliingkung dawngah thaidut khaw thaih nooek nawh.
Thingkung theen lawng athaih theen thaih tih thingkung the lawng athaih the thaih van.
Thingkung theen lawng athaih the thaih nooek nawh tih thingkung the lawngkhaw athaih theen thaih nawh.
Athaih theen aka thaih nawh thingkung boeih te a vung tih hai dawngah a phuum u.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng tawngha rawlrap hue te a saina oen na noek u ai.
“Bawipa, Bawipa tila ka tengah aka ti thlaang boeih lawng Vaan ram khuiah kuun boeih manawh, tede Vaan ah aka awm a Pa kawngaih aka sai thli bueng lawngah kuun ai.
Awlcekna Khawhin apha vengah thlaang yahawh lawng ka tengah Bawipa, Bawipa! na miing oen ah Pathen awl ka thui u, na miing oen ah raaithe thli ka hek u tih kawpoekraina ka sai u! ti ai.
Tevengah ahimi te, “kan ming nawh, atloela cet uh, thlaangthe thli!” ka tina ai.
“Tedawngah a-u khaw ka awl a yaak tih aka vai tah lungnu dawngah im aka sa thlaangcuih oen lo u.
Rawnu tlanthiim, tuiphu tho tih thlipui lawng im te a linglok, tede im te lungnu dawng acakla a sak tih tlim nawh.
“Tede a-u khaw ka awl a yaak tih aka vai nawh tah divin dawngah im aka sa thlaangngau oen lo u.
Rawnu tlanthiim, tuilet tho tih thlipui lawng im te a linglok vengah tlim. Te kah im a tlim te metila rih ham a awm tangkiik.
Jesuh lawng he awl ha thui boeih coengah thlaang yahawh tah a cangpueina dawngah a kawpoek rai u.
Ahih lawng phungawl cangpueikung hue angla cang puei nawh tih saithaina aana aka khueh hue angla a cang puei.
Tlaangsawm kalawng Jesuh a rum thuk vengah, thlaangping yahawh lawng a hu ah a vai u.
Tevengah haibe aka na thlaang pakhat a tengla law tih khuklu oen cuengkueng tih buekuep ruila, “Bawipa, na kawngaih atah nan hoeih sak thai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a kut a phawh tih a tek coengah, “Ka kaw tla; Ciim hawn loeih!” a tina. Kawlkalh ah haibe natna hoeih pahoei.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Hutung lah! a-u tengah khaw thui boel, khawsoeih tengla cet phaat langtah na pum te nueh, tecoengah thlaang rangpui tengah ka hoeih poen tila tuengsakna ham Mosi phungawl angla luciik thawthuengna te nawn lah” a tina.
Jesuh tah Kapernaum khaw a pha vengah Rom raalbawi pakhat lawng a tengah reenna a bih.
“Bawipa, ka tuihyoeihthlaang tah tlo tih im ah ral sut, a tlawh nauh tangkiik tih tat khaw tat thai nawh” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “ka law silang ka hoeih sak ai” a tina.
Raalbawi lawng, ‘Bawipa, tih mai boel seh; Kai tah thlaangkoeih pavaih nawh dawngah ka im la nang na law ham tah ka koeih nawh. Awl bueng mah m'pe mai, ka tuihyoeihthlaang te hoeih badai” a tina.

“Kai khaw ka sawkah Bawihaam thli kut huiah ka awm tih kai kut huiah raalkap thli awm patoeng van baal. Pakhat khat te kai lawng cet lah! ka tina atah cet tih atloe pakhat te law lah’ ka tina atah va law, ka tamnaa te he he sai lah ka tina atah a sai.” a tina.
He awl he Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah, a kawpoek la rai tih a hu ah aka vai thlaangping hue tengah, “Atak tang kavan thui u, he ang oengcakna he Israel thlaang tim ah khaw ka hu nawh hun” a tina.
Nangmi tengah kavan thui u, khawlaw khawtlaak ben kalawng thlaang yahawh law u vetih, Abraham, Isak, Jakob mi oen Vaan ram kah poei buh veelna ah ngawl u haih ai.
Tede Vaan ram aka paang ham koei thlaang hue te Vaan adau ben rungrahna oen naw tahna huen yiinna khuila a voeih ai.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng raalbawi te, “im la meel loeih,” na oengna angla coengg hawn seh” a tina. Raalbawi kah tuihyoeihthlaang tah teveng tue roe ah hoeih pahoei.
Piter im la Jesuh a ceh vengah Piter mase hutaa te tlo tih ihkhun dawngah a ralh te a huh.
Jesuh lawng a kut ah a phoeih tih a tlawhna hoeih pahoei. Tho hang tih Jesuh te a do a dan.
Thlemben tue a pha vengah, a kaw ah raaithe oen aka be thlaang thli te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u. Jesuh lawng a awl kam-at oen raaithe thli te a hek tih thlaangtlo boeih te khaw a hoeih sak.
Ahih lawng tila a sai he tah, “Amah lawng mami kah natna te a lawh tih mami kah tlawhthe te a phueih” tila tawngha Isaiah lawng a thui oepsoeh awl te asoepna ham ni.
Jesuh lawng a teng-avai kah thlaangping te a huh vengah Galili tuilii khatben rall la ceh ham a hubang hue te awl a peek.
Phungawl cangpueikung pakhat a tengla law tih, ‘Saya,’ na cehna roekk ah ka law van ai” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Metaang lawngkhaw a awmna ham ungrawm a khueh tih, va lawngkhaw bu a khueh, tede Thlaanghing Capa lawngtah ihna huen oen duemdawngna kangna khaw khueh nawh.” a tina.
Atloe hubang pakhat lawng atah, “Bawipa, im la ka cet de silang tah a pa rawkk te ka kuem de ai,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Ka hu ah bang hawn, thlaangduek lawng amami thlaangduek puei te kuem noen seh,” a tina.
Jesuh tah lowng khuila kuun tih, a hubang hue khaw ahih oen cet haih u.
Kawlkalh ah tuilii dawngah thlipui tho tih lowng te tuilet lawng a khup dalh. Tede Jesuh tah ditdit ip.
A hubang hue a tengla cet u tih a thawh u. Bawipa, kaimi he, n'thlawn lah, ka duek u poen ai he, a tina u.

Jesuh lawng, “N'tu ah tila na rih u aih? Na oengna yawl tangkiik u nawh pai he!” a tina. Tecoengah ahih lawng tho tih thlipui oen tuilet te duem ham awl a peek; kawlkalh ah thlipui oen tuilet te duem tih tuilii te dipsipla awm.
Thlaang boeih lawng a kawpoek la rai u tih, “He thlaang he me ang thlaang kai? khawthlii oen tuilet lawngkhaw a awl a ngaai pe mai!” ti u.

Jesuh tah tuilii khatben rall kah Gadara ram la a law vengah thlaang a upna lungkaw khui kalawng raaithe oen aka be thlaang pahih Jesuh tengla va law. Te rawi tah a kaw khuiah raaithe awm tih a tluung thakbat dawngah te kah lawngpui benla a-u lawngkhaw ceh ham a rih.
Ahih rawi lawng, “Nang Pathen Capa, kaihih sawah n'tu sai ham na ngaih? Atue akhoek thlan ah kaihih he dantat hamla na law aw?” tila paang hih.
Te huen kalawng ceh hot athlana ah awk yahawh a vuelh u.
Raaithe hue lawng Jesuh tengah, “Kaimi he kan hek ai na ti oh atah awk kaw khuiah n'kuun sak u hawn” tila a bih u.
Jesuh lawng, “Cet uh,” a tina. Tedawngah ahimi lawng co u tih awk kaw khuila kuun u. Awk boeih te cehthleeng ah plit tih tuilii ah tla tih duek boeih.
Awkdoen hue lawng aloela heeng u tih khawpui khuila kuun u, raaithe aka be thlaang pahih kawng oen a huh thli boeih te a thui u.
Tedawngah khawpui khuikah thlaang boeih tah Jesuh te huh ham cet u; Jesuh te a huh u veng atah te ram kalawng atloela ceh ham reenna a bih u.
Jesuh te lowng khuila kuun, tuilii ah kat tih khatben tuirall amah khaw la te meel koep phai.

Te huen ah aka khawn thlaangtlo pakhat te ihphah dawngah avan kawh u tih Jesuh tengla avan khuen u. Jesuh lawng ahimi kah oengna te a huh vengah, aka khawn thlaang te, “Ka capa, na ngai mawng sak! na thawlhna boeih khawdawpngaai la awm poen” a tina.
Tevengah Mosi phungawl cangpueikung khatsut hue lawng amami kaw khuiah, “He kah thlaang lawng Pathen thekhana awl a thui nawh pai he!” ti u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi kah kawpoek te a ming tih, “N'tu kawngah te ang thaihu the te na poek u?
Na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaai la awm poen ti he aw aka yoeii bet, tihnawhtah, tho lang cet loeih! ti he aw aka yoeii bet?
Thlaanghing Capa lawng dilai sawah thawlh khawdawp ngaai thaina a khueh ti he kan ming sak u ai,” a tina tih aka khawn thlaang te “Tho lah, na himbai te lo lang im la cet loeih!” a tina.
Te thlaang lawng tho tih im la cet.
Thlaangping lawng te tila a sai te a huh vengah a ngai hang u tih te ang saithaina thlaanghing tengah aka pe Pathen te a thangpawm u.
Te huen kalawng Jesuh te cet phai tih Matthai a ti u mangmu cawikung amah yungim ah aka ngawl te a huh. Jesuh lawng, “Ka hu ah va bang lah” a tina. Matthai lawng tho tih a hu ah bang.
Jesuh te Matthai im ah buh a caak vengah mangmu cawikung thli oen atloe thlaangthawlh broe lawng Jesuh oen a hubang hue te buh haih a veel puei u.
Farasi khatsut lawng te tila buh a veel haih u te a huh vengah a hubang hue te, “N'tu ah na saya lawng mangmu cawikung oen thlaangthawlh hue oen ah buh haih a caak? tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng ahimi kah awldoetna te a yaak tih, “Sading thlaang lawng sibawi ngoe nawh, tede thlaangtlo bueng lawng ni angoe,” a tina.

Va cet u lang, “Ramsa oen thawthuengna lak ah reenna lungbui te ni ka ngaih,” tila caciim lawng a thuingaihna te poek u lah! Thlaangdoeng khue ham ka law nawh tih thlaangthawlh khue ham ni ka law” a tina.
Tecoengah Baptisma pekung Johan kah hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih, “N'tu ah kaimi oen Farasi hue lawng atah buh ka yeh u tih nang kah hubang hue lawngtah buh a yeh u nawh?” tila a doet u.

Jesuh lawng, “Yuluipoei ah yulokung a awm khuiah poei aka bur kamyin thli te a kaw the u ai aw? Tede ahimi teng kalawng yulokung te athlala a khuenna khawhin apha vengah ahimi lawng buh a yeh u badai.
A-u lawngkhaw angki pawn te hisa athaai oen baw vai nawh, hisa athaai oen a baw atah angki ruem te a doek vetih a puut kau tare ai.

Te tih van angla a-u lawngkhaw, misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap ruem dawngah thloen nawh, athloen atah saphaw te puut ai, misurtui khaw ceu thloep vetih saphaw te khaw pawn ai. Tedawngah misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap athaai dawngah a thloen, te atah pahih bok la sueng ai, a tina.

He awl he Jesuh lawng a thui lii vengah Judah bawi pakhat te a tengla va law, a haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih, “Ka canu tapekca roe ah duek; va law lang a sawah na kut tloeng pe lah, ahih tah hing koep badai,” a tina.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng tho tih a hu ah a vai, a hubang hue khaw ahih oen cet haih u.
Kum thlaihih khui thi suntlaak tlawhna oen aka tlo hutaa pakhat Jesuh kah a hu ben kalawng va law tih ahih kah baidung te a tek.
Te hutaa lawng, “A baidung hmoi bueng mah ka tek mai kawinih ka hoeih sui de,” tila a thinkaw ah a poek.
Jesuh lawng a hu benla mang tih hutaa te a huh vengah, “Ka canu na ngaai mawng sak; na oengna lawng n'hoeih sak poen,” a tina. Teveng tue roe ah hutaa te hoeih pahoei.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng Judah bawi im khuila kuun. Rawkk im ah riingding aka tum hue oen curumngang la aka awm hue te a huh vengah,
“Cet u lah! hutaaca he a duek moenih, aka ip ni!” a tina. Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a nuihna u.
Thlaangping te a ceh boeih coeng khoeng ah Jesuh lawng hutaaca kah akhann khuila kuun, a kut ah a phoeih tih a thawh vengah hutaaca te tho.
He awlthang he a teng avaai kah ram pum boeih ah thaang khok.
Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak tih a ceh phai vengah mikpum thlaang pahih lawng a hu ah a vai hih tih, “Devid Capa, kaihih he n'reen lah!” tila paang hih.
Jesuh te im khuila a kuun vengah mikpum rawi te a tengla va law hih. Jesuh lawng. “Kai lawng kan hoeih sak thai ti he na oeng hih aw?” tila a doet. “Oeih, Bawipa! kan oeng” a tina hih.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih rawi kah mik te a tek pe tih, “Na oeng hih angla coengg hawn seh,” a tina.
Ahih rawi kah mik tah tueng koep. Jesuh lawng te rawi te “He he a-u tengah khaw thui roe roe boel,” a tina.
Tede te rawi lawng cet hih tih Jesuh kah awlthang te ram pum boeih ah a heh khonghak.
Te kah thlaang pahih te a mel vengah, thlaangvaang hue lawng raaithe aka khueh awlmueh thlaang pakhat te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u.
Jesuh lawng raaithe te a hek pe coeng khoeng ah te thlaang lawng cal thai koep tih te kah thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u. “Israel thlaang tim ah he ang he n'hu vai u nawh” ti u.
Tede Farasi hue lawngtah, “Raaithe hek thaina huham Jesuh aka pekung he Raaibawi ni,” ti u.
Jesuh lawng khawpui oen vangca boeih la cet tih a hiil. Sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei. Vaan ram kawng Awlthang Theen a phawng, tlawhnatna soeprep oen ah aka tlo thlaang boeih te a hoeih sak.
Jesuh lawng thlaang yahawh te a huh vengah doenkung aka awm nawh tuu angla, bawmkung taal tih lakueng rihna oen khawdeng ming ruila a awm u te a huh vengah a reen tangkiik.
Tedawngah a hubang hue tengah tila a thui, “Caang ah ham yahawh hlang de aka aat ham thlaang yawlca,
Caang aka aat thlaang yahawh avan tuihna ham lotoenkung tengah thangthui uh,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a hubang paha thlaihih hue te a khue tun tih, raaithe hek thaina, tlawhna oen natna soeprep hoeih sak thaina te a peek.
A hubang paha thlaihih hue kah a miing tah, “lamhacuekla Simon (Piter a ti u te) oen a manau Andru; Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen a manau Johan;
Filip oen Bartalomiu, Tawmas oen mangmu cawikung Matthai, Alfias capa Jeem, oen Tadias;
Phunkuup Simon oen Jesuh sawah paipi thleepkung Judah Iskariot, he hue ni.
Jesuh lawng a hubang paha thlaihih hue te he tila awl a uen tih a tuih u; “Gental ram oen Samaria ram khawpui boeih ah cet u boel.
Te lak ah Israel thlaangphun aka auh tuu tengah cet uh.”
Cet u lang, “Vaan ram tah yoeiica poen” tila phawng uh.
Thlaangtlo hoeih sak uh, thlaangduek thawh sak koep uh, haibe natna hoeih sak u lang raaithe thli te hek uh. Ayoela na dang u te ayoela pe u van.
Sui, ngun oen ruhum tangka khaw na angkithlep dawngah khuen u boel;
Yin cehna sawngsa khaw, Angki, khawmuek oen cawnghol khaw ahoei khuen u boel. Bii aka bi tah angoe boeih te peek la awm badai.
Khawpui khaw vangca vangnau khaw na pha u vengah awmngaihcala n'do tih aka pah sak ham koei im te tlap u lang na voei thlantoe te im ah cam uh.
Im khuila na kuun u vengah, “Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh,” tina uh.

Te imkhuikaw lawng nang te n'do tih m'pah sak atah na voemtoeina awl ngaimawngna tah te im khuiah awm hawn seh!; tede nangmi te n'do nawh tih m'pah sak nawh atah na voemtoeina awl ngaimawngna te lat koep uh.
Khatsut imkhuikaw, tihnawhtah khaaw pakhat khat lawngah nangmi te n'do nawh tih na awl thui te khaw a hutung nawh atah ceh taak lang na khow dawngkah laidiik te khoek pe uh,
Atak tang kavan thui u, “Awlcekna khawhin ah te khaaw kah thlaang thli lak ah Sodom oen Gomorrah khaaw kah thlaang thli te Pathen lawng a reen ngaai ai,” a tina.
“Hutung u lah! metaang tim ah tuu angla nangmi he kan tuih u. Tedawngah ruul angla na cuih khueh u lang akhuu angla na kaw daw sak uh.
Ngaithuen uh, nangmi te tuuk hamla thlaang va law ai, awlcekna yung la n'khuen u vetih sinakok bok-im ah khaw m'bawh u ai.
Kai kawng dawngah awlcek ham ukkung thli oen sengpahrang haiah n'khuen u vetih ahimi oen Gental hue tengah Awlthang Theen na phawng u ai.
Nangmi te awlcek ham n'khuen u vengah n'tu ka thui ai, metila ka thui ai tila lakueng u boel, atue a pha vengah na thui ham koei te m'peek badai.
Na thui ham koei awl te tah nangmi awl nawh ni. Te awl tah Pa Pathen Muithla lawng nangmi dawng kalawng a thui ai.

“Thlaang lawngah a maya manau te duek sak hamla thlaang kut ah a peek u ai, te tih van angla ana pa lawng a ca thli tengah a sai van ai; a ca thli lawngkhaw a manu oen ana pa te a raalna vetih ngawn sak hamla thlaangtloe kut ah a peek u ai.
Kai kawng dawngah thlaang boeih lawng nangmi te n'thina ai; tede a-u khaw aboettoe ueh atah Pathen lawng a thlawn ai.
Khaaw pakhat ah nangmi te n'heemtek tih ng'ngawn u atah khaw tloe la heeng uh. Atak tang kavan thui u! Thlaanghing Capa a law thlan ah Israel ram boeih ah bii na coeng u manawh.
“Sengcamoe lawng saya sawah awm nawh. Bawi sawah tamnaa lawngkhaw awm nawh.

Tedawngah sengcamoe lawng saya angla, tamnaa lawng a bawi angla a awm atah a kaw a tluep ham awm mai. Imkhuikaw kah a luu koek te Beelzebul tila a khue u atah, a cakaw hue tare tah te lak ah anauh ngaai miingthe oen a khue u ai!” a tina.
Tedawngah thlaang te rih u boel. Tahe ah thuh elh la aka awm boeih he phumpho vetih awlhuep boeih te ming la awm ai.
Yiin samangting ah kavan thui he hingthun khawse ah thui koep uh; ahuepla na yaak te imphu kalawng phawng uh.
Pum bueng a ngawn thai tih muithla aka ngawn thai nawh thlaang te rih u boel. Pum oen muithla pahih bokla hell khuiah aka ngawn thai Pathen te rih uh.
Pheksa seen pakhat oen variit pahih na lai thai. Tede variit pakhat Pateng na Pa lawng ming ohla dilai ah tla tih duek nawh.
Nangmi tare tah na luu dawngkah samthaam Pateng khaw a toek boeih.
Tedawngah rih u boel, nangmi tah variit yahawh lak ah na phu awm ngaai.”
“A-u khaw kai kah thlaang la a awmna te thlaangping haiah a pai puei khak atah vaan kah a Pa haiah ahih te ka pai puei van ai.
Tede a-u khaw thlaangping haiah kai aka hoett tah vaan kah a Pa haiah ahih te ka hoett van ai.
“Kai he dilai dawngah roepna awm sak hamla va law tila poek u boel, roepna awm sak ham ka law nawh, samsen ni kavan khuen.
Kai tah a capa oen ana pa, a canu oen a manu, a la-nga oen a manii raal u sak ham ni ka law.
Thlaang pakhat ham aka nauh koek raal tah amah cakaw ni.
“A-u khaw kai lak ah a manu oen ana pa te a thintlawhna ngaai atah kai kah hubang la koeih nawh: A-u khaw kai lak ah a capa oen a canu te a thintlawhna ngaai atah kai kah hubang la koeih nawh.
A-u khaw amah kah thinglam te a kawh tih ka hu aka vai nawh tah kai kah hubang la koeih nawh.
A-u khaw a hingna dang ham aka yawm tah a hingna a thlawng ai; a-u khaw kai kawng dawngah a hingna te a thlawng atah hingna te a dang ai.
“A-u khaw nangmi aka do thlaang tah kai aka do thlaang la awm tih a-u khaw kai aka do tah kai aka tuihkung te a do.

A-u khaw Pathen kah celtuih aka do tah Pathen kah celtuih a do dawngah celtuih hue kah kutdo te a dang van ai. A-u khaw thlaangdoeng pakhat te thlaangdoeng la a awm dawngah a do atah ahih kah kutdo te a dang van ai.
Atak tang kavan thui u; A-u lawngkhaw ka hubang thli yingkah huhsitkoek pakhat te kai kah hubang la a awm dawngah tuiding boengloeng khui at mai khaw a tuul atah kutdo a dang ngaai ai” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a hubang thlaangha thlaihih tengah he awl he a thui pe coengah te huen kalawng tho tih cang puei ham oen awlthang phawng ham a teng-avai kah khawpui boeih ah cet.
Baptisma pekung Johan lawng Jesuh Khrih kah thaihu a sai kawng te thongim kalawng a yaak vengah a hubang khatsut hue te Jesuh tengla a tuih.
“Aka law ham koei thlaang he nang poen aw? tih nawh atah thlaangtloe aw ka lamtoen u huen ai? van thui lah!” tila Jesuh te a doet sak.
Jesuh lawng, “Meel koep u lang, na yaak boeih oen na huh boeih te Johan tengah thui pe uh:

Mikpum lawng a mik tueng poen, Khawkheem lawng cet thai poen, haibe aka na lawng hoeih poen, haapang lawng awl a yaak, thlaangduek thli lawng tho tih khawdeng harah thli tengah Awlthang Theen phawng la awm poen.
Kai kawng dawngah uepvoetna aka khueh nawh tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm!”

Johan kah a hubang hue a ceh coengah, Johan kawng he Jesuh lawng thlaangping tengah a thui pe: “Ramhum huhang Johan tengla na ceh u vengah n'tu huh ham na ngaiuep u? Yilh lawng a yawng tih aka tat mailai capuu aw huh na ngaih u?
N'tu bueh hamla na ceh u? Bai-naak theen oen aka thoeicam u thlaang te huh ham aw? Te ang bai-naak aka buen te sengpahrang im ah ni a awm!
Van thui u lah, n'tu huh ham na ceh u? Tawngha aw? Oeih! tawngha na huh u; tede na bueh u te tawngha lak ah aka lenduet ni.
Johan he tah caciim dawngah: ‘Pathen lawng, nangmi hamla lawngpui roekbahkung ka laipai nangmi haiah kavan tuih ai,’ tila a thui te ni.
Atak tang kavan thui u, hutaa lawng a cuun thlaang tim ah Baptisma pekung Johan lak ah aka lenduet a-u khaw awm nawh. Tede Vaan ram ah huhsit koekla aka awm te Johan lak ah lenduet.
Johan lawng phungthui a tongcuek veng kalawng tihin toe Vaan Ram he raalna oen thekhana angaihhlangla a ming tih aka raalna thli lawng taa hamla tha a huer u.
Johan dung toe tawngha boeih oen Mosi kah Phungawl lawng Vaan ram kawng te a thui u.
Nangmi lawngah ahimi kah awl te tangna ham na ngaih u atah Johan he tah va law ai tila a thui oepsoeh u Elijah poen ni.
Tedawngah yaakna haa aka khueh lawng ya u hawn seh!
“Tahe san kah thlaang thli he n'tu oen nuem ka nuehtah lah ai? Ahimi tah thaihu yoeihna huen ah aka ngawl camaw thli oen lo u.
‘Thlaangvaang lawngah a tloe hue te, nangmi hamla yuluina riingding kavan tum u, tede na laam u nawh! duek laa kavan sak u, tede na rap u nawh! tila a paang thil u.’
Johan a law vengah, ahih lawng buh a yeh tih misurtui khaw a awkk nawh dawngah thlaang boeih lawng ahih tah raaithe oen be!’ na ti u.

Thlaanghing Capa a law vengah ahih lawng a caak a awkk dawngah thlaang boeih lawng, “He thlaang he bueh u lah! caruut awlam thlaang ni, mangmu cawikung hue oen thlaangthawlh hue kah a paya ni” na ti u. Tede Pathen cuihna tah soeng tila a saina oen a tueng sak” a tina.
Jesuh lawng kawpoekraina yahawh hlang a saina khawpui thli kah thlaang hue lawng thawlhna a yut u nawh dawngah te khawpui thli te a toel atham.

Korazin, nang hamla khawmap tangkiik nawh pai he! Betsaida, nang ham khaw khawmap tangkiik nawh pai he! nangmi tengkah kawpoekraina ka sai thli he Taiar oen Sidon ah ka sai kawinih te kah thlaang hue lawng a thawlh yutna tueng sakna ham tlamhi oen a thiing u coengah amah oen amah haiphu oen phull u vetih a thawlhna yut u poen sui de.
Atak tang kavan thui u; Awlcekna Hin ah Pathen lawng nangmi lak ah Taiar oen Sidon khaaw kah thlaang hue te a reen bet ai.

Nang Kapernaum namah oen namah vaan la pawmsang u ham na ngaih aw? Hell ah thlaak la na awm ai! Nangmi khaaw kah kawpoekraina ka sai he Sidon khaaw ah ka sai kawinih tihin toe ah te khaaw te awm hun sui de!
Atheenla ming uh! Awlcekna Hin ah Pathen lawng nang lak ah Sidon khaaw te a reen bet ai!” a tina.
Tevengah Jesuh lawng, “Apa, dilai oen vaan kah Bawipa! Thlaangcuih oen aka thoemthai hue tengah na thuh te aka thoemthai nawh hue tengah na tueng sak dawngah kan uem tangkiik.
Oeih, Apa, he ang he nang lawng coengg sak hamla na ngaih roe ni.” tila a thui.

“Apa lawng thaihu soeprep boeih m'peek poen. Apa nawh tah a-u lawngkhaw Capa te ming nawh. Capa oen amah te m'ming seh tila Capa lawng a tueng sak thlaang thli teng bueng nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw a Pa te ming u manawh.
“Thalrih aka phuei tih tha aka hoengg thli boeih ka tengla law u lah, kai lawngah duemdawngna kan pe u ai.
Kai kah hawphueih he lo lang phuei u lah, kai tah kawdaw oen boe-ngaaina thinkaw ka khueh dawngah kai tengah cang u lah; ngaimawngna kan pe ai.
Kai lawng kan phueih sak hawphueih tah a phueih khaw nep tih thalrih khaw yaanghoep,” a tina.
Tecoeng adiw aih thlan ah Jesuh tah sabbath hin ah lo lak kalawng pat cet. A hubang thli buh a pawng u dawngah caangvui te a yuun u tih a caak u.
Farasi thli lawng a huh vengah, Jesuh nala “Bueh lah, na hubang hue lawng sabbath hin ah he tila a sai u he kaimi kah Phungawl a phe,” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Devid oen a thlaang hue lawng a bung a pawng u vengah n'tu a sai tite na tae u nooek nawh aw?

Devid lawng Pathen im khuila kuun tih, Pathen tengah a peek u takawi, khawsoeih hue bueng lawng a caak koei takawi te Devid oen a thlaang hue lawng a caak u teta ahimi lawng Mosi phungawl eek u nawh aw?
Te bueng ohla sabbath hin takuem ah khawsoeih hue lawng Tempal khuiah sabbath phung a eek u poepa de thawlhna la awm nawh tite na tae u nawh aw?
Tempal lak ah aka lenduet he ah awm.”
Caciim lawng, “Kai tah boiava oen thawthueng lak ah reenna te ka ngaih ngaai a tite a thuingaihna awltak na ming u kawinih aka thawlh nawh thlaang thli te thawlh na peel u nawh sui de.
Metihtiah Thlaanghing Capa tah Sabbath Bawi ni” a tina.
Jesuh tah te huen kalawng cet tih sinakok bok-im la kuun.

Te kah sinakok bok-im ah kutkheem thlaang pakhat awm. Te ah te Jesuh thawlh peel ham aka ngaih thlaang khatsut awm. Ahimi lawng Jesuh te, “Sabbath hin ah thlaang hoeih sak ham mami kah Phungawl lawng a ngaih kai aw?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi timkah thlaang pakhat lawng tuu pakhat a khueh tih Sabbath hin ah ungrawm dung khuila tla kawinih tuu te doek tih lawh ohla na awm ai aw?
Thlaanghing he tuu lak ah a phu tlo. Tedawngah Sabbath hin ah thlaang bawmcem ham mami kah Phungawl lawng a ngaih” a tina.
Tecoengah te kah kutkheem thlaang te, “na kut yueng lah” a tina. Ahih lawng a kut te a yueng vengah khatben kut angla theen koep.
Tecoengah Farasi hue lawng cet u tih Jesuh te ngawn hamla a teeng u.
Jesuh amah ngawn ham a teeng u te a yaak vengah te huen kalawng ah cet. Tevengah thlaangping lawng a hu ah bung a vai u. Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo boeih te a hoeih sak.
Amah kawng te thlaangtloe tengah thui nawh ham a khaang pe.
He tila a sai he tah Pathen lawng tawngha Isaiah hawna oen: a thui oepsoeh te asoepna ham ni.
Isaiah lawng “He tah ka lungna, ka thinkaw aka deng ka tuihyoeihthlaang ka tuek te ni. Ahih sawah ka Muithla te ka khueh vetih, doengna phung te thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng ai.
Ahih lawngtah thlaang te oelhtaih nawh vetih paang manawh. Lawngpui ah a awl a kaa te a-u lawngkhaw ya manawh.
Doengna lawng taana te a khueh thlantoe toeng ohla a sai ai. Ahih lawngtah aka tlot tawm caapu thing te khaw khemtlot nawh vetih aka duek tawm hai-im te khaw thih yip manawh.
Ahih te thlaangphun boeih lawng a uepna ai,” tila a thui te a soepna ham ni.

Tecoengah thlaang khatsut lawng raaithe a khueh dawngah a mik pum tih awl aka mueh thlaang pakhat te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u. Jesuh lawng te thlaang te a hoeih sak dawngah awl khaw a thui thai tih a mik khaw tueng koep.
Jesuh kah a saina dawngah thlaang broe lawng a kawpoek rai u tih, “Ahih he Devid Capa tangtang cawini!” ti u.
Farasi hue lawng he awl he a yaak vengah ahimi lawng;” Ahih lawngah raaithe a hek thai he tah ahimi ukkung Beelzebul lawng raaithe hek thaina huham tharana a peek dawngah ni,” a tina u.

Ahimi kah poekna te Jesuh lawng a ming tih ahimi tengah, “Ram pakhat ah a kawpoek vai u nawh tih athloekla pek u tih raal u kawinih asanhlang cak manawh. Tih van angla khawpui pakhat tihnawhtah imkhuikaw pakhat ah pek bo u tih raal u kawinih pai thai manawh.
Tedawngah Seitan ram khuiah bu pakhat oen pakhat raal u kawinih te ram te bu la pek u poen dawngah kawlkalh ah rawk ai.

Nangmi lawngah Beelzebul lawng huham tharana a peek dawngah kai lawng raaithe a hek thai na ti u. Tetih atah nangmi kah hubang hue te raaithe hek thaina huham tharana a-u lawng a peek kai? Nangmi kah sai thawlh he namami kah hubang hue lawng a tueng sak!

Raaithe hek thaina huham he Beelzebul kah nawh ni, tede kai he raaithe hek thaina huham tharana pekung tah Pathen Muithla ni, raaithe hek thaina lawng he nangmi sawah Pathen ram avan pha poen tite a tueng sak.
“A tha aka ra thlaang te a piin lamha nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw a im te a muk tih a kaawn te lawh pe thai nawh; amah te a piin coengah a kaawn te a lawh pe thai ai.
A-u khaw kai aka pai puei nawh tah kai aka raalna thlaang ni. A-u khaw kai lawng thlaang ka caawi vengah aka caawi puei nawh tah pekbokung ni.

Tedawngah kavan thui u, thlaanghing lawng me ang thawlhna khaw a sai tih Pathen thekhana awlthe awlkha phoei mai cakhaw a sawah khawdawp a ngaai pe ai, tede a-u khaw Ciim Muithla thekhana awl a thui atah a sawah khawdawp ngaai pe manawh.

A-u khaw thlaanghing Capa raalna awlthe thui mai cakhaw a sawah khawdawp a ngai ai, tede a-u khaw Ciim Muithla raalna awlthe aka thui tah tahe ah khaw, hailam ben toe meveng khaw a sawah khawdawp ngaai pe tlaih manawh.” a tina.
“Athaih theen dang ham thingkung theen khueh a ngoe. Thingkung the na khueh atah athaih the van ai. Ame ang thingkung tite athaih rang oen m'ming thai ai.
Nangmi ruul hue; Na the u lal maiah metila awltheen na thui u thai ai? Lungbui khuiah aka awm te kaa dawng kalawng va thoeng.
Thlaangdoeng lawngtah thaihu theen a kuem khuikah thaihu theen te a pho sak; Thlaangthe lawngtah thaihu the a kuem khuikah thaihu the te a pho sak van.
Atak tang kavan thui u; “Awlcekna Hin atah thlaang boeih lawng awlpoei a thuina dawngah awlcekna a yawkk ai.
Na dok oen na tangna te mingna ham namah kah awlthui te awlcekna ham a hawna ai.”
Tecoengah Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut oen Farasi khatsut hue lawng,” Saya! kawpoekraina na sai te huh ham ka ngaih u” a tina.

Jesuh lawng “Tahe san kah thlaangthe oen Pathen n'tu la aka sak nawh thlaang hue nangmi lawng kawpoekraina sai ham nan ceel u? Ka sai manawh! Atloe kawpoekraina nawh tih Tawngha Jonah kah kawpoek-raina bueng te ni na huh u ai.
Jonah tah nga bung khuiah yiin daai hin thum a awm angla Thlaanghing Capa khaw yiin daai hin thum dilai khuiah awm van ai.

Nineveh khawpui kah thlaang thli lawng Jonah kah phungthui awl a yaak u dawngah a thawlhna yut u, Awlcekna Hin ah ahimi lawng pai vetih nangmi te thawlh n'peel u ai. Atak tang kavan thui u, Jonah lak ah aka lenduet he ah awm.

Sheba sengpahrang Nu lawng Solomon kah cuihna awl hutung ham athlahlang amah ram kalawng va law; Awlcekna Hin ah ahih lawng pai vetih nangmi te thawlh n'pup ai. Atak tang kavan thui u, Solomon lak ah aka lenduet he ah awm” a tina.
“Thlaang pakhat kaw khui kalawng raaithe te a co vengah, ramhum huhang a hiil tih a awmna huen a tlap: a awmna huen a dang nawh vengah,
Ka im la ka meel koep ai, tila a poek. Tedawngah a meel koep phai vengah im aciimbiitla awm tih atheenla thaihu akuem te a huh.

Tecoengah cet koep tih amah lak ah aka the ngaai raaithe pasarih te avan law puei tih te im ah awm u. Tedawngah a hukhueng ah te thlaang tah acuek veng lak ah nauh tare. He tih van angla tahe san kah thlaangthe thli tengah awm van ai” a tina.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping tim ah awl a thui lii vengah, a manu nucahui law u tih ahih oen awl thui a ngaih u dawngah im adau ben ah pai u.
Tedawngah thlaangping timkah thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh te “Bueh lah! na nu nucahui nang oen awl thui a ngaih u tih adau ben ah pai u” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “A nu te a-u nuem? ka manau hue te a-u nuem?” a tina.
Tecoengah a hubang hue te a khi tih, “Bueh u lah! a nu oen ka manau hue tah ahimi he ni!
A-u khaw vaan ah aka awm a Pa kawngaih aka sai tah ka maya, ka manau, ka ngannu oen a nu ni,” a tina.
Te hin ah Jesuh lawng te im te a thawh taak tih Galili tuiliikeeng la cet; cang puei ham te ah te ngawl.
Ahih aka veel thlaangping a yahawh aih dawngah Jesuh tah lowng khuila kuun tih ngawl; thlaangping hue tah tuilii-keeng ah pai u.
Jesuh lawng thuidoetna awl oen ahimi te thaihu moen a thui pe. “Voei khat ah caangti hehkung thlaang pakhat tah caangti heh hamla cet.
Ahih lawng caangti te lo khuiah a heh vengah khatsut tah lawngpui ah tla tih va lawng a ruh boeih.
Caangti khatsut tah lungrawng sawkah dilai ah tla, dilai apam dawngah kawlkalh ah caangti tah po.
Tede khaw a ling hang atah caangpawk te khawling lawng a kaang, a yung te a dung la a thlak nawh dawngah kawlkalh ah yai tih reu.
Caangti khatsut tah thliing tim ah tla, thliingkung tah roeng hang tih caang te malh a telh.
Tede caangti khatsut tah laitheen dawngah tla tih a vui a thaih thaawn. Khatsut tah apueh yakhat, sawmruk, sawm thum toe la nawl.”
Jesuh lawng, “Yaakna haa aka khueh lawng ya hawn seh” a tina.
Tecoengah a hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih, “Thlaangping tengah awl na thui vengah n'tu hamla thuidoetna awl na hawna?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Vaan ram kawng awlhuep mingna te nangmi tengah kan peek poen, tede ahimi tah ka pe thlan.
A-u khaw aka khueh te tah a taawm pe vetih a ngoena lak ah a khueh tare ai; tede aka khueh nawh te tah a khueh duen te a lawh pe ai.
Ahimi tengah awl ka thui vengah thuidoetna ka hawna he tah ahimi lawng a bueh u, tede hu u nawh, a hutung u, tede ya u nawh, yaakming khaw yaakming u nawh.
Tedawngah Tawngha Isaiah lawng a thui oepsoeh awl te ahimi tengah soep. Te awl tah: “He thlaang hue lawng a hutung tah a hutung u de, yaakming u nawh; a bueh tah a bueh u de hu u nawh,

Metihtiah a kawpoek biing sut tih a haa a buem khoep u, a mik te a yiin khoep u, tih nawh kawinih ahimi mik lawng a huh vetih a haa lawng a yaak coengah a thinkaw lawng a yaakming vetih ka tengla va meel u ai, ahimi te kai lawng ka hoeih sak sui de” tila Pathen lawng a thui te ni.
“Nangmi tah na yotheen phoeih. Na mik lawng a huh tih na haa lawng a yaak u.

Atak tang kavan thui u, nangmi lawng na huh u he tawngha hue oen Pathen kah thlaang hue lawng huh ham a ngaih u tangkiik de hu u thai nawh; nangmi lawng na yaak te yaak ham a ngaih de ya u nawh,” a tina.
Tedawngah caangti hehkung thuidoetna awl thuicaihna he hutung u lang yaakming u lah.
A-u khaw Vaan ram kawng awlthang a yaak de aka yaakming nawh te tah lawngpui ah aka tla caangti oen lo u. Ahimi thinkaw ah a heh u caangti te Seitan lawng law tih a rot pe.
Lungrawng sawkah dilai apamna ah aka tla caangti tah Vaan ram kawng a yaak vengah awmngaihcala aka do koeloe thlaang oen lo u.

Tede, ahimi kah thinkaw lungbui ah Vaan ram kawng a thlengyung a thlaak nawh dawngah asan hlang hing nawh. Tedawngah Vaan ram kawng dawngah thekha raina oen heemtekna soeprep a law vengah ahimi lawng kawlkalh ah a hoett pahoei.

Thliing tim ah aka tla caangti thui-ngaihna tah Vaan ram kawng tah a yaak de dilai khawsakna dawngah lakueng tih dilai han bawilen ngaihna lawng akang ahalh khoep tih caangvui caangthaih aka thaawn nawh oen lo u.
Laitheen dawngah aka tla caangti tah Vaan ram kawng te a yaak tih aka yaakming thlaang te a thuingaihna, ahimi tah a vui athaih thaawn tih apueh yakhat, apueh sawmruk, apueh sawmthum la thaawn.
Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah atloe thuidoetna pakhat a thui pe: “Vaan ram tah amah lo ah caangti theen aka heh thlaang pakhat oen lo u.
Yiin at atah, thlaang boeih a ih coengah raal pakhat law tih caang tim ah varaamcaang a heh tih a ceh taak.
Caangkung tah roeng tih avui arai hang atah varaamcaang khaw pho van.
Lokhuehkung kah a tuihyoeihthlaang hue lawng a tengla law u tih, Bawipa! na lo khuiah caangti theen ni na heh de, ame kah varaamcaang he a po oh kai?” a tina u.
Ahih lawngah, “Te ngoen tah raal thli lawng a heh ni,” a tina. Ahimi lawng, “Ka cet u silang varaamcaang te ka phuk u ai aw?” tila a doet u.
Lokhuehkung lawng “Phuk u boel,” varaamcaang te na phuk u kawinih caangkung oen na phuk renten u hau ai” a tina.

Caang ah tue a pha thlantoe caangkung oen varaamcaang te roeng haih hawn seh. Caang ah tue a pha vengah cang-aat hue te lamhala varaamcaang te phuk, tuum u langtah hai dawngah phuum uh, te coengah caang te aat uh! caawi u langtah ka thaidi khuiah sang uh, ka tina badai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng atloe thuidoetna pakhat ahimi tengah a thui pe: “Vaan ram tah he tila awm. Thlaang pakhat lawng antammu a lawh tih a lo khuiah a heh.
Antammu tah amu-ati boeih lak ah a yiitkoek la awm. Tede po tih a roeng hang atah akung boeih lak ah aka bo koek la awm. Thingkung pakhat la pai, va thli law tih a beek dawngah bu a tuk.”

Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah atloe thuidoetna pakhat a thui pe baal: “Vaan ram tah he tila awm. Hutaa pakhat lawng tawlru a lawh tih taa-eek hawl at dawng a phull atah a raawi sak boeih oen lo u” tila Jesuh lawng a tina.
Jesuh lawng he thaihu boeih thlaangping tengah a thui vengah thuidoetna a hawna. Thuidoetna hawna ohla n'tu khaw thui nawh.
He tila a thui he tah Tawngha lawng, “Ahimi tengah awl ka thui vengah thuidoetna ka hawna ai; Dilai a suen cuek kalawng ming nooek nawh awlhuep te ka thui ai,” tila a thui te a soepna ham ni.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping te a ceh taak tih im khuila a kuun vengah a hubang hue a tengla law u tih, “Lo khuikah varaamcaang thuidoetna te acaihla van thui lah” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Caangti theen aka heh tah Thlaanghing Capa ni;
Lo tah he dilai ni; caangti theen tah Vaan ram aka paang thlaang hue ni; varaamcaang tah Seitan kah thlaang hue ni;
Varaamcaang aka heh raal tah Seitan ni; caang ah tue tah dilai a boetna; caangaatkung tah vanthlaang hue ni.
Varaamcaang te a caawi tih hai dawng a phuum angla dilai aboet tue atah te tila awm van ai.
Thlaanghing Capa lawng vanthlaang thli te avan tuih vetih thawlhna ben la thlaang aka ceh sak boeih oen thaihu the aka sai boeih te amah Ram khuiah a caawi sak vetih,
Vanthlaang lawng ahimi te haialh dawngah a phuum ai, te huen ah rap vetih a naw a rueng u ai.
Tevengah thlaangdoeng thli tah ana pa Pathen kah Ram ah khaw angla see u ai. Tedawngah yaakna haa aka khueh lawng ya u lah!” a tina.

“Vaan ram tah he oen lo u. Thlaang pakhat lawng lo ah khawh-arang a thuh te a huh. Ahih lawng atheenla a up koep tih awmngaihla im la cet. A khueh thaihu boeih te a yoeih coengah meel koep tih te kah lohuen te a lai.
“Tecoengah Vaan ram tah he oen lo u. Thlaang pakhat lawng latha theen a tlap,
A hih lawng latha theen te a huh vengah cet tih a khueh thaihu boeih te a yoeih coengah te kah latha te a lai.
“Tecoengah Vaan ram tah he oen lo u. Tui aka hawi khatsut hue lawng tuilii khuiah lok te a heeng u tih nga phun soeprep te a tuuk u.
Lok dawngah nga a be atah lan la a doek u tih nga te pekbo hamla ngawl u: nga atheen te busui dawngah a sang u tih nga athe te tah a voeih u.
Dilai aboet tue atah he tila awm van ai: vanthlaang lawng law vetih thlaang theen timkah thlaangthe te a tuek coengah,
Ahimi te haialh dawngah a phuum ai. Te huen ah ahimi lawng rap vetih a naw a rueng u ai,” tila a thui pe u.
Jesuh lawng, “He thaihu boeih he na yaakming u aw?” tila ahimi te a doet. Ahimi lawngah, “Oeih! ka yaakming u poen” a tina.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng, “Phung-awl cangpueikung timkah thlaang pakhat, Vaan ram ah hubang pakhat la aka awm tah kaawn a khuehna im khui-kah thaihu aruem oen athaai aka sat oen lo u,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng thuidoetna he a thui boeih coengah, te huen te a ceh taak tih,

Amah awmna Nazaret la meel koep. Sinakok ah a cang puei tih ahih kah awl aka ya thlaang boeih a kawpoek rai u. “He ang cuihna he me kah a huh kai? He ang kawpoekraina he metila a sai thai kai?” tila te doet u patoeng.
“Ahih he lettama capa nawh aw? Meri he ahih kah a manu nawh aw? Jeem, Josep, Simon oen Judah he ahih kah a manau thli nawh aw?
He kah aka awm he a ngannu thli nawh aw? He ang thaihu boeih he me kah a dang kai?” ti u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh te hinyah u nawh. Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Tawngha tah amah awmna khawpui oen a imkhuikaw nawh atah huen tloe boeih ah a hinyah u,” a tina.
Metihtiah ahimi lawng oengna a khueh nawh dawngah Jesuh lawng te huen ah kawpoekraina yahawh sai nawh.
Teveng tue ah Galili peng ukkung Herod lawng Jesuh kawng te a yaak.
Herod lawng, “Ahih tah aka hing koep baptisma pekung Johan tang tang ni, tedawngah kawpoekrai saithaina huham a khueh,” tila a kut hui kah bawi hue te a thui pe.
Teveng thlan ah Herod lawng Johan te a tuuk sak tih thong khuiah a thlaak. Ahih lawng tila a sai he tah a manau Filip kah a yu Herodias kawng dawngah ni.
Voei khat ah Baptisma pekung Johan lawng Herod te, “Herodias he na yuna ham tuueng nawh,” a tina.
Herod lawng ahih te ngawn ham a ngaih. Tede, Judah thlaang thli lawng Johan te tawngha pakhat ni a ti u dawngah ahimi te a rih.
Herod a cuunna hin ah Herodias canu lawng kamyin thlaang yahawh haiah laam. Herod tah a kaw hoe tangkiik tih,
Hutaaca tengah, “Na van bih boeih te kan pe ai,” tila a taap tih awl a kam.
Hutaaca lawng a manu kah ceemtuh angla a bih tih, “Baptisma pekung Johan kah a luu te beelphai dawngah tahe ah m'peh,” a tina.
Sengpahrang tah a kawthe, tede ahih lawng kamyin boeih haiah awl a kam poen dawngah hutaaca kah a bihna angla peek ham Herod lawng awl a peek.
Tedawngah thongim khuikah Johan luu te a tloek sak.
A luu te beelphai dawngah avan khuen u tih hutaaca te a peek u, hutaaca lawng a manu tengla a khuen.
Johan kah hubang thli law u, a rawkk te a khuen u tih a up u, tecoengah ahimi lawng cet u tih Jesuh tengah a thui pe u.

Jesuh lawng Johan kawng awlthang te a yaak vengah te huen kalawng thlaang a awmna nawh a dingruena huen la lowng oen amah bueng cet. Te kawng te thlaang yahawh lawng a yaak. Tedawngah a awmna khaaw roekk kalawng law u tih lanloeih lawngpui kalawng Jesuh te a hu ah a vai u.
Jesuh te lowng dawng kalawng lan la rum tih thlaangping te a huh vengah ahimi te caalla a reen tih thlaangtlo boeih te a hoeih sak.

Thlemben tue apha veng atah a hubang hue a tengla law u tih, “Khaw thlem poen, he huen tah thlaang a awmna nawh huen la awm, thlaangping he khaaw khui la tuih lang a mami ham caak awkk lai u seh,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Ahimi ceh ham ngoe nawh,’ “Nangmi lawng caak koei pe uh,” a tina.
A hubang hue lawng, “Takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih bueng ni ka khueh u,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Ka tengla van khuen u lah,” a tina.

Thlaangping te pompih dawngah ngawlh ham awl a peek; tecoengah takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih te a lawh, vaan la maang tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui. Jesuh lawng takawi te a eh coengah a hubang hue te a peek tih a hubang hue lawng thlaangping tengah a ree pe.
Thlaang boeih lawng a caak tih a bung hah. Tecoengah a caak coeih te a hubang hue lawng vawhphueih paha thlaihih la a caawi u.
Buh aka ca boeih tah hutaa oen camaw toek ohla tawngpataang hawng ah thlaang thong ngaa yunyan awm ai.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping te a mel sak veng te ah a hubang hue te lowng khuila a kuun sak tih lamhala tuilii khatben rall la a tuih.
Thlaangping te a tuih boeih coengah Jesuh tah thangthui ham amah bueng tlaang la luui. Khaw athlem atah Jesuh amah bueng te huen ah awm.
Lowng te tuirall kalawng athlana tuiluung a pha vengah thlipui tho tih lowng te a maam khak dawngah, tuilet lawng dalh a khup.
Cinghuetaang atah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengla tui sawah cet.
Tui sawah a ceh te ahimi lawng a huh u vengah let u tih, “Muithla ni,” ti u tih paang u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te a voem pahoei tih, “Lakueng u boel! Kai ni; rih u boel,” a tina.
Tecoengah Piter lawng, “Bawipa, nang tang tang atah na teng la tui sawah ka lawna ham awl m'pe lah,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Va law lah!” a tina. Tedawngah Piter te lowng khui kalawng rum tih Jesuh tengla tui sawah cet.
Tede Piter lawng khawthlii a tlawh hlang te a huh vengah a rih tih tui khuiah dalh buekk. “Bawipa n'thlawn lah!” tila paang.
Jesuh lawng a kut a phawng pahoei tih ahih te a phoeih coengah, “Na oengna yawl tangkiik! n'tu dawngah uepvoetna na khueh?” a tina.
Ahih rawi te lowng khuila a kuun hih coeng atah khawthlii dip.
Tecoengah lowng khuiah a hubang hue lawng Jesuh te a bok u. Ahimi lawng, “Nang tah Pathen Capa tang tang ni!” a tina u.
Ahimi lawng tuilii ah te kat u tih Gennesaret ram te a pha u.
Te kah thlaang hue lawng Jesuh te a noek u. Tedawngah a teng-avai kah thlaangtlo boeih te a khue u tih Jesuh tengla avan law puei u.
Thlaangtlo thli lawng Jesuh kah himbai hmoi te tek ham a bih u tih aka tek boeih tah hoeih u.
Tecoengah Farasi khatsut oen Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut te Jesuh tengla Jerusalem kalawng law u tih,
“N'tu dawngah na hubang hue lawng mami patuer thli kah cang puei awl te a eek u? Ahimi lawng buh caak thlan ah kut sil u nawh!” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng, “N'tu dawngah, Pathen kah awlpeek te na vai u nawh tih namami kah cang puei bueng na vai u?” a tina.
Pathen lawng, na nu oen na pa te hinyah uh! a-u khaw a manu oen ana pa te a tap avoep atah duek sak ham awm” ti.
Tede nangmi kah cang puei tah thlaang pakhat mai lawngah a manu oen ana pa bawmna hamla thaihu pakhat mai khaw a khueh te, “He tah Pathen koe ni,” a ti atah,
‘A manu oen ana pa te hinyah ham ngoe tlaih nawh,” na ti u. He tila namami kah cangpueina bueng te na vai u tih Pathen kah awlpeek te n'tu la na sak u nawh.
Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Isaiah lawng nangmi kawng a thui oepsoeh te soeng tang tang!
Isaiah lawng, “He thlaang hue lawng awlhong oen kai ng'hinyah u, tede a thinkaw lungbui tah kai oen thla tangkiik.
Ahimi lawng thlaanghing kah sai coplap phung te kai kah awlpeek angla a cang puei dawngah, kai m'bok u he khaw a poei ni; tila Pathen lawng ti,” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te a tengla a khue tih ahimi te, “Hutung u lang yaakming u lah!
Thlaang aka ciimcaih sak nawh thaihu he tah kaa khui kalawng aka kuun he nawh ni, kaa khuikah aka thoeng lawng ni thlaang he a ciimcaih sak nawh” a tina.
Tecoengah a hubang hue ahih tengla law u tih, “Na awlthui lawngah Farasi hue a thin a sa sak he na ming aw?” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Vaan a Pa kah thingliing nawh thingkung boeih tah a phuk ai;
“Ahimi kawngah lakueng u boel! ahimi tah mikpum aka mawt mikpum hue ni, mikpum pakhat lawng atloe mikpum te a mawt atah ungrawm khuila bok tla hih ai,” a tina.
Piter lawng, “Te thuidoetna awl te kaimi tengah aciimla van thui lah!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah, “Nangmi he tahe toe thlaangtloe lak ah na cuih u thlan nawh pai he!
“Na yaakming u nawh aw? Thlaang kaa khuiah aka kuun thaihu boeih tah a bung khui a pha tih te kalawng naatceh la thoeng.
Tede kaa khuikah aka thoeng hang thaihu tah thinkaw lungbui khui kalawng law tih te thaihu lawng thlaang ciimcaih sak nawh.
Thlaang ngawnna, samphaihna, hutaa tawngpa thawlhna, atheen nawh thaihu saina, huuenna, hoemna, thlaang thaang the sakna, poekna atloe boeih he tah lungbui khui kalawng ni a law.
He ang thli lawng thlaang a hawt a aih, tede ahimi kah a thui angla kut silh ohla buh caakna lawng thlaang he a hawt a aih moenih,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak tih Taiar oen Sidon peng la cet.
Te peng kah aka awm Kanaan nu pakhat a tengla law tih, “Devid Capa!” Kai he n'reen lah, ka canu tah raaithe lawng a tuuk tih nauh tangkiik,” tila angaihhlangla paang.
Tede Jesuh lawng kam at khaw voem nawh. A hubang thli a tengla law u tih, “Ahih he tuih loeih, mami hu ah bang tih thlaangngeu palaawn la paang khiing,” a tina u.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Israel thlaang aka auh tuuca ham bueng ni ka law,” a tina.
Tevengah te kah hutaa lawng Jesuh khow kungah buekuep tih, “Bawipa! kai he n'reen mai hawn lah,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Camaw kah buh te lawh tih ui m'peek pe atah soeng nawh,” a tina.
Te hutaa lawng, “Bawipa, na thui te soeng tak tak, tede ui lawngkhaw a Bawipa kah caboi dawng kalawng aka tla buhdik anhaai te a caak van ta,” a tina.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng, “Nang tah oengcakna aka khueh hutaa ni! na ngaihna angla coengg hawn seh,” a tina. Teveng tue roe ah a canu te hoeih pahoei.
Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak tih, Galili tuiliikeeng ah cet. Tecoengah tlaang la luui hang tih ngawl.
Thlaangping lawng ah khawkheem thli, mikpum thli, aka khawn thli, awlmueh oen atloe thlaangtlo te avan law puei u tih, Jesuh kah a khow kungah a khueh u tih ahimi boeih te Jesuh lawng a hoeih sak.
Awlmueh lawng cal thai, aka khawn thli lawng theen, khawkheem lawng cet thai, mikpum lawng a mik a tueng koep te thlaangping lawng a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai u tih Israel Pathen te a thangpawm u.

Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te a tengla a khue tih, “Thlaangping he kai oen hin thum ka awm haih u poen tih tahe ah buh caak ham a khueh u tlaih nawh dawngah ka reen tangkiik, lawngpueng ah tawnba u hau ai ka ti dawngah ahimi he buh cah ohla im la tuih ham ka ngaih nawh,” a tina.
A hubang hue lawng, “He thlaangping he yoeh kok ham he ramhum ah ame kah buh caak khoek kaimi lawng ka dang ai?” tila Jesuh te a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Takawi meyoeh na khueh u?” a tina. Ahimi lawng “Takawi cuun rih oen nga ayawlca tah awm,” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te dilai dawngah a ngawlh sak.
Tecoengah takawi cuun rih oen nga te a lawh tih Pathen tengah uemna awl a thui coengah takawi oen nga te a eh tih a hubang hue te a peek. A hubang hue lawng thlaangping tengah a ree pe.
Ahimi lawng ahah la a caak u. A caak coeih te a hubang hue lawng vawh phueih pasarih dawngah abecala a kawh u.
Aka ca boeih te hutaa oen camaw toek ohla tawngpataang hawng ah thawnglii law.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te a tuih coengah lowng oen Makadan ram la cet.
Farasi oen Sadusi khatsut te Jesuh tengla law u tih a thawlhna tlap ham a ngaih u dawngah, Pathen kah thlaangtuih la na awm ti he mingna ham kawpoekraina van sai lah tila a ceel u.
Tede Jesuh lawng, “thlemben ah khaw a pang yuuk atah, khaw theen ai na ti u!

‘Mincang ah khaw pang tih khaw a mai atah khaw tlan ai na ti u.’ Nangmi lawng vaan na dan u rang oen khaw theen ai, khaw tlan ai, tila na thui u thai, tede tahe kah atue noekna he tah na ming u thai nawh!

Tihin hang kah thlaang hue he me tih aihla na the tangkiik u tih Pathen khaw na ming u nawh! Nangmi lawng kawpoekraina na van bih u? Ka sai manawh! Nangmi ham kawpoekraina tah Jonah kah kawpoekraina bueng te ni na huh u ai,” a tina. Tedawngah ahimi te a thawh taak tih atloela cet.
A hubang hue lawng tuilii khatben ral la a kat phai u vengah ahimi lawng buh khuen ham a hilh u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah, “Dalra u boel; Farasi oen Sadusi hue kah tawlru te anepla ngaithuen uh,” a tina.
Tevengah amami pakhat oen khat te, “Mami lawng buh ng'khuen u nawh tih he awl he a thui cawini,” ti u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi kah awl thui te a ming tih ahimi te, “Buh na khuen u nawh kawng te n'tu la na thui khiing u? Na oengna yawl tangkiik u nawh pai he!
Tahe toe ah na yaakming u thlan aw? Kai lawng takawi cuun ngaa ka eh tih thlaang thong ngaa ka cah te na hilh u poen aw? Acoeih te vawh meyoeh dawngah a be?
Tecoengah takawi cuun rih thlaang thong lii ka cah te na hilh u poen aw? Acoeih te vawh meyoeh dawngah a be?
Nangmi tengah kavan thui he buh kawng nawh ni ti he n'tu ah na yaakming u nawh? Farasi oen Sadusi hue kah tawlru te ngaithuen uh,” a tina.
Tevengah a hubang hue lawng, ngaithuen uh, ati he takawi dawngah a hawna tawlru nawh tih Farasi oen Sadusi hue kah cangpueina ni tila a yaakming u.
Jesuh lawng Sisaria Filipi khawpui tengvaai ah cet tih te huen ah a hubang hue te, “Thlaang thli lawng Thlaanghing Capa he a-u a ti u? tila a doet.
Ahimi lawng, “Khatsut lawng Baptisma pekung Johan,” ti u, atloe hue lawng, “Elijah,” ti u, atloe khatsut lawng, “Jeremiah nawh atah atloe tawngha pakhat khat cawini ti u,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi lawng ta, kai he a-u na ti u?” tila a doet.
Simon Piter lawng, “Nang tah aka hing Pathen Capa Messiah ni,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Johan capa Simon, na yo theen phoeih,” He awltak he thlaanghing teng kalawng na tengla law nawh, tede vaan ah aka awm a Pa kah peek ni.
Tedawngah na tengah kavan thui, Piter: nang tah lungto ni! He lunghiim lungdangsuem dawngah ka Khrihcabu ka pai sak ai, duekna lawng Pateng taa thai manawh.
Vaan ram caabi na tengah kan pe ai; dilai dawngah thawhka na khaih boeih te tah vaan ah khaw khaih la awm van ai, dilai dawngah thawh na awng pe te tah vaan ah khaw a awng pe van ai,” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah amah te Messiah ni tila a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham awl a uen u.

Teveng tue kalawng ah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah, “Jerusalem la ka cet vetih Judah ahaamca thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen ah phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng patang n'khang sak ai, kai he ng'ngawn u ai, tede athum hin ah thawh sak koep la ka awm vetih ka hing ai,” tila acairaula a thui pe.
Piter lawng Jesuh te atloela yawp a ceh puei tih a siim. “Bawipa he ang thaihu he Pathen lawng thoeng sak boel seh, te ang te mevengah khaw na sawah van pha roe boel seh,” a tina.

Jesuh lawng Piter te a mang thil ket tih, “Seitan! Ka teng kalawng cet lah, na poekna he Pathen teng kah law nawh tih thlaanghing ben kalawng a law dawngah, ka cehna lawngpui kanghalhkung la na awm,” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te, “A-u khaw ka hu ah law ham a ngaih atah amah kawngaih te hoett selang amah kah thinglam kawh ruila ka hu ah bang seh.
A-u khaw a hingna thlawn ham aka ngaih tah a hingna te a thlawng ai. Tede a-u khaw kai kawng dawngah a hingna te a sung atah hingna a dang ai.
Thlaang pakhat lawng dilai pum he pang mai cakhaw a hingna a thlawng atah n'tu nuem aphu aka awm? Aphu awm nawh! A hingna dang koep ham n'tu oen khaw thaw thai manawh.
Thlaanghing Capa tah ana Pa kah ruep-awmna oen amah kah vanthlaang thli oen ah va rum thuk vetih thlaang boeih te bii a bina taring ah kutdo a peek ai.
Atak tang kavan thui u, Thlaanghing Capa lawng Sengpahrang angla a law te na huh u thlantoe aka duek nawh ham koei thlaang khatsut tah he ah na awm u,” a tina.
Hinruk a diw raih coengah Jesuh lawng Piter, Jeem oen Johan te tlaangsawm la a luui puei tih amami bueng te huen ah awm u,
Tevengah ahimi mik huh ah Jesuh kah a muei te thawleng u: a mik-hai tah khawmik angla aang tih a bai a naak khaw bawk tih aang rawngtheng.
Tecoengah Mosi oen Elijah tah Jesuh oen ah awl a thui u te a hubang pathum hue lawng a huh.
Tedawngah Piter lawng Jesuh nala “Bawipa, he huen ah mami awm ham theen tangkiik. Na kawngaih atah im pathum: nang ham pakhat, Mosi ham pakhat, Elijah ham pakhat he ah ka sa u ai,” a tina.

Piter lawng awl a thui lii vengah ahimi te aka bawk tangkiik muui lawng a thiing khoep u tih muui khuikah awl lawng, “He tah ka lungvatna ka Capa ni, ahih sawah ka kaw hoe, a awl ngaai pe uh,” tila a thui.
Te awl te a hubang hue lawng a yaak vengah a rih tangkiik u dawngah dilai ah a mik-hai a buengkhuem tih kawpp u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi tengla law tih ahimi te a tek. “Tho u loeih, rih u boel!” a tina.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng a bueh vengah, Jesuh bueng nawh tah a-u khaw hu u tlaih nawh.
Tlaangsawm kalawng a rum thuk u vengah, ahimi te, “He kah na huh u huhthlaam he Thlaanghing Capa duekna kalawng a thawh thlantoe thui u boel,” tila awl a uen.
Tecoengah a hubang hue lawngah, “N'tu dawngah phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng Elijah he lamhacuekla law ai a ti u kai? tila Jesuh te a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Elijah tah lamhacuekla law tangtang vetih soeprep boeih te aroek abah oepsoeh ai.
Tede kavan thui u, Elijah tah law coeng poen de thlaang lawng a ming u nawh dawngah amami ngaikhuekla ahih te a thena u. Tetih van angla Thlaanghing Capa he khaw a thekhana u ai,” a tina.
Tecoengah a hubang hue lawng Baptisma pekung Johan kawng ni ahimi tengah avan thui tila a yaakming u.
Ahimi lawng thlaangping tengla a mel koep u vengah, Jesuh tengla thlaang pakhat law tih a haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih,
“Bawipa, ka capa he van reen lah! Ahih tah raaihum tlawhna a khueh tih patang a khang tangkiik. Hai dawngah khaw, tui dawngah khaw tlim taitu.
Na hubang hue tengah ka khuen de, ahimi lawng hoeih sak thai u nawh,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Oengna aka khueh nawh nangmi thlaangthe hue! Metuek toe nangmi he kan awm puei u hun ai? Meveng tue toe kan nueh u hun ai? Camaw te ka tengla van khuen u lah,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng raaithe te awl a peek tih camaw kaw khui kalawng raaithe te co, kawlkalh ah ahih tah hoeih pahoei.
Tecoengah a hubang hue amami bueng Jesuh tengla law u tih, “N'tu dawngah kaimi lawng raaithe ka hek thai u nawh?” tila a doet u.

Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi lawng oengcakna na khueh u nawh dawngah ni, Atak tang kavan thui u, antammu teh maimah oengna na khueh u kawinih nangmi lawng he tlaang he, he kalawng ke la thoeih lah na tina u a tah thoeih ai, nang mi lawng soeprep boeih na sai u thai ai.
Tede, he ang raaithe tah thangthuina oen buh yehna bueng nawh atah atloe n'tu oen khaw hek thai la awm nawh,” a tina.
A hubang hue Galili la a law boeih u vengah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah, “Thlaanghing Capa he thlaang kut dawngah a peek u ai.
Ahih te a ngawn u ai, tede athum hin ah tho koep ai,” tila a thui. A hubang hue tah a kaw the u tangkiik.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue Kapernaum a pha u vengah, Tempal bok-im kah mangmu cawikung hue Piter tengla law u tih, “Na saya lawng Tempal bok-im kah mangmu a peek van aw? tila a doet u.

Piter lawng, “Oeih, a peek,” a tina. Piter te im khuila a kuun vengah Jesuh lawng a voem lamha tih, “Simon, metila na poek? A-u lawng he dilai sengpahrang tengah ram tloe kah thaihu khuen phu oen mangmu a peek? Ram khuikah thlaang lawng aw? Tihnawhtah ram tloe thlaang lawng aw?” a tina.
Piter lawng, “Ram tloe thlaang lawng a peek ai,” a tina. Jesuh lawng, “Theen, ram khuikah thlaang lawngtah peek ham ngoe nawh,” a tina.

Tede he thlaang hue he a thinsa sak ham ka ngaih nawh. Tedawngah tuilii la cet lang nga vaih lah. Lamhacuek la na tuuk nga kah a kaa khuiah nang oen kai ham Tempal mangmu peek khoek tangka na dang ai. Te tangka te lo langtah mahih kah mangmu la ahimi te pe hawn, a tina.
Teveng tue ah a hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih, “Vaan ram ah a-u aka lenduet?” tila a doet u.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng camaw pakhat te a khue, ahimi haiah a pai sak tih,
“Atak tang kavan thui u, nangmi lawng na kaw na thaw tih camaw hue angla na awm u nawh atah Vaan ram khuiah na kuun u thai manawh,” a tina.
Vaan ram ah aka lenduet ham thlaang tah boe a ngaai tih he camaw angla kawpoek aka khueh he ni.
A-u khaw ka miing oen he ang camaw pakhat he a do atah kai aka do thlaang ni.
“Kai aka oeng camaw pakhat kah a oengna te a phelhna ham a-u lawng-khaw a suek atah caang neetna lungto sum bohlang a awi tih tuilii ah tla kawinih ahih ham theen bet ai.

Dilai dawngah thlaanghing kah oengna aka phelh sak thaihu yahawh hlang a awm dawngah rih ham awm tangkiik. Te ang thaihu te awm ngaikhoek ai, tede te tila thlaang kah oengna aka phelh sak thlaang ham tah caalla khawmap tangkiik!

“Na kut tihnawhtah na khow lawng na oengna te avan phelh sak atah tloek langtah voei vik hawn! Kut soep khow soep oen dungyan hai khuila na tlaak lak ah kut oen khow muehla hingna khuiah na kuun te theen ngaai.
