Tecoengah na mik lawng na oengna te avan phelh sak atah na mik te koeih lang voei hawn! Mik pahih oen hell hai khuiah na tlaak atah mik pakhat bueng oen hingna khuila na kuun te theen ngaai.
“Nangmi lawng he ang camaw pakhat Pateng khaw huhsit nawh ham ngaithuen uh. Atak tang kavan thui u, ahimi doenkung vanthlaang tah Vaan kah a Pa haiah awm yoeyah u.
(Metihtiah Thlaanghing Capa tah aka auh thlawn ham va law.)

“Tuu yakhat aka khueh thlaang lawng tuu pakhat a auh atah n'tu a sai ai tila na poek? Ahih lawng ramtliim saino a awmna tlaangsawm ah atloe sawmkua pakua hue te a ceh taak vetih aka auh tuu pakhat te tlap ham cet ai.
Atak tang kavan thui u, aka auh tuu te a dang vengah, aka auh nawh tuu sawmkua pakua lak ah aka auh tuu pakhat te a uem ngaai.
Tih van angla vaan kah nangmi na Pa lawng he ang camaw pakhat Pateng khaw auh sak ham ngaih nawh,” a tina.
“Na boenhui pakhat lawng na sawah a thawlh atah a tengla cet lang a thawlhna te thui peh. Tede ahuepla namahih bueng thui hih. Na awl a ngaai atah na boenhui oen na roep hih poen.
Tede na awl te a ngaai nah atah, Caciim lawng,” thawlh peelna boeih te aka mingpueikung pahih tihnawhtah te lak ah yahawh awm seh! ati angla thlaangtloe pakhat khaw, pahih khaw ceh puei.

Tecoengah ahimi kah awl te a ngaai nawh atah, awlkaa boeih te khrihcabu tengah thui uh. Aboetna ah khrihcabu awl te a ngaai nawh toeng toeng atah ahih te lukih thlaang tihnawhtah mangmu cawikung hue angla poek uh.
“Tedawngah nangmi tengah kavan thui u, dilai dawngah na piin boeih te vaan ah khaw a piin vetih dilai dawngah na thlam boeih te vaan ah khaw a thlam pe van ai.
Tecoengah atloe pakhat kavan thui u: Dilai dawngah nangmi tim kah thlaang pahih lawng me ang thaihu dawngah khaw thin-at kaw-at la na thangthui hih atah vaan kah a Pa lawng nangmi ham avan sai ai.
Thlaang pahih, pathum kai kah miing oen a tunna huen ah ahimi oen kai ka awm haih,” a tina.
Tecoengah Piter lawng Jesuh tengla law tih, “Bawipa, ka boenhui thli lawng ka sawah a thawlh atah, voei meyoeh toe ahih sawah khawdawp ka ngai ai? Voei sarih toe aw? tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng, “Nawh ni, voei sarih bueng nawh ni, voei sawmsarih let sarih khawdawp na ngaai ai.
Metihtiah vaan ram tah he tila awm. Voei khat ah sengpahrang lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang kah biibina te soepsa ham a ngaih.
Atong cuek vengah, ahih kah tangka laiba aka khueh thli khuikah tangka athong asang aka ba te a tengla avan law puei u.
A tuihyoeihthlaang lawng laiba sahna khoek tangka khueh nawh, tedawngah sengpahrang lawng amah oen a yu, a ca oen a khueh thaihu boeih laiba sahna ham yooei seh! tila awl a peek.
Te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng sengpahrang haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng ruila a bok tih, “N'reen hawn de! Laiba boeih te kan sah badai,” a tina.
Sengpahrang lawng a reen dawngah ahih kah laiba boeih te a yoe pe sak tih a tuih.
Tecoengah te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng cet tih ahih kah tangka ayawlca aka ba tuihyoeihthlaang a paya te a huh. Te thlaang te a tuuk tih a khak. Laiba te, “N'sah loeih!” a tina.
A tuihyoeihthlaang a paya lawng khuklu oen cuengkueng ruila, “N'reen hawn de, kan sah badai,” a tina.
Tede ahih lawng a thana. Laiba a sah boeih thlantoe a paya te thong ah a thlaak.
Atloe tuihyoeihthlaang hue lawng te tila a sai te a huh vengah a reen u tangkiik tih Sengpahrang tengah cet u tih te tila thaihu a sai thli boeih te a thui pe u.
Tedawngah Sengpahrang lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang te a khue tih, “Nang tuihyoeihthlaang, thlaangthe koek! Ka tengah reenna navan bih dawngah na laiba boeih te kavan yoe sak.
Kai lawng kan reen van angla tuihyoeihthlaang na paya te na reen van ham awm,” a tina.
Sengpahrang tah a thinsa tangkiik tih te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng laiba boeih a sah thlantoe thong ah a thlaak.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi lawng thinkaw lungbui tang oen na maya manau tengah khawdawp na ngaai u nawh atah vaan kah a Pa lawng nangmi sawah khawdawp ngaai van manawh,” tila a boetna ah a thui pe.
Jesuh lawng he awl boeih he a thui boet coengah, Galili te a thawh taak tih Jordan tuiva khatben ral Judia ram la cet.
Thlaangping yahawh hlang lawng a hu ah a vai u tih ahih lawng te huen ah thlaangtlo boeih te a hoeih sak.

Farasi khatsut lawng a tengla law u tih a thawlhna tuuk pe ham a ngaih u dawngah, “A me ang kawng dawng maiah a khaw tawngpa pakhat lawng a yu thlaak ham mami kah phungawl lawng a ngaih aw?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Acuekca ah Saikung lawng thlaang hutaa oen tawngpa a sai,” tila caciim lawng a thui te na tae u nawh aw?
Tedawngah Pathen lawng, “He kawng dawngah tawngpa lawng a manu oen ana pa te a ceh taak vetih a yu oen awm haih ai, ahih rawi tah pumsa pakhat la coeng ai,” ti.
Tedawngah ahih rawi tah pahih tlaih nawh ni, pumsa pakhat poen ni. Pathen lawng a tun sak haih poen te tah thlaanghing lawng pek boel seh,” a tina.
Farasi thli lawng, “Te atah n'tu dawngah Mosi lawng thlaang pakhat lawng a yu te thlaakna ca pe selang tuih seh, tila phungawl a peek kai?” tila Jesuh te a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi tah thuituen ham na rai u tangkiik dawngah Mosi lawng na yu thlaak ham awl m'peek u. Tede acuekca vengah te tila awm nawh.
Tedawngah atak tang kavan thui u, “A-u lawngkhaw a yu te thlaangtloe oen a samphaih nawh maiah a thlaak tih yu tloe a lawh atah te thlaang lawng a yu han ah samphaih poen,” a tina.
A hubang hue lawng, “Yuvaa laklaw ah he tila a awm ham koei atah a yuvaa hih nawh ah theen ngaai ai,” tila Jesuh te a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “He kah kan cang puei he thlaang boeih ham nawh ni. Tede Pathen lawng a peek thlaang hue bueng ham ni.

Thlaang lawng a yu a lawh thai nawh he akawng atloetloe la awm: khatsut tah a yu lawh thai nawh ham a thang puei, atloe thlaang khatsut tah yu lawh thai nawh ham a sai u tih atloe khatsut hue tah Vaan Ram kawng dawngah a yu lo u nawh. He cangpueina he aka yaakming lawngtah vai hawn seh!” tila a thui pe u.
Thlaang khatsut lawngah camaw hue kah a luu dawngah Jesuh lawng a kut tloeng tih thangthui pe ham a tengla avan law puei u. Tede a hubang hue lawng thlaangping te a tlung.
Jesuh lawng, “Camaw hue te kanghalh u boel, ka tengla law u seh! metihtiah Vaan ram tah he ang thlaang thli kah ni,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahimi kah luu sawah a kut a tloeng coengah atloela cet.
Voeikhat ah thlaang pakhat Jesuh tengla law tih, “Saya! Dungyan hingna dang hamla me ang thaihu theen ka sai ai?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng, “Me ang thaihu theen ti he n'tu dawngah nan doet? Thlaang-theen pakhat bueng ni a awm. Dungyan hingna dang ham na ngaih atah awlpeek te vai,” a tina.
Ahih lawng, “Me ang awlpeek,” a tina. Jesuh lawng, “Thlaang ngawn boel, hutaa tawngpa thawlhna sai boel, huen boel, a soeng nawh la thlaang thawlh peel boel,
Na nu oen na pa te hinyah lang, namah pum na lungna angla na imbe te lungnah,” a tina.
Cadawng lawng, “He awlpeek thli he ka vai boeih poen, n'tu sai ham a ngoe hun?” tila a doet.

Jesuh lawng, “Thlaang soep la awm ham na ngaih atah cet lang na koeva thli te yooei boeih langtah tangka te khawdeng harah thli van peh. Te atah vaan ah kaawn theen na khueh badai, tecoengah law lang ka hu ah va bang,” a tina.
Te cadawng tah kuirang la a awm dawngah te awl a yaak vengah a kawthe tih meel.
Tevengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah, “Atak tang kavan thui u: Kuirang ham tah Vaan ram ah kuun ham rai tangkiik.
Kavan thui koep he; Kala-uk pakhat phaimeet khui a kuun lak ah kuirang pakhat lawng Pathen Ram khuiah kuun ham rai bet!” a tina.
A hubang hue lawng te awl a yaak u vengah a kawpoek rai tangkiik u tih. “Te atah a-u lawng thlawnna a dang ai,” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te ahaitang heet tih, “He ang he thlaanghing ham coeng thai nawh, tede Pathen ham tah thaihu boeih he coeng thai,” a tina.
Tevengah Piter lawng, “Bueh lah! Kaimi lawng thaihu boeih ka ceh taak u tih na hu ah ka bang u poen, n'tu ka dang u ai?” tila a doet.

Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah, “Atak tang kavan thui u; San thai a pha tih Thlaanghing Capa lawng Bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah Ruep-awmna oen a ngawlh vengah nangmi ka hubang thlaihih hue nang khaw Israel thlaangphun thlaihih te uk ham bawi-ngawlhcoen dawngah na ngawl u van ai.

Tecoengah a-u khaw kai kawng dawngah a im oen a lo, a maya manau, ngannu nganca, a manu ana pa oen a ca te aka ceh taak thlaang tah te yueng te a pueh yakhat la a dang u vetih dungyan hingna te a dang baal ai.
Tede tahe ah lamhacuekla aka awm hue he hukhuengla awm lat vetih tahe ah hukhuengla aka awm hue he lamhacuekla awm dai ai,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Vaan ram tah he tila awm. Dumkhuehkung pakhat lawng misur dum ah bii bi sak ham thlaang aka tlap hamla mincanghi ah cet.
Thapang a peek nooek angla hin-at kutphu ngun tangka pheek at peek ham biibithlaang thli oen a kaw vai u tih ahimi te dum la a tuih.
Mincang khawnoek pakua ah dawr la cet koep tih n'tu khaw bi ohla aka pai thlaang khatsut te a huh.
Tevengah ahimi te, “Nangmi khaw misur dum la cet u langtah bii bi uh, na thapang te ating atawkk la kan pe ai,” a tina.
Tedawngah ahimi tah cet u. Te-coengah hingthun khawnoek thlaihih vengah khaw, khawnoek pathum vengah khaw a sawkah angla a sai.
Thlemben khawnoek pa-ngaa tawm ah ahih lawng dawr la a ceh koep vengah thlaangtloe khatsut te huen ah a pai hun te a huh. “Ahimi te n'tu ah biibi ohla khawyung khun he ah na pai u?” tila a doet.
Ahimi lawng, “Kaimi he a-u lawngkhaw bii m'bi sak u nawh dawngah ni,” a tina u. Dumkhuehkung lawng, “Theen, nangmi khaw misur dum la cet u lang bii bi uh,” a tina.

Thlemben tue apha vengah dumkhuehkung lawng dumtoetkung tengah, “Bii aka bi thli te khue u lang a thapang te pe uh. Hukhueng koek bii aka bi kalawng tong langtah lamhacuek bii aka bi toe a thapang kutphu te peh,” a tina.
Thlemben khawnoek pa-ngaa kalawng bii aka bi thli te thapang ngun tangka pheek at rip a peek.
Lamhacuek la bii aka bi thli thapang lawh ham a law u vengah thapang yahawh ka dang ai, tila a poek u. Tede ahimi khaw thapang ngun tangka pheek at rip a dang u.
Tangka te a lawh u tih dumkhuehkung tengah caitoek u.

Ahimi lawng, “Hukhueng koek la bii aka bi thlaang thli he tah khawnoek pakhat khui bueng a bi u. Kaimi tah khawyungkhun khawling khawlai khuiah ka bi u. Tede ahimi na peek yoeh van te kaimi nan peek u,” a tina u.
Tevengah dumkhuehkung lawng ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat te, “Ka puei, hutung lah! Kan thaina moenih, hin at kutphu ngun tangka pheek at peek ham awl n'thui u nawh aw?
Na tangka te lo langtah im la cet loeih! A hukhueng koek aka bi he khaw nangmi kah dang yoeh van te peek ham ka ngaih.
Ka mah tangka te ka kawngaih angla ka hawna thai nawh aw? Kai ka moeihoeih dawngah nang na lungoe aw?” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Tedawng-ah hukhueng koek te lamhacuekla awm vetih lamhacuek te hukhueng koek la awm ai,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng Jerusalem la a ceh vengah a hubang thlaihih te ahuep ahelna ah a ceh puei tih amami bueng noenoe ceh ruila ahimi tengah awl a thui pe.

“Hutung u lah,” “Mami tah Jerusalem khawpui la n'cet u ai. Te huen ah Thlaanghing Capa tah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue kut ah peek la awm ai. Ahimi lawng Thlaanghing Capa te ngawn hamla thawlh a peel u vetih,
thlaangphun tloe kut dawngah a peek u ai. Thlaangphun tloe hue lawng ahih te nuihbu kamring la a khueh u ai, athe akhana u ai, a bawh u coengah a ngawn u ai. Tede athum hin ah tho koep ai,” a tina.
Tecoengah Zebedi kah a yu te a capa rawi oen Jesuh tengla va law. Jesuh haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih buekuep ruila a tengah a kawngaih te a bih.

Jesuh lawng ahih te, “N'tu na ngaih,” tila a doet. Ahih lawng, “Sengpahrang la na law vengah ka ca rawi he na bantang ben ah pakhat, na banvoei ben ah pakhat a ngawlh hih thaina hamla awl van pe lah.” a tina.

Jesuh lawng, “Na van bih he na ming hih nawh! Kai lawng ka awkk ham koei patang khangna boengloeng he na awkk thai hih ai aw? tila te rawi boeinau te a doet. A hih rawi lawng, “ka awkk thai hih ai,” a tina.

Jesuh lawng, “Nanghih lawng ka boengloeng dawngkah na awkk thai tang tang ai. Tede ka bantang ben ah ahih ngawl seh, ka banvoei ben ah ahih ngawl seh tila kai lawng ka tuek thai nawh tih te huen tah a Pa lawng a nuuen tangte thlaang hue ham ni,” a tina.
He kawng he atloe hubang paha hue lawng a yaak u vengah te rawi boeinau sawah a thin sa u tangkiik.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng a khue tun u tih, “Pathen aka ming nawh ukkung bawi hue lawng a uk thlaang thli sawah huham a khueh u tih mawtkung ahaamca hue lawngkhaw atlawh ngaaila aana a khueh u.
Tede nangmi tah tila na awm u manawh. Nangmi timkah pakhat lawng alenduet la awm a ngaih atah nangmi boeih kah tuihyoeihthlaang la awm seh;
nangmi timkah thlaang pakhat lawng pakhatna ah awm ham a ngaih atah nangmi kah sal la awm seh.
Te tila ni Thlaanghing Capa khaw thlaangtloe te bii bi sak ham law nawh tih thlaang kah bii bi ham oen thlaang yahawh te tlang ham oen ah hingna peek ham ni a law,” a tina.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Jeriko khaaw kalawng a ceh u vengah thlaangping yahawh hlang lawng a hu ah a vai u.
Lawngteng ah aka ngawl mikpum pahih lawng Jesuh kah a ceh tuen awl te a yaak hih vengah, “Devid Capa! Kai hih he n'reen lah, Bawipa!” tila paang hih.
Thlaangping lawng te rawi te a ho u tih duem awm hih a tina u, Tede ahih rawi lawng, “Devid Capa! n'reen lah, Bawipa!” tila angaihla paang tare hih.
Jesuh lawng pai tih te kah mikpum rawi te a tengla a khue tih, “Nanghih ham n'tu sai sak na ngaih?” tila a doet.
Ahih rawi lawng, “Bawipa! Ka mik na van tueng sak ham ka ngaih hih” a tina.
Jesuh lawng mikpum rawi te a reen tangkiik tih a mik te a tek pe. Teveng roe ah a mik tueng pahoei hih tih Jesuh te a hu ah a vai hih.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Jerusalem pha tawm kah Olif tlaang tengah aka awm Betfat khaaw te a pha u atah Jesuh lawng a hubang pahih te a tuih tih,
he tila awl a uen, “Na hai kah khaaw la cet hih langtah la pakhat a kiing te na huh hih pahoei vetih a tengah a ca awm ai. Rui te thlam pe hih lang la te ka tengla bok van mawt hih.
A-u lawngkhaw n'kaana atah, ‘Bawipa lawng angoe’ tina hih. Te atah ahih lawng avan thlah pahoei badai” a tina.
Tedawngah a hubang rawi lawng cet hih tih Jesuh kah a thui angla a sai.
La oen a cano te avan khuen hih tih la pum ah a himbai te a dawk u tih Jesuh te a cit sak u.
Thlaangping lawng lawngpui ah a himbai a phaih pe u tih thlaangtloe khatsut lawngtah thingbuuk te a kawi u tih lawngpui ah thinghu a phaih pe u.
Jesuh kah a haiah aka cet hue oen a hu ah aka vai thli lawng, “Devid capa te thangpawm uh! Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe hawn seh! Pathen te thangpawm uh,” tila paang u.
Jerusalem khawpui la Jesuh a kuun phai vengah a khaaw pum hinghuen tih “He thlaang he a-u kai,” tila a doet u.
Tevengah thlaangping lawng, “He thlaang he tah Galili ram Nazaret khaaw kah tawngha Jesuh ni,” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng Tempal khuila kuun tih te huen kah thaihu aka yooei oen aka lai thli te boeih a hek. Tangka aka thaw thli oen akhuu aka yooei hue kah caboi oen ngawlhna boeih te a plet pe tih,
ahimi tengah, “Caciim dawngah Pathen lawng, ‘Ka Tempal bok-im he thangthuina im ni ti u ai’ tila a thui. Tede nangmi lawng thlaanghuuen yingreelna a huen la na hawn u.” a tina.
Mikpum oen khawkheem Tempal khuiah Jesuh tengla law u tih ahimi te a hoeih sak.

Kawpoekrai thaihu a saina thli oen Tempal khuiah camaw thli lawng, “Devid capa tah thangtheen sak uh!” tila a paang u te khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue lawng a yaak a vengah a thin sa tangkiik u.

Tedawngah Jesuh te, ahimi kah a paang awl he na yaak aw? tila a doet u. Jesuh lawng, “Ka yaak ta, Caciim dawngah ‘Camaw oen nauseen hue teng kalawng thangtheenna awl na thoeng sak’ tila a thut u te na tae vai nawh aw?” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te a ceh taak tih Jerusalem kalawng Bethani la cet tih te ah te ip.
Avuen mincanghi ah Jesuh tah Jerusalem khawpui ben la a mel koep vengah lawngpueng ah a bung pawng.

Lawngteng kah thaidut thing te a huh tih a kung la cet, a thing dawngah a ram hawng te a huh. Tedawngah thaidut thing te. “Meveng khaw na thaih koep thaih manawh,” tila a tap. Kawlkalh ah thaidut thing te duek rup tih reu pahoei.
Te tila a awm te a hubang hue lawng a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai tangkiik u tih, “Metila kawlkalh ah thaidut thing a duek rup tih a reu pahoei mai?” tila a doet u.

Jesuh lawng, “Atak tang kavan thui u, uepvoetna khueh ohla, na oeng u tang tang atah he thaidut thing sawah ka sai he nangmi lawngkhaw na sai thai u van ai. He bueng ohla he kah tlaang Pateng, ‘Thoeih lang tuilii khuila tla lah,’ na tina atah tla thai ai.
Na oeng u tangtang atah thangthuina rang oen na bih u boeih te na dang u ai,” a tina.

Jesuh te Tempal bok-im la law koep tih a cang puei lii vengah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah ahaamca thli a tengla law u tih, “Mekah saithaina aana oen he ang he na sai? A-u lawng saithaina aana he m'peek?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Awl pakhat kan doet u vetih awl nan thung thai u atah ame kah saithaina aana oen he ang thaihu ka sai tite kavan thui u ai,” a tina.

“Johan lawng Baptisma a peek te ame kalawng a law! Pathen ben kalawng aw? Thlaanghing ben kalawng aw? tila a doet. Ahimi lawng, ‘Pathen ben kalawng va law n'ti kawinih n'tu ah Johan te na oeng u nawh,’ ti ai.
“Thlanghing ben kalawng ni a law n'ti kawinih Johan te thlaang boeih lawng tawngha ni a ti u dawngah thlaangping he mami lawng rih ham awm,” ti u.
Tedawngah, “Ka ming u nawh,” a tina u. Tedawngah Jesuh lawng, “Te atah kai lawngkhaw ame kah saithaina aana oen he ang thaihu ka sai ti he kavan thui van manawh,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Metila na poek u? Thlaang pakhat lawng capa pahih a khueh. A capa ahaamca tengla cet tih, Ka ca! tihin ah misur dum la cet langtah bii bi lah’ a tina.
A capa ahaamca lawng, ‘Ka ngaih nawh, ka cet manawh’ a tina tih a thana de a kaw a poek koep tih dum la cet.
Tecoengah a capa ano tengla cet tih misur dum ah bii bi ham a tuih. A capa lawng, ‘Oeih, a pa! ka cet ai’ a tina. Tede cet nawh.

He kah a capa pahih khuiah a-u lawng ana pa kah awl a ngaai?” tila a doet. Ahimi lawng, “A capa ahaamca lawng,” a tina u. Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah, “Atak tang kavan thui, mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaanghalhnu thli lawng nangmi te n'khall vetih Vaan ram la ng'kuun taak u poen ai,” a tina.

Metihtiah Baptisma pekung Johan tah nangmi tengla law tih lawngdoeng te n'huh sak u poen de nangmi lawng na tangna u nawh. Tede mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaanghalhnu thli lawngtah a tangna u. Te te nangmi lawng na huh u poen de na kawpoek khaw na thaw u nawh, ahih te na tangna u nawh,” a tina.

Jesuh lawng “Atloe thuidoetna he hutung u lah, misur dum khuehkung pakhat awm tih dum te vawng khoep a thung, misurtui a suina ham ungrawm a to, misurdum toetna ham paw a sak. Tecoengah misur dum te tah bii aka bi thli te a vat tih amah tah khawlawng thla la cet.
Misur thaih bit tue veng atah dum aka vat thli tengah a tamnaa thli a tuih tih a dang ham koei dum khang la misur thaih te a bih sak.
Dum aka vat thli lawng dum khuehkung kah a tamnaa thli te a tuuk u tih pakhat te a bawh u, pakhat te a ngawn u tih pakhat te tah lungto oen a de u.
Dum khuehkung lawng lamha kah lak ah a tamnaa yahawh ngai a tuih koep. Dum vatkung thli lawng ahimi te lamhacuek vengkah angla a sai u.
A hukhueng ah dum khuehkung lawng a capa te ahimi tengla a tuih ‘Ka capa he tah a hinyah u ngai badai’ tila a poek.
Tede dum aka vat hue lawng a capa te a huh u vengah “He tah dum khuehkung kah capa, ro aka pang ham ni. Law uh, ngawn silang a ro thaihu lawh pe u sih.” ti u.
Tedawngah a tuuk u tih dum adaubenla a khuen u tih a ngawn u.
Jesuh lawng, “Tetih atah dum khuehkung a law vengah dum aka vat thli te metila a tina ai?” tila a doet u.
Ahimi lawng, “Te ang thlaangthe thli te a ngawn vetih misur thaih bit tue a pha vengah dum khang atheenla aka pe thai te a vat ai,” a tina u.

Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Caciim lawng: ‘Imsakung thli lawng aphu aka awm nawh angla a hoett u lungto te, aphu aka awm koek imkil lungto la awm, he tah Bawipa lawng a sai tih mami mik huh ah kawpoekrai la awm,’ tila a thui te na tae vai u nawh aw?” a tina.
Tedawngah atak tang kavan thui u, “Pathen Ram tah nangmi teng kalawng a lawh vetih thaih theen aka thaih sak koei thlaangphun tloe tengah a peek ai,” a tina.
“A-u khaw he lungto dawngah aka tla tah adiik anuui la rek vetih he lungto lawng a neet te tah adiik avaai la coengg ai,” a tina.
Jesuh kah thuidoetna awl he khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Farasi thli lawng a yaak vengah ahimi kawng ni a thui tila a ming u.
Tedawngah Jesuh te tuuk ham kamthlah u. Tede thlaangping lawng Jesuh he tawngha ni a ti u dawngah thlaangping te a rih u.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping te thuidoetna awl koep a thui pe.
“Vaan ram tah he tila awm. Voeikhat ah Sengpahrang pakhat lawng a capa kah yului poei sai ham kamthlah.
A hih lawng a ceel thlaang thli te poei ah law ham a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a tuih tih a khue sak. Tede ahimi lawng law ham ngaih u nawh.

Tecoengah poei bur ham a ceel thlaang thli te khue ham atloe tuihyoeihthlaang thli te koep a tuih tih, “Poei buh veel ham coekroek la awm poen; vaitawtaal thli oen boiava a thau thau thli khaw ka ngawn boeih poen, thaihu soeprep khaw coekroek la ka sai poen. Yului poei la law u loeih, tina uh,” a tina.
Tede a ceel thlaang hue lawng n'tu la sak ohla amami ngaih la cet u. Khatsut tah lo la cet u, khatsut tah dawr la cet u tih,
khatsut lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a tuuk tih a bawh u, a ngawn u.
Sengpahrang tah a thin sa soeh tih a raalkap thli te a tuih tih thlaang aka ngawn thli te a thup sak boeih coengah khaaw te hai oen a dawi sak.
Tecoengah a tuihyoeihthlaang hue te a khue tih, “Yului poei tah coekroek la awm poen de ka thlaangceel thli he hinyahna dang ham koeih u nawh.
Tahe ah lawngpui cumruum ah cet u lang poei ah thlaang a yahawhna ham na huh thlaang boeih te van ceel uh,” a tina.
Tecoengah a tuihyoeihthlaang hue lawng lawngpui boeih ah cet u tih a huh sarui thlaangthe thlaang theen boeih te a cawi tih yuluina im ah thlaang be-toet sut.
A ceel thlaang thli te bueh ham sengpahrang lawng a law vengah yului poei himbai bai ohla aka awm thlaang pakhat te a huh.
Sengpahrang lawng, “Ka puei, yului poei himbai bai ohla metila he poei khuiah na kuun thai? tila a doet. Tede ahih lawng n'tu khaw thui thai nawh.
Tecoengah sengpahrang lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te, ‘Ahih he a kut, a khow te piin pe u lang adau ben yiinna khuila voei uh. Te huen ah rap vetih a naw a tah ai,’ ti” tila a thui pe u.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “A thlaangceel tah yahawh de a tuek thlaang tah yawlca,” tila hukhueng koek ah a thut.
Farasi hue lawng Jesuh tengla cet u tih awldoetna oen a thawlhna tuuk pe ham kamthlah u.

Tecoengah amami kah hubang khatsut hue oen Herod kah thlaang khatsut hue te Jesuh tengla a tuih u tih, ahimi lawng,” Saya, nang lawngtah awl doeng na thui tila ka ming u. Pathen kah kawngaihna a kawng he khaw thlaang lawng metila a poek ti khaw rih ohla na cang puei tih a-u kah mik-hai khaw na bueh nawh.
Tedawngah na poekna van thui lah, Rom Sengpahrang tengah mangmu peek he mami kah Phungawl lawng a ngaih aw, ngaih nawh aw?” tila a doet u.
Ahimi kah kamthlahna athe khawkhan te Jesuh lawng a ming dawngah ahimi te, “Thlaangthaipalat hue, n'tu dawngah kai he kamah awl dawngah tuuk ham na ngaih u?
Mangmu peek ham tangka te n'nueh u lah,” a tina. Ahimi lawng tangka te a tengla a khuen u tih Jesuh lawng,
“A-u kah a mueime oen a miing aka awm?” tila a doet u.
Ahimi lawng, “Sengpahrang kah a muei oen a miing awm,” ti u. Tedawngah Jesuh lawng, “Tetih atah sengpahrang koe te sengpahrang pe u langtah Pathen koe te Pathen pe uh,” a tina.
Te awl te a yaak u vengah a kawpoek rai tangkiik u tih Jesuh teng kalawng atloela cet u.
Te khawhin vengah te duek coengah thawhkoepna awm tlaih nawh aka ti Sadusi thlaang khatsut Jesuh tengla law u tih awl a doet u. (Ahimi lawngtah thawhkoepna awm nawh ti u).

Ahimi lawng, “Saya, Mosi kah cangpueina dawngah thlaang pakhat a ca cuun ohla a duek atah a manau lawng a yu te a yuna roe roe ai. Te tila a yuna tih a ca a cuun hih atah aka duek tangte a maya kah a ca la awm ai,” ti.
Tahe ah boenhui pasarih awm u. Aham koek lawng a yu a lawh de a ca cuun ohla duek, a yu te a manau lawng a paang.
A manau pabe khaw, a pathumna te khaw duek. Te tila boenhui pasarih te duek boeih.
Ahukhueng atah te hutaa khaw duek van.
Boenhui pasarih lawng a yuna dawngah thawhkoepna hin ah a-u kah a yu la a awm ai?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Na poek thawlh u! Nangmi lawng Caciim oen Pathen kah huham tharana na ming u nawh dawngah ni.
Metihtiah thlaangduek a thawh koep vengah tah vaan ah aka awm vanthlaang angla awm vetih yuvaa tila awm tlaih manawh.
Thlaangduek thawhkoepna kawngah Pathen lawng a thui awl te vai khat khaw na tae u nawh aw?
Pathen lawng, ‘Kai tah Abraham Pathen, Isak Pathen, Jakob kah Pathen la ka awm! ti. Aka hing thli kah Pathen la awm tih aka duek thli kah Pathen nawh ni,’ tila a thui.
Te awl te thlaangping hue lawng a yaak vengah ahih kah cangpueina dawngah te a kawpoek rai u tangkiik.
Sadusi thlaang hue awl thui thai nawh la Jesuh lawng a voem te Farasi hue lawng a yaak vengah ngawl tun u tih,
Ahimi timkah Phungawl aka ming thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh kah a thawlhna tuuk pe a ngaih dawngah,
“Saya, Phungawl dawngah me ang awlpeek he aka lenduet?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng, “Na Bawipa Pathen te na thinkaw lungbui boeih, na hingna boeih oen na thoemna, na tharana boeih oen ah lungnah.’
Tete aka lenduet oen awlpuikoek awlpeek mi.
Pahihna awlpeek aka lenduet tah pakhatna angla, “Na imbe te namah pum na lungna angla na lungna ai.’
Mosi kah Phungawl boeih oen tawngha hue kah cangpueina thli boeih te he awlpeek pahih dawngah cui boeih poen” a tina.
Farasi hue thik-at la a ngawlh tun u vengah Jesuh lawng.
“Messiah kawng he metila na poek u? A-u kah cadil la a awm? tila ahimi te a doet. Ahimi lawng, “Devid cadil ni,” ti u.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Tetih atah n'tu dawngah Ciim Muithla lawng Devid nala Messiah te ka Bawipa ni,” tila na thui ai, a tina kai?” Devid lawng,
“Bawipa lawng ka Bawipa tengah, Na raal thli na khowtang ah ka khueh thlantoe Ka bantang ben ah ngawl lah,” a tina, ti.
Devid lawng, “Bawipa” a tina atah metila Messiah te Devid cadil la a awm thai ai? tila a doet u.
Jesuh kah awl doet te a-u lawng-khaw a thung u thai nawh dawngah te hin kalawng a-u lawngkhaw awl doet ha u tlaih nawh.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue oen a hubang hue tengah awl a thui.
“Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue he tah Mosi kah Phungawl aka thuicaih thlaang hue ni.
Tedawngah avan thui boeih tah na sai u ham oen na vai u ham koei ni, tede ahimi kah sai te oett u boel, ahimi lawng a thui angla te sai u nawh.
Thlaangtloe ham tah thalrih te a tloeng pe u tih arih tangkiik la a phueih sak u, tede amami lawngtah thlaangtloe kah thalrih bawm ham a kutdawn oen Pateng dawm u nawh.
Thlaang kah huh theenna ham bueng thaihu soeprep a sai u. A luu oen a baan dawngah a yeen u Caciim bu ke bueh u lah! metihtlukla a bo tih a himbai hmoi metila a san.
Poei saina oen sinakok atah atheenkoek huen ah ngawlh a ngaih u tih ngawlhna te a kam oepsoeh u.
Thlaang yahawh a awmna dawr ah thlaang kah hinyahna oen koehna te a ngaih u tih ‘Saya’ tila khue ham a ngaih u.
Tede nangmi tah, ‘Saya’ tila khue ham ngaih u boel, nangmi tah boenhui la na awm u dawngah, ‘Saya’ tila khue ham pakhat bueng ni na khueh u.
Tecoengah Vaan ah aka awm Pa pakhat bueng na khueh u dawngah he dilai han ah a-u khaw ‘Apa’ tila khue u boel.
Nangmi lawng ‘Ukkung’ tila khue khaw ngaih u boel. Ukkung pakhat bueng na khueh u te tah Messiah ni.
Nangmi timkah aka lenduet te nangmi kah tuihyoeihthlaang la awm ai.
A-u khaw amah oen amah aka pawmsang u tah adangla a thlaak vetih a-u khaw boe ngai la aka awm tah aka lenduet la a pawmsang ai,” a tina.

“Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Farasi hue! nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue, nangmi lawng Vaan ram thawhka te thlaang kuun thai nawh ham na khaih khoep u tih namami khaw na kuun u nawh; kuun aka ngaih thli ham khaw awng ham na ngaih u nawh.

(“Nangmi Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue, nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue, huhai thli te na thai na latna u tih a im te na lawh pe u. Thlaang huh atah asanhlangla na thangthui u. He tila na awm u dawngah Pathen kah dantatna a tlawh ngaai la na dang u ai.”)

“Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Farasi hue! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik. Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Thlaang pakhat thinkaw thaw sak hamla tuitunlii ah lowng oen na cet u tih ram pum na hiil u. Thlaang pakhat na dang u vengah namami angla hell ah arepla patang khang ham na sai u.

“Nangmi mawtkung mikpum hue! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik. Nangmi lawng, ‘Thlaang pakhat lawng Tempal bok-im a phoei tih awl a taap atah ahih kah awltaap te cak nawh, tede Tempal bok-im khuikah sui te a phoei tih awl a taap atah a awl taap te cak.’ tila na cang puei u.
Mikpum thlaangngau hue! N'tu awlpui ngaai? Sui aw! Tihnawhtah sui aka ciim sak Tempal bok-im aw?
Tecoengah nangmi lawng, ‘Thlaang pakhat lawng bokna a phoei tih awl a taap atah ahih kah awltaap te cak nawh; tede thaang dawngkah kutdo te a phoei tih awl a taap atah cak,’ tila na cang puei u.
Na mik pum u tangkiik nawh pai he! N'tu awlpui ngaai? Kutdo aw, kutdo aka ciim sak bokna te aw?
Tedawngah a-u khaw boknathaang te a phoei tih awl a taap poen atah boknathaang dawngah kah kutdo te khaw a phoei haih poen tih,
Tempal bok-im te a phoei tih awl a taap poen atah Tempal bok-im oen a khuiah aka awm Pathen te khaw a phoei haih poen.
Tecoengah thlaang pakhat lawng vaan te aphoei tih awl a taap atah Pathen kah ngawlhcoen oen te ngawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl te khaw a phoei haih poen.

“Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Farasi hue! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik. Nangmi lawng cuenruek-an, sawngsing, sungii, oen tawian thli Pateng Pathen te paha ah pakhat na peek u; tede Phungawl lawng awlpui la n'cang puei doengna, thlaang reenna oen ueppang, koei la awmna te tah na hadalhna u. He ang thli he na sai hamla awm tih atloe te khaw dalrana ohla sai ham awm.
Nangmi mawtkung mikpum hue! Nangmi lawng pildiik pakhat mai Pateng awkk hau nawh ham tui te na cii u, tede kala-uk tah na doelh u.

“Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue, nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik. Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Nangmi lawng boengloeng oen beel te asaw ahan tah na silh u tih akhui tah athe thaihu, mah kawngaih saina oen betoet.
Mikpum Farasi hue! Boengloeng te akhuiben sil lamha uh, te atah adauben khaw ciim badai.

“Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik. Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Nangmi tah ahan kah a bawk oen a thluk u thlann oen na lo u; ahan ben atah dan theen tangkiik, tede akhuiben atah arong athaang duekrawkk oen ah betoet.
Tih van angla nangmi khaw asaw ahan atah thlaangdoeng angla na awm u, tede na kaw khui atah thailatna, thawlna soeprep oen ah na betoet u.

“Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Tawngha hue ham thlann te atheen theen la na sai pe u tih thlaangdoeng thlaangciim hue kah lungsuem te atheenla na thoei na cam pe u.
Tecoengah nangmi lawng ‘Yan kah nu haam pahaam thli san vengah mami ng'awm u kawinih ahimi kah a sai angla n'sai u nawh vetih tawngha thli khaw ng'ngawn u nawh sui de,’ na ti u.
Tedawngah namami roe lawng tawngha thli aka ngawn hue kah cadil la na awm te na tueng sak u poen.
Tedawngah na patuer hue kah a sai thaihu thli te nangmi lawng sai langtah coeng ngala u hawn.
Nangmi ruul hue, ruul kah cadil hue! Metila hell khui tlaakna kalawng ka loeih u thai ai tila na ngaiuep u?

Tedawngah kavan thui u: nangmi tengah tawngha oen thlaangcuih hue oen ah cangpueikung kavan tuih ai; nangmi lawng khatsut te na ngawn u ai, khatsut te sinakok bok-im khuiah na bawh u vetih ahimi te khaaw tloe la na vai reroe u ai.

Tedawngah, thawlhna aka khueh nawh hue na ngawn u dawngah dantatna nangmi tengah avan pha ai. Thlaangdoeng Abel kalawng Tempal bok-im oen bokna-thaang laklaw ah na ngawn u Berikhiah capa Zekhariah toe te na ngawn u dawngah thisen phu dantatna nangmi tengah avan pha ai.
Atak tang kavan thui u: thlaangdoeng hue na ngawn u dawngah thisen phu dantatna te tahe san kah thlaang hue tengah avan pha ai.

Jesuh lawng, “Aw, Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Tawngha hue te na ngawn u tih nangmi tengla Pathen lawng avan tuih celtuih hue te lungto oen na de u, Aainu lawng a ca thli a phe thlip ah a yiing sak angla kan thlip kan dah ham ka cai de na ngaih u nawh.
Tedawngah na Tempal bok-im te a hoett vetih ahong ahii dingrak la awm ai.
Kavan thui u: tahe kalawng hailam toe, ‘Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe hawn seh,’ na ti u thlantoe kai he nan hu koep u tlaih manawh,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng tho tih Tempal bok-im kalawng a ceh vengah a hubang hue a tengla law u tih Tempal bok-im oen ah tuhkai u la a sak thli te a nueh u.
Jesuh lawng, “Oeih, nangmi lawng he ang thli boeih he na huh u. Atak tang kavan thui u; he Tempal bok-im kah lungto pakhat maikhaw a awmna huen ah awm manawh; apum boeih la a dawng u ai,” a tina.

Jesuh lawng amah bueng Olif tlaangsawm ah a ngawlh vengah a hubang hue amami bueng ahuepla a tengah law u tih, “He ang thli he metuek vengah a thoeng ai? Van thui lah!” Na lawna ham atue oen tahe kah san a boetna yoeii poen ti he mingna ham me ang miknoekna a awm ai?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “A-u lawngkhaw n'thaina u nawh ham ngaithuen uh.
Thlaang yahawh lawng ka miing oen law u vetih ‘Kai he Messiah ni,’ ti ai, thlaangping yahawh hlang te a thai alatna ai.

Ayoeica kah raal kahna awl oen athla hlang kah ceemraal thawhna awlthang te na yaak u ai, tede lakueng u boel. Te ang thaihu thli te a thoeng ham roe ni, tede aboetna a pha poen tila thuingaihna nawh ni.
Ram pakhat oen pakhat kaap u ai, thlaangphun pakhat oen pakhat thekyak u ai. Dilai pum ah khawkha vetih likluei hinghuen ai.
He ang thli boeih he camoe awm tawm tamtuencuek bung-tlawh angla ni a awm.
“Tecoengah nangmi te thekhana ham oen ngawn hamla n'tuuk u vetih thlaangtloe kut ah nangmi te n'peek ai. Kai kawng dawngah thlaang boeih lawng n'thina u ai.
Tevengah thlaang broe lawng a oengna te a hoett u ai. Ahimi lawng pakhat oen pakhat sawah paipi a thleep u vetih pakhat oen pakhat thi u patoeng ai.
Tecoengah tawngha rawlrap thli yahawh hlang pho vetih thlaang thli te a thai alatna u ai.
Thawlhna puung tare vetih thlaang yahawh kah lungna thinkaw khaw dingreel poen ai.
Tede a-u khaw aboettoe acakla aka pai tah thlawn la awm ai.
Tecoengah thlaangphun boeih kah sausi la a awmna ham Vaan Ram kawng Awlthang Theen he dilai pum kah thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng u vetih tecoengah aboetna te a pha ti.
“Tawngha Deniel lawng a thui oepsoeh ‘Rih koei tuiilehkap thaihu,’ lawng huenciim ah a pai te na huh u ai. (Caciim aka tae lawng he kah a thuingaihna he yaakming uh)
Tevengah Judia ram kah thlaang thli lawng tlaangsawm la heeng u seh.
Imphu ah aka awm lawng im khuikah thaihu thli lawh ham rum boel seh.
Lo ah aka awm lawng himbai hinaak lawh ham im la meel re boel seh.
Te kah atue khawhin tah hutaa bungpum tattloel oen cacuun naukem thli ham metila khaw amap sut ai.
Nangmi lawng na heengna atue he sikding tue oen Sabbath khawhin ah a thoengna nawh ham Pathen tengah thangthui uh!
Metihtiah dilai suen cuek kalawng tihin toe ah aka awm, me ang patangraina boeih lak ah teveng tue ah aka awm te rih ham awm ngaai. Te ang patangraina te a awm khaw awm koep tlaih manawh.
Tede Pathen lawng te kah atue te a toi sak poen; te tila atue toi sak nawh kawinih a-u khaw deem manawh. Tede Pathen lawng a thlaang tuek hue hamla atue a toi sak ai.
“Tevengah a-u lawngkhaw nangmi te ‘Bueh lah, Messiah tah he ah awm, ke ah Messiah awm,’ a ti vengah tangna u boel.
Metihtiah Messiah rawlrap oen tawngha rawlrap thli pho u vetih a coengg thai atah Pathen kah thlaangtuek Pateng thailatna ham kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu a lentloe a sai u ai.
Hutung u lah! Atue atang a pha thlan ah kavan thui oepsoeh u poen he.
“Thlaang lawng ‘Bueh lah, Messiah tah ramhum huhang ah awm,’ a ti u vengah cet u boel. ‘Bueh lah, he huen ah thuh u,’ a ti vengah khaw tangna u boel.
Metihtiah khawlaw ben kalawng khawtlaak toe mik patap ah khaw thlap apha angla Thlaanghing Capa tah law ai.
“Duek rawkk awmna huen roekk ah langta lawng tun van ai.
“Te tila raina khawhin akhum coeng khoeng atah khaw yiin khoep ai, thla lawngkhaw hop ai, vaan kalawng aisi tla ai, vaan kah huham tharana thli boeih lawng hinghuen ai.
Tevengah Thlaanghing Capa kah miknoekna vaan ah tueng ai; Thlaanghing Capa lawng tharana huham “oen ruep-awmna oen ah” muui dawng a rum thuk te a huh u vengah dilai thlaang boeih lawng rap ai.
Pengsara angaihhlangla a tum vetih dilai a kil palii ah vanthlaang thli te a tuih ai, dilai a boetna kalawng khatben toe kah a thlaangtuek thli te ahimi lawng a cawi ai.
“Thaidut thing dawngah cuihna lo uh. Thaidut thing tah a ke hingsuep tih a ram thaai a cawn hang vengah khawhaal tue yoeii poen tila na ming u.
Te tih van angla he thaihu boeih na huh u vengah a lawna atue tah yoei poen tila ming uh.
He he hilh u boel: tahe kah aka hing hue a duek boeih thlan ah he kah thaihu boeih he thoeng ai.
Vaan oen dilai tah khum boeih ai, tede ka awl tah meveng khaw khum manawh.
“Te khawhin oen atue te a-u lawng-khaw ming nawh; vaan kah aka awm vanthlaang oen a Capa lawngkhaw ming nawh; A Pa bueng lawng ni a ming,
Noah dung vengkah angla Thlaanghing Capa a law vengah awm van ai.
Tuiliw a law thlan, Noah te lowng khuila a kuun hin toe thlaang thli lawng a caak a awkk u tih awmtheen a boenn u.
Te tila tuiliw lawng a khuk u thlantoe n'tu aka thoeng ai tite ahimi lawng ming u nawh. Tetih van la Thlaanghing Capa a law vengah awm van ai.
Teveng tue ah lo ah thlaang pahih lawng bii a bi hih ai. Tevengah pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai.
Hutaa pahih lawng sum a deng hih ai. Pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai.
“Bawipa a lawna atue khawhin te na ming u nawh dawngah ngaithuen oepsoeh uh.
Imkung lawng thlaanghuuen a lawna atue te ming kawinih atheenla a toet huertue vetih thlaanghuuen lawng im te muk thai manawh tite na ming u.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng ngaithuen oepsoeh uh, metihtiah nangmi lawng na poek nawh atue vengah Thlaanghing Capa tah law ai.

“Te tih atah a-u uep-awm tih aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la aka awm ai? Te tah a bawi lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli cawmcah ham oen ah atue atang vengah ahimi caak awkk pekung la a khueh te ueppang koei aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la awm ai.
Ahih lawngah bii atheenla a bi lii te a bawi lawng a law vengah a huh atah metihtlukla te tuihyoeihthlaang tah a awmngaih ai?
Tedawngah atak tang kavan thui u: te kah tuihyoeihthlaang te a bawi lawng a koeva boeih te khoembelkung la a khueh ai.
Tede ahih lawng uepvoet koei tuihyoeihthlaang la a awm atah, ka bawi he law yue thlan hun ai ti vetih,
atloe tuihyoeihthlaang te a bawh apai vetih, yuuruui buh hah hue oen a caak a awkk haih u ai.
Tecoengah ahih lawng a poek a sam nawh khawhin oen a ming a tung nawh atue ah a bawi tah law koep ai.
A bawi lawng ahih te ram la a voeih vetih thlaangthaipalat thli lawng a dang koei te a dang sak van ai. Te huen ah rap vetih a naw a rueng ai.
“Vaan ram tah yulokung cadawng do hamla haiim a khuen tih aka cet hulaa paha oen lo u.
Te thli timkah hulaa pa-ngaa hue tah cuih tih pa-ngaa hue tah cuih nawh.
Aka cuih nawh hutaa pa-ngaa he lawng haiim tah a khuen u de haitui ahoei akai khuen u nawh.
Aka cuih hulaa hue lawngtah hai-im dawngah haitui abepirla a thloen u coengah haitui ahoei akai a khuen u.
Yulokung cadawng te a law yue nawh dawngah hulaa hue tah ip muelh u.
“Yiinthuem veng atah ‘Yulokung cadawng law poen! Tho u lang do uh,’ tila paang awl a yaak.
Hulaa paha hue te tho u tih haiim vaang ham kamthlah u.
Tevengah hulaa aka cuih nawh hue lawng aka cuih hulaa hue tengah ‘Kaimi kah hai duek poen ai, haitui van thloen thoem u lah,’ a tina u.
Hulaa aka cuih he lawng ‘Coengg thai manawh, kaimi ham oen ah nangmi ham haih tah haitui khoek manawh. Dawr la cet u lang namami ham lai uh,’ a tina u.

Tedawngah hulaa aka cuih nawh hue lawng haitui lai ham dawr la a cehna ruet ah yulokung tah va pai parak. Ngaithuen oepsoeh la aka awm hulaa hue lawngtah yulokung oen yului poei khuila kuun u tih thawh a khaih khoep u.
Tecoengah hulaa atloe hue te avan pha u tih ‘Bawipa, Bawipa kaimi ham thawh van awng u de lah!’ a tina u.
Yulokung lawng ‘Kavan awng manawh, nangmi te kan ming nawh,’ a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Te tila khawhin oen atue te na ming u nawh dawngah ngaithuen oepsoeh lang ring uh,” tila ahukhueng ah a tina.
Jesuh lawng “Vaan ram tah he tila awm. Thlaang pakhat lawng athlahlang la yin ceh ham kamthlah tih a ceh thlan vengah a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a khue tih a thaihu boeih te a kuem sak u.
Amami kah sai thai khoek ah pakhat rip te tangka thong ngaa a peek, atloe pakhat te thong hih a peek, atloe pakhat te thong khat a peek tih yin la a ceh taak.
Tangka thong ngaa aka dang tuihyoeihthlaang lawngtah cet pahoei tih tangka te bii a bina tih apueh thong ngaa a dang.
Tih van angla tangka thong hih aka dang lawngkhaw apueh thong hih a dang.
Tede tangka thong khat aka dang te lawngtah dilai a to tih a bawi kah tangka te a up.
“Atue sanhlang a awm coeng atah a bawi te va meel koep tih ahimi kah tangka hawna te cayin a sai u.
Tangka thong ngaa aka dang te va kuun tih apueh thong ngaa a peek. ‘Bawipa tangka thong ngaa nan peek. Bueh lah! Apueh thong ngaa ka dang tih kan peek,’ a tina.

A bawi lawng ‘Nang tah, ueppangna koei tuihyoeihthlaang la na awm! Thaihu yoehca dawngah ueppang koei la na awm dawngah thaihu yahawh kuemkung la kan khueh ai. Law langtah ka awmngaihna khuiah kuun van,’ a tina.
Tecoengah tangka thong hih aka dang tuihyoeihthlaang lawng law tih ‘Bawipa nang lawng tangka thong hih nan peek. Bueh lah! Tahe ah apueh thong hih ka dang tih kan peek,’ a tina.

A bawi lawng ‘Theen tangkiik, Nang khaw tuihyoeihthlaang ueppang koei la na awm. Thaihu yoehca dawngah ueppang koei la na awm dawngah thaihu yahawh kuemkung la kan khueh ai. Law lang ka awmngaihna khuiah kuun van lah,’ a tina.
Tecoengah tangka thong khat aka dang te kuun tih ‘Bawipa nang tah amangkhak thlaang la na awm tite kan ming; na tuhna nawh huen ah na ah tih na hehna nawh huen ah na cawi tite kan ming.
Tedawngah kan rih tangkiik tih tangka te dilai khuiah ka up. Bueh lah! He he namah koe tangka ni,’ a tina.
Tevengah a bawi lawng ‘Nang aka thekoek tuihyoeihthlaang thayong bi ngak! Caangti ka tuhna nawh huen ah ka ah tih ka hehna nawh huen ah a thaih ka yuun tite na ming tang tang aw?
Na ming atah n'tu dawngah ka tangka te ka meel koep vengah apuehla dangna ham tangka khuehna bengh ah na khueh nawh?
Tahe ah ahih tengkah tangka te lo u lang tangka thong ha aka khueh te pe uh.
Metihtiah aka khueh moek thlaang tengah a tawm athap pe vetih apueh la a khueh ai. Tede aka khueh nawh thlaang tengkah a khueh duen te a lawh pe ai.
He kah tuihyoeihthlaang n'tu la aka thuum nawh he adauben yiinna khuila daawng u langtah te huen ah rap selang a naw cak cak rueng seh,’ a tina.
Jesuh lawng “Thlaanghing Capa tah Sengpahrang angla vanthlaang thli boeih oen law vetih a bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah ngawl ai.
Thlaangphun boeih lawng a haiah tun u ai. Tecoengah tuudoen lawng me-ee timkah tuu te a pekthlee angla ahih lawngkhaw thlaang thli te bu hih la a pek abo ai.
Ahih lawng thlaangdoeng hue te a bantang ben ah a khueh vetih thlaangthawlh hue te a banvoei ben ah a khueh ai.

Tecoengah Sengpahrang lawng a bantang ben ah aka awm hue te, ‘Law uh, nangmi a Pa kah yotheenna aka paang hue! Law u lang dilai suen cuek veng kalawng nangmi ham a roek abah sut Vaan ram te paang u lah.
Metihtiah ka bung a pawng vengah buh nan cah u; tui ka halh vengah tuiding nan tuul u; kamyin la ka awm vengah na im ah nan luui sak u;
hinaak himbai ka taal vengah nan bai nan naak sak u; Ka tlawh ka nat vengah nan khuut nan ceem u; thongim ka tlaak vengah nan hip u;’ a tina ai.
Tevengah thlaangdoeng hue lawng, ‘Bawipa, mevengah na bung a pawng te kan huh u tih buh kan cah u; tui na halh te mevengah kan huh u tih tui kan tuul u?
Mevengah kamyin la na law tih im ah kan pah sak u; mevengah hinaak himbai na taal te kan huh u tih kan naak kan bai sak u?
Mevengah na tlawh na nat, mevengah thongim ah na awm te kan huh u tih kan hip u?’ tila a tina u ai.
Sengpahrang lawng, ‘Atak tang kavan thui u; He kah ka boenhui huhsit koek pakhat tengah na sai u te ka sawah na sai u poen ni,’ a tina ai.

“Tecoengah Sengpahrang lawng a banvoei benkah aka awm hue tengah ‘Nangmi Pathen lawng a kawsina’ thlaang thli ka teng kalawng atloela cet uh. Seitan oen a hubang hue ham aroek abah pe sut dungyan haialh khuila cet uh.
Metihtiah ka bung a pawng vengah buh nan cah u nawh; tui ka halh vengah tui nan tuul u nawh;

Kamyin la ka awm vengah na im ah nan pah sak u nawh; hinaak himbai ka taal vengah nan bai nan naak sak u nawh; ka tlawh ka nat vengah khaw, thongim ka tlaak vengah khaw nan khuut nan ceem u nawh,’ a tina ai.

Tevengah ahimi lawng ‘Bawipa, mevengah na bung a pawng, tui na halh, kamyin la na awm, hinaak himbai na taal, na tlawh na nat tih thongim ah na awm tih atliingla na awm te kan huh u tih kan khuut kan ceem u nawh,’ a tina u ai.
Sengpahrang lawng ‘Atak tang kavan thui u: He thlaang huhsit koek timkah pakhat bawm ham na ngaih u nawh te kai nan bawm nan ceem u nawh poen ni,’ a tina ai.
Tecoengah ahimi te dungyan patang raina huen ah a tuih vetih thlaangdoeng hue te tah dungyan hingna ah cet u ai,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he awl a thui boeih coengah a hubang hue tengah,
“Na ming u angla he coeng kalawng hin hih ah Kaantaak Poei awm vetih Thlaanghing Capa te thinglam dawngah ngawn hamla thlaang kut ah a peek ai,” a tina.
Tecoengah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng Khawsoeih Bawi Kaiafas kah impui ah tun u tih,
Jesuh te ahuepla tuuk tih ngawn ham khaw a khan u.
“Poei khawhin khui atah tu boel sih, thlaangping lawng awl puung vetih cumplaam la tho ai,” tila ahimi lawng a thui u.
Jesuh tah Bethani khaaw kah haibe aka na Simon im ah te awm.
Buh a caak lii vengah hutaa pakhat Jesuh tengla law tih riimtuui phutlo alabasta uum dawngah abepirla avan khuen tih Jesuh te a luu ah a suep.
Te tila a sai te a hubang hue lawng a huh u vengah a thinsa u tih, “N'tu ham he tila apoeih alak he!
He riimtuui he tangka yahawhla a yoeih vetih khawdeng harah a peek makawi!” ti u.
Te tila a hubang hue lawng a thui u te Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah ahimi nala “N'tu hamla he hutaa he na lawl na la u? Ka sawah ahih lawng thaihu theen a sai poen ni,
Khawdeng harah thli tah nangmi tengah awm poepa ai, tede kai tah nangmi tengah ka awm poe manawh.
He kah hutaa lawng ka pum riimtuui oen avan suep he ka rawkk kuem ham a kamthlahna ni.
Atak tang kavan thui u: dilai saw peng tawm ah he awlthang a thuina huen roekk atah ahih kah thaihu sai he amah hilhna nawh ham a thui yoeyah u van ai.
Tecoengah a hubang thlaihih tim kah Judas Iskariot aka miingna te khawsoeih ahaamca hue tengla cet tih,
“Jesuh he a sawah paipi ka thleep tih nangmi kut ah kan pe kawinih n'tu nan peek u ai?” tila a doet. Ahimi lawng tangka sawmthum te a toek u tih Judas te a peek u.
Teveng kalawng Judas lawng Jesuh te ahimi kut ah peek thai ham atue theen a ring.
Tawlru thuum mueh Takawi Poei acuek hin ah a hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih, “Nang hamla Kaantaak buh he ame huen ah ka sai u ai? tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Khawpui khuikah thlaang pakhat im la cet u lang ‘Saya lawng: Kai ham atue a pha poen; ka hubang hue oen na im ah Kaantaak buh veelna ka ca sai u ai, ti’ tila thui pe uh,” a tina.
A hubang hue lawng Jesuh kah a thui angla Kaantaak buh te aroek abah u.
Khaw a thlem veng atah Jesuh oen a hubang thlaihih hue buh a veel u.
Thlem buh a caak u lii vengah Jesuh lawng, “Atak tang kavan thui u: nangmi timkah pakhat lawngah ka sawah paipi a thleep ai,” a tina.
A hubang hue tah a kawthe u tangkiik tih pakhat coengah pakhat lawng, “Bawipa, kai aw?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai oen buh beel aka puei haih lawng ka sawah paipi a thleep ai.

Thlaanghing Capa tah duek ai tila Caciim lawng a thui angla ahih tah duek ai, tede Thlaanghing Capa sawah paipi’ aka thleep thlaang ham tah khawmap! Te thlaang te cuun ohla awm kawinih ahih ham theen bet sui de!” a tina.
Paipi thleepkung Judah lawng, “Saya, kai aw” tila a doet. Tevengah Jesuh lawng, “Na thui angla soeng,” a tina.
Buh a caak u lii vengah Jesuh lawng takawi pheel at te a lawh tih a thangthui coengah takawi te a eh tih a hubang hue te a peek. “He tah ka pum ni; lo u langtah ca uh,” a tina.
Tecoengah boengloeng te a lawh tih Pathen teng awmngaih ciil a thui coengah a hubang hue te a peek. “Nangmi boeih lawng aw uh,” a tina.
“He tah ka thi ni. Pathen kah awlkhueh thaai acakna oen thlaang boeih kah thawlh khawdawp ngaaina hamla ka hok ka thisen ni.
Atak tang kavan thui u: A Pa Ram ah nangmi oen haih misurtui a thaai awkk ham khawhin a pha thlantoe tahe kalawng misurtui he ka aw koep tlaih manawh,” a tina.
Tecoengah laa raawl at a sak u tih Olif tlaang la luui u.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Caciim lawngah, ‘Pathen lawng tuudoen te a ngawn vetih tuu boeih tah pathengg payaangla awm ai’ tila a thui angla, ‘N'tu yiin roe ah nangmi lawng kai he nan heng taak u vetih nan ceh taak u ai.’
Tede duekna kalawng ka thawh koep coengah Galili la nangmi haiah ka cet ai,” a tina.
Piter lawng, “Thlaangtloe boeih lawng nang te n'hoett sut tih ng'heng taak cakhaw kai lawngtah kan heng taak roe manawh,” tila Jesuh te a tina.
Jesuh lawng Piter tengah “Atak tang kavan thui: n'tuu yiin ah aai a khaawk thlan vengah nang lawng kai he ka ming nawh’ tila voeithum toe na basa ai,” a tina.
Piter lawng, “Nang oen duek haih ham toe awm mai cakhaw kan ming nawh tila ka thui roe manawh,” a tina. A hubang atloe hue lawngkhaw te tila a thui u van.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah a hubang hue oen Ketsaman a ti u ahuen la cet u tih ahimi te, “Ke huen la ke ka cet silang ka thangthuina ruet ah he ah he anna ngawl uh!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng Piter oen Zebedi capa rawi te a ceh puei. A kaw caalla the tih lakueng sut.
Tecoengah ahimi nala “Ka kaw a the uett ah ka duek kaw la hut. He ah awm u lang n'hak puei’ u lah,” a tina.

Jesuh lawng ahimi oen athla betna huen la cet, dilai ah buekuep tih “A Pa, acoengg thai atah he kah patang khangna boengloeng he van khoe mai hawn! Tede kai kah kawngaih angla awm boel selang nang kah kawngaih angla awm hawn seh,” tila thangthui.
Tecoengah a hubang pathum tengla ava mel vengah ahimi a ih muelh u te a huh tih Piter tengah, “Metila nangmi pathum hue he khawnoek pakhat khui maikhaw na hak u thai nawh aw?
Suek-halhna na taa thaina ham hak u lang thangthui uh. Thinkaw lawngtah a ngaih de pumsa tah a tha yoek sut” a tina.
Jesuh tah cet koep tih “A Pa, he kah patang khangna boengloeng he awkk ohla khoe thai koeila a awm nawh atah, na kawngaih angla awm hawn seh,” tila thangthui.
A hubang hue tengla Jesuh a mel koep vengah ahimi a ih muelh te a huh; a mik khaw daai u thai nawh.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te a ceh taak tih apathumna ah a thangthui nooek angla thangthui koep.
Tecoengah a hubang hue tengla mel koep tih “Na ip tih na duem u huen aw? Bueh u lah! Thlaanghing Capa tah thlaangthawlh thli kut ah peekna atue tah a pha poen.
Tho uh, Cet u poen sih. Bueh lah, ka sawah paipi aka thleep thlaang te avan pha poen he,” a tina.

Jesuh lawng awl a thui pe vengah te a hubang paha thlaihih tim ah aka thuum van Judas te avan pha. Ahih lawngah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng a tuih u thlaangping, samsen oen boelhoen aka pawm thli te avan law puei.
Paipi thleepkung lawng thlaangping tengah miknoekna te a thui pe oepsoeh tih, “Kai lawng ka mok thlaang te nangmi lawng tuuk ham na ngaih thlaang te ni, ahih te tu uh,” a tina.
Judas lawng a paipuek ah Jesuh tengla cet pahoei tih “Saya, na sawah ngaimawngna awm seh,” a tina tih a mok.
Jesuh lawng, “Ka puei, na sai ham koei te aloela sai hawn,” a tina. Tecoengah ahimi lawng Jesuh te a tuuk tih a khih u.
Jesuh oen aka awm haih thlaang pakhat lawng a samsen te tiingim dawngkah a suh tih Khawsoeih Bawi kah a tamnaa haa te pat a tloek.
Jesuh lawng, “Na samsen te tiingim khuila sang koep. Samsen aka hawna tah samsen oen duek van ai.
Kai lawng a Pa tengah bawmna ka bih kawinih raalkapbu paha thlaihih lak ah yahawh ngaai vanthlaang te ka tengla avan tuih pahoei ai ti he na ming nawh aw?
Tede te tila awm kawinih, he ang thaihu a awm ham Caciim lawng a thui te metila a soep thai ai?” a tina.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te, “Nangmi lawng kai he thlaanghuuen angla tuuk ham pawmcunghaiha, samsen oen boelhoen na pawm u tih na law u? Khawhin roekk Tempal bok-im ah ka ngawl tih kan cang puei u vengah a-u lawngkhaw nan tu u nawh.
Tede he tila thaihu boeih a awm he tah tawngha hue lawng Caciim dawngah a thut te asoepna ham ni,” a tina u. Tevengah a hubang boeih lawng Jesuh te a ceh taak tih a heeng taak u.
Jesuh aka tu thlaangping lawng Jesuh te Khawsoeih Bawi Kaiafas im la a ceh puei u. Te huen ah Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Judah ahaamca boeih tun u.

Piter lawngah a thla bet ngai kalawng Khawsoeih Bawi kah a talawng vawng-up khui toela Jesuh te a hu yut tih a vai. Metila nuem a sai u lah ve tite ming ham a ngaih dawngah ahih lawng talawng vawng-up khuila kuun tih raaltoeng thli oen haih ngawl.
Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Khonsil ah aka thuum boeih lawng Jesuh te ngawn thai ham a thawlhna a tlap pe u;
tede a thawlhna pakhat khaw hu u nawh. Hoem awl oen thawlh aka peel tah awm moen mai de a thawlhna tehca khaw hu thai nawh. Ahukhueng atah thlaang pahih law hih tih.
“He thlaang lawng ‘Pathen kah Tempal bok-im te ka phe vetih hin thum ah ka sak koep ai,’ ti” tila a thui hih.
Khawsoeih Bawi lawng pai hang tih, “He rawi lawng thawlh n'peel he na oelh ham koei awm nawh aw?” tila Jesuh te a doet.
Tede Jesuh lawng n'tu khaw thui nawh. Khawsoeih Bawi lawng pai koep tih, “Aka hing Pathen miing ka phoei tih kan doet: Nang he Pathen Capa Messiah tang aw thui lah?” a tina.

Jesuh lawng, “Na thui angla soeng! Tede nangmi boeih tengah kavan thui u; tahe kalawng Thlaanghing Capa tah Thara koek bantang ben ah ngawl vetih vaan kah muui dawngah a rum thuk te na huh u ai,” a tina.
Tevengah Khawsoeih Bawi lawng a himbai te a pheuh tih, “Pathen thekhana poen ni! Atloe sausi ngoe tlaih nawh. Pathen thekhana awl na yaak u boeih poen!
Metila na poek u?” tila a doet. Ahimi lawng, “A thawlh dawngah duek ham awm,” ti u.
Tecoengah ahimi lawng Jesuh te a mik-hai ah a tumthoeih u tih a bawh u; a bel u. Tecoengah aka bel hue lawng,
“Messiah! Nang a-u lawng m'bel; van thui lah,” a tina u.
Piter lawng talawng adauben vawng-up khuiah a ngawlh vengah Khawsoeih Bawi im kah tuihyoeihnu pakhat a tengla law tih, “Nang khaw Galili thlaang Jesuh oen aka awm haih van ni,” a tina.
Tede Piter lawng ahimi boeih haiah basa tih, “N'tu kawng nuem na thui, ka ming moenih,” a tina.
Tecoengah Piter tah talawng thawhka ben la te cet. Atloe tuihyoeihnu pakhat lawng a huh tih te kah thlaang thli tengah, “He thlaang he Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh oen aka awm haih thlaang ni,” a tina u.
Piter lawng basa koep tih, “Awl ka taap, te thlaang te ka ming nawh,” a tina.
Raih a awm coengah te huen kah aka pai thlaang hue lawng Piter tengla law u tih “Nang khaw ahimi timkah thlaang van ni, na awlcal thingkaa dawngah ming u poen,” a tina u.

Tecoengah Piter lawng “Awl ka taap tih awltak ka thui. Ka thui awl he a soeng nawh atah Pathen lawng dan m'pe seh! Te thlaang te ka ming roeroe nawh,” a tina. Te tila a thui coeng khoeng atah aai khawk pahoei.
Jesuh lawng, “Aai a khawk thlan vengah voeithum toe kan ming nawh nan tina ai,” a tina awl te Peter lawng a poek lot vengah adaubenla te cet, a kawsi la dung tih rap.
Mincanghi atah Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue boeih lawng Jesuh te ngawn ham khaw a khan u.
Ahih te thiirui oen a khih coengah a ceh puei u tih Rom ram ukbawi Pilat kut ah a peek u.
Paipi thleepkung Judas lawngah, Jesuh te ngawn hamla khaw a khan u te a yaak vengah yut tih tangka sawmthum te Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue tengah a baal koep.
“Ka thawlh tangkiik, thawlhna aka khueh nawh te duek sak hamla a sawah paipi ka thleep hau poen,” a tina. Ahimi lawng, “Kaimi lawng n'tu ka tina ai? Namah ngaih poen ni,” a tina u.
Judas lawng tangka sawmthum te Tempal bok-im khuiah a voeih sut tih cet, te coengah kaiawk tih duek.
Khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng tangka te a ruh u tih, “He kah tangka he thisen phu tangka la a awm dawngah Tempal bok-im kah tangkakong khuiah khueh ham mami kah Phungawl lawng ngaih nawh,” ti u.
Te kah tangka kawng te a thui u tih kawtlaakna a khueh coeng atah thlaangphun tloe kah phuel la khueh ham ah Ambawpkung kah Lohuen te laina ham tangka te a hawna u.
Tedawngah te lohuen te, “Thisen huen” tila tihin toe ah a thui u.

Te tila tawngha Jeremiah lawng a thuisut awl te soep poen. Tawngha Jeremiah lawng, “Israel thlaang thli lawng ahih kah phu ting la kawtlaakna oen aphu a kheh u tangka sawmthum te ahimi lawng a lawh u tih, Bawipa lawng awl n'peek angla,
Ambawpkung kah lohuen te laina ham tangka te a hawna u,” tila a thui te ni.
Rom ram ukbawi haiah Jesuh a pai vengah ram ukbawi lawng, “nang he Judah sengpahrang tang aw?” tila a doet. Jesuh lawng, “Na thui angla ka awm,” a tina.
Tede Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng thawlh a peel u te Jesuh lawng khat khaw thung pe nawh.
Tedawngah Pilat lawng, “Nang he ahimi lawng thawlh he yoeh m'peel u he na ya nawh aw?” tila a doet.
Tede Jesuh lawng kaam at khaw a thung pe nawh dawngah ram ukbawi tah a kawpoek rai tangkiik.
Rom ram ukbawi lawng Kaantaak Poei veng roekk ah rangpui lawng loeih sak ham a ngaih thongtla pakhat te a thlah pe.
Tevengah a thaang aka the soeh thlaangthe Jesuh Barabbas aka miingna thongtla pakhat awm.
Thlaang rangpui a tun soep vengah Pilat lawng, “A-u thlah sak ham na ngaih u? Jesuh Barabbas aw, tih nawh atah Messiah a ti u Jesuh aw?” tila a doet.
Ahimi lawng Jesuh he a uett u dawngah aana aka khueh Judah hue lawng ka kut ah avan pha sak u tite ahih lawng atheenla a ming.
Awlcekna yung ah Pilat a ngawlh vengah a yu lawng, “Thawlhna aka khueh nawh te kah thlaangdoeng sawah n'tu khaw sai boel. Ahih kawngah tiyiin ka mang ah ka patang tangkiik,” tila awl a tah.
Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng Barabbas te thlah tih Jesuh te ngawn hamla Pilat tengah bih ham ah rangpui te a ceemtuh.
Pilat lawng “He rawi pahih khuiah a-u thlah sak ham na ngaih u?” tila rangpui te a doet. Ahimi lawngah, “Barabbas” ti u.
Pilat lawng ahimi te, “Te atah Messiah a ti u Jesuh he metila ka sai ai?” tila a doet. Ahimi boeih lawng, “Thinglam dawngah ngawn” a tina u.
Tede Pilat lawng, “N'tu thawlhna a sai?” tila a doet koep u. Tevengah te thli lawng, “Thinglam dawngah ngawn!” tila angaihhlangla paang u.

Pilat lawng he tila awl doett khiing he coeng thai manawh, cumplaam la tho tih so tare poen ai tite a huh vengah tui a lawh tih rangpui haiah a kut te a silh. “He thlaangdoeng kah duekna kawngah kai ka thuum nawh! Namami kah sai ni!” a tina.
Tevengah rangpui lawngah, “Ahih kah duekna kawngah dantatna tah kamami oen ka cadil thli sawah tla hawn seh,” ti u.
Tecoengah Pilat lawng ahimi ham Barabbas te a thlah pe tih; Jesuh te cungpoelh oen a bawh sak u tih thinglam dawngah ngawn ham ahimi kut ah a peek.
Tecoengah Pilat kah raalkap hue lawng Jesuh te ram ukbawi kah impui la a khuen u tih raalkap bu khat lawng a voel khoep.
Ahimi lawng a himbai te a pit pe u tih himbai ling a bai sak u.
Tecoengah thliing lumuek te a muek sak u, a bantang kut ah cawnghol a pawm sak u; tecoengah a haiah buekuep u tih a the akhana u, “Judah sengpahrang na hinglung vaang seh,” tila a the akhana u.
Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a tumthoeih u, cawnghol te a lawh pe u tih a luu ah a bawh u.
He tila a thena u coengah himbai ling te a pit pe tih amah kah himbai te a bai sak koep tih thinglam dawngah ngawn ham a ceh puei u.
Te tila a ceh u vengah Sairin khaaw kah Simon te a huh u tih raalkap hue lawng amangkhakla Jesuh kah thinglam te a kawh sak u.
Golgota a ti u huen te a pha u. Golgota ti he tah, “Luuruh Huen,” ti ngaihna ni.
Te huen ah Jesuh te misurtui oen tuikha a pawlh te a tuul u. Jesuh lawng a teng doek tih aw nawh.
Jesuh te thinglam dawngah a tai u, tecoengah talcung a suh u tih a hinaak himbai te rek ra u.
Tecoengah ngawl u tih Jesuh te a toet u.
Thawlh a peel te a thut u tih a luu sawah a tai pe u. “He tah Judah Sengpahrang Jesuh ni,” tila a thut pe u.
Tevengah thlaanghuen pahih khaw Jesuh oen haih bantang ben ah pakhat, banvoei ben ah pakhat thinglam dawngah a tai u.
Te kah aka cet paitai thli lawng a luu halh a voeih u tih a tamdeng kawkhahna u.
Tempal bok-im te aka phe tih hin thum ah aka sa koep ham koei! Pathen Capa la na awm atah namah oen namah thlawn u lah saw! Thinglam dawng kalawng rum thuk lah!” a tina u.
Tetih van angla khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen ah Judah ahaamca hue lawngkhaw a tamdeng u van tih,
“Ahih lawng thlaangtloe tah a thlawn thai de, amah oen amah tah thlawn u thai nawh! Israel sengpahrang la awm nawh aw? Tahe roe ah thinglam dawng kalawng a rum atah mami lawng ahih he n'tangna ai ta!
Pathen a uepna tih Pathen Capa la ka awm ti, Pathen lawng tahe ah a thlawn ai aw bueh u lah sih!” ti u.
Jesuh oen thinglam dawngah a tai haih thlaanghuen rawi lawng pateng khaw ahimi angla a tamdeng hih van.
Hingthun ah ram pum boeih te yiinna lawng a thiing khoep tih khawnoek pathum khui yiin khoep.
Khawvaang ben khawnoek pathum yun atah Jesuh lawng, “Eli, Eli, Lama sabaktani?” tila angaihhlangla paang. A thuingaihna tah, “Ka Pathen, Ka Pathen, n'tu ah kai nan hoett sut?” ti ngaihna ni.
Te huen kah aka pai thlaang khatsut lawng a yaak u vengah, “Ahih lawng Elijah ni a khue,” ti u.
Ahimi tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng thlat cet tih himbaipeen te a lawh, misurtui ah a nuem tih cungkui dawngah a piin tih Jesuh te awkk sak ham kamthlah.
Tede atloe hue lawng, “Awm de lah! ahih thlawn hamla Elijah law ai nuem, bueh de lah sih,” ti u.
Jesuh lawng angaihhlangla paang, tecoengah a mal pat yip.
Tevengah Tempal bok-im khuikah himbaiyan te asaw kalawng adang toe pahih la poet pheuh u. Dilai hinghuen tih lungnu thli boeih rek.
Thlann thawhka boeih awng u tih aka duek tangte Pathen thlaang thli boehoeng mai te tho u.
Phuel te a ceh taak u tih duekna kalawng Jesuh a thawh koep coengah Aciim Khawpui khuila kuun u tih thlaang broe haiah tueng u.
Raalbawi oen Jesuh aka toet raalkap hue lawng likluei hinghuen tih atloe thaihu thli te tila a awm te a huh u vengah lakueng rih oen thuen u tih, “Ahih he Pathen Capa tang tang ni” ti u.
Galili kalawng Jesuh hu ah aka bang tih amah te aka bawmcem hutaa broe nawh te ah te awm u tih ahih te athla kalawng a toet tih a dan u.
Ahimi tim-ah Meri Makdalin, Jeem oen Josep manu Meri oen Zebedi yu khaw awm u.
Thlemben apha atah Arimatia khaaw kah kuirang pakhat Josep aka miingna te avan pha. Ahih khaw Jesuh kah a hubang pakhat la awm van.
Ahih lawng Pilat tengla cet tih Jesuh kah a rawkk te a bih. Jesuh kah a rawkk te Josep kut ah peek ham Pilat lawng awl a peek.
Josep lawng Jesuh rawkk te a lawh tih himbai bawk athaithik oen a yaawl tih,
amah ham lungkaw a thuk heet thlann thaai ah te a up. Tecoengah lungto bo hlang oen thlann thawhka te a khaih tih a ceh taak.
Meri Makdalin oen atloe Meri mi khaw te ah te thlaan ben la mang tih ngawl u.
Avuen Sabbath hin ah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Farasi thlaang thli tah Pilat oen huh u tih,
“Bawipa hoem thui thlaang ahih lawng te a hing vengah, ‘Kai tah duekna kalawng ka tho koep ai’ tila a thui te ka ming u.

Tedawngah athum hin toe thlann te atheenla a khaih tih a toet u ham awl van pe lah, te nawh kawinih a hubang hue lawng cet u vetih a rawkk te a huuen u coengah ahih tah duekna kalawng tho koep poen tila thlaang tengah a thui u ai. Hukhueng kah thailatna he acuek kah thailatna lak ah the-eep ngaai ai,” tila a thui pe u.
Pilat lawng “Raalkap bu khat aka toet la na khueh u te ta: cet u langtah thlann te a toet thai khui anepla toet sak uh,” a tina.
Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng cet u tih thlann khaihna lungto dawngah miknoekna a khueh u tih thlann te anepla a toet sak.
Sabbath hin boeih tih yarh khat khuikah lamhacuek khawhin khawthaih tawm ah Meri Makdalin oen atloe Meri te thlann bueh hamla cet.
Tevengah te bawtbet khawlai ah likluei tho tih angaihhlangla hinghuen. Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat te vaan kalawng va rum tih thlann khaihna lungto te a thoeih tih a sawah ngawl.
Ahih kah a muei asam tah khawpha angla awm tih a himbai tah rawsawng angla bawk.
Thlann aka toet raalkap thli let u tih a rih u dawngah thuen u tih thlaang duek angla awm u.
Vanthlaang lawng hutaa rawi nala “Rih boel; thinglam dawngah a ngawn u Jesuh te na tlap te ka ming.
Ahih tah he ah awm tlaih nawh; a thui angla tho poen. Law langtah a ralhna huen te bueh lah.
Tahe ah aloela cet langtah a hubang hue tengah, ‘Ahih tah duekna kalawng tho koep poen; nangmi haiah Galili la cet vetih te ah ahih te na huh u ai!” tila thui pe uh. Kavan thui he hilh boel,” a tina.
Hutaa rawi lawng a rih hih de awmngaihna oen phuel kalawng ah aloela cet tih a hubang hue tengah thui pe ham heeng.
Tevengah Jesuh te ahih rawi tengah law parak tih “Nanghih sawah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh.” a tina. Ahih rawi lawng a tengla cet, a khow ah a phoeih tih a bok.
Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala te “Rih boel, cet langtah ka maya manau thli te Galili la ceh ham thui pe hih, te ah te ahimi lawng kai he n'huh u ai” a tina.
Hutaa hue Phuel kalawng a meel u vengah, thlann toet raalkap khatsut lawng khawpui khuila cet u tih khawsoeih ahaamca hue tengah thlann kah a huh boeih te a thui pe u.
Khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng Judah ahaamca hue oen huh tun u tih khaw a poek u; ahimi lawng raalkap thli te tangka yahawh a peek u tih,
“A hubang hue khawyiin ah law u tih kaimi ka ihna ruet ah a rawkk te a huuen u tila thui uh.
He kawng he ram ukbawi lawng a yaak atah kaimi lawng ka thloep u vetih nangmi te he kawngah lakueng ham awm manawh,” a tina u.
Thlanntoet raalkap hue lawng tangka te a lawh u tih ahimi lawng a uen angla a thui u. Raalkap hue kah a thui awl te tahe toe Judah hue lawng a thui khuep u.
A hubang paha thlaikhat hue tah Galili ram la cet u tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe tlaang la te luui u.
Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a huh u vengah a bok u, tede ahimi timkah khatsut lawngtah tangna u nawh.
Jesuh lawng ahimi tengla cet phai tih. “Dilai oen vaan kah saithaina aana boeih kai m'peek poen.
Tedawngah dilai dawngkah thlaangphun boeih tengah cet u langtah ahimi te ka hubang la van coeng sak uh; Pa, Capa, Ciim Muithla miing ah baptisma pe uh.
Kai lawng awl kan peek boeih te a vaina u ham cang puei uh. Dilai tue aboettoe nangmi oen haih ka awm poe ai,” a tina.
He tah Pathen Capa Jesuh Khrih kawng Awlthang theen ni.
A tongcuek vengah tawngha Isaiah lawng: “Pathen lawng ‘Nang hamla lawngpui tukkung Kamah kah laipai na haiah kavan tuih ai, ti.’
Thlaang pakhat tah ramhum huhang ah paang tih, “Bawipa ham lawngpui te roekbah uh, a cehna ham lawngpui te doeng sak uh,” tila a thut.

Tedawngah Johan tah ramhum huhang ah va law, baptisma a peek tih phung a thui. Thlaangping thli te, “Na thawlhna yut u langtah baptisma dang uh. Te dengah ni Pathen lawng na thawlhna sawah khawdawp avan ngai u ai.” a tina.
Judia peng oen Jerusalem kah thlaang thli lawng Johan kah phungthui te hutung hamla cet u. A thawlhna a phawng u tih Jordan tuiva ah ahimi te Johan lawng baptisma a peek u.
Johan lawng Kala-uk mul oen a tah himbai te a baai tih a hingcen ah saphaw cihin a naak. Ahih lawngah khaurang oen khawitui te buh la a caak.
Ahih lawng thlaangping nala te, “Kai coengah aka law ham koei thlaang te tah kai lak ah aka lenduet ni. Kai tah ahih kah khowmuek rui thlam ham Pateng ka ting ka tawkk nawh.
Kai lawngtah nangmi he tui oen ni baptisma kan peek u. Tede ahih lawngtah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma m'peek ai,” a tina.
Tecoeng kalawng a awm raih thlan ah Jesuh tah Galili peng Nazaret khaaw kalawng va law tih Jordan tuiva ah Johan lawng baptisma a peek.
Jesuh te tui dawng kalawng a thawh hang khoeng vengah vaan te awng u tih ahih sawah Muithla akhuu angla a cuuk te a huh.
Vaan kalawng aka law awl lawngah, “Nang tah kan thintlawhna ka Capa ni, na sawah ka kaw tluep, tangkiik” a tina.
Tecoeng atah Muithla lawng ahih te ramhum huhang la a tuih pahoei tih,
Te ah te khawhin sawmlii awm tih Seitan lawng a suek a halh. Ramsatlung thli khaw te ah te awm, tede vanthlaang thli law u tih Jesuh te a bawm acem u.
Johan te thong a tlaak coengah Jesuh tah Galili ram la cet tih Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen te a phawng.
“Atue atang tah avan pha khuek poen! Pathen ukna tah yoeii poen! Na thawlhna yut u langtah Awlthang Theen he tangna uh!” tila a thui.
Galili tuikeeng ah Jesuh a ceh phai vengah tuihawi thlaang pahih Simon oen a manau Andru lok a heeng hih te a huh.
Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala, “Ka hu ah bang hih lah, thlaang tukung la kan coengg sak hih ai,” a tina.
Tevengah lok te pak a tloeng hih tih Jesuh hu ah bang hih pahoei.
Ahih tah cet hot phai tih Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen Johan boeinau te a huh. Ahih rawi tah lowng khuiah lok te a baw hih.
Jesuh lawng a huh pahoei oen te rawi te a khue. Ahih rawi lawng ana pa Zebedi oen a bii aka bi pe thlaang thli te lowng khuiah a ceh taak hih tih Jesuh hu ah bang hih pahoei.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue Kapernaum khawpui la law u tih Sabbath hin ah Jesuh te Sinakok la cet tih cang puei ham a tong.
Jesuh lawngtah Phungawl cangpueikung hue angla cang puei nawh tih sai thaina aana aka khueh angla a cang puei dawngah ahih kah cangpueina aka ya boeih lawngtah a kawpoek rai u.
Tevengah te a kaw khuiah raaithe aka awm thlaang pakhat sinakok bok-im khuila law tih rih oen thuen ruila paang,
“Nazaret Jesuh, kaimi he metila sai ham na ngaih? Kaimi he phe ham aw na law? Nang he me ang thlaang ti he kan ming: Nang tah Pathen kah laipai thlaang ciim ni” a tina.
Jesuh lawng raaithe te, “Awm duem lah, te thlaang kaw khui kalawng co loeih!” tila awl a peek.
Raaithe lawng te thlaang te a ngaih hlang la a thuen sak, rih oen thuenn doe ah paang tih te thlaang kah a kaw khui kalawng co.
Thlaang boeih te a kawpoek rai u tih khat oen khat te, “He he me ang kai? Cangpueina a thaai phun tloe kai aw? He thlaang lawng raaithe te aana oen awl a peek tih ahimi lawng awl a ngaai pe,” ti u.
Tedawngah Jesuh kawng awlthang te kawlkalh maiah Galili peng khaaw tawm ah thaang khonghak.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue, Jeem oen Johan mi khaw, sinakok kalawng tho u tih Simon oen Andru im la poe cet u.
Simon kah a mase hutaa te tlo tih ral. Jesuh te a paipuek ah ahih kah sading nawh kawng te a thui pe u.
Jesuh lawng a tengla cet tih ahih te a kut ah a phoeih tih a thawh hang. A sa ding pahoei tih ahimi te a do a dan.
Khaw a tlaak coeng thlem khup atah thlaangping lawngah thlaangtlo boeih oen raaithe aka khueh thli te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u.
Te khawpui khuikah thlaang boeih tah im haiah tun u boeih.

Jesuh lawng tlawhnatna soeprep boeih oen aka tlo thli te a hoeih sak tih raaithe thli khaw boeih a hek. Jesuh he me ang thlaang tite raaithe thli lawng a ming u dawngah Jesuh lawng raaithe thli te awl kam at khaw thui sak u nawh.
Avuen khawhin mincanghi khaw a thaih thlan ah Jesuh tah tho tih khawpui adauben ading asuekna huen la te cet tih te ah te thangthui.
Simon oen a paya thli lawng ahih te a tlap tih,
a huh u vengah, “Thlaang boeih lawng nang he n'tlap u ta,” a tina u.
Tede Jesuh lawngah, “He kah atloe khaaw teng khaaw vai la cet u sih. Ahimi tengah khaw phung ka thui ham awm. Te ham ni kai ka law roe ta,” a tina.
Tedawngah Jesuh tah Galili peng tawm ah cet, sinakok bok-im boeih ah te phung a thui tih raaithe thli khaw a hek.
Haibe aka tlo thlaang pakhat Jesuh tengla law tih khuklu oen cuengkueng ruila, “Na kawngaih atah nan hoeih sak thai,” tila reenna a bih.
Jesuh lawng a reen tangkiik dawngah a kut a thueng tih a tek, “Hoeih sak ham ka ngaih ta, hoeih loeih,” a tina.
Kawlkalh ah haibe natna te hoeih tih ciim pahoei.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih te he tila awl ceet ceet a uen tih a tuih pahoei.

Hutung lah! He kawng he a-u tengah khaw thui boel. Tede khawsoeih tengla cet phaat langtah na pum te nueh lah; tecoengah nang na hoeih poen tite thlaang boeih lawng a mingna ham Mosi kah awlpeek angla thawthuengna te sai,” a tina.

Tede te kah thlaang lawng cet tih amah aciimna kawng te a thui tih khaaw tawm ah thaang khonghak. Ahih lawng he kawng he yahawh la a thui lat dawngah Jesuh tah khawpui khuila langya ah cet thai tlaih nawh poen. Khawpui adauben adingruena huen ah awm tih te la te khaw tawm kah thlaang thli te a tengla law u.
Khawhin yahawh hlang a awm raih thlan ah Jesuh te Kapernaum khaaw la meel koep tih im ah awm tila awlthang a yaak u.
Tedawngah thlaang yahawh hlang va tun u tih im khuiah ahoengna roe awm muehla thawhka keeng adauben ah Pateng khaw be khawk. Ahimi tengah te Jesuh lawng phung a thui pe.
Tevengah thlaang palii lawng aka khawn thlaang pakhat te Jesuh tengla avan kawh u.
Tede thlaang yahawh aih tih Jesuh tengla te pha puei u thai nawh. Tedawngah Jesuh a awmna tuueng kah imphu te a phe u, thlaangtlo te a himbai dawngah a ralh sak tih a thlaak thuk u.
Ahimi kah oengna te Jesuh lawng a huh vengah aka khawn thlaangtlo te, “Ka ca, na thawlhna boeih te khawdawp kavan ngaai poen,” a tina.
Te kah aka ngawl Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut lawng,
“N'tu ah he tila a thui ngam kai? Pathen thekhana poen ni, Pathen bueng nawh atah a-u lawng thawlhna khawdawp a ngaai thai! tila a kaw khuiah a poek u.
Ahimi kah kawpoek te Jesuh lawng a ming tih ahimi nala te, “N'tu kawng ah he ang thaihu he na poek u?
He kah aka khawn thlaang he, ‘Na thawlhna khawdawp ngaai la awm poen,’ tina aw aka yoei bet, tihnawhtah ‘Tho loeih, na himbai te lo langtah cet loeih,’ tina aw aka yoei bet?
Thlaanghing Capa lawng dilai han ah thawlhna khawdawp ngaai thaina aana a khueh ti he nangmi tengah ka tueng sak ai,” a tina. Tedawngah aka khawn thlaang nala.
“Tho lah, na himbai te lo langtah im la cet loeih kan tina he!” a tina.
Ahimi boeih kah mik huh ah te thlaang lawng tho hang, a himbai te a lawh tih aloela cet. Ahimi boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tih, “He ang thaihu he n'hu vai u nawh!” ti u tih Pathen te a thangpawm u.
Jesuh tah Galili tuiliikeeng la cet koep. Thlaangping broe lawngah a tengla a law u dawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te a cang puei.
Jesuh lawng a ceh phai vengah Alfias capa mangmu cawikung amah yungim ah aka ngawl Levi te a huh. Jesuh lawng ahih nala, “Ka hu ah va bang lah,” a tina. Levi lawng tho tih a hu ah bang pahoei.
Tecoeng atah Jesuh te Levi im ah buh a caak. Mangmu cawikung thli oen atloe thlaangthawlh thli lawng Jesuh te a hu ah bung a vai u tih khatsut lawngah Jesuh oen a hubang hue te buh a veel puei u.

Te tila Jesuh lawng thlaangthawlh thli oen mangmu cawikung hue oen ah buh a veel haih u te Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut oen Farasi thli lawng a huh u vengah, “N'tu dawngah he ang thlaang thli oen ahih lawng buh haih a caak u?” tila a hubang hue te a doet u.

Jesuh lawng ahimi kah awldoet te a yaak tih, “Sading thlaang lawng Siibawi ngoe nawh tih thlaangtlo bueng lawng ni a ngoe. Hinyah koei thlaangdoeng khue ham ka law nawh tih thlaang thawlh khue ham ni ka law” a tina.

Hin at atah Baptisma pekung Johan kah hubang hue oen Farasi thli buh a yeh u. Thlaang khatsut Jesuh tengla law u tih “Baptisma pekung Johan kah a hubang hue oen Farasi thli lawng buh a yeh u, nang kah hubang hue lawngtah n'tu kawngah buh a yeh u van nawh?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Yului poei ah a khue kamyin thli lawng buh a yeh u ai tila na poek aw? Yeh u manawh! Yulokung a awm vengah ahimi lawng buh yeh u manawh.
Tede ahimi teng kalawng yulokung a khuena khawhin a pha ai, tevengah ahimi lawng buh a yeh u badai.
A-u lawngkhaw a himbai ruem te bawna ham hisa athaai te hawna nawh; a bawna atah hisa athaai lawng aruem te a doek vetih a puut kau tare ai.

A-u lawngkhaw misurtui athaai te saphaw-yuukhap athaai dawngah thloen nooek nawh, thloen kawinih misurtui lawng saphaw-yuukhap te a pawkk sak vetih pahih bok la misurtui te yut boeih ai, saphaw-yuukhap te khaw paw poen ai. Tedawngah misurtui athaai te saphaw-yuukhap athaai dawngah thloen ham awm,” a tina.
Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh te caangthliw kalawng cet. A hubang hue khaw amah oen cet haih u tih ahimi lawng ceh doe ah caangvui a yuun u.
Tedawngah Farasi hue lawng Jesuh nala, “Bueh lah! na hubang hue lawng Sabbath khawhin ah he ang thaihu a sai u he mami kah Phungawl lawng ngaih nawh” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Devid lawngah caak koei khat khaw a khueh nawh vengah n'tu a sai tite na tae u vai nawh aw? Amah oen a paya thli a bung pawng u tangkiik,

Devid lawng Pathen im khuila kuun phaat tih Pathen tengah a nawn u takawi te a caak. Khawsoeih bawi Abiatha dung vengah te tila a sai. Mami kah Phungawl angla kawinih Khawsoeih hue bueng lawng ni te takawi te a caak. Tede Devid lawng a caak tih a puei thli Pateng khaw a peek” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng awlcuina ah, “Thlaanghing theenna hamla ni Sabbath he a sai; Sabbath hamla thlaanghing he sai nawh.
Tedawngah Thlaanghing Capa he Sabbath Bawi la khaw awm” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah sinakok bok-im la te cet koep. Te ah te kut kheem thlaang pakhat awm.

Jesuh kah sai thawlhna dawngah thawlh peel ham aka ngaih thlaang khatsut te ah te awm u; tedawngah Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng thlaang a hoeih sak ai aw, hoeih sak nawh ai aw ti u tih ahimi lawng ayoeirepla huh ham a doen u.
Jesuh lawng te kah kut kheem thlaang te, “Hai benla law lah,” a tina.

Tecoengah thlaangping te, “Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath hin ah n'tu sai sak ham a ngaih? Thlaang bawmcem ham aw, tihnawhtah patang khang sak ham aw?” tila a doet. Tede ahimi lawng awl kam at khaw thui u nawh.

Jesuh te a thin sa, a teng avai ah te maang tih ahimi te a bueh, ahimi a thin len tih a thawlh u te a huh vengah khatvaang atah a kaw khaw the. Tecoengah kut kheem thlaang nala te, “Na kut te yueng lah” a tina. A kut te a yueng tih theen koep.
Tecoengah Farasi hue tah Sinakok bok-im kalawng cet u tih Herod kah a thlaang thli oen huh u pahoei tih ahimi lawng Jesuh te ngawn ham khawkhanna a khueh u.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Galili Tuilii la cet u. Thlaangping broe lawngah a hu ah bung a vai u. Te kah thlaangping te tah Galili peng, Judia peng,

Jerusalem khawpui, Idumia peng, Jordan tuiva khawcuuk ben ramri kah Taiar oen Sidon khawpui teng kalawng aka law thlaang thli ni. Jesuh kah thaihu sai te a yaak u tih ahimi boeih lawng a tengla te law u.
Thlaang a yahawh aih dawngah thlaangping lawng a tiil hau nawh ham lowng pakhat te amah hamla roekbah oepsoeh ham a hubang hue te a thui pe.
Thlaangtlo yahawh hlang te a hoeih sak dawngah thlaangtlo boeih lawng Jesuh te tek hamla tulh u the.
Raaithe aka khueh thlaang boeih lawng ahih te a huh u vengah a haiah buekuep u tih thuen ruila, “Nang tah Pathen Capa ni.” tila paang u.
Jesuh lawng amah te me ang thlaang tite a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham raaithe thli te awl a peek.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah tlaangsawm la luui hang tih amah kah a ngaih thlaang thli te a khue. Ahimi lawng ahih tengla law u,
thlaang thlaihih a tuek tih ahimi te, “Celtuih” tila miing a sak. “Ka tengah awm ham kan tuek u, phung aka thui la kan tuih u vetih,
Nangmi lawng raaithe hek thaina aana khaw na khueh u ai,” a tina.
Celtuih thlaihih a tuek hue te tah, Simon (Piter a ti u te),
Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen a manau Johan (Jesuh lawng he rawi he Boanerzi tila miing a sak, a thuingaihna tah khawhumm ca rawi tina ni).
Andru, Filip, Bartalomiu, Matthai, Tawmas, Alfias capa Jeem, Taddias, Phunkuup Simon oen
Jesuh sawah paipi thleepkung Judas Iskariot, he hue ni.
Tecoengah Jesuh te im la meel. Thlaangping lawng tun u koep tih Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah buh caak ham atue Pateng awm nawh.
Te kawng te a cakaw hue lawng a yaak u tih ahih te khuutcem ham cet u. Metihtiah thlaang thli lawng “Jesuh tah ngau poen” tila a thui u dawngah ni.
Jerusalem kalawng aka law Phung-awl cangpueikung khatsut lawng, “A kaw khuiah Beelzebul awm! te tah raaithe hek thaina huham aka pe rai bawi ni” tila a thui u.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te amah tengah a khue tih thuidoetna awl oen a thui pe: “Metila Seitan lawng Seitan te a hek thai ai?
Ram pakhat ah amah oen amah athloekla pek u tih pakhat oen pakhat kaap u the kawinih te kah imkhuikaw tah pai thai manawh.
Imkhuikaw pakhat ah amah oen amah athloekla pek u tih pakhat oen pakhat raal u the kawinih te kah imkhuikaw tah pai thai manawh.
Tetih van angla Seitan kah ram khaw athloekla pek u kawinih aboet toe caak manawh, thek yak u vetih boet poen ai.
