Josep lawng rawkk yaawlna himbai a lai, a rawkk te thinglam dawngkah a lawh tih himbai oen te a yaawl coengah thel a thuk heet thlann lungkaw khuiah te a up. Tecoengah lungto bohlang a plet u tih phuel thawhka te a tleng.
Meri Makdalin oen Josep manu Meri mi khaw awm van tih Jesuh kah a rawkk upna huen te a huh hih.
Sabbath hin aboeih coengah Meri Makdalin, Jeem manu Meri oen Salome mi lawng Jesuh rawkk a thlukna hamla riimtuui a lai u.
Hin rih khuiah lamhacuek khawhin, khaw a thoeng cuek ah ahimi tah phuel la cet u.
Ahimi lawng thlann khuila a kuun u vengah cadawng tawngpang pakhat himbai bawk a bai tih bantang ben ah aka ngawl te a huh tih let u.
Ahih lawngah, “Let u boel, nangmi lawngah thinglam dawng a ngawn u Nazaret khaw kah Jesuh na tlap u te ka ming. Ahih tah he ah awm tlaih nawh, tho poen! Ahih a khuehna huen he bueh lah.
Tahe ah cet u langtah a hubang hue oen Piter te, he awlthang he thui pe uh: “Ahih tah nangmi haiah Galili la cet; nangmi tengah avan thui angla te ah te na huh u ai,” tila van thui pe uh,” a tina.
Tedawngah ahimi tah cet tih lakueng oen thuen ruila heng u. Ahimi lawng a rih u tangkiik dawngah a-u tengah khaw thui u nawh.

Hin rih khuiah lamhacuek khawhin mincanghi ah duekna kalawng Jesuh a thawh coengah, raaithe pasarih a kaw khuikah a hek pe Meri Makdalin tengah lamhacuek la phumpho. Hutaa hue lawng Piter oen a paya thli tengla cet u tih vanthlaang lawng ahimi tengah a thui pe awl te atawila a thui pe u.

Meri Makdalin lawng cet tih a paya thli te a thui pe. Ahimi tah a kaw the u tih rap u; He coengah Jesuh amah lawng a hubang hue rang oen khawcuuk ben kalawng ah khawtlaak ben toe aka hing yoeyah tih aka ciim dungyan thlawnna awlthang te a thui.
“Jesuh tah hing koep tih ka huh poen tila a thui te ahimi lawngah tangna u nawh.
He coengah hubang pahih vangca la a ceh vengah Jesuh lawng muei ame phuntloe ngai bet la ahih rawi tengah a phumpho pe.
Ahih rawi lawng meel koep hih tih atloe hue tengah a thui pe hih de ahimi lawng tangna u nawh.

Hukhueng koek ah a hubang paha thlaikhat buh a caak u lii vengah Jesuh te a phumpho pe. Ahimi lawng oengna khueh nawh tih Jesuh te a hing la aka hu thli kah awlthui khaw tangna ham thinkaw aniing khaklal u dawngah ahimi te a siim.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Dilai peng tawm ah cet u lang thlaangphun boeih tengah, awlthang theen he thui pe uh.
A-u lawngkhaw a tangna tih baptisma a huh atah thlawn la awm ai; A-u khaw a tangna nawh atah awlcekna a dang ai.
Aka oeng thli tah kawpoek rai saina huham te a peek ai; ahimi lawngah ka miing oen raaithe thli te a hek ai; awl thaai la cal u ai;
ahimi lawng asue aka awm ruul tu cakhaw, duekna sue aw cakhaw nganbawh ya manawh, ahimi lawng thlaangtlo thlaangnaa thli sawah kut a tloeng atah te thli lawng hoeih ai.” a tina.
Bawipa Jesuh lawng ahimi te awl a thui pe coengah vaan la luui tih Pathen bantang ben ah te ngawl.
A hubang thli lawng cet u tih peng tawm ah awlthang a thui u, Bawipa tah ahimi tengah bii a bi tih ahimi lawng a thui he soeng tite kawpoekrai saina oen a tueng sak u.
Hinyah koei Tiofilas: Mami tengah thaihu aka awm he atheen koek la thut ham thlaang yahawh lawng a yawm u poen.
He thaihu thli he acuekca veng kalawng aka hu tih awlthang aka phawng thli lawng mami tengah avan thui te ahimi lawng a thut u.
Tedawngah kai lawngkhaw he thaihu boeih he akungcuek kalawng ah acek aneh la ka rui ka hiim coengah Tongmang nang tengah ca thut ham theen ai tila ka poek.
Nang tengah avan thui u tangte soeprep boeih kawng te ataktang ni tila na mingna hamla kavan thut.
Judia ram ah Herod he sengpahrang la a awm vengah Abijah khawsoeih bu ah Zekhariah aka miingna khawsoeih pakhat awm. A yu tah Elizabet a miingna, ahih khaw khawsoeih imkhuikaw ah aka thuum van ni.
Ahih rawi tah Pathen mik huh ah thlaangdoeng la bok awm hih tih Bawipa kah phungawl oen awlpeek boeih te asoepcala a vai hih.
Elizabet tah a ca yaa tih ca-anau khueh hih nawh, ahih rawi tah patawng aih hih poen.
Hin at atah Zekhariah he khawhin roekk ah bii a sai ham koei te sai hamla atue a pha van tih Tempal bok-im khuiah khawsoeih biibi a sai koei te a sai.
Khawsoeih boeih lawng a vai u phung alam van angla bokna-thaang dawngah riimtuui huihthlut ham talcung a suh u tih a hih te a tuek u. Tedawngah Bawipa kah Tempal bok-im khuila te cet,
Tevengah riimtuui huihthlutna atue la awm tih rangpui thlaangping tah adauben ah thangthui u.
Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat ahih tengah phumpho tih rimtuui huihthlutna bokna-thaang bantang ben ah te pai.
Zekhariah lawng ahih te a huh vengah let uekcuek tih a rih.
Tede vanthlaang lawngah ahih nala te, “Zekhariah, rih boel! Nang kah thangthuina te Pathen lawng a yaak tih na yu Elizabet lawng na ca tawngpa avan cuun ai. Nang lawngah Johan tila miing na sak ai.
Ahih te a awm veng atah na kaw hoe tangkiik ai, thlaangtloe hue khaw awmngaih tangkiik u ai!
Ahih tah Bawipa mik huh ah aka lenduet la awm ai. Ahih lawngtah misurtui oen yuu khaw aw roe manawh. Ahih tah a thang pek kalawng Ciim Muithla oen be poen ai.
Ahih lawng Israel thlaangphun yahawh hlang te amami kah Bawipa Pathen tengla a mel puei koep ai.

Ahih tah Bawipa kah puencawn la awm vetih tawngha Elijah angla a tha awm vetih a tha ra ai. Ahih lawng ana pa oen ca-anau thli te koep a roep u sak ai; Ahih lawngah awl aka ngaai nawh thlaang thli te thlaangdoeng thli kah poekna lawngpui la te a mawt koep ai; Ahih lawngtah Bawipa kah thlaang thli te Bawipa amah ham oepsoeh la arueng aphong sak ai,” tila a thui pe.
Zekhariah lawng vanthlaang nala te, “Te tila awm tangtang ai tite metila ka ming ai? Kai tah ka patawng poen tih ka yu khaw hutawng van poen” a tina.
Vanthlaang lawngah, “Kai he Gabriel ni, he awlthang theen he nang tengah thui pe ham tuihkung Pathen haiah ka pai.

Tede nang lawng ka awl he na tangna nawh, atue akhoek vengah atakla thoeng ai. Nang lawng na tangna nawh dawngah awl na cal thai manawh; ka awlkam he atakla na tengah a thoeng thlantoe awlmueh la na awm ai.” a tina.
Teveng khui puet ah te thlaangping lawng Zekhariah te a ring u tih n'tu ah ahih he Tempal bok-im khuiah atue san hlang adiw aih oh kai ti tih a kawpoek rai u.

A law veng atah ahimi tengah awl thui thai nawh, tedawngah Tempal bok-im khuiah huhthlaam a huh tila ahimi lawng a ming u. Awl kam at khaw thui thai nawh, ahimi tengah te a kut oen ah miknoekna te a sai pe.
Tempal bok-im khuiah biibina atue te a boeih coeng atah Zekhariah te im la koep meel.
Tecoeng adiw raih coeng atah a yu Elizabet te vawn tih thla ngaa khui im khuiah awm roep.
Ahih lawng, “Tahe aboetna ah kai he Bawipa lawng n'bawm poen, thlaang rangpui haiah yaraula ka awm te avan lawh poen,” tila a thui.
Elizabet te tattloella a awmna thla ruk vengah Pathen lawng vanthlaang Gabriel te Galili ram kah khawpui Nazaret la te a tuih.
Sengpahrang Devid cadil la aka awm Josep aka miingna thlaang pakhat lawngah yuna hamla awl a khueh hulaa tengah awl thui pe ham a tuih. Te hulaa tah Meri a miingna.
Vanthlaang lawng a tengla law tih, “Na tengah ngaimawngna awm seh! Bawipa tah na tengah awm tih yotheen kam-awmna yahawh hlang la m'peek!” a tina.
Vanthlaang kah awlthui dawngah Meri tah a ngaai hang tih ahih kah awl he n'tu a thui ngaihna kai tila a kawpoek rai.
Vanthlaang lawng, “Meri! Rih boel; Nang tah mik-hai theenna Pathen lawng m'peek poen.
Nang tah na vawn ai, capa pakhat na cuun vetih a miing tah Jesuh tila na sak ai.
Ahih tah bawilen vetih Tloeng Khoelh Pathen Capa ti u ai. Bawipa Pathen lawngah ahih te patuer Devid angla te sengpahrang la a khueh ai,
ahih tah Jakob cadil thli kah dungyan sengpahrang la awm ai; ahih kah ram tah meveng khaw boet manawh!” a tina.
Meri lawng vanthlaang nala te, “Kai tah hulaa cuem la ka awm. Metila he he acoengg thai ai? a tina.
Vanthlaang lawng, “Ciim Muithla te na tengla law vetih Pathen kah huham tharana tah na sawah awm ai. Tedawngah aciim camaw te Pathen Capa ti u ai.
Namah kah cakaw Elizabet te poek lah. Ahih lawngah ca ka cuun tlaih manawh tila a thui, ahih tah hutawng poen de tahe ah tattloella a awmna thla ruk awm poen.
Metihtiah Pathen lawng a sai thai nawh khat khaw awm nawh.
Meri lawngah, “Kai he Bawipa kah salnu ni; na thui angla ka sawah awm seh.” a tina. Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng Meri te a ceh taak.
Tecoeng adiw thlan ah Meri tah kamthlah tih Judia ram tlaang ah aka awm khawpui pakhat la te cet.
Meri lawng Zekhariah im la cet tih Elizabet te a toei.
Elizabet lawng Meri kah toeina awl te a yaak vengah a bung khuikah camoe te tat. Elizabet tah Ciim Muithla oen be tih,
Ahih lawng angaihhlangla, “Nang tah hutaa boeih lak ah yo aka theen koek hutaa ni, na cuun ham koei na ca te khaw a yo theen phoeih!
He ang aka lentloe thaihu he n'tu kawngah ka teng avan pha tih ka Bawipa kah a manu he ka tengla a yingyawi kai?
Metihtiah nan toeina awl ka yaak pahoei oen ah ka bung khuikah camoe yawngdiik he awmngaihna oen tat.
Bawipa kah awlthang te na tengah ataktangla thoeng ai tila na tangna dawngah na yo theen phoeih,” tila a thui.
Meri lawngah, “Ka lungbui lawng Bawipa a koeh;
ka hingna khaw thlawnkung Pathen tengah awmngaih,
Metihtiah huhsit koek kai a salnu he amah lawng n'hilh nawh! Tahe kalawng tah cadil nauha thlaang boeih lawng yotheen aka dawng hutaa ni ti u poen ai,
metihtiah Thara koek Pathen lawng kai hamla alentloe thaihu avan sai poen. Ahih kah miing tah ciim;
Amah te aka hinyah thlaang boeih tengah cadil nauha khat coeng khat toe reenna te a tueng sak.
Ahih lawngah a thara baan te a thueng a thleng tih amami kah ahuep khawkhanna oen aka oekk u thlaang boeih te a thek a yak boeih.
Ahih lawngtah thara sengpahrang thli te amami kah ngawlhcoen dawng kalawng adangla a thlaak boeih tih thlaang la a toeh u nawh thli te a pawmsang.
Buh mueh buhpawng thli te caak awkk atuui tuui oen bung a hah sak tih kuirang thlaanglen thli te kut pingpuei oen atliingla a meel sak.
Ahih lawngtah mami kah patuer thli tengah awlkamna a sai te thlauh nawh tih amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang Israel thlaangphun te bawmcem hamla law poen.
Ahih lawngah Abraham oen a cadil nauha boeih tengah dungyan toela reenna tueng sak ham te hilh nawh!” tila a thui.
Meri tah Elizabet tengah thla thum yunyan awm tih tecoengah amah im la koep meel.
Elizabet tah camoe awm ham atue atang khoek tih capa pakhat a cuun.
Bawipa lawng ahih sawah kawpoek raina atheen tangkiik a sai te a imbe lovaai oen a cakaw thli lawng a yaak vengah boeih a awmngaih puei u.
Camawca te hinreet a cuung atah yahhuivuen rett pe ham law u tih ana pa miing Zekhariah miingna seh ti u.
Tede a manu lawngah, “Nawh ni! Johan miingna seh” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah Elizabet nala, “Tetih atah na cakaw khuiah he ang miing he a awm moenih ta! a tina u.
Tecoengah ahimi lawng, camoe he ana pa lawng a-u miingna seh a ti kai ti u tih kut oen miknoekna a sai pe u tih a doet u.
Zekhariah lawng cathutna lungpeel a bih tih, “A miing tah Johan ni,” tila a thut. Ahimi boeih tah a kawpoek rai u.
Teveng ruetca maiah Zekhariah tah cal thai koep tih Pathen te a thangpawm pahoei poen.
Imbe lovaai boeih lawngtah lakueng u, he thaihu kawng awlthang he Judia ram tlaang ah aka awm, khaaw boeih ah te thaang khok.
He kawng he aka ya tih aka poek thlaang boeih lawng doet u the tih, “He camaw he metila nuem a awm lah ve!” ti u. Metihtiah Bawipa kah huham tharana tah a sawah awm tite atheenla tueng.
Johan kah ana pa Zekhariah tah Ciim Muithla oen be tih Pathen awl te a thui:
“Israel Pathen Bawipa te koeh u lah sih! Ahih tah a thlaang thli te bawmcem ham oen ah loeih sak hamla law poen.
Ahih lawngah amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang Devid cadil tha aka ra Thlawnkung avan tuih poen.
Ahih lawng suenyan veng kalawng amah kah aciim tawngha thli oen awl a kam poen,
ahih lawngtah mami he raal kut khui kalawng ah, mami aka thina thlaang boeih kah tharana huham dawng kalawng n'thlawn ai.
Ahih lawng mami kah patuer thli tengah reenna ka tueng sak vetih amah kah aciim awlkam te ka hilh manawh” ti.
te tah mami lawng hing khuiah amah haiah ciim acaih tih adoengla awmna ham ni.
Ka ca, nang tah a Tloeng Khoelh Pathen kah tawngha ni ti u ai. Nang tah ahih ham amah kah lawngpui te roekbah hamla Bawipa haiah na cet oepsoeh ai.
A thlaang thli nala te nangmi kah thawlhna te khawdawp avan ngai vetih thlawnna na dang u ai tila na thui pe ai.
Mami kah Pathen tah thlaang reenkung oen thintlawhnakung la awm. Ahih lawngah thlawnna khawse theen te mami sawah avan aang sak vetih,
duekna thlip yiinna khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih te vaan kalawng avan thue ai, ngaimawngna lawngpui ah mami he m'mawt ai” tila a thui.
Camaw te pumtaksa oen muithla ben ah puer tih roeng hang. Israel thlaang thli tengah langyala a pho thlan vengah ramhum huhang ah te awm.
Tevengah te Sengpahrang sangluel Awkastas lawng Rom ram pum ah thlaangmi soep hamla awl a peek.
He kah lamhacuek thlaangmi soepna a sai vengah Kuirinias tah Siria ram ukkung bawi la awm.
Tedawngah thlaang boeih lawng thlaangmi soepna ah miing peek hamla amami awmna khawpui la te rip cet u.
Josep tah Galili ram Nazaret khawpui kalawng ah Devid sengpahrang a cuunna huen Judia ram Bethlehem khawpui la te cet. Josep tah Devid cadil la a awm dawngah tela te cet.
Josep lawng yuna ham amah thlaang kang Meri oen te cet hih. Meri tah tattloel la awm tih,
Bethlehem ah a awm hih vengah te camoe awm ham atue te a pha.
Meri lawng a capa camiing awmthang te a cuun, ahih te poehlaa oen a yaawl tih awkkhawng dawngah te a helh, ahih rawi pahna ham kamyin pahna-im ah ahuen awm nawh.
Te ram khui pengpang yun kah tuudoen khatsut tah ramhum ah reh u tih amami kah tuu thli te a doen u.
Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat te ahimi tengah tueng tih Bawipa kah ruep-awmna lawng ahimi te a thue. Ahimi lawng caalla a rih u;
tede vanthlaang lawngah ahimi nala te, “Rih u boel! Nangmi ham awlthang theen kavan khuen, te awlthang theen lawngah thlaang boeih tengah awmngaihna abo hlang avan khuen ai.
Tihin ah Devid khawpui khuiah nangmi kah thlawnkung Khrih Bawipa tah thang poen!
Nangmi lawng na noekna ham tah he tila awm ai: camaw te poehlaa oen a yaawl vetih vaitaw buh beel awkkhawng dawngah a helh te na huh ai,” a tina.
Kawlkalhca maiah vaan kah vanthlaang raalkap bu tah vanthlaang thli oen va pho u tih Pathen te laa sak oen a thangpawm u:
“Vaan asang koek ah Pathen thangpawm u hawn seh, a lungna thlaang thli a awmna dilai dawngah roepna awm hawn seh,” tila a thui u.

Vanthlaang thli ahimi teng kalawng vaan la a mel koep u veng atah tuudoen hue lawng amami pakhat oen khat te “Bethlehem la cet u silang tah Bawipa lawng mami tengah avan thui thaihu aka thoeng te bueh u sih.” ti u.
Tedawngah aloela cet u tih vaitaw awkkhawng dawngah a helh camawca oen ah Meri oen Josep te a huh u.
Tuudoen thli lawng camaw te a huh u coeng atah vanthlaang thli lawng camaw kawng a thui pe te thlaang thli tengah a thui patoeng u.
Tuudoen thli lawng a thui te aka ya boeih tah a kawpoek rai u.
Meri lawng he thaihu boeih he hilh nawh tih te kawng te adung hlangla a poek.
Tuudoen thli lawng meel koep u tih a yaak boeih oen a huhna boeih dawngah te Pathen thangpawmna laa a sak u; ahimi tengah vanthlaang lawng a thui pe angla te thoeng tak tak.
Hinreet cuung tih camaw te yahhuivuen reet ham atue apha veng atah, Jesuh tila miing a sak u. Te tah a manu bung khuiah a suen thlan vengah vanthlaang lawng a sak sut poen ni.
Mosi kah awlpeek Phungawl angla Josep oen Meri lawng Ciim-acaihna te sai hamla atue te a pha. Tedawngah ahih rawi lawng camaw te Bawipa tengah nawn ham Jerusalem la te a ceh puei.
Bawipa kah phungawl dawng: “Camiing tawngpaca boeih tah Bawipa tengah na nawn ai,” tila a thut.
Bawipa kah phung awl lawng a kuek angla akhuu bawh at tinawh tah imvuelh akhuu puer pek pheek hih te luciik la thawthueng ham ahih rawi tah cet hih.

Tevengah te Simeon aka miingna thlaang pakhat te Jerusalem ah awm. Ahih tah thlaangdoeng, Pathen aka rih thlaang la awm tih Israel thlaangphun thlawn la a awmna tue te a ring khuep. Ahih te ciim muithla lawng a awm puei tih,
Bawipa kah awlkam Messiah te na huh thlan atah na duek manawh tila Ciim Muithla lawng a thui pe rapcaat.
Ciim Muithla kah mawtna rang oen Simeon tah Tempal bok-im la cet. Phungawl lawng a kuek te sai hamla a manu oen ana pa lawng camaw Jesuh te Tempal bok-im la avan khuen vengah,
Simeon lawng camaw te a kut oen a pawm tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui:
“Bawipa, tahe ah na awlkam te na soep sak poen tih na salpa he ngaimawng ngaitoe la nan ceh sak poen ai.
Nang kah thlawnna te ka mik oen ka huh poen,
te tah thlaang boeih haiah namah kah roekbah te ni:
Gental thlaangphun tengah na kawngaihna aka tueng sak aangna la awm tih na thlaangphun Israel thlaang thli tengah ruep-awmna avan khuenkung la awm.” tila a thui.
Simeon lawng ahih kawng te tila a thui dawngah te a manu oen ana pa tah a kawpoek rai hih.

Simeon lawng ahimi te a phueh asawm tih a manu Meri nala te, “He camaw tah Israel thlaangphun khuiah thlaang yahawh lawng a rawkna ham oen thlawnna hamla Pathen lawng a tuek poen ni. Ahih tah Pathen kah miknoek la awm tih thlaang lawngah athela a thui u ai,
te tila a thui u dawngah amami kah ahuepla poekna boeih te tueng ai. Tecoengah samsen aka hatt angla na kawthena lawng na lungbui te avan thun ai.” a tina.
Ahih khaw tevengah te avan pha van tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui, Pathen lawng Jerusalem a loeih sak ai tila aka lamtoen thlaang boeih tengah camawca kawng te a thui pe.
Josep oen Meri lawng, Bawipa kah phungawl lawng akuek boeih a sai coeng atah a awmna Galili ram Nazaret khawpui la te meel koep hih.
Camaw te roeng hang tih a tha awm hang; cuihna oen be tih Pathen yotheenna te a sawah awm.
Kaantaak Poei bur hamla Jesuh a manu oen ana pa he kum roekk ah Jerusalem la cet hih.
Jesuh he a kum kumha thlaihih vengah a ceh nooek u angla Poei bur ham cet u.
Poei a boeih coeng atah amah khaw la voei u, tede camaw Jesuh tah Jerusalem ah te awm. Te tila a awm te a manu oen ana pa lawng ming hih nawh;
ahih rawi lawngtah aka voei haih thlaang thli oen cet haih cawini tila a poek, tedawngah hin at puet lawngpueng cet u, tecoeng atah a cakaw thli oen a paya thli tim ah te a tlap hih.
Ahih rawi lawng a huh nawh dawngah Jerusalem la meel koep hih tih a tlap hih.
Athum hin atah ahih te Tempal bok-im khuiah a huh hih. Ahih tah Judah thlaang thli cangpueikung thli oen ngawl haih u, ahih kah awlthui te a hutung u tih awl a doet u.
Ahih lawng cuihna oen awl a thung pe te aka ya thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u.

A manu oen ana pa lawngkhaw a huh hih vengah a kawpoek rai hih van tih a manu lawngah, “Ka ca, n'tu ah kai hih he tila nan sai? Na pa oen kai lawngtah lakueng lalapla nang he kan tlap hih ta.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ana pa yuvaa te, “N'tu ham kai he nan tlap hih! Kai he a Pa im ah ka awm ti he na ming hih nawh aw?” a tina.
Tede ahih kah awlthungna te ahimi lawng yaakming u nawh.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah ana pa yuvaa oen haih Nazaret la te meel koep u, te ah te poe awm tih a manu oen ana pa awl te a ngaai pe. A manu lawngah he thaihu boeih he a kaw khuiah a khueh.
Jesuh tah pumtaksa oen cuihna ben ah roeng hang tih Pathen oen thlaanghing haiah mik-hai theen a dang.

Sengpahrang sangluel Teberias lawng a ram a ukna kum thlaingaa a law vengah te Pontias Pilat tah Judia ram ukkung la awm, Herod tah Galili ram ukkung la awm tih a manau Filip tah Ituria oen Trakhonitis ram ukkung la awm; Lisanias tah Abilen ram ukkung la awm tih,
Annas oen Kaiafas tah khawsoeih bawi la awm hih. Tevengah ramhum huhang ah aka awm Zekhariah capa Johan tengah Pathen awl te a pha.
Tedawngah Johan tah Jordan tuiva tengvaai kah ram tawm boeih ah cet tih, “Na thawlhna yut u langtah baptisma dang u lah, te ah ni na thawlhna te Pathen lawng khawdawp avan ngaai ai,” tila a thui.
Tawngha Isaiah kah cabu dawngah a thut angla, “Thlaang pakhat ramhum huhang ah paang tih: ‘Bawipa ham lawngpui te oepsoeh la roekbah u lah; a cehna lawngpui te adoengla sai uh!
Longhoi boeih te et uh, khawcung rammawl boeih te avan at la sai uh, cehkel lawngken te adoengla sai u lang lawngthe lawnghu te hal thlaula sai uh:
Thlaangphun boeih lawng Pathen kah thlawnna te a huh ai! tila a thui.” a tina te soep.
Thlaangping lawngah baptisma dang ham Johan tengla te law u. Johan lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi ruul hue, aka law ham koei Pathen kah dantatna kalawng na loeih u thai ai tila a-u lawng avan thui u?

Na thawlhna na yut u te thaihu theen saina oen tueng sak uh. Abraham tah mami cuunkung patuer ni tila nangmi lawng thui u mailai tlaih boel. Pathen lawngah he lungto he a lawh vetih Abraham kah cadil la a sai thai ti he kavan thui u!
Thingkung boeih te ayung ah vung hamla haica te a toen oepsoeh poen; Athaih theen aka thaih nawh thingkung boeih te a vung vetih hai dawngah a phuum ai.” a tina.
Thlaangping lawngah, “Te tih atah kaimi lawng n'tu ka sai ai?” tila a doet u.
Ahih lawngah, “Angki yung hih aka khueh lawngah aka khueh nawh thlaang te yung at ah pe seh, caak awkk aka khueh lawngah aka khueh nawh thlaang thli te pe thoem seh.” a tina.
Mangmu cawikung thli khatsut tah baptisma dang ham law u tih, “Saya, kaimi ta n'tu ka sai u ai?” a tina u.
Ahimi nala te, “Mangmu te cawi ham tuueng lak ah apuehla cawi boel,” a tina.

Raalkap khatsut lawngah khaw, “Kaimi ta, n'tu ka sai u ai?” tila ahih te a doet u. Ahih lawngah, “A-u tengkah khaw tangka te rot boel, a-u khaw asoeng nawh la ngah ngah thawlh peel boel. Namami kah thapang oen na ngaai tluep sak uh.” a tina.
Thlaang yahawh lawng Messiah a ngaiuepna te pho koep tih Johan amah he Messiah poen kai aw ti u tih a kawpoek rai u.

Tedawngah Johan lawng ahimi nala te, “Kai lawngtah tui oen ah baptisma kan peek u, tede thlaang pakhat kai lak ah aka lenduet te law ai. Kai tah ahih kah khawmuek rui Pateng thlam pe hamla ka mueinai nawh. Ahih lawngtah nangmi te Ciim Muithla oen hai oen ah baptisma m'peek ai.
Ahih lawngah caang yahna raa te a pawm, Caangthaih boeih te a yah vetih caangtak te thaidi khuiah a khueh ai; tede caanghii te tah aka duek tlaih nawh hai dawngah a phuum ai.” a tina.
Johan lawng aphunphun la Awlthang Theen te thlaangping tengah a phawng tih a thawlhna te yut u hamla a thuituen.
Tede ukkung bawi Herod lawngah a manau yu Herodias te a rot tih a yuna dawngah khawseh, atloe athe thaihu broela a sai dawngah Johan lawng ahih te a siim.
Tecoengah Herod lawng athe-eep ngaai thaihu te a sai. Johan te thong ah a thlaak.
Thlaangping lawng baptisma a dang u coeng atah, Jesuh khaw baptisma a dang van. A thangthui vengah te ahih ham vaan te awng u tih,
Ciim Muithla tah pumtaksa la akhuu angla te ahih sawah va law thuk. Tecoengah vaan kah awl lawng, “Nang tah kan lungna ka Capa ni. Na sawah ka ngaai tluep ti.” tila a thui.
Jesuh lawng amah kah bii a tong vengah te a kum sawm thum yunyan law poen. thlaang thli lawngtah ahih he Josep capa tila a poek u. Josep tah Heli capa la awm.
Heli tah Matthat capa, Matthat tah Levi capa, Levi tah Melkhi capa, Melkhi tah Jannai capa, Jannai tah Josep capa,
Josep tah Mattathias capa, Mattathias tah Amos capa, Amos tah Nahum Capa, Nahum tah Esli capa, Esli tah Nakkai capa,
Nakkai tah Maath capa, Maath tah Mattathias capa, Mattathias tah Semin capa, Semin tah Josek capa, Josek tah Joda capa,
Joda tah Joanan capa; Joanan tah Resa capa; Resa tah Jerubbabel capa; Jerubbabel tah Shealtiel capa; Shealtiel tah Neri capa;
Neri tah Melkhi capa; Melkhi tah Addi capa, Addi tah Kosam capa, Kosam tah Elmadam capa, Elmadam tah Er capa,
Er tah Joshua capa, Joshua tah Elizer capa, Elizer tah Jorim capa, Jorim tah Matthat capa, Matthat tah Levi capa;
Levi tah Simeon capa, Simeon tah Judah capa, Judah tah Josep capa, Josep tah Jonam capa, Jonam tah Eliakim capa,
Eliakim tah Melia capa, Melia tah Menna capa, Menna tah Mattatha capa, Mattatha tah Nathan capa, Nathan tah Devid capa,
Devid tah Jesi capa, Jesi tah Obed capa, Obed tah Boaz capa, Boaz tah Salmon capa, Salmon tah Nashon capa,
Nashon tah Amminadab capa, Amminadab tah Admin capa, Admin tah Arni capa, Arni tah Hezron capa, Hezron tah Perez capa, Perez tah Judah capa,
Judah tah Jakob capa, Jakob tah Isak capa, Isak tah Abraham capa, Abraham tah Terah capa, Terah tah Nahor capa,
Nahor tah Seruk capa, Seruk tah Riu capa, Riu tah Pelek capa, Pelek tah Eba capa, Eba tah Shelah capa,
Shelah tah Kainan capa, Kainan tah Arpaksad capa, Arpaksad tah Shem capa, Shem tah Noah capa, Noah tah Lamek capa,
Lamek tah Metuselah capa, Metuselah tah Enok capa, Enok tah Jared capa, Jared tah Mahalaleel capa, Mahalaleel tah Kenan capa,
Kenan tah Enos capa, Enos tah Seth capa, Seth tah Adam capa, Adam tah Pathen Capa ni.
Jesuh tah Ciim Muithla oen ah betoetla Jordan tuiva kalawng va meel, tecoengah Muithla lawng ramhum huhang la te a ceh puei,
te ah te Raaibawi lawng khawhin sawmlii khui puet ah ahih te a suek ahalh. Teveng khui puet ah n'tu khaw ca nawh, tedawngah atloeih lam atah a bung pawng.
Raaibawi lawng ahih nala te, “Nang he Pathen Capa tangtang atah he lungto he takawi la a coenggna ham awl thlaw lah.” a tina.
Tede Jesuh lawngah, “Caciim lawngah, ‘Thlaanghing he buh bueng oen ah hing thai nawh?’ tila a thui” a tina.
Tecoengah Raaibawi lawng a ceh puei tih apabe atah dilai dawngkah ram boeih te a huh sak.
Raaibawi lawng, “Huham tharana boeih oen he kah bawi areng kuirangna boeih he nang kan pe ai, he ang thli boeih he ka kut dawngah peek la awm poen tih kai lawng ka tuek thlaang te ka peek thai.
Tedawngah nang lawng kai he nan bok atah he ang thli boeih he nang ham poen ni,” a tina.
Jesuh awng, “Caciim lawngah, “Bawipa na Pathen bueng te ni na bok vetih ahih bueng kah bii te ni na bi ai,’ tila a thui,” a tina.
Tecoengah Raaibawi lawng Jerusalem la te a ceh puei, Tempal bok-im kah imphu ah te a khueh tih, “Nang he Pathen Capa tang atah he kalawng ah sungpung thuk lah.
Metihtiah Caciim lawng, ‘Nang te khoemdoen hamla Pathen lawng amah kah vanthlaang thli te avan tuih ai,’ ti.
‘Na khow Pateng khaw lungto dawng na khuek nawh ham ahimi lawng a kut oen te m'pawm ai,’ tila a thui.” a tina.
Tede Jesuh lawng, “Caciim lawngah, ‘Bawipa na Pathen te noekdak boel’ tila a thui,” a tina.
Jesuh te Raaibawi lawng soeprepla a suek a halh coeng atah kawlkalh tah a nawng taak.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah Galili la meel tih Ciim Muithla kah huham tharana tah ahih sawah awm. Ahih kawng awlthang te te kah pengpang boeih ah thaang khonghak.
Ahih lawng sinakok ah a cang puei tih thlaang boeih lawng a koeh u.
Tecoengah Jesuh te amah apuer ayawngna Nazaret khawpui la cet tih Sabbath hin atah a ceh nooek angla Sinakok la te cet. Caciim te tae hamla ahih te pai hang,
tawngha Isaiah kah cayaawl te a peek u, ahih lawng cayaawl te a thlam tih he tila a thutna hue te a huh,

“Bawipa kah Muithla tah ka sawah awm, metihtiah khawdeng lungma thli tengah awlthang theen thui hamla ahih lawng kai he n'tuek poen. Sal la a khawh khaklal thlaang thli tengah loeihna te thui hamla, mikpum haiying thli a mik a tueng koepna ham; Heemtekna patang khang thlaang thli a loeihna ham,
Bawipa lawng a thlaang thli a thlawnna tue tah avan pha poen, tila phawng hamla kai he n'tuek poen,” tila a thut te a tae.
Jesuh lawng cayaawl te a yaawl tih aka khoemkung kut ah te a peek koep tih ngawl. Sinakok khuikah thlaang boeih lawng mikkhah ohla ahih te ringg a bueh u,
ahimi nala te, “Caciim dawngkah ka tae awl te tihin ah soep poen.” a tina.
Ahih kah awl thui lawng ahimi boeih kah thinkaw khuek adeng tih ahih lawng awl theen kaa theen a thui te a kawpoek la rai u tangkiik. Ahimi lawngah, “Ahih he Josep capa nawh aw?” ti u.

Ahimi nala te, “Tatuk awl dawngah, ‘Siibawipa, namah oen namah te tuui-ahaai u lah,” tila a thui awl te kamah he nan tina u lettat ai tite ka ming. Kapernaum khaaw ah na sai tila ka yak u thaihu te ang van te kamah khaaw ah he sai van lah,’ tila nan tina u ai.
He he kavan thui u, “Tawngha he amah a awmna khaaw ah do u nooek nawh.
Ka thui he hutung u lah; Elijah dung vengah kum thum coengah kum vangg ah khaw kaang tih ram pum ah khawthe khawkha vengah te Israel ram khuiah huhai tumtee broela awm tang tang.
Elijah he Israel ram kah a-u huhai khat tengah khaw tuih nawh, tede Sidon ram kah Zarefat khaaw ah aka awm huhai teng bueng ah ni a tuih.
Tawngha Elisha dung vengah te Israel ram kah thlaang yahawh tah lungkiit haibe natna a khueh u; ahimi timkah a-u khat khaw hoeih nawh de Siria ram kah Naaman pakhat bueng tah hoeih.” a tina.
Sinakok ah aka awm thlaang thli lawng a yaak vengah a thin toek u.
Ahimi lawngah tho u tih Jesuh te khawpui khui kalawng adaubenla a mawt u tih pu-ngaw pathleng ah tulh voek ham khawpui a phuengna tlaangpoer la te a khuen u,
tede ahih tah thlaangping tim ah te yingyelh tih cet vik.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah Galili ram, Kapernaum la te cet, te ah te Sabbath hin ah thlaangping te a cang puei.
Ahih lawng saithaina aana oen a thui dawngah ahih kah cangpueina te ahimi boeih a kawpoek la rai u.
Sinakok khuiah te raaithe lawng a kuun thil thlaang pakhat awm; ahih lawng angaihhlangla paang tih,
“Aah! Nazaret Jesuh, kaimi he metila kan tina ai na ti? Kaimi he phe ham aw na law? Nang he a-u tite kan ming: nang tah Pathen kah aciim laipai ni!” a tina.

Jesuh lawng raaithe nala te, “Awl muehla te kah thlaang kaw khui kalawng cet loeih!” tila awl a peek. Raaithe lawngah te kah thlaang te ahimi haiah te a tlim sak tih nganbawh peek muehla ahih kah a kaw khui kalawng cet.
Thlaang boeih te a kawpoek la rai tih pakhat oen pakhat, “He awl he me ang awl kai? He thlaang lawngah ahu-aham oen raaithe thli awl a peek tih ahimi tah cet khonghak u mai!” ti u.
Tecoeng atah te kah pengpang ram pum ah Jesuh kawng te thaang khonghak poen.
Jesuh tah sinakok kalawng suntla tih Simon im la te cet. Simon kah a mase hutaa te tlo malcal tih ahih kawng te Jesuh tengah a thui pe u.
Jesuh lawng cet tih ahih tengah te pai tih tlawh anatna kalawng hoeih loeih a tina. Tevengah a sanat te hoeih, tho pahoei tih ahimi te a do adan.
Khaw a tlaak thuk coeng atah tlawh natna soeprep oen aka tlo thli te a paya thli lawngah Jesuh tengla avan law puei u; ahimi pakhat rip sawah te a kut a tloeng pe tih ahimi boeih te a hoeih sak.

Raaithe thli lawngkhaw thlaang yahawh hlang kah a kaw khui kalawng co u tih, “Nang tah Pathen Capa ni,” tila paang u. Raaithe thli lawng ahih te Messiah ni tila a ming u dawngah ahimi te awl cal nawh ham Jesuh lawng awl a peek.
Khaw athaih khoeng atah ading apuekna huen benla te khawpui khui kalawng ah cet. Thlaangping lawng ahih te a tlap u tih a huh u veng atah ahimi te ceh taak nawh hamla a thlawh u.
Tede ahimi nala te, “Pathen kah Ram kawng Awlthang Theen he atloe khawpui ah khaw ka phawng ham awm, te tila aka thui ham ni Pathen lawng Kai he n'tuih.” a tina.
Tedawngah ram pum kah sinakok bok-im ah te phung a thui.
Hin at ah Jesuh tah Kenisaret Tuilii-keeng ah a pai vengah te thlaangping lawng Pathen awl hutung hamla ahih tengah te toklekla la law u.
Tevengah tuikeeng ah lowng pahih a kiing u te a huh; tuihawi thli lawng lowng te a ceh taak u tih amami kah lok thli te a suk u.
Jesuh lawng Simon kah lowng khuiah te kuun tih tuikeeng kalawng tuilii benla lowng te a thoeih sak. Jesuh te lowng khuiah ngawl tih thlaangping te a cang puei.
Ahih lawng awl a thui coeng atah Simon nala te, “Tuilii dung benla lowng te tulh langtah na paya thli oen lok te voei u lah.” a tina.
Simon lawng, “Bawipa, khawyiin puet ah lok ka heeng khiing u poen de nga khat khaw ka tu u nawh. Tede nang awl ah ka heeng u de lah ai,” a tina.
Lok te a heeng u atah nga yahawh khuengdeng te a tuuk u tih lok te thok pawn tawm.

Tedawngah atloe lowng dawngah aka awm a paya thli te a kut oen a yavaih u tih law u lang m'bawm uh a tina. Ahimi te law u tih lowng pahih dawngah nga te abetoet la a sang u tih tui dawngah lowng te buekk dalh.
Simon Piter lawng tete a huh vengah Jesuh haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih, “Bawipa, Kai he thlaangthawlh ni, n'ceh taak mai hawn!” a tina.
Nga te yahawh khuengdeng a tuuk u dawngah Piter amah oen aka awm haih thli tah a kaw poek rai u.
Simon oen nga aka tu haih Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen Johan a puei rawi te khaw a kawpoek rai hih van. Jesuh lawng, “Rih boel; tahe kalawng tah thlaang tukung la na awm ai.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah lowng te tuikeeng la a doek u coeng atah soeprep boeih te a ceh tak u tih Jesuh hu ah bang u.

Vaikhat ah Jesuh tah haibe natna lawng a caak kawlsawp thlaang pakhat a awmna khaw ah te awm. Ahih lawng Jesuh te a huh vengah dilai dawngah buekuep tih reenna a bih, “Bawipa na kawngaih atah haibe natna he navan ciing sak thai!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a kut a thueng tih ahih te a tek, “Ka ngaih ta, hoeih hawn loeih.” a tina. Kawlkalh ah te thlaang te haibe natna hoeih pahoei.

Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “A-u tengah khaw thui boel, tede khawsoeih tengla cet phaat langtah ahih lawng nang he n'yutt n'yam seh; tecoengah na hoeih poen tite thlaang boeih lawng a mingna ham Mosi kah awlpeek angla luciik thawthuengna te sai.” a tina.
Tede Jesuh kawng te tah thaang tare tih rangpui thlaangping lawng ahih kah awl thui te yaak hamla law u tih ahimi kah tlawhnatna te a hoeih pe sak.
Tede ahih tah ading asuekna huen la te cet tih te ah te thangthui.

Hin at ah Jesuh lawng a cang puei u lii vengah te Galili oen Judah ram kah khawpui boeih oen Jerusalem kalawng aka law Farasi thlaang khatsut oen phungawl cangpueikung thli te ngawl u. Thlaangtlo hoeih sakna hamla Bawipa kah huham tharana tah Jesuh tengah awm.
Thlaang khatsut lawngah aka khawn thlaang pakhat te a himbai phaih dawngah avan kawh u, ahih te Jesuh haiah khueh pe ham im khuila khuen hamla te a yawm u.

Thlaang ayahawh aih dawngah im khuila khuen u thai nawh. Tedawngah ahih te imphu la a khuen u tih imphu te a bauh u, tecoengah thlaangping lakli Jesuh haiah thlaangtlo te himbai phaih dawngah a thlaak thuk u.
He tih aih la ahimi lawng oengna a khueh u te Jesuh lawng a huh vengah aka khawn thlaang nala te, “Ka puei, na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaai la awm poen.” a tina.

Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang thli lawng, “Pathen thekhana awl aka thui he kah thlaang he a-u? Pathen pakhat bueng lawng ni thawlhna khawdawp a ngaai thai ta!” tila ahimi lawng a poek u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi kah poekna te thiim a ming tih ahimi nala te, “N'tu ah te ang thaihu te na poek u?
‘Na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaai la awm poen,’ tihnawhtah, ‘Tho lang cet loeih’ tila thui he aw aka yoei bet kai?

Tedawngah Thlaanghing Capa lawng dilai dawng thawlh khawdawp ngaai thaina aana a khueh tite nangmi kan ming sak u ai.” a tina. Tedawngah aka khawn thlaang te, “Tho loeih, namah kah himbaiphaih he lo langtah namah im la cet loeih, kan tina he!” a tina.
Te thlaang lawngah ahimi boeih haiah pai pahoei, a ralhna himbai phaih te a lawh koeloe, Pathen te a tih koeh im la te cet.
Ahimi boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik! Ahimi lawng rih oen thuen ruila Pathen te a thangpawm u, “Tihin atah kawpoek rai tangkiik thaihu te mami lawng n'huh u poen,” tila a thui u.
He coengah te cet tih mangmu cawikung Levi aka miingna amah kah yung im ah aka ngawl te a huh. Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Ka hu ah baang lah” a tina.
Levi lawng tho tih soeprep boeih te a ceh taak tih a hu ah koe a vai.
Tecoengah Levi lawng amah im ah buh veelna poei Jesuh ham a sai pe tih kamyin kamlai tim ah mangmu cawikung thli oen atloe thlaang thli te awm u.

Farasi thlaang khatsut oen amami bu khuiah aka thuum van Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut lawng Jesuh kah hubang thli tengah te caitoek u tih, “N'tu ah nangmi lawng mangmu cawikung hue oen thlaangthawlh thli oen ah buh te na caak na awkk haih u?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Sading thlaang lawngah siibawi ngoe nawh, tede thlaangtlo bueng lawng ni angoe a tina.
Kai tah thlaangdoeng thli te khue ham oen ah thawlh yut sak ham ka law nawh tih thlaangthawlh thli te khue ham oen ah thawlh yut sak ham ni ka law.” a tina.

Thlaang khatsut lawng Jesuh nala, “Johan kah hubang thli lawngtah buh a yeh u poepa tih thangthui u, tecoengah Farasi hue kah hubang thli lawngkhaw te tila te a sai u van; tede nang kah hubang thli lawngtah a caak a awkk u mai nawh pai he.” a tina u.
Jesuh lawngah, “Yuluipoei ah poei aka bur thlaang thli te yulokung oen a awm haih khuiah ahimi te buh a yeh sak ai tila na poek u aw? Buh yeh sak manawh!
Tede yulokung te ahimi teng kalawng athlala a khuenna khawhin te a pha ai, tevengah ahimi lawng buh a yeh u badai” a tina.

Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah he kah thuidoetna he khaw a thui pe: “A-u lawngkhaw angki aruem te hisa athai oen ah baw nawh, angki aruem te hisa athaai oen a baw atah hisa athaai te angki aruem oen ah roepcap manawh.

A-u lawngkhaw misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap aruem dawngah thloen nooek nawh, metihtiah misurtui athaai lawngah saphaw yuukhap te a pawkk sak vetih misurtui khaw ceu thloep ai, saphaw te khaw pawn ai.
Te lak atah misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap athaai thik dawngah thloen ham awm!
A-u lawngkhaw misurtui aruem te a awkk coeng atah misurtui athaai te ngaih tlaih nawh. Misurtui aruem te tah tuui ngaai.” tila a thui pe.
Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng loha lakli kalawng ah te cet. A hubang hue lawngah caangvui te a yuun u, a kut oen a nawi u tih a caak u.
Farasi thlaang khatsut lawngah, “Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath khawhin ah sai nawh hamla a thui te n'tu ah nangmi lawng na sai u?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Devid oen a thlaang thli lawng a bung a pawng u vengah n'tu a sai tite ca na tae nooek u nawh aw?

Ahih lawng Pathen im khuila cet tih, Pathen tengah a nawn u takawi te a lawh tih a caak, tecoengah amah kah thlaang thli te khaw a peek. Khawsoeih hue bueng lawng a caak thai takawi, ahimi lawng a caak te mami kah Phungawl oen kalh u teta!” a tina.
Tecoengah awlcuina ah Jesuh lawng, “Thlanghing capa tah Sabbath Bawi ni” a tina.
Atloe Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh tah Sinakok bok-im la te cet tih a cang puei. Te ah te a bantang kut aka kheem thlaang pakhat awm.

Khatsut Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang vaang hue lawngah Jesuh kah a sai he soeng nawh tila thawlh peel ham a ngaih u, tedawngah Sabbath khawhin ah kut kheem te a hoeih sak lah ai nuem tite huh hamla rep a doen u.
Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi kah poekna te a ming tih kut kheem thlaang nala te, “Pai langtah hai benla he law lah,” a tina. Te thlaang lawng tho hang tih pai.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Awl kan doet u lah ai: Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath khawhin ah mami he n'tu sai sak ham a ngaih? Thlaang bawm ham aw, tihnawhtah nganbawh peek ham aw? Thlaang kah hingna thlawn ham aw, tihnawhtah phe ham aw?” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a teng-avai ah te mang tih a dan; tecoengah te thlaang nala te, “Na kut te thueng lah” a tina. A hih lawng a thui angla a sai tih a kut te koep theen.
Ahimi te a thin sa soeh u tih Jesuh he metila n'sai lah ai tite a thui u.
Tecoengah Jesuh te thangthui hamla tlaang la cet tih te ah te yiin at puet Pathen tengah thangthui.
Khaw athaih atah a hubang thli te a tengla a khue tih ahimi timkah paha thlaihih te a tuek, te thli te Celtuih tila miing a sak:
Ahimi hue kah a miing tah, Simon (Piter tila khaw a thui u) oen a manau Andru; Jeem oen Johan, Filip oen Bartalomiu;
Matthai oen Tawmas, Alfias capa Jeem oen Simon (Phunkuup a ti u te),
Jeem capa Judas oen paipi thleepkung Judas Iskariot, he hue he ni.

Jesuh tah celtuih thli oen tlaang kalawng rum thuk u tih dilai avan at na ah a hubang thlaang broe oen ah te pai u. Te kah thlaangping yahawh hlang te tah Judia peng pum oen Jerusalem kalawng ah, tuivakeeng kah khawpui Taiar oen Sidon kah aka law thlaang thli ni;
ahimi lawngah a awl thui te yaak ham oen ah a tlawhna te hoeih sak ham a ngaih u dawngah law u. Raaithe lawng khawdeng a peek thlaang thli khaw law u tih hoeih u.
Ahih kah huham tharana te a pum dawng kalawng pooeng tih ahimi te a hoeih sak dawngah thlaang boeih lawng ahih te tek ham a yawm u.
Jesuh lawng a hubang thli te a bueh tih, “Nangmi khawdeng thlaang thli tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u; Pathen Ram tah nangmi ham ni!

“Tahe ah buh mueh buhpawng la aka awm thli tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u; Nangmi tah na bung hah ai! Tahe ah aka ruungrap nangmi hue tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u; nangmi nuihcalna te awm badai!
Thlaanghing Capa kawngah nangmi te thlaang lawngah n'thina u tih n'hoett sut u, n'sal aphaam tih athela n'thui u atah nangmi tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u!

“Te tila n'sai u atah na kaw hoe sak lang awmngaih oen laam u lah, metihtiah vaan ah nangmi ham kutdo alentloe te avan khueh poen. Metihtiah tetih van la te ahimi kah patuer thli lawng tawngha thli te a sai u roe poen.
“Tede tahe ah nangmi kuirang thlaanglen thli ham tah khawmap tangkiik mai mah aw; nangmi tah hingkhui awmtheenna na boenn u poen!

Tahe ah bung aka hah thlaang thli ham tah khawmap tangkiik mai mah aw; nangmi tah buhmueh buhpawng la oen na van ai! Tahe ah nangmi aka nui aka cal thlaang thli ham khawmap tangkiik mah aw; nangmi tah lungnat yaak oen na rap u ai!
Thlaang lawng nangmi te n'koeh u vengah te khawmap tangkiik mah aw; ahimi kah patuer thli lawng te tila ni tawngha rawlrap thli te a koeh u van.
“Tede ka awl he aka hutung nangmi tengah kavan thui u: Na raal te lungna u lah, nangmi aka thina thlaang thli hamla theenna te sai pe uh,
Nangmi aka tapvoep thli te yotheenna pe u langtah nangmi thekhana thlaang thli ham thangthui pe uh.
Thlaang lawngah na beeng khatben te avan bel atah khatben te khaw bel sak baal; pakhat lawngah asawkah na buen angki te avan lawh atah adangkah na buen angki te khaw pe hawn.
Na tengah thaihu aka bih thlaang te pe u langtah pakhat khat lawng na thaihu te a lawh atah bih koep boel.
Thlaang lawng na sawah van sai seh tila na ngaih van angla thlaangtloe sawah khaw sai van.
Nang aka lungna thlaang bueng te na lungna atah metila yotheen kam-awmna te dang hamla na poek? Thlaangthawlh thli lawngkhaw ahimi aka lungna te a lungna van ta!
Tecoengah nang ham theenna aka sai thlaang bueng sawah theenna te na sai atah n'tu ah yotheen kam-awmna te dang ham na poek? Thlaangthawlh thli lawng Pateng te tila a sai u van ta!

Aka sah thai koep ham na ngaaiuep thlaang bueng tengah thaihu te na pu atah n'tu ah yotheen kam-awmna te dang hamla na poek? Thlaangthawlh thli lawng Pateng ataring ah dang koep hamla thlaangthawlh thli te thaihu a pu van ta!

Nangmi lawngtah te tila sai boel! Na raal thli te lungna langtah ahimi sawah theenna te sai peh; thaihu te pu u lah, dang koep ham ngaiuep hanlan tlaih boel. Nangmi lawng alentloe kutdo na dang u vetih Tloeng Khoelh Pathen kah ca anau la na awm u ai. Metihtiah ahih tah lungvatna aka ming nawh oen thlaangthaipalat thlaang thli sawah theenna te a sai pe.
Nangmi kah na Pa lawng thlaang reenna kaw a poek van angla nangmi lawngkhaw thlaang reenna kaw te poek uh.

“Thlaangtloe te awl cek boel, tetih atah Pathen lawng nangmi te awl n'cek van manawh; thlaangtloe te sal-aphaam boel, tetih atah Pathen lawng nangmi te n'sal-aphaam van manawh; thlaangtloe sawah khawdawp ngaai u lah, tetih atah Pathen lawng na sawah khawdawp a ngaai van ai.

Thlaangtloe te do a dan u lah, Pathen lawng nangmi te n'dodan van ai: Atak tang ni, abetoet la avan loeng ai, apueh asawm la te na dang ai, na kut dawngah avan lun vetih na phueih tloel toela m'peek ai. Nang lawng thlaangtloe ham na hawna loengkhong te ang van te Pathen lawng nang ham a hawna van ai” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng he tila thuidoetna awl a thui pe: “Mikpum pakhat lawng atloe mikpum pakhat te mawt thai nawh; a mawt atah pahih bok la ungrawm khuiah tla ai.
Sengcamoe he cangpueikung saya lak ah thoem soeh aih nawh; tede sengcamoe boeih lawng amami kah cangna te a coeng boeih atah a saya angla awm ai.
Namah mik khuiah thingboeng aka awm te poek ohla n'tu ah na boenhui thli mik dawngkah muenmawi te na bueh?

Namah mik khuiah aka awm thingboeng Pateng khaw na huh thai nawh maiah na maya manau nala te, ‘Na mik dawngkah muenmawi te kavan lo ai ne?’ na tina. Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Lamhacuek la namah mik dawngkah thingboeng te lo, tecoengah na maya manau mik khuikah muenmawi te lawh pe ham atheenla na huh thai ai.” a tina.
Thingkung theen lawng athaih the te thaih nawh, thingkung the lawngkhaw athaih theen te thaih nawh.
Thingkung boeih he athaih apai oen ming thai la awm; nangmi lawngah thliingkung dawngkah thaidut thaih te na bit u nooek nawh, thliingkung dawng-kah misur thaih khaw na bit u nawh.

Thlaang theen lawngtah a thinkaw lungbui khuikah thaihu theen a tung asep khui kalawng atheen thaihu te a thoeng sak; thlaangthe lawngtah thaihu the a tung asep te a thoeng sak. Metihtiah thinkaw khuiah abetoet te hui a kaa lawng a thui.
“Kai lawng kavan thui te tah na sai u nawh maiah, n'tu ah nangmi lawng, ‘Bawipa, Bawipa’ nan tina u?
A-u khaw ka tengah law tih ka awl thui a hutung tih aka vai tah n'tu oen a lawh u tite kan huh sak u ai.

Ahih tah tuungrawm te adungla a to tih lungnu dawngah tuung acakla aka liing im sakung oen lo u. Tuivatui te alen atah te kah im te tui lawng a liw tih a linglok, tede im te acakla a sak dawngah im tah hinghuen nawh.

Tede a-u khaw ka awl he a yaak tih aka vai nawh thlaang te tah tuungrawm te adungla to nawh tih imtuung acakla aka sut nawh, im aka sa coplap thlaang oen lo u; tuiliw lawngah te im te aningnoek vengah tlim pahoei; metihtlukla rih ham a awm!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he awl boeih he thlaangping tengah a thui boet coengah Kapernaum khaaw la te cet.
Te kah aka awm Rom raalbawi lawngah a lungna tangkiik tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat a khueh. Te thlaang te tlo tih duek tawm.
Te kah raalbawi lawng Jesuh kawng te a yaak vengah Judah ahaamca thli te a tuih tih a tuihyoeihthlaang te hoeih sak hamla a ceel sak.
Ahimi te Jesuh tengla law u tih reenna te caalla a bih u, “He thlaang he na bawm roeroe hamla angoe.
Ahih lawngah mami phun he a lungna tih kaimi ham sinakok pakhat avan sak.” a tina u.
Tedawngah Jesuh te ahimi oen cet haih u tih, im te a pha tawm u atah raalbawipa lawngah a paya thli te avan tuih tih, “Bawipa, patang palai tlap boel. Ka im la nang na law ham ka koeih ka vaih nawh,
na tengla kamah law hamla khaw ka ting ka tawkk nawh tila ka poek u. Na awl mah thlaw doek mai, kai kah tuihyoeih-thlaang he hoeih mai badai.

Kai khaw ka sawkah bawi haam thli kut huiah ka awm tih kai kah kut huiah raalkap thli awm patoeng van baal. Kai lawngah pakhat khat te, “Cet lah!” ka tina atah cet tih atloe pakhat te, ‘Law lah!’ ka tina atah va law, ka salpa te he he sai lah ka tina atah a sai,” tila te a thui sak u.

Jesuh lawng he awl he a yaak vengah a kawpoek la rai, amah huvai thlaangping tengla te maang dak phai tih, “Ataktang kavan thui u, he ang oengna he Israel thlaang thli tim ah Pateng khaw ka hu thlan hun!” a tina.
A thlaangtuih thli te raalbawipa im la meel u tih a tuihyoeihthlaang sadingla a awm te a huh u.
Tecoeng adiw thlan ah Jesuh te Nain a ti u khawpui la te cet, a hubang thli oen thlaangping lawngah a hu ah a vai u.

Khawpui vawngka te a pha khoeng vengah rawkk aka thak thlaangping te law u. Aka duek thlaang te tah huhainu kah a capa pakhatca bueng la a awm dawngah khawpui khuikah thlaang yahawh hlang te huhainu oen haih law u.
Bawipa lawng te kah huhainu te a huh vengah a reen tangkiik tih ahih nala te, “Rap tlaih boel” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh te cet phai tih repp te a tek, tevengah rawkk aka kawt thlaang thli te cot pai u. Jesuh lawng, “Cadawng tawngpang! Tho hang lah, kan tina he!” a tina.
Thlaangduek te ngawl tih awl a thui, tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih te a manu tengah koep a peek.
Ahimi boeih lawng rih ruila Pathen te a thangpawm u. “Aka lenduet tawngha tah mami tim ah thoeng poen, Pathen tah a thlaang thli thlawn hamla law poen!” tila te ahimi lawng a thui u.
He awlthang Jesuh kawng he Judah ram pum oen a teng-avai ram boeih ah thang khonghak.
He thaihu boeih kah akawng alam he a hubang thli lawng Johan tengah a thui pe u, tedawngah ahimi timkah laipai pahih te a khue tih,
Bawipa te doet sak hamla a tuih, “Nang he Johan lawngah aka law ham koei thlaang a tite nang poen aw, tihnawhtah kaimi lawng thlaangtloe te ka ngaiuep u hun ai aw?” tila te a doet sak.

Jesuh teng apha hih vengah ahih rawi lawng, “Johan lawngah aka law ham koei thlaang a tite nang he poen aw, tihnawhtah kaimi lawng thlaangtloe ka ngaiuep u hun ai aw,’ tila doet sak hamla kaihih he n'tuih” a tina.
Tevengah te Jesuh lawng thlaang-thli kah a tlawhna, natna oen raaithe lawng a kuun thil thlaang thli te a hoeih sak tih mikpum thlaang broe te khaw mik a tueng sak koep.

Jesuh lawng Johan kah thlaangtuih laipai rawi nala te, “Cet koep hih langtah na huh boeih oen na yaak boeih he Johan tengah thui pe hih: mikpum thli a mik tueng poen, khowkheem khowbai thli cet thai poen, lungkiit haibe natna aka tlo thli anatna ciing boeih poen, haapang lailot thli lawng awl a yaak poen, thlaangduek tho koep poen, Awlthang Theen he khawdeng lungma thlaang thli tengah a thui u poen.
Kai kah kawng alam dawngah ngaithliwhna aka khueh nawh tah yotheen aka dawng thlaang ni! tila thui pe” a tina.

Johan kah laipai rawi te a mel koep coeng atah, Jesuh lawng Johan kawng te thlaang rangpui tengah a thui: “Nangmi lawng ramhum huhang ah Johan tengla na ceh u te, n'tu huh hamla na ngaiuep u? Yilh lawng a yawng mailai caapu thing te huh ham aw na ngaiuep u?

Nangmi lawng n'tu huh hamla na ceh u? Hinaak himbai atheen theen oen aka thoekcau u te huh hamla aw? Te tila hi-acuu atheen theen phutlo oen thloeih cah u tih thayoeidoh la aka awm tah sengpahrang impui ah ni a awm u!
Nangmi lawng n'tu huh ngaih ah na ceh u, van thui u lah? Tawngha te huh ngaih ah aw? Tetih tangtang pai ni, tede nangmi lawngah tawngha lak ah aka lenduet na huh u poen he ta.
Metihtiah Johan he tah caciim lawngah, “Pathen lawng nang hamla lawngpui roekbahkung na haiah laipai kavan tuih ai,’ tila a thui thlaang te ni.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Johan lak ah aka lenduet a-u khat khaw awm nawh hun tila kavan thui u. Tede Pathen ram khuiah ayiit koek la aka awm thlaang te Johan lak ah lenduet ngai.” a tina.
Te tila a thui te thlaang rangpui lawng a yaak u: ahimi oen ah, awlpui ngaaila mangmu cawikung thli tah Pathen lawng a kuek doengna te aka vai thlaang la awm u tih Johan lawng baptisma te a peek u.
Tede Farasi thlaang thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue lawngtah ahimi ham Pathen kah kamthlahna te a hoett u tih Johan kah baptisma te dang hamla te a thana u.
Jesuh lawng a awlthui te a tom koep tih, “Tahe san kah thlaang thli he n'tu oen ah ni ka nuehtah lah ai? Ahimi he n'tu oen a lawh u?

Ahimi he tah thaihu yoeihna huen ah aka ngawl camaw thli oen lo u. Thloep at la aka awm hue lawngah atloe thloep at hue nala te, “Kaimi lawngah yuluina riingding kavan tum u, tede na laam u nawh! Kaimi lawng rawkktoetna laa khaw kavan sak u de na rap u nawh!’ aka ti u the camaw hue oen na lo u.
Baptisma pekung Johan te law tih buh a yeh, misurtui khaw aw nawh, tevengah nangmi lawng, ‘Johan te raaithe lawng a kuun thil!’ na ti u.
Thlaanghing Capa lawngah law tih a caak, a awkk, tevengah nangmi lawng, ‘He thlaang he bueh u lah! caruut aw lam thlaang ni, mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaangthawlh thli kah paya ni!’ na ti u.
Tecakhaw, Pathen kah cuihna tah soeng tangtang tila aka do thlaang boeih lawng a tueng sak” a tina.
Farasi thlaang pakhat lawng thlem buh veel haih hamla Jesuh te a khue, Jesuh te ahih im la cet tih buh caak hamla te ngawl thuk.

Te kah khawpui khuiah te aka thawlh tangkiik hutaa pakhat awm. Te kah hutaa lawngah Farasi thlaang kah im ah Jesuh buh a caak tite a yaak, tedawngah alabasta um at dawngah riimtuui abepirla avan khuen tih,
Jesuh kah a hu ben a khowkung ah te pai, rap tih a mikphitui te Jesuh khow dawngah a cip sak. Tecoengah a khow te a sam oen a thuut pe, a mok tih riimtuui oen a khow te a suep pe.

Farasi thlaang lawng te kah hutaa lawng te tila a sai te a huh vengah a kaw khuiah te, “He thlaang he tawngha tangtang kawinih amah aka tek hutaa he a-u te ang thlaang ti te a ming vetih metila a thawlh ti khaw a ming ai,” tila a poek.
Tevengah Jesuh lawng, “Simon, na tengah thui ham pakhat awm” a tina. Ahih lawngah, “Oeih, Saya, van thui lah,” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Tangkapu thlahkung thlaang tengah tangka aka pu thlaang pahih awm. Pakhat lawngah ngun tangka ya-ngaa a ba tih atloe pakhat lawng ngun tangka sawm-ngaa a ba.
Te rawi lawng laiba te sah thai hih nawh, te rawi pahih bok kah laiba te a yoe pe sak. Te atah te rawi pahih khuiah a-u lawng tangkapu thlahkung te a lungna ngaai ai? tila a doet.
Simon lawng, “Ka poekna maiah laiba yahawh hlang a yoe pe sak tih khawdawp a ngaai pe thlaang lawngah te a lungna ngaai ai,” tila a thui pe. Jesuh lawng, “Soeng tangtang” a tina.

Tecoengah te kah hutaa benla te maang tih Simon nala te, “He hutaa he na huh aw? Na im la ka law de khow silhna tui nan pe nawh, tede he hutaa lawngtah mikphitui oen ka khow he avan silh tih a sam oen avan thuut.
Nang lawngtah nan mok nawh, tede ahih lawngtah avan pha pek kalawng ka khow avan mok he toeng nawh.
Nang lawngah ka luu suepna ham olif situi khaw nan pe nawh, tede ahih lawngtah riimtuui oen ka khow avan suep poen.

Tedawngah, “Lungna aka lenduet lawng a thawlhna yahawh hlang te khawdawp a ngaai pe poen tite a tueng sakna ni. Tede a-u khaw a thawlhna tehca te khawdawp ngaai pe la aka awm thlaang lawngtah lungna tehca bueng te a tueng sak van” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng hutaa nala te, “Na thawlhna boeih te khawdawp ngaai la awm poen.” a tina.
Caboi dawngah thlembuh aka veel haih thlaangtloe hue lawngah, “Thawlhna Pateng khawdawp aka ngaai thlaang he a-u kai? tila a thui u.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng hutaa nala te, “Na oengna lawng n'thlawn poen: ngaimawng ngaitoe la cet loeih” a tina.
Tecoeng adiw raih atah Jesuh lawng vangpui oen vangca boeih te a hiil tih Pathen Ram kawng Awlthang Theen te a phawng. A hubang hue paha thlaihih khaw ahih oen cet haih u tih,
tlawhnatna oen raaithe lawng a tuuk tih aka hoeih hutaa khatsut khaw a hu ah te bang u: a kaw khuikah raaithe pasarih co tih aka hoeih Meri (Makdalin a ti u te) oen ah
Herod sengpahrang kah imkhuikaw ukkung Khusa kah a yu Joanna; tecoengah Susanna oen atloe hutaa thli a hu ah bang u tih a khuehtoen thaihu oen ah Jesuh oen a hubang thli te a bawmcem u.
Khawpui pakhat coeng pakhat kah thlaang thli te Jesuh tengla law u tih a tun kueng u vengah te he kah thuidoetna awl he Jesuh lawng a thui pe:
“Voei khat ah thlaang pakhat tah caangti heh hamla cet. Lo khuiah caangti a heh vengah te caangti khatsut tah lawngpui ah tla, thlaang lawng a caawt tih va lawngah boeih a ruh.
Caangti khatsut tah lungrawng sawkah dilai apamna ah te tla tih caangti a po hang veng atah dilai te nuem poe nawh tih caangkung te reu boeih.
Caangti khatsut tah thliing ahaang tim ah tla, thliing te roeng hang tih caangkung te malh a diik.
Caangti khatsut tah dilai atheenna ah tla; caangkung te roeng hang tih let yakhat la a vui athaih te rip thaawn.” a tina. Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Yaakna haa na khueh u atah ya uh.” a tina.
A hubang hue lawngah, he thuidoetna awl thuingaihna te Jesuh a doet u tih,
Jesuh lawng, “Pathen Ram awlhuep mingna te nangmi m'peek poen, tede thlaangtloe hue lawngtah a bueh u de huh nawh ham, a hutung u de yaakming nawh ham thuidoetna oen ni thui pe ham a awm.” a tina.
“Thuidoetna awl thuingaihna tah he tila awm: Caangti tah Pathen kah awl te ni.

Lawngpui ah aka tla caangti tah Pathen awl aka ya thlaang thli te thuingaihna ni; ahimi lawng oengna oen thlawnna te a dangna nawh ham Seitan lawngah law tih ahimi thinkaw khuikah awlthang te a lawh pe.

Lungrawng sawah aka tla caangti te tah awlthang theen te a yaak tih awmngaih kawhoe la aka do thlaang te thuingaihna ni. Tede ahimi kaw khuiah ayung te caa khuek nawh. Kawlkalh ham bueng te a oeng u tih noekdakna tue a law veng atah tlim boeih u.

Thliing ahaang tim ah aka tla caangti te thuingaihna tah: Pathen awl te a yaak u de he dilai khawsakna kah lakueng raina oen kuirangna oen ah awmtheenna lawng a khuk tih ahinghoek dawngah a vui athaih ahii la aka awm thlaang thli te ni.

Lai theen dawngah aka tla caangti thuingaihna tah: awlthang theen te a yaak tih thinkaw khuiah hinyahna, doengna oen a khoem tih a vui athaih toela uehna oen aka awm thlaang thli te thuingaihna ni,” a tina.
“A-u lawngkhaw haiim te a vaang tih beeldung oen muek khoep nawh, ih-khun huiah khaw khueh nawh. Imkhui la thlaang a kuun vengah haiang te a huhna ham haivangna dawngah haiim te a khueh.
Thuh-elh la aka awm boeih te pho biit vetih muekdah la aka awm boeih te tueng pheng vetih huh thai la awm ai.

Tedawngah metila awl he na hutung tite ngaithuen uh; metihtiah, a-u khaw thaihu a khueh te a tawm athap pe ai, tede a-u khaw a khueh nawh te ayawl akaai tah ka khueh tila a poek te Pateng khaw a lawh pe ai.” a tina.
Jesuh kah a manu oen a manau thli te a tengla law u, tede thlaang ayahawh aih dawngah huh u thai nawh.
Thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh nala te, “Na nu oen na manau thli nang huh ham a ngaih u tih adauben ah pai u.” tila a thui pe.
Jesuh lawng ahimi boeih nala te, “Pathen awl te a yaak tih aka vai thlaang boeih tah ka manu oen ka manau la awm.” a tina.
Hin at ah Jesuh tah a hubang thli oen lowng dawngah ngawl u tih ahimi nala te, “Tuilii khatben rall la cet u sih.” a tina tih cet u.
Lowng oen ah a ceh u phai vengah Jesuh tah ditdit ip. Kawlkalh maiah tuilii dawngah te khaw thlii tih lowng dawngah tui te be dalh poen, tedawngah ahimi boeih te lakueng u.

A hubang thli te Jesuh tengla cet tih a thawh u, “Bawipa, Bawipa! Mami n'duek boeih u poen ai he!” a tina u. Jesuh lawng tho tih khawthlii oen tuilet te awl a peek; thlipui thliphoe te duem tih dipsiditla awm.

Tecoengah a hubang thli nala te, “Na oengna te mela na khueh u?” a tina. Tede ahimi te a kawpoek rai u tih a rih u, amami khat oen khat te, “He kah thlaang he a-u kai? Ahih lawngtah khawthlii oen tuilet he awl a peek tih a awl khaw a ngai pe mai!” ti u.
Jesuh oen a hubang thli tah Galili tuilii khatben rall ah aka awm Kerasa peng benla lowng oen ah cet u.

Jesuh te lan a pha khoeng veng atah te khaaw kah thlaang raaithe lawng a kuun thil pakhat te a tengla va law. Ahih tah atliing ayaalla asanhlang awm puet poen, im ah khaw awm nawh tih thlaangduek a upna lungkaw khuiah te awm.

Ahih lawng Jesuh te a huh vengah angaihhlangla paang tih a khowkung ah te a buekuep pe tih, “Tloeng Khoelh Pathen Capa Jesuh! Kai he metila sai ham na ngaih? Kai he dan n'tat mai boel, reenna kavan bih!” tila te paang.

Jesuh lawng raaithe te ahih kaw khui kalawng ram la ceh ham awl a peek dawngah ni te tila a tina. Ahih kaw khuiah te raaithe kuun poepa tih a kut a khow te thiirui oen rap a piin tih a khawh khaklal u de thiirui te a bot tih ramhum huhang la raaithe lawng a viil puei.
Jesuh lawng ahih te, “A-u na miingna? tila a doet. Ahih lawngah, “Ka miing tah ‘Mob’ ka miingna” a tina. Metihtiah ahih kaw khuiah raaithe moen a awm dawngah ni.
Raaithe thli lawngah Jesuh nala te kaimi he aboetna aka awm nawh ungrawm dung khuila te n'thlaak mai boel a tina u tih reenna a bih u.
Te kah tlaangthleep ah te awk piing hui at a vuelh u te awm. Tedawngah raaithe thli lawng ahimi te awk thli kah a kaw khuila kuun sak ham Jesuh tengah a bih u tih a kuun sak u.
Ahimi tah te kah thlaang kaw khui kalawng co u tih awk thli kah a kaw khuila te kuun u. Tevengah awk hui at te apum boeih la cehthleeng ah plit dingkang, tuilii ah tla tih duek boeih.
Awkdoen hue lawng te tila a awm te a huh u dawngah heeng u tih khawpui khui oen vangca boeih ah te kah awlthang te a thui u.

Thlaangping lawngah te tila a awm te huh hamla cet u tih Jesuh teng a pha u atah raaithe lawng a ceh taak thlaang lawngah te hinaak himbai a buen a naak tih lungcuih la Jesuh khow kungah a ngawlh te ahimi lawng a huh u vengah te a rih u.
Te tila a awm te aka hu thlaang thli lawngah te kah thlaang te metila hoeihna a dang tite thlaangping hue tengah patoeng a thui pe u.

Tecoeng atah te kah peng paang ah aka awm thlaang boeih lawngah te a rih tangkiik u tih ahimi boeih lawng Jesuh nala te atloela cet mai hawn a tina u. Tedawngah Jesuh tah lowng dawngah luui hang tih atloela cet.
Raaithe lawng a ceh taak thlaang lawngah te, “Na hu ah m'bang sak van.” a tina tih reenna a bih. Tede, Jesuh lawng ahih nala te.
“Im la cet koep langtah Pathen lawng nang ham avan sai he thui,” a tina. Te thlaang lawngah khawpui khuila te cet tih Jesuh lawng ahih sawah a sai pe te a thui.
Jesuh te thlaang broe lawngah a ring khiing u poen dawngah tuilii khatben rall kalawng a meel phai veng atah thlaangping lawng ahih te a do u.

Tevengah Jairu aka miingna thlaang pakhat te khaw va law, ahih tah te kah sinakok bok-im ukkung pakhat van ni. Ahih lawng Jesuh kah a khow kungah te buekuep tih amah im ah law van hamla Jesuh tengah reenna a bih,
metihtiah a canu khatca bueng kum thlaihih aka law te a duek tawmca dawngah ni. Jesuh te a ceh phai vengah khatben khat bang kalawng thlaangping lawngah muelh a yaawl u.

Te kah thlaangping tim ah te kum ha thlaihih khui puet ah thisuntlaak tlawhna aka tlo hutaa pakhat te awm; ahih lawng a khuehtoen boeih thapang la siibawi te a peek tih a tuui ahaai u van de a-u khat lawngkhaw hoeih sak thai nawh.
Ahih lawngah thlaangping lakli ah Jesuh kah a hu ben ah te law tih ahih kah himbaidung ahmoi te duem a tek, tevengah thisuntlaak tlawhna te hoeih pahoei.

Jesuh lawng, “Kai he a-u lawngah n'tek?” tila a doet u. Thlaang boeih lawng kan tek nawh a tina u, Piter lawngah, “Bawipa, thlaangping lawngah khatben khat bang kalawng n'veel khoep tih n'yaawl u he ta” a tina.
Tede Jesuh lawng, “Thlaang pakhat lawngah kai he n'tek, metihtiah ka pum dawngkah huham tharana a thoeng te ka ming.” a tina.

Te kah hutaa lawngah kai lawng ka tek te a ming poen a ti dawngah thuen ruila law tih Jesuh kah a khow kungah te a buekuep pe. Te kah thlaang boeih haiah te n'tu kawngah ahih te a tek tih metila a hoeih pahoei tite biit a thui.
Jesuh lawng ahih te, “Ka canu, na oengna lawng n'hoeih sak poen. Ngaimawng la cet loeih” a tina.
Jesuh lawng awl a thui lii vengah te Jairu im kalawng thlaang pakhat rawkk-thenn va law tih, “Na canu duek poen, saya he kawhuet cakbat la khueh khiing tlaih boel,” tila Jairu tengah a thui pe.
Tede Jesuh lawng tete a yaak vengah Jairu nala, “Lakueng boel; oeng mah oeng doek mai lah, ahih te theen badai,” a tina.
Im te a pha u veng atah, Piter, Johan, Jeem oen ah camaw kah a manu oen ana pa bueng nawh atah amah oen haih a-u khaw im khuila kuun sak nawh.
Te kah aka awm thlaang boeih lawng camaw te a rah u tih reeng u. Jesuh lawng, “Rap u boel, camaw he a duek moenih, aka ip mai ni!” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah camaw te duek tila a ming u dawngah Jesuh te a nuihna u.
Tede Jesuh lawng a kut ah camaw te a phoeih tih, “Ka canu, tho lah!” a tina.
Hutaaca te hing koep tih pahoei tho hang, Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te ‘Caak koei pakhat khat pe uh’ a tina.
Ana pa oen a manu tah a kawpoek rai tangkiik hih, tede Jesuh lawng he tila aka awm thaihu he a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham awl a uen.
Jesuh lawng a hubang thlaihih te a khue tun tih, ahimi lawng raaithe boeih te hekna ham, tlawhnatna te hoeih sak hamla huham tharana oen saithaina aana te a peek.
Tecoengah Pathen ram kawng thui ham oen ah thlaangtlo hoeih sak hamla ahimi te a tuih.
Ahimi nala te, “Kamyin la na cehna ah n'tu khaw khuen u boel; cawnghol khaw, sawngsa khaw, caak awkk khaw, tangka khaw, angki ahoei yung at khaw khuen u boel.
Nangmi na pahna im ah te khawpui khui kalawng na ceh thlantoe ah awm uh;
Nangmi impahna aka pe nawh khaaw te ceh taak u langtah ahimi te ngaithuen peekna la na khow dawngkah laidiik te van khoek pe uh.” a tina.
A hubang hue lawngah cet u tih vangca vangnau boeih te a hiil u, Awlthang Theen te a phawng u tih khaaw tawm ah thlaangtlo te a hoeih sak u.
Galili ram ukkung Herod lawngah he tila thaihu aka thoeng hang kawng he a yaak vengah, thlaang khatsut lawng Baptisma pekung Johan he hing koep tila a thui u dawngah a ngaai hang sut.
Thlaangtloe hue lawngtah Elijah ni aka pho koep tila a thui u tih thlaangtloe lawngtah yan vengkah tawngha pakhat khat ni aka hing koep ti u.
Herod lawngah, “Kai lawng Johan kah a luu te ka tloek pe poen, tede he kah thaihu thli akawng alam, ka yaak thlaang he a-u kai?” tila a thui. Tedawngah Jesuh te huh hamla a yawm.
A hubang thli te va meel koep u tih amami kah a sai boeih te Jesuh tengah a thui pe u. Jesuh lawng ahimi te a khue tih amami bueng Betsaida khawpui la te cet u.
Te kawng te rangpui lawng a yaak vengah a hu ah bung a vai u. Jesuh lawng ahimi te a uem tangkiik tih Pathen Ram kawng te a thui pe, sadingna aka ngoe thlaang thli te sa a ding sak.

Thlemben khaw a tlaak tawm atah hubang thlaihih hue te a tengla law u tih, “Thlaangping he tuih loeih, he hue yunyan kah khaaw oen lo ah he cet u selang tah caak awkk oen pahna tlap u seh, he kah ahuen amawl he ramhum rammawl ni,” a tina u.

Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawngah he kah thlaang thli he caak awkk pe uh a tina. Ahimi lawngah, “Kaimi lawng takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih bueng ni ka khueh u. Thlaang rangpui ham caak awkk lai sak hamla na ngaih aw?” a tina u.
(Te ah te thlaang tawngpataang hawng ah thong ngaa yun awm.) Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala, “Thlaangping sawm ngaa yun maiah athloepla rip ngawlh sak.” a tina.
Te tila a hubang hue lawng a sai coengah,

Jesuh lawng takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih te a lawh tih vaan la maang hang; Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui, takawi oen nga te a eh tih a hubang thli tengah te a peek tih thlaangping hue tengah takawi te a ree pe u.
Ahimi boeih lawng a hah khuek la a caak u, acoeih aphe te a hubang hue lawng a cawi u tih vawhphueih paha thlaihih dawngah te betoet.
Hin at ah Jesuh amah bueng a thangthui vengah a hubang thli te ahih tengla law u. Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “thlaang thli lawng kai he a-u a ti u?” tila a doet.

Ahimi lawngah, “Khatsut lawngtah nang he Baptisma pekung Johan ti u. Thlaangtloe khatsut lawngtah Elijah ni ti u tih atloe khatsut lawngtah yan veng kah tawngha pakhat khat aka hing koep ni, ti u” tila a thui pe.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng ta, Kai he a-u na ti u?” tila a doet. Piter lawngah, “Nang tah Pathen kah Messiah ni,” a tina.
Tecoengah he kawng he ahimi lawngah a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham Jesuh lawng a khang pe.

Jesuh lawng, “Thlaang hing capa lawng patang palai a khang doetthloet vetih Judah ahaamca thli, khawsoeih haam thli oen Phungawl Cangpueikung thli lawngah te a hoett u ai. Ahih te a ngawn u ai, tede hin thum coengah tho koep ai.” tila a thui pe.
Tecoengah ahimi boeih tengah te, “A-u khaw ka hu ah baang ham a ngaih atah, amah kawngaih te hoett seh, amah kah thinglam te hin roekk ah kawt selang tah ka hu ah bang seh.
Metihtiah a-u khaw amah kah hingna te thlawn ham aka ngaih tah a hingna te a thlawng ai, tede a-u khaw kai kawngah a hingna te a thlawng atah a hingna te a thlawn ai.
Thlaanghing lawng dilai pum he amah koe la khueh mai cakhaw a hingna te a thlawng tih a sung atah n'tu nuem hoeikhangna a awm? Hoeikhangna roe awm nawh!

Kai he khaw seh, kan cang puei he khaw seh a-u lawngkhaw a yah puei atah Thlaanghing Capa lawng a ruep-awmna oen, ana Pa oen aciim vanthlaang thli kah ruep-awmna oen a law vengah ahih te khaw a yah puei van ai.
Atak tang kavan thui u, he kah aka awm thlaang khatsut lawngah Pathen Ram te na huh thlantoe na duek u manawh” a tina.
He kah awl he a thui coeng yarh khat yunyan a awm atah Piter, Johan, oen Jeem mi te Jesuh lawng a ceh puei tih thangthui u ham tlaang la luui u.
A thangthui lii vengah a mik-hai te thawleng u tih alakloe la awm, a hinaak himbai te bawk rawngtheng.
Kawlkalh maiah thlaang pahih te ahih oen awl a thui. Ahih rawi te tah Mosi oen Elijah ni.
Ahih rawi tah vaan ruep-awmna oen law hih tih Jerusalem ah Jesuh kah duekna rang oen Pathen kawngaihna adiw thlaan ah asoep ham kawng te Jesuh oen a thui u.
Piter oen a paya rawi tah ip muelh u, tede a hinghang u veng atah Jesuh kah ruep-awmna te khaw, a tengah thlaang pahih aka pai te khaw a huh u.

Te kah thlaang pahih lawng Jesuh te ka ceh taak hih ai a ti veng atah Piter lawng Jesuh nala te, “Bawipa, he ah mami n'awm u he theen tangkiik! Kaimi lawng riim-im pathum ah ka sa u ai, pakhat te nang ham seh, pakhat te Mosi hamla, pakhat te tah Elijah ham seh.” a tina. (Ahih lawng n'tu ka thui tite ming heet nawh.)
Ahih lawng awl a thui lii vengah muui va yaal tih ahimi te a yaawl khoep; ahimi muui lawng a thiing khoep vengah te a hubang hue lawngtah caalla a rih u.
Muui dawngkah awl pakhat lawngah, “Ahih he tah Ka Capa ni, Kai lawngah ka tuek te ni, a awl thui te ngaai pe uh!” tila a thui.
Te kah awl te a thui boet atah Jesuh te amah bueng la awm. Hubang hue lawng he kah akawng alam boeih te a phah u tih te vengkah ahimi lawng thaihu a huh u te a-u tengah khaw thui u nawh.
Avuen khawhin atah Jesuh oen a hubang pathum hue te tlaang kalawng a rum thuk u vengah thlaangping lawng Jesuh te avan pan u.
Thlaangping tim kah thlaang pakhat te paang tih, “Saya! Reenna kavan bih, ka capa khueh duen he van bueh lah!
Raaithe lawng a tuuk tih ploeng ploeng paang, a thuen sak tih tlup tlup a tlim sak, a kaa dawngah tilhawm khaw nomnom a peem; a ngawn a theh poepa tih thlah tlaih nawh!
Na hubang thli tengah raaithe hek hamla reenna ka bih de ahimi lawng hek u thai nawh” a tina.

Jesuh lawngah, “Nangmi oengna khueh nawh thlaang oen lawnghang thlaang thli! Meveng toe nangmi he kan awm puei ai? Meveng toe nuem kan ruemm khiing u lah ai?” a tina. Tecoengah te kah thlaang nala te, “Na capa te he la van law puei lah.” a tina.
Tawngpaca te a law phai vengah raaithe lawng ahih te a thuen sak tih dilai dawng tlup a tlim sak. Jesuh lawng raaithe te awl a peek, tawngpaca te a hoeih sak coengah ana pa tengah koep a peek.
Thlaang boeih tah Pathen kah lenna huham tharana dawngah te a kawpoek rai u. Jesuh kah a sai thaihu boeih dawngah thlaangping a kawpoek a rai u lii vengah te a hubang hue nala,
Kai lawng kavan thui he hilh u boel! Thlaanghing Capa he aana aka khueh thlaang thli kut ah a peek u ai,” a tina
Tede a hubang hue lawngah a thui ngaihna te ming u nawh. Ahimi lawng a yaakmingna nawh ham thuingaihna te awlpaveel oen a thui pe. Te kawng alam te doet ham khaw birih sut u.
A hubang thli lawngah amami khuiah te a-u nuem aka lenduet ti u tih awl puung u.
Ahimi lawng te tila a poek u te Jesuh lawng a ming, tedawngah camaw pakhat te a khue tih amah tengah a pai sak,

a hubang hue nala te, “A-u khaw he camaw he ka miing oen ah a do atah kai he ni n'do; a-u khaw kai he aka do tah kai aka tuihkung te a do. Metihtiah nangmi tim kah ayiit koek te aka lenduet la awm.” a tina.
Johan lawngah, “Bawipa, nang kah miing oen ah raaithe aka hek thlaang pakhat ka huh u tih mami timkah thlaang nawh dawngah sai tlaih nawh ham ka khang pe u.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng Johan oen atloe hubang hue nala te, “Khaang pe u boel, metihtiah nangmi te aka oelhtaih nawh thlaang te tah na puei na paw ni.” a tina.
Jesuh te vaan la luui ham atue a khoek tawm poen dawngah Jerusalem la ceh ham kaw a poek tih kamthlah.
Samaria khaaw ah soeprep boeih oepsoeh la aka sai ham ahih lawng thlaang a tuih.
Tede Jerusalem la te ceh poe ham a kamthlah u dawngah te khaw kah thlaang thli lawng Jesuh te pah sak u nawh.
He tila a awm te hubang Jeem oen Johan lawng a huh vengah ahih rawi lawng Jesuh te, “Bawipa he kah thlaang thli he phe hamla vaan kah hai te kaimi lawng tlaak sak ham na ngaih aw?” tila a doet hih.
Jesuh lawng maang dak tih ahih rawi te a ho.
Tecoengah Jesuh oen a hubang thli tah khaw tloe la cet u.
Ahimi te lawngpueng a ceh u vengah thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh nala, “Na cehna roekk ah na hu ah ka baang van ai.” a tina.

Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Metaang lawngkhaw a awm na lungkaw thingkaw a khueh tih va lawngkhaw a bu a khueh, tede Thlaanghing Capa lawngtah duemdawngna oen ihna ahuen kangna khaw khueh nawh.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng thlaangtloe pakhat nala te, “Ka hu ah baang lah.” a tina. Tede te thlaang lawngah, “Bawipa, im la ka cet de silang a pa rawkk te ka kuem lamha de ai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Thlaangduek lawng amami thlaangduek te vui u noen seh. Nang tah cet langtah Pathen Ram kawng te thui lah.” a tina.
Thlaangtloe pakhat lawngah te, “Bawipa na hu ah ka baang van ai, tede ka cet silang tah ka cakaw thli te ka phih ka ra de ai,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “A-u khaw laithawl sai ham a tongnan tih a hu benla aka maang khiing te tah Pathen Ram oen ah tingtawkk nawh.” a tina.
He coengah Bawipa lawng thlaang sawmsarih pahih te a tuek, ahimi te pahih pahih ah a bok u sak tih amah a cehna koei khaaw oen ahuen amawl boeih ah te a tuih.

Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Caang ah hamla tah yahawh tangkiik mai de, aka aat ham biibikung tah yawlca. Lo khui-kah caang aka aat la biibikung thlaang yahawh avan tuihna ham lokhuehkung tengah thangthui uh.
Nangmi va cet u lah! Metaang timkah tuuca angla nangmi he kan tuih u.
Nangmi lawng tangka bawm khawseh, sawngsa khawseh, khawmuek khaw khuen u boel; a-u thlaang khaw voemtoei hamla lawngpueng ah cot pai boel.
Nangmi lawng im khui pakhat ah na kuun veng roekk ah lamhacuekla, “He im khuiah he ngaimawngna awm hawn seh.” tina uh.
Te kah im khuiah ngaimawngna aka ngaih thlaang te a awm atah nangmi kah ngaimawng toeina te ahih sawah awm seh; a awm u nawh atah namami tengah va meel koep ai.
Te kah im ah te awm u langtah ahimi lawng m'peek boeih te ca uh, metihtiah bii aka bi lawngtah a bi phu te a dang ham awm. Imlui te khat coeng khat pong thiikthuek u boel.
Khawpui pakhat khuila na kuun veng roekk ah nangmi te n'do u atah na haiah avan toen te ca uh,
te khawpui khuikah thlaangtlo thli te hoeih sak uh, te kah aka awm thlaang thli nala te, ‘Pathen Ram tah nangmi tengah avan pha poen’ tila thui pe uh.
Tede khawpui pakhat khuila na kuun veng roekk ah nangmi te n'do u nawh atah lawngpui tawm ah cet u langtah,

‘Kaimi kah ka khow dawngah aka kap na khaw khuikah laidiik nangmi ngaithuen he peekna hamla kavan khoek u poen. Tede he tah van hilh u boel, ‘Pathen Ram tah nangmi tengah avan pha poen!’ tila thui pe uh.
Atak tang kavan thui u, Awlcekna Khawhin ah te kah khaaw lak ah Sodom khaaw te Pathen lawng a reen ngaai bet ai!” a tina.

“Nang Korazin khawpui, nang hamla khawmap tangkiik mah aw! Nang Betsaida nang hamla khawmap sut! nangmi tengah kawpoek raina ka sai he Taiar oen Sidon ah ka sai kawinih n'cui vengah ni te kah thlaang thli lawng amami kah thawlh yutna te tueng sak hamla ngawl u vetih tlamhi oen a khuk u coengah amah oen amah te haiphu oen a phull u poen ai!
Awlcekna Khawhin ah te nangmi lak ah Taiar oen Sidon khaw te Pathen lawng a reen ngaai bet ai.
Nang Kapernaum! Namah oen namah te vaan la pawmsang u ham na ngaih aw? Hell ah thlaak thuk la na awm ai!” a tina.

Jesuh lawng a hubang thli nala te, “A-u khaw nangmi kah awl a hutung u atah kai kah awl ni a hutung u; a-u khaw nangmi kah awl te a hutung nawh atah kai kah awl ni a hutung nawh poen; a-u khaw kai he aka hoett tah kai tuihkung te ni a hoett poen.” a tina.

A thlaangtuih sawmsarih pahih hue te awmngaih kawhoe la va meel koep u tih ahimi lawngah, “Bawipa, kaimi lawng nang kah miing oen ah awl ka peek u vengah raaithe thli lawng Pateng khaw awl a ngaai u!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Khaw thlap apha angla vaan kalawng Seitan a tlaak thuk te ka huh.

Hutung u lah! Nangmi lawng ruul oen celkhui ta-ai tim ah na ceh thaina ham, Raal kah huham tharana te taana thai ham, nangmi te thaihu khat lawngkhaw nganbawh peek nawh ham saithaina aana te kan peek u poen.
Tede raaithe thli lawng nangmi awl te a ngaai u dawngah awmngaih u boel; vaan ah nangmi kah miing a thut u dawngah te awmngaih uh.” a tina.

Tevengah te Ciim Muithla lawng Jesuh te awmngaihna oen a betoet sak tih, “A Pa, vaan oen dilai kah Bawipa! Nang lawng thlaangcuih oen thoemthaina aka khueh thlaang thli tengah na tueng sak nawh tih na thuh te thoemthaina aka khueh nawh thlaang thli tengah na tueng sak poen dawngah kan uem tangkiik. A Pa, he tila coengg sak ham namah lawng na ngaih roe ni.” tila a thui.

“A Pa lawng thaihu soeprep boeih m'peek poen. Capa he a-u ti khaw Pa nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw ming nawh. Amah te tueng sak hamla Capa lawng a tuek thlaang oen Capa amah lawng nawh atah Pa te a-u lawngkhaw ming u nawh.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah a hubang hue benla te maang tih ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng na huh u thaihu he na huh thloem u dawngah na yo theen phoeih u!

Nangmi tengah kavan thui he tawngha yahawh hlang oen sengpahrang thli lawngah nangmi lawng na huh u he huh hamla a ngaih u de hu u thai nawh, nangmi lawng na yaak u he yaak ham a ngaih u de ya u thai nawh.” a tina.
Phungawl cangpueikung pakhat law tih Jesuh kah a thawlhna tuuk pe ham a yawm. Ahih lawngah, “Saya, dungyan hingna ka dangna ham n'tu ka sai ai?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Caciim lawng n'tu a thui? Avan thui thli te metila nang lawng na yaakmingna a awm?” a tina.

Te kah thlaang lawngah, “Na Bawipa Pathen te na thinkaw lungbui boeih oen na hingna boeih oen, na tharana boeih oen, na kawpoek boeih oen ah lungna lah,’ ti. Tecoengah ‘namah oen namah te na lungna u van angla na imbe lovaai te khaw lungna van’ ti” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Awl navan thung he tah soeng poen, te tila te sai, te tih atah na hing ai.” a tina.
Tede Phungawl cangpueikung lawng amah oen amah te thlaangdoeng la a poek u dawngah, “Ka imbe lovaai te a-u nuem?” tila Jesuh te a doet.

Jesuh lawngah, “Voei khat ah thlaang pakhat tah Jerusalem kalawng Jeriko khaw la a ceh thuk vengah ahih te thlaanghuen thli lawng a bawh u, hinaak himbai te a pit pe u, a bawh doetthloet u tih a duek dalh la a ceh taak sut u.
Te tila a awmna kah lawngpui ah te khawsoeih pakhat te cet thuk van; tede ahih lawng te kah thlaang te a huh vengah khatben kalawng a reel aram tih a ceh taak.
Te tih van la te Levi thlaang pakhat khaw te kah lawngpui ah poe cet thuk van tih te kah thlaang te a huh, ahih lawngkhaw khatben kalawng areel aram tih a ceh taak van.
Tede Samaria thlaang pakhat, te kah lawngpui kalawng ah kamyin la aka cet lawng atah te kah thlaang tengla te a pha tih a huh vengah a reen tangkiik.

A tengla te cet tih boengha te situi oen misurtui oen ah a thluk pe tih boengha thli te a yeen pe; tecoengah te kah thlaang te amah kah lacano dawngah a ngawlh sak tih yinpahna im la te a ceh puei; te ah te ahih lawng te kah thlaangtlo te a buul athlawng.

Avuen ah ka cet ai a ti veng atah ngun tangka pheek hih te a lawh tih yinpahna imtoetkung te a peek tih ahih nala te, “Nang lawngah ahih he khuutcem mai de, ahih hamla na hawna avak asah boeih te ka meel koep vengah kan pe ai,’ a tina.” tila te a thui pe.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng awlcuina ah, “He kah thlaang pathum khuiah he thlaanghuuen thli lawng a bawh thlaang kah imbe lovaai te a-u tila na poek?” tila te a doet.
Phungawl cangpueikung lawngah, “Ahih aka reen thlaang te a imbe lovaai la awm.” a tina. Jesuh lawng, “Te atah nang khaw cet langtah te tila te sai van.” a tina.
Jesuh oen a hubang thli te kamyin la cet u tih khaw pakhat a pha u, te ah te Marta aka miingna hutaa pakhat lawng a im ah a pah sak.
Meri aka miingna a manau pakhat awm. Ahih lawngtah Bawipa kah a khow kungah ngawl tih a hih kah cangpueina te a hutung.

Marta tah bii toklek tih hoeng atoeih nawh, tedawngah law tih, “Bawipa, kamah bueng pawng athawh ham ka manau lawng n'ceh taak sut he, n'tula khaw na ngaai nawh aw? Kai he bawm hamla van thui pe lah!” a tina.
Bawipa lawng, ahih nala te, “Marta! Nang lawngtah thaihu yahawh hlang dawngah na lakueng tih na patang,
tede angoe tangtang tah pakhat bueng ni. Meri lawngtah asoeng thaihu te a tuek poen tih ahih tengkah te a-u lawngkhaw rot pe tlaih manawh.” a tina.

Hin at vengah Jesuh tah ahuen pakhat ah thangthui. A thangthui coeng atah a hubang pakhat a tengla law tih, “Bawipa, Johan lawng a hubang thli a cang puei van angla thangthuina te kaimi n'cang puei u van lah,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng na thangthui u vengah tila thui uh: ‘A Pa: Na miing ciim tah hinyahna awm hawn seh; na Ram va pai hawn seh.
Kaimi lawng ka ngoe caak awkk te hin at coeng hin at m'pe lah.

Kaimi sawah thawlhpalhna aka sai boeih te khawdawp ka ngaai u van angla kaimi kah thawlhna he khawdawp van ngaai van lah. Aka rai tangkiik noekdakna te kaimi tengah van pha sak boel’ tila thangthui uh.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang thli tengah, “Thuina maiah, nangmi pakhat khat lawng yiinthuem ah na paya im la na cet tih ahih nala te, Anaang nang, takawi cuun thum ah m'pe de lah.
Ka paya pakhat khawlawng cet tih tapekca ah ka im avan pha tih ka cah ka awh ham caak koei khat khaw ka khueh nawh!’ na tina.
Tevengah na paya lawngah im khui kalawng, ‘Thlaang kawhuet cakbat la khueh boel! Thawh ka khaih poen, ka ca thli oen ka ip u poen. Nang te thaihu peek ham ka tho thai tlaih manawh.’ ti.
