Te atah metila a awm ai? Kavan thui u, ahih te na paya la a awm dawngah tho nawh tih takawi te m'pe nawh de nang lawng yah ohla na bih mangkhak atah ahih lawng tho vetih na ngoe thaihu boeih te m'peek ai.
Tedawngah he he kavan thui u: Bih u lah, m'peek ai; tlap u lah na dang ai, Thawh te khooek u lah, nang ham avan awng ai.
Metihtiah aka bih boeih te a peek ai, aka tlap boeih lawng adang ai, thawh aka khooek boeih ham a awng pe ai.
Na ca lawng nga avan bih vengah ruul aka pe papa nangmi khuiah khat khaw na awm u aw?
Aaidui avan bih vengah celkhuita-ai na peek ai aw?
Thlaangthe la na awm u de ta, na ca thli te thaihu theen peek ham na ming u. Te atah vaan ah aka awm Pa lawng atah Ciim Muithla te aka bih boeih tengah a peek tare ai ta!” a tina.

Raaithe lawng akuun tih awl aka mueh thlaang pakhat kah a kaw khui kalawng raaithe te Jesuh lawngah a hek tih te thlaang te raaithe lawng a ceh taak coeng atah awl cal. Thlaangping tah a kawpoek la rai sut u,
tede, thlaang khatsut lawngtah, “Raaithe thli hek thai hamla huham tharana he raaithe thli kah a bawipa Beelzebul lawng ni a peek,” ti u.
Thlaangtloe lawngtah Jesuh kah a thawlhna te tuuk ham a ngaih u dawngah ahih kah a sai te Pathen ben-kah aka law ni tite tuengsakna ham kawpoek raina sai ham te a bih u.

Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi kah poekna te thiim a ming tih ahimi nala te, “Ram pakhat he amah oen amah athloekla pek u the tih thek u kawinih asan pai thai manawh; imkhuikaw khaw pek u the tih a roep u nawh atah khawsak paw.

Tedawngah Seitan kah ram khaw pakhat oen khat raal u the kawinih metila asan a pai thai ai? Nangmi lawng atah kai lawngah raaithe ka hek he Beelzebul lawngah raaithe hek thaina te kai he a peek na ti u.
Kai lawng Beelzebul rang oen raaithe ka hek atah nangmi kah hubang thli lawng ta metila a hek u? Nangmi na soeng u nawh tite namami kah hubang thli lawng a tueng sak!
Tetih nawh ni, kai lawngah Pathen kah huham tharana oen raaithe ka hek tih, te lawngah te Pathen Ram nangmi teng avan pha poen tite a tueng sak.
Thara thlaang pakhat lawng amah kah aw-vaa boeih oen a im te a toet atah a khueh a toen boeih te sueng.
Tede tha aka ra ngaai bet pakhat lawng a teek tih a taa atah ahih lawng a uepna awva boeih te a lawh pe vetih thaihu thaiha te a rek a ra pe ai.
A-u khaw kai he aka pai puei nawh tah kai he aka raalna thlaang ni; a-u khaw thlaang ka cawitun vengah kai he aka bawmcem nawh tah thlaang aka thekyak thlaang ni.” a tina.

“Raaithe pakhat, thlaang pakhat kah a kaw khui kalawng co tih a ceh vengah, ramhum huhang te a hiil tih a awmna ham ahuen amawl te a tlap. Pakhat khaw a huh nawh veng atah, ‘Ka ceh taak kamah im la te ka meel koep hawn ai.’ tila a poek.
Tedawngah meel koep tih im te aciimbiit la awm tih thaihu thaiha atheenla a kuem heet u te a huh.
Tecoengah cet tih amah lak ah athe eep ngaai atloe raaithe pasarih te avan law puei tih te ah te awm u. Tedawngah te thlaang te tah acuek veng kah lak ah nauh tare ngaai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng tila a thui coengah thlaang tim kah hutaa pakhat lawngah paang tih ahih nala te, “Nang he aka cuunkung oen cawmcahkung tah metihtlukla a awmngaih ai te!” a tina.
Tede Jesuh lawngah, “Pathen awl te a yaak tih aka vai tah metihtlukla a awmngaih tare ai!” a tina.

Thlaangping lawngah Jesuh te a veel khoep u vengah te Jesuh lawng, “Tihin hang kah thlaang thli he the-akk tangkiik! Ahimi lawng kawpoekraina te a bih u, tede Jonah kah kawpoekraina nawh atah atloe khat khaw ka sai manawh.
Nineveh khaaw kah thlaang thli hamla tawngha Jonah te noekna la a awm van angla Thlaanghing Capa he khaw tihin hang kah thlaang thli ham miknoek la awm van ai.

Sheba sengpahrang Nu lawng Solomon kah cuihna awl hutung ham athla hlang amah ram kalawng va law; Awlcekna Khawhin ah ahih lawng pai vetih tihin hang kah thlaang thli he thawlh a peel poen ai; ataktang kavan thui u, Solomon lak ah aka lenduet ngaai he ah he awm.

Nineveh khaaw kah thlaang thli lawng Jonah kah phung thui awl a yaak u dawngah a thawlhna yut u, Awlcekna khawhin ah ahimi lawng pai vetih nangmi te thawlh m'peel poen ai; ataktang kavan thui u, Jonah lak ah aka lenduet ngaai he ah he awm.” a tina.
A-u lawng haiim te a vaang tih thlip khoep nawh, beeldung oen khaw dah khoep nawh; im khuila aka law thlaang thli lawng aangna te a huh thaina ham haivangna dawngah te a khueh.
Pum hamla tah mik he haiim angla awm. Na mik rawi te acaih vengah na pum te aangna oen be; tede na mik rawi te atheen nawh veng atah na pum te yiinna khuiah awm.
Tedawngah na pum dawngah aka awm aangna te yiinna la a coengg nawh ham ngaithuen uh.
Haiim a aangna oen nang te n'thue vengah na pum te aangna oen be tih ame huen maiah khaw yiinna a awm nawh angla na pum boeih te aang ai.” a tina.
Jesuh te awl a thui coeng atah Farasi thlaang pakhat lawng buh ca la ahih te a khue; tedawngah cet tih buh caak hamla te ngawl.
Jesuh lawng buh caak thlan ah kut a silh nawh te Farasi thlaang lawng a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai.
Tedawngah Bawipa lawng ahih nala te, “Nangmi Farasi thlaang thli lawngtah boengloeng oen beel te adauben tah na silh u, tede akhui ben tah tluung-athangna, athe thaihu oen betoet.
Nangmi thlaangngau paathuu thli! Adauben aka sai Pathen lawngah akhuiben te khaw sai nawh aw?
Tede nangmi kah boengloeng oen beel dawngah aka awm te khawdeng thlaang thli te pe u lah, tetih atah soeprep boeih te nangmi ham ciim ai.

Nangmi Farasi thlaang thli ham khawmap tangkiik! Nangmi lawng cuenruek-an, sawngsing oen tawitlim anno Pateng khaw paha ah pakhat te Pathen na peek u, tede nangmi lawngah doengna, Pathen lungna te tah na hadalhna u. He ang thli he na sai hamla awm tih atloe te khaw dalrana ohla sai ham awm.

Nangmi Farasi thlaang thli ham khawmap tangkiik! Nangmi lawng sinakok bok-im ah athloekla ahooep atlaang ngawlhcoen dawngah ngawlh ham oen ah thaihu yoeihna huen ah thlaang kah hinyahna oen voemtoeina te na ngaih u.
Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik mah aw! Nangmi tah thlaang lawng ming nawh tih asawah a cehna miknoekna aka awm nawh thlam oen na la u.” a tina.
Phungawl cangpueikung pakhat lawng ahih nala te, “Saya he tila na thui he kaimi khaw nan sal nan phaam haih poen!” a tina.

Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi Phungawl cangpueikung thli ham khaw khawmap tangkiik! Nangmi lawngah phueih ham aka rai tangkiik thalrih te thlaang na phueih sak u, tede namami lawngtah thalrih te na kutdawn oen Pateng na tek nawh.
Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik mah aw! Nangmi lawngah tawngha thli ham thlann te atheen theenla na sai pe u, te kah tawngha thli te namami kah patuer thli lawng a ngawn u te ni.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng namami kah patuer thli lawngah a sai te na kawtlaak puei u tite na tueng sak u; ahimi lawng tawngha thli te a ngawn u tih nangmi lawng thlann te na sai pe u.
He kawngah he Pathen kah Cuihna lawng, ‘Ahimi tengah tawngha thli oen laipai thli te ka tuih ai; ahimi lawngah khatsut te a ngawn u vetih atloe hue te tah a heem a tek u ai? tila a thui.

Nangmi Phungawl cangpueikung thli ham khawmap tangkiik! Nangmi lawng cuihna im kah thawhka awngna caabi te na kuem khak u; namami khaw na kuun u nawh, kuun ham aka yawm thlaang thli ham khaw na khang pe u!” a tina.
Te kalawng Jesuh te a ceh coeng atah, Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thli lawng ah teveng kalawng tah ahih te a huhhuett tangkiik u poen tih,
a cal thawlhna oen awl a thuina dawngah a thawlhna te tuuk pe ham thaihu kawng alam yahawh hlang te a doet u.

Tevengah thlaangping toeklek nawh te tun u tih amami pakhat oen pakhat te tiil u the; tevengah Jesuh lawng lamhacuekla a hubang hue nala te, ‘Farasi thlaang thli kah tawlru te atheenla ngaithuen uh, ka thui ngaihna tah ahimi kah thailatna te ni.
Muekdah khoep la aka awm thaihu boeih te pho vetih ahuep ahel boeih te a ming sak ai.
Tedawngah yiinna khuiah na thui u te hingthun khawthaih ah a yaak u ai, thawh na khaih khoep u tih ahuepla im khuiah awltuemm na thui u te imphu kalawng a paang puei u ai.” a tina.
“Ka puei thli, kavan thui u, pum bueng he a ngawn thai doek tih atloe athe-eep khat khaw aka sai thai nawh thlaang thli te rih boel.

Nangmi lawng a-u rih ham a awm tite kavan tueng sak ai; Pum he a ngawn coengah hell khuiah thlaak thaina aana aka khueh Pathen te rih uh. Nangmi lawng ahih te ni na rih u ham a awm, kai lawng kavan thui he tangna u lah!
Variit pa-ngaa te pheksaseen pahih la yooei u nawh aw? Pathen lawngtah variit te pakhat khaw hilh nawh.
Na luu dawngkah sam Pateng a toek boeih. Tedawngah rih u boel; nangmi tah variit yahawh hlang lak ah na phu awm ngaai!” a tina.
“Atak tang kavan thui u, a-u khaw kai kah thlaang la ka awm tila langya ah aka thui tah, Thlaanghing Capa lawng ahih te Pathen kah vanthlaang thli haiah ka thlaang ni a tina van ai.
Tede a-u khaw seh langya ah kai he aka hoett tah Thlaanghing Capa lawngah ahih te Pathen kah vanthlaang thli haiah a hoett van ai.
A-u khaw Thlaanghing Capa te oelhtaihna awl aka thui te khawdawp a ngaai pe ai, tede a-u khaw Ciim Muithla te a oelh ataih tih athela aka thui tah khawdawp ngaai pe manawh.
Ahimi lawngah nangmi te sinakok ah khaw, ram ukbawi oen ukkung thli haiah khaw n'khuen u vengah namah oen namah te metila ka phungtu u vetih me ang awl ka thui ai ti khaw lakueng a boel.
Metihtiah nangmi lawng na thui ham koei te Ciim Muithla lawng n'cang puei ai.” a tina.
Thlaangping tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh nala te, “Saya, a pa lawng kaihih boeinau hamla avan ceh taak ro te kai ham thoem avan pek van ham ka maya tengah thui pe lah” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Ka puei, nanghih te awl cek ham oen ah ro pek pe hamla a-u lawng kai he n'khueh?” a tina.
Tecoengah ahimi boeih nala te, “Apueh ngaihna soeprep dawngah kuemsuem u lang tloeng u lah; metihtiah thlaang kah hingna tak tak he bawirengna, khueh toen thaihu dawngah pangtung nawh.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi teng ah he kah thuidoetna he a thui pe: “Voei khat ah kuirang pakhat lawng lo pakhat a toen tih caang theen tangkiik.
Ahih lawngah tila a poek, ‘Caang ka khuehna ham awm tlaih nawh. Me tih ni ka ti lah ai?’ ti.
Tecoengah tila a poek tih, ‘He tila ka sai ai, thaidi boeih te ka phe silang pakhat la kang abo ngaai la ka sai ai, tecoengah te kah thaidi dawngah te caang oen atloe thaihu boeih te ka khueh ai.

Tecoengah kamah oen kamah te nang yotheen kam-awm thlaang! Kum san hlang ham na ngoe thaihu theen boeih te na khueh poen! Thayoeidoh la awm lah, Ca langtah aw lah, ngaimawng ngaitoe la awm lah, ka ti ai’ ti.
Tede Pathen lawng ahih nala te, ‘Nang thlaangngau paathuu! N'tu yiin ah na hingna te boet poen ai; tedawngah namah ham na tung na sep thaihu thli he a-u lawng a paang ai?” a tina.
Tecoengah awlcuina ah Jesuh lawng, “Amah hamla kaawn aka tung aka sep thlaang tah Pathen kah mik huh atah kuirang la awm nawh.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala te, “Tedawngah nangmi lawng na hingna ham angoe caak awkk khaw, na pum ham angoe hinaak himbai khaw lakueng u boel kan tina u.
Hingna he caak awkk lak ah awlpui ngaai tih pum he khaw hinaak himbai lak ah awlpui ngaai ni.

Vang-aak thli ke bueh u lah; ahimi lawng ruk khaw tuh u nawh tih caang khaw aat u nawh. Ahimi lawng khaai khaw khueh u nawh tih caangpai khaw holh u nawh; Tede Pathen lawng a cah a awh! Nangmi he va lak ah na phu tlo ngaai!
Nangmi timkah a-u lawng mai khaw lakuengna rang oen a hingna te bet a cot sak thai ai aw?
He ang thaihu tehca mai Pateng khaw na sai thai u nawh atah, n'tu ham ah atloe thaihu kawngah na lakueng u?

Ramhum kah raipai thli lawng metila a roeng hang tite bueh u lah: ahimi lawng bii khaw bi nawh, amami ham hinaak himbai khaw tak u nawh. Tede nangmi tengah kavan thui tah Solomon sengpahrang Pateng khaw a bawilen hi-acuu a khueh moek de, raipai angla aka theen khat khaw khueh nawh.

Tihin ah hing tih thangvuen ah aka duek pahoei, hai dawngah phuum hamla aka awm sul-aram Pateng khaw Pathen lawng a thoei acaam. Ahih lawngah nangmi te thoei acaam tare nawh ai aw? Nangmi na oengna yawl tangkiik nawh pai he!
Tedawngah nangmi lawng caak awkk kawng te poek khuep oen lakueng u boel.
(Metihtiah Pathen aka ming nawh dilai thlaang thli lawng ni he ang thaihu thli he a thoeh a tham.) Nangmi kah na Pa lawng he ang thaihu na ngoe boeih te a ming.
Amah kah a Ram te awlpuila poek u lah, te atah he thaihu boeih he nangmi m'peek ai.” a tina.
“Rih u boel, metihtiah nangmi te na Pa lawng Vaan Ram peek ham a ngaih.

Nangmi lawng na khueh na toen te yooei u langtah tangka te khawdeng thlaang thli pe uh. Aka pawn thai nawh tangkabawm te namami ham khueh u langtah vaan ah namami ham kaawn te tung asep uh, te huen atah thlaanghuuen lawngkhaw huuen thai nawh tih kuum-akett lawngkhaw a caak thai nawh dawngah metuek khaw boeih manawh.
Metihtiah na thaihu a awmna huen ah te na thinkaw khaw awm yoeyah van ai.” a tina.
“Me ang thaihu a thoeng veng-kah ham khaw oepsoehla awm uh, hinaak himbai te oepsoehla bai-ana u langtah haiim te oepsoehla vaang uh,
yuluipoei kalawng aka meel koep ham koei a bawipa lawng thawh a khooek pe vengah thawhka te pahoei awng pe ham aka ring oepsoeh tuihyoeihthlaang thli angla huertuela awm uh.

A bawipa a law koep vengah huertuela a toet tih oepsoehla aka ring tuihyoeihthlaang thli te tah a yo theen phoeih! Atak tang kavan thui u, ahih lawng amah angki te a pit vetih a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a ngawlh sak coengah ahimi te a do adan ai.
Yiinthuemtaang ah a law ah khaw, cinghue ah a law ah khaw, ahimi oepsoeh la a awm te a huh atah a yo theen phoeih u!
Tecoengah he he ming u lah, Im khuehkung lawng thlaanghuuen a lawna atue te ming kawinih a im te thlaanghuuen muk sak manawh.
Tedawngah nangmi khaw oepsoehla awm uh, metihtiah nangmi lawng na ngaiuep nawh vengah Thlaanghing Capa tah law ai.” a tina.
Piter lawngah, “Bawipa, he thuidoetna he kaimi ham aw na van thui, tihnawhtah thlaang boeih ham aw?” tila a doet.

Bawipa lawngah, “Tetih atah, a-u nuem uep-awm tih aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la aka awm? Ahih tah a bawi lawng tuihyoeihthlaang thli cawmcah ham, atue atang vengah ahimi caak awkk pekung la a khueh te ueppang koei aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la awm ai.
A bawipa a law vengah te tila bii a bi te a huh atah te kah tuih-yoeih thlaang te tah a yotheen phoeih!
Atak tang kavan thui u, te kah tuihyoeihthlaang te amah kah khuehtoen boeih uktemkung la a bawipa lawng a khueh ai.
Tede ‘ka bawipa he law yue tang manawh’ tila a poek tih atloe tuihyoeih-thlaang hutaa khaw, tawngpa khaw a bawh apai tih a caak a awkk tih yuu a ruui atah,

ahih lawng a ngaiuep nawh tih a ming nawh atue atang hin at veng atah a bawipa te a law pe ai. A bawipa lawng ahih te pat a tloek vetih awl ngaai nawh thlaang thli kah paang koei te a paang sak van ai.
A bawipa lawng sai sak ham a ngaih te a ming de aka sai nawh tih oepsoehla aka awm nawh tuihyoeihthlaang te tah dan a tat vetih a bawh doetthloet ai.

Tede a bawipa kah kawngaih ming nawh tih bawh ham koei te aka sai tuihyoeihthlaang tah adoem aphoe ngaai la a bawh ai. Yahawh hlang a peek thlaang tengkah te yahawh hlang a bih van ai; apueh ngaai la a peek thlaang tengkah te apueh la a bih van ai.” a tina.
“Kai tah dilai he hai oen ung sak ham ni ka law, tahe vengah khaw ung poen kawinih ka ngaih!
Kai lawng ka dang ham koei baptisma pakhat awm hun, tete ka coeng thlantoe tah ka kawpoek patang tangkiik mah aw!
Nangmi lawngah kai he dilai dawngah roepna peek hamla va law tila na poek u aw? Nawh ni, roepna nawh tih pekbona peek ham ni ka law.
Tahe kalawng tah imkhuikaw pakhat ah aka awm thlaang pa-ngaa te pek u ai, pathum lawng pahih te a raalna vetih pahih te lawngah pathum te a raalna van ai.

Ana pa thli lawng a capa thli te a raalna vetih a capa thli lawng ana pa thli te a raalna van ai; a manu thli lawng a canu thli te a raalna vetih a canu thli lawngkhaw a manu thli te a raalna van ai; a manii lawng a la-nga te a raalna vetih a la-nga lawngah a manii te a raalna van ai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng thlaangping tengah tila a thui pe, “Nangmi lawng khawtlaak ben kalawng ah muui a yaal hang te na huh u vengah khawtlan ai tila pahoei na thui u tih tlan khoet.
Tecoengah ahot ben-kah yilh a law atah khaw ling ai na ti u tih ling tangtang.
Thlaangthaipalat hue! Nangmi lawng vaan oen dilai he na dan u tih khawtue tah na thui thai u; tetih atah, n'tu ah tahe vengkah atue he tah na ming u thai nawh?” a tina.
Asoeng thaihu te sai ham n'tu ah namami lawngkhaw kaw na poek u nawh?

Thlaang pakhat khat lawng nang te tayacawi ham a ngaih tih awlcekna yungim la n'ceh puei atah, awlcekna yungim na pha thlan vengah ahih oen roeproeina sai. Te tila na sai nawh atah ahih lawng nang te awlcek bawi haiah m'mawt poen ai, awlcekbawi lawng nang te palik kut ah m'peek vetih thongim ah n'thlaak ai.
Ataktang ni kavan thui u, laiba te na sah boeih thlantoe thongim khuiah na awm ai” a tina.
Tevengah te kah aka awm thlaang khatsut lawng Galili thlaang thli Pathen tengah Luciik thawthuengna a sai u vengah Pilat bawi lawng a ngawn kawng te a thui pe u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala, “Te kah Galili thlaang thli, te tila a ngawn u te atloe Galili thlaang thli lak ah aka thawlh ngaai ni tila na poek u aw?
Thawlh koek aih nawh! Atak tang kavan thui u, nangmi khaw na thawlhna te na yut u nawh atah nangmi boeih khaw ahimi angla na duek u van ai.
Siloam kah imtloensang a tlim vengah thlaang paha thlaireet a namm darek tih aka duek hue te ta? Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaangtloe boeih lak ah the koek tila nangmi lawng na poek u aw?
The koek aih nawh! Atak tang kavan thui u, nangmi khaw na thawlhna te na yut u nawh atah nangmi boeih khaw ahimi angla na duek u van ai.” a tina.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng he kah thuidoetna he ahimi tengah a thui pe: “Thlaang pakhat lawngah misurdum khuiah thaidut thing kung at a liing. Ahih lawng cet tih thaidut te thaih aw, thaih nawh aw ti tih a bueh de athaih pakhat khaw hu nawh.

Tedawngah ahih lawng amah kah dumtoetkung nala te, ‘Bueh lah, kum thum puet ah he la he ka law tih thaidut thing he ka bueh de a thaih khat khaw ka hu nawh. Vung hawn loeih! N'tu ah laitheen apoei apit la a vak asah sak?” a tina.
Tede dumtoetkung lawng, “Bawipa kum at tah awm mai de seh; a teng-avai he dilai ka voe pe silang tah laimeen oen ka vui de lah ai.
Cangthok ah a thaih atah theen badai; athaih nawh atah vung mai hawn; a tina.” tila a thui pe.
Sabbath khawhin hin at vengah Jesuh lawng sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei.
Teah te kum ha thlaireet khuiah raaithe lawng a tlawh sak hutaa pakhat te awm; ahih te a uen khuun roepsoet tih doeng sak thai tlaih nawh.
Jesuh lawng ahih te a huh vengah a khue tih, “Hutaa nang, na tlawhna hoeih poen!” a tina.
Ahih lawng a kut te hutaa sawah a tloeng tih hutaa te amah poek ah yauh doeng pahoei tih Pathen te a thangpawm.

Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo a hoeih sak dawngah sinakok bok-im ukkung te a thin sa; tedawngah thlaangping nala te, “Mami lawng bii bina ham khawhin hinruk awm; te khawhin ah te law u langtah thlaangtlo hoeih sak uh, tede Sabbath khawhin atah sai u boel!” a tina.
Bawipa lawng ahih nala te, “Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue! Nangmi lawng Sabbath khawhin ah na vaitaw khaw, lacano khaw seh, a kiingna rui te na thlam pe u tih tui awkk sak ham na mawt u de lah koen.
Tahe ah Seitan lawng kum ha thlaireet khui a piin tih a khawh mangkhak Abraham cadil he ah awm he ta; Sabbath khawhin ah ahih he piin ayeenna kalawng n'loeih sak nawh ai aw? a tina.
Ahih kah awl thungna lawng a raal thli te a yah sak, thlaangping tah ahih kah kawpoekrai thaihu a saina dawngah te awmngaih u.
Jesuh lawngah tila a doet, “Pathen kah Ram he n'tu oen a lawh u? N'tu oen ah ka nuehtah lah ai?
Te tah he oen lo u. Thlaang pakhat lawng antammu te a lawh tih amah dum ah te a heh. Antammu te roeng hang tih thingkung la pai, te atah va thli te law u tih abeek thli dawngah a bu a tuk u.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng “Pathen Ram he n'tu oen ah ka nuehtah lah ai? tila koep a doet.
Te tah he oen lo u. Hutaa pakhat lawng tawlru te a lawh tih ta-ekk hawl thum oen a thoekk haih tih ta-ekk te a rawi sak boeih.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng Jerusalem la a ceh vengah te khawpui boeih oen vangca vangnau ah te cet tih thlaang thli te a cang puei.
Thlaang pakhat lawng ahih nala, “Bawipa, thlaang a yawlca lawng aw thlawnna he a dang ai?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala, “Thawhka ceek ah te kuun ham yawm u lah; thlaang yahawh lawng kuun ham a yawm u ai, tede kuun thai u manawh.

Imkung lawng tho vetih thawh a khaih ai; tevengah adauben ah na pai u vetih thawh te na khooek u ai, “Bawipa, thawh van awng de lah!’ na tina u ai. Ahih lawngah, “Ame kalawng nangmi na law u, kan ming kan tung u moenih.’ ti ai.
Tevengah nangmi lawng, ‘Kaimi he nang oen ah buh aka ca haih ni; kaimi khaw ah nan cang puei u teta!? na tina u ai.
Tede tila koep a thui ai, ‘Nangmi he ame kalawng na law, kan ming nawh. Nangmi thlaangthe thli; atloela cet uh’ n'tina ai.
Nangmi lawng Pathen Ram khuiah Abraham, Isak, Jakob oen tawngha thli te na huh u ai. Nangmi tah adauben ah na rap vetih na naw te cakcak na rueng u ai!
Khawcuuk, khawtlaak, aluen ben akakk ben kalawng thlaang law u vetih Pathen Ram khuiah poei buh a veel haih u ai.
Tevengah te tahe ah hukhueng la aka awm he lamhacuekla awm vetih tahe ah lamhacuekla aka awm he hukhueng la awm ai.” tila a thui pe.
Tevengah te Farasi thlaang khatsut a tengla law u tih Jesuh nala te, “Herod lawng nang he ngawn ham a ngaih dawngah he kalawng atloela cet loeih” a tina u.

Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Tihin ah khaw, thangvuen ah khaw, kai lawng raaithe thli te ka hek vetih thlaangtlo te ka hoeih sak hun ai, a thum hin ah bii ka coeng ai.” tila cet u langtah metaang tengah te thui pe uh.” a tina.

Me tih khaw seh, kai ngoen tah tihin ah khaw, thangvuen ah khaw, awmvai ah khaw ka sai nooek te ka sai toengtoeng hun ai; metihtiah tawngha pakhat he Jerusalem khawpui khui nawh atah atloe ame huen ah khaw ngawn ham theen nawh.

“Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Nang lawng tawngha thli te na ngawn, Pathen lawng na tengah avan tuih laipai thli te khaw lungto oen na de u! Aainu lawng a ca thli te a phe oen a khuk adah angla na thlaang thli te ka pooem hamla voei yahawh hlang ka ngaih de nang lawng ah na thana.

Tedawngah nangmi kah Tempal bok-im te a hoett poen ai. Atak tang kavan thui u, ‘Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe hawn seh’ tila nangmi lawng na thuina atue te apha thlantoe kai he nan hu u tlaih manawh.” a tina.
Sabbath khawhin hin at vengah Jesuh tah Farasi thlaang thli mawtkung pakhat im la te buh pan la cet; tevengah thlaang thli lawng Jesuh te rep a doen u.
Thlaang pakhat a kut a khaw aka phiing te Jesuh tengla va law,
tevengah Jesuh lawng Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang thli te, “Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath khawhin ah thlaangtlo hoeih sak ham a ngaih aw, ngaih nawh aw?” tila a doet.
Tede ahimi te awlmueh la awm u. Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo te a khue, a hoeih sak tih a tuih.
Tecoengah ahimi nala te, “Nangmi timkah thlaang pakhat kah a ca mai khaw, tihnawhtah vaitaw khaw, Sabbath khawhin ah ungrawmdung ah tla kawinih nangmi lawng doek pahoei ohla na awm ai aw?” a tina.
Tede he kawngah he ahimi lawng awl thung pe u nawh.
Kamyin khatsut lawngah huen theen koek a tuek u te Jesuh lawng a huh, tedawngah he kah thuidoetna he ahimi boeih tengah a thui pe:
‘Thlaang pakhat khat lawng yuluina poei ah n'ceel vengah huen theen koek ah ngawl u boel. Nang lak ah awlpuila aka awm hinyah koei ngaai thlaang khaw a ceel thai mai,
tevengah nang hih te aka ceelkung lawngah na tengla law vetih nang nala te, ‘He ah he ahih ngawl seh.’ n'tina ai. Tevengah nang tah yah laat la ahemkoek huen ah te na ngawl ai.

Tedawngah nang te thlaang lawng n'khue vengah cet langtah ahemkoek huen ah te ngawl mai hawn, te atah nang te imkung lawng na tengla law vetih, ‘Ka puei, huen theen ngaai dawngah ngawl.’ ti ai. He tila te nang tah atloe kamyin boeih haiah hinyahna na dang ai.
A-u khaw amah oen amah a pawm sang u atah adangla tla ai, a-u khaw amah oen amah adangla aka awm tah a pawmsang u ai.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng imkung nala te, “Nang lawngah hingthun buh khaw, thlembuh khaw, buh pan la thlaang na khue vengah na paya thli khaw, na imbe kuirang thlaanglen thli khaw khue boel. Metihtiah ahimi lawng nang te n'khue u van vetih te tila nang lawng na sai te avan thung van ai.
Nang lawng poei na sai vengah khawdeng thlaang, kut ngun khaw-ngun thlaang thli, kutkheem khowkheem thlaang thli oen mikpum thlaang thli te khue;
ahimi lawngtah nang te n'thung koep thai nawh vetih nang lawng yotheenna na dawng ai. Thlaangdoeng thli duekna kalawng a thawhna khawhin ah Pathen lawng nang te n'thung badai.” a tina.
Te kah buh veelna ah aka ngawl thlaang pakhat lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Jesuh nala te, “Pathen Ram khuikah buhlawi poei ah aka thuum van tah yotheen aka dawng ni!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Thlaang pakhat lawng buhlawi a thawng tih thlaang yahawh thlaang te a ceel.
Buhlawi tel ham atue te a khoek veng atah kamyin thli te khue hamla amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang te a tuih tih, “Law u loeih, soeprep boeih te coekroek la awm poen!” a tina.

Tede ahimi boeih pakhat coeng pakhat lawngah peelnangna awl te a thui u. Lamhacuek kah thlaang lawngah tuihyoeihthlaang te tila a thui pe, “Lo ka lai tih ka cet silang ka bueh de ai; ka law thai manawh n'reen mai hawn.” a tina.
Thlaang pakhat lawngah, ‘Vaitaw bawh ngaa ka lai tih ka phep hamla awm; ka law thai manawh, n'reen mai hawn.’ a tina.
Thlaangtloe pakhat lawngtah, ‘Ka yu ka lawh pek tih ka law thai manawh.’ a tina.

“Tuihyoeihthlaang te meel koep tih he ang thli boeih he a bawi manghai tengah a thui pe. Bawi manghai tah a thin sa tih a tuihyoeihthlaang nala te, ‘Khawpui khuikah lawngpui boeih oen imkep imvaai ah aloela cet langtah khawdeng thli, mikpum haaiying thli, kutngun, khowngun thli, kut kheem khow kheem thli te van law puei.’ a tina.
Bawt a awm atah tuihyoeihthlaang lawngah, ‘Bawipa, na awlpeek angla ka sai poen, tede awmna ham ahuen hoeng hun.’ a tina.
Tedawngah a bawi manghai lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang nala te, ‘Ka im khuiah thlaang abetoetna ham manglai lawngpui oen lawnglak boeih ah cet langtah thlaang boeih te van law puei.
Atak tang kavan thui, acuek kah thlaangceel thli a-u khat lawngkhaw ka buh ka aan he teng alai manawh.’ a tina” tila a thui pe.
Voei khat vengah thlaangping yahawh hlang lawng Jesuh oen a ceh haih u vengah ahimi benla te maang tih tila a thui pe.

“A-u khaw ka tengla aka law thlaang thli lawngah a manu oen ana pa te a lungna lak ah khaw, a yu oen a ca thli te a lungna lak ah khaw, a maya manau thli oen a ngannu thli te a lungna lak ah khaw, amah oen amah te a lungna u lak ah khaw kai he aka lungna ngaai nawh tah ka hubang la awm thai ma-nawh.
A-u khaw amah kah thinglam te kawh ruila ka hu ah aka law nawh tah ka hubang la coengg thai manawh.
Nangmi tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng imtloensang sak ham a kamthlah atah, bii coengna hamla tangka khoek ai aw tite ming ham lamhala ngawl vetih me yoeh aboeih ai tite a nai anawng ai.
Te tila a nai anawng lamha nawh atah bii a tong tih lungdang a suem coengah imtloensang a sak te coeng thai nawh vetih thlaang lawngah a nuihna ai.
‘He thlaang lawngah he imtloensang tah a sak de bii khaw coeng thai nawh!’ ti u ai.

Sengpahrang pakhat ahih te teek ham raalkap thongkul oen aka law atloe sengpahrang pakhat te a raalkap thong ha oen kah hamla a ceh atah ahih lawng ngawl lamha vetih te sengpahrang te ka taa thai ai aw tite a poek ai.
A taa thai koei nawh atah ahih te teek ham aka law sengpahrang te athla hlangla a awm vengah laipai a tuih vetih roeproeina awl te a thui sak ai.” tila a thui pe.
Jesuh lawng awlcuina ah, “Tetih van angla nangmi timkah pakhat lawngah soeprep boeih te a hoett nawh atah ka hubang la coengg thai manawh.” a tina.
“Lungkeh tah theen, tede a aalna te a moelh atah aal sak koep ham sai thai la awm tlaih nawh.
Laitheen la khaw, laimeen la khaw sai ham theen tlaih nawh; voeih ham ni a awm poen. Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah ya seh!” a tina.
Hin at ah mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaangthawlh thli tah Jesuh kah awl thui hutung hamla law u,
Farasi thlaang thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli tah caitoek u tih, “He thlaang lawngah he thlaangthawlh thli khaw a do tih ahimi oen buh Pateng khaw a caak haih u nawh pai he!” ti u.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah he kah thuidoetna he a thui pe;

Nangmi khuikah thlaang pakhat lawngah tuu yakhat khueh mai tih tuuping timkah pakhat te auh mai kawinih n'tu a sai ai? Ahih lawng tuu sawmkua pakua te ramtliim saino a awmna ramhum ah te a ceh taak vetih tuu aka auh te a dang thlantoe a tlap.
A dang koep veng atah awmngaih tangkiik tih a lengpang dawngah a kawh tih im la meel.
Tecoengah a paya thli oen a imbe kah thlaang thli te a khue tun tih ahimi nala te, “Ka awmngaih tangkiik, tuu aka auh vik te ka dang koep poen, n'awmngaih puei u lah!’ a tina.

Atak tang kavan thui u, tetih van angla thawlhna yut ham aka ngaih nawh thlaangdoeng sawmkua pakua lak ah thlaangthawlh pakhat lawng thawlhna a yut dawngah vaan ah awmngaihna yahawh ngaai awm ai.” a tina.

“Hutaa pakhat lawngah ngun tangka pheek ha a khueh ti mai lah sih, te khuikah pakhat te a auh atah n'tu a sai ai? Ahih lawng haiim te a vaang coengah im te a tell tih a huh thlantoe im khui tawm ah a tlap.
A huh koep veng atah a paya thli oen a imbe kah thlaang thli te a khue tun tih ahimi nala te, ‘Ka awmngaih tangkiik, ngun tangka aka auh te ka dang koep poen, ng'awmngaih puei u lah! a tina.
Atak tang kavan thui u, tetih van angla thlaangthawlh pakhat lawng a thawlhna a yut dawngah Pathen kah vanthlaang thli tah awmngaih u.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng awl thui a tom koep tih, “Voei khat ah capa pahih aka khueh thlaang pakhat awm.
A capa anoca lawngah te, ‘A Pa, ka paang ham koei ro te tahe ah m'pe mai hawn’ a tina. Tedawngah te kah thlaang lawngah a capa pahih ham ro te a pek pe.

Hin hih, hin thum coeng atah a capa anoca lawng te amah kah thaihu thli te a yoeih, tangka te a khuen tih atloela te cet. Ahih tah athlahlang ram la cet, te ah te awmtheen awmyaal aboen tih tangka a pooek ayak.
A khueh boeih te thloep a hawna. Tecoeng atah te kah ram pum ah te khawthe khawkha tih te vengah te ahih tah n'tu khat khaw khueh tlaih nawh.
Tedawngah te ram kah thlaang pakhat tengah bii bi hamla te cet, te kah thlaang lawng ahih te lo la a tuih tih awk a doen sak.
Ahih te a-u khat lawngkhaw caak koei a peek nawh dawngah awkbuh dawngkah maicik maidawn cang te a naai poen.
Hukhueng atah a lungcuih pan tih tila ti, ‘A pa kah bii aka bi thlaang thli lawng caak lek awkknaa nawh la buh a khueh u, kai tah he ah he ka lamlum tawm poen!
Ka tho silang a pa tengla ka cet ai, tecoengah tila ka tina ai, ‘A pa, Pathen oen nang sawah ka thawlh tangkiik poen.
Na ca ti hamla ka koeih tlaih nawh; namah kah bii aka bi thlaang la khaw n'khueh mai hawn, ka tina ai, tila a poek.
Tecoengah tho tih ana pa tengla te koep meel. “Im kalawng athlana ah a law vengah te ana pa lawng a huh dinn tih a reen tangkiik, heeng phai tih a capa te koe a kop tih a mok.
A capa lawng, ‘A pa, Pathen oen nang sawah ka thawlh tangkiik oh poen. Na capa ti ham ka koeih tlaih nawh.’ a tina.
Tede ana pa lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a khue tih, ‘Angki theen koek te aloela van khuen u lang buen sak uh. Kutcabuen te buen sak u langtah khawmuek te khaw muek sak uh.
Tecoengah cet u langtah vaitaw sak-awm paduuk te van khuen u langtah ngawn uh, poei sai u sih!
Metihtiah ka capa he duek poen de tahe ah hing koep; ahih tah vi vik poen de tahe ah phumpho koep.’ a tina. Tecoeng atah poei te a sai u.
“Te veng ah te a capa ahaamca te lo ah awm. Lawngpueng a law phai veng im a pha tawm atah riingding tum awl oen laa sak laam awl te a yaak.
Ahih lawngah a tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat te a khue tih a doet, ‘N'tu a sai u?’ a tina.
Tuihyoeihthlaang lawng ah, ‘Na nau te im la law koep tih sading ngaimawng la avan pha koep dawngah na pa lawng vaitaw sak-awm paduuk te a bawh pe.’ a tina.
A capa ahaam te a thin sa soeh tih im khuila kuun nawh; Te atah ana pa te law tih im khuila kuun ham a capa te a thloep ahoelh.

Tede a capa lawng ana pa nala te, “Bueh lah, kum san hlang sal angla nang ham bii ka bi, na awl te ngaai ohla vai khat khaw ka awm nawh. Kai ta n'tu nan peek? Ka paya thli oen awmtheenna poei sai ham me-ee pum at Pateng khaw nan pe nawh!
Tede nang kah koe-ava te poeihcaih mai la thlaanghalhnu oen aka hawna na capa he im la a law koep atah vaitawca sak-awm te na bawh pe!’ a tina.
Ana pa lawng, ‘Ka ca, nang tah kamah tengah na awm tih ka toen thaihu boeih he nang kah thaihu ni.
Tede na nau he tah duek poen de tahe ah hing koep; ahih tah vi poen de tahe ah phumpho koep, tedawngah ka awmngaih tih poei ka sai u,’ tila a thui pe.” a tina.

Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah, “Vai khat ah kuirang pakhat awm tih thaihu kuemkung tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat a khueh. Thaihu kuemkung lawngah a bawipa kah tangka apoei-oepla a hawna tila kuirang tengah a thui pe u,
Tedawngah ahih te a khue tih, ‘Nang kah kawng alam ka yaak he metila a awmna? Ka thaihu boeih na kuemna cayin te m'pe loeih, nang tah thaihu kuemkung la na awm tlaih manawh.’ a tina.
Te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng a kaw khuiah, ‘Ka bawipa lawng kai he bii n'toeng sak poen ai. Metila ka ti lah ai? Tuilong to ham khaw ka tha lawng noeng koek nawh, Buh bih kutduen ham tah ka yak.
N'tu ka sai ai tite ka ming poen! Te tila ka sai atah ka bii he aboet ah khaw a im ah aka awm sak ham paya thli ka khueh poen ai.’ ti.
Tedawngah a bawipa kah laiba aka khueh thli te a khue. Lamhacuek kah thlaang te, ‘Ka bawipa kah lai meyoeh na ba pe?’ tila a doet.
Ahih lawngah, ‘Olif situi pung yakhat ka ba pe’ a tina. Thaihu kuemkung lawng, ‘He he nang kah cayin seh, ngawl thuk, sawm ngaa la mah thut mai hawn.’ a tina.

Tecoengah atloe pakhat te, ‘Nang ta, lai meyoeh na ba?’ tila a doet. Ahih lawngah, ‘Caanghum suum thong khat ka ba,’ a tina. Thaihu kuemkung lawng, ‘He he nang kah cayin seh, yareet la thut mai.’ a tina.

Te kah thaihu kuemkung lawng cuihna oen te tila thaihu a sai dawngah a bawipa lawng a koeh; metihtiah he dilai thlaang thli lawng amami kah thaihu a sai vengah aangna khuiah aka awm thlaang thli lak ah cuih u ngai.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Tedawngah kavan thui u: dilai bawilenna koeva oen paya laikoei sai uh, bawilenna koeva aboeih coeng dengah ni dungyan im ah nangmi te n'khueh ai.
A-u khaw thaihu tehca dawngah uep-awm la a awm atah thaihu bo hlang dawngah khaw uep-awm la awm van ai; a-u khaw thaihu tehca dawngah uep-awm nawh atah thaihu bohlang dawngkhaw uep-awm van manawh.
Tecoengah dilai bawilenna koeva khoembelna dawngah uep-awm nawh atah metila bawilenna koeva tang tang te nangmi m'peek ai?
Tecoengah thlaang kah koeva thaihu dawngah uep-awm nawh atah namami kah thaihu te a-u lawng m'peek tang ai?

“Me ang tuihyoeihthlaang lawngkhaw bawi manghai pahih kah sal la awm thai manawh, ahih lawng pakhat te a thina vetih a khat te a lungna ai; pakhat teng atah a ciil cak vetih a khat te tah a hel acal ai. Nangmi lawng Pathen oen tangka kah bii te pahih bok la na bi renten thai manawh” a tina.
Tangka aka ngaih soeh Farasi thlaang thli lawng he kah awl boeih he a yaak u vengah Jesuh te a nuihna u.

Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng thlaangtloe kah mik huh atah thlaangdoeng la na sa u, tede nangmi kah thinkaw lungbui te Pathen lawng a ming. Metihtiah thlaang lawngah phutlo tangkiik la a poek thaihu thli he Pathen mik huh atah a phu awm nawh.

Mosi kah Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cathut te tah Baptisma pekung Johan dung toe ah ni a cak; tecoeng kalawng tah Pathen Ram kawng Awlthang Theen te a phawng u tih thlaang boeih lawng toklekla kuun u.
Phungawl dawngkah a yitt koek a dek yet te a auh lak atah vaan oen dilai a auh te yoei ngaai.
“A-u lawngkhaw a yu te a ma tih yu tloe a lawh atah samphaih poen; tecoengah yu thlaak hutaa te khaw aka yuna thlaang tah samphaih poen ni,” a tina.
Voei khat tah kuirang thlaang pakhat awm tih hinaak himbai phutlo oen thoekcau u tih hin roekk ah awmtheen a boenn.
Khawdeng thlaang pakhat Lazaruh aka miingna te awm van tih apum araw boeih ah vueihacang-ing lawng a yaawl, kuirang thlaang kah thawhka toela te avan law puei u,
kuirang thlaang kah caboi dawng kalawng aka tla buhdik anhaai te caak hamla a ngaiuep. Ui Pateng khaw law tih ahih kah vueihacang-ing te a leh pe.
“Khawdeng thlaang te a duek atah vaan kah poeipui ah Abraham tengah ngawlh sak hamla vanthlaang thli lawng a ceh puei u. Kuirang thlaang te khaw duek van tih a up u.
Ahih tah Hell khuiah patang a khang, athlahlangla a dan hang vengah Abraham tengah Lazaruh aka ngawl te a huh.

Te atah paang tih a khue, ‘A pa, Abraham! Kai he n'reen mai langtah Lazaruh te van tuih lah, a kutpue te tui dawngah nuemm selang ka daang he van suul lah seh, he kah hai khuiah he patang ka khang sut oh poen!’ a tina.

Tede Abraham lawngah, ‘Ka capa, na hing khui puet ah thaihu theen boeih te m'peek poen, Lazaruh lawngtah athe thaihu boeih adang te ming lah saw. Tede, tahe ah ahih tah he ah he awmtheen a boenn tih nang tah patang na khang poen.

Tecoengah mami kah laklaw ah longhoi dung pakhat awm, tedawngah he kalawng ah he nang na awmna benla laan hamla aka ngaih thli khaw laan thai nawh, nang na awmna kalawng kaimi benla he a-u khatca khaw laan thai nawh? a tina.
Kuirang thlaang lawngah, ‘Tetih atah, A pa Abraham, reenna kavan bih, Lazaruh te a pa im la tuih lah,
te ah te ka manau thli pa ngaa awm hun. Lazaruh te tuih langtah ahimi khat lawngah khaw he kah patang khangna ahuen he avan phana u nawh ham ahimi tengah ngaithuenna awl van thui pe lah seh.’ a tina.
Abraham lawngah, ‘Na manau hue te ngaithuen awl thui pe ham Mosi oen tawngha thli awm ta,’ ahimi kah awl thui te na nau hue lawng hutung ngoen seh,” a tina.
Kuirang thlaang lawngah, ‘A pa Abraham, tete khoek nawh! Thlaang pakhat khat he duekna kalawng tho tih cet kawinih ahimi lawngah a thawlhna te yut ai,’ a tina.
Tede Abraham lawngah, ‘Ahimi lawngah Mosi oen tawngha thli kah awl te a hutung u nawh atah thlaang pakhat khat duekna kalawng tho mai cakhaw ahimi lawng tangna manawh,’ tila a thui pe,” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah, “Thawlhna khuiah thlaang aka tlaak sak thaihu thli awm ngai khoek ai, tede te ang tlaakna te aka sai thlaang thli ham tah khawmap tangkiik!
He camaw tim kah pakhat mai khaw thawlh sak lak atah caang neetna lungto bohlang a rawn a awi tih tuitunlii khuiah tla kawinih ahih ham theen bet ai.
Tedawngah na sai ham koei te ngaithuen uh! Na boenhui te a thawlh atah ahih te toel athaam, a yut alawi atah a sawah khawdawp ngaai peh.
Ahih lawng hin at ah voei sarih na sawah thawlhna a sai tih voei sarih van na tengah law tih, ‘Ka yut oh poen,’ a ti atah a sawah khawdawp van ngaai peh,” a tina.
Celtuih thli lawng Bawipa nala, “Kaimi kah oengna he van roeng sak lah,” a tina u.

Bawipa lawngah, “Nangmi lawng antammu teh mai mah oengna te na khueh u atah he kah songlet thing he, ‘Na yung oen haih ah namah poek ah phuk u langtah tuitunlii ah namah poek ah liing u lah,’ na tina atah nangmi awl te avan ngaai ai,” a tina.

“Nangmi tim kah thlaang pakhat lawngah laithawl aka sai mai khaw, tuudoen mai khaw seh tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat na khueh ti mai lah sih. Ahih te lo kalawng law tih a paipuek ah, ‘Aloela buh ca loeih’ na tina u ai aw?

Na tina u manawh! Te tila na tina lak ah nang lawng, ‘Kai hamla thlembuh van lo de lah, tecoengah rangkhukna angki te buen langtah buh ka caak vengah kai he n'toet de lah; tecoengah buh te na caak badai,’ na tina ai.
Te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng awl a ngaai dawngah te awmngaih awl thui pe ham ngoe nawh de lah koen?
Nangmi khaw te tila na awm u van, sai hamla avan thui boeih te na sai u coengah, ‘Kaimi tah tuihyoeihthlaang mai ni; kamami kah sai ham koei te ni ka sai u’ ti u mai hawn,” tila a thui pe.
Jerusalem khaw benla Jesuh a ceh phai vengah Samaria oen Galili laklaw ramri ah te cet.
Vangca pakhat la ahih te a kuun vengah haibe aka na thlaang paha a tengla law u. Ahimi lawngah athlala hoer pai u tih,
“Bawipa Jesuh! Kaimi he n'reen lah!” tila paang u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te a huh vengah, “Cet u langtah nangmi te khawsoeih thli lawngah n'yutt n'yam u seh.” a tina. Lawngpueng a ceh phai u vengah ahimi tah boeih hoeih u.
Ahimi tim kah pakhat lawngah ka hoeih poen tila a ming vengah, meel koep tih angaihhlangla Pathen te a koeh.
Jesuh kah a khowkungah dilai dawng buekuep tih Jesuh tengah uemna awl a thui. Te thlaang te tah Samaria thlaang ni.
Jesuh lawng, “Thlaang paha hoeih u de lah koen ni, atloe pakua hue teta mela oh kai?
N'tu ah he kah thlaangphun tloe pakhat bueng lawngah Pathen thangpawm ham a va meel koep?” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Tho lang cet loeih; na oengna lawng n'hoeih sak poen,” a tina.
Farasi thlaang khatsut lawng Jesuh nala te, “Pathen Ram he mevengah avan pha ai,’ tila a doet u. Ahih lawng awl a thung pe tih, ‘Pathen Ram he tah huh thai koeila law manawh.
A-u lawngkhaw, ‘Bueh lah he ah awm he! tihnawhtah, te ah awm te!’ tila thui thai manawh, metihtiah Pathen Ram tah namami khuiah ni a awm.” a tina.
Tecoengah a hubang hue te, “Thlaanghing Capa kah Khawhin hin at te nangmi lawng huh hamla na ngaihna atue law ai, tede nangmi lawng na hu u manawh.
Nangmi tengah, ‘Bueh lah, ke ah awm ke!’ tihnawhtah, ‘Bueh lah, he ah awm he!’ tila aka thui thlaang awm ai. Tede tlap hamla cet u boel.
Thlaanghing Capa kah khawhin tah khaw thlap apha vengah khawhi-mikboet akhatben kalawng khatben toe ah a aangna lawng a thue rawngtheng angla te awm ai.
Tede ahih lawngah lamhala patang palai a khang vetih tihin hang kah thlaang thli lawng ahih te a hoett u ai.
Noah dung vengkah a awm angla te Thlaanghing Capa kah khawhin vengah khaw awm van ai.
Noah te lowng khuila a kuun khawhin toe ah thlaang thli lawng a caak a awkk u tih hutaa tawngpa lawng yu a lawh u tih vaa a sak u, tuiliwpui law khuengdeng tih ahimi te boeih a khuk.
Lot dung vengah a awm angla te awm van ai. Thlaang boeih lawng a caak a awkk u, thaihu a lai u tih a yoeih u, thingkung rawkung a liing u tih im a sak u.
Lot lawng Sodom khaaw te a thawh taak hin vengah vaan kalawng hai oen kat hai te, khaw angla tlan tih ahimi boeih te a ngawn.
Thlaanghing Capa kah khawhin a thoeng vengah khaw te tila awm van ai.
Te khawhin ah amah kah imphu ah aka awm lawng a thaihu thli te lawh hamla im khuila kuun re tlaih boel seh; te tila te lo ah aka awm thlaang lawngkhaw im la meel koep tlaih boel seh.
Lot kah a yu te hilh u boel!
A-u khaw a hingna te thlawn hamla a yawm atah a hingna te sung ai; A hingna te a sung atah hingna te a dang ai.
Nangmi tengah kavan thui u, te kah khawhin ah ihkhun dawngah aka ip haih thlaang pahih khuiah pakhat te a lawh vetih a khat te a ceh taak ai,
Sum deeng haih hutaa pahih khuiah pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai.
Lo ah bii aka bi haih thlaang pahih khuiah pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai.” a tina.
A hubang hue lawng ahih te, “Bawipa, te tila te me tuek ah a awm ai?” tila a doet u. Jesuh lawngah, “Duek rawkk a awmna roekk ah langta thli tun ai,” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te thathe muehla thangthui poepa ham awm tite cangpueina hamla thuidoetna pakhat ahimi tengah a thui pe.
Ahih lawngah, “Khawpui pakhat ah Pathen khaw rih nawh tih thlaang khaw aka hinyah nawh awlcekbawi pakhat awm.
Te kah khawpui khuiah te huhai pakhat awm van, ahih lawngah awlcekbawi tengla law tih, ‘Ka raal te a dokna ham n'bawm de lah!’ tila a bih poepa.
Awlcekbawi lawng a thana khiing de aboet lam atah, ‘Kai lawng Pathen Pateng ka rih nawh tih thlaang khaw ka hinyah nawh,
he kah huhainu lawng he n'lawn khiing aih poen dawngah awl ka tloek pe mai poen ai. Te tih nawh kawinih law poepa vetih hukhueng atah kamah he patang m'peek lat ai!? ti.” a tina.
Tecoengah Bawipa lawng, “Adoengla awl aka cek nawh awlcekbawi kah awl te hutung u lah.
Te atah amah tengah khawyiin khawdaai paang tih bawmna aka bih thlaang thli ham ah Pathen lawng adoengla awl te cek nawh ai aw? Ahimi te bawm hamla a tat loe nawh ai aw?
Nangmi tengah kavan thui, ahih lawngah ahimi kah ngaihna angla awl a cek vetih aloela a sai pe ai. Tede Thlaanghing Capa lawng a Law vengah dilai sawah he oengna te a huh ai aw?” a tina.
Amah kah theenna te a uepna tih thlaang boeih te tula aka sak nawh thlaang thli tengah he kah thuidoetna he Jesuh lawng a thui pe.
“Voei khat ah thlaang pahih tah thangthui hamla Tempal bok-im la cet hih: Pakhat te tah Farasi thlaang la awm tih a khat te tah mangmu cawikung la awm.

Farasi thlaang lawngtah amah bueng pai tih, “Aw, Pathen, kai tah ngaihmoekna aka khueh thlaang, hoem thui thlaang, samphaih thlaang, he ang thlaang thli angla ka awm nawh dawngah kan uem tangkiik. He kah mangmu cawikung angla khaw ka awm nawh dawngah kan uem baal
Kai tah yarh khat ah hin hih buh ka yeh tih, tangka ka dang boeih khuikah paha ah pakhat te nang kan peek.” tila thangthui.
Tede mangmu cawikung tah athlala pai tih vaan benla Pateng maang ha nawh, a raang te a tum tih, ‘Aw Pathen, kai thlaangthawlh he n'reen lah,’ tila thangthui.

Nangmi tengah kavan thui u, mangmu cawikung lawng Pathen haiah doengna te a huh tih im la meel. Farasi thlaang lawng atah doengna te hu nawh. A-u khaw amah oen amah a pawmsang u atah adangla tla vetih a-u khaw amah oen amah te adangla aka awm tah a pawmsang u ai.
Thlaang khatsut lawng a ca camaw thli te Jesuh lawngah a sawah a kut tloeng pe selang tah thangthui pe seh a ti u dawngah Jesuh tengla avan law puei u. A hubang hue lawng a huh u tih ahimi te a ho u,
tede Jesuh lawng camaw thli te amah tengla a khue tih, “Camaw thli te ka tengla law seh, ahimi te kanghalh u boel, metihtiah Pathen Ram tah he ang camaw thli kah ni.
He he hilh u boel! A-u lawngkhaw Pathen Ram te camaw angla a do nawh atah te Ram ah kuun manawh.” a tina.
Judah thlaang mawtkung pakhat lawng Jesuh te, “Cangpueikung Saya Theen, dungyan hingna ka dangna ham n'tu ka sai ai? tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng ahih te, “N'tu ah kai he thlaang theen nan tina? Pathen pakhat bueng nawh atah a-u khat khaw theen nawh.” a tina.
Awlpeek thli te na ming te ta: ‘Hutaa tawngpa thawlhna sai boel; thlaang ngawn boel; huuen boel; asoeng nawh la thlaang te thawlh peel boel; na nu oen na pe te hinyah;’ ti de lah koen.” a tina.
Te thlaang lawngah, “He kah awlpeek boeih he ka camaw veng kalawng ka vai boeih poen.” a tina.

Jesuh lawng he awl he a yaak vengah ahih nala te, “Nang lawng na sai ham pakhat a ngoe toengtoeng hun. Na khueh boeih te yooei langtah tangka te khawdeng thli te peh, te atah nang lawng vaan ram ah koeva thaihu na dang ai; tecoengah law langtah ka hu ah bang lah.” a tina.
Tede te kah thlaang lawng he awl he a yaak vengah a kaw la the malcal, metihtiah ahih tah broela a bawi alen dawngah ni.
Jesuh lawng ahih kah kawthe te a huh vengah, “Kuirang thlaanglen ham tah Pathen Ram khuiah kuun hamla rai tangkiik oh he!
Kala-uk pakhat phaimeet khuiah a kuun lak ah kuirang thlaang pakhat lawng Pathen Ram khuiah kuun ham rai tangkiik,” a tina.
Ahih kah awlthui te aka ya boeih lawngah, “Tetih atah a-u lawng thlawnna te a dang ai,” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng, “Thlaanghing ham aka coengg thai tlaih nawh te Pathen ham tah coengg thai.” tila a thui pe.
Tecoengah Piter lawng, “Bueh lah! Na hu ah bang hamla kaimi lawngtah ka im khaw ka ceh taak u poen he.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Oeih, atak tang kavan thui u, a-u khaw Pathen Ram kawngah a im khaw, a yu a ca thli khaw, maya manau khaw, a manu oen ana pa khaw, ca-anau thli khaw aka ceh taak tah,
tahe san ah khaw, a pueh alawila a dang vetih aka law ham koei san ah khaw dungyan hingna te a dang ai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng hubang thlaihih te ahuep ahelna ah a ceh puei tih, “Hutung u lah! Mami he Jerusalem la n'cet u ai, te ah te tawngha thli lawng Thlaanghing Capa kawng a thut oepsoeh boeih te soep ai.
Ahih te Gental thlaang thli kut ah a peek u vetih nuihbu la a sai u ai, a sal aphaam u vetih a tumthoeih u ai.
Ahimi lawngah a bawh u vetih a ngawn ai, tede athum hin ah tho koep ai.” tila a thui pe.
Tede a hubang hue lawng he ang thli he khat khaw yaakming u nawh; ahimi ham tah he kah awl thuingaihna he thuhphah la awm tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe akawng alam he ming u nawh.
Jesuh tah Jeriko khaaw te a pha tawm, tevengah lawngteng ah mikpum thlaang pakhat ngawl, kut a duen tih buh a bih.
Ahih lawngah thlaangping kah ceh tuen awl te a yaak vengah, “He he n'tu muuem ca?” tila thlaang thli te a doet.
Ahimi lawngah, “Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh va law” a tina u.
Ahih lawngah paang tih, “Devid capa, Jesuh! Kai he n'reen lah.” a tina.
Hai ben kah aka cet thlaangping lawngah ahih te a tlung u tih duem awm ham a thui pe u. Tede ahih lawngah angaihhlangla paang tare tih, “Devid capa, kai he n'reen lah!” a tina.
Tevengah Jesuh te cot pai tih te kah mikpum te a tengla te van law puei uh a tina. A teng avan pha atah Jesuh lawngah,
“Nang hamla n'tu kavan sai ai?” tila a doet. Ahih lawng, “Bawipa, ka mik he a tueng koep ham ka ngaih.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Na mik tueng koep seh! Na oengna lawng na mik avan tueng sak poen.” a tina.
Ahih te a mik tueng pahoei, Jesuh hu ah bang tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui. Te tila a awm te thlaangping lawng a huh vengah ahimi boeih lawng Pathen te a thangpawm u veng.
Jesuh tah Jeriko khaw la kuun tih te kalawng poe cet.
Te ah te Zakia aka miingna mangmu cawikung bawi pakhat awm tih ahih tah bawireng tangkiik.
Jesuh he a-u kai ti tih huh hamla a yawm, tede ahih tah thlaang hemm la awm tih thlaangping lawng a thlip khoep dawngah Jesuh te hu thai nawh.
Tedawngah Jesuh a cehna koei ben ah thlaangping kah hai benla heeng phai tih ahih te a huhna ham thaihba thing dawngah luui.
Jesuh lawng te huen te a pha atah asaw benla maang hang tih Zakia nala te, “Zakia, aloela rum thuk, tihin ah nang im ah ka pah ai.” a tina.
Zakia tah aloela rum thuk tih awmngaih cala ahih te a pah sak.
Te tila a awm te thlaang thli lawng a huh u vengah, “He kah thlaang he thlaang-thawlh im ah pah hamla a ceh maica!” ti tih caitoek u.

Zakia lawng pai hang tih Bawipa nala te, “Bawipa, hutung lah! Ka khueh thaihu avaang athal ah khawdeng thlaang thli ka pe ai, thlaang ka thai ka latna tih thaihu ka lawh pe atah apueh asawm let lii la ka sah ai.” a tina.
Ahih te Jesuh lawng, “He kah im ah thlawnna ti hin ah a pha poen, metihtiah ahih khaw Abraham kah cadil van ni.
Thlaanghing Capa tah thlaangha paataam tlap ham oen ah thlawn ham ni a law.” a tina.
Thlaangping hue lawng awl a hutung u lii vengah he kah thuidoetna pakhat he a thui pe. Jerusalem te a pha tawm u poen tih ahimi lawngtah Pathen Ram he tueng pahoei poen ai tila a poek u.
Tedawngah tila a thui pe, “Voei khat ah areng aka sang thlaang pakhat awm tih sengpahrang la coengg ham khaw thla la cet, tecoeng atah im la meel koep hamla te kamthlah.
A ceh thlan ah tuihyoeihthlaang paha te a khue, ahimi te sui tangka pheek at rip a peek tih, “Khawlawng la ka ceh ruet ah, he kah tangka oen thaihu thaiha yooei uh.” a tina.
Tede ahih te a ram khuikah thlaang thli lawng a thina u dawngah laipai a tuih u tih, “He kah thlaang he kaimi lawngah sengpahrang la ka ngaih u nawh.” tila te a thui sak u.
Te kah thlaang te sengpahrang la a awm coeng atah koep meel. A tuihyoeihthlaang thli lawng tangka apuung ataai meyoeh a dang kai tite ming a ngaih tih ahimi te pahoei a khue.
Lamhacuek kah thlaang te law tih, ‘Bawipa! Nang lawng nan peek tangka pheek at oen thaihu thaiha ka yoeih tih apuung ataai sui tangka pheek ha ka dang,’ a tina.
Tevengah ahih lawng, ‘Theen! Nang tah aka theen tuihyoeihthlaang ni! Nang tah thaihu tehca dawngah uep-awm la na awm tih khawpui paha ukkung la kan khueh ai.’ a tina.
Tecoengah a pahihna tuihyoeihthlaang te law tih, ‘Bawipa, nang lawng nan peek tangka pheek at oen thaihu thaiha ka yoeih tih apuung ataai sui tangka pheek ngaa ka dang,’ a tina.
Ahih te khawpui pa-ngaa ukkung la na awm ai,’ a tina.
Atloe tuihyoeihthlaang te law tih, ‘Bawipa, nang kah tangka te awm ngoen he; baipeen oen ka cuun tih ka kuem mangkhak ta.’ a tina.
Nang tah amangkhak thlaang la na awm tih kan rih tangkiik. Nang lawngtah namah kah thaihu nawh khaw na lawh tih caangti na tuh nawh te khaw na ah mai? a tina.

Ahih nala te, ‘Nang thlaangthe tuihyoeihthlaang! Na awlthui te namah awlcekna ham ka hawna ai! Kai he amangkhak thlaang, kamah kah thaihu nawh khaw ka lawh tih caangti ka tuh nawh te khaw ka ah te na ming ta.
Theen, te atah, n'tu ah tangka kuemna bengh ah ka tangka te na khueh nawh? Ka meel koep vengah tangkaca oen acingrang la ka dang ai ta.’ a tina.
Tecoengah te kah aka pai thlaang thli nala te, “Ahih tengkah sui tangka te lo u langtah tangka pheek ha aka khueh tuihyoeihthlaang te pe uh.’ a tina.
Tede ahimi lawng, ‘Bawipa, ahih tah tangka pheek ha a khueh poen ta!’ a tina u.
Ahih lawng awl a thung pe tih, ‘Kavan thui u, yahawh hlang aka khueh te yahawh ngaai a peek ai; tede aka khueh nawh te a khueh duen Pateng khaw a lawh pe ai.
Kai he amami kah sengpahrang la awm sak ham aka ngaih nawh ka raal thli te van law puei u langtah ahimi te ka hai ah ngawn uh!’ a tina” tila a thui pe.
Jesuh lawng he kah thuidoetna awl he a thui coengah ahimi haiah Jerusalem la te cet.
Olif Tlaang tengkah Betfat oen Bethani khaaw te a pha u tawm atah a hubang pahih te hai la a tuih tih tila awl a uen:

‘Na hai kah khaaw la ke an cet hih langtah khaaw khuila na kuun hih vengah a-u lawngkhaw a cit thlan lacano pakhat a kiing u te na huh pahoei hih ai. A kiingna rui te thlam hih langtah he la he van khuen.
Thlaang pakhat khat lawngah n'tu ham rui te na thlam a ti atah, Bawipa lawng a ngoe tila thui peh.” a tina.
Ahih rawi lawng cet hih tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe angla soeprep boeih te a huh.
Ahih rawi lawng lacano a khihna rui te a thlam hih lii vengah la khuehkung lawngah ahih rawi nala te, “N'tu hamla rui te na thlam hih?” a tina.
Te rawi lawngah, “Bawipa lawng a ngoe,” a tina hih tih,
Jesuh tengla lacano te a khuen pe. Tecoengah ahimi lawngah amami kah himbai te lacano kah a uen dawngah a phaih u tih Jesuh te a ngawlh sak u.
Jesuh lawng lacano te a cit tih a ceh phai vengah thlaangping lawng amami kah himbai te lawngpui ah a phaih u.

Jerusalem te a pha tawm tih Olif Tlaang tengkah singlingla lawngpui a rum thukna ahuen kalawng tah a hubang thli thlaangping lawngah kawpoek rai thaihu thli te a huhna dawngah Pathen te a uem u tih angaih-hlangla a thangpawm u:
“Bawipa miing oen aka law sengpahrang tah Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awmna pe hawn seh! Vaan ah roepna awm selang Pathen tengah ruep-awmna awm hawn seh!” tila paang u.
Tevengah thlaangping timkah Farasi thlaang khatsut lawng Jesuh nala te, “Saya, na hubang thli he awl a phahna ham thui pe lah,” a tina u.
Jesuh lawngah, “Kavan thui u, ahimi lawng awl phah sap kawinih lungto thli lawng amah poek ah paang ai ta.” a tina.
Jerusalem khawpui te a pha tawm tih, Jerusalem te a huh atah rap.
“Tihin ah ngaimawngna hamla n'tu angoe ti bueng mah te na ming u mai kawinih! Tede nang lawng tahe ah na hu thai nawh!
Nang he na raal thli lawngah raalvawng oen ceemraal oen ah n'duum khoep vetih khatben khatbang kalawng n'khaih khoepna khawhin te a pha ai.

Ahimi lawngah nang te m'phe phengvel vetih na vawngup khuiah na thlaang thli te a ngawn dingkang poen ai. Ahimi lawng lungto khatca khaw khupthal ohla awmna huen ah ceh taak u manawh, metihtiah nang thlawn hamla Pathen a lawna atue atang te na ming nawh dawngah ni!” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah Tempal bok-im khuila kuun tih thaihu aka yooei thlaang thli te pheng a vai,

ahimi nala te, “Caciim dawngah, Pathen lawng, ‘Kai kah Tempal bok-im tah thangthuina im tila a thui u ai.’ tila a thut te ta. Tede nangmi lawngtah thlaanghuuen pa caan thli kuepyingna la na sai u poen.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im khuiah a cang puei u. Khawsoeih ahaamca thli, Phung-awl cangpueikung thli oen thlaangping mawtkung thli lawng ahih te ngawn ham a ngaih u,
tede thlaang boeih lawng ahih awl te a thung u tih lung at khaw thlauh ham a ngaih u nawh dawngah ahimi lawng te tila te sai ham along a-im hu u nawh.

Hin at ah Jesuh lawng Tempal bok-im khuiah thlaang thli te a cang puei tih Awlthang Theen te a phawng, khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli, bokna ben kah ahaamca thli thik at la haih law u tih,
ahih nala te, “He thaihu thli sai hamla ame ang saithaina na khueh? Saithaina aana he a-u lawng m'peek? van thui lah” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala, “Nangmi he tahe ah awl khat ah kan doet u van lah ai.
Johan lawng baptisma peek ham saithaina aana he Pathen tengkah a huh aw, tihnawhtah thlaanghing tengkah aw? Van thui u lah,” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah amami oen amami te oelhtaih khiing u tih, “Metila n'thui u lah ai? ‘Pathen tengkah a dang,’ tila n'thui pe kawinih ahih lawngah, ‘N'tu ah Johan te na tangna u nawh ti ai ta.
Tede mami lawng, “Thlaanghing tengkah ni,’ n'tina u kawinih he kah thlaang boeih lawngah Johan he tawngha tangtang ni tila a oeng u dawngah lungto oen n'de ai,” ti u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng, “Ame kah nuem ka ming u nawh.” a tina u.
Te atah Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Tetih atah kai lawngkhaw he kah thaihu thli he ame kah saithaina aana oen ka sai ti he ka thui van manawh” a tina.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te he kah thuidoetna awl he a thui pe: “Thlaang pakhat lawngah misurdum a sai tih dum te thlaang a vat, tecoengah amah tah khawlawng thla la cet tih asan hlang awm.

Misur thaih bit tue a pha veng atah a salpa pakhat te dum vat thlaang thli tengla a tuih tih amah lawng ahimi tengkah dang ham koei te a lawh sak. Tede dum aka vat thlaang hue lawng a salpa te a tam doetthloet u tih atliing saloella a meel sak u.
Tecoengah atloe a salpa pakhat te a tuih koep; tede dum aka vat thlaang thli lawng ahih te khaw a bawh doetthloet u tih athe akhana u, yah a bai u tih atliing saloella te a meel sak u.
Tecoengah a pathumna a salpa te a tuih; dumvat thlaang thli lawngah ahih te khaw boengha a caak sak u tih dum adaubenla a voeih u.
Tecoeng atah dumkhuehkung lawng, ‘Metila ka sai lah ai? Ka lungna duet ka capa he man nih ka tuih mai poen sui, ahih ngoen tah a hinyah u ngai badai!’ ti.
Tede dum vat thlaang thli lawng ahih te a huh u vengah, ‘Ahih he tah dum khuehkung kah a capa ni. Ngawn u sih, ahih lawng a paang ham koei ro he mami ham awm seh!’ tila a thui u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng a capa te dum adaubenla a khuen u tih a ngawn u. Tetih atah misurdum khuehkung lawng dum vat thlaang thli te metila a sai?”
Ahih te law vetih te kah thlaang thli te a ngawn coeng atah misurdum te thlaangtloe a vat ai.” tila a thui pe. Thlaangping lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah, “Te tila te awm roe mai boel seh!” ti u.

Jesuh lawng ahimi te he tila a doet, “Caciim dawngah, im aka sa thlaang thli lawng aphu aka awm nawh angla a hoett u lungto te atloe boeih lak ah awlpui koek la coengg,’ tila a thui te ta n'tu a thuingaihna?
A-u khaw te kah lungto dawngah aka tla boeih tah adiik anuui la rek vetih te kah lungto lawng a tlaak thil thlaang te khaw adiik avaai la a neet ai.” a tina.

Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng he kah thuidoetna awl he amami ni a thuingaihna tite a ming u dawngah Jesuh te tuuk pahoei ham a ngaih u; tede ahimi lawngah thlaangping te a rih u.

Tedawngah ahimi lawng atue theen te a ring u. Tedawngah saithaina aana aka khueh Rom acoyah kah ram ukbawi kut ah Jesuh te peek thai ham, thlaang khatsut te thlaangdoeng la aka sa u ham tangka kutsuh a peek u tih Jesuh te awl kaa doetdapna oen thawlhna te thuep aka doen la a tuih u.

He kah raalyam thlaang hue lawngah Jesuh nala te, “Saya, nang lawng na thui tih na cang puei thli he soeng tila ka ming u. Nang lawngtah thlaang mik-hai khaw dan muehla Pathen kah kawngaihna akawng awltak te na cang puei tila ka ming u.
Kaimi lawngah Rom sengpahrang sangluel tengah mangmu peek hamla mami kah Phungawl oen kalh u the aw, kalh u nawh aw? van thui lah.” a tina u.
Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi kah thailatna te thiim a ming tih,
“Ngun tangka pakhat ah n'huh sak u lah. Tangka dawngah a-u kah muei-ame oen a miing a awm?” a tina. Ahimi lawngah, “Sengpahrang sang-luel kah mueime oen a miing awm,” a tina u.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng, “Tetih atah Sengpahrang sangluel kah koe te sengpahrang sangluel te pe uh, Pathen kah koe te Pathen pe uh” a tina.
Ahimi lawng thlaangping hai ah te a thawlhna khat khaw tu u thai nawh, ahih kah awlthungna te a kawpoek la rai u tih awl mueh thuep la awm u.
Tecoeng atah, thlaang he duekna kalawng ah tho koep nawh tila aka thui Sadusi thlaang khatsut te Jesuh tengla law u tih ahimi lawng,

“Saya, Mosi lawngtah kaimi ham phungawl tila avan thut: ‘Thlaang pakhat lawng a ca sak muehla a yu te a duek taak atah a manau lawng a maya yu te paang seh, ca-anau cuun selang tah aka duek a maya kah ca-anau ti u seh,’ tila a thut.
Voei khat ah boenhui pasarih awm; ahaam koek lawng te yu a lawh de ca sak muehla duek.
Tecoengah apabena lawngah te kah hutaa te a yuna tih ca sak muehla a duek taak van.
Tecoengah apathumna a manau lawng a yuna de ca sak muehla a duek taak baal. Te tila te boenhui pasarih lawng ca sak muehla boeih a duek taak u.
Hukhueng atah te kah hutaa khaw duek van.
Boenhui thlaang pasarih lawng ahih te a yuna u, tetih atah thlaangduek thawhkoepna khawhin ah a-u kah a yu la a awm ai?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Hutaa oen tawngpa lawngah hingkhui vengah ni yu vaa la a awm ai,
tede duekna kalawng aka tho ham koei hutaa oen tawngpa hue tah aka law ham koei hingna dawngah yuvaa la awm tlaih manawh.
Ahimi tah vanthlaang angla awm u vetih duek thai manawh. Ahimi tah duekna kalawng tho koep u poen tih Pathen kah ca-anau la ni a awm u poen.
Thlaangduek tho koep ai ti he Mosi lawng aciimphanla a thui. A boeih tangte tangpuem ungna kawng a thuina dawngah Bawipa te, ‘Abraham Pathen, Isak Pathen oen Jakob kah Pathen,’ tila a thui.
Ahih tah aka hing hue kah Pathen la awm tih aka duek thli kah Pathen nawh ni, ahih dawngah thlaang boeih tah hing.” tila a thui pe.
Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut hue lawngah, “Saya, awl na thung pe he theen!” a tina u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh te awl kam at khaw doet ha u tlaih nawh.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Messiah tah Devid cadil la awm ai tila te metila a thui thai u kai?
Metihtiah Devid amah lawng Saam cabu dawngah, ‘Bawipa lawng ka Bawipa tengah,
Na raal thli te na khowtloeng la ka sai thlantoe Ka bantang ben ah he ngawl lah,’ tila a thui.
Devid lawng ahih te, ‘Bawipa’ a ti atah metila Messiah te Devid cadil la a awm thai ai?” tila a doet.
Thlaangping lawngah ahih kah awl te a hutung u lii vengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te,

“Phungawl cangpueikung thli tengah he ngaithuen u lah, ahimi lawngah himbaidung bai oen yingyawi ham a ngaih u, thaihu yoeihna huen ah thlaang kah voemtoeina oen hinyahna te a ngaih u; sinakok ah ngawlhna athloekla a hooep u te a tuek u tih poei saina ah ngawlhna atheen koek te a tuek u;
huhai tumtee kah thaihu oen a im te a rot pe u tih thlaang kah yaak ngaih la asanhlangla thangthui u! Ahimi lawngah athekoek dantatna te a dang u ai!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng maang tih a teng avai te a dan vengah Tempal bok-im kah tangkakong khuiah kuirang thli lawng tangka a sang u te a huh,
Khawdeng tangkiik huhai pakhat lawng ruhum pheksa pahih a sang te khaw a huh.
Tevengah ahih lawng, “Atak tang kavan thui u, thlaangtloe boeih lak ah he kah khawdeng koek huhai lawng yahawh ngaai te a sang poen.
Metihtiah thlaangtloe hue lawngtah amami kah khuehtoen bawi alenna dawngkah acoeih aphe te ni a peek u, tede he hutaa he tah khawdeng de amah kah hingna ham a khueh duen te a peek kik poen” a tina.
A hubang khatsut hue lawngah Tempal bok-im lungto theen theen oen dan ngaih danthluela thoekcauna oen Pathen tengah kutdo peekna akawng te a thui u.
Tevengah Jesuh lawngah, “He kah na huh boeih he, lungto khatca khaw ceh taak ohla apum boeih la a voeih dingkangna atue te avan pha ai.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Saya, metuek vengah he tila a awm ai? Atue apha poen tite noekna ham n'tu aka thoeng ai?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Ngaithuen uh; a-u lawngkhaw n'thaina boel seh. Thlaang broe lawngah ka miing oen law ai, ‘Kai tah ahih poen ni! Atue a pha poen!’ ti ai. Tede ahimi hu ah te bang u boel.
Nangmi lawng raal thawhna oen ceemtloekna te na yaak u vengah rih u boel; te ang thaihu te lamhacuek ah va thoeng ai, te ang thli te aboetna tah yoeii poen ti ngaihna nawh ni.” a tina.
Tecoengah a awl thui te a tom tih, “Ram pakhat oen khat kaap u the ai; thlaangphun khat oen khat thekyak u the ai.
Khaaw yat ram yat ah rih-awm likluei hinghuen ai; khawthe khawkha oen tlawhtahaw awm ai; vaan kalawng miknoekna oen rih-awm thaihu thoeng ai.

He kah thaihu boeih he a thoeng thlan ah nangmi te n'tuuk u vetih n'heemtek u ai; nangmi te sinakok ah awlcek ham n'ceh puei u vetih thongim ah n'thlaak ai; kai kawngah sengpahrang thli oen ukkung bawi thli haiah n'khuen ai.
He tah Awlthang Theen phawngna ham ah nangmi hamla atue theen la awm ai.
Namah oen namah te metila ka phungtu u ai tite lakueng u boel, thincak la awm oepsoeh uh,
metihtiah na raal thli a-u khatca lawngkhaw oelhtaih thai nawh tih taa thai nawh hamla nangmi lawng na thui ham koei awl oen cuihna te kan peek ai.
Nangmi te na nu oen na pa lawngkhaw, na boenhui lawngkhaw, na paya lawng-khaw raal kut ah m'peek u vetih nangmi timkah khatsut te tah a ngawn u ai.
Kai kawngah nangmi te thlaang boeih lawng n'thina ai.
Tede na luu dawngkah sam te thaam at mai khaw ha ata manawh.
Acakla pai lah, tetih atah namah oen namah te na thlawn u ai.
“Jerusalem khawpui te raal thli lawng a veel khoep te na huh u vengah adiw thlan ah rawk poen ai tila te ming uh.

Tevengah Judia ram khuiah aka awm thlaang thli lawng tlaang sawm la heeng u seh; khawpui khuiah aka awm thlaang thli lawng khawpui te co taak u seh, khaaw teng khaaw vai ah aka awm thlaang thli lawng khawpui khuila kuun u boel seh.
Metihtiah te hin te tah, ‘Dantatna Khawhin’ la a awm dawngah Caciim lawng a thui te soep ai.

Te khawhin tah bungpum vawn-um oen cacuun naukem hutaa thli ham tah khawmap sut maimah aw! He kah ram khuiah rih-awm mueirihtamyiin te thoeng vetih he kah thlaang thli sawah Pathen kah dantatna te thoeng ai.
Thlaang khatsut te samsen oen a ngawn u vetih atloe hue te tah ram tawm ah saltamnaa la a khuen ai; thlaangphun tloe lawng amami kah atue atang te aboet thlantoe Jerusalem te a khow huiah a khueh ai.
“Te atah khawmik, thla oen aisi thli dawngah, noekna alakloe te thoeng ai. Dilai sawkah ram boeih lawng tuitunlii kah tuisambaak awl oen tuilet thawh awl te a rih u vetih ngaihang khawbing la awm ai.
Dilai pum ah aka law ham koei te thlaang thli lawng a poek doen u vengah a rih u vetih thuen ai, metihtiah vaan kah huham tharana te hinghuen ai.
Tecoengah thlaanghing capa tah ruep-awmna oen bawilen tharana oen muui dawngah a rum thuk te a huh u ai.
He thaihu thli a thoengna ham atong poen atah pai u langtah na luu te thawh u lah, metihtiah nangmi thlawnna ham tah yoeii poen” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah he kah thuidoetna he a thui pe: “Thaidut thing oen atloe thingthaih boeih te poek u lah.
A dawn thaai a cawn hang te nangmi lawng na huh u vengah khawhaal hungkang tue tah yoeii poen tila na ming u.
Tetih van angla he kah thaihu thli a thoeng te nangmi lawng na huh u vengah Pathen Ram tah law poen ai tila ming uh.
He he hilh u boel, tahe ah aka hing thlaang thli he a duek boeih thlan ah he kah thaihu thli he va thoeng ai.
Vaan oen dilai tah khum ai, tede ka awl he tah mevengah khaw khum manawh.

“Ngaithuen u lah! Nangmi lawng awmtheen awmyaal poeibuh caak awkk oen dilai han khawsak lakuengna te poek u aih boel, te tila na awm u veng bawtbet khawlai ah te kah Khawhin lawng nangmi teng avan pha ai.
Metihtiah te tah dilai saw khaaw tawm ah aka awm thlaang boeih sawah thoeng ai.
He kah aka law ham koei thaihu thli he ading asuekla pooeng ahana ham, tharana khueh tih Thlaanghing Capa haiah paina thai ham ahuertuela awm u langtah thangthui yoeyah uh.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng khawdaai atah Tempal bok-im ah thlaang thli te a cang puei, thlemben atah Olif Tlaang la cet tih khawyiin atah te ah te ip yoeyah.
Thlaang boeih lawngah ahih awl te hutung hamla mincanghi ah Tempal bok-im la te cet u.
Kaantaakpoei, Tawlru aka thuum nawh Takawi Poei tah atue yoeii poen.
Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng thlaangping te a rih u dawngah Jesuh te ahuepla ngawn ham along a-im tlap hamla a yawm u.
Tevengah hubang paha thlaihih khuiah aka thuum Iskariot a ti u Judas kaw khuila Seitan te kuun.
Tedawngah Judas tah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raal bawi thli tengla cet tih Jesuh te ahimi kut ah peek thaina ham koei akawng te a thui u.
Ahimi tah a kaw hoe soeh u tih ahih te tangka peek ham awl a khueh u.
Te tila te Judas khaw a kaw tla van tih thlaangping lawng he kawng he ming ohla Jesuh te ahimi kut ah peek ham atue theen te tlap ham a tong.
Tawlru thuum mueh Takawi Poei vengkah Kaantaak poeibuh hamla tuuca ngawn ham khawhin te a pha.
Jesuh lawng Piter oen Johan te he tila awl a uen tih a tuih: “Cet hih langtah mami kah caak ham Kaantaak Poei te roekbah hih” a tina.
Ahih rawi lawngah, “Ame huen ah roekbah sak ham na ngaih?” tila a doet.
Ahih lawng, “Nanghih lawng khawpui khuila na kuun vengah tuithaan thlaang pakhat oen na hum u ai. Ahih a kuunna im khuila te vai poe hih langtah,
Imkung nala te, ‘Saya lawng, me kah akhann khuiah nuem Kaantaak Poei buh te ka hubang hue oen ka caak ai?’ ti, tila thui peh.
Ahih lawngah im han kah akhann kau hlang thaihu a cungkuem la aka awm te n'huh sak ai, te ah te thaihu soeprep te roekbah hih,” a tina.
Ahih rawi tah cet hih tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe angla soeprep te a huh tih Kaantaak Poei buh te a roekbah hih.
Atue a khoek vengah Jesuh lawng caboi te a hubang hue oen haih a veel u.
Ahimi nala te, “Kai lawngah patang palai ka khang thlan ah Kaantaak Poei buh he nangmi oen veel haih hamla ka ngaih tangkiik!
Nangmi tengah kavan thui u, metihtiah Pathen Ram khuiah he kah poei buh lawng thuingaihna tangtang te a tueng sak thlantoe tah ka ca tlaih manawh.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng boengloeng te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui, “He he lo u langtah nangmi khat oen khat rekra u lang aw uh.
Kavan thui u, tahe kalawng ah Pathen Ram a pai thlantoe misurtui he ka aw tlaih manawh.” a tina.

Tecoengah takawi te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui coeng atah takawi te a eh tih ahimi te a peek, “He tah ka pum ni, nangmi ham kan peek te ni. Nangmi lawng kai he nan poek khuepna ham he tila sai uh.” a tina.
Tetih toengtoeng la thlembuh caak coengah boengloeng te ahimi a peek tih, “He kah boengloeng he tah nangmi ham ka hok ka thi oen ah ka cak sak Pathen kah awlkam thaai ni.
Tede, bueh lah! Ka sawah paipi aka thleepkung tah caboi tengah ka awm haih.
Pathen kah awltloek angla Thlaanghing Capa tah duek ai, tede ka sawah paipi aka thleep thlaang ham tah khawmap tangkiik mah aw!” a tina.
Tecoeng atah ahimi khat oen khat te a-u lawngah he kah thaihu he a sai ai tila doet u.
A hubang hue lawng amami tim ah a-u nuem aka lenduet la poek ham aka awm ti u tih awl puung u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Pathen aka oeng nawh sengpahrang thli lawng thlaang rangpui sawah aana a khueh u tih ukkung bawi thli lawngkhaw amami te ‘Thlaang rangpui te aka lungvatkung ni’ ti u.
Tede nangmi tah te tila awm ham nawh ni; nangmi timkah aka lenduet lawngtah anoca koek angla awm ham ni, mawtkung lawngah tuihyoeihthlaang angla awm ham ni.
A-u aka lenduet, buh caak ham aka ngawl thlaang aw, tihnawhtah buhteemkung aw? Aka ngawl thlaang te lenduet ta. Tede, kai tah nangmi tim ah buh teem an teem angla ka awm.
“Nangmi lawngtah suek-halhna ka tawngna boeih ah nan awm puei u;
a Pa lawng ka tengah ukna aana m'peek van angla nangmi khaw kan pe van ai.
Nangmi lawngtah ka Ram khuiah kamah kah caboi dawng na caak na awkk u vetih Israel phun paha thlaihih te uk hamla bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah na ngawl u ai.

Jesuh lawng, ‘Simon, Simon! Hutung lah! Lotoenkung lawng caangtak oen caanghii a pekthlee angla athe khui kalawng atheen te thloeng ham, nangmi boeih te noekdak hamla Seitan lawng saithaina nawl a dang poen.
Tede Simon, na oengna te a tlaakna nawh ham ah nang ham ka thangthui. Tecoengah ka tengla koep na maang phai vengah na maya manau thli te tha van ra sak.” a tina.
Piter lawng, “Bawipa, nang oen thong tlaak haih ham khaw, duek haih ham khaw oepsoeh la ka awm poen” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Piter, kavan thui, n'tu yiin ah, kai he ka ming ka tung nawh tila voei thum toe na thui thlan atah aai khawk manawh.” a tina.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang thli nala te, “Kai lawng nangmi te tangkabawm, sawngsa oen khowmuek khaw khuen sak ohla kan tuih u vengah te avoetna awm aw?” tila a doet. Ahimi lawngah, “Khat khaw voet mai nawh” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Tede, tahe atah tangkabawm khaw, sawngsa khaw khuen uh, a-u khaw samsen te a khueh nawh atah angki te yooei selang lai seh.
Kavan thui u, metihtiah caciim lawngah, ‘Ahih tah thlaangthawlh la a toek haih poen’ tila kai kah kawng alam a thut te asoep ham awm, metihtiah kai kah kawng alam a thut sut te noenoe soep poen.
A hubang hue lawng, “Bawipa, bueh lah! He ah samsen pahih awm!” a tina u. Ahih lawngah, “Te mah khoek poen” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a sai nooek angla khawpui te a thawh taak tih Olif Tlaang la te cet, a hubang hue khaw ahih oen haih cet u.
Te huen ah a pha u veng atah ahimi nala te, “Suek-halhna khuiah na tlaak thawlh nawh ham thangthui uh.” a tina.
Tecoengah ahimi teng kalawng lungto kutdi daawng khoek athlana ah cet tih khuklu oen cuengkueng tih thang-thui.
“A Pa, na kawngaih atah he kah patang khangna boengloeng he ka teng kalawng khoe hawn. Tede kai kah kawngaihna boel selang na kaw-ngaih angla sai hawn.” tila thangthui.
Vaan kah vanthlaang pakhat a tengah phumpho tih ahih te tha a peek.
Thin thiip uett ah kawsi dung tangkiik la thangthui tih a sotui te thisen angla dilai ah cip.
A thangthuina kalawng tho hang tih a hubang hue tengla te cet phai, ahimi tah kawthe uett ah tawnba sut u tih a ih muelh u te a huh.
Ahimi nala te, “N'tu ah na ih muelh u? Suekna khuiah na tlaak thawlh nawh ham tho lang thangthui u lah.” a tina.
Jesuh te awl a thui lii vengah thlaangping te avan pha, hubang thlaihih khuiah aka thuum Judas lawngah te avan law puei. Ahih lawng Jesuh te mok hamla a tengla tang va law.
Tede Jesuh lawng, “Judas, nang lawngah mokna oen aw Thlaanghing Capa he na thak ai? a tina.
Jesuh tengah aka awm a hubang hue lawngah te tila thaihu aka thoeng te a huh u vengah ahimi lawng, “Bawipa, samsen oen ka tloek u ai aw?” a tina.
Ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat lawng Khawsoeih Bawi kah a sal te a bantang haa pat a tloek pe.
Tevengah Jesuh lawng, “Yoeh mah seh!” a tina. Ahih lawng te thlaang kah a haa te a tek tih a hoeih pe sak.

Tecoengah Jesuh lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet thli kah a bawi hue oen ah a tengla aka law ahaamca boeih nala te, “Kai he thlaanghuuen la ka awm dawngah aw nangmi lawng samsen oen boelhoen oen ah nan law thil u?
Kai he khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im ah nangmi oen n'awm u ta, tevengah te nan tu u nawh. Tede yiin tharana lawng a uk lii tahe vengah he nangmi kah saina hamla a tue theen ni.” a tina.
Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a tuuk u tih Khawsoeih Bawi im la te a ceh puei u; Piter lawngah athla ngaai kalawng soei soei a vai.
Talawng luung ah hai a toeih u, hai te a aawm u tih ngawl u, Piter khaw te ah te ngawl van.
Hai kungah Piter a ngawlh te tuih-yoeihthlaang hutaa pakhat lawng a huh vengah a bueh rang patang tih, “He kah thlaang he khaw Jesuh oen aka awm haih ni!” ti.
Tede Piter lawng a oelh tih, “Hutaa nang, ahih te ka ming moenih” a tina.
Tecoeng a awm bawt ah thlaang pakhat lawng Piter te a huh nooek dawngah, “Nang khaw, ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat van ni” a tina. Tede Piter lawng, “Kai he ahimi timkah thlaang nawh ni” a tina.

Tecoengah khawnoek pakhat yunyan a diw raih coeng atah thlaangtloe pakhat lawng, “Ahih he khaw Jesuh oen aka awm haih ni, uepvoetna tehca khaw awm nawh, metihtiah ahih he Galili thlaang la khaw awm!” tila rapcaat la a thui.
Tevengah Piter lawng, “Nang lawng na thui akawng alam he ka ming moenih!” a tina. Awl a thui lii vengah aai te khawk pahoei.

Bawipa tah dak maang tih Piter te rangpatang la a bueh heet, tevengah Piter lawng, “N'tu yiin aai a khaawk thlan ah kai he kan ming nawh tila voei thum toe na basa ai” tila Bawipa lawng a thui pe te lot a poek.
Piter te adaubenla cet, a kawsi la dung tih rap.
Jesuh amah te aka toet raalkap thli lawngah thekha la a sai u tih a bawh u.
Ahimi lawngah a mik te khoep a yeen pe u tih a doet u, “A-u lawng nang n'bawh? Thui lah!” a tina u.
Te tila te ahimi lawngah thekhana awl tloe broela a thui u.
Khaw a daai veng atah Judah thlaang ahaamca thli, khawsoeih haam thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli te tun huh u tih Jesuh te awlcekkung thli khonsil haiah avan law puei u.
Ahimi lawngah, “Nang he Messiah aw, van thui lah?” a tina u. Ahih lawngah, “Kai lawngah ka thui cakhaw na tangna u manawh;
awl kan doet u cakhaw navan thung tang u manawh.
Tede tahe kalawng tah Thlaanghing Capa he Thara koek Pathen bantang ben ah ka ngawl poen ai.” a tina.
Ahimi boeih lawngah, “Te atah nang he Pathen Capa aw?” tila a doet u. Ahih lawng ahimi nala, “Na thui u angla Pathen Capa ni.” a tina.
Tevengah ahimi lawngah, “Aka mingkung sausi khat khaw ngoe tlaih nawh! Amah awlthui te mami lawng n'yaak rep poen!” ti u.
Ahimi boeih lawng tho u tih Pilat haiah Jesuh te a khuen u,

Te ah te ahimi lawng thawlh a peel u, “He kah thlaang lawngah thlaangping he a mawt thawlh, Sengpahrang sangluel tengah mangmu peek nawh ham a thui pe tih amah oen amah te Messiah a ti u sengpahrang ni tila a thui.” a tina u.
Pilat lawngah, “Nang he Judah sengpahrang aw?” tila a doet. Jesuh lawng, “Na thui angla ka awm.” a tina.
Tecoengah Pilat lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen thlaangping te, “He thlaang he a thawlhna ka hu nawh.” a tina.

Tede ahimi lawngah anauh ngaai la awl a huer u tih, “He kah thlaang lawngah amah kah cangpueina oen awlpuungna a sai. Ahih lawng Galili kalawng a tong tih tahe ah he la he avan pha.” tila thawlh a pup u.
He awl he Pilat lawng a yaak vengah, “Ahih he Galili thlaang aw?” tila a doet.
Jesuh te Herod uk khuikah thlaang ni tila a ming vengah Herod tengla te a tuih, te vengah Herod khaw Jerusalem ah awm.
Herod lawng Jesuh te a huh vengah a kaw hoe tangkiik, metihtiah ahih kawng te a yaak poen tih huh hamla a ngaih te san poen. Jesuh lawng kawpoek rai a sai te huh hamla a ngaiuep.
Tedawngah Herod lawng Jesuh te awl yahawh hlang a doet de Jesuh lawng thung pe nawh.
Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng hai benla cawh u tih anauh ngaai la Jesuh te thawlh a pup u.
Herod oen a raalkap thli lawng Jesuh te nuihbu la a sai u tih tula sak ohla a nuihna u; tecoengah ahimi lawng himbaidung atheen te a bai sak u tih Pilat tengla koep a tuih.
Te khawhin ah te Herod oen Pilat he koep roep hih, he veng thlan atah ahih rawi he raal la awm hih.
Pilat lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli, mawtkung thli oen thlaangping te a khue tun tih,

ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng he kah thlaang lawngah thlaang a mawt thawlh na ti u dawngah ka tengla navan law puei u. Tahe nangmi haiah ahih he awl ka khee poen, nangmi lawng thawlh na pup angla ahih lawng lumlai a thawh sak te khat khaw ka hu nawh.
Herod lawngkhaw a thawlhna hu nawh, tedawngah namami tengla avan tuih koep. He kah thlaang lawng duekna yawkk ham koei a sai te awm nawh.
Tedawngah cungpoelh oen ka tam silang ka thlah hawn ai.” a tina.
(Kaantaak Poei veng roekk ah thongtla thlaang pakhat te Pilat lawng a thlah pe ham awm.)
Thlaangping rangpui lawngah, “Ahih te ngawn! Barabbas te van thlah!” tila paang u.
(Barabbas tah khawpui khuiah thlaang a ngawn tih kawsi a pawkk sak dawngah thongim ah a thlaak u.)
Pilat lawngtah Jesuh te a hoerpoengla thlah ham a ngaih dawng-ah thlaangping tengah lunghoeih awl koep a thui.
Tede ahimi lawngah, “Thinglam dawngah ngawn! Thinglam dawngah ngawn!” tila koep paang u.
Pilat lawng a pathumna atah ahimi nala te, “Tetih atah n'tu thawlhna ahih lawngah a sai? Duekna yawkk ham koei a sai khat khaw ka hu nawh! Cungpoelh oen ka tam silang ka thlah hawn ai.” a tina.
Tede ahimi lawngah Jesuh te thinglam dawng ngawn ham ah awl ue la paang tare u tih aboetna atah ahimi kah paang awl lawng a taa.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng a bih khiing u awltloekna te Jesuh sawah Pilat lawng a sai pe.
Ahimi kah a ngaih, thlaang a ngawn tih kawsi aka pawkk sak thongtla te a thlah pe tih Jesuh te amami kawngaih la sai ham ahimi kut ah a peek.
