Jesuh te raalkap thli lawng a khuen tih a ceh u vengah te vangca vangnau ben kalawng khawpui khuila aka law Sairin khaaw kah Simon aka miingna te a hum u tih ahimi lawng ahih te a tuuk u, thinglam te amangkhak la a kawh sak u tih Jesuh hu ah te a ceh sak u.
Rangpui thlaangping lawngah a hu ah a vai u, ahimi timkah khatsut hutaa thli lawng a raang te a tum u tih ahih te aka rah hutaa khaw awm.
Jesuh lawng ahimi benla maang tih, ‘Jerusalem kah hutaa thli! Kai ham rap u boel, namami ham oen ah na ca na nau thli ham mah rap uh.
Metihtiah thlaang lawngah, “ca-anau aka khueh nooek nawh, camoe aka cuun nooek nawh, suuktui aka tuul nooek nawh hutaa thli tah a yo theen tih a kam awm phoeih” tila a thuina khawhin te avan pha ai!
Thlaang lawngah tlaang sang nala te, ‘Kaimi sawah tlim rup lah!’ khawcung nala te, ‘Kaimi he n'thuh lah!’ tila a thuina tue te a pha ai.
Metihtiah thing he a hing vengah he ang thaihu he, he tila a sai u atah thing he a koh atah metila nuem a awm lah ve?” a tina.
Thlaangtloe pahih thlaangthawlh rawi te khaw Jesuh oen ngawn haih ham a ceh puei u.
Ahimi lawngah “Luu Ruh” huen a ti u te a pha u vengah Jesuh te thinglam dawng a tai u tih thlaangthawlh pahih te a bantang ben ah pakhat, a banvoei ben ah pakhat a tai u.
Jesuh lawng, “A Pa, Ahimi sawah khawdawp ngaai hawn! Ahimi lawng a sai he a ming u nawh dawngah ni.” a tina. Ahimi lawng talcung a yueh u tih ahih kah hi-acuu thli te a rek ara u.

Judah thlaang mawtkung thli lawng: “Ahih lawng thlaangtloe tah a thlawn; Pathen lawng a tuek Messiah tang tang atah amah oen amah thlawn u seh!” tila a nuih ariingna u vengah te thlaangping lawngah pai tih a dan u.
Raalkap thli lawngkhaw a nuihna u, ahimi te law u tih misurtui thuii te a tuul u tih,
“Nang he Judah sengpahrang atah namah oen namah thlawn u lah,” a tina u.
Asawkah ca a tai tah: “Ahih tah Judah sengpahrang ni.” tila a thut u.
Te kah a tai u thlaangthawlh pakhat lawngah ahih te asal aphaam tih: “Nang he Messiah nawh aw? Namah oen namah thlawn u langtah kaihih he khaw n'thlawn lah saw!” a tina.
Tede atloe pakhat te lawngtah ahih te a siim tih, “Pathen na rih nawh aw? Nang lawng ahih angla awlkhuengna avan at te na dang.
Tecakhaw mahih ham tah awlkhuengna he aka soeng ni, metihtiah mahih lawngtah n'sai phu yawkk ham koei te ni n'yawkk; tede ahih tah thawlhpalhna sai nawh.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh nala te, “Jesuh, Sengpahrang la na law vengah kai he n'hilh boel ne!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Na sawah awl ka kam, Paradis ah kai oen haih tihin ah na awm ai.” a tina.
Hingthun khawnoek paha thlaihih yun vengah khawmik lawng aang tlaih nawh tih yiinna lawngah ram pum te thlemben khawnoek pathum toe a khuk;
Tempal bok-im kah baiyaan te pahih la poet pheuh u.
Jesuh lawng angaihhlangla paang tih, “A Pa! Na kut dawngah ka muithla kavan tloeng!” tila a thui coengah te duek.
Te tila a awm te raalbawi lawng a huh vengah Pathen te a thangpawm tih, “Ahih he tah thlaangdoeng tangtang ni!” tila te a thui.
Te tila thaihu aka thoeng hang te huh hamla te ah aka tun thlaang thli lawng te tila thaihu a awm te a huh u vengah kawthe uett ah a raang a tum u tih im la meel u.
Jesuh te pumpak la aka ming boeih oen Galili kalawng ahih hu ah aka baang hutaa thli lawngkhaw athla la soei pai u tih a dan u.
Judah peng Arimatia khaaw kah Josep aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm. Ahih tah hinyah koei thlaangdoeng pakhat la awm tih Pathen Ram a lawna tue te a ring.
Ahih tah awlcekna khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang pakhat van de ahih lawngah amami khonsil kah awltloekna oen thaihu sai te ngaih nawh.
Ahih lawng Pilat tengla cet tih Jesuh rawkk te a bih.
Tecoengah a rawkk te a lawh tih himbai athaaithik oen a yaawl, lungkaw thuk tangte, vai khat khaw hawna nooek nawh thlann khuiah te a up.
Te khawhin te Huet hin la awm tih Sabbath khawhin te a pha tawmca poen.
Jesuh hu ah aka bang Galili kah hutaa hue lawng Josep oen haih cet u tih thlann te khaw, akhuiah Jesuh rawkk te metila a khueh tite khaw ahimi lawng a huh u.
Tecoeng atah ahimi te im la meel u tih riimtuui oen baw aka tuui thaihu thli te rawkk hamla a roek a bah u. Ahimi tah Phungawl dawngkah awlpeek angla Sabbath khawhin ah te duem u.
Khawhin hin rih khuikah lamhacuek khawhin mincanghi ah hutaa thli lawng amami kah roek abah riimtuui te a khuen u tih phuel la cet u.
Thlann thawhka kah lungto atloela a thoeih te a huh u tih akhuila te kuun u,
tede ahimi lawng Bawipa Jesuh kah a rawkk te tah hu u nawh.
He kawngah ngaihangla a pai sut u vengah te himbai bawk aka bai thlaang pahih te ahimi tengah parak a pai pe.
Hutaa hue lawng a rih soeh u tih dilai ah buekuep u, te kah thlaang rawi lawng ahimi nala te, “N'tu ah nangmi lawng aka hing thlaang te thlaangduek tim ah na tlap u?
Ahih tah he ah awm tlaih nawh! tho poen. Galili a awm vengah nangmi tengah avan thui awl te poek uh:
‘Thlaanghing Capa he thlaangthawlh thli kut ah a peek u vetih thinglam dawng a ngawn u ai, athum hin ah tho koep ai.’ tila a thui teta” a tina.
Tecoeng atah hutaa hue lawng Jesuh awl thui te lot a poek u,
phuel kalawng meel u tih a hubang thlaikhat oen atloe hue tengah he kah thaihu boeih he a thui pe u.
Te kah hutaa hue tah Meri Makdalin, Joanna oen Jeem manu Meri, he hue he ni; te kah aka awm haih atloe hutaa hue lawngkhaw, he thaihu he celtuih hue tengah a thui pe u.
Tede celtuih hue lawngah hutaa thli kah a thui te ahong la a poek u tih tangna u nawh.

Tede Piter tah tho thlat tih poe heeng; ahih lawng buekuep thuk tih thlann khui te a bueh vengah rawkk yaawlna himbai tah a huh de atloe n'tu khaw hu nawh. Tecoeng atah he tila aka awm thaihu dawngah te a kawpoek rai tih im la koep meel.
Te hin vengah te Jesuh kah hubang rawi pahih tah Emmau a ti u khaw la te cet hih. Te khaw tah Jerusalem khawpui kalawng meng sarih yun thla.
Ahih rawi lawngah thaihu aka thoeng hang kawng alam te a thui hih.
Ahih rawi lawng te tila a thui hih veng te ah, Jesuh lawng te rawi te a kee tih ahih rawi oen haih cet;
ahih rawi lawng a huh de metila nuem noek hih nawh.
Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala te, “Nanghih lawng lawngpueng puet ah n'tu kawng nuem na thui hih” a tina. Te rawi te haithe-latt la pai hih.
Kleopas aka miingna thlaang pakhat lawng, “Jerusalem la aka law kamyin khuiah thlemvai pekca ah te kah aka thoeng hang thaihu te aka ming nawh he tah nang bueng mai kai aw?” a tina.

Ahih lawng, “N'tu thaihu muuem?” tila a doet. Ahih rawi lawngah, “Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh tengah aka thoeng teta. Ahih tah tawngha pakhat la awm tih Pathen oen thlaang boeih haiah a thuina oen a saina thaihu boeih dawngah ahu aham awm tila a poek u.
Mami kah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen ukkung bawi hue lawng ngawn hamla awl a khueng u tih thinglam dawng a ngawn u.
Kaimi lawngtah ahih lawng ni Israel thlaangphun he a loeih sak ai tila ka ngaiuep u! Te tila a awmna kalawng tihin he tah a thum hin poen ni.
Kaimi timkah hutaa khatsut lawngtah kaimi he kawpoek avan rai sak u; Ahimi lawngah mincanghi ah cet u tih thlann te a bueh u de a rawkk te hu u nawh.
Ahimi te va meel koep u tih ahih tah tho poen tila aka thui vanthlaang te khaw ka huh u tila a thui u.
Kaimi timkah thlaang khatsut khaw phuel la cet u tih hutaa hue kah a thui angla boelh a huh u, tede ahih te tah hu u nawh.” tila a thui pe hih.
Tevengah Jesuh lawng te rawi nala te, “Metila na ngau hih aih! Tawngha thli lawng a thui boeih te tangna hamla na kawpoek yaai hih aih he!
Messiah lawng amah kah ruep-awmna ah a kuun thlan ah he ang thli he a yawkk hamla ngoe nawh aw?” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng Mosi kah cabu dawng kalawng a tong tih tawngha boeih kah cathut toe ah Caciim boeih dawngah amah kah kawng alam a thut te a hih rawi tengah a thuicaih pe.
A cehna koei khaw te ahimi lawng a pha tawm atah Jesuh lawng ka cet phaat ai a ti angla te a sa pe;
tede terawi lawng ahih te a tuuk tih, “Kaihih tengah pah van mai; khaw tla thuk poen tih khaw yiin tawm poen.” a tina. Tedawngah te rawi oen pah haih hamla te cet.
Ahih lawngah te rawi oen buh caak haih hamla ngawl, takawi te a lawh tih awmngaih awl a thui, tecoengah takawi te a eh tih te rawi te a peek.
Tecoeng atah te rawi kah a mik te tueng pan tih ahih te a noek, tede ahih rawi kah mik huh ah pahoei a auh pe poen.
Ahih rawi lawngah te, “Lawngpueng ah ahih lawng awl avan thui tih Caciim te a thuicaih vengah mahih kah lungbui ah hai aka alh angla awm ta?” tila a thui hih.
Ahih rawi te tho pahoei hih tih Jerusalem la meel koep hih, te ah te hubang thlaikhat oen thlaangtloe thli a tun haih u te a huh tih,
“Bawipa tah tho tangtang poen! Ahih tah Simon tengah phumpho poen!” tila te a thui u.
Tecoengah te kah thlaang pahih lawngkhaw lawngpueng ah thaihu aka thoeng te oen Bawipa lawng takawi a eh vengah a noekna kawng te a thui hih.
He kawng he ahimi tengah a thui hih lii vengah Bawipa amah te ahimi tengah pai parak tih ahimi nala te, “Nangmi sawah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh,” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah muithla ni ka huh tila a poek u tih a rih u.
Tede ahimi nala te, “N'tu kawngah na lakueng u akcak aih? N'tu kawngah he ang uepvoetna he nangmi kaw khuiah a law?

Bueh lah, ka kut rawi oen ka khaw rawi he, Kamah ni nan huh u. N'tek u lah nan ming u badai, metihtiah muithla lawngtah thi-asa oen ruh te khueh nawh, nan huh u angla kai ngoen tah ka khueh ta.” a tina.
Te tila a thui coengah a kut oen a khow te ahimi a huh sak.
Ahimi tah awmngaih tih kawpoek rai oen awm u de ahimi lawng tangna u thlan hun, tedawngah ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng caak koei khat mai khaw na khueh aw?” a tina.
Ahimi lawng nga haai tangte keekvaang te a peek u,
a lawh tih ahimi mik huh ah a caak pe.

Tecoengah ahimi tengah, “Mosi kah Phungawl khuiah khaw, tawngha thli kah ca thut dawngah khaw, Saam laabu dawngah kai kah kawng alam a thut boeih te asoep ham awm tila nangmi teng ka awm vengah kavan thui u te he kah thaihu thli he ni.” tila a thui pe.
Tecoeng atah caciim te a yaak ming thaina ham ahimi kah thinkaw te a awng pe tih,
Ahimi te, “He tila a thut sut te awm: Messiah lawng patang a khang vetih a thum hin ah duekna kalawng tho koep ai,
amah miing oen thawlh yutna kawng thawlh khawdawp ngaaina kawng awlthang te Jerusalem kalawng a tong vetih thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng ai.
Nangmi tah he kah thaihu he aka mingkung sausi la na awm u.
Kamah roe lawngah a Pa lawng avan kam te nangmi tengah kavan tuih ai. Tede asawben kah tharana te nangmi tengah a law thlantoe tah khawpui khuiah te ring uh.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te khawpui adauben athla hlang Bethani khaw la te a ceh puei, te ah te a kut a thueng tih ahimi te a phueh a sawm.
Ahimi te aphueh asawm tih yotheenna a peek veng te ah ahimi teng kalawng hooep u tih vaan benla te pawm u hang.
Ahimi lawng ahih te a bok u tih awmngaih tangkiik la Jerusalem la te koep meel u,
ahimi lawng atue atang khueh boeih te Tempal bok-im khuiah Pathen thangpawmna hamla a hawna u.
Dilai suen thlan ah, awl tah awm oepsoeh poen; ahih tah Pathen oen awm haih tih ahih te tah Pathen ni.
Acuek veng kalawng te awl te tah Pathen oen ah awm haih.
Ahih rang oen ah Pathen lawng thaihu boeih he a sai; Ahih rang oen ah a sai mueh thaihu khat khaw awm nawh.
Te awl te tah hingna kungpui la awm tih te kah hingna lawngah thlaanghing tengla aangna te avan khuen.
Te kah aangna lawng yiinna khui te a thue tih, yiinna lawng metuek vengah khaw thih thai manawh.
Pathen lawng amah kah laipai Johan te avan tuih,
thlaang boeih lawng awlthang te a yaak tih a tangna u ham, aangna kawng te aka thui ham ahih te va law.
Amah tah aangna nawh ni; aangna kawng te thui hamla aka law thlaang ni.
Te kah aangna tah dilai la law tih thlaanghing boeih aka thue aangna tangtang ni.
Te awl te tah dilai ah awm, ahih rang oen Pathen lawng dilai he a sai de ahih te dilai lawng ming nawh.
Ahih tah amah ram la law de amah kah thlaang thli lawng do u nawh.
Tecakhaw khatsut lawngtah ahih te a tangna u tih a do u; tedawngah ahimi te Pathen kah ca-anau la coenggna te a dang u.
Ahimi lawng thlaanghing phung angla Pathen kah ca-anau la coengg nawh, ahimi te thlaanghing ana pa kah ca-anau angla a cuun moenih; ahimi kah ana Pa tah Pathen amah ni.

Te awl te tah thlaanghing la coengg tih lungvatna oen awltak oen ah betoet, mami tim ah he awm. Mami lawng amah kah ruep-awmna te n'huh u, te ruep-awmna te tah ana Pa kah khuehduen pakhat bueng Capa la a awm te ni.

Johan lawngah ahih kawng te a thui vengah, “Ahih tah kai coengah aka law ni, tede ahih tah kai lak ah aka lenduet ni, metihtiah kai ka awm thlan ah ahih tah awm poen tila akawng ka thui te tah ahih he poen ni” tila paang tih a thui.
Amah kah abetoet lungvatna khui kalawng yotheen kam-awmna khat coeng khat te mami m'peek.
Pathen lawng Phungawl te Mosi rang oen m'peek, tede awltak oen lungvatna tah Jesuh rang oen ni a law.
Pathen he a-u khat lawngkhaw hu u vai nawh. Pathen amah oen van at la haih, ana Pa tengah aka awm a capa khat bueng lawngah he ana Pa te a tueng sak poen.
Jerusalem kah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng Levi thlaangphun oen khawsoeih khatsut te Johan tengla a tuih tih, “Nang he a-u nuem?” tila a doet sak u.
Johan lawng thana ohla, “Kai tah Messiah nawh ni” tila phah ohla aciimla a thui pe.

Ahimi lawngah, “Tetih atah nang he a-u? Nang he Elijah aw?” tila a doet u. Johan lawngah, “Kai he Elijah nawh ni” tila awl a thung pe. Ahimi lawngah, “Nang he tawngha aw?” tila koep a doet u tih, “Kai he tawngha nawh ni” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Tetih atah nang he a-u? Kaimi aka tuihkung hue tengah awl khuen ham a awm dawngah namah oen namah ta a-u na ti? van thui lah,” a tina u.
Johan lawng awl a thung pe tih: “Kai tah, tawngha Isaiah lawng, ‘Bawipa a cehna ham lawngpui te adoengla sai uh’ tila ramhum huhang ah aka paang te ni” tila a thui pe.
Farasi thlaang thli lawng a tuih laipai hue lawngah,
Johan nala te, “Nang he Messiah nawh, Elijah nawh tih tawngha nawh atah n'tu ah nang lawng baptisma na peek?” tila a doet u.
Johan lawng, “Kai lawngtah tui oen ah baptisma te ka peek, tede nangmi lawng na ming u nawh, nangmi tim ah aka pai pakhat te awm.
Ahih tah kai ka law coengah va law, tede kai tah ahih kah khowmuek rui pateng thlam pe ham ka ting ka tawkk moenih” a tina.
He kah thaihu boeih a coenggna he tah Johan lawng baptisma a peekna Jordan tuiva rall kah khawcuuk ben ah aka awm Bethani khaaw ah ni.
Avuen khawhin atah amah tengla Jesuh a law te Johan lawng a huh tih, “Dilai thawlhna aka phuei Pathen kah Tuuca ke bueh u lah!
Kai coengah thlaang pakhat va law, tede ahih tah kai lak ah bawilen ngaai, metihtiah kai he n'cuun thlan ah ahih tah awm poen.’ tila akawng ka thui te tah a hih poen ni.
Kai lawngah ahih he a-u ti khaw ka ming nawh, tede kai lawng tui oen ah baptisma ka peek he tah ahih te Israel thlaang thli lawng a mingna ham ni.” tila a thui.
Tecoengah Johan lawng, “Vaan kalawng Muithla te akhuu angla va rum thuk tih ahih sawah a cuuk thuk te ka huh.

Ahih te a-u ti khaw ka ming nawh, tede tui oen ah baptisma peek hamla tuihkung Pathen lawngah ‘Muithla te va rum thuk vetih thlaang pakhat sawah a cuuk te na huh ai; ahih te tah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma pekung ni tite na ming ai,’ ti.
Te tah kamah lawng ka huh tih ahih tah Pathen Capa ni tila nangmi tengah kavan thui u,” tila Johan lawng a thui.
Avuen hin ah Johan te a hubang pahih oen haih a pai u vengah,
Jesuh a yingyawi te a huh tih, “Pathen kah Tuuca ke bueh hih lah!” a tina.
He tila a thui te a hubang rawi lawng a yaak tih Jesuh te a hu ah a vai hih.

Jesuh te a hu la dak maang, te vengah ahih rawi lawng a hu ah a vai hih te a huh tih, “N'tu na tlap hih” tila a doet. Ahih rawi lawngah, “Rabbi, me ah na awm?” a tina hih. (He kah awllung he tah, “Cangpueikung” ti ngaihna ni.)
Ahih lawng, “Law hih langtah bueh lah,” a tina. (Te veng te tah thlemben khawnoek palii yunyan ni.) Tedawngah ahih rawi lawng cet hih, a awmna te a bueh hih tih khawyiin toe ahih oen awm u.
Te rawi khuikah pakhat te tah Simon Piter kah a manau Andru ni.
Vaikhat atah a maya Simon nala te, “Kaimi tah Messiah te ka huh poen” a tina. (Messiah ti he tah ‘Khrih’ ti ngaihna ni.)

Tecoengah Jesuh tengla Simon te a ceh puei. Jesuh lawng ahih te a bueh tih, “Nang tah Johan capa Simon na miingna, tede Sifas na miingna poen ai.” a tina. (He tah Piter tina oen lo hih tih “Lungto” tila thui ngaihna ni.)
Avuen atah Jesuh te Galili la ceh ham kamthlah. Filip te a huh tih, “Ka hu ah bang lah!” a tina.
(Filip he tah Andru oen Piter a awmna Betsaida khaw kah van ni.)

Filip lawng Nathanael te a huh tih, “Mosi lawng Phungawl cabu dawngah akawng alam a thut tih tawngha thli lawngkhaw akawng alam a thut thlaang te kaimi lawng ka huh poen. Ahih tah Nazaret khaw kah Josep capa Jesuh te ni” a tina.
Nathanael lawng, “Nazaret khaw kalawng thaihu theen pakhat mai khaw thoeng thai ai aw?” tila a doet. Filip lawng, “Law langtah bueh lah.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng Nathanael a tengla a law te a huh vengah, “Israel thlaangphun tak tak he ah awm he; ahih tah thawlhpalhna roe awm nawh!” tila ahih lawng a thui.
Nathanael lawng ahih nala te, “Metila nan ming?” tila a doet. Jesuh lawng, “Filip na khue thlan ah thaidut thing phung kaak ah na awm vengah te kan huh poen” a tina.
Nathanael lawngah, “Saya, Nang tah Pathen Capa ni! Nang tah Israel Sengpahrang ni!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Thaidut thing phungkaak ah na awm vengah kan huh poen tila ka thui dawngah na tangna aw? Nang lawngah he lak ah aka bo ngaai thaihu na huh hun ai!” a tina.
Tecoengah ahih rawi te, “Awltak tang kavan thui: Vaan te awng u vetih Thlaanghing Capa sawah Pathen kah van thlaang thli a rum thuk oen a luui hang te na huh u ai” a tina.
Hin hih a awm coengah Galili peng Kanaa khawpui ah yuluipoei awm. Jesuh kah a manu khaw te ah te awm tih,
Jesuh oen a hubang hue khaw yuluipoei ah te a khue u van.
Misurtui te a boeih dawngah Jesuh te a manu lawng, “Misurtui khueh u tlaih nawh.” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Nang lawng sai koei te van thui boel, kai lawng sai hamla atue pha thlan.” a tina.
Tecoeng atah Jesuh kah a manu lawng tuihyoeihthlaang thli nala te, “Ahih lawng a thui boeih te sai uh” a tina.
Judah thlaangphun lawngah khaw-niingtuikaa ah ciimcaihna kawng phung alam a khueh u tih, te ham ah te tuitang pakul kuun awikaw paruk te ah te a hawlh u.
Jesuh lawng tuihyoeihthlaang thli nala, “He kah awikaw dawngah tui thloen uh.” a tina. Ahimi lawngah awikaw rai toe ah tui te abecala a thloen u,
tecoengah ahimi nala te, “Tui te thoem duekk u langtah poei uktemkung tengla khuen pe uh” a tina. Ahimi lawng tui te a khuen u,
misurtui la aka coengg tui te a teng-alai. Ahih lawngah misurtui he ame kah tite ming nawh, (tede tuithaan tuihyoeihthlaang thli lawngtah a ming u); tedawngah yulokung te a khue tih,

ahih nala te, “Thlaang boeih lawngtah kamyin thli te lamhala misurtui ahuemm te a tuul tih ahahla a awkk u coengah misurtui adu te a tuul. Tede nang lawngtah misurtui ahuemm te tahetoe na khueh hun nawh pai he!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng lamhacuek kawpoek rai thaihu he Galili peng Kanaa khaw ah a sai; te ah te a ruep-awmna a tueng sak tih a hubang hue lawng ahih te a tangna u.
He coeng atah Jesuh oen a manu, maya manau oen ah a hubang hue tah Kapernaum la cet u tih te ah te khawhin ayawlca awm u.
Judah hue kah Kaantaak Poei te a pha tawm vengah Jesuh te Jerusalem la cet.
Tempal bok-im vawngup khuiah thlaang thli lawng vaitaw, tuu oen akhuu aka yooei thli, amami kah caboi dawngah ngawl u tih tangka aka thaw-leeng thlaang thli te a huh.

Tedawngah rui-akhau te ruicungpoelh la a holl tih boiava boeih vaitaw oen tuu khaw ruicungpoelh oen a tam tih Tempal bok-im adaubenla kang a vai; tangka thawlengkung thli kah caboi te boeih a plet pe tih a tangka thli te heh u khonghak;
tecoengah akhuu aka yoei thlaang thli te, “He ang thli he khuen uh! A Pa kah im he thaihu yoeihna huen la sai u tlaih boel!” a tina.
Caciim lawngah, “Aw, Pathen, na im ka thintlawhna he ka kaw khuiah hai angla alh.” tila a thui te a hubang hue lawng lot a poek u.
Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng, “Nang lawngah he tila na sai he ame kah sai thaina aana oen na sai ti he tueng sak ham kawpoek raina n'tu navan sai ai?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “He kah Tempal bok-im he phe uh, hin thum khuiah ka sak koep ai.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “He kah Tempal bok-im he sawm lii kumruk khui puet ah a sak u, nang lawng hin thum khuiah na sak koep ai aw? a tina u.
Tede Jesuh lawng Tempal bok-im tila a thui te amah pum ni a thuingaihna.
Tedawngah duekna kalawng a thawh koep vengah ahih lawng Te tila a thui te a hubang thli lawng koep a ming u tih Caciim khaw, Jesuh awl thui te khaw a tangna u.
Jesuh lawng Kaantaak Poei khui, Jerusalem ah a awm vengah kawpoekrai a sai te a huh u tih thlaang broe lawngah ahih te a tangna u.
Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi boeih te a ming dawngah tangna nawh.
Ahimi kah akawng alam te a-u khat lawngkhaw a tengah thui pe ham ngoe mai nawh, metihtiah amah lawng thlaang kah thinkaw te boeih a ming.
Nikodemu aka miingna Judah thlaang mawtkung pakhat awm, ahih tah Farasibu khuikah thlaang ni.

Yiin at atah ahih te Jesuh tengla cet tih, “Rabbi, nang tah Pathen kah thlaangtuih cangpueikung pakhat ni tila ka ming u. Pathen kah awmpueina nawh atah kawpoek rai na sai he a-u khat lawngkhaw sai thai manawh.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Awltak kavan thui: a-u khaw a thang koep nawh atah Pathen Ram te hu manawh.” tila a thui pe.
Nikodemu lawngah “Metila thlaang haam la aka awm te a thang koep thai ai, ahih te a manu kah ca-im khuila kuun vetih apabe la thang koep thai manawh!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Awltak tang kavan thui, a-u khaw tui oen muithla oen ah a thang nawh atah Pathen Ram khuiah kuun thai manawh.
Thlaang he nu oen pa kah pumsa ben ah aka thang tah pumsa la awm, tede muithla ben ah aka thang tah Muithla la awm.
Kai lawngah na thang koep ham awm kan tina dawngah na ngaai hang sak boel.
Khaw lawngah amah ngaihna benla thlii mai; khawthlii awl te na yaak, tede ame kalawng a law tih me benla a ceh tite na ming nawh. Muithla oen aka thang thlaang boeih khaw te tila ni a awm.” a tina.
Nikodemu lawng, “He he metila a coeng thai ai?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawngah, “Nang he Israel thlaangphun khuiah aka lentloe cang-pueikung la na awm de, he he na ming nawh aw?
Awltak kavan thui, “Kaimi lawngtah ka ming te ka thui u tih ka huh rep te ni ka thui pantau, kaimi kah awl he a-u khat lawngkhaw na do u nawh.
Kai lawng he dilai thaihu kawng kavan thui vengah Pateng nangmi lawng nan tangna u nawh; vaan kah thaihu kawng kavan thui vengah metila nan tangna u pai ai?
Vaan kalawng aka law thuk Thlaanghing Capa nawh atah a-u khat khaw vaan la luui nawh.
Mosi lawng ramhum huhang ah ruhum ruul te cungkui dawngah a tai van angla Thlaanghing Capa khaw a tai ai,
amah te aka tangna thlaang boeih lawng dungyan hingna a khuehna ham ni.
Pathen lawng dilai he a lungna tangkiik dawngah a Capa khat bueng khueh duen te a peek, ahih te aka tangna boeih tah duek manawh, dungyan hingna te a khueh ai.
Metihtiah Pathen lawng dilai he awl cek ham a Capa he van tuih nawh, dilai thlawnkung la awm ham ni avan tuih.
A-u khaw Capa te aka tangna boeih tah awl cek manawh; tede a-u khaw aka tangna nawh tah awl cek la awm poen, metihtiah ahih lawngah Pathen Capa khuehduen khat bueng te a tangna nawh dawngah ni.
Awlcekna biibi tah he tila ni: aangna tah dilai la law poen, tede thlaang he athe aih dawngah aangna lak ah yiinna te a lungna ngaai.
Athe thaihu aka sai boeih lawngtah cangna te a thina tih aangna ah law ham te ngaih u nawh, metihtiah athe thaihu a sai te tueng sak ham ngaih u nawh.
Tede a-u khaw asoeng thaihu theen aka sai tah aangna ah law tih a sai thaihu te Pathen kawngaih ni tite aangna lawng a tueng sak.” a tina.
Tecoengah Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Judia peng la cet u, te ah te ahimi oen awm u tih baptisma a peek.
Aenon ah te tui yahawh a awm dawngah te ah te Jesuh lawngkhaw baptisma a peek van. Aenon tah Salim khaw kalawng yoeii. Thlaangping lawng ahih tengla cet u tih ahimi te baptisma a peek.
(He vengah Johan he thongim ah tla thlan hun.)
Johan kah hubang khatsut hue tah bokna benkah ciimcaihna kawngah te Judah thlaang pakhat oen awl puung u.

Tedawngah ahimi lawng Johan tengla cet u tih, “Saya, Jordan tuiva rall kah na tengah aka awm akawng na thui thlaang te na ming aw? Ahih lawng tahe ah baptisma a peek van tih ahih tengla thlaangping broela cet u!” a tina.
Johan lawngah, “A-u khaw Pathen lawng a peek nawh atah n'tu khat khaw khueh thai nawh.
‘Kai tah Messiah nawh ni, ahih hai kah a tuih thlaang mai ni.” tila ka thui te aka mingkung tah nangmi ni.

Vaa aka sa tuemnu hulaa te tah yulokung cadawng kah thlaang ni; tede yulokung kah paya tah a tengah pai tih awl a hutung, yulokung kah awl te a yaak vengah awmngaih. Kai kah awmngaih soepna khaw te tila ni a awm.
Ahih tah roeng hang ai, tede kai tah ka tla thuk ai.” a tina.

Saw benkah aka law thlaang tah atloe boeih lak ah lenduet. Dilai dawng-kah aka law tah dilai thlaang la awm tih dilai kawng te a thui, tede vaan benkah aka law tah soeprep boeih sawah awm. Ahih lawngtah amah kah a huh oen a yaak te a thui de a-u lawngkhaw ahih awl te do u nawh.
Ahih lawngtah a huh tih a yaak te a thui de a-u khat lawngkhaw ahih awl te tangna u nawh.
Tede a-u khaw ahih kah awl te aka do tah te tila a dona rang oen Pathen tah ataktang ni a thui tila a cak sak.
Pathen lawng a tuih thlaang te tah Pathen amah Muithla te betoetla a peek dawngah Pathen awl te a thui.
A Capa te ana Pa lawng a lungna tih soeprep boeih te ahih kut ah kang a peek.
A-u khaw a Capa te aka tangna boeih tah dungyan hingna a khueh; a-u khaw a Capa awl te aka ngai nawh tah hingna te khueh nawh vetih Pathen thinsana te a sawah poe awm ai.
Jesuh lawngah Johan lak ah hubang yahawh adang tih baptisma a peek tite a yaak u.
(Atak tang atah Jesuh amah lawngtah a-u khat khaw baptisma pe nawh; a hubang hue lawng ni a peek.)
Tedawngah te tila a thui u te Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah Judia peng te a ceh taak tih Galili la te koep meel;
te vengah te Samaria peng kalawng te a ceh hamla awm.
Samaria peng khuikah Saika khaaw te a pha, Te khaaw te Jakob lawng a capa Josep a peek lohuen kalawng ah thla aih nawh.
Te ah te Jakob kah tuikhur te awm, Jesuh tah lawngpueng ceh ah bawngg malcal tih tuikhur tengah te ngawl. Te veng te tah hingthun yunyan ni.
Samari nu pakhat te tui thaan la law tih Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Tui n'awkk sak lah.” a tina.
(A hubang hue tah caak awkk lai ham khawpui khuila cet u.)

Te kah hutaa lawngah, “Nang he Judah thlaang la na awm, kai tah Samaria thlaang ni; metila kai tengah tui navan bih mai lauh?” a tina. (Judah thlaang phun lawngah Samari thlaang thli kah a hawna boengloeng oen beel thli te hawna u nawh.)
Jesuh lawng, “Pathen kah peek lungvatna tila doek na ming mai tih nang tengah tui aka bih he a-u tite na ming kawinih, ahih tengah te na bih vetih ahih lawng hingna tui te m'peek ai.” a tina.
Te kah hutaa lawngah, “Bawipa, tuium khaw na khueh nawh, tuikhur khaw dung tangkiik. Nang lawng ame kah hingna tui te na dang ai?
He kah tuikhur he patuer Jakob lawng kaimi m'peek ni; amah lawngkhaw a ca anau thli lawngkhaw, a boiava lawngkhaw he kah tui he ni rip a awkk u. Nang he Jakob lak ah na lenduet ngaai aw? a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “A-u khaw he kah tui aka aw tah tui hall koep ai,
tede, a-u khaw kai lawng ka peek tui te aka aw tah tui hall koep tlaih manawh.” a tina.
Te kah hutaa lawng, “Bawipa, te tih atah kai lawngah tuihalh la koep ka awm tlaih nawh ham khaw, he la he tui thaan la ka law koep tlaih nawh ham te tui te kai m'pe lah!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Cet langtah na vaa te khue, tecoengah koep va lawh.” a tina.
Ahih lawngah, “Kai he ka vaa awm nawh.” a tina. Jesuh lawng, “Ka vaa awm nawh na ti te soeng.
Nang lawng thlaang pa-ngaa na vaana poen, tahe ah na awm puei thlaang te na vaa tangtang nawh ni. Atak tang ni na thui.” a tina.
Te hutaa lawngah, “Bawipa, nang he tawngha ni tila kan ming.
Kaimi Samari thlaang thli kah patuer hue lawngtah he kah tlaangsawm ah he Pathen a bok u, tede nangmi Judah thlaang lawngtah Jerusalem ah ni Pathen he bok ham awm na ti u.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala, “Hutaa nang, ka awl thui he tangna lah, he kah tlaangsawm ah khaw, Jerusalem ah khaw, Pa te thlaang lawngah a bokna nawh atue te a pha ai.
Nangmi Samari thlaang lawngah a-u ka bok u tite na ming u taktak nawh; tede kaimi Judah thlaang lawngtah a-u ka bok u tite ka ming u, metihtiah Judah thlaang teng kalawng ni thlawnna tah a law.

Tede Pa tah ataktangla a awm van angla aka bok thlaang thli lawngkhaw Pathen kah Muithla tharana oen awltak oen ah a bokna atue te avan pha poen tih he ah he awm poen. Te tila aka bok te ni Pathen lawngah a ngaih.
Pathen tah Muithla la a awm dawngah ahih te aka bok thlaang lawngkhaw Muithla oen awltak la a bok ham awm.” a tina.
Hutaa lawng ahih nala, “Messiah law ai tite ka ming, ahih te a law veng atah soeprep boeih te kaimi tengah avan thui ai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Nang oen awl aka thui kai he tah ahih poen ni.” a tina.

Tevengah te Jesuh kah a hubang thli koep va meel u tih hutaa pakhat oen awl a thui te a huh u vengah ahimi tah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik. Tede ahimi khat lawngkhaw te hutaa te, “N'tu na ngaih?” te tila doet u nawh tih Jesuh te khaw, “N'tu ah ahih oen awl na thui?” tila khaw doet u nawh.
Tecoeng atah hutaa lawng tuium te a ceh taak tih khaw khuila cet koep, te kah aka awm thlaang thli nala te,
“Kai lawng ka sai thaihu boeih aka thui thlaang he law u langtah bueh u lah. Ahih he Messiah kai aw?” tila a thui pe.
Tedawngah khaw khuikah thlaang thli te law u tih Jesuh tengla cet u.
Teveng ruet ah te a hubang hue lawng Jesuh nala te, “Saya, buh ca de saw!” a tina u.
Tede ahih lawng, “Akawng alam na ming u nawh buh te caak hamla ka khueh.” a tina.
Tedawngah hubang hue lawng doet u the tih, “thlaang pakhat khat lawng buh avan peek kai aw?” ti u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Kai kah buh tah kai aka tuihkung kah kawngaih te vai ham oen ah sai ham bii m'peek te coeng pe ham ni.
Nangmi lawngtah, ‘he coengah thla lii a awm atah caang ah ham khoek poen ai’ na ti u. Tede kavan thui u, loha thli ke a theenla dan u lah; tahe ah caang hiin poen tih caang ah ham khoek poen!
Caang aat thli lawng thapang a dang u tih dungyan hingna hamla caangvui te a cawi u; tedawngah caang aka tuhkung oen caang aatkung tah awmngaih bok ai.
‘Thlaang pakhat lawng a tuh tih thlaangtloe pakhat lawng a ah” tila a thui awl te soeng tangtang.
Nangmi lawng na bina nawh lohuen ah caang aat la kan tuih u; te ah te thlaangtloe lawng bii a bi tih ahimi kah biibina dawngah te nangmi lawng athawn na dang u” a tina.
Te kah hutaa lawngah te, “Kai lawng thaihu ka sai boeih te ahih lawngah avan thui” tila te a thui pe dawngah, te khaw kah aka awm Samari thlaang broe lawng Jesuh te a tangna u.
Tedawngah Samari thlaang thli lawng Jesuh tengla avan pha u vengah te kaimi tengah cam mai de a tina u tih Jesuh tah te khaw ah te khawhin hin hih cam.
Amah kah awl thui a yaak u dawngah thlaang broe lawng a tangna u tih,

ahimi lawng te kah hutaa nala te, “Nang lawng na thui dawngah nawh tih, kamami roe lawng amah awl thui ka yaak u poen dawngah ahih tah he dilai thlawnkung ni tila ka ming u tih tahe ah ka tangna u poen.” a tina.
Te ah te hin hih a cam coengah Jesuh tah Galili la te cet.
Metihtiah Jesuh amah lawngah te, “Tawngha he amah ram khuiah thangpawm u nooek nawh.” tila a thui u.
Galili te a pha veng atah te kah thlaang thli lawng a do u, metihtiah ahimi tah Jerusalem ah Kaantaak Poei vengah cet u van tih te poei ah ahih kah a sai thaihu boeih te a huh u dawngah ni.
Tecoengah tui te misurtui la a coeng sakna Galili peng kah Kanaa khaaw la te koep cet. Te ah te ukkungbawi pakhat awm, Kapernaum khaaw ah aka awm a capa te tlo.
Ahih lawngah Judia kalawng Galili la Jesuh va law tite a yaak vengah a tengla cet tih a capa aka duek tawm te hoeih sak ham ah Kapernaum la poe ceh hamla reenna a bih.
Jesuh lawngah ahih nala te, “Nangmi lawngah kawpoekraina oen kawpoekrai thaihu te na huh u nawh atah mevengah khaw na tangna u manawh” a tina.
Te kah bawi lawngah, “Bawipa, ka ca a duek thlan ah law mai de.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Cet loeih, na ca te hing badai.” a tina. Te kah thlaang lawng Jesuh awl te a tangna tih cet.
Lawngpueng a ceh phai vengah te a tuihyoeihthlaang thli oen hum u tih, “Na capa te theen badai” a tina awlthang oen avan voekk u.
Ahih lawngah a capa te mevengah a hoeih tila a doet tih ahimi lawngah, “N'thlem hingthun khawnoek pakhat ah a sanat lawng a thlah” tila a thui pe u.
Tevengah ana pa lawngah, “Na Capa te theen badai” tila Jesuh lawng a tina atue ni tite a ming. Tedawngah amah oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng a tangna u.
He tah Judia kalawng Galili la a law coengah Jesuh lawng apabe kawpoekraina miknoek a sai ni.
He coengah Judah hue kah bokna poei a awm dawngah Jesuh te Jerusalem la cet.
Jerusalem kah Tuu Thawhka tengah te tuilii pakhat awm, te tuilii tengah savang pa-ngaa a sak u, te kah tuilii te Hebru awl la Betzatha tila a thui u.
Te kah savang ah te thlaangtlo thli, mikpum, khowkheem oen kutkheem thli broela ral u.

(Pathen kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng metuek tue vengah nuem tah tuilii ah te law tih tui te a phuul sak. Tui te a phuul coengah Lamhacuekla tuilii khuiah aka sungpung thlaangtlo tah me ang tlawhnat khaw a hoeih pe dawngah ahimi lawng tui aka phuul te a ring u.)
Te ah te sawmthum kum reet aka tlo puet thlaang pakhat awm.
Jesuh lawngah ahih te ah a ralh te a huh, te thlaang te tah a san hlang tlo puet poen tite ahih lawng a ming; tedawngah ahih nala te, “Hoeih ham na ngaih aw?” tila a doet.
Te kah thlaangtlo lawngah, “Bawipa, tui a phuul vengah, tuilii dawng kai aka tulh ham thlaang awm nawh; tuilii dawngah ka cet ai ka ti vengah thlaangtloe lawng n'khall poen.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Tho lah, na ihphah te lo lang cet loeih.” a tina.
Kawlkalh ca ah te thlaang te hoeih; a ihphah te a lawh tih cet. Te hin te tah Sabbath khawhin ni
tedawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng aka hoeih thlaangtlo nala te, “Tihin he Sabbath khawhin la awm tih ihphah na kawh te mami kah Phungawl lawng ngaih nawh.” a tina u.
Ahih lawngah, “Kai aka hoeih sak lawngah na ihphah te lo langtah cet loeih ti ta” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “He tila sai ham aka thuikung te a-u?” tila a doet u.
Tede aka hoeih thlaang te lawngah Jesuh te a-u ti khaw ming nawh, metihtiah te kah aka awm thlaangping tim ah Jesuh tah cet valh poen.

Tecoeng atah Jesuh lawng ahih te Tempal bok-im khuiah a huh tih, “Hutung lah, tahe tah na hoeih poen; thawlhna sai tlaih boel, toeng loeih, tetih nawh kawinih athe-eep ngaai na sawah pakhat khat va thoeng ai.” a tina.
Tecoengah te kah thlaang lawng cet tih ahih aka hoeih sak te Jesuh ni tila aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tengah te a thui pe.
Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo a hoeih sak dawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh te heem-atek hamla a tong u poen.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “A Pa lawng bii a bi yoeyah dawngah kai lawngkhaw ka bi van ai.” a tina.

Ahih lawng Sabbath phung te a phe bueng muehla Pathen te amah kah ana Pa la a thui tih amah te Pathen oen van at la a khueh, a awl thui lawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang boeih te a thin a phawh pe tare tih ahih te ngawn hamla a teeng u.

Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Awltak kavan thui u; Capa lawngah amah ngaih ah thaihu khat khaw sai thai nawh; ana Pa lawng a sai thaihu a huh te ni a sai. Ana Pa lawng a sai te Capa lawngkhaw a sai van.
Metihtiah ana Pa lawng Capa te a lungna dawngah amah lawng a sai boeih te a Capa a huh sak. He lak ah aka lenduet thaihu te a huh sak vetih nangmi boeih tah na kawpoek rai u ai.
Ana Pa lawng thlaangduek a thawh sak tih hingna a peek angla Capa lawngkhaw amah lawng a ngaih thlaang thli te hingna a peek.
Ana Pa amah lawng a-u khaw awl cek nawh. Ahih lawng a Capa tengah awl cek thaina te asoepla a peek poen,
Ahimi lawng ana Pa te a hinyahna van angla thlaang boeih lawng a Capa te a hinyahna van ham ni. A-u khaw Capa te a hinyah nawh atah ahih tuihkung ana Pa te hinyah nawh.
“Awltak kavan thui u: a-u khaw ka awl a yaak tih kai aka tuihkung te a tangna atah dungyan hingna te a khueh. Ahih te awl cek tlaih manawh, metihtiah duekna kalawng hingna ah kuun poen.
Awltak kavan thui u: Pathen Capa awl te thlaangduek thli lawng a yaakna atue te law ai, te kah atue te avan pha poen, te awl aka ya boeih tah hing ai.
Ana Pa amah te hingna kungpui la awm, tetih van la a Capa te hingna kungpui la awm ham a sai poen.
Tecoengah a Capa tah Thlaanghing Capa la a awm dawngah awl cek thaina te a peek poen.
He dawngah he na kawpoek rai sak aih boel, thlaangduek thli lawng ahih awl a yaakna atue te law lii poen;
ahimi tah thlann khui tho kalawng u ai, theenna aka sai thlaang thli tah tho u vetih hing ai; athe aka sai thlaang thli khaw tho u van ai, tede dan a tat ai.

“Kai lawngah kamah rang oen thaihu khat khaw ka sai nawh; Pathen lawng avan thui angla ni awl ka cek, tedawngah kai kah awlcekna tah doeng, metihtiah kai lawng kamah ngaih te sai ham ka yawm nawh, tede kai aka tuihkung kah kawngaih te ni ka sai.
Kai lawngah kamah kawng te sausi ka deng atah ka thui he aka soeng taktak nawh ni.
Tede kai yueng la sausi dengkung pakhat awm tih ahih lawng kai kawng alam a thui te soeng tila ka ming.
Nangmi lawng Johan tengla laipai na tuih u tih ahih lawng awltak avan thui.
Kai lawngah thlaang kah sausi deng he ka ngaih dawngah nawh ni; he tila ka thui he nangmi lawng thlawnna na dangna ham ni.
Johan he tah haialh aka aang haivang oen lo u tih nangmi lawngah ahih kah aangna khuiah kawlkalh ni awmtheen ham na ngaih u.

Tede Johan kah sausideng lak ah alentloe sausideng ham ka khueh: te tah a Pa lawng sai ham m'peek bii ka sai te ni, te lawng atah kai yuengla awl a thui vetih a Pa lawng kai he a tuih tila a tueng sak ai.
Tecoengah tuihkung Pathen lawngkhaw kai yuengla sausi a deng ai. Nangmi lawng ahih awl te na ya nooek u nawh, a mik-hai te na huh nooek u nawh dawngah
nangmi lawng ahih awl te na thinkaw lungbui ah na khoem u thai nawh, metihtiah amah lawng avan tuih thlaang te nangmi lawng na tangna u nawh dawngah ni.
Nangmi lawng Caciim khuiah dungyan hingna ka huh ai tila na poek u tih Caciim na thoel na laang u. Caciim lawngah he kai kah kawng alam ni a thui.
Hingna khueh hamla ka tengah law ham tah na ngaih u nawh.
Kai lawngah thlaang kah koeh awl te ka tlap nawh,
Tede nangmi he me ang thlaang tite kan ming u tih nangmi lawng thinkaw lungbui oen Pathen na lungna u nawh ti khaw ka ming.
Kai tah a Pa rang oen ni ka law, tede kai he nangmi lawng nan do u nawh; tede thlaangtloe pakhat khat amah kah saithaina aana oen a law vengah ahih te na do u badai.
Nangmi lawngtah khat oen khat tengkah koehna awl te na ngaih u, tede Pathen pakhat bueng tengkah koehna dang ham tah na yawm u nawh; tetih atah metila kai he nan tangna u pai ai?
Tede kai lawngah nangmi he a Pa haiah thawlh m'peel ai tila poek u boel. Nangmi lawng na uep na pangna Mosi lawng ni thawlh m'peel u ai.
Nangmi lawng Mosi he na tangna u tak tak kawinih kai he nan tangna u suide ta; metihtiah ahih lawngah kai kah kawng alam ni a thut.
Tede ahih kah cathut te na tangna u nawh poen atah kai lawng ka thui he metila na tangna u pai ai.” a tina.
He coeng atah Jesuh te Galili Tuiliipui ah te kaa phai. (Tiberias Tuiliipui tila khaw a thui u).
Ahimi lawngah thlaangtlo a hoeih sak kawpoekrai noekna te a huh u tih thlaangping lawng a hu ah bung a vai.
Jesuh te tlaangsawm la luui tih a hubang thli oen haih ngawl u.
Kaantaak Poei atue tah yoeii poen.
Jesuh lawng a teng avai te a dan vengah thlaangping yahawh hlang a tengla a law te a huh, tevengah Filip te a doet tih, “He kah thlaang he yoeh hamla caak khoek buh he ame ah n'lai thai ai?” a tina.
(He tila a doet he tah Filip te noekdak ham a ngaih; amah lawngtah metila ka sai ai tite a ming poen).
Filip lawngah, “Thlaang boeih lawng ayawlca ah yeen a caak ham Pateng takawi laina ham ngun tangka yahnih khoek manawh.” a tina.
A hubang atloe pakhat, Simon Piter kah a manau, Andru lawngah,
“He ah he baalii takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih aka khueh camaw tawngpaca pakhat awm” a tina. Tede he kah thlaang he yoeh hamla te ang ca mai te khoek manawh.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Thlaangping te ngawlh sak lah,” a tina. (Te ah te pompih moen awm). Te ah te thlaang boeih te ngawl u; te kah thlaang te thong ngaa yun awm.
Jesuh lawng takawi te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awm-ngaih awl a thui, tecoengah te kah aka ngawl thlaangping tengah te a ree. Nga te khaw te tila te a sai tih ahimi lawngah ahahla a caak u.
Ahimi boeih lawng ahahla a caak u coeng atah a hubang hue nala te, “Acoeih aphe te cawi uh; baw-are sak boel.” a tina.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng a cawi u tih baalii takawi cuun ngaa dawngkah thlaangping lawng a caak coeih te vawhphueih paha thlaihih dawngah abela a cawi u.
Jesuh lawng a sai kawpoekrai miknoekna he aka hu thlaang boeih lawngah, “Ahih he tah dilai dawngah aka law ham koei Tawngha taktak te ni” tila a thui u.
Ahimi lawngah law u vetih amangkhakla amah te sengpahrang la n'khueh u ai tite Jesuh lawng a ming tih; tedawngah tlaangsawm la te amah bueng koep cet.
Khaw athlem thuk veng atah Jesuh kah a hubang hue te tuiliipui la cet thuk u,
Lowng dawngah ngawl u tih Kapernaum khaw benla te tuiliipui ah kaa u phai tih cet u. Khaw tah yiin poen de ahimi tengla Jesuh tah pha thlan hun.
Tevengah khaw thlii khuengdeng tih tuilet tho.
A hubang hue lawng meng thum, meng lii yunyan lowng te a kaih u coeng atah tui sawah Jesuh te law phai tih lowng a awmna benla ayoeii rep te a huh u veng atah ahimi lawng a rih u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Rih u boel, kai ni” a tina.
Tecoengah lowng dawngah te awmngaihcala a ngawlh sak u, tecoeng atah ahimi lawng pha ham a ngaih ahuen te kawlkalh ah a pha u.

Avuen khawhin atah tuiliipui khatben rall ah aka awm thlaangping lawng, te huen ah lowng pakhat bueng a awm te a ming u. Te kah Lowng dawngah Jesuh cet nawh tih a hubang hue bueng ni a ceh u tite a ming u.
Tiberias kalawng aka law atloe lowng thli te, Bawipa lawng awmngaih awl a thui coengah thlaangping lawng takawi a caakna huen tuikeeng ah te avan pha u.
Thlaangping lawngah te huen ah te Jesuh oen a hubang hue khaw awm u nawh tite a ming u vengah te kah lowng dawngah te luui u tih ahih te tlap hamla Kapernaum khaw la te cet u.
Thlaangping lawng tuiliipui khatben rall ah Jesuh te a huh u vengah, “Saya, me vengah he la he na pha?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Awltak kavan thui u; nangmi lawngah kawpoekrai miknoekna te na yaakming u dawngah kai he nan tlap u moenih, takawi te a hah toett la na caak u dawngah ni nan tlap u.

Aka awm poe nawh caak awkk ham bii bi u boel; te lak ah dungyan aka awm caak awkk ham bii te bi uh. Thlaanghing Capa lawng caak awkk te m'peek ai; metihtiah Pa Pathen lawngah ahih sawah amah kah ngaikhuekna miknoek a khueh poen.” a tina.
Te atah ahimi lawngah, “Pathen lawng kaimi sai sak ham a ngaih te ka bina u thai ham n'tu ka sai u ai?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Pathen lawng nangmi sai sak ham a ngaih te tah amah lawng avan tuih thlaang te tangna ham lawngah ni” a tina.
Ahimi lawng, “Kaimi lawngah na sai te ka huh u tih nang te kan tangna u hamla kawpoekrai miknoek n'tu na sai ai? Nang lawng n'tu navan sai ai?
Caciim lawngah a thui angla, ‘Ahih lawngtah ahimi kah caak hamla vaan kah takawi a peek’ a ti van angla kaimi kah patuer hue lawngtah ramhum huhang ah manna te a caak u.” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Awltak kavan thui u, Mosi lawng nangmi m'peek te vaan kah takawi nawh ni; vaan kah takawi tangtang te nangmi aka pe tah a Pa ni.
Metihtiah Pathen kah peek takawi tah vaan kalawng law thuk tih dilai he hingna a peek.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Bawipa, te takawi te yoeyahla kaimi m'pe lah.” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Kai tah hingna takawi ni, a-u khaw ka tengah aka law tah meveng khaw a bung pawng manawh; a-u khaw kai he aka tangna tah meveng khaw tui hall manawh.
Tede kavan thui u, tahe ah nan huh u poen de nan tangna u nawh.
A Pa kah peek boeih tah ka tengla law ai. A-u khaw ka tengah aka law boeih tah ka hek manawh.
Metihtiah kamah kawngaih sai hamla vaan kah ka law nawh tih kai aka tuihkung kah kawngaih te sai ham ni ka law.
Kai he aka tuihkung kah kawngaih tah ka tengah amah kah peek boeih te pakhat khaw ha-ata sak ham nawh ni, tede aboetna khawhin ah ahimi boeih te thawh sak tih hing sak ham ni.
Metihtiah Capa te a huh tih aka tangna boeih lawngtah dungyan hingna te khueh hamla a Pa lawng a ngaih. Tecoengah aboetna khawhin ah ka thawh vetih ka hing sak ai.” a tina.
Ahih lawngah, “Kai tah vaan kalawng aka rum thuk takawi ni” tila a thui dawngah te kah thlaangping hue te caitoek u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng, “He thlaang he Josep capa Jesuh nawh aw? Mami lawng ana pa oen a manu khaw m'ming u ta. Metila vaan kalawng ka rum thuk a ti mai?” ti u.
Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi lawng caitoek khiing u boel, toeng u loeih.
Kai he aka tuihkung a Pa lawngah ka tengla avan mawt nawh atah a-u khat khaw ka tengah law thai manawh; aboetna khawhin ah ahih te ka thawh vetih ka hing sak ai.
Tawngha thli lawng, “Thlaang boeih te Pathen lawng a cang puei ai” tila a thut. A-u khaw Pa awl te a yaak tih aka cang tah ka tengla law u.
He tah a Pa te aka hu thlaang awm ti ngaihna nawh ni; Pathen tengkah aka law bueng lawng ni Pa te a huh.
Awltak tang kavan thui u: ahih te aka tangna tah dungyan hingna a khueh.
Kai tah hingna takawi ni.
Nangmi kah patuer hue lawng ramhum hu hang ah manna te a caak u de ahimi boeih tah duek u.
Tede, a-u khaw vaan kah aka rum thuk takawi te aka ca boeih tah duek manawh.

Kai tah vaan kalawng aka rum thuk hingna takawi ni. A-u khaw he takawi he aka ca tah yoeyahla hing poen ai. Kai lawng ka peek ham koei takawi tah ka thi ka sa he ni, dilai lawng a hingna ham ka peek ni.” a tina.
He awl lawngah ahimi tim ah te thinso kawsa a thawh sak tih, “He kah thlaang lawngah he mami kah caak hamla metila a thi asa te mami m'peek thai ai?” tila doet u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Awltak kavan thui u: nangmi lawngah Thlaanghing Capa kah a ngan te na ca u nawh tih a thi te na awkk u nawh atah hingna te na khuiah awm manawh,
A-u khaw ka ngan he a caak tih ka thi he a awkk atah dungyan hingna a khueh tih ahih te aboetna khawhin ah ka thawh vetih ka hing sak ai.
Metihtiah ka ngan he tah caak ham tangtang tih ka thi he tah awkk ham koei tangtang ni.
A-u khaw ka ngan he a caak tih ka thi he aka aw tah kai dawngah hing tih kai khaw ahih dawngah ka hing.
Aka hing a Pa lawngah kai he n'tuih tih ahih rang oen ah kai khaw ka hing. Tetih van angla a-u khaw kai he aka ca tah kai rang oen ah hing ai.

Tecoengah he tah vaan kalawng aka law takawi ni; he takawi he aka ca tah yoeyahla hing poen ai. He tah nangmi kah patuer hue lawng a caak takawi oen lo u nawh, te kah takawi te aka ca tah duek u.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he awl he Kapernaum khaw Sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei.
He awl he a huvai thlaang broe lawng a yaak u vengah, “He kah cangpueina he rai tangkiik aih, a-u lawng a yaakming thai ai?” ti u.
He kawngah ahimi caitoek u tite a-u lawngkhaw thui pe muehla Jesuh lawngah a ming tih tedawngah ahimi te, “He awl lawngah he na kaw avan boet sak u aw?
Thlaanghing Capa he acuek vengkah a awmna huen la a luui koep hang te na hu u mai kawinih me tih ni na ti u oh ai?
Hingna pekung tah Pathen Muithla ni; thlaanghing tharana tah a poei ni. Nangmi tengah kavan thui awl lawngah hingna aka pe Pathen Muithla te avan law puei.
Tede nangmi khatsut lawngtah na tangna u nawh.” a tina. (Jesuh lawngah thlaang pakhat lawngtah tangna nawh vetih amah sawah paipi a thleep ai tite acuekca kalawng a ming poen.)
Tecoengah a thui pe tih, “He kawngah ni a Pa lawng avan tuih nawh atah a-u khaw ka tengla law thai manawh tila acuekca ah kavan thui u teta.” a tina.
He kawngah he Jesuh kah a huvai thlaang broe te meel koep u tih a hu ah te bang u tlaih nawh.
Tedawngah a hubang thlaihih hue te, “Nangmi khaw kai he ceh taak ham na ngaih u van aw?” tila a doet.
Simon Piter lawngah, “Bawipa, a-u tengla ka ceh u ai? Nang lawng ni dungyan hingna na khueh.
Tahe atah nang he Pathen tengkah aka law Thlaang Ciim tila kan tangna tih kan ming u poen.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi thlaihih hue he kai lawng kan tuek u nawh aw? Nangmi khuikah pakhat tah raaithe la awm!” a tina.
Ahih lawng Simon Iskariot capa Judah kawng ni a thui. Metihtiah Judah khaw hubang paha thlaihih khuikah pakhat van de ahih sawah te paipi a thleep.
He coengah Jesuh tah Galili peng la te kamyin la cet; Judia peng khuiah aka awm aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng ahih te ngawn ham a ngaih u dawngah tela te yin ceh ham ngaih nawh.
Judah thlaangphun kah Riim-im Poei atue te yoeii poen,
tedawngah Jesuh te a manau hue lawngah, “He kalawng Judia la cet langtah nang lawng na sai thaihu thli te na huvai thli lawng hu u van seh.
A-u lawngkhaw miing thang te a ngaih atah a sai thaihu te thuh elh thai nawh. Nang lawng he ang thaihu thli he na sai dawngah na kawng he dilai pum lawng ming lah seh!” a tina u.
(Amah kah a manau hue lawngkhaw tangna u nawh.)
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Kai ham atue atang pha thlan hun. Nangmi ham tah me ang atue atang khaw theen mai ta.
Dilai lawng nangmi n'thina moenih, kai ni n'thina, metihtiah kai lawngah ahimi kah athe te ka poer pe dawngah n'thina u.
Te kah poei la te nangmi cet uh, kai ham tah atue a pha thlan dawngah te poei la te kai tah ka cet manawh.” a tina.
He tila a thui pe tih Galili ah te awm.
Te kah Poei la te a manau thli a ceh coeng atah Jesuh khaw cet van; tede langya ah cet nawh tih ahuepla cet.
Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng ahih te poei khuiah a tlap u tih, “Ahih he mela a awm kai?” ti u.
Thlaangping tim ah ahih kawng te tuemtuem a thui u. Thlaang khatsut lawng, “Ahih te thlaang theen ni,” ti u tih khatsut lawng, “Thlaangthe ni.” ti u.
Tede aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih u dawngah ahih kawng te a-u lawngkhaw langya ah thui u nawh.
Te kah Poei te tentanrak a boeih tawm veng atah Jesuh te Tempal bok-im la cet tih a cang puei.
Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik tih, “He thlaang he sengim khaw kai nooek nawh de, thoemthaina he yoeh he metila a ming kai?” ti u.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai lawng kan cang puei u he kamah kah cangpueina nawh ni, tede kai aka tuihkung Pathen tengkah aka law ni.
A-u khaw Pathen kawngaih te sai ham aka ngaih lawngtah kan cang puei u he Pathen tengah aka law aw, tihnawhtah kamah kah saithaina aana oen ka thui aw ti he a ming ai.

Amah kah saithaina aka thui thlaang tah amah ham ruep-awmna dang ham aka yawm thlaang ni. Tede ahih te aka tuihkung kah ruep-awmna aka tlap thlaang tah boe a ngaai tih ahih dawngah thawlhpalhna khat khaw awm nawh.
Mosi lawng Phungawl te nangmi m'peek u. Tede a-u khat lawngkhaw Phungawl te na vai u nawh. Nangmi lawng n'tu dawngah kai he ngawn ham nan teeng u?” a tina.
Thlaangping lawngah, “Nang he raaithe na khueh! A-u lawngah nang he ngawn ham n'teeng u?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai lawng kawpoek rai miknoekna pakhat ka sai tih nangmi boeih na kawpoek rai u.

Mosi lawng na capa thli te yahhuivuen reet ham avan thui u, (te te Mosi lawng sai nawh tih na patuer hue lawng ni a tong u.) tedawngah nangmi lawng Sabbath khawhin ah na capa thli te yahhuivuen na reet pe u.

Tecoengah Mosi kah Phungawl te phe nawh ham ah Sabbath khawhin ah camaw tawngpaca te yahhui-vuen na reet u atah kai lawng Sabbath khawhin ah thlaang te aciimthlaula ka hoeih sak dawngah he n'tu ah na thin a sa u?
Asaw ahan kah alan atang oen awltloek mailai he toeng u loeih, asoeng akam taktak la awl tloek uh.” a tina.
Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang khatsut lawng, “Aana khuehkung thli lawng ngawn hamla a teeng u te ahih he nawh aw?
Bueh lah! Ahih lawng langya ah awl a thui, ahimi lawng me tih khaw a tina u nawh kai? Ahih he Messiah ni tila ahimi lawng a ming u tangtang aw?
Messiah te a law vengah ahih te ame kalawng a law tite a-u lawngkhaw ming manawh. Tede mami boeih lawng he kah thlaang he ame kalawng a law tite m'ming u.” tila a thui u.

Jesuh lawng Tempal bok-im khuiah a cang puei vengah, awl a huer tih, “Nangmi lawng kai he nan ming u taktak tih ame kalawng ka law ti khaw na ming u aw? Kai he kamah rang oen ka law nawh. Tede kai aka tuihkung tah soeng tangtang, ahih te nangmi lawng na ming u nawh,
tede, kai lawngtah ka ming, metihtiah kai tah ahih teng kalawng ka law tih kai he ahih lawng n'tuih dawngah ni.” a tina.
Te vengah te ahimi lawng ahih te tuuk ham a yawm u de ahih kah atue a pha thlan dawngah a-u khat lawngkhaw tu u nawh.
Tede thlaang rangpui khuikah akuum ngaai lawngah ahih te a tangna tih, “Messiah te a law atah ahih lawngah he kah thlaang lak ah he kawpoekrai miknoek yahawh a sai ai aw?” ti u.
Jesuh kawng te thlaangping lawng-ah te tila tuemtuem a thui u te Farasi thlaang thli lawng a yaak u, tedawngah ahimi oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng ahih te tuuk sak hamla raalkap a tuih u.
Jesuh lawngah, “Kai he nangmi tengah kawlkalh ni ka awm ai, tecoeng atah kai aka tuihkung tengla ka cet ai.
Nangmi lawng nan tlap u ai, kai ka awmna ham koei ahuen la te na cet thai u nawh vetih kai he nan hu u manawh.” a tina.

Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawngah amami khat oen khat te, “Mami lawng huh nawh ham mela a ceh vik ai? Mami phun Judah thlaang thli a awmna Krik khawpui la cet vetih Krik thlaang thli te a cang puei ai aw?
‘Nan tlap u suide nan hu u manawh, tecoengah ka awmna ham koei ahuen la te na law u thai manawh’ a tite n'tu a thuingaihna kai?” ti u.
Te kah poeipui aboetna khawhin ah te Jesuh lawng pai tih, “A-u khaw tui aka hall tah ka tengla law selang tah tui aw lah seh.
Caciim lawngah, “A-u khaw kai aka oeng tah a thinkaw khui kalawng hingna tui te phuet ai’ a ti angla awm ai” tila angaih hlang la pang tih a thui.

Jesuh lawng amah te aka tangna thlaang thli lawng a dang ham koei Muithla kawng te ni he tila a thui. Te kah atue vengah ahih te Muithla pe thlan hun, metihtiah Jesuh te ruep-awm la thawh sak thlan hun.
He tila a thui te thlaangping timkah khatsut lawng a yaak u vengah, “He kah thlaang he tawngha tangtang ni!” ti u.
Thlaangtloe lawngtah, “Ahih he Messiah ni!” tila a thui u. Tede thlaangtloe lawngtah, “Messiah he Galili kalawng law manawh!
Caciim lawng a thui tah, “Messiah he Sengpahrang Devid kah cadil la awm vetih Devid amah a awmna Bethlehem khawpui khuiah ni a thang ai.” tila a thui u.
Tedawngah thlaangping hue tah Jesuh kawngah a kaw poek vai u nawh.
Thlaang khatsut lawngtah tuuk hamla a ngaih u de a-u lawngkhaw tu u nawh.
Raalkap hue te a meel u koep veng atah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Farasi hue lawng ahimi nala te, “Ahih te n'tu ah navan khuen u nawh.” tila a doet.
Raalkap hue lawng, “A-u khat lawngkhaw te kah thlaang angla awl thui nooek u nawh!” a tina u.
Farasi hue lawng, “Nangmi khaw n'ngau sak u poen aw?
Aana khuehkung khaw, Farasi thlaang khaw ahih te aka tangna pakhat mai khaw na ming u aw?
He kah thlaangping lawngah Mosi kah Phungawl ming u nawh, tedawngah ahimi lawng Pathen kah kawsi te a yawkk u poen!” a tina.
Farasi thlaang pakhat, he veng thlan ah Jesuh te huh ngaih ah aka cet Nikodemu te awm. Ahih lawng thlaangtloe hue nala te,
“Mami kah Phungawl ning ah, thlaang pakhat te amah awl thui n'yaak thlan ah, a sai thaihu khaw huh thlan ah awl khueng thaina awm nawh.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Nang khaw Galili thlaang van aw? Caciim te thoel alang lah, Galili kalawng tawngha khat khaw thoeng vai nawh tite na ming ai.” a tina u.
Tecoeng atah thlaang boeih te im la meel u, tede Jesuh tah Olif Tlaang la te cet.
Avuen mincanghi ah Tempal bok-im la te koep cet. Thlaangping lawng ahih te a veel khoep u, ngawl thuk tih ahimi te a cang puei.
Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang thli lawng a samphaih vengah a tuuk u hutaa pakhat te avan khuen u tih ahimi boeih haiah te a pai sak u.
Ahimi lawng Jesuh nala te, “Saya, he kah hutaa he a samphaih lii veng roe ah a tuuk u.
Mami kah Phungawl dawng Mosi lawngtah he ang hutaa he a duek toela lungto oen de mat ham awm tila awl a khueng. Nang lawng ta, metila na thui ai? a tina u.

Ahimi lawng he tila a thui u he tah, Jesuh te amah awl thui dawngah a thawlh tuuk pe ham oen ah ahimi lawng thawlh a peel thaina ham ni. Tede ahih lawng buekuep tih a kutdawn oen dilai dawngah ca a thut.
Te kah aka pai thlaang thli lawng a doet khiing u dawngah adoengla ngawl tih ahimi nala te, “Nangmi tim kah thawlhna aka sai vai nawh lawngah lungto oen de lamha seh.” a tina.
Tecoengah koep buekuep thuk tih dilai dawngah ca a thut.
Ahimi lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah, ahaamca kalawng a tong tih pakhat coeng khat ahimi boeih te cet u khongphaat. Te kah aka pai khiing hutaa oen Jesuh bueng te a ceh taak u.
Ahih tah adoengla ngawl tih hutaa nala te, “Mela a ceh kang u? Nang kah thawlhna khee hamla khat khaw awm u nawh aw?” a tina.
Te hutaa lawngah, “Bawipa khat khaw awm u nawh.” a tina. Jesuh lawngah, “Tetih atah theen, kai lawngkhaw kan khee van manawh. Cet loeih, tede thawlh koep tlaih boel.” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah Farasi thlaang thli nala te, “Kai tah dilai aangna ni, a-u khaw ka hu ah aka bang tah hingna aangna te a khueh vetih yiinna khuiah yingyawi tlaih manawh.
Farasi thlaang thli lawng, “Nang lawng namah kawng ni na thui; na awlthui te khaw a poei-oep ni.” a tina u.

Jesuh lawngah, “Tih nawh ni, kai lawng kamah kawng he ka thui cakhaw aka soeng ni ka thui, metihtiah kai lawngah ame kalawng ka law tih mela ka ceh ai tite ka ming. Nangmi lawngtah kai he ame kalawng ka law tih mela ka ceh ai ti khaw na ming u nawh.
Nangmi lawngtah thlaanghing siing la awl na cek u; Kai lawngah a-u khat khaw awl ka cek nawh.
Tede kai lawng he tila ka sai mai cakhaw kamah bueng lawng awl ka tloek moenih; kai aka tuihkung a Pa te ka tengah a awm dawngah kai kah awltloekna tah soeng ai.
Namami kah Phungawl dawngah, sausi thlaang pahih lawng a pai puei atah a thui te soeng tila a thut.
Kai lawng kamah kawng ka thui, kai aka tuihkung a Pa lawngkhaw ka kawng alam he a thui.” a tina.

Ahimi lawngah, “Na Pa te mela a awm?” a tina u. Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi lawng kai he khaw nan ming u nawh, a Pa khaw na ming u nawh. Nangmi lawng kai he nan ming u kawinih a Pa khaw na ming u van ai” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he kah awl boeih he Tempal bok-im khuikah tangka khuehna kong tengah a cang puei u vengah te a thui. Tede amah kah atue te a pha thlan dawngah a-u lawngkhaw a hih te tu u nawh.

Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah te a thui pe koep tih, “Kai tah athlala ka cet ai; nangmi lawng nan tlap u ai, tede nangmi tah namami kah thawlhna dawngah na duek u ai. Ka cehna ahuen la te nangmi na cet thai u manawh” a tina.
Tedawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng, “Ahih lawngah ka cehna huen ah nangmi na cet thai manawh tila a thui he amah oen amah te ka ngawn u ai a ti ngaihna aw?” tila a thui u.
Jesuh lawngah, “Nangmi tah adang ben dilai thlaang la na awm u, tede kai tah asawben kah aka law ni. Nangmi tah dilai thlaang ni, tede kai tah dilai thlaang nawh ni.
Tedawngah ni nangmi tah na thawlhna dawngah na duek ai kan tina u. Tecoengah, “Kai Tah Ka Awm Tih Ka Awm’ tila aka thui te na tangna u nawh atah namami thawlhna dawngah na duek ai.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Nang he a-u?” tila a doet u. Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Acuekca veng kalawng kavan thui u poen.
Nangmi kawng he ka thui hamla moen awm, nangmi he sal-aphaam hamla moen awm. Tede kai aka tuihkung tah soeng tangtang tih kai lawng ahih tengkah ka yaak te ni dilai tengah ka thui.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ana Pa kawng te a thui vengah ahimi lawng yaakming u nawh.

Tedawngah ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng thlaanghing Capa te na tai u vengah, “Kai Tah Ka Awm Tih Ka Awm” tila aka thui te na ming u badai, tecoengah kai lawngah kamah kah saithaina aana oen khat khaw ka sai nawh, tede kai lawng thui hamla a Pa amah kah thuituenna bueng te ni ka thui tite na ming u ai.
Tecoengah kai aka tuihkung te tah ka tengah awm; metihtiah kai lawngah ahih kah kawhoena te ka sai poepa dawngah kamah bueng n'ceh taak sut nawh.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he kah thaihu thli a thui he aka ya thlaang broe lawngah ahih te a tangna u.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng amah aka tangna thlaang thli tengah, “Kai lawng kan cang puei u he nangmi lawng na tangna u atah nangmi tah kai kah hubang tangtang la na awm u;
awltak te na ming u vetih te kah awltak lawng nangmi te n'loeih sak ai.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Kaimi tah Abraham cadil la ka awm u tih a-u khat kah saltamnaa la khaw ka awm u nawh. ‘Nangmi tah na loeih ai’ tila na thui te n'tu na thuingaihna?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Awltak kavan thui u: a-u khaw thawlhna aka sai boeih tah thawlhna sal la awm.
Sal lawngtah imkhuikaw pakhat ah akaanla poe awm nawh, tede a capa tah yoeyahla poe awm.
Nangmi te Capa lawng n'loeih sak atah na loeih u tangtang ai.
Nangmi he Abraham cadil tite ka ming ngoen ta. Kai lawng kan cang puei he nangmi lawng na do u nawh dawngah kai he ngawn ham nangmi lawng na yawm u.
A Pa lawngah kai n'huh sak akawng alam te ni kai lawngah ka thui, tede nangmi lawngtah na pa lawng avan thui te na sai u.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Abraham tah kaimi na pa ni.” a tina u. Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Nangmi he Abraham kah ca anau taktak atah ahih lawng a sai thaihu te ang te na sai u van ai ta.
Nangmi tengah he Pathen tengkah ka yaak te ni kavan thui, tede nangmi lawngtah kai he ngawn ham nan teeng u. Abraham lawngtah he tila a sai moenih!
Nangmi lawngtah na pa kah kah a sai te ni na sai u van” a tina. Ahimi lawngah, “Kaimi lawng a Pa pakhat bueng Pathen amah te ni ka khueh u; kaimi he ahih kah aca anau thli taktak ni.” a tina u.

Jesuh lawngah ahimi nala, “Pathen he nangmi kah na Pa tangtang kawinih kai he nan lungna u suide, metihtiah kai tah Pathen teng kalawng ka law tih tahe he ah he ka awm. Kamah kah aana oen ka law nawh, ahih lawng ni n'tuih.
Kai lawng kavan thui he n'tu ah na yaakming u nawh? Awl kavan thui he na hutung u thai nawh dawngah ni.

Nangmi tah na pa Raaibawi kah ca-anau la na awm u tih na pa kah kawngaih te vai hamla na ngaih u. Acuek veng kalawng ahih tah thlaang ngawnkung la awm tih awltak ben ah metuek veng khaw awm nooek nawh, metihtiah ahih ah awltak te a awm roe nawh dawngah ni. Hoem awl a thui vengah a sai nooek bueng te ni a sai, metihtiah ahih tah hoemthuikung la awm tih hoem thui thlaang boeih kah ana pa la awm.
Tede kai lawngtah awltak kavan thui dawngah nangmi lawng nan tangna u nawh.
Nangmi khuiah ka thawlhna aka thui thai thlaang pakhat khaw na awm u aw? Kai lawng awltak ka thui atah n'tu ah kai he nan tangna u nawh?
Pathen tengkah aka law thlaang lawngtah Pathen awl te a hutung u. Tede nangmi tah Pathen teng kalawng na law u van nawh dawngah ni hutung ham na ngaih u nawh.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah Jesuh nala te, “Nang tah Samari thlaang la na awm, tecoengah na kaw khuiah raaithe awm” kan tina u he soeng nawh aw?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Kai tah raaithe ka khueh nawh, kai lawng a Pa ni ka thangpawm, tede nangmi lawngtah kai he nan sal nan phaam u.
Kai lawng kamah ham ruep-awmna ka tlap nawh. Tede kai hamla ruep-awmna aka tlap awlcekkung pakhat awm.
Awltak kavan thui u; a-u khaw kai lawng kan cang puei he aka vai tah mevengah khaw duek manawh.” a tina.

Ahimi lawngah ahih nala te, “Nang he raaithe na khueh tite tahe atah acaihla ka ming u poen! Abraham tah duek poen tih tawngha hue khaw duek boeih poen, tede nang lawngtah, ‘a-u khaw kai lawng kan cang puei he aka vai tah mevengah khaw duek manawh’ na ti.
Kaimi kah pahaam Abraham tah duek poen; nang he Abraham lak ah ka lenduet na ti aw? Tawngha thli khaw duek poen. Namah oen namah te a-u la na ngaai u?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng awl a thung tih, “Kai lawng kamah oen kamah ka thangpawm u atah te thangpawmna te aphu awm nawh. Kai he thangpawmkung tah a Pa ni, nangmi lawng namami kah Pathen na ti u te ni.

Nangmi lawngah a hih te na ming u nawh, tede kai lawngtah ka ming. Ahih te ka ming nawh ka ti kawinih nangmi angla kai he hoemthuikung la ka awm ai. Tede kai lawngtah ahih te ka ming tih a awl ka ngaai pe.
Nangmi kah na pa Abraham lawngah kai ka lawna atue he huh a ngaih tih awmngaih; ahih lawng a huh tih a kaw hoe.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Nang he na kum sawmngaa pateng khaw a law thlan maiah, Abraham te na huh tangtang aw?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Awl tak kavan thui u, Abraham a awm thlan ah Kai Ka Awm poen.” a tina.
Tecoeng atah ahih te de ham ah lungto a ruh u, tede Jesuh lawng a thuh u taak tih Tempal bok-im kalawng ah suntla.
Jesuh te a ceh phai vengah a awm pek veng kalawng mikpum thlaang pakhat te a huh.
A hubang hue lawngah, “Saya, a-u kah thawlhna lawng ahih he mikpum la a thang sak? Amah kah thawlhna lawng aw, tihnawhtah ana pa yuvaa kah thawlhna lawng aw?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawngah, “Ahih he amah kah thawlhna lawngkhaw, ana pa yuvaa kah thawlhna lawngkhaw a mik pum sak nawh. Ahih kah mik a pum he Pathen kah huham thara biibina te ahih sawah a tuengna ham ni.
Khawthaih vengah he kai aka tuihkung kah bii te mami lawng bi ham awm; a-u lawngkhaw bii a bi thaina nawh khawyiin te law ai.
Dilai ka awm vengah he kai tah dilai ham aangna la ka awm” a tina.
Te tila a thui coengah Jesuh lawng dilai dawngah tumtui a tha tih tumtui oen taknawng te a sai; taknawng te a mik dawngah a thluk pe,
tecoengah, “Cet langtah Siloam Tuilii ah na mik-hai te sil lah” a tina. (Siloam he tah, ‘Tuih’ ti ngaihna ni.) Tedawngah te thlaang lawngah cet tih a mik-hai te a silh tih a mik te koep tueng.
He veng thlan ah ahih lawng kutduen buh bih la a awm te aka hu thlaang thli oen a imbe lovaai hue lawng, “Ahih he aka ngawl kutduen thlaang nawh aw?” ti u.
Thlaang khatsut lawngtah, “Ahih ni” ti u tih atloe hue lawngtah, “Ahih nawh ni; ahih oen aka lo u ni.” ti u. Tedawngah amah lawng, “Te thlaang te tah kai he poen ni” tila a thui.
Ahimi lawngah, “Tetih atah metila na mik te a tueng thai?” tila a doet u.

Ahih lawng, “Jesuh a ti u thlaang lawngah te taknawng a sai tih ka mik dawngah avan thluk tih, “Siloam la cet langtah na mik-hai te sil.’ n'tina. Tedawngah ka cet tih ka silh vengah te tueng pahoei poen.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Ahih te mela a awm?” tila a doet u. Ahih lawngah, “Ka ming moenih” a tina.
Tecoengah mikpum aka hoeih thlaang te Farasi thlaang thli tengla a ceh puei u.
Jesuh lawng taknawng a sai tih ahih kah mik a hoeih pe sak khawhin te tah Sabbath hin ah ni.
Tecoengah Farasi hue lawngah te thlaang te metila a mik a tueng tite koep a doet u. Ahimi nala te, “Ahih lawng ka mik dawngah taknawng avan thuk; ka mik ka silh tih tahe ah ka mik tueng” a tina.

Farasi thlaang khatsut lawngtah, “He tila aka sai thlaang lawngah te Sabbath phung a vai nawh dawngah Pathen tengkah aka law thlaang nawh ni.” tila a thui u. Tede thlaangtloe lawngtah, “Thlaang thawlh pakhat lawng he ang kawpoekrai miknoekna he metila a sai thai ai?” ti u. Tedawngah ahimi tim ah pekbona te awm.

Tedawngah Farasi hue lawng te thlaang te a doet koep u, “Nang lawngtah ahih lawngah na mik te avan hoeih sak tila na thui, tetih atah ahih te a-u na ti?” a tina u. Te kah thlaang lawngah, “Ahih tah tawngha ni.” a tina.
Tede aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng te thlaang te a mik pum tih tahe ah a mik tueng koep tite ana pa yuvaa te doet thlan atah tangna hamla ngaih u nawh,
tedawngah ana pa yuvaa te a khue u tih, “Ahih he nanghih yuvaa kah na capa aw? A thang pek kalawng a mik pum na ti u, tetih atah metila tahe ah a mik he a tueng koep thai?” tila a doet u.
Ana pa yuvaa lawng, “Ahih he kai hih yuvaa kah capa ni, a awm pek kalawng a mik pum poen.

Tede tahe ah metila a mik a tueng thai ti khaw, ahih kah mik te a-u lawng a tuui ahaai pe ti khaw ka ming hih nawh. Amah te doet uh; a kum haam van poen, amah lawng avan thui thai ai ta!” tila a tina hih.

Ahih rawi yuvaa lawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih hih dawngah te tila te a thui pe, Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila a tangna tih aka thui boeih te sinakok bok-im kalawng hek sih tila aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng a thui u dawngah ni.
Tedawngah ni ana pa yuvaa lawng, “Ahih te a kum haam van poen; amah te doet uh!” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah mikpum la aka thang thlaang te apabela a khue koep u tih, “Awltak na thuina ham Pathen haiah awl kam lah! Nang kah mik aka hoeih sak te thlaangthawlh ni tila ka ming u.” a tina u.
Te thlaang lawngah, “Ahih te thlaangthawlh aw, thlaangdoeng aw ti khaw ka ming nawh. Kai lawng ka ming pakhat tah: Kai tah ka mik pum tih tahe ah ka mik a tueng koep he ni ka ming.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Ahih lawng n'tu avan sai? Na mik aka pum te metila avan hoeih sak? tila a doet u.
Ahih lawngah, “Kavan thui poen teta, nangmi lawng na hutung u nawh. N'tu hamla yaak koep na ngaih u? Nangmi khaw ahih kah hubang la coengg ham na ngaih u van aw?” tila awl a thung pe.
Ahimi lawng te thlaang te a tap avoep u coengah, “Nang he ahih kah hubang ni he; tede kaimi tah Mosi kah hubang ni.
Kaimi lawngtah Pathen lawng Mosi tengah awl a thui pe te ka ming u, tede nang lawng a hu ah na vai thlaang te tah ame kalawng a law ti khaw ka ming u nawh!” a tina u.
Te thlaang lawngah, “Ahih lawngah, ka mik he avan tueng sak lal maiah ame kalawng a law khaw ka ming nawh na ti u te kawpoek rai ham awm!
Kaimi lawng ka ming tah Pathen lawng thlaangthawlh awl te hutung pe nawh tih amah te a hinyah tih a kawngaih aka sai thlaang thli kah awl te a hutung pe tila ka ming u.
Dilai suen cuek veng kalawng mik aka pum te thlaang pakhat khat lawng a hoeih sak ti he a-u lawngkhaw ya nooek nawh.
Te kah thlaang te Pathen teng kalawng a law nawh atah ahih lawng thaihu khat khaw sai thai manawh.
Ahimi lawng, “Nang thawlhna dawngah aka thang tih aka roeng hang, nang lawngah aw kaimi he cangpuei ham na yawm van.” a tina u. Tecoeng atah ahih te sinakok bok-im kalawng a hek u poen.
Jesuh lawng ahih te a hek u tite a yaak tih a huh veng atah, “Nang lawng Thlaanghing Capa he na tangna aw?” tila a doet.
Te thlaang lawngah te, “Bawipa, ahih te a-u, ka tangna hamla van thui lah saw!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Nang lawng ahih te na huh poen, ahih tah tahe ah nang oen awl aka thui hih he ni.” a tina.
Te thlaang lawngah, “Bawipa, kan tangna poen” a tina tih Jesuh haiah te khuklu oen cuengkueng.
Jesuh lawng, “Dilai la kai ka law he tah mikpum thlaang thli lawng mik a tuengna ham, miktueng thlaang thli lawng mik a pumna ham ah awl cek hamla ni ka law.” a tina.
Te kah aka awm Farasi thlaang khatsut thli lawng he tila ahih tengah a thui te a yaak u vengah, “Kaimi khaw na mik pum u van, na ti ngaihna aw?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng, “Nangmi he na mik pum u kawinih na thawlhna awm manawh; tede ka mik he tueng na ti u dawngah tahe toe ah na thawlhna awm mangkhak hun.” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Awltak kavan thui u: Tuu im khuila thawhka kalawng kuun ohla atloe abang kalawng luui tih aka kuun tah thlaanghuuen thli oen raal thli ni.
Thawhka kalawng aka kuun thlaang te tah tuu thli te khawlcuikung tuudoen ni.
Thawhka toetkung lawng ahih hamla thawh a awng pe; amah kah tuu thli te a miing oen a khue vengah ahih awl te tuu thli lawng a yaak pe tih ram la a ceh puei.
Ahih lawng tuu thli te a khuen vengah te thli kah a hai ben ah a ceh pe tih tuu thli lawng a hu ah a vai u, metihtiah ahih awl te a noek u dawngah ni.
Thlaangtloe hu tah vai u nawh, ahih kah awl te noek u nawh vetih te ang thlaang te tah a heng taak khongphaat dai ai.” a tina.
He kah thuidoetna he ahimi tengah Jesuh lawng a thui pe de thuingaihna te ming u nawh.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng koep a thui pe tih, “Awltak kavan thui: Kai tah tuu thawhka ni.
Kai ka law thlan veng kah atloe boeih aka law te tah thlaang huen oen raal thli ni; tede ahimi kah awl te tuu thli lawng hutung pe nawh.
Kai tah thawhka ni. A-u khaw kai dawng kalawng ah a kuun atah thlawnna a dang ai, ahih tah kuun thuk, cet hang vetih ramtliim sainona te a dang ai.
Thlaanghuuen lawngtah huuen ham, ngawn ham oen ah phe ham bueng ni a law. Kai tah nangmi lawng hingna te na khueh thaina hamla, asoepbir hingna te na khuehna u thai ham ni ka law.
Kai tah tuudoen theen ni. Tuudoen theen lawngtah tuu hamla a hingna te a peek.

Tuudoen la aka awm nawh, thlaangvat tuudoen lawngtah amah kah tuu khaw khueh nawh, metaang a law te a huh vengah tuu thli te a ceh taak tih a heeng taak; tedawngah metaang lawng tuu te a ngeh tih a thek ayak boeih.
Thlaangvat tuudoen tah thlaangvat la a awm dawngah tuu thli te doen acang nawh.
He kah tuu-im khuiah aka awm nawh ka tuu thli atloe khaw awm hun. Te thli te khaw kavan khuen hun ai; te thli lawngah ka awl he a ngaai ai; tuu huui at la coengg vetih tuudoen pakhat oen awm u ai.
Kai lawngtah hingna te ka dang koep hamla a awm dawngah hingna te peek ham ka ngaih tih a Pa lawng n'lungna.
Ka hingna he a-u lawngkhaw van rot nawh. Kamah kawthawh oen ni ka peek. Kai lawngah peek thaina ka khueh tih lawh thai koepna khaw ka khueh. He tah kai lawngah sai ham a Pa kah awlpeek ni.” a tina.
He kah awl dawngah he thlaangping tim ah pekbona te koep awm.
Ahimi a kuum ngaai lawngtah, “Ahih he raaithe a khueh! Angparawt thlaang ni! N'tu la a awl he na hutung pe u?” tila a thui u.
Tede atloe hue lawngtah, “Raaithe aka khueh thlaang lawngah he tila awl thui manawh! Metila raaithe lawng mikpum thlaang te mik a tueng sak ai?” ti u.
Jerusalem ah Tempal bok-im Nawnna Poei te awm. Te tah sikca sikding tue ni.
Jesuh tah Tempal bok-im kah Solomon Imcoen ah te yingyawi.
Thlaangping lawngah a veel khoep u tih, “Kaimi he meveng toe ah ngaihang khawbing la nan khueh khiing ai? Awlceet van thui loeih: Nang he Messiah aw?” tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawngah, “Kavan thui poen ta, tede kai he nan tangna u nawh. A Pa kah aana oen ah ka sai thaihu thli lawng kamah kawng he a thui;
tede nangmi he kamah kah tuuca la na awm u nawh tih nan tangna u nawh.
Kamah kah tuuca lawngtah ka awl he a hutung; tuu thli te ka ming tih ka hu ah va bang u.
Te thli te dungyan hingna ka peek tih meveng khaw duek u tlaih manawh. A-u lawngkhaw ahimi te van rot u manawh.
Ka tengah a Pa kah peek te tah soeprep lak ah aka lenduet ni, a Pa kah khoemdoenna khui kalawng rot manawh.
A Pa oen kai he tah pakhat ni.” a tina.
Tecoeng atah ahih te dena hamla lungto a ruh u.

Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Kai lawng sai hamla a Pa kah peek thaihu theen te nangmi hai ah moen ka sai poen; he thaihu thli khuiah me ang kawng dawngah kai he lunghawh oen de hamla na ngaih u?” a tina.

Ahimi lawngah, “Thaihu theen na sai dawngah nang he lungto oen de ham ka ngaih u moenih, tede Pathen thekhana awl na thui dawngah ni! Nang he thlaangthoet mailai ni, tede namah oen namah te Pathen la na sa u.” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Namami kah Phung-awl dawngah Pathen lawng ‘Nangmi tah pathen thli ni” tila, a thui te a thut.
Caciim lawngah a thui he yoeyahla soeng tite ka ming; Pathen lawng amah kah awl a peek thlaang thli te pathen a tina.
Kai he a Pa lawng n'tuek tih dilai la n'tuih. Tetih atah kai tah Pathen Capa ni ka ti dawngah Pathen thekhana awl na thui tila metila nangmi lawng na thui thai ai?
A Pa lawng sai sak ham a ngaih thaihu te kai lawng ka sai nawh atah kai he n'tangna u boel.

Tede te thli te ka sai atah, nangmi lawng kai he nan tangna u nawh mai cakhaw, a Pa tah kai ah awm tih kai khaw a Pa ah ka awm te na mingna u hamla ka sai thaihu thli he tah na tangna u ham awm.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah Jesuh te tuuk hamla koekthoek a yawm u de ahih lawng a thuh u taak vik tih ahimi kah kut dawng kalawng loeih.
Tecoengah Jesuh tah Jordan tuiva ah te kaa phai, Johan lawng baptisma a peekna huen la te cet tih te ah te awm.
Thlaang yahawh hlang a tengla te law u. Ahimi lawngah “Johan lawng kawpoek rai miknoek khat khaw sai nawh, tede ahih kawng a thui boeih boeih te tah soeng.” ti u.
Te kah aka awm thlaang broe lawngah ahih te a tangna u.
Bethani khaw ah aka awm Lazaruh aka miingna thlaang pakhat te a sa ding nawh. Bethani he tah Meri oen Marta boeinau a awmna khawpui ni.
(Meri he Bawipa kah a khow te riimtuui oen a suep tih a sam oen aka thuut te ni; sa aka ding nawh Lazaruh te tah ahih kah nganpa ni.)
A ngannu rawi lawngah Jesuh tengah “Bawipa na lungna na paya he a sa ding nawh.” tila awl a tah hih.

Tete Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah, “He tlawhna he Lazaruh kah duekna toela coengg aih manawh; he ngoen tah Pathen kah ruep-awmna a tuengna hamla awm vetih he tlawhna rang oen Pathen Capa lawng ruep-awmna a dang ai.” tila a thui.
Jesuh lawng Marta oen a manau oen ah Lazaruh te a lungna.
Lazaruh kah sadingna nawh awlthang te a yaak de a awmna huen ah te hin hih awm hun.
Tecoeng atah a hubang hue nala te, “Judia la cet koep u sih.” a tina.
A hubang hue lawngah, “Saya, thlemvai pekca ah thlaangping lawng nang te lungto oen de a ngaih u teta, ceh koep ham na kamthlah aw?” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Hin at ah khawnoek thlaihih awm de lah koen? Tedawngah a-u khaw khawthaih ah a yingyawi atah he dilai aangna he a huh dawngah ploeng nawh.
Tede khawyiin ah a yingyawi atah aangna te a khueh nawh dawngah ploeng.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he awl he a thui coengah, “Mami kah paya Lazaruh tah ip muelh poen, tede ka cet silang ahih te ka thawh ai.” a tina.
A hubang hue lawngah, “Bawipa, ahih te a ih muelh atah a sa ding badai.” a tina u.
Jesuh lawngtah Lazaruh duek poen tila a thuingaihna ni, tede ahimi lawngtah amah poek ah ip mai cawini tila a poek u.
Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te, “Lazaruh duek poen.” tila a thui pe angtau.
“Tede ahih tengah ka awm nawh te nangmi hamla ka awmngaih, te dengah ni nangmi lawng na tangna u hun ai. Cawh, ahih tengla cet u sih.” a tina.
Tevengah Tawmas (Caphee a ti u te) lawng a paya hubang hue nala te, “Mami khaw ahih oen duek haih van hamla, Saya oen cet haih u sih!” a tina.
Jesuh te a pha vengah Lazaruh a up u te khawhin hin lii awm poen tite a ming.
Bethani he Jerusalem kalawng ah meng hih vet ni a thla,
Ahih rawi boeinau kah a nganpa a duek dawngah reem ahaalna ham ngawlh puei hamla Judah thlaang thli te broela law u.
Jesuh va law tite Marta lawng a yaak vengah do hamla te cet, tede Meri tah im ah awm.
Marta lawng Jesuh nala te, “Bawipa, he ah nang na awm kawinih ka nganpa he duek nawh sui!
Tede, tahe Pateng khaw Pathen tengah na bih boeih te nang m'peek ai tite ka ming.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Na nganpa he tho koep ai,” a tina.
Ahih lawngah, “Aboetna khawhin ah tho ai ti ngoen tah ka ming ta.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng Marta nala te, “Kai tah thawhkoepna oen hingna ni. A-u khaw kai he aka tangna tah duek mai cakhaw hing ai;
a-u khaw kai he aka tangna tih khaw aka sa tah duek roe manawh. He he na tangna aw?” a tina.
Marta lawng, “Bawipa! Oeih, ka tangna, nang tah dilai la aka law ham Pathen Capa Messiah tite kan tangna.” a tina.
Marta lawng he tila a thui coengah cet koep phai tih a manau Meri te ahuepla duem a khue. Ahih nala te, “Saya te he ah awm, nang he n'tooem ta.” a tina.
Meri lawng a yaak vengah tho thlat tih ahih te huh hamla aloela cet.
(Jesuh te khaaw khui pha thlan, Marta oen a humna hih ah te awm hun.)

Reem ahaalna awl aka thui hamla Meri oen im ah aka awm haih thlaang thli lawng Meri lawngah tho thlat tih aloela a ceh te a huh u vengah a hu ah bung a vai u. Ahimi lawngtah Meri he phuel la ni aka rap hamla a ceh tila a poek u.
Meri lawng Jesuh a awmna te a pha atah, ahih te a huh pahoei oen a khowkung ah buekuep tih, “Bawipa, he ah nang na awm kawinih ka nganpa he duek nawh sui!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih kah rah te khaw, ahih oen aka awm haih hue kah rah te khaw a huh, a thinkaw a phoel pe tih a kawsi la dung.
Ahimi nala te, “Ame ah na up u?” tila a doet. Ahimi lawng “Bawipa law langtah bueh lah saw,” a tina u.
Jesuh rap.
Te kah thlaang thli lawng, “Bueh u lah, a lungna tangkiik den he!” ti u.
Tede ahimi tim kah khatsut lawngah, “Mikpum haaiying khaw, mik aka tueng sak thlaang lawngah he Lazaruh khaw duek nawh hamla sai thai nawh ai aw?” ti u.
Jesuh tah kawsi la dung tih thlann la te cet, phuel te lungkaw la awm tih thlann te lungpeel oen a tleng u.
Jesuh lawng, “Lungpeel te khoe u lah.” a tina. Thlaangduek ngannu Marta lawngah, “Bawipa, a baw the poen cawi ni. A up u he khawhin hin lii awm poen!” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Nang lawng na tangna atah Pathen ruep-awmna na huh ai, kan tina de lah koen?” a tina.
Ahimi lawng lungpeel te a khue u. Jesuh te vaan la maang hang tih, “A Pa, ka awl na hutung tih ka awmngaih tangkiik.
Ka awl na hutung yoeyah he ka ming, te cakhaw kavan thui he tah, he kah aka awm thlaang thli ham ni, ahimi lawngah kai he nang lawng nan tuih tite a tangna u ham ni.” a tina.
He tila a thui coengah angaihhlangla a khue tih, “Lazaruh law lah!” a tina.
Ahih tah a kut, a khow kah rawkk yaawlna himbai oen, a mik-hai yeenna himbai oen te va law. Jesuh lawng ahimi nala, “Thlam pe u langtah ceh sak uh.” a tina.
Meri te hip hamla aka law thlaang yahawh hlang lawngah Jesuh kah a sai te a huh u tih ahimi lawng ahih te a tangna u.
