Tede khatsut tah meel koep u tih Jesuh kah a sai te Farasi thlaang thli tengah a thui pe.
Tedawngah Farasi thlaang thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng awlcekna khonsil huhtunna te a sai u tih, “Me tih ni n'ti u lah ai? He kah thlaang lawngah kawpoek rai miknoek boehoeng la a sai poen!

Mami lawng he tila n'thlahphaam sut kawinih thlaang boeih lawng a tangna u poen ai, aana khuehkung Rom thlaang thli lawng law u vetih mami kah Tempal bok-im he a phe u vetih mami Judah thlaangphun he khaw a thup poen ai!” ti u.
Ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat, te kum ah Khawsoeih Bawi la aka awm Kaiafas aka miingna lawngah, “N'tu khaw na ming u nawh!
Thlaangphun a thup rup tih thlaang boeih a duek lak atah thlaang pakhat a duek te theen ngaai ti he na ming u nawh aw?” a tina.
Atak tang atah, he awl he amah kawthawh oen a thui moenih; te kum ah ahih te Khawsoeih Bawi la a awm van angla Jesuh he Judah thlaangphun ham duek ai tite a thui oepsoeh ni,
ahimi ham bueng nawh tih khawyat ah aka darh khonghak Pathen thlaang boeih pumkhat la cawi tunna hamla khaw a thui haih ni.
Te khawhin kalawng tah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng Jesuh te ngawn hamla khawkhanna a sai u poen.
Tedawngah Jesuh tah langya ah Judia la te yin cet tlaih nawh, tede divinlangre tengkah Efarim khawpui la tah cet tih te ah te a hubang hue oen awm u.
Kaantaak Poei atue te yoeii tih poei a pha thlan ah aphung angtoekla bokna ben kah ciimcaihna te sai ham ram pum kah thlaang akuum ngaai tah Jerusalem la cet u.
Tempal bok-im ah ahimi lawng a tun u veng atah Jesuh te a tlap u tih, amami khat oen khat te doet u, “Metila na poek? Poei ah he law nawh ai aw?” ti u.
Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Farasi thlaang thli lawng ahih te a tuuk thaina u ham, “A-u lawngkhaw Jesuh a awmna te na ming u atah van thui uh.” tila awl a uen u.
Kaantaak Poei a phana ham hinruk a ngaih vengah duekna kalawng aka tho koep Lazaruh a awmna khaaw, Bethani la Jesuh te cet.
Te ah te ahih hamla thlembuh veelna a sai pe u tih Marta lawngah bii te a bawm. Jesuh oen caboi dawng buh aka veel haih thlaang thli tim ah Lazaruh khaw thuum van.
Tevengah Meri lawng naadu riimtuui phutlo boengloeng khui at te avan khuen, Jesuh khow te a suep tih a sam oen a thuut pe. Te kah riimtuui baw lawngah im khui te a hu thulh.
Jesuh kah hubang pakhat Judas Iskariot, ahih sawah paipi aka thleep ham koei lawngah te,
“N'tu ah riimtuui he ngun tangka yathum la a yoeih tih khawdeng thlaang thli te a peek nawh?” tila a thui.

Ahih lawng tila a thui he khawdeng thlaang thli te a poek tang tih a thui moenih, thlaanghuuen la a awm dawngah ni a thui. Ahih tah tangka kuemkung la a awm dawngah tangka te amah hamla thoem a hawna poepa.
Tede Jesuh lawng, “Ahih te lawl ala u boel! Ka rawkk kuemna khawhin veng kah ham khaw sai mai seh.
Khawdeng thlaang thli tah nangmi oen awm u poepa ai, tede kai tah nangmi oen ka awm poe manawh.” a tina.
Bethani khaw ah Jesuh awm tite a yaak u vengah tela te thlaangping broela cet u. Te ah te Jesuh a awm dawng bueng ah nawh tih duekna kalawng Jesuh lawng a thawh sak Lazaruh khaw a awm dawngah ni.
Tedawngah khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng Lazaruh te khaw ngawn hamla a teeng u,
metihtiah ahih kawng dawngah Judah thlaang broe lawng ahimi te a hoett u tih Jesuh te a tangna u dawngah ni.
Avuen hin ah Kaantaak Poei la aka law thlaangping lawngah Jerusalem la Jesuh law ai tila a yaak u.

Tedawngah ahimi lawng samtoe te a khuen u tih ahih te do hamla cet u, “Pathen te thangpawm uh! Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe seh! Israel Sengpahrang te Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awm pe seh!” tila te paang u.
Caciim lawngah, “Zaion khawpui, nang lawng rih roe boel!
Na sengpahrang lawng lacano te a cit tih law lii hun,” tila a thui angla Jesuh lawng lacano pakhat te a huh tih a cit.

Tevengah te a hubang hue lawng he kah thaihu he yaakming u thai nawh; tede Jesuh he ruep-awm la a thawh coeng veng atah Caciim lawng ahih kawng a thui tih ahih hamla ni ahimi lawng a sai pe u tite a yaakming u.
Jesuh lawng Lazaruh te thlann khuikah a khue tih duekna kalawng a thawh sak vengah Jesuh tengah aka awm thlaang thli lawng te kawng te a thui patoeng u.
Ahih lawng he ang kawpoekrai miknoekna a sai te a yaak u dawngah ahih te huh hamla thlaangping law u.
Tedawngah Farasi thlaang thli lawng amami khat oen khat te, “Mami lawng n'taa thai nawh poen ti he na ming u aw! Bueh lah, dilai pum lawng ahih hu ah bang u poen!” ti u.
Poei vengah Pathen bok ham Jerusalem la aka cet thlaang tim ah te krik thlaangphun khatsut khaw awm u.
Ahimi lawngah Galili peng Betsaida khaw kah Filip tengla te cet u tih, “Saya, Jesuh huh hamla ka ngaih u.” a tina.
Filip lawng Andru tengla cet tih a thui pe coengah ahih rawi te Jesuh tengla cet tih a thui pe hih.
Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala te, “Thlaanghing Capa lawng aka lenduet ruep-awmna dang hamla tahe ah atue a pha poen.
Awltak kavan thui u; caangthaam thaam at te dilai la tla nawh tih a duek nawh atah amah moepoe la awm. A duek atah caangthaam yahawh la a thoeng sak.
A-u lawngkhaw amah kah hingna te a lungna atah sung ai; a-u khaw he dilai ah amah kah hingna te a thina atah dungyan hingna te a dang ai.

A-u khaw kai kah bii he bi hamla a ngaih atah ka hu ah bang seh, te dengah ni kai kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli lawngah ka awmna ah a awm u van ai. Kai kah bii aka bi te tah a Pa lawng a thangpawm ai.” a tina.

Jesuh lawng, “Ka kawpoek patang tangkiik mah aw, n'tu ka thui lah ai? ‘A Pa, he kah atue he ka sawah van pha sak mai boel,’ tila aw ka thui lah ai? Tede patang khangna atue he tawng ham ni ka law roe.
A Pa, na miing te ruep-awmna pe lah!” tila a thui. Tecoengah vaan kah awl lawngah, “Ruep-awmna te ka peek poen, ka peek koep hun ai” tila a thui.
Te kah aka pai thlaangping lawngah te awl te a yaak u tih thlaang pakhat lawngtah khawhumm awl ni ti u, thlaangtloe lawngtah, “Vanthlaang lawng awl avan thui pe.” ti u.
Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “He awl he kai hamla van thui nawh, nangmi ham ni.
Tahe ah dilai he awlcek ham atue apha poen; tahe ah he dilai ukkung thli te atloela a khoe poen ai.
Kai he dilai dawng kalawng tai la ka awm vengah thlaang boeih he ka tengla ka doek ai.” a tina.
(Te tila a thui te amah kah patang khang duekna te ni a thui ngaihna.)
Thlaangping lawngah, “Kaimi kah Phungawl lawngah Messiah tah yoeyahla hing ai tila a thui. Tetih atah Thlaanghing Capa te a tai u ai tite metila na thui thai? Thlaanghing Capa te a-u? tila a doet u.

Jesuh lawng, “Aangna he nangmi tengah kawlkalh ni a awm poen ai. Yiinna te nangmi sawah avan pha nawh ham aangna a awm vengah he cet u lah; metihtiah yiinna khuiah aka cet lawngtah meben la ka ceh tite ming nawh.
Nangmi lawng aangna thlaang la na awmna u ham aangna na khueh vengah he aangna te tangna u lah,” a tina. He awl he a thui coeng atah ahimi te a ceh taak tih thuh u poen.
Ahimi kah mik huh ah kawpoekrai miknoekna boeih he a sai pe de ahimi lawng tangna u nawh,
he tah tawngha Isaiah lawng: “Bawipa, kaimi lawng awl ka thui he a-u lawng a tangna? Bawipa lawng a-u tengah huham tharana te a tueng sak? tila a thui te asoepna ham ni.
He dawngah ni ahimi lawng a tangna u nawh, metihtiah Isaiah amah toengtoeng lawngah,

“Pathen lawng ahimi mik te a pum sak tih lung among sak, ‘Tetih atah ahimi mik lawng hu nawh vetih, ahimi kah thinkaw lawng ming nawh vetih ahimi te hoeih sak hamla ka tengla a law u nawh ai’ tila Pathen lawngah ti” tila te a thui.
Isaiah lawng Jesuh kah ruep-awmna te a huh dawngah ni ahih lawng te tila a thui.

Te tila a awm ah Pateng khaw aana khuehkung Judah thlaang broe lawngah Jesuh te a tangna u; tede Farasi thlaang thli lawngah sinakok bok-im kalawng n'hek hau ai tite a rih u dawngah te kawng te langyala thui u nawh.
Ahimi lawng Pathen kah koehna lak ah thlaanghing kah koehna te a ngaih ngai u dawngah ni.
Jesuh lawng awl a huer tih angaihhlangla paang tih, “A-u khaw kai he aka tangna tah kai bueng he tangna nawh tih kai tuihkung te khaw a tangna.
A-u khaw kai he aka hu tah kai tuihkung te khaw a huh.
A-u khaw kai aka tangna tah yiinna khuiah a awmna nawh ham kai tah dilai ah aangna la ka law poen.
A-u khaw ka awl he a yaak tih aka vai nawh te kai lawng awl ka cek manawh. Dilai he awl cek ham ka law nawh tih thlawn ham ni ka law.
A-u khaw ka awl he aka do nawh tih kai aka hoett te awl aka cek hamla thlaang awm. Aboetna khawhin vengah ka awl thui lawngah awl a cek ai.
He tah soeng tak tak; metihtiah kai lawng kamah rang oen ka thui nawh, tede kai he tuihkung a Pa kah awlpeek rang oen ni ka thui.
Tecoengah ahih kah awlpeek lawngtah dungyan hingna te avan khuen tila ka ming. Tedawngah a pa kah thui sak te ni kai lawng ka thui.” a tina.

Te tah Kaantaak Poei apha tawm Khawhin poen ni. Jesuh lawng he dilai he ceh taak tih Pa tengla ceh hamla atue apha poen tite a ming. Ahih lawngah he dilai kah a hubang hue te a lungna tih aboet toela a lungna.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue thlembuh a veel u vengah Seitan lawngah Simon Iskariot capa Judas thinkaw khuiah te Jesuh sawah paipi thleep hamla kawpoek te a khueh pe poen.
Jesuh lawngah tharana cungkuem ana Pa lawng a peek te a ming; ahih lawngah Pathen tengkah ka law tih Pathen tengla ka cet ai ti khaw a ming.
Tedawngah caboi dawng kalawng tho hang tih asawkah himbaidung a bai te a pit, bailoeng oen a hingcen te a yeen.
Tecoengah beeldung dawngah tui a thloen tih a hubang thli kah a khow te a silh pe, a hingcen ah a yeen bailoeng oen te a thuut pe.
Simon Piter tengah a pha veng atah ahih lawng, “Bawipa, nang lawng ka khow navan silh aw?” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai lawng ka sai he tahe ah na yaakming thlan hun, tede tahe kalawng ah na yaakming badai.” a tina.
Piter lawngah, a thana tih, “Ka khow he meveng khaw navan sil boel!” a tina. Jesuh lawngah, “Na khow he kavan sil nawh kawinih ka hubang la na awm tlaih manawh.” a tina.
Simon Piter lawng, “Te tih atah, Bawipa, ka khow bueng he van sil boel! ka kut oen ka luu he khaw van sil!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Tui aka thlu tangte tah ciim poen tih thui thluk ham awm tlaih nawh, a khow bueng te ni silh ham angoe. Nangmi boeih tah na ciim u, pakhat ni aka ciim nawh.” a tina.
(Jesuh lawng amah sawah paipi aka thleep koei te a ming, tedawngah, “Nangmi boeih na ciim u, pakhat ni aka ciim nawh.” a tina.)
Jesuh lawng ahimi khow te a silh coengah himbaidung te a bai koep tih a ngawlhna caboi dawngah te koep ngawl. Kai lawng ka sai he na yaakming u aw? tila a doet.
Nangmi lawngah kai he Saya tila khaw, Bawipa tila khaw nan khue u, te tila ka awm dawngah nan tina te soeng.
Nangmi kah Bawipa oen Saya kai lawngah nangmi kah khow te kavan silh. Tedawngah nangmi lawng khat oen khat kah khow te patoeng na silh u van ham awm.
Kai lawng ka sai van angla nangmi lawngkhaw na sai u van ham, na oett ham koei te kavan sai poen.
Awltak kavan thui: Sal he a bawipa lak ah lenduet nawh, laipai he khaw aka tuihkung lak ah lenduet nawh.
Tahe tah awltak he na ming u poen, ataktangla aka sai tah metihtlukla a awmngaih ai!
Nangmi boeih he ka thui ngaihna nawh ni; ka tuek te tah ka ming. Tede caciim lawng, “Kamah kah buh aka ca lawng raal la coeng poen” a tite asoep ham awm.
He ang thli he a thoeng thlan ah kavan thui u, te dengah ni a thoeng tak tak vengah, “Kai Tah Ka Awm Tih Ka Awm” a tite na tangna ai.
Awltak kavan thui u, kai lawng ka tuih thlaang te aka do tah kai he khaw n'do van, kai he aka do tah kai tuihkung te khaw a do van.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he awl he a thui coeng atah, thinphat uett ah, “Awltak kavan thui u, nangmi tim kah pakhat lawng ka sawah paipi a thleep ai.” a tina.
A hubang hue lawngah a-u thui-ngaihna kai ti u tih khat oen khat te aletla bueh u the.
A hubang thli khuikah thlaang pakhat, Jesuh lawng a lungna te Jesuh tengah ngawl.
Simon Piter lawng ahih nala te, “A-u nuem a thuingaihna doet lah.” a tina.
Tedawngah te kah hubang te Jesuh tengla thoeih rep phai tih, “Bawipa a-u lawng paipi a thleep ai? a tina.

Jesuh lawng, “Kai lawngah takawi kaam at caak te antui dawngah ka nuemm vetih ka peek thlaang te ahih ni.” a tina. Tedawngah takawi kaam at caak te a lawh tih a nuem, tecoengah Simon Iskariot capa Judah te a peek.
Judah lawng takawi te a lawh khoeng vengah Seitan tah a kaw khuiah kuun. Jesuh lawng ahih nala, “Na sai koei te aloela sai loeih!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih tengah n'tu ah te tila a thui tite caboi dawngah aka ngawl khat lawngkhaw yaakming u nawh.

Judah tah tangka kuemkung la awm tih Jesuh lawngah ahih te poei veng ham ah amami kah angoe, tihnawhtah khawdeng thlaang thli te thaihu pakhat khat peek ham te lai hamla a thui pe cawini tila a hubang khatsut lawngtah a poek u.
Judah lawng takawi te a do tih cet pahoei poen. Teveng te tah khawyiin thlemkhuep poen ni.
Judah te a ceh coengah Jesuh lawng, “Tahe ah Thlaang Capa kah ruep-awmna tah tueng poen; ahih rang oen Pathen kah ruep-awmna tah tueng poen.
Tecoengah ahih rang oen Pathen kah ruep-awmna te a tueng atah Pathen lawng Thlaanghing Capa amah dawngah ruep-awmna te a tueng sak vetih avan sai pahoei poen ai.

Ka ca thli, nangmi tengah asan ka awm tlaih manawh. Nangmi lawng kai he nan tlap u ai; tede aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tengah ka thui te tahe ah nangmi tengah kavan thui u, ‘Kai ka cehna ah nangmi na cet thai manawh.’
Tahe ah awlpeek thaai kan peek u: pakhat oen khat te lung u lah. Kai lawng nangmi kan lungna u van angla nangmi khat oen khat na lung u ham awm.
Nangmi khat oen khat na lung u atah thlaang boeih lawng nangmi he kai kah hubang hue ni tila a ming u ai.” a tina.
Simon Piter lawng, “Bawipa, mela na ceh ai?” a tina. Jesuh lawng, “Kai ka cehna ah tahe na law thai manawh, tede ahula na law badai” a tina.
Piter lawng, “Bawipa, n'tu ah tahe ah ka law thai nawh ai? Nang hamla tah duek khaw ka maa nawh” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai hamla tah duek khaw na maa nawh tang tang aw? Awl-tak kavan thui: aai a khawk thlan ah, kai he ka ming nawh tila voei thum toe na thui ai.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala te, “Nangmi lawngah ngaihang khawbing la awm u boel, Pathen khaw oeng u langtah kai khaw n'tangna u lah.
A Pa im ah ahuen yahawh hlang awm tih nangmi ham ah ahuen roekbah hamla ka cet ai. Awm nawh kawinih nangmi tengah kavan thui nawh mue.
Kai lawng ka cet vetih nangmi hamla ahuen te ka roekbah coengah ka law koep vetih kai ka awmna ah nangmi awm van ham kan lawh ai.
Kai ka cehna ahuen la aka pha sak lawngpui te na ming u.” a tina.
Tawmas lawng ahih nala te, “Bawipa, mela na ceh ai tite ka ming u nawh, te kah ahuen ah phana lawngpui te metila ka ming u ai?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Kai tah lawngpui oen awltak oen ah hingna la ka awm. Kai rang nawh atah a-u khaw Pa tengla cet thai manawh.
Tahe ah kai he nan ming u poen, nangmi lawng a Pa te khaw na ming u; tahe veng kalawng ah nangmi lawng ahih te na ming u poen tih na huh u poen” a tina.
Filip lawng, “Bawipa, na Pa te kaimi n'huh sak lah, te ni kaimi lawng ka ngoe u.” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Nangmi tengah asan hlang ka awm poen, nan ming thlan aw, Filip? A-u khaw kai he aka hu tah a Pa te a huh poen. Tetih atah n'tu ah, “Na Pa te kaimi n'huh sak lah na ti.
Filip, kai tah a Pa khuiah ka awm tih a Pa te ka khuiah awm tite na tangna nawh aw? Nangmi tengah awl kavan thui he kamah awl nawh ni. Ka khuiah aka awm a Pa kah bii bina ni.
Kai lawngah, kai tah a Pa khuiah ka awm tih ka khuiah a Pa awm tila ka thui he tangna lah. Na tangna nawh atah ka sai thaihu te tangna uh.
Awltak kavan thui u, a-u khaw kai he aka tangna lawngtah kai lawng ka sai he a sai van ai, thaihu alentloe Pateng khaw a sai ai, metihtiah kai tah Pa tengla ka ceh ham a awm poen dawngah ni.
Capa rang oen ah Pa kah ruep-awmna te a tuengna ham ka miing oen na bih boeih te kavan sai ai.
Ka miing oen ah thaihu khat khat navan bih te kavan sai ai” a tina.
“Kai he nan lungna u atah, ka awlpeek he na vai ham awm.
A Pa tengah ka bih vetih nangmi te dungyan aka awm puei hamla ahih lawngah atloe Bawmkung te nangmi m'peek ai.

Pathen kawng awltak aka tueng sak Muithla te m'peek ai. Dilai lawng ahih te hu thai nawh, ming thai nawh vetih ahih te do manawh. Tede ahih tah nangmi tengah awm tih na khuiah a awm dawngah nangmi lawngtah na ming u.
“Kai lawng ka ceh atah namami bueng te kan ceh taak sut manawh; Nangmi tengla koep ka law ai.
Kawlkalh a awm coeng atah dilai lawng kai he n'hu tlaih manawh, tede nangmi lawngtah nan huh ai; kai tah ka hing dawngah nangmi khaw na hing u van ai.
Te khawhin te apha atah, kai he a Pa khuiah ka awm tih nangmi khuiah ka awm van angla nangmi khaw ka khuiah na awm te na ming u ai.

A-u lawngkhaw ka awlpeek he a do tih aka vai tah kai he aka lungna thlaang ni. Kai he aka lungna boeih tah a Pa lawng a lungna ai; Kai lawngkhaw ahih te ka lungna vetih a tengah ka phumpho pe ai.” a tina.
Judas lawng (Judas Iskariot nawh ni), “Bawipa, kaimi teng atah na phumpho tih dilai teng atah na phumpho nawh te metila a awm ai?” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “A-u khaw kai aka lungna tah kan cang puei he a vai ham awm. Ahih te a Pa lawng a lungna ai, kai oen a Pa te a tengla ka law vetih ahih tengah te ka awm hih ai.
A-u khaw kai he aka lungna nawh tah ka cang puei he vai manawh. Nangmi lawng na yaak u cangpueina he kamah tengkah nawh ni, tede kai tuihkung a Pa teng kalawng ni a law.
Nangmi teng ka awm vengah he kah awl he kavan thui u.
A Pa lawng ka miing oen avan tuih ham koei Bawmkung Ciim Muithla lawngah soeprep boeih te nangmi m'cang puei vetih kavan thui boeih he nangmi m'ming sak ai.
Ngaimawngna kavan ceh taak u, te tah kamah kah ngaimawngna te ni kan peek u. Dilai kah peek te ang te kan pe nawh. Ngaihang lakueng oen khawthe boepla awm u boel; rihsakna khaw khueh u boel.

‘Kai tah ka cet ai, tede nangmi tengla ka law koep ai, kan tina te na yaak u poen.’ Kai he nan lungna u atah a Pa tengla ka cet ai ka ti he na awmngaih ham awm; metihtiah ahih tah kai lak ah aka lenduet ni.
He he a thoeng taktak vengah nangmi lawng na tangna u hamla tahe veng a thoeng thlan ah he kavan thui u poen.
He dilai ukkung te law poen ai, tedawngah nangmi oen awl asan hlang la n'thui u tlaih manawh. Ahih lawng ka sawah huham tharana te khueh thai manawh,
tede kai lawng a Pa ka lungna tih ahih kah awl peek angla soeprep boeih ka sai te dilai lawng a ming ham awm. “Law uh, cawh, he huen kalawng cet u poen sih.” a tina.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai tah misurkung tangtang la ka awm tih a Pa tah Dum khuehkung ni.
Ahih lawngah, dawngah athaih aka thaih nawh a beek-athleeng thli te a haih boeih tih athaih aka thaih nawh te khaw athaih ciil te athaihna ham a beek-athleeng thli te a coei pe.
Nangmi tah kai kah cangpueina oen aciimthlaula na awm u poen.

Kai dawngah he tuhkai u lang awm poe u lah, kai khaw nangmi oen ka tuhkai u vetih ka awm poe van ai. Misur kah a beek-athleeng lawng amah poek ah thaih thai nawh; misurkung oen poe a tuh u dengah ni a thaih thai. Te tih van angla nangmi khaw kai dawngah poe na tuhkai u nawh atah na thaih u thai manawh.

Kai tah misurkungpui la ka awm tih nangmi tah a beek a thleeng thli ni. A-u khaw kai dawngah awm tih kai khaw ahih dawngah ka awm atah yahawh hlang la thaih ai; kai rang nawh atah n'tu khaw na sai thai u manawh.
A-u khaw kai dawngah aka awm nawh tah misur kah a beek-athleeng angla a voeih vetih reu ai; te ang a beek-athleeng te a cawi vetih hai dawngah a phum ai, te ah te ung boeih ai.
Kai dawngah na awm u tih nangmi khuiah ka awl he a awm atah nangmi lawng na bih thaihu te na dang u ai.
Nangmi lawng yahawh hlangla athaih thaihna rang oen a Pa kah ruep-awmna te na tueng sak u vetih te tila te ka hubang la na coengg u ai.
A Pa lawng kai n'lungna van angla nangmi khaw kan lungna.
A Pa kah awlpeek te ka vai tih a lungna khuiah ka awm van angla ka awlpeek thli he na vai u atah kai kah lungna khuiah na awm u.
Ka awmngaihna te nangmi khuiah awm tih na awmngaihna te asoepna ham he awl he kavan thui u.
Ka awlpeek tah he ni: kai lawng nangmi kan lungna van angla nangmi khat oen khat lung u van.
Thlaang lawngah he a paya hamla a lenduet lungna a khueh thai tah ahimi ham hingna a peek te ni.
Nangmi lawng ka awlpeek he na sai u atah ka paya la na awm u.

Nangmi te tuihyoeihthlaang kan tina tlaih nawh, metihtiah tuihyoeihthlaang lawngtah a bawipa kah a sai te ming nawh. A Pa tengkah ka yaak boeih te kavan thui poen dawngah nangmi he ka paya kan tina u poen.

Nangmi lawngah kai he nan tuek nawh; nangmi lawng na cet u vetih yoeyahla aka cak a thaih te na thaihna u hamla kai lawng nangmi he kan tuek tih bii kan peek u. Tedawngah nangmi lawng ka miing oen na bih boeih te a Pa lawng m'peek ai.
Tecoengah he tah kai kah awl peek ni: pakhat oen pakhat lung u lah.” a tina.
Dilai lawng nangmi n'thina atah lamhacuekla kai he ni n'thina tite poek uh.

Nangmi lawngah dilai koeva la na awm u kawinih dilai lawng amah koeva angla te n'lungna u van ai. Tede nangmi he dilai dawng kalawng kan tuek u poen tih dilai koeva la na awm u tlaih nawh dawngah dilai lawng nangmi n'thina.

‘Sal he tah a bawipa lak ah lenduet nawh’ kan tina te hilh u boel. Ahimi lawng kai he n'heem atek atah nangmi te khaw n'heem atek van ai; ahimi lawng kai kah cangpueina he a vai u atah nangmi kah cangpueina te khaw a vai u van ai.
Tede nangmi he kai kah thlaang la na awm u dawngah ahimi lawng te ang thli boeih te nangmi sawah avan sai ai; metihtiah ahimi lawng kai aka tuihkung te ming u nawh.
Kai he ka law nawh tih ahimi tengah te ka thui pe nawh kawinih ahimi lawng thawlhna khueh u nawh sui; tede tahe tah ahimi lawng amami thawlhna peelnangna ham n'tu khaw khueh u tlaih nawh.
A-u khaw kai he aka thina tah a Pa te khaw a thina van.
A-u lawngkhaw a sai nooek nawh te ahimi tim ah ka sai nawh kawinih ahimi te thawlh u nawh sui; kai lawng ka sai te ahimi lawng a huh u tih a Pa oen kai he n'thina u poen.
Tede, he tah amami kah Phungawl dawngah, ‘N'tu kawng nawh maiah ahimi lawng kai he n'thina u poen,’ tila a thut te asoepna ham ni.
A Pa teng kalawng aka law Bawmkung, Pathen kawng awltak aka phawng Muithla te law ai. Kai lawng a Pa tengkah kavan tuih vetih kamah kawng he a thui ai.
Nangmi khaw acuekca veng kalawng ka tengah na awm u dawngah kamah kawng he na thui u van ai.
Nangmi lawng na oengna te na hoett u nawh ham he awl he kavan thui u.
Nangmi te sinakok bok-im khui kalawng n'hek u vetih nangmi te aka ngawn thlaang thli lawng Pathen bii ni ka bi u tila a poekna atue te law ai.
Ahimi lawngah kai he khaw, a Pa khaw a ming u nawh dawngah he ang thli he nangmi sawah a sai u ai.
He ang thaihu thli he ahimi lawng sai hamla atue apha vengah kavan thui he na hilh u nawh ham ah awl kavan thui. Nangmi tengah ka awm dawngah he kah thaihu thli he acuekca ah kavan thui u nawh.
Tahe atah kai aka tuihkung tengla ka cet poen ai, tede a-u khat lawngkhaw mela na ceh ai tite nan doet u nawh.
Tahe ah kavan thui dawngah na kaw the u.
Tede awltak kavan thui: kai he ka ceh atah nangmi ham theen bet ai, metihtiah ka cet nawh kawinih nangmi tengah Bawmkung te law manawh. Tede ka cet kawinih ahih te nangmi tengla kavan tuih ai.
Ahih te a law veng atah thawlhna kawng, oengna kawng oen Pathen kah awlcekna kawng te ahih lawngah dilai thlaang thli tengah a thui pe ai.
Ahimi lawng kai he n'tangna u nawh dawngah thawlh u ti khaw a thui pe ai;
Kai tah a Pa tengla ka cet poen vetih nan hu u tlaih manawh, tedawngah doengna kawng te a thui ai.
He dilai ukkung thli he awl a cek poen dawngah awlcekna kawng te a thui ai.
Nangmi tengah thui ham moen ka khueh, tede tahe ah he nangmi lawng na harukna lek aih manawh.

Tede Muithla te a law veng atah ahih lawng Pathen kawng awltak te avan phawng vetih awltak khuila te m'mawt u ai. Ahih lawng amah aana oen thui manawh, tede ahih lawng a yaak te a thui vetih aka law ham koei thaihu te avan thui ai.
Ahih lawng kai he ruep-awmna te m'peek ai, metihtiah ahih lawngtah kai lawng ka thui te nangmi tengah avan thui ai.
A Pa kah a khueh boeih te tah kai kah ni; tedawngah Muithla lawngtah kai lawng ka peek te a lawh vetih nangmi tengah avan thui ai tila kavan thui u.” a tina.
“Kawlkalh a awm coeng atah kai he nan hu u tlaih manawh, tede kawlkalh a awm coengah kai he koep nan huh u ai” a tina.

A hubang khatsut lawngah amami oen amami te, “He he n'tu a thuingaihna kai? Kawlkalh a awm coengah nan hu tlaih manawh ti tih, tecoengah kawlkalh a awm coengah nan huh u koep ai’ ti; tecoengah ‘a Pa tengla ka cet ai’ tila khaw a thui.
‘Kawlkalh ah’ a ti he n'tu a thui ngaihna kai? N'tu kawng nuem a thui; ka ming u moenih!” ti u.

Ahimi lawngah doet hamla a ngaih u te Jesuh lawng a ming tih ahimi nala, “Kai lawngah, ‘kawlkalh a awm coengah nan hu u tlaih manawh, tecoeng kawlkalh a awm coengah nan huh u koep ai’ ka ti te aw namami oen namami na doet u khiing te?
Awltak kavan thui, nangmi lawng kopaang oen na rap u ai, tede dilai tah awmngaih ai; nangmi tah na kaw the ai, tede nangmi kah kawthena te awmngaihna la coengg ai.
Hutaa lawngah camoe a cuun vengah, patang khangna tue lawng a pha tih a kaw the; tede dilai dawng camoe pakhat te a cuun veng atah ahih lawng awmngaih tih patang palaina te a hilh.
Te tila te nangmi khaw na awm u van ai: tahe ah na kaw the u, tede nangmi te koep kan huh u vetih na awmngaih tangkiik u ai; te tah a-u khat lawngkhaw a lawh thai nawh awmngaihna ni.
“Te khawhin te a law vengah nangmi lawng n'tu khaw navan bih u manawh. Awltak kavan thui: nangmi lawng ka miing oen na bih boeih te a Pa lawng m'peek ai.
Tahe toe ah he nangmi lawng n'tu khaw ka miing oen na bih u thlan hun; nangmi kah awmngaihna te asoepna ham bih u lah na dang ni.
He thaihu thli he nangmi tengah thui hamla nuehtahna awl bueng te ka hawna. Tede kai lawng nuehtahna awl ka hawna nawh atue te a pha vetih a Pa kawng te aciimbiitla nangmi tengah avan thui ai.
Te khawhin te a pha vengah ka miing oen ah ahih tengah te na bih u ai; ahih tengah nangmi yuengla kavan bih ai tila ka thui nawh,
Metihtiah a Pa amah lawng nangmi te n'lungna. Nangmi lawng kai he nan lungna u tih kai he Pathen teng kalawng ka law ti he na tangna u dawngah nangmi te n'lungna.
Kai tah a Pa teng kalawng dilai dawngla ka law, dilai he ka ceh taak vetih a Pa tengla ka cet ai.” a tina.
Tecoengah a hubang hue lawng, “Tahe tah nang lawng nuehtahna awl thui tlaih ohla aciimthlaula na thui poen.
Nang lawng soeprep boeih na ming tila tahe tah ka ming u poen; nang lawngah thlaangtloe te doet ham na ngoe nawh. Tedawngah nang he Pathen tengkah na law tila kaimi lawng ka tangna.” a tina u.
Jesuh lawngah, “Tahe ah na tangna u poen aw?

Nangmi he phang na pek u ai, namah im la na cet u khongphaat vetih kai he kamah bueng nan ceh taak sut atue te law lii tih tahe ah avan pha poen. Tede kai tah kamah bueng tangtang aih nawh ni, metihtiah a Pa lawngah ng'awm puei.
Nangmi lawng kai oen ah tuhkaina rang oen ngaimawngna na khuehna ham he he kavan thui. Dilai lawng nangmi raina m'peek ai. Tecakhaw na thin cak sak uh! Kai lawng dilai ka taa poen!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng he awl he a thui coengah ahih tah vaan benla maang hang tih, “A Pa, atue tah a pha poen. Na capa kai lawng nang te ruep-awmna kan peekna ham na capa he ruep-awmna m'pe lah.
Nan peek boeih te dungyan hingna ka peek thaina ham thlaang boeih sawah sai thaina aana te nan peek poen.
Tecoengah dungyan hingna ti he tah nang lawng na tuih Jesuh Khrih he ming tih Pathen taktak nang te ming he ni.
Dilai sawah na ruep-awm na te ka tueng sak poen; kai lawngah ka sai hamla nan peek bii te ka coeng poen.
A Pa! Dilai sai thlan ah namah oen awm haih vengkah ruep-awmna te ang van te tahe namah haiah ruep-awmna te m'pe lah.
Dilai dawngkah nan peek thlaang thli tengah na miing te ka tueng sak poen. Ahimi te nang kah thlaang la awm tih ahimi te kai nan peek. Ahimi lawng na awl te a ngaai u tih,
soeprep boeih nan peek he nang teng kah aka law ni tite tahe tah a ming u poen.
Nang lawng nan peek awl te ahimi ka peek tih ahimi lawng a do u; kai he nang teng kalawng ka law ti he soeng tangtang tila a ming u tih kai he nang lawng nan tuih ni tila a tangna u.
“Ahimi hamla ka thangthui. Dilai ham ka thangthui nawh tih nang lawng nan peek thlaang thli te nang kah thlaang la a awm dawngah ahimi ham ka thangthui.
Kai lawng ka khueh boeih he nang kah ni, nang lawng na khueh boeih te khaw kai kah ni; ahimi rang oen kai kah ruep awmna he tueng.

Tahe tah na tengla ka law poen ai; dilai ah ka awm tlaih manawh, tede ahimi tah dilai ah awm ai. Aka ciim a Pa! nang oen kai tah pumkhat la n'awm van angla ahimi khaw pumkhat la a awm u van ham nang lawngah nan peek huham tharana namah miing oen ah te ading asuekla thlipdah lah.

Ahimi oen ka awm vengah he nang lawng nan peek huham tharana namah miing oen ah te ahimi he ading asuekla ka thlip ka dah tih ka khoem. Thlaangha pataam la nuen tangte thlaang pakhat te thui muehla tah pakhat khaw ha-ata nawh.
Tahe ah kai tah na tengla ka law poen ai, ahimi lawngah ka awmngaihna he a thinkaw khuiah aboet toela a khuehna u ham dilai ka awm veng he ah, he ang thaihu thli he ka thui pe.
Nang kah awl te ahimi ham ka thui pe, kai he dilai koeva la ka awm van nawh angla ahimi khaw dilai koeva la awm u nawh tih ahimi he dilai lawng a thina u.
Dilai dawng kalawng ahimi he na lawh hamla kavan bih nawh, tede Thlaangthe Puei teng kalawng ading asuekla thlipdah ham ni kavan bih.
Kai he dilai koeva la ka awm van nawh angla ahimi khaw dilai koeva la awm u nawh.
Ahimi he awltak oen namah hamla pum peek sak lah; awltak tah na awl te ni.
Kai he dilai ah nan tuih van angla ahimi te dilai ah ka tuih van.
Ahimi lawngah ataktang la na tengah pum a peek u van ham kai khaw ahimi hamla pum ka peek.
Ahimi ham bueng ah ka thangthui nawh, ahimi kah awl thui rang oen ah kai he aka tangna thlaang thli ham khaw ka thangthui.

Ahimi boeih lawng pumkhat la a awmna u ham ka thangthui. A Pa, Nang khuiah kai ka awm tih kai khuiah nang na awm van angla ahimi te mami khuiah awm van lah seh. Kai he nang lawng ni nan tuih tite dilai lawng a tangna ham ahimi he pumkhat la awm sak lah.
Nang oen kai he pumkhat la n'awm van angla ahimi khaw pumkhat la a awmna u ham nang lawng nan peek ruep-awmna te ang van te ahimi ka peek.
Ahimi khuiah kai ka awm tih kai khuiah nang na awm, ahimi lawng pum khat la a awmna rang oen nang lawng kai nan tuih tih nan lungna van angla ahimi khaw na lungna tite dilai lawng a ming ai.
“A Pa! Dilai suen thlan vengah nan lungna tih ruep-awmna nan peek, te kah ruep-awmna te nang lawng ka tengah nan peek thlaang thli lawng a huhna u ham kai ka awmna ah ahimi te awm sak ham ka ngaih.
Aka doeng a Pa! Dilai lawng nang m'ming nawh de kai lawngtah kan ming tih nang lawngah kai he nan tuih tite he thli lawng a ming u.
Kai nan lungna te ahimi khuiah awm tih kai khaw ahimi khuiah ka awmna ham nang te ahimi ka ming sak poen, ka ming sak baal hun ai.” tila thangthui.
Jesuh lawng he tila a thangthui coengah a hubang hue oen ah cet u tih Kidron sawkpui ah te kat phai u. Te ah te dum pakhat awm tih te la te Jesuh oen a hubang hue te cet u.
Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah tela te a ceh poepa u dawngah paipi thleepkung Judas lawng dum te a ming.

Tedawngah Judas lawng Rom raalkap bu khat oen ah Farasi thlaang thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng a tuih tempal bok-im aka toet thlaang vang te dum la a ceh puei. Ahimi lawng pawmcunghaiha oen oep u tih haiim oen haithoei te a khuen u.
Jesuh lawng amah tengah aka thoeng ham koei soeprep boeih te a ming, tedawngah hai-la te cawh phai tih ahimi nala te, “A-u na tlap u?” tila a doet.
Ahimi lawng, “Nazaret Jesuh ka tlap” a tina u. Ahih lawngah, “Kai he ahih poen ni.” a tina. Paipi thleepkung Judas tah te ah te ahimi oen haih pai u.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai he ahih poen ni.” a ti vengah te hu benla nawng u tih dilai dawngah tlim drek u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “A-u na tlap u?” tila koep a doet. Ahimi lawng, “Nazaret khaw kah Jesuh” a tina u.
Jesuh lawng, “Kai he ahih poen ni, kan tina u teta, nangmi lawng kai he nan tlap u atah atloe hue he tah ceh sak uh.” a tina.
(He tila a thui he tah, “A Pa, nang lawng nan peek thli te tah pakhat khaw ka ha sak nawh” tila a thui te asoepna ham ni.)
Simon Piter lawng samsen a khuen te tiingim dawngkah a phong tih Khawsoeih Bawi kah tamnaa, a bantang haa te pat a tloek pe. Te kah tamnaa te Malkhas a miingna.
Jesuh lawng Piter nala, “Na samsen te tiingim khuiah sang koep! A Pa kah peek patang khangna boengloeng he kai lawngah aw manawh tila na poek aw? a tina.
Tecoengah Rom raalkap thli oen raalbawi thli oen ah Judah hue lawngah Jesuh te a tuuk u tih a khih u,
Lamhacuekla Annas tengla a khuen u. Ahih tah te kum ah Khawsoeih Bawi la aka awm Kaiafas kah a mase la awm.
Kaiafas he tah, ‘thlaang yahawh hamla thlaang pakhat a duek he theen bet,’ tila Judah thli te poekna aka pe aana khuehkung ni.
Simon Piter oen atloe hubang pakhat lawng Jesuh te a hu ah a vai hih. Te kah hubang pakhat te Khawsoeih Bawi oen ming u, tedawngah ahih lawng Jesuh oen Khawsoeih Bawi kah impui vawngup khuila te cet,
tevengah Piter tah vawngthawhka adauben ah te awm. Atloe hubang lawngah te adaubenla koep cet, thawhka aka toet hutaaca te a thui pe tih Piter te a khuila a ceh puei.
Thawhka aka toet hutaaca lawng Piter nala te, “Nang khaw te thlaang kah a hubang van nawh aw?” a tina. Piter lawng, “Kai he ahih kah hubang nawh ni.” a tina.
Khaw a sik dawngah tuihyoeih-thlaang thli oen raalkap thli lawng haihol hai a toeih u, a veel u tih pai ruila hai te a aawm u. Piter lawng cet van tih pai ruila hai te a aawm van.
Khawsoeih Bawi lawngah Jesuh te a hubang thli kawng oen amah kah cangpueina kawng te a doet.

Jesuh lawng, “Kai lawng thlaang tawm tengah langyala ka thui poepa poen; cangpueina boeih te thlaang boeih a tunna sinakok bok-im oen Tempal bok-im ah ni ka sai, kai lawng ahuepla khat khaw ka sai nawh.
Tedawngah n'tu hamla kai he nan doet? Ka awl thui te aka ya thlaang thli te man na doet sui. Kai lawng ka thui te a ming u, ahimi te doet.” a tina.
He awl he Jesuh lawng a thui vengah te kah raalkap pakhat lawng ahih te a bel tih, “Metila Khawsoeih Bawi tengah tila awl na thui aih mai!” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Kai lawng ka thui te asoeng nawh atah he kah thlaang thli he asoeng nawh te thui peh saw. Tede ka thui he asoeng atah n'tu ah kai he nan bawh?” a tina.
Tecoengah Annas lawng Jesuh te a khihna rui thlam pe ohla Khawsoeih Bawi Kaiafas tengla a tuih.

Piter tah te ah te pai khiing tih hai a aawm. Tedawngah thlaangtloe hue lawng ahih nala te, “Nang khaw te thlaang kah a hubang pakhat van nawh aw?” a tina. Tede Piter lawng basa tih, “Kai he ahih kah hubang nawh ni,” a tina.
Khawsoeih Bawi kah tamnaa pakhat, Piter lawng a bantang haa a tloek pe thlaang kah a cakaw pakhat lawng, “Nang he dum khuiah ahih oen kan huh haih de lah koen?” a tina.
Piter lawng koekthoek ah, “Kai nawh ni” tila a thui tih tevengah aai khawk pahoei.

Mincanghi ah Jesuh te Kaiafas im kalawng ukkung bawi impui la te a khuen u. Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawngah Kaantaak poei buh te caak thaina ham amami te bokna phung angla ciimcaih ham a ngaih u dawngah ukkung bawi impui khuila kuun u nawh.
Tedawngah Pilat lawng adauben la cet tih ahimi te a doet, “He thlaang lawngah n'tu thawlhna a sai dawngah navan khuen u?” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “He thlaang lawng he lumlai lo nawh kawinih nang tengla kavan khuen u nawh mue.” a tina u.

Pilat lawng ahimi nala te, “Te atah ahih he namami lawng khuen u langtah namami kah phungawl angla awl cee uh.” a tina. Ahimi lawngah, “Kaimi lawng a-u khat khaw ngawn thaina ka khueh u nawh.” a tina u.
(Jesuh lawng amah he me ang duekna oen ka duek ai tila a thui te asoepna ham ni tila he a thoeng hang.)
Pilat bawi lawngah impui khuila koep kuun tih Jesuh te a khue, “Nang he Judah Sengpahrang aw?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawng, “He awl he namah poek ah aw nan doet, tihnawhtah thlaangtloe lawng aw kai kah kawng he avan thui?” a tina.
Pilat lawng, “Nang lawng kai he Judah thlaang la aw nan poek? Kai kut dawngah nang aka pe thlaang thli he namah thlaangphun oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli ni. Lumlai na huh aw?” a tina.

Jesuh lawng, “Kai kah pengram tah he dilai he nawh ni; he dilai he ka ram mai kawinih aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tengah a pha nawh ham ka hubang thli lawng a teek u poen ai. Kai kah ram tah he dilai he nawh ni.” a tina.

Tedawngah Pilat lawng koep a doet tih, “Tetih atah nang he sengpahrang aw?” a tina. Jesuh lawng, “Na thui angla kai tah sengpahrang ni. Kai lawng awltak thui ham ka ngaih pakhat dawng maiah ni he dilai ah ka law tih ka thang. A-u khaw awltak dawngah aka awm lawngtah ka awl he a ngaai u.
Pilat lawng, “Awltak he n'tu?” tila a doet. Tecoegah Pilat lawng adauben kah thlaangping tengla koep cet tih ahimi nala te, “Kai lawngtah a duekna koei thawlhna khat khaw ka hu nawh.
Tede namami kah phung angla Kaantaak poei vengah kai lawng thongtla thlaang pakhat ka thlah poepa. Nangmi lawng Judah sengpahrang he thlah sak ham na ngaih u aw?” tila a doet.
Ahimi lawngah paang u tih, “Ahih te van thlah boel! Barabbas te van thlah!” ti u. (Barabbas tah thlaanghuuen ni.)
Tecoengah Pilat lawng Jesuh te a khue tih cungpoelh oen a tam sak u.
Raalkap thli lawng thliing lumuek te a sai u tih a luu ah a muek sak u, tecoengah himbai ling te a bai sak u,
a tengla te yoeii u tih, “Judah Sengpahrang na hinglung vaang seh!” a tina u tih a bel u.
Pilat lawng koekthoek cet tih thlaangping nala te, “Bueh u lah! Ahih he duek sak ham akawng alam ka hu nawh tite na huhna u ham nangmi tengah kavan khuen ai.” a tina.
Tecoeng atah Jesuh lawng thliing lumuek te a muek tih bailing bai oen va law. Pilat lawng ahimi nala te, “Ahih he bueh u lah!” a tina.

Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raalkap thli lawng a huh u vengah paang u tih, “Thinglam dawngah ngawn! Thinglam dawngah ngawn!” tila a thui u. Pilat lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi lawng khuen u langtah thinglam dawng ngawn uh. Kai lawngtah ahih he duek sak ham akawng alam ka hu nawh.” a tina.
Thlaangping lawngah, “He kah thlaang lawng amah oen amah te Pathen Capa a ti dawngah kamami kah phungawl lawng a thui angla a duek ham awm.” tila awl te koep a thung pe u.
He tila a thui u te Pilat lawng a yaak vengah tare a rih.
Ahih lawngah impui khuila cet koep phai tih Jesuh te, “Nang he ame kalawng na law?” tila a doet. Tede Jesuh lawng awl thung pe nawh.
Pilat lawng, “Kai he nan voem ngaih nawh aw? Kai lawngah nang he thlah thaina khaw, thinglam dawng ngawn thai ham khaw aana ka khueh ti he na ming nawh aw?” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Nang lawng ka sawah aana na khueh he Pathen lawng m'peek dawngah ni. Tedawngah na kut dawngah kai aka pekung te a thawlhna bo tare ngai,” a tina.

He tila a thui te Pilat lawng a yaak vengah Jesuh thlah ham oen ah loeih sak ham along a-im te a tlap. Tede thlaangping lawngah paang koep u tih, “Nang lawng ahih te na loeih sak atah nang tah Sengpahrang sangluel kah paya tlaih nawh ni! A-u khaw amah oen amah te sengpahrang ni aka ti boeih tah Sengpahrang sangluel te aka raalna thlaang poen ni!” ti u.
Pilat lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Jesuh te adaubenla avan law puei tih, “Lungpeel Phaih” a ti u ahuen kah awlcekna ngawlhcoen dawngah te ngawl. (Lungpeel Phaih a tite Hebru awl la “Gabbatha” ti u.)
Teveng te tah Kaantaak Poei huet hin hingthun tawm poen ni. Pilat lawngah thlaangping nala te, “Na sengpahrang he bueh u lah!” a tina.

Ahimi lawngah paang koep u tih, “Ahih te ngawn! Ahih te ngawn! Thinglam dawngah ahih te ngawn!” ti u. Pilat lawng ahimi nala, “Nangmi kah sengpahrang he thinglam dawng ngawn sak ham na ngaih u aw?” tila a doet. Khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawngah, “Sizar Sengpahrang sangluel nawh tah atloe sengpahrang ka khueh u nawh.” a tina u.
Tecoeng atah Pilat lawng Jesuh te thinglam dawngah ngawn hamla ahimi kut ah a peek. Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng Jesuh te a ceh puei u.
Amah thinglam te kawh ruila cet tih, “Luuruh Huen” a ti u te a pha. (Hebru awl la tah, “Golgota” ti u.)
Ahimi lawng te ah te thinglam dawng a ngawn u; thlaangtloe pahih khaw khatben khat bang ah a ngawn u tih Jesuh te a lung ah a ngawn u.
Pilat lawng noekna ca a thut tih thinglam dawngah a tai sak. Ahih lawng, “Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh, Judah Sengpahrang” tila a thut.
Thinglam dawngah Jesuh a taina huen te khawpui khui kalawng athla aih nawh dawngah thlaang tawm lawngah noekna ca te a tae u. Noekna ca te Hebru, Latin oen Krik awl la a thut.
Khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawngah Pilat nala te, “Judah Sengpahrang tila thut boel, te lak atah amah awl thui angla, ‘He kah thlaang lawng kai tah Judah sengpahrang ni’ a ti ang la te thut” a tina u.
Pilat lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Ka thut tangte he tah ka thut angla awm seh.” a tina.

Raalkap thli lawng Jesuh te thinglam dawngah a tai coeng atah ahimi lawng hi-acuu te a lawh pe u tih amami pakhat rip hamla thloep lii la a pek u. Ahimi lawngah a himbaidung te khaw a lawh u, te himbaidung te tah aduul la a tah dawngah a huina a-ngawhaa awm nawh.

Raalkap thli lawng, “He tah pheuh u boel sih; a-u lawng nuem a dang ve, talcung sutt u sih” tila a thui u. He kah Caciim lawngah, “Ahimi lawngah, kai tah hi-acuu te pek u the tih ka himbaidung te tah talcung a yueh u” tila a thui te asoepna hamla tila he awm. Raalkap thli lawng te tila te a sai u.
Jesuh kah thinglam tengah te a manu oen a manu kah manau Klopas yu Meri oen Meri Makdalin hue he ayoeiila rep pai u.
Jesuh lawng a manu oen te ah aka pai a lungna a hubang te a huh tih a manu nala te, “Ahih te na capa ni.” a tina.
Tecoengah te kah hubang nala te, “Ahih te na nu ni” a tina. Te kalawng atah a hubang lawngah amah im ah awm sak ham a ceh puei.
Jesuh lawngah, tahe tah thaihu cungkuem soep boeih poen tite a ming tih Caciim lawng a thui te asoepna ham, “Tui ka hall” tila a thui.
Te ah te misurtui thuii abecala a thloen u tuium pakhat awm; te kah misurtui dawngah baipeen te a nok tih hissop thing cungkui dawngah a kek, tecoengah Jesuh te a kaa ah a tuh.
Jesuh lawng misurtui te a yawn tih, “Coeng boeih poen!” ti. Tecoeng atah a luu te a khun a hingna boet.

Tecoengah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng Pilat tengla cet u tih thinglam dawng a tai thlaang thli kah a khow thli te tlot khem pe ham, ahimi kah rawkk te thinglam dawngkah lawh hamla a bih u. Ahimi lawng tila a bih u he tah te khawhin te huet hin la awm tih Sabbath khawhin ah rawkk thli te thinglam dawng awm sak ham ahimi lawng ngaih u nawh, Sabbath khawhin tah aciim khawhin la a awm dawngah ni.
Tedawngah raalkap thli lawng cet u tih thinglam dawng Jesuh oen a ngawn haih thlaang kah a khow te lamhacuek ah a khem pe, tecoengah atloe pakhat kah a khow te a khem pe u.
Tede, ahimi lawngah Jesuh teng a pha u veng atah duek tangte la a awm te a huh u, tedawngah ahih kah a khow te tah khem pe u nawh.
Raalkap pakhat lawngah Jesuh te a vee ah cai oen a thun tih tevengah thisen oen tui te pahoei thoeng.
(He tila a awm he aka hukung lawng tila a thui he tah nangmi lawngkhaw na tangna u van hamla ni. Ahih lawng atak tang a thui te amah lawng a ming.)
Caciim lawngah, “A ruh te pakhat Pateng tlot manawh” tila a thui te asoepna hamla tila he awm.
Tecoengah atloe Caciim dawngah khaw, “Ahimi lawng cai oen a thun u te a bueh u ai” tila a thui te awm.

He coeng atah Arimatia khaaw kah Josep lawng Jesuh rawkk te lawh hamla Pilat tengah a bih. (Josep lawng aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih tih ahuepla Jesuh kah hubang la thuep aka awm ni.) Pilat lawng a rawkk te na lawh thai a tina dawngah cet tih a lawh.
Jesuh te huh hamla khawyiin ah aka cet Nikodemu khaw Josep oen haih cet tih mura oen aloes a pawlh heet riimtuui pawng yakhat tluk te a khuen.
Ahih rawi lawng Jesuh rawkk te a khuen hih tih Judah phung rawkk vui siing angla Jesuh rawkk oen riimtuui te himbai haldoel oen ah haih a yaawl.
Jesuh a ngawnna huen ah te dum pakhat awm tih te ah te a-u khat khaw a upna nawh thlann lungkaw a thai pakhat awm.
Te khawhin te tah Judah thlaang thli kah huet hin la awm tih thlann lungkaw te khaw ayoeica dawngah te ah te Jesuh te a up u.
Yarh khat khuikah lamhacuek khawhin mincanghi khaw a thaih suisai vengah Meri Makdalin te phuel la cet, thlann thawhka tlengna lungto ana khoe u te a huh.
Ahih lawngah Jesuh lawng a lungna atloe hubang thli oen Simon Piter tengla te heeng tih, “Thlann khuikah Bawipa te a lawh u poen, mela nuem a khueh u kai, ka ming nawh!” tila a thui pe.
Tecoengah Piter oen atloe hubang lawng phuel la cet hih.
Ahih rawi te heeng hih de atloe hubang te loe bet tih lamhala thlann te a pha.
Ahih lawng buekuep thuk tih a bueh vengah rawkk yaawlna himbai te a huh, tede a khuila tah kuun nawh.
Ahih hu ah aka law Simon Piter tah thlann khuila te kuun thuk. Te ah himbai a awm te khaw,
Jesuh kah a luu yaawlna himbai yaawl tangte athloekcala a awm te khaw a huh.
Tecoeng atah lamhala thlann aka pha atloe hubang te khaw a khuila kuun van; ahih lawngkhaw a huh tih a tangna.
(Caciim dawngah ahih tah duekna kalawng tho koep ai tila a thui te yaakming hih nawh toengtoeng hun.)
Tecoengah a hubang rawi te im la meel koep hih.
Meri te thlann tengah pai tih rap. Ahih lawng rah ruila te buekuep thuk tih thlann khui te a bueh,
tevengah himbai bawk aka bai vanthlaang pahih Jesuh kah rawkk a helhna ah te a khow ben ah pakhat, a luu ben ah pakhat aka ngawl hih te a huh.
Ahih rawi lawngah, “Hutaa nang, n'tu ah na rah khiing?” a tina hih. Ahih lawngah, “Ka Bawipa he a khuen u poen, mela nuem a khueh u ka ming nawh he!” a tina.
Tecoengah a hu benla a mang phai veng atah te ah Jesuh aka pai te a huh; tede ahih lawng Jesuh tila noek nawh.

Jesuh lawngah, “N'tu ah na rah khiing oh ca? Nang lawng a-u nuem na tlap de?” a tina. Ahih te dumtoetkung la a poek tih,” Saya, ahih te na lawh oh atah van thui lah, mela nuem na khueh, ka cet silang tah ka lo ai” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah, “Meri!” tila a khue. Meri lawngah ahih benla te maang tih Hebru awl la, “Rabboni!” a tina. (Thuingaihna tah, ‘Saya’ tina ni.)

Jesuh lawngah, “Kai he n'tu khaklal boel de lah, a Pa tengla ka cet thlan hun, tede ka manau thli tengla cet langtah, ‘ahimi oen kai kah a pa, kai kah Pathen oen ahimi kah Pathen tengla ka cet poen ai ti’ tila thui peh.” a tina.
Tedawngah Meri Makdalin lawng a hubang thli tengla te cet, Bawipa a huhna oen ahih tengah awl a thui pe te ahimi tengah a thui pe.

Thawh koep hin thlemben atah a hubang hue te thik at la tun u. Ahimi lawng aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih u tih thawh a khaih tih khak a kalh u. Tevengah Jesuh te law tih ahimi tim ah te a pai pe. “Nangmi sawah ngaimawngna awm seh.” a tina.
He tila a thui coengah ahimi te a kut rawi oen a vee te a huh sak. A hubang hue lawng Bawipa te a huh u tih awmngaih u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm seh, a Pa lawng kai n'tuih van angla nangmi he kan tuih u.” tila koep a thui pe.
Tecoengah ahimi sawah a hill te pho a hut tih, “Ciim Muithla he lo u lah.

Nangmi lawng thlaang kah thawlhna te khawdawp na ngaai pe u atah ahimi te khawdawp ngaai la awm ai; nangmi lawng ahimi kah thawlhna te khawdawp na ngaai pe nawh atah ahimi tah khawdawp ngaai nawh la awm ai” a tina.
Jesuh a law vengah te hubang thlaihih khuikah pakhat van Tawmas (Caphee a ti u te) tah awm nawh.

Tedawngah atloe hubang hue lawng, “Kaimi tah Bawipa te ka huh u poen!” a tina u. Tawmas lawng ahimi nala te, “Kai tah, a kut dawngkah thiicung henna boengha te kutdawn oen ka tek nawh tih a vee te khaw ka kut oen ka yuh ka yam nawh atah ka tangna manawh” tila a thui.

Yarh khat a awm coeng atah a hubang hue te im khuiah koep tun u. Tawmas khaw ahimi oen awm u. Thawh te khak a kalh u, tede Jesuh te law tih ahimi tim ah pai tih,” Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm seh” a tina.
Tecoengah Tawmas nala te, “Na kutdawn thli te ka kut dawngah khueh langtah ka kut he bueh lah; na kut te yueng langtah ka vee he yutt yam lah. Uepvoet tlaih boel, tangna loeih!” a tina.
Tawmas lawng, “Ka Bawipa oen ka Pathen” a tina.
Jesuh lawng ahih nala te, “Nang lawng nan huh dawngah nan tangna aw? Kai he huh muehla aka oeng thlaang thli tah yotheenna a dawng u!” a tina.
Jesuh lawngah a hubang thli tengah kawpoekrai miknoekna yahawh hlang a sai te he cabu dawngah thut nawh la moen awm hun.
Tede Jesuh tah Messiah, Pathen Capa ni tite nangmi lawng na tangna u tih ahih te na oengna rang oen hingna te na khuehna u ham he ang thli he thut la awm.
He coengah Jesuh lawng Teberias Tuiliipui ah a hubang thli tengah te koep a phumpho pe. A phumphona tah tila ni.
Simon Piter, Tawmas (caphee a ti u te), Nathanael (Galili peng Kanaa khaw kah), Zebedi ca rawi oen ah Jesuh kah hubang atloe pahih te haih awm u.

Simon Piter lawng atloe hue nala te, “Kai nga ka heeng de lah ai.” a tina. Ahimi lawng, “Kaimi khaw ka law u van ai” a tina u. Lowng dawngah cet u tih nga a heeng u, tede yiin at puet ah nga khat khaw tu u nawh.
Khaw a thoeng hang atah Jesuh te tuikeeng ah pai, tede a hubang thli lawng Jesuh te noek u nawh.
Tecoengah ahimi nala te, “Cadawng thli, nga khat khaw na tu u nawh aw?” a tina. Ahimi lawngah, “Khat khaw ka tu u nawh” a tina u.

Te atah ahimi nala te, “Lowng kah bantang ben ah lok te heeng u lah, ayawl akai tah na tuuk u khawming.” a tina. Tedawngah ahimi lawng lok te a heeng u tih nga yahawh hlang a tuuk khuengdeng u tih lok te koep doek u thai tlaih nawh.
Jesuh lawng a lungna hubang pakhat lawngah Piter nala te, “Bawipa ni!” a tina. Piter lawng, Bawipa ni tite a yaak vengah a himbaidung a dul sut te a hingcen ah a yeen tih tui dawngah sungpung thuk.
Atloe hubang hue lawngtah nga aka be poek lok te a doek u tih tuikeeng la te lowng oen law u. Ahimi te tah lan kalawng ah thla hlang aih nawh, pe yathum yun ni athla.
Ahimi lawng tuikeeng te a pha u vengah haialh dawngah nga a haai tangte te khaw a huh u, takawi khaw awm.
Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Nga na tuuk u te thoem van khuen lah,” a tina.
Simon Piter lawngah lowng dawng la cet tih nga abobo oen aka be poek lok te tuikeeng la a duek, nga te, yakhat coeng sawmngaa pathum law mai de lok te pawn nawh.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “Law uh, ca u loeih,” a tina. Bawipa ni tite a ming u poen tih a hubang khatca lawngkhaw, “Nang he a-u?” tila te doet re u tlaih nawh.
Te atah Jesuh lawng cet tih takawi te a lawh tih ahimi te a peek; te tila te nga khaw ahimi te a peek.
He tah duekna kalawng a thawh coengah a hubang hue tengah Jesuh a phumphona a pathumna ni.

Ahimi lawng a caak u coeng atah Jesuh lawng Simon Piter nala, “Johan capa Simon, he hue lawngah kai n'lungna lak ah nang lawng nan lungna ngaai aw?” tila a doet. Simon lawngah, “Oeih, Bawipa, kan lungna he na ming.” a tina. Jesuh lawng, “Ka tuu thli he atheenla van doen.” a tina.
Avoeihihna ah Jesuh lawng, “Johan capa Simon, kai he nan lungna aw?” a tina. Ahih lawngah, “Oeih, Bawipa, kan lungna te na ming.” a tina. Jesuh lawngah, “Ka tuu thli he van doen ne.” a tina.

Apathum na ah Jesuh lawng, “Johan capa, Simon, kai he nan lungna aw?” tila a doet. Jesuh lawng voei thum toe ah nan lungna aw tila a doet dawngah Piter tah a kaw the malcal tih, “Bawipa soeprep he na ming; kai lawng kan lungna te na ming!” a tina. Jesuh lawngah, “Ka tuu thli he van doen.

Awltak kavan thui: Na thawh thuem veng atah huertuela na awm tih na ngaihna ah te na cet; tede na patawng atah baan na lam vetih nang te thlaang lawngah n'piin ai, na ceh ngaihna nawh ahuen la te n'khuen u ai.” a tina.
(He tila a thui he tah Piter he me ang duekna oen a duek vetih Pathen ruep-awmna te a tueng sak ai tite thuinuetna ni.) Tecoengah Jesuh lawng, “Ka hu ah baang lah!” a tina.

Piter lawng maang tih a bueh vengah Jesuh lawng a lungna atloe hubang te a huh, te thlaang te tah thlembuh a veel u vengah Jesuh pum dawngah hangdang tih, “Bawipa, na sawah a-u lawng paipi a thleep ai?” tila aka doet te ni.
Piter lawng ahih te a huh vengah, Jesuh nala, “Bawipa, ahih he ta metila a awm ai?” tila a doet.
Jesuh lawngah, “Kai ka law toe ah ahih te hing sak hamla ka ngaih mai kawinih nang lawng n'tu na tina ai? ka hu ah va bang ngoen lah!” a tina.

Tedawngah te kah a hubang te duek manawh tila Jesuh kah a hubang hue tengah te a thui pe u. Tede Jesuh lawngtah ahih te duek manawh tila thui nawh: “Kai ka law toe ah ahih te hing sak hamla ka ngaih mai kawinih nang lawng n'tu na tina ai?” tila ni a thui.
Ahih te tah he ang thaihu thli aka thuikung oen cathutkung hubang pakhat la awm tih ahih lawng a thui te soeng tila ka ming u.

Jesuh lawng atloe thaihu thli a sai te moen awm hun. Te ang thli te pakhat coeng pakhat thut boeih mai sih ti kawinih te ang thli thutna cabu te khuehna ham dilai pumpui he Pateng khoek mai manawh tila ka poek.
Lamhacuek kah cabu dawngah Jesuh lawng thaihu a sai boeih oen bii a tong cuek vengkah a cangpueina kalawng ah vaan la a luuina khawhin toe kah akawng alam te ka thut poen.
Vaan la a luui thlan vengah a thlaangtuek hubang hue te Ciim Muithla tharana oen a uen a tawn.
A duek coengah khawhin sawmlii khui puet ahimi tengah a phumpho pe tih ahih tah hing tite uepvoetna awm tlaih nawh.
Tecoengah ahimi a tun u vengah he tila awl a thui pe: “Jerusalem he ceh taak u boel, a Pa awlkam akawng alam kavan thui kutdo te ring uh.
Johan lawngtah tui oen baptisma te a peek, tede khawhin meyoeh khaw a awm aih thlan ah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma te na dang u poen ai.” tila a thui pe.
Jesuh oen a hubang thli a tun u vengah te ahimi lawng, “Bawipa, tahe vengah aw Israel thlaangphun thli he a Ram na peek koep ai? tila a doet u.
Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te, “A Pa lawng atue atang oen ari amawng a helh te nangmi lawng na ming ham ngoe mai nawh.

Tede nangmi sawah Ciim Muithla a law vengah nangmi tah tharana oen na betoet u vetih Jerusalem ah, Judia peng boeih oen ah Samaria peng ah, tecoengah dilai aboetna kheng toela kai kah sausi la na awm u ai.
He awl he a thui coengah ahimi kah mik huh roe ah te vaan la luui hang, muui lawng a yaawl khoep tih ahimi lawng hu u thai tlaih nawh.
Te tila vaan la a luui hang te ahimi lawng mik khah muehla vaan benla poe a dan u, tevengah himbai bawk aka bai thlaang pahih ahimi tengah a pai pe tih,

ahih rawi lawngah, “Galili thlaang thli, n'tu ah te ah te na pai u tih vaan benla na dan khiing u? Jesuh he nangmi teng kalawng vaan la luui poen, vaan la a luui hang na huh u van angla te a rum thuk koep te na huh u ai.” a tina.
Tecoengah a hubang thli tah Olif Tlaang kalawng Jerusalem la te koep meel u. Te tlaang te khawpui kalawng ah meng tentan yunyan ni a thla mai.

Ahimi tah khawpui khuila kuun u tih amami a awmna huen la te cet u: Ahimi hue te tah; Piter, Johan, Jeem oen Andru, Filip oen Tawmas, Bartalomiu oen Matthai, Alfias capa Jeem, Phunkuup Simon; oen ah Jeem capa Judas, he hue ni.
Ahimi tah Jesuh kah a manu Meri oen khaw, hutaa thli oen khaw, Jesuh kah a manu thli oen khaw huh u poepa tih thangthui u.
Khawhin meyoeh yun nuem a awm coeng atah oengca thli huhtunna awm tih thlaangmi te a pum boeih la ya pakul yun awm, Piter lawng pai tih awl a thui.
Ahih lawngah, “Maya manau thli, ‘Jesuh aka tu thlaang thli te lawngnuehkung Judas kawng Ciim Muithla lawng Devid kaa khui kalawng a thui oepsoeh tih Caciim khuiah a thut te asoep ham awm.
Judas tah mami bu khuiah aka thuum thlaang pakhat van tih mami oen bii aka bi haih hamla a tuek thlaang van ni,” tila a thui.
(Judas lawngah amah kah athe ara, saina oen a dang tangka te oen ah lo huen pakhat a lai, te ah te amah duek. A bung te pawkk phut tih a riil khaw boeih thoeng.
Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang boeih lawng te kawng te a yaak u, tedawngah te kah lo huen te amami awl la ‘Akeldama’ tila a thui u, thuingaihna tah “Thisen lo huen.” ti ngaihna ni.).
“Saam cabu dawngah, ‘A im te imrongg dingratt la awm selang tah im khuiah a-u khaw awm boel seh’ tila a thut. Tecoengah, ‘Ahih kah bi yueng te thlaangtloe lawng bi seh’ tila a thut te khaw awm.
Tedawngah Bawipa Jesuh kah thawhkoepna te aka thui haih hamla thlaang pakhat khat lawng mami he bawngyawng ham awm.

Te thlaang te tah Bawipa Jesuh he mami oen ah khawlawng ceh poepa vengah te mami tengah aka thuum van tih Johan lawng baptisma awlthang a thui veng kalawng ah, mami teng kalawng Jesuh vaan la a luui toe ah mami tengah aka awm thlaang seh” tila a thui.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng thlaang pahih Josep a ti u Barsabbas (Jastas tila khaw a miingna) oen Mattias te a nuen u.
Tecoengah ahimi lawng thangthui u tih, “Bawipa, nang lawng thlaang boeih kah kawpoek te na ming.
Tedawngah Judas lawng a ceh taak Celtuih bii te ahih yuengla aka bi ham he kah thlaang pahih khuiah nang lawng na tuek te van tueng sak lah.” tila thangthui u.
Tecoengah ahimi lawng te thlaang pahih khuiah te tuek hamla talcung a yueh u tih Mattias te a tuek u, ahih te celtuih thlaikhat tim ah te a thuum sak u.
Pentikos hin a pha vengah oengca thli boeih te ahuen pakhat ah kang tun u.
Tevengah thlipui khawthlii tuen awl oen aka lo u awl te vaan kalawng bawtbet ah law tih ahimi a ngawlhna im khui te a hu thulh.
Tevengah ahimi lawng hailai oen ah aka lo u te a huh u, te kah hailai te pek u phang tih te kah aka awm thlaang pakhat rip sawah te awm.
Ahimi tah Ciim Muithla oen betoet u tih Muithla lawngah a thui sak angla awl tloe la cal u.
Tevengah te dilai saw ram tawm kah aka law, bokna ben ah thinkaw aka pe Judah thlaang thli te Jerusalem ah awm u.
He kah tuen apau awl he a yaak u vengah thlaangping te kueng tun u. Oengca thli lawng amah awl la a cal u te ahimi lawng amah awl la rip a yaak u vengah ahimi tah a kawpoek la rai u.
Ahimi lawng ngaihang kawpoek rai oen, “He tila awl aka thui hue he Galili thlaang boeih de lah koen!
Tetih atah metila ahimi awl thui he mami lawng mah awl mah kaa la rip n'yaak kai?
Mami he Patia ram, Media ram oen Elan ram kah aka law; Mesopotamia ram, Judia ram oen Kappadocia ram kah aka law; Pontias oen Asia ram kah aka law,
Frikia ram oen Pamfilia ram kalawng, Iyipt ram oen Sairin khaaw teng khaaw vai Libia ram khuikah aka law thlaang ni; khatsut tah Rom ram kalawng aka law;

Judah thlaangphun oen Judah phung aka vai Gental thlaang ni; Mami timkah khatsut tah Krik ram oen Arabia ram kah aka law thlaang ni; Pathen kah kawpoek rai thaihu sai kawng, ahimi lawng a thui u te mami lawng n'mah awl la n'yaak rip u mai!” tila a thui u.
Ahimi tah ngaihang cawm-am sut u tih amami khat oen khat te, “He he n'tu a thuingaihna kai?” tila doet u.
Tede thlaangtloe lawngtah oengca thli te a nuihna u tih, “He kah thlaang thli he yuu aka ruui thlaang hue ni!” tila a thui u.

Tevengah Piter te celtuih paha thlaihih oen pai haih u, angaih hlang la awl a huer tih thlaangping rangpui tengah awl a thui: “Ka puei - Judah thlaangphun thli oen Jerusalem ah aka awm boeih, he kah thuingaihna he kavan thui ai, hutung u lah.
He kah thlaang thli he nangmi kah poek angla yuu a ruui u moenih; Tahe ah mincang khawnoek pakua ni a pha hun.
He tah tawngha Jo-el lawng akawng alam a thui te ni.

Ahih lawngah, ‘Khawhin aboetna a pha atah, Pathen lawng: Thlaang boeih he ka Muithla oen ka toi ai. Na capa thli oen na canu thli lawngah ka awl he a phawng u ai; Thlaangno roeng thaai thli lawng huhthlaam a huh u vetih Ciya patawng hue lawngah mang a man ai.
Te khawhin ah kamah kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli hutaa oen tawngpa sawah ka Muithla ka toi vetih ahimi lawng ka awl te a phawng ai.
Vaan khawhi sawah kawpoek rai miknoek ka sai vetih dilai adang ben ah khaw kawpoek rai thaihu ka sai ai. Te tah thisen, hai-alh, aka thah muepkuep haikhu oen ah ka tueng sak ai;
Bawipa kah khawhin, ruep-awm oen alenduet te a pha thlan ah khawmik te yiin khup vetih thla lawngkhaw thisen angla lingduuk la awm ai.
Tevengah Bawipa te a khue tih reenna aka bih tah thlawnna a dang ai,’ tila a thui.

Ka puei Israel thlaangphun thli, ka awl he hutung u lah! Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh lawng Pathen kah saithaina aana a khueh tite ahih rang oen Pathen lawng a sai kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu oen ah aciimphanla a tueng sak poen. Te ang thli te namami mik huh ah a sai dawngah nangmi lawng na ming u.
Pathen lawngah amah khawkhanna angla Jesuh te nangmi kut ah peek hamla awl a khueng oepsoeh poen; ahih te thinglam dawng na tai u tih thlaangthawlh thli kah kut oen na ngawn u poen.
Tede, Pathen lawngah ahih te duekna thara khui kalawng a loeih sak tih a thawh sak poen, metihtiah ahih te duekna lawngah thongtla angla tu khaklal thai nawh.
Devid lawngah ahih kawng te, ‘Bawipa te ka haiah ka huh poepa; Ahih tah ka tengah awm tih ka lakueng nawh
Tedawngah kawhoena oen ka betoet tih ka awl tah awmngaihna oen becoeih. Kai tah duek koei la ka awm de ngaiuepna oen ngaikhuek thindeeng la ka awm ai,
metihtiah nang lawngah celkhui-khaaw ah nan voei sut nawh vetih; namah kah uep-awm tuihyoeihthlaang te thlann khuiah rong athaang sak ham na ngaih nawh.
Nang lawngah hingna benla aka mawt lawngpui te nan huh sak poen, nan awm puei tih awmngaihna oen ka betoet.’ tila a thui.
Maya manau boeih, mami kah patuer miingthang Devid Sengpahrang kawng he acaihpanla kavan thui ai. Ahih tah duek tih a up u poen, ahih kah thlann te tahe toe mami mik huh ah awm hun.
Ahih tah tawngha la awm tih Pathen lawng ahih tengah awl a kam te a ming: Pathen lawng awl a kam tah Devid cadil pakhat te Devid amah angla sengpahrang la a khueh ai a ti te ni.

Pathen lawng hailam ben ah a sai ham koei te Devid lawng a ming tih tedawngah Messiah kah thawhkoepna kawng te a thui oepsoeh poen. Ahih lawngah, ‘Ahih tah celkhuikhaaw ah voei sut manawh; ahih kah a pum te thlann khuiah rong sut manawh.” tila a thui.
Pathen lawng Jesuh te duekna kalawng a thawh sak tite aka mingkung tah kaimi ni.
Ahih tah ana Pa Pathen kah bantang ben ah a ngawlh sak poen tih ana Pa kah awlkam angla Muithla te a dang poen. Tahe ah nangmi lawng na huh u tih na yaak he tah kaimi sawah avan toi amah kutdo ni.
Tedawngah Israel thlaang thli boeih, nangmi lawng thinglam dawng na ngawn Jesuh te Pathen lawngah Bawipa oen Messiah la a sai ni tite atak tang la ming u lah!” a tina.
He awl he thlaang thli lawng a yaak u vengah lakueng u tangkiik tih Piter oen atloe celtuih hue nala te, “‘Maya manau thli, kaimi lawng n'tu ka sai u ai?’ tila a doet u.

Piter lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi boeih lawngah na thawlhna yut u langtah na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaaina hamla Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah baptisma hu u lah; te atah Pathen kah kutdo Ciim Muithla te na dang u ai.
Te kutdo te peek ham Pathen kah awlkam tah namami oen na cadil thli ham khaw, athla hlang kah thlaang boeih ham khaw, Bawipa Pathen amah lawng a khue boeih thlaang thli ham ni.” a tina.
Piter lawng ahimi te awltloe khaw moen a thui pe tih, ‘He kah thlaangthe thli sawah aka law ham koei dantatna kalawng namami oen namami thlawn u lah!” a tina.
Ahih kah awl thui te thlaang broe lawngah a tangna u tih baptisma a huh u, te kah khawhin ah te ahimi bu khuiah thlaang thong thum yunyan lawngah a tawm a thap u.
Ahimi lawngah celtuih hue tengah cangna, khat oen khat pawlneengna, beroep lopaang buh veelna, thangthuina ah amami kah atue te a hawna u.
Celtuih hue lawngah kawpoek rai miknoekna oen kawpoek raina thli te broela a sai u tih thlaang boeih tah lakueng u.
Oengca boeih te khat la huui u tih a khueh thaihu thli te pakhat oen khat rek ara patoeng u.
Ahimi lawng amami kah thaihu khuehtoen thli te a yoeih u tih a voetna aka awm thlaang thli te a ngoena angla tangka te arek ara u.
Khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im ah te pum u, amami im ah buh veel haihna te a sai u tih lunghoeih lungpaih la awmngaihna thinkaw oen a caak u.
Pathen te a thangpawm u tih ahimi te thlaang boeih lawng a hinyah u. Tecoengah thlawnna aka dang thlaang thli te Bawipa lawngah khawhin roekk ah ahimi bu khuiah te a kuun pe sak.
Hin at ah Piter oen Johan tah thangthuina tue thlemben khawnoek pathum ah Tempal bok-im la te cet hih.

Te ah te Atheen Thawhka a ti u te awm tih a thangpek kalawng khow aka kheem thlaang pakhat te ah te awm. Tempal bok-im la aka cet thlaang thli tengah tangka bih hamla ahih te hin roekk ah te kah thawhka la te avan khuen u.
Ahih lawngah Piter oen Johan a law hih te a huh vengah tangka a bih.
Ahih rawi lawng a bueh rang patang tih Piter lawng, “Kai hih he n'bueh lah!” a tina.
Tevengah thaihu pakhat khat m'peek ai tite a ngaiuep tih ahih rawi te a bueh.
Tede Piter lawng ahih nala, “Tangka ka khueh thamhalh nawh, tede ka khueh te kan peek: Nazaret Jesuh miing oen ah awl kan peek, tho langtah cet lah!” a tina.
Tecoengah ahih te a bantang kut ah a phoeih tih a thawh hang. Te thlaang kah a khow oen khowcih te cak pahoei;
Ahih tah sawi tih pet, pai hang tih yingyawi. Tecoengah ahih rawi oen Tempal bok-im khuila te kuun, sawipet ruila cet tih Pathen te a thangpawm.
Ahih lawng ceh ruila sawipet tih Pathen a thangpawm te te kah thlaang thli lawng a huh u;
Ahih te Atheen Thawhka ah aka ngawl buh bih kutduen thlaang ni tite a ming u vengah ahih sawah thaihu aka thoeng dawngah te kawpoek la rai tih a ngaai hang u.
Te thlaang lawngah Piter oen Johan te a phoeih khak, thlaangping tah a kawpoek la rai u tih Solomon imthloeih a ti u te ah te ahimi tengla heeng u phai.

Piter lawng thlaangping te a huh vengah ahimi nala, “Ka puei Israel thlaang thli, n'tu kawngah he thaihu dawngah he na kawpoek a rai u tih kaihih he alet uekcuekla nan bueh u? Kaihih lawngah kamahih kah huham tharana oen Pathen haiah theenna oen ah he kah thlaang he a ceh sak tila na poek u aw?

Abraham, Isak oen Jakob Pathen, mami patuer hue kah Pathen lawngah amah kah tuihyoeih-thlaang Jesuh te aciim ruep-awmna te a peek poen. Tede nangmi lawng aana khuehkung thli kut ah na peek tih Pilat lawng ka thlah silang tah ka loeih sak ai tila awl a khueh coengah Pateng khaw Pilat haiah nangmi lawng na thana u.
Ahih tah thlaangciim, thlaangdoeng la awm de, ahih te nangmi lawng na hoett u tih thlaang aka ngawn dai te thlah sak ham Pilat tengah na bih u.
Nangmi lawngah hingna benla aka ceh puei thlaang te na ngawn u, tede Pathen lawng ahih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak poen, tite aka mingkung tah kaimi ni.

Ahih kah a miing huham tharana lawng he kah khowkheem thlaang he tharana te a peek. Nangmi lawng na huh tih na ming u he tah ahih kah a miing oengna rang oen ni sai la a awm; nangmi boeih lawng na huh u angla Jesuh oengna lawng ni ahih he a sa ading sak.
Tedawngah maya manau thli, nangmi boeih oen namami kah mawtkung thli lawng Jesuh sawah na sai u te na ming u nawh dawngah na sai u tite ka ming u.
Yan vengah Pathen lawng tawngha boeih tengah, amah kah Messiah lawngah patang a khang ai tila a thui oepsoeh te amah lawng te tila asoep sak.
Tedawngah nangmi kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaaina ham thawlhna yut u langtah Pathen tengla meel u lah.
Te tila na sai u atah, Bawipa teng kalawng muithla ben tharana a lawna tue te a pha vetih nangmi ham a tuek oepsoeh Messiah Jesuh te avan tuih ai.
Yan vengkah aciim tawngha thli hawna oen Pathen lawng a thui poen angla soeprep boeih he athaaila saina atue te a pha thlantoe ahih te vaan ah awm hun ai.
Mosi lawngah, ‘Bawipa na Pathen lawng nangmi khuikah thlaang kai angla tawngha pakhat te nangmi ham avan tuih ai. Nangmi lawng na sai u ham koei soeprep boeih avan thui te na hutung pe u ai.
A-u khaw tawngha lawng a thui te a ngaai nawh atah Pathen thlaang thli teng kalawng a thloeng vetih a phe boeih ai’ tila a thui.
Samu-el oen ahih coeng kah aka law tawngha boeih lawngkhaw tahe vengah aka thoeng ham koei thaihu thli he a thui u.

Pathen lawng amah kah tawngha thli rang oen ah awl a kam te tah nangmi ham ni, Pathen lawng namami kah patuer thli tengah awlkamna a sai te nangmi lawngkhaw na paang u van. Abraham tengah te, ‘Nang kah cadil nauha thli rang oen ah dilai thlaang boeih te yotheenna oen ka phueh ka sawm ai’ tila a thui.
Tedawngah Pathen lawng a Tuihyoeih-thlaang te a tuek tih nangmi lawng thawlhna te na ceh taak u tih nangmi boeih te yotheenna peek hamla nangmi tengah lamhacuekla avan tuih.” a tina.
Piter oen Johan lawng thlaangping tengah awl a thui hih lii vengah te khawsoeih khatsut thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raalkapbawi thli oen ah Sadusi khatsut hue te avan pha u.
Celtuih pahih rawi lawngah thlaangping hue te duekna kalawng Jesuh tho koep tila a cang puei he tah thlaangduek thli tho koep tite a cak sak dawngah Sadusi hue tah a thin sa u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng ahih rawi te a tuuk u, khaw athlem thuk poen dawngah avuen khawhin toe thong ah a thlaak u.
Tede ahih rawi kah awl thui te aka ya thlaang broe lawng a tangna u tih thlaang thong ngaa yun toela puung hang.
Avuen khawhin atah Judah thlaangphun mawtkung thli, ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli te Jerusalem ah tun u.
Ahimi te Khawsoeih Bawi Annas oen Kaiafas, Johan, Alekzandar oen ah Khawsoeih Bawi kah atloe imkhuikaw thli oen huh u.
Ahimi lawngah celtuih rawi te amami haiah a pai sak tih a-u kah a miing na hawna? tila a doet u.
Tevengah Ciim Muithla oen aka betoet Piter lawng, “Thlaangping aka mawt thli oen ahaamca thli:
Khowkheem thlaang pakhat sawah thaihu theen saina kawng ahih he metila a hoeih tite tihin ah nan doet u,

Nangmi boeih oen ah Israel thlaang boeih lawng a ming ham tah he kah thlaang lawngah hoeih heet tih nangmi haiah a pai he tah, nangmi lawng thinglam dawngah na ngawn u tih duekna kalawng Pathen lawngah a thawh sak koep, Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh Khrih kah a miing tharana rang oen ni.
Caciim lawngah, “Imsakung thli lawng a hoett sut lungto te awlpui koek lungto la coengg,’ tila a thui te tah Jesuh he ni.
Ahih rang bueng oen ni thlawnna he huh thai la a awm; dilai pum ah he Pathen kah peek ahih nawh atah mami aka thlawn thai a-u khat khaw awm nawh.

Awlcekna khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli lawngah Piter oen Johan he thoemthai cuihna aka khueh nawh thlaang mailai ni tite a ming u, tede ahih rawi lawng tong-aa ohla awl a thui te a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai u. Tede ahih rawi he tah Jesuh kah a paya beroep ni tite ahimi lawng a ming u.
Tede Piter oen Johan tengah khow-kheem thlaang aka hoeih te ahimi lawng a huh u dawngah n'tu khaw thui u thai nawh.
Tedawngah awlcekna khonsil im khui kalawng ahih rawi te kawlkalh a ceh sak u, tecoeng atah amami poek ah doet u tih awl a thui u.
Ahimi lawngah, “He rawi he metila n'sai lah ai? Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang boeih lawngah ahih rawi kah miknoekna alakloe a sai he a ming u boeih poen tih mami lawngkhaw oelh thai la awm nawh.
Tede he thaihu he thlaangping tim ah apuung tare nawh ham, ahih rawi lawngah a-u tengah khaw Jesuh miing oen awl thui nawh ham khaang pe sih.” tila a thui u.
Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng te rawi te a khue koep u tih Jesuh miing oen a-u khaw cang puei nawh ham, a-u tengah khaw Jesuh miing oen awl thui nawh hamla a khaang pe u.
Tede Piter oen Johan lawng ahimi nala te, “Pathen haiah nangmi kah awl ngaai he aw aka soeng, tihnawhtah Pathen awl ngaai he aw aka soeng tite namami lawngah awl tloek uh.
Metihtiah kai hih lawngtah kamah mik oen ka huh tih ka haa oen ka yaak te thui hamla ka toeng manawh.” tila a thui hih.

Tedawngah awlcekna khonsil thlaang thli lawng ahih rawi te anauh ngaai la ngaithuenna a peek tih a tuih hih. He tila thaihu aka awm dawngah he thlaang broe lawng Pathen te a thangpawm u tih ahih rawi te dan peek hamla coengg thai nawh.
He kah kawpoekrai miknoekna a sai pe thlaang he tah a kum sawmlii thlai law poen.
Piter oen Johan he a thlah pahoei oen a paya hue tengla meel hih tih khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang ahaamca thli kah awl thui te ahimi tengah a thui pe.
Te awl te oengca thli boeih lawng a yaak u vengah ahimi boeih lawng thik at la haawl u tih Pathen tengah thangthui u: “Vaan oen dilai, tuitunlii oen ah a khuiah aka awm boeih saikung Bawipa!

Nang kah tuihyoeihthlaang, kaimi kah patuer Devid teng kalawng Ciim Muithla oen awl na thui tih, ‘Gental thlaang thli lawng n'tu ah a thin a sa u tih, n'tu ah thlaang thli lawng ahuep khawkhanna te a sai u?
Bawipa oen Messiah te oelhtaih hamla, dilai saw kah sengpahrang thli lawng kamthlah u tih, ukkung thli lawng tun u.’ tila na thui.
Metihtiah Herod oen Pontias Pilat tah he khawpui khuiah Gental thlaang thli oen Israel thlaang thli oen ah nang kah aciim Tuihyoeihthlaang Messiah la na sai Jesuh te oel khak hamla tun u tangtang.
Nang lawngah namah kah huham tharana oen aka awm ham koei na thui sut soeprep boeih te sai hamla ahimi tah tun u.
Tedawngah tahe ah he Bawipa, ahimi kah helcalna he van poek lang namah kah tuihyoeihthlaang kaimi he namah kah awl te thin awm tangkiik la n'thui sak lah.
Thlaang tlo thli lawng a sa a dingna ham na kut te van thueng langtah aciim Tuihyoeihthlaang Jesuh miing oen ah kawpoekraina oen kawpoekrai miknoekna te sai lah.” tila thangthui u.
Ahimi lawng a thangthui coeng boet atah ahimi a tunna ahuen te hinghuen. Ahimi tah Ciim Muithla oen betoet u tih Pathen awl te thin awm tangkiik la a thui u.

Oengca thli lawngah thinkaw oen lungbui khat la kang a khueh u. A-u lawngkhaw a khueh thaihu te kamah kah thaihu ni ti u tlaih nawh tih ahimi lawng a khueh thaihu boeih te khat oen khat avanpila ree u.
Celtuih thli lawng Bawipa Jesuh kah thawhkoepna te huham tharana oen a phawng u tih Pathen lawng ahimi boeih sawah yotheen kam-awmna te yahawh hlang la a lun pe.
Ahimi kah bu ah te thlaang khat khaw a voetna awm nawh. Im khaw, lo khaw aka khueh hue lawngah boeih a yoeih u tih a huh tangka boeih te,
Celtuih hue kah kut ah kang a peek u; te tangka te pakhat rip tengah a voetna taring ah arek ara pe u.
Te ah te Caipras tuisanglak kah Levi thlaangphun Josep aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm tih Celtuih hue lawng Barnabas a tina u. (thuingaihna tah, “Thaphawhkung” tina ni.),
ahih lawngah amah lo huen te a yoeih, tangka te avan khuen tih celtuih hue kah kut dawngah te a tloeng pe.
Ananias aka miingna thlaang pakhat te awm tih a yu tah Safira a miingna, ahih rawi lawng a khueh thaihu te thoem a yoeih hih.
Tede a yu lawngkhaw a ngaih van tih tangka avaang athal te amahih ham a paih hih tih a paih coeih te celtuih hue kah kut ah te a peek.
Piter lawng ahih nala, “Ananias, n'tu ah na thinkaw te Seitan na uk sak, na khueh toen na yoeih thaihu phu te namah ham na paih thoem tih Ciim Muithla te na thai na lat na?

Na thaihu te na yoeih thlan ah namah thaihu la awm tih na yoeih coengah khaw tangka te namah koe la ni a awm. N'tu ham he ang thaihu he sai hamla thinkaw na poek? Thlaang na thai na latna nawh tih Pathen ni na thai na lat na!” a tina.
He awl he Ananias lawng a yaak pahoei oen tlim tih duek; he kawng he aka ya boeih lawngtah
Cadawng caloe thli law u tih a rawkk te himbai oen a yaawl u, a khuen u tih a up u.
Tecoeng khawnoek pathum yunyan a awm coengah a yu te va law, ahih lawngah te tila thaihu aka awm te ming nawh.
Piter lawng ahih te, “Nanghih yuvaa lawng na yoeih thaihu phu na dang te he yoeh poen aw, van thui lah?” a tina. Ahih lawngah, “Oeih, he yoeh poen ni.” a tina.

Tedawngah Piter lawng, “N'tu ah nanghih yuvaa lawng Bawipa kah Muithla he noekdak ham kaw na poek hih? Na vaa kah rawkk aka kuem thli thawhka ah tahe pai u te, ahimi lawng nang khaw n'khuen u van ai!” a tina.
Kawlkalh ah ahih te Piter kah a khowkung ah tlim pahoei tih duek. Cadawng caloe thli law u tih ahih te a rawkk la a thoel u, ahimi lawng a khuen u tih a vaa tengah te a up u.
He kawng he aka ya khrihcabu oen thlaangtloe boeih lawng atah caalla a rih u tangkiik.
Celtuih hue lawngah thlaangping tim ah kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu te broela a sai u. Oengca thli boeih tah Solomon Imthloeih ah te kueng tun u.
thlaang thli lawng ahimi te a koeh u de, amami bu khuikah thlaang nawh lawngtah ahimi oen tuhkai u ham te tong-aa haitawk u.
Tede, Bawipa te aka tangna hutaa, tawngpa thlaang broe lawngah ahimi bu te a tawm athap tare u.

Celtuih hue kah biibina rang oen a dang phu tah Piter te a law phai vengah a mueithlip lawngah thlaangtlo pakhat mai khaw thlipdah seh ti u tih, thlaangtlo thli te lawngpui la avan khuen u tih ihkhun dawngah khaw, phak dawngah khaw a ralh sak u.
Tecoengah Jerusalem khaawteng khaawvai kah thlaangping broe lawngah thlaangtlo thli khaw, a kaw khuiah raaithe aka awm thli te khaw avan khuen u; ahimi boeih te biit hoeih u.
Tecoengah Khawsoeih Bawi oen a paya boeih, te kah aka awm Sadusi thlaang boeih lawng celtuih thli te a uett aham u; tedawngah ahimi lawng thaihu pakhat khat sai hamla awl a khueng u.
Ahimi lawngah celtuih hue te a tuuk u tih rangpui kah thongim ah te athlaak u.
Tede khawyiin ah Bawipa kah vanthlaang lawng thongim thawh te a awng pe, celtuih thli te a ceh puei tih ahimi nala te,
“Cet u langtah Tempal bok-im khuiah te pai u lang he kah hingna a thaai kawng he thlaang boeih tengah thui uh” a tina.

Celtuih hue lawng ahih awl te a ngaai pe u, khaw a thaih atah Tempal bok-im khuila kuun u tih a cang puei u. Khawsoeih Bawi oen a paya thli lawngah awlcekna khonsil huhtunna sai hamla Judah thlaang ahaamca thli te a khue; te coengah celtuih thli te ahimi haiah van law puei ham thongim la thlaang a tuih u.
Tede a thlaangtuih thli lawng thongim a pha u vengah thongim khuiah celtuih thli te hu u tlaih nawh, tedawngah awlcekna khonsil thlaang thli tengla te meel u tih a thui pe u,

‘Kaimi thongim ka pha u vengah thong thawhka a kalh khak tih a piin rap te khaw, aka toet thli thong thawhka ah a awm u te khaw ka huh u; tede thawhka te ka awng u vengah a khuiah a-u khat khaw ka hu u nawh!” ti u.
Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raalkap bawi thli lawng te awl te a yaak u vengah celtuih thli he me tih ni a ti oh kai tite a kawpoek rai u.
Tevengah thlaang pakhat law tih ahimi nala te, “Hutung u lah! thong ah na thlaak u thlaang thli lawng Tempal bok-im ah thlaang thli te a cang puei!” a tina.

Tevengah tempal bok-im aka toet bawi lawng amah kah thlaang thli te a ceh puei tih celtuih hue te avan khuen koep u. Tede amami te thlaangping lawngah lungto oen n'de hau ai tite a rih u tih a mangkhakla tah sai u nawh.
Ahimi lawng celtuih thli te im khuila a kuun puei u tih khonsil thlaang thli hai ah te a pai sak u tih Khawsoeih Bawi lawng ahimi te awl a doet.

Ahimi lawngah, “Nangmi lawngah te kah thlaang miing oen ah cang puei nawh hamla kavan khaang khak u poen, tede na sai he bueh u lah! Nangmi lawng Jerusalem pum ah na cang puei u tih puung khonghak poen, ahih te kaimi lawng a duek sak tila sai hamla na ngaih u!” a tina u.
Piter oen atloe celtuih thli lawng awl a thung pe u tih, “Kaimi lawng Pathen awl ni ka ngaai u, thlaanghing awl ka ngaai u nawh.
Nangmi lawng ahih te thinglam dawng na tai u tih na ngawn u coengah mami patuer thli kah Pathen lawng Jesuh te duekna kalawng ah a thawh sak poen.
Israel thlaang thli te a thawlhna yut sak ham oen ahimi kah thawlhna te khawdawp ngaai pe ham ahih tah Pathen lawngah a bantang ben ah Mawtkung oen Thlawnkung la a pawmsang poen.
Kaimi tah he thaihu boeih he aka mingkung la ka awm u, Pathen lawngah amah awl aka ngaai thli kutdo la a peek Ciim Muithla te khaw mingkung sausi la awm” a tina u.
Awlcekna Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang boeih lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah a thin sa soeh u tih celtuih thli te duek sak ham a ngaih u.

Tede ahimi timkah Farasi thlaang pakhat, thlaang boeih lawng a hinyah tangkiik, Phungawl cangpueikung Gamaliel aka miingna te awlcekna Khonsil ah pai tih, celtuih thli te adaubenla khuen kawlkalh ham awl a peek tih,
tecoengah awlcekna Khonsil kah thlaang thli nala te, “Ka puei Israel thlaang thli, he kah thlaang thli sawah na sai u he atheenla ngaithuen uh.

N'hu vengah Tudas aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm tih amah oen amah te thlaangtang van ni tila a hoe soeh tih thlaang yalii yunyan lawngah a hu ah bang u. Tede ahih te a ngawn u coeng atah a hubang thli te yan khonghak tih ahih kah biibi te khaw a duek roep te na ming u.
Tecoengah thlaangmi soepna atue vengah te Galili thlaang Judas te khaw awm tih ahih lawng thlaangping a hu ah a bang sak van, tede ahih te a ngawn u tih a hubang thli khaw pal u boeih.

Tedawngah kavan thui u, he kah thaihu dawngah, he kah thlaang thli he metila khaw sai u mai boel. Amami awm la te awm u mai seh! Ahimi kah khawkhanna oen biibi he thlaanghing benkah sai la a awm atah pal badai;
tede Pathen benkah biibina atah na taa u thai tang manawh. Nangmi lawng Pathen te ee-lena la awm hau ai!” a tina. Awlcekna Khonsil thlaang thli lawngah Gamaliel kah poekna te a vai u.
Ahimi lawng celtuih thli te a khuila a khue koep u tih cungpoelh oen a tam u, Jesuh miing oen awl thui tlaih nawh ham awl a peek u tih tecoengah ahimi te a thlah u.
Celtuih hue tah awlcekna Khonsil kalawng a ceh u vengah awmngaih u tangkiik, metihtiah ahimi te Jesuh kawngah yarau ming ham tueng roe la Pathen lawng a poek dawngah ni.
Khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im khuiah khaw, im ah khaw, Messiah Jesuh kawng Awlthang Theen te ahimi lawng a thui u tih a cang puei yoeyah u.

Teveng tue kalawng a awm raih coeng atah a hubang thli thlaangmi khaw puung tare hang tih Krik awl la aka cal Judah thlaang oen Judah awl la aka cal Judah thlaang thli te awlpuungna awm.
