Krik awl aka cal Judah thlaang thli lawng khawhin roekk bawmna fann tangka rekrana ah ahimi tengkah huhai tumtee thli tah navan thloeng bet u ti tih caitoek u.
Tedawngah celtuih paha thlaihih lawng oengca thli te a pum boeih la a khue tun tih, “Kaimi lawng tangka kawng thuikhanna dawngah Pathen kah awl thui ham thlahphaam sut atah soeng nawh.
Tedawngah maya manau thli, Cuihna oen Ciim Muithla oen ah aka betoet namami timkah thlaang pasarih ah tuek uh, ahimi te he kah thaihu kawng khawkhankung la ka khueh u ai.
Kaimi ngoen tah thangthuina oen Pathen awl thui biibina dawngah atue boeih he ka hawna u ai.” a tina u.

Celtuih hue kah awl thui te ahimi boeih a kaw tla u, tedawngah ahimi lawng Ciim Muithla oen oengna oen ah aka betoet Stefen, Filip, Prokoras, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, Antiok khaaw kah Gental thlaang, acuek ah Judah phung aka vai Nikolas te a tuek u.
Celtuih hue tengla a tuek thlaang thli te a ceh puei u tih ahimi sawah kut a tloeng pe u tih a thangthui pe u.
Te tila te Pathen kah awl tah puung tare hang Jerusalem khawpui khuiah a hubang thli khaw puung van tih khawsoeih thli broe lawngkhaw oengna te a do u van.
Pathen lawng yotheenna oen aphueh asawm tih huham tharana oen aka betoet Stefen lawng thlaang rangpui tim ah aka lentloe miknoekna oen kawpoekraina te a sai.

Tede ahih te thlaang khatsut lawngah a oelh ataih u, ahimi te tah Sairin oen Alekzandria khaaw kah Judah thlaang thli lawngkhaw a tunna van Sal loeih thli kah sinakok bok-im ah aka thuum thlaang thli van ni. Stefen he ahimi oen khaw, Asia oen Silicia peng kah atloe Judah thlaang thli oen khaw awl oelhtaih u.
Tede Stefen lawngah Muithla kah peek cuihna oen awl a thui dawngah ahimi lawng taa u thai nawh.
Tedawngah thlaang khatsut te, “Mosi oen Pathen thangthena awl ahih lawng a thui te kaimi lawng ka yaak u!” tila aka thui ham kutsuh a peek u tih a thui sak u.
Te tila te ahimi lawng thlaang rangpui oen ahaamca thli oen ah Phungawl cangpueikung thli te thinkaw a phawh pe u. Ahimi lawng Stefen te a tuuk u tih awlcekna Khonsil haiah a khuen u.
Tecoengah ahih kawng te ahong ahii la aka thui ham thlaang khatsut te avan law puei u. Ahimi lawngah, “Ahih lawng he mami kah aciim Tempal bok-im oen Mosi kah Phungawl te athela a thui poepa.
Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh lawngah Tempal bok-im he a phe vetih Mosi kah peek phung boeih te a thaw pan ai tila a thui te kaimi lawng ka yaak u!” tila a thui u.
Awlcekna Khonsil ah aka ngawl thlaang boeih lawng Stefen te a bueh rangpatang u vengah ahih kah mik hai tah vanthlaang kah mik-hai angla a awm te a huh u.
Khawsoeih Bawi lawngah Stefen nala te, “Ahih lawng a thui he soeng aw?” tila a doet.

Stefen lawngah, “Maya manau oen a pa thli, ka awl thui he hutung u lah! Mami kah patuer Abraham he Haran ah awm hamla a ceh thlan ah Mesopotemia khaaw ah a awm vengah te ruep-awm Pathen te a tueng pe tih,
ahih nala te, ‘Na imkhuikaw oen na ram he ceh taak langtah kai lawngah kan nueh ham koei ram la te cet lah’ a tina.
Tedawngah ahih lawng amah ram te a ceh taak tih Haran khaaw ah awm hamla te cet. Abraham te ana pa a duek coeng atah tahe ah na awmna u ram la he Pathen lawng a pooeng sak.

Tevengah te Pathen lawng Abraham te amah hamla ram te avaang athal khaw pe nawh, pae khat mai khaw pe nawh, tede Pathen lawngtah te ram te ahih peek hamla amah oen a cadil nauha kah ram la awm ham awl a kam. Pathen lawng awl a kam vengah te Abraham tah ca-anau khueh nawh.
Ahih tengah Pathen lawng a thui tah: ‘Na cadil thli te ram tloe ah saltamnaa la awm u vetih kum yalii khuiah patang palai heemtekna te a ming u ai.
Tede sal la ahimi aka hawna thlaang thli te kai lawng awl ka cek ai; tecoeng atah ahimi lawng te kah ram kalawng law u vetih he kah ahuen ah kai he n'bok u ai.” tila a thui.

Tecoengah Pathen lawng Abraham te awlkam noekna hamla yahhuivuen reetna phung alam te a peek. Tedawngah Abraham lawng Isak te a cuun coeng yarh khat a awm atah yahhuivuen a reet pe; Isak lawngkhaw a capa Jakob te yahhuivuen a reet pe tih Jakob lawngkhaw mami phun miing thang patuer thli a capa paha thlaihih te yahhuivuen a reet pe.
Jakob ca thli lawng a manau Josep te a uett u tih Iyipt ram ah sal la a yoeih u. Tede Pathen lawng a awm puei tih,

patang raina boeih dawng kalawng ahih te a ding apuekla a loeih sak. Iyipt sengpahrang tengah Josep a pha vengah Pathen lawng mik-hai thlampaanna oen cuihna te a peek, tedawngah sengpahrang lawng Josep te ram ukkung oen sengpahrang im khui ukkung la a khueh.
Tecoengah Iyipt ram pum oen Kanaan ram ah khawthe khawkha tih khawdeng raina te awm. Mami kah patuer thli te caak awkk khueh u nawh,
Iyipt ram atah khawbuh ram sai tite Jakob lawng a yaak vengah mami kah patuer a ca thli te lamhacuek la tela te a tuih.
Apabe ah a ceh u veng atah Josep lawngah amah te a-u tite a maya hue tengah a thui pe, tecoeng atah Iyipt sengpahrang lawng Josep cakaw kawng te a ming.
Tedawngah Josep lawng ana pa Jakob tengah awl a tah tih a cakaw boeih thlaang sawm sarih pa-ngaa te Iyipt ram la law ham a thui pe.
Tecoengah Jakob tah Iyipt ram la cet tih amah oen a ca thli tah te ah te duek u.
Ahimi kah a rawkk thli te Shekhem la a khuen u tih Abraham lawng Hamor thlaangphun tengkah tangka oen a lai phuel ah te a up u.
Pathen lawng Abraham tengkah awlkamna te sai hamla atue ayoeii veng atah Iyipt ram ah te mami phun khaw puung khuengdeng poen.
Hukhueng atah Josep kawng aka ming nawh sengpahrang lawng Iyipt ram te a uk.
Ahih lawng mami kah patuer hue te a thai alatna tih ahimi te athe akhana u, a ca thli te amilh amoengna ham im adauben ah te amangkhakla ngah ngah a khueh sak u.
Te kah atue atang vengah a thlaang aka theen camaw Mosi te a cuun. Ahih te im ah thla thum bueng a poeh a pawm u tih,
amah im adauben ah a khueh u vengah sengpahrang canu lawng amah kah cacah la a lawh tih a cuun a cah.
Ahih lawng Iyipt thlaang thli kah cuihna boeih te a cang tih awlcal thingkaa ah khaw, thaihu saina ben ah khaw miing thaang thlaang la coengg hang.
Mosi he a kum sawmlii a law veng atah amah thlaang phun Israel thlaang thli te metihtlukla thekha hepna patang a khang u tite bueh hamla kamthlah.
Iyipt thlaang pakhat lawng thlaang pakhat a heem atek te a huh, cet tih a runn, Iyipt thlaang te a ngawn tih kut a thung.
(Ahimi te loeih sak hamla Pathen lawng ahih te a hawna ai tite a thlaangphun thli lawng a ming ai tila a poek, tede ahimi lawngah ming u nawh.)

Avuen khawhin atah Israel thlaang pahih a tawh asi hih te a huh tih ahih rawi te roeproei sak hamla a yawm. Ahih lawngah, “Hutung hih lah, nanghih he Israel thlaang ni; n'tu ah tila he na tawh na si hih?” a tina.
Tede atloe pakhat sawah khawboe aka the soeh thlaang te lawngah, Mosi te a tulh tih, “Kaimi he uk ham oen awl cek hamla a-u lawng nang he n'khueh?
Iyipt thlaang pakhat n'thlem ah na ngawn angla te kai hih he ngawn van ham na ngaih aw?” a tina.
Mosi lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Iyipt ram kalawng heeng vik, cet tih Midian ram ah te awm. Te ah te a ca pahih a cuun.
Kum sawmlii a awm coeng atah Sinai Tlaang tengkah ramhum huhang ah tangpuem aka ung hairawng haialh khui kalawng vanthlaang pakhat Mosi tengah a phumpho pe.
Mosi tah te kah a huh te a kawpoek rai tih atheen heet la huh rep ham tangpuem tengla te cet. Tede Bawipa awl te a yaak tih,
‘Kai tah na patuer hue kah Pathen, Abraham, Isak oen Jakob mi kah Pathen ni.’ a tina. Mosi lawng a rih uuet ah thuen tih bueh ha nawh.
Bawipa lawng, “Na khowmuek te dul lah, nang lawng na paina ahuen te huen ciim ni.

Iyipt ram ah ka thlaang thli lawng khawdeng patang a khang u te ka huh poen. Ahimi kah khaw khah laise awl te ka yaak tih ahimi te thlah hamla ka law poen. Tahe ah law lah; Iyipt ram la kan tuih ai.’ a tina.

“Mosi he Israel thlaang pahih lawng a ngaih nawh thlaang te ni. Ahih rawi lawng, “A-u lawng nang he kaimi kah ukkung oen awlcekkung la n'khueh?” a tina. Ahih tah tangpuem aka ung hairawng haialh dawngah aka thoeng vanthlaang bawmna rang oen ahimi te loeih sak ham oen uk hamla Pathen kah thlaangtuih ni.
Ahih lawngah a thlaangphun thli te Iyipt ram kalawng a mawt tih, Iyipt ram ah khaw, Tuitunlii Seen ah khaw, ramhum huhang ah khaw kum sawmlii khui puet ah miknoekna oen kawpoek raina te a sai.
‘Pathen lawngah namami khuikah thlaang tawngha pakhat te kai angla avan tuih ai’ tila Israel thlaang thli tengah aka thuikung te tah Mosi ni.

Ahih tah ramhum huhang ah Israel thlaang thli te aka tunsakkung, mami kah patuer hue oen khaw, Sinai Tlaang ah awl aka thui pe vanthlaang oen khaw awm haih tih Pathen kah hingna awl te mami tengah van phasakkung la awm.
“Tede mami kah patuer hue lawng ahih awl te ngaai u nawh; ahimi lawngah ahih te hoett sut tih Iyipt ram la mel koep ham te a ngaih u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng Aaron nala, “Kaimi he aka mawt hamla pathen thli te kaimi ham van sai loeih. Iyipt ram kalawng mami mawtkung Mosi he metila a awm ti khaw m'ming u tlaih nawh poen.” a tina u.
Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng vaitaw ataalca muei asam te a sai u tih amami kah kutsaimuei tengah thaw a thueng u tih luciik a nawn u, amami kah kutsaimuei te hinyah peekna poei khaw a sai u.

Tedawngah Pathen lawng ahimi te a mangthawng taak tih vaan kah aisi thli te a bok sak u. Tawngha thli kah cabu dawngah a thut tah: ‘Israel thlaang thli; ramhum huhang ah kum sawmlii khui puet boiava na ngawn u tih thaw na thueng u te kai ham nawh ni.

Nangmi lawng na khuen u te tah, Molek pathen bokna-thaang ni, namami kah aisi pathen Rephan kah muei asam, namami lawng bok hamla na sai u kutsaimuei ni. Tedawngah nangmi he Babilon ram voel la te kan hek poen ai.’ tila a thut.

“Mami kah patuer hue lawng ramhum huhang ah Pathen tah ahimi tengah awm tite mingna hamla Pathen a awmna Riim-im te a khueh u. Mosi tengah Pathen lawng a thui pe angla a sak u tih Mosi tengah a huh sak amaw-aka angla te a sak u.

Hukhueng atah mami kah patuer hue lawng ana pa hue tengkah riim-im te a paang u tih Pathen lawng a hek thlaang thli kah ram te Joshua mi oen a lawh pe u vengah riim-im te a khuen u tih te ah te Devid dung toe awm.
Ahih tah Pathen haiah mik-hai theen a dang tih Jakob Pathen a awmna im te sak hamla Pathen tengah a bih.
Tede ahih ham imsakung tah Solomon ni.
Tede Tloeng Khoelh Pathen tah thlaanghing lawng a sak im dawngah te awm nawh; tawngha lawng a thui angla,
Bawipa lawngah, ‘Vaan tah Ka ngawlhcoen la awm tih, dilai he tah ka khowtloeng la awm. Nangmi lawng kai ham ah me ang im nuem navan sak ai? Kai lawng ka awmna ham ahuen te mela nuem?
He kah thaihu boeih he kamah lawng ka sai thaihu nawh aw?’ tila a thui.

Tecoengah Stefen lawng, “Nangmi he na thin thah tangkiik mai mah aw! Na kaw talh sut u tih Pathen awl yaak hamla na haa khaw pang malhtalh u! Nangmi he na patuer hue angla ni na awm u: Nangmi lawngkhaw Ciim Muithla te na hek khaklal poepa u!

Na patuer hue lawngah aheem atek nawh tawngha khat khaw awm aw? Amah kah thlaangdoeng Tuih-yoeih thlaang a lawna kawng, yan veng kalawng aka thui Pathen kah laipai thli te ahimi lawng a ngawn u. Tahe ah khaw nangmi lawng paipi na thleep u tih ahih te na ngawn u poen.
Vanthlaang teng kalawng peek patoeng Pathen kah phungawl te aka dang tah nangmi ni, te kah phungawl te nangmi lawng na vai u nawh!” a tina.
Awlcekna Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang boeih lawng Stefen kah awl thui te a yaak u vengah a thin sa soeh u tih thinsa uuet ah a naw te cakcak a rueng u.
Tede Ciim Muithla oen aka betoet Stefen tah vaan a dan hang tih Pathen kah bantang ben ah aka pai Jesuh oen Pathen kah ruep-awmna te a huh.
Ahih lawngah, “Bueh lah! Vaan ke awng u tih Pathen kah bantang ben ah Thlaanghing Capa aka pai ke ka huh!” tila a thui.
Khonsil kah thlaang thli lawng angaihhlangla paang u tih a haa te khoep a buem u. Tecoengah ahimi boeih lawng pahoei a cuuk thil u tih,
ahih te khawpui adaubenla akhup athalla a mawt u tih lungto oen mat a de u. Sausi la aka awm thlaang thli lawngah amami kah himbaidung thli te cadawng pakhat Sawl aka miingna te a kuem sak u.
Ahimi lawng lungto oen a de u lii vengah te Stefen lawng Bawipa tengah, “Bawipa Jesuh, ka muithla he nang lawng lo mai loeih!” a tina.
Ahih lawngah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih, “Bawipa! He thli lawngah thawlhna a sai he van thung pe boel!” tila te angaihhlangla paang. He awl a thui coeng atah duek poen.

Ahih a ngawn u te Sawl lawngkhaw a kaw tlaak puei van. Te khawhin kalawng tah Jerusalem kah Khrihcabu ah heem-atek patang-khangna te tong u poen. Celtuih thli thui muehla oengca thli boeih tah Judia peng oen Samaria ram ah yan khonghak.
Bokna ben ah tlungmu thlaang khatsut lawngah Stefen rawkk te a kuem u, a kaw the u tih rap u.
Tede Sawl lawngtah khrihcabu te phe ham a yawm; im pakhat coeng pakhat ah cet tih oengca thli te hutaa khaw, tawngpa khaw akhup athalla a mawt tih ahimi te thongim ah a thlaak.
Aka yan khonghak oengca thli lawngah peng tawm ah cet u tih awlthang a thui u.
Filip tah Samaria ram kah khawpui la te cet tih te kah aka awm thlaang thli tengah Messiah kawng te a thui pe.
Filip kah awl thui dawngah thlaangping te a kaw thluembuek u, ahih lawng kawpoekrai a sai te a huh u tih atheenla awl te a hutung u.
Raaithe lawng a kuun thlaang thli kah a kaw khui kalawng raaithe thli te vupaang ruila co u tih, aka khawn thlaang thli oen khowkheem thlaang thli broela hoeih u.
Tedawngah khawpui khuikah thlaang thli tah awmngaih u.
Te khawpui khuiah Simon aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm tih amah kah caam thoemthaina oen Samaria thlaang thli te kawpoek a rai sak poepa. Ahih lawng amah te thlaang mailai nawh ni tila a thui tih,
te khawpui kah thlaangcawm thlaangcee, ahem asang boeih lawng ahih awl te a ngaai pe u tih ahimi lawng, “Ahih tah ‘Alen Duet Huham Tharana’ a ti u Pathen kah tharana ni” tila te a thui u.
Ahih lawngah amah kah caam thoemthaina oen asanhlangla ahimi te a thai alatna poen dawngah a thinkaw thluembuek u tih awl a ngaai pe u.
Tede Jesuh Khrih kawng oen Pathen Ram kawng awlthang theen Filip lawng awlthang a phawng te a tangna u tih hutaa tawngpa lawngkhaw baptisma te a dang u.
Simon lawngkhaw a tangna van tih baptisma a dang coeng atah Filip tengah te awm roep poen, ahih lawngah alentloe miknoekna oen kawpoekraina te a huh vengah a ngaai hang sut.
Jerusalem ah aka awm celtuih thli lawng Samaria khaaw kah thlaang thli lawngkhaw Pathen awl te a tangna u van poen tite a yaak u vengah Piter oen Johan te ahimi tengla a tuih u.
Ahih rawi lawng a pha atah ahimi lawngah Ciim Muithla te a dangna u hamla oengca thli ham te a thangthui pe hih.
Metihtiah Ciim Muithla te ahimi timkah a-u pakhat tengah khaw law thlan hun; ahimi lawngah Bawipa Jesuh miing bueng oen ah baptisma te a huh u hun dawngah ni.
Tecoengah Piter oen Johan lawng ahimi sawah a kut te a thueng hih tih Ciim Muithla te a dang u.
Celtuih rawi lawngah ahimi sawah kut a thueng tih oengca thli lawng Ciim Muithla a dang u tite Simon lawng a huh. Tedawngah ahih lawng Piter oen Johan te tangka a peek tih,
“A sawah ka kut ka thueng pe thlaang boeih lawng Ciim Muithla te a huhna u ham, huham tharana te kai m'pe van lah,” a tina.
Tede Piter lawng ahih nala te, “Pathen kah kutdo he tangka oen ka lai thai ai tila na poek dawngah namah oen na tangka te hell ah tla hih!
Pathen mik huh ah na thinkaw lungbui a doeng nawh dawngah kaihih kah biibina dawngah na thuumna ham koei avaang athal khaw awm nawh.
Tedawngah he ang na kamthlahna athe dawng kalawng yut langtah he ang thaihu na poek dawngah na sawah khawdawp avan ngaaina ham Bawipa tengah thangthui lah.
Metihtiah nang he uett-eena oen na betoet tih thawlh thongtla la na awm tite kan huh.” a tina.
Simon lawng Piter oen Johan nala te, “Nanghih lawng na thui te ka sawah pakhat khaw a thoengna nawh ham reenna oen Bawipa tengah thangthui hih lah” a tina.

Piter oen Johan lawng Bawipa kawng a mik huh thli te a thui hih tih Bawipa awl te a phawng hih coeng atah Jerusalem la koep meel hih. A meel lam ah Samaria peng kah vangca vangnau yahawh hlang ah te Awlthang Theen a phawng hih.
Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng Filip nala te, “Tho lang kamthlah lah, akaak ben Jerusalem kalawng Gaza la cehna lawngpui ah cet lah.” a tina. (He kah lawngpui he tahe ah hawna u tlaih nawh.)
Ciim Muithla lawng Filip nala, “Maranglengg tengah ayoeii-repla cet lah.” a tina.
Filip lawngah heeng phai tih ayoeii rep veng atah ahih lawngah tawngha Isaiah kah cabu a tae awl te a yaak. Ahih nala te, “Nang lawng na tae te na yaakming aw?” tila a doet.
Te kah bawi lawng, “A-u lawng-khaw a thuicaih nawh maiah metila ka yaakming thai ai?” a tina. Te atah ahih lawng Filip te maranglengg dawngah luui ham oen ngawlh haih hamla te a ceel.
Ahih lawngah caciim awl a tae te tah: “Ngawn hamla a khuen tuuca angla a mawt u tih, a mul te a vawkk pe vengah awl kaa aka law nawh tuucano angla awm, ahih tah awl kam at khaw thui nawh.
Ahih te yaraula a sai u tih, asoeng akam nawh la awl a cek u, dilai dawngah a hingna aboet poen dawngah ahih kah cadil nauha kawng te a-u khat lawngkhaw thui thai u manawh.” tila a thut te ni.
Te kah bawi lawng Filip nala te, “Tawngha lawngah a-u kawng a thui kai? Amah kawng aw a thui, tihnawhtah thlaangtloe kawng aw a thui kai, van thui lah?” a tina.
Tecoeng atah Filip lawngah te kah caciim awl kalawng ah a tong pe tih Jesuh kawng Awlthang Theen te ahih tengah a thui pe.
Ahih rawi tah poe cet thuk hih, tui a awmna te a pha hih veng atah te kah bawi lawng, “He ah tui awm he. Baptisma dang ham n'tu lawng kai he n'kang khak ai?” tila a thui.
(Filip lawngah, “Na thinkaw lungbui boeih oen na tangna atah baptisma na dang ai ta” a tina. Ahih lawngah, “Jesuh Khrih tah Pathen Capa ni tite ka tangna” a tina.)
Te kah bawi lawngah maranglengg te a pai sak, Filip oen te kah bawi te tui dawngla bok cet thuk hih tih Filip lawng ahih te baptisma a peek.
Ahih rawi te tui dawngkah a law hang hih vengah Bawipa kah Muithla lawng Filip te vik a ceh puei. Te kah bawi lawngah ahih te koep hu tlaih nawh, tede awmngaihna oen poe cet.
Filip lawng Asdod khaw ka pha tite a ming; ahih tah Sisaria la cet tih a pha thlantoe lawngpueng kah khaw roekk ah te Awlthang Theen a thui.
Teveng yun ah te Sawl lawngah Bawipa kah a huvai thli te heem-atek tih ngawn hamla a teeng mangkhak. Ahih lawng Khawsoeih Bawi tengla cet tih,

Bawipa kah lawngpui aka vai thlaang thli te a huh atah hutaa khaw, tawngpa khaw ahimi boeih te tuuk thaina ham, a tuuk thlaang thli te Jerusalem la avan khuen koep thaina hamla Damaskas khawpui kah sinakok bok-im kah ahaamca thli tengah a yaak sakna ca te a bih.
Sawl tah cet tih Damaskas khawpui te a pha tawm atah, vaan kah aangna pakhat lawng mikpatap ah a thue ploeng tih a teng-avai te aang rawngtheng.
Ahih te dilai ah tlim tih, “Sawl, Sawl! N'tu ah kai he nan heem nan tek aih?” tila awl kam at te a yaak.
Ahih lawngah, “Bawipa, nang te a-u?” tila a doet. Te kah awl lawngah, “Kai tah nang lawng nan heem nan tek Jesuh ni.
Tede tho langtah khawpui khuila te cet lah, te ah te na sai ham koei te avan thui ai.” a tina.
Sawl oen aka cet haih thlaang thli te pai ngangtang u, awl kam at khaw cal u nawh; ahimi lawng awl tah a yaak u de a-u khat khaw hu u nawh.
Sawl tah dilai dawng kalawng tho hang tih a mik te a daai, tede thaihu khat khaw hu nawh. Tedawngah ahimi lawng a kut ah a phoeih u tih Damaskas khawpui khuila a mawt u.
Khawhin hin thum khuiah ahih te a mik tueng nawh, teveng khuiah te caak awkk khaw ca nawh tih tui khaw aw nawh.

Damaskas khawpui ah Ananias aka miingna Khrihca pakhat awm. Ahih lawngah huhthlaam a huh tih te kah huhthlaam dawngah Bawipa lawng ahih te, “Ananias!” tila a khue. Ahih lawngah, “Bawipa he ah ka awm,” a tina.
Bawipa lawng ahih nala te, “Tho langtah Lawng Doeng ah aka awm Judas im la te cet lah, te ah te Tarsas khaw kah Sawl aka miingna thlaang pakhat te tlap lah. Ahih tah thangthui lii hun tih,
ahih lawng a mik a tueng koep na ham Ananias aka miingna thlaang pakhat law tih a sawah kut a tloeng pe te huhthlaam a huh poen.” a tina.
Ananias lawng, “Bawipa, thlaang yahawh lawngah he kah thlaang kawng khaw, Jerusalem kah na thlaang thli tengah rih-awm thaihu a sai boeih kawng te khaw avan thui u.
Tecoengah nang aka bok thlaang boeih tuuk hamla khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengkah aana oen ni a law.” a tina.
Bawipa lawng ahih nala te, “Cet mai hawn, metihtiah kamah kah bii aka bi hamla, Gental thlaang thli, sengpahrang thli oen Israel thlaang thli tengah ka miing aka tueng sak ham ahih te ka tuek poen.
Tecoengah kamah roeroe lawngah kamah kawngah patang a khang ham koei boeih te ka huh sak ai.” a tina.

Tedawngah Ananias lawng cet tih Sawl a awmna im khuila te kuun tih a sawah kut a tloeng pe. Ahih lawng, “Ka manau Sawl, he la na law vengah lawngpueng ah te namah tengah aka phumpho Bawipa Jesuh amah lawng kai he n'tuih. Na mik te a tueng koep na ham Ciim Muithla oen na betoet na hamla ni kai he n'tuih.” a tina.
Kawlkalhca maiah Sawl kah a mik dawng kalawng thaihu pakhat ngakher angla tla tih a mik te tueng koep. Ahih lawng tho tih baptisma te a dang;
tecoengah caak awkk te a caak coeng atah a tha awm koep. Sawl tah Damaskas khaaw ah te oengca thli oen khawhin yawlca awm kawlkalh.
Ahih lawng sinakok bok-im boeih ah te cet tih Jesuh tah Pathen Capa ni tite a thui.

Ahih kah awl thui te aka ya thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tih, “Ahih he Jerusalem ah Jesuh aka bok thlaang boeih aka ngawn te nawh aw he? Ahimi te tuuk hamla kamthlah tih khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengah khuen hamla ni he la a law de ca?” tila te doet u.
Tede Pawl kah awl thui tah huham tharana awm tare tih Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila a thui rapcaat tih Damaskas ah aka awm Judah thlaang thli lawng a awl te thung pe u thai nawh.
Khawhin yahawh thlaang a awm hang coeng atah Judah thlaang thli te tun huh u tih, Sawl te ngawn hamla khaw a khan u,
tede ahimi kah khawkhan te Sawl tengah a thui pe u. Ahimi lawng Sawl te ngawn a ngaih u dawngah khawpui kah vawng thawhka te khawyiin khawdaai a toet u.
Tede yiin at atah Sawl te a hubang hue lawng a khuen u tih pahaang dawng a sang u, vawngkulh bangbuerh kalawng duem a thlaak u.
Sawl tah Jerusalem la cet tih hubang thli tengah pawlneeng hamla a yawm. Tede ahih te hubang pakhat van ni tite tangna u nawh tih ahimi lawng a rih u.

Te atah Barnabas te ahih bawm ham law tih celtuih hue tengla a ceh puei. Ahih lawngah Sawl lawng lawngpueng ah Bawipa te a huh tih awl a thui pe kawng te ahimi tengah a thui pe. Sawl lawngah Jesuh miing oen raltheenla awl a thui te khaw ahimi tengah te a thui pe.
Tecoeng atah Sawl te ahimi oen awm haih u tih Jerusalem te a hiil adawng, Bawipa miing oen raltheenla awl a thui.
Krik awl la aka cal Judah thlaangphun hue oen khaw awl a thui u tih oelhtaih u, tede ahimi lawngkhaw ahih te ngawn ham a yawm u.
Oengca thli lawng te kawng te a ming u vengah Sawl te Sisaria la a ceh puei u tih Tarsas khaaw la te a tuih u.
Judia Tecoeng atah ram, Galili ram oen Samaria ram kah khrihcabu tah ngaimawngla awm u. Bawipa te hinyahna oen khaw a sak u tih Ciim Muithla kah bawmna rang oen a tha ra u tih puung tare u.
Piter tah khaw tawm ah yin la cet tih voei khat atah Lidda ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli te hip hamla te cet.
Te ah te kum reet khuiah khawn roep tih ihkhun dawng kalawng aka tho thai nawh Anias aka miingna thlaang pakhat te awm.
Piter lawng ahih nala te, “Anias, Jesuh Khrih lawng na sa avan ding sak poen. Tho langtah na ihphah te yaawl.” a tina tih Anias te pahoei tho.
Lidda oen Sharon ah aka awm thlaang lawng a hih te a huh u tih Pathen ben ah kaw a thaw u.

Joppa khaaw ah Tabita aka miingna oengca pakhat awm. (Ahih te Krik awl la Dorkas a miingna tih thuingaihna tah, “Sayuk” ti ngaihna ni.) Ahih lawng thaihu theen saina oen khawdeng bawmna ah atue atang boeih te a hawna.
Tevengah te ahih tah tlo tih duek. A rawkk te tui a thluk u tih asaw dawtt im han ah te a helh u.

Joppa khaaw he Lidda khaaw kalawng thla aih nawh tih Lidda ah Piter awm tite Joppa khaaw kah oengca thli lawng a yaak u vengah thlaang pahih a tuih u tih, “Reenna oen kaimi tengah aloela law de lah.” tila awl a uen u.

Tedawngah Piter te kamthlah pahoei tih ahih rawi oen cet u. A pha veng atah asaw dawtt im han la te a luui puei u. Huhai thli lawng Piter te a veel khoep u tih rap u, Dorkas lawng a hing vengah a sai pe angki oen hinaak himbai thli te a huh sak u.

Piter lawng ahimi boeih te im han kalawng ram la a ceh sak coengah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih thangthui; tecoengah rawkk benla maang tih, “Tabita, tho lah!” a tina. A mik a daai tih Piter te a huh vengah tho tih ngawl.
Piter lawng a phoeih tih ahih te a thawh hang. Tecoengah Oengca boeih oen huhai thli te a khue tih ahimi tengah te a hing la a tloeng pe.
Te kawng awlthang te Joppa khaaw ah thaang khok tih thlaang broe lawng Bawipa te a tangna u.
Piter tah Joppa khaaw kah Simon aka miingna saphaw oen haw-apai thaihu aka sai thlaang oen ah khawhin yahawh hlang haih awm.
Sisaria khaaw ah Kornilias aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm. Ahih tah, “Itali Raalkapbu” a ti u Rom raalkapbu pakhat kah raalbawi ni.

Ahih tah bokna ben ah a tlungmu thlaang pakhat la awm tih amah oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng Pathen a bok u. Ahih lawngkhaw Judah thlaang khawdeng thli te a bawm acem poepa tih Pathen tengah thangthui yoeyah.
Hin at atah khawvaang ben khawnoek pathum yunyan ah ahih lawng huhthlaam a huh tih te kah huhthlaam dawngah Pathen vanthlaang pakhat law tih “Kornilias!” tila khuekung te aciimphanla a huh.

Ahih lawng vanthlaang te rih doe ah a dan heet tih “N'tu nuem, Bawipa?” a tina. Vanthlaang lawngah, “Nang kah thangthuina oen reenna oen ah bawmcemna na sai lawngah te Pathen kah thinkaw a puem poen tih na thangthuina te thung hamla awm oepsoeh poen.
Piter aka miingna thlaang pakhat tengah te tahe ah Joppa khaaw la thlaang tuih lah.
Ahih tah tuitunlii tengah aka awm saphaw thaihu aka sai Simon im ah pah.” a tina.
Tecoeng atah vanthlaang te cet. Kornilias lawng amah im kah tuihyoeihthlaang pahih oen bokna ben ah tlungmu tih amah te pumpakla doenkung raalkap pakhat te a khue.
Ahimi tengah amah lawng a huh boeih te a thui pe tih Joppa khaaw la ahimi te a tuih.
Ahimi te cet u tih avuen khawhin Joppa a pha tawm vengah te, Piter tah thangthui hamla hingthun ah imphu la luui hang.
Ahih te a bung pawng tih pakhat khat caak hamla a ngaih; caak awkk te aroek abah pe u vengah ahih lawng huhthlaam pakhat a huh.
Te kah huhthlaam dawngah te, vaan awng u tih thaihu pakhat aka law thuk, a kil palii a thlingthlui tih himbai bohlang oen aka lo u, dilai la avan thlaak thuk te a huh.
Te kah a khuiah te ramsa phun soeprep boeih, aka colh aka vaan thai ramsa boeih oen va phun soeprep boeih te awm.
Awl pakhat lawngah, “Piter, tho lah; ngawn langtah ca lah!” a tina awl te a yaak.
Tede Piter lawng, “Ka ca nawh mue, Bawipa! phung alam ben ah aka acaih nawh tih aka ciim nawh thaihu te khatca khaw ka ca nooek nawh.” a tina.
Te kah awl lawng koep a thui pe tah, “Pathen lawng Ciim a ti coengthloeih te pakhatca khaw aciim nawh la poek boel.” a tina.
He tila voei thum toe awm tih tecoeng atah te kah thaihu te vaan la koep a doek hang poen.
Piter lawng he kah huhthlaam thuingaihna a kawng te a poek lii vengah, Kornilias kah thlaangtuih hue lawng Simon im te a pha u tih vawng thawhka haiah ahimi te pai u.
Ahimi lawngah, “Simon Piter aka miingna kamyin te awm aw?” tila a khue tih a doet u.
Piter lawng huhthlaam thuingaihna te yaakming ham a poek lii veng-ah Muithla lawngah, “Hutung lah! Thlaang pathum lawng nang he n'tlap u.
Tedawngah tho langtah rum thuk, ahimi oen haih cet, uelh boel, ahimi te kai lawng ni kavan tuih.” a tina.
Tedawngah Piter tah ahimi tengla cet thuk tih, “Nangmi lawng na tlap u te kai poen ni. N'tu navan lawh u?” a tina.

Ahimi lawng, “Raalbawi Kornilias lawng n'tuih u. Ahih tah Pathen aka bok thlaang theen pakhat la awm tih Judah thlaang boeih lawngah a hinyah tangkiik u. Nang lawng na thui thli te ahih lawng a yaakna hamla Pathen kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng nang te amah im ah ceh puei ham a thui pe.” a tina u.
Piter lawng ahimi te im khuila a khue tih yiin at tah ip u de a tina tih te ah te pah u. Avuen atah kamthlah tih ahimi oen cet haih; Joppa khaaw kah oengca thli khatsut tah ahih oen cet haih van.
Avuen khawhin ah Piter tah Sisaria khaaw te a pha, te ah te Kornilias lawng amah cakaw thli oen paya laikoei a ceel thlaang thli oen ahih te a ring u.
Piter te a law phai vengah Kornilias lawng a do tih a khowkung ah a buekuep pe.
Tede Piter lawng a thawh tih, “Pai hang lah, kai khaw thlaang mailai van ni” a tina.
Piter oen Kornilias tah awl noenoe a thui hih tih im khuila a kuun phai hih vengah thlaang broela a tun kueng te a huh.

Tevengah ahimi nala te, “Judah thlaang pakhat he Gental thlaang phun oen yingyawi paithle tih pawlneeng haih hamla a bokna phung lawng ngaih nawh tite atheencala namami lawngkhaw na ming u. Tede a-u khat khaw phung alam ben ah caih nawh tih ciim nawh tila poek nawh ham Pathen lawng n'huh sak poen.
Tedawngah nang lawng nan khue sak vengah oelhtaih tlaih ohla ka law poen. Tetih atah van thui u lah, n'tu hamla nan khue u?” a tina.

Kornilias lawng, “N'thlem vai vuen, he veng tue yunyan ah, khawvaang khawnoek pathum ah te kamah im khuiah ka thangthui. Kawlkalhca maiah himbai a bawk likthik aka bai thlaang pakhat ka haiah va pai tih,
ahih lawng: ‘Kornilias! Pathen lawng na thangthuina te a yaak tih reenna oen bawmcemna na sai te a ming poen.
Joppa khaaw la thlaang tuih langtah Simon Piter aka miingna thlaang te khue sak. Ahih tah tuitunlii tengah aka awm saphaw aka sai Simon im ah te pah” tila te a thui.
Tedawngah nang te pahoei kan khue sak, na law tih theen poen. Tahe ah Bawipa lawng nang n'thui sak awl te hutung hamla he ah he kaimi boeih Pathen haiah ka awm u.” a tina.
Tevengah Piter lawng awl a thui tih, “Pathen lawngah thlaang boeih he avan at la a khueh ti he tah soeng tangtang tila tahe atah ka ming poen.
A-u khaw amah te a bok tih doengna te aka sai boeih tah me ang thlaangphun khaw a hih lawng a do.
Thlaang boeih kah Bawipa la aka awm Jesuh Khrih rang oen ngaimawngna Awlthang Theen a thui tih Israel thlaang thli tengah Pathen lawng a peek te na ming u.
Johan lawng baptisma a peekna kawng awl te a thui coengah Galili kalawng a tong tih Israel ram pum ah thaihu alentloe aka thoeng te a ming u.

Nangmi lawng Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh kawng oen ah ahih sawah Ciim Muithla oen tharana te metila Pathen lawng a lun pe tite a ming u. Ahih tah Pathen lawng a awm puei dawngah peng tawm ah te cet, theenna te a sai tih Raaithe bawi kah huham tharana kut khuiah aka awm boeih te a hoeih sak.
Israel ram pum oen Jerusalem khaaw ah ahih lawng a sai boeih te aka mingkung sausi la kaimi he ka awm u. Tecoengah ahih te thinglam dawng a tai u tih a ngawn u.
Tede hin thum coengah ahih te Pathen lawng a thawh sak koep tih a phumpho sak,

thlaang boeih tengah phumpho sak nawh tih Pathen lawng a tuek oepsoeh mingpueikung sausi la aka awm, duekna kalawng a thawh coengah amah oen caak awkk te aka ca, aka aw haih kaimi teng bueng ah ni a phumpho sak.
Thlaang boeih tengah awlthang theen thui hamla, thlaangduek oen thlaanghing awlcekkung la Pathen lawng ahih te a khueh te aka mingkung sausi la kaimi he awl m'peek u.
A-u khaw ahih te aka tangna boeih tah a miing huham tharana oen ah a thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai pe ai tila tawngha boeih lawng ahih kawng te a thui u.” a tina.
Piter lawng awl a thui lii vengah te ahih kah awl thui aka hutung thlaang boeih sawah Ciim Muithla te va rum thuk.
Gental thlaangphun thli sawah khaw, amah kutdo Ciim Muithla te Pathen lawng a lun pe dawngah Joppa khaw kah Piter oen aka law haih Judah thlaangphun oengca thli tah a kawpoek rai u.
Metihtiah ahimi lawngah ming nawh awl la cal u tih Pathen kah bawilenna a thangpawm te a yaak u dawngah ni. Piter lawngah:
“Mami angla he kah thlaang thli lawngkhaw Ciim Muithla a dang u van. Te tih atah he thli he tui oen baptisma peek ham a-u lawng a khaang khak ai?” tila a thui.
Tedawngah ahimi te Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah baptisma dang hamla awl a peek. Tecoengah Piter te ahimi tengah khawhin ayawl khaw cam hamla a ceel u.
Judia ram pum kah atloe oengca thli boeih oen celtuih boeih lawng Gental thlaang thli lawngkhaw Piter te a do u van tite a yaak u.
Piter te Jerusalem la a ceh vengah Gental thlaang thli te yahhuivuen reet sak ham aka ngaih thlaang thli lawngah a cawtt-abauh u tih,
“Yahhuivuen aka reet nawh Gental thlaang im ah na pah tih caak awkk khaw na caak haih roe mai!” a tina u.
Tedawngah Piter lawng acuekca veng kalawng thaihu aka thoeng hang te asoepbirla biit a thui pe:

“Joppa khawpui ah ka thangthui lii vengah huhthlaam pakhat ka huh. Vaan kalawng thaihu pakhat aka law, a kil palii a thlingthlui himbai bo hlang oen aka lo u dilai la avan thlaak thuk te ka huh tih ka teng avan pha dengah a toeng.
Akhuiben te ka bueh heet vengah imvuelh boiava oen ramsa phun soeprep aka colh aka vaan thai ramsa boeih oen va phun soeprep boeih te ka huh.
Tecoengah awl pakhat ka tengah avan thui te ka yaak tih, ‘Piter, tho lah; ngawn langtah ca lah!’ tila avan thui.
Tede, kai lawngah, ‘Bawipa, ka ca nawh mue! Phung alam ben ah caih nawh tih aka ciim nawh caak awkk te ka kaa khuiah kuun nooek nawh” ka tina.
Vaan kalawng awl avan thui koep tih, ‘Pathen lawng ciim a ti coengthloeih te nang lawngah khatca khaw aciim nawh la poek boel,’ tila avan thui.
He tila voei thum toe awm tih tecoeng atah te kah thaihu boeih te vaan la koep a doek hang poen.
Teveng tue ca roe ah Sisaria khaaw kalawng avan tuih thlaang pathum te ka awmna im la te avan pha u.

Uelh re tlaih ohla ahimi oen ceh haih pahoei ham Muithla lawng avan thui. He kah ka puei oengca paruk hue khaw Joppa kalawng Sisaria la kai oen haih ka law u tih kaimi boeih he Kornilias im la ka cet u.
Ahih lawngah, amah im ah vanthlaang pakhat pai tih, ‘Joppa khaaw la thlaang tuih lang atah Simon Piter aka miingna thlaang te khue sak.
Ahih lawngtah nangmi tengah awl avan thui vetih te awl rang oen ah namah oen na imkhuikaw lawng thlawnna na dang u ai.’ tila a thui pe te kaimi tengah avan thui.
Tecoengah, awl ka thui pe vengah te acuek vengah mami sawah a awm van angla ahimi sawah khaw Ciim Muithla te va rum.
Tevengah Bawipa lawng, ‘Johan lawngtah tui oen ah baptisma te m'peek u, tede nangmi tah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma m'peek ai.’ tila a thui te lot ka poek.

Mami lawng Bawipa Jesuh te n'tangna vengah mami m'peek kutdo te ang van te Gental thlaang thli khaw Pathen lawng a peek van ti he tah ciim mai poen; tedawngah kai he a-u la ka awm aih tih Pathen te ka oel khak lal thai ai!’ tila a thui pe.

He awl he ahimi lawng a yaak u vengah cawttbauh awl te a toeng u, Pathen te a thangpawm u tih, “Pathen lawng, Gental thlaangphun thli khaw thawlh yut u tih hing van hamla atue theen a peek van poen!” ti u.

Stefen a ngawn u coeng kah heemtekna aka thoeng hang dawngah te oengca thli khatsut tah yan khonghak tih khatsut tah Fonicia, Saipras oen Antiok toela a pha u tih Judah thlaangphun thli bueng tengah awlthang te a thui u.
Tede Saipras oen Sairi khaw kah thlaang, atloe oengca thli te Antiok la cet u tih Gental thlaangphun thli tengah khaw, awlthang te a phawng pe u tih Bawipa Jesuh kawng Awlthang Theen te a thui pe u.
Bawipa kah huham tharana tah ahimi tengah awm tih thlaang toek lek nawh lawng a tangna u tih Bawipa benla a kaw a thaw u.
He kawng awlthang he Jerusalem kah khrihcabu teng a pha, tedawngah Barnabas te Antiok la a tuih u.

Ahih lawng a pha vengah Pathen lawng thlaang thli te metihtlukla yotheen a peek tite a huh vengah awmngaih tangkiik tih thinkaw lungbui tak oen Bawipa tengah thincak la a awmna u ham, uep-awm la a awmna u hamla ahimi te a thaphawh.
Barnabas tah thlaangdoeng pakhat la awm, Ciim Muithla oen oengna oen ah betoet tih thlaang yahawh hlang te Bawipa tengla avan law puei.
Tecoengah Barnabas tah Sawl te tlap hamla cet.

Ahih te a huh tih Antiok la avan law puei tih ahih rawi lawng kum at puet khrihcabu kah thlaang thli oen huh u tih thlaang boehoeng mai te a cang puei. Oengca thli he lamhacuek la Antiok ah Khrihca tila a thui cuek u.
Teveng yunyan ah tawngha khatsut te Jerusalem kalawng Antiok la cet u.

Akabas aka miingna ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat te pai tih dilai pum ah he khawthe khawkha awm ai tila Muithla kah huham tharana oen oepsoehla a thui. (Klaudias te sengpahrang sangluel la a awm vengah khawthe khawkhana te awm.)
A hubang thli lawngah amami kah sai thai khoek ah Judia ram ah aka awm oengca thli te bawmcemna peek hamla awl a thui u.
Ahimi lawng te tila a sai u coeng atah tangka te khrihcabu ahaamca thli tengah peek ham Sawl oen Barnabas kut ah a pat pe u.
He veng yunyan ah Herod seng-pahrang lawng khrihcabu khui-kah thlaang khatsut te heemtek hamla a tong poen.
Ahih lawngah Johan kah a manau Jeem samsen oen a ngawn sak.
He tila a ngawn dawngah Judah thlaang thli a ngaai khuek a ti u te a huh vengah Piter te khaw a tuuk sak u. (Te veng te tah Tawlru thuum mueh Takawi Poei ni).
Piter te a tuuk u coeng atah thongim ah a thlaak tih bu khat ah raalkap palii aka awm raalkap bu lii te a toet sak u. Herod lawngtah Kaantaak Poei a boeih coengah rangpui haiah awl cek ham kamthlah.
Tedawngah ni Piter te thong ah a thlaak, tede khrihcabu khuikah thlaang thli lawng ahih hamla te Pathen tengah thinkaw thluembuek tang oen thangthui u.
Herod lawng ahih te thlaangping haiah awl cek ham a pha tawm yiin ah Piter te raalkap pahih laklaw ah te ip. Ahih te thiirui pahih oen a khih tih thong thawhka ah khaw raaltoeng thli pai u.

Bawipa kah vanthlaang te bawtbet khawlai ah te ah te pai parak tih thongim te a thue pheng. Vanthlaang lawng Piter te a lengpang ah a hinghuek tih a thawh, “Aloela tho!” a tina. Tevengah Piter kut dawngkah thiirui te pahoei tla.

Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng, “Na cihin te na langtah na khawmuek te muek lah” a tina. A thui pe angla Piter lawng a sai coeng atah vanthlaang lawng, “Na himbai te bai langtah ka hu ah law lah.” a tina.
Piter lawng thongim adauben toela a vai. Tede vanthlaang lawng a sai te ataktang ni tila ming nawh; ahih lawng huhthlaam ni ka huh tila a poek.

Ahih rawi lawng lamhacuek raaltoeng a paina oen a pabena te a pooeng hih coeng atah khawpui khuila cehna thii thawhka te a pha hih. Thawhka te amah poek ah te rawi hamla awng u tih te kalawng ah te cet hih. Lawngpui ah poe a ceh hih vengah te bawtbet maiah Piter te vanthlaang lawng a ceh taak.

Tevengah Piter lawng a tengah aka thoeng boeih te a ming vengah cuih pan tih, “He tah ataktang ni tila ka ming poen! Bawipa lawng kai he Herod kah tharana oen Judah thlaang thli lawng ka sawah a sai thaihu boeih dawng kalawng loeih sak ham vanthlaang avan tuih.” tila a thui.
Amah kah awm ih boeih te a kaw a puk heet coeng atah Johan Mark kah a manu Meri im la te cet, te ah te thlaang broela tun u tih thangthui u.
Piter lawng adauben kalawng ah thawh te a khooek tih Roda aka miingna tuihyoeihthlaang hutaaca lawngah thawhka te awng hamla cet.
Ahih lawngah Piter awl te a noek tih awmngaih uett ah thawh te awng ohla im khuila cet koep tih thlaang thli tengah te ‘thawhka adauben ah Piter awm’ a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Na ngau aw!” a tina u. Tede ahih lawng atak tang ni tila a thui mang khak. Tedawngah ahimi lawng, “Ahih kah vanthlaang macawi.” a tina u.
Teveng ah Piter lawng thawhka te a khooek khiing. Ahukhueng ah ahimi lawng thawh a awng u tih Piter te a huh u veng atah a ngaai hang sut u.

Piter lawng ahimi te awm duem hamla a kut oen noekna a peek tih thongim khui kalawng ah metila Bawipa lawng a loeih sak tite ahimi tengah a thui pe. Ahih lawngah, “He he Jeem oen atloe oengca thli tengah thui pe uh.” a tina tih ahimi te a ceh taak coeng atah atloela poe cet.
Khaw athaih atah Piter he me tih ni a ti oh kai ti u tih raaltoeng thli tah ngaihangtalh la awm u.

Herod lawng Piter te tlap hamla awl a peek tih a tlap u de dang u nawh. Tedawngah raaltoeng thli te doet adap coengah ngawn hamla awl a peek. He coeng atah Herod he Judia ram kalawng cet tih Sisaria khaaw ah te kawlkalh awm.

Herod tah Turi oen Sidon khaaw kah thlaang thli sawah a thin sa tangkiik, tedawngah ahimi lawng tun huh u tih ahih oen huh u hamla te cet u. Lamhacuek ah ahimi lawng sengpahrang impui ukkung Blastas te ahimi pai puei ham a ceel u. Tecoengah ahimi tah Herod tengla cet u tih roeproei u hamla a bih u, metihtiah ahimi ram kah caak awkk dangna tah Herod sengpahrang kah ram uk khuiah a awm dawngah ni.
Awl tuentahna khawhin te a pha atah Herod lawng amah kah sengpahrang phawlip oen thoekcau u, a bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah te ngawl tih thlaangping tengah awl a thui pe.
Ahimi lawngah, “Awl aka thui he thlaang nawh ni, Pathen ni!” tila te paang u.
Herod lawng Pathen te a hinyah nawh dawngah Bawipa kah vanthlaang lawng ahih te a bawhtaal pahoei, yunghuut lawng a keuh tih duek.
Teveng ruetrat ah te Pathen awl tah puung tare tih roeng hang.
Barnabas oen Sawl tah amami kah biibi te a coeng hih tih Jerusalem la koep meel hih, Johan Mark te khaw a ceh puei hih.

Antiok khaaw kah khrihcabu khuiah tawngha thli oen cangpueikung thli khatsut tah thoem awm u: Te thli te tah, Barnabas, Simeon (Thlaangmuuem a ti u te), Lucias (Sairin khaw kah), Manaen (ukkungbawi Herod kah thawnpuei) oen ah Sawl, he hue ni.
Ahimi lawngah Pathen a bok u tih buh a yeh u vengah te Ciim Muithla lawngah ahimi nala te, “Kai lawng bii ka hoel ka paai te aka bi hamla ka khue Barnabas oen Sawl te kai ham van thloeng uh” a tina.
Ahimi lawng buh a yeh u tih thangthui u, ahih rawi sawah kut a tloeng pe u tih tecoeng atah ahih rawi te a tuih u.
Barnabas oen Sawl tah Ciim Muithla lawng a tuih van angla Silukia khaaw la cet hih tih te kalawng ah Saipras tuisanglak la te tuisangphaw oen cet hih.
Ahih rawi lawng Salamis khaaw a pha hih veng atah Pathen awl te sinakok bok-im ah a phawng hih. Ahih rawi lawng bii aka bawmkung la Johan Mark te a ceh puei.

Ahimi tah te kah tuisanglak kalawng cet poe u tih Paphos khaaw te a pha u, te ah te caam aka thoem Bar-Jesuh aka miingna thlaang te a huh u, ahih tah amah oen amah te tawngha ni tila aka thui soeh Judah thlaang pakhat van ni.
Ahih tah tuisanglak ukkung, Serkias Pawlas thlaangcuih kah paya la awm. Ukkungbawi lawng Pathen awl te yaak ham a ngaih dawngah Barnabas oen Sawl te amah tengla a khue.
Tede ahimi te caam aka thoem Elimas (he tah Krik miing ni) lawng a oelh ataih tih ukkung bawi lawngah oengna khueh boel seh tila a yawm mangkhak.
Tevengah Pawl a ti u Ciim Muithla oen aka betoet Sawl lawngah; caam aka thoem thlaang te a bueh rangpatang tih,
“Nang, Raaibawi capa! Nang tah doengna boeih boeih kah thunkha la na awm. Nang he thailatna soeprep oen na betoet tih Bawipa kah awltak he hoem awl la thawvel ham na yawm poepa!

Bawipa kut te na sawah tahe avan pha ai; na mik te pum khoep vetih kawlkalh khui atah khawthaih khawse te na hu manawh,” a tina. Kawlkalh maiah Elimas kah a mik te muui muuemtuut lawng a dah pe khoep tih amah te a kut ah aka mawt hamla thlaang te a pathoep poen.
Ukkung bawi lawng he tila thaihu aka thoeng te a huh vengah a tangna tih Bawipa kawng a cang puei te a kawpoek la rai tangkiik.
Pawl oen a paya thli tah Paphos kalawng tuisangphaw oen cet u tih Pamfilia ram kah Perka khawpui te a pha u, te ah te Johan Mark te a ceh taak u tih Jerusalem la amami tah koep meel u.
Ahih tah Perka kalawng poe cet tih Pisidia ram khui Antiok khaaw te a pha u. Sabbath khawhin atah sinakok bok-im la cet u tih ngawl u.

Mosi Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cathut te a tae coeng atah sinakok bok-im ukkung thli lawngah ahimi nala te: “Maya manau thli, thlaang yahawh ham thaphawhna awl thui ham a awm atah na thui u ham ka ngaih u de” a tina u.
Pawl lawng pai tih a kut oen noekna a peek tih awl a thui: “Ka puei - Israel thlaang thli oen Pathen aka bok Gental thlaang thli: hutung u lah!

Israel thlaangphun kah Pathen lawngah mami kah patuer thli te a tuek tih Iyipt ram ah ram tloe thlaang angla a awm u vengah thlaangphun bo la te a sai. Pathen lawng amah kah alentloe huham tharana oen ahimi te Iyipt ram kalawng avan law puei tih,
ahimi lawngah khawkum Sawmlii khui puet ramhum huhang ah patang a kha ang u.
Ahih lawngah Kanaan ram kah thlaangphun phun sarih te a taa tih te ram kah hunkung huenmah la a thlaang thli te a sai.
He tila a awm khui boeih te kum yalii sawm ngaa yunyan awm. “He coengah tawngha Samu-el dung toe ah ahimi te awlcekkung thli te a peek.
Tecoengah ahimi lawng sengpahrang a bih u tih kum sawmlii khuiah ahimi kah sengpahrang la awm hamla Pathen lawngah Benjamin phun, Kish capa Sawl te a peek.

Pathen lawng ahih te a khoe pe coeng atah Devid te ahimi kah sengpahrang la a khueh pe. Pathen lawng ahih kawng a thui te tah: ‘Jesi capa Devid tah ka kaw aka tawng thlaang, kai lawng sai sak ham ka ngaih boeih te aka sai ham thlaang te ka huh poen” tila a thui.
Pathen lawngah amah awlkam angla Devid cadil Jesuh te Israel thlaang thli kah Thlawnkung la a sai poen.
Jesuh lawng amah kah bii te a tong thlan ah Johan lawngah Israel thlaangphun thli te na thawlhna yut u langtah baptisma dang u lah, a tina.

Tecoengah Johan lawng amah kah bii te a coeng tawm vengah thlaang rangpui nala te, ‘Kai he a-u tila na poek u? Kai tah nangmi lawng na ring oel khiing thlaang te nawh ni. Tede hutung u lah! Ahih tah kai hu ah va law tih kai tah ahih kah khowmuek te dul pe ham Pateng khaw ka koeih nawh.’ tila a thui.
“Abraham cadil, ka puei Israel thlaangphun thli oen Pathen aka bok Gental thlaangphun thli; thlawnna awlthang he mami tengah m'peek!

Metihtiah Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang thli oen ahimi mawtkung thli lawngah ahih te Thlawnkung ni tila ming u nawh tih Sabbath khawhin roekk ah a tae u tawngha thli kah awl te khaw ahimi lawng yaakming u nawh. Tede Jesuh te a ngawn u tih tawngha thli kah awl thui te a soep sak u.
Ahimi lawngah ahih te ngawn hamla akawng alam hu u nawh de ahih te ngawn ham Pilat tengah a bih u.
Te tila ahih kawng Caciim lawng a thui boeih te a sai u coengah thinglam dawngkah a rawkk te ahimi lawng a lawh u tih thlann ah a up u.
Tede Pathen lawng ahih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak poen tih,
Galili kalawng Jerusalem la amah oen khawlawng aka cet haih nooek thli tengah khawhin broe nawh la a phumpho pe. Tahe ah ahimi te Israel thlaang phun ham aka mingkung sausi la awm u.

Tecoengah thlann khuiah metuek khaw rong sut ohla duekna kalawng a thawhkoepna kawng te Pathen lawng a thui tah: ‘Devid teng awl ka kam tangte, aka ciim tih uepna koei tangtang yotheen kam-awmna te kan pe ai.’ tila a thui.
Tecoengah Saam laa atloe dawngah khaw, ‘Namah kah a congmang heet tuihyoeihthlaang te thlann khuiah na rong sak sut manawh.’ tila a thui.
Devid lawng a hing khuiah Pathen kawngaihna te a sai, tecoengah duek tih an patuer thli oen haih a up u de phuel khuiah a rawkk te rong.
Tede Pathen lawng duekna kalawng a thawh sak thlaang te tah he tila awm nawh.
Tedawngah tawngha thli lawng a thui te nangmi sawah a thoeng nawh ham ngaithuen uh:

‘Hutung u lah! Nangmi nuihbu la thlaang aka sai hue! Lakueng uekcuek lang duek uh! metihtiah tihin ah ka sai ham koei he thlaang pakhat lawng van thui u cakhaw, na tangna u roe manawh!’ tila a thui” a tina.
Sinakok bok-im kalawng Pawl oen Barnabas a ceh hih vengah te, Sabbath khawhin ah law koep hih langtah he kawng he yahawh la van thui de a tina u.

Thlaangping te sinakok bok-im kalawng a ceh boeih u coengah Pawl oen Barnabas te Judah thlaang thli oen Judah phung la aka kuun Gental thlaang broe lawngah a hu ah bung a vai u. Celtuih rawi lawng ahimi te Pathen lungvatna dawngah awm poe hamla thathluena awl a thui pe.
Tecoeng Sabbath khawhin atah te khawpui khuikah thlaang boeih lawng Bawipa awl te hutung hamla law u.
Judah thlaang thli lawngah thlaangping te a huh u vengah ahimi lawng uett-eena thinkaw a khueh u; Pawl lawng a thui te khaw a oelh ataih u tih amah te khaw aphawh akhah u.

Tede Pawl oen Barnabas lawng raltheenla a thui tare hih tih: “Nangmi tengah Pathen awl he lamhacuekla thui ham ngoe tangtang. Tede nangmi lawng na hoett u tih namah oen namah te dungyan hingna oen a tingtawkk nawh la na poek u atah kan ceh taak u vetih Gental thlaangphun tengla ka cet hih ai.
Metihtiah kai hih tengah Bawipa kah awlpeek tah: ‘Dilai pum lawng thlawnna a dangna ham nang hih tah Gental thlaang thli kah aangna la kan khueh poen.’ tila a thui” a tina hih.
Gental thlaang thli lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah, awmngaih u tangkiik tih Bawipa kah awlthang te a thangpawm u; dungyan hingna paang hamla a tuek thlaang thli te oengca la awm u.
Bawipa kah awl tah te kah ram pum ah te puung khuengdeng.

Tede Judah thlaang thli lawngah khawpui khuikah mawtkung thlaang thli oen Pathen aka bok hinyah koei Gental hutaa thli te a ceemtuh u tih Pawl oen Barnabas te heemtek ham a tong u, ahih rawi te a ram khui kalawng a vai u.
Celtuih rawi lawngah ahimi sawah a kawlawna nawh te ming sak nala a khow dawngkah laidiik te a khoek hih tih Ikoniam khaaw la poe cet hih.
Antiok khaw kah oengca thli tah awmngaihna oen Ciim Muithla oen ah betoet u.
Tetih toengtoeng la te Ikoniam ah khaw Pawl oen Barnabas tah sinakok bok-im la cet tih awl a thui hih, Judah thlaang thli oen Gental thlaang thli yahawh hlang te oengca la coengg u.
Tede aka tangna nawh Judah thlaang thli lawng Gental thlaang thli te a ceemtuh u tih oengca thli te a oelh a taih sak u.

Celtuih rawi tah te ah te asan hlang awm tih Bawipa kawng te raltheenla a thui hih, ahih rawi lawng a thui lungvatna kawng awlthang te soeng tila tueng sakna ham kawpoek rai miknoekna oen kawpoek rai sai thaina huham tharana te a peek.
Te khawpui khuikah thlaangping tah pek u tih khatsut lawng Judah thlaang te a bawngyawng u tih khatsut lawng celtuih rawi te a bawngyawng u.
Tecoengah Judah thlaang thli oen Gental thlaang thli lawngah celtuih rawi te thekhana tih lungto oen de hamla a thui u.
Celtuih rawi lawng he kawng he a ming tih Likonia ram khuiah aka awm Listra oen khaawteng khaawvai la te heeng hih.
Te ah te ahih rawi lawng Awlthang Theen te a thui hih.
Listra khaaw ah a thang pek kalawng a khow kheem tih aka cet thai nawh thlaang pakhat awm.
Ahih tah te ah te ngawl tih Pawl kah awl thui te a hutung. Pawl lawngah, ahih lawngtah a tangna dawngah hoeih thai ai tite a huh, tedawngah rangpatangla a bueh heet tih,
angaih hlang la ahih nala te, “Tho lang pai hang lah!” a tina. Te thlaang lawng cungpet tih yingyawi.
Pawl lawng a sai te thlaangping lawng a huh vengah, “Thlaanghing angla pathen thli he va thoeng tih mami tengah va law poen!” tila amami Likonia awl la te paang u.
Ahimi lawngah Barnabas te Zias tila miing a sak u tih Pawl tah awl thuikung la a awm dawngah Harmas tila miing a sak u.

Te khawpui kah adauben ah tempal bok-im awm tih Zias pathen khawsoeih lawng vaitaw taal thli oen raipai thli te khawpui vawng thawhka la te avan khuen, ahih oen thlaangping hue lawngah celtuih rawi tengah luciik thawthuengna te nawn ham a ngaih u.
Ahimi lawngah te tila ka sai ai a ti u te Pawl oen Barnabas lawng a yaak hih vengah amahih kah himbai te a pheuh hih, thlaangping tim ah heeng hih tih paang,

“N'tu ham he he na sai u? Kaihih khaw nangmi angla thlaanghing van ni! Nangmi lawng he ang aphu aka awm nawh te na hoettna u ham, vaan, dilai oen tuitunlii oen ah a khuiah aka awm boeih saikung aka hing Pathen tengla na maang u hamla kaihih lawng Awlthang Theen he phawng hamla ka law hih.
N'cui veng atah thlaang boeih he amami kah ngaihna angla a ceh sak.

Tede ahih tah thaihu theen saina oen ah awm tite a tueng sak poepa: vaan kalawng ah khaw a tlan sak tih atue atang vengah thing thaih rampu te m'peek u; caak awkk te m'peek u tih na kaw avan hoe sak u.” tila a thui pe hih.
He tila awl a thui pe hih ah Pateng khaw thlaangping lawngah ahih rawi tengah luciik thawthuengna te nawn nawh ham celtuih rawi lawng a khaang pe tloel hih.

Pisidia ram khuikah Antiok khaaw oen Ikoniam khaaw kalawng Judah thlaang khatsut te law u tih thlaangping te amami benla a doek u thai, Pawl te lungto oen a de u, duek poen tila a poek u tih khawpui adaubenla te a mawt u.
Tede oengca thli lawng ahih te a veel khoep u vengah tho tih khawpui khuila te koep cet. Avuen khawhin atah Barnabas oen Derbe khaaw la te cet hih.
Pawl oen Barnabas lawng Derbe ah Awlthang Theen te a phawng hih tih thlaang broe te hubang la coengg. Tecoengah Listra, Ikoniam, Pisidia ram kah Antiok khaaw la te cet hih koep.

Ahih rawi lawngah oengca thli te tha a peek hih tih oengna dawngah cak poe hamla thathluena awl a thui pe hih. Ahih rawi lawngah, “Mami lawng Pathen ram khuiah kuun ham ah khawdeng patang broela khang ham roe ni,” tila te a cang puei hih.
Ahih rawi lawng khrihcabu roekk ah ahaamca thli te a khueh pe, ahih rawi lawngah buhyeh thangthuina oen ahimi te a uepna Pathen tengah a nawn.
Pisidia ram te a pooeng hih coengah Pamfilia ram te a pha hih.
Perka khaaw ah awlthang a phawng hih tih tecoengah Attalia khaw la te cet hih.
Bii a coeng hih poen dawngah te kalawng ah Antiok la tuisangphaw oen koep cet hih. Antiok khaaw he tah biibi tong hamla Pathen kah lungvatna dawngah pum a peekna hih khaw ni.

Antiok khaaw te a pha hih veng atah khrihcabu kah thlaang thli te thik at la a tun sak hih tih ahih rawi rang oen Pathen lawng a sai thli oen Gental thlaang thli lawng a tangna thai ham lawngpui a awng pe kawng te ahimi tengah a thui pe hih.
Ahih rawi tah te ah te atue san hlang oengca thli oen awm u.
Thlaang khatsut tah Judia kalawng Antiok la law u tih, “Nangmi lawngah Mosi kah Phungawl lawng a kuek angla yahhuivuen na reet u nawh atah thlawnna na dang thai manawh.” tila a cang puei u.

Pawl oen Barnabas tah he kawngah ahimi oen oelh ataih u tih awl puung u. Tedawngah Pawl oen Barnabas he Antiok kah thlaang khatsut oen Jerusalem la cet u selang tah he kawng he celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli te doet u seh tila awl a thui u.

Khrihcabu lawng ahimi te yawh a thak u; Fonicia oen Samaria ram ben kalawng poe cet u tih Pathen ben ah Gental thlaangphun thli kah kawthawna kawng te ahimi lawng a thui u tih he kah awlthang lawngah oengca boeih te a awmngaih sak.
Jerusalem te ahimi a pha veng atah khrihcabu oen celtuih thli oen ah ahaamca thli lawng ahimi te a do u tih ahimi rang oen Pathen lawng thaihu a sai boeih te a thui pe u.
Tede Farasi benla aka awm oengca thli khatsut lawng pai u tih, “Gental thlaangphun lawng yahhuivuen reet u selang tah Mosi kah Phungawl he vai u seh tila thui pe ham awm” tila a thui u.
Celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli tah he kah awldoetna he poek hamla tun huh u.

Asan hlang a thui khiing u coengah Piter lawng pai tih, “Maya manau thli, Gental thlaangphun lawng Awlthang Theen te a yaak u tih a tangna u thai ham n'hu vengah Pathen lawng nangmi timkah kai he aka thuikung la n'tuek te nangmi lawng na ming u.
Thlaang boeih kah poekna mingkung Pathen lawngah Ciim Muithla te mami m'peek van angla Gental thlaang thli khaw a peek van tih ahimi te a do poen tite a tueng sak.
Ahih lawngah mami oen ahimi laklaw ah pekbona sai nawh; ahimi lawng a tangna u dawngah ahimi kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai pe.
Tedawngah, n'tu hamla nangmi kah patuer thli lawngkhaw, mami nawn lawngkhaw phueih thai nawh thalrih te oengca thli na phueih sak rang oen tahe ah Pathen te noekdak ham na ngaih u?
Tetih moenih ta! Ahimi angla mami lawngkhaw n'tangna u van tih Bawipa Jesuh kah lungvatna rang oen thlawnna n'dang u.” a tina.
Barnabas oen Pawl lawng, ahih rawi rang oen Gental thlaangphun tengah Pathen lawng kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu a sai kawng te a thui hih vengah thlaangping lawng sap a hutung u.
Ahimi lawng awl a thui boeih u coeng atah Jeem lawng ah: “Maya manau thli, ka awl hutung u lah!
Simon lawng a thui angla Pathen lawng Gental thlaang thli te amah hamla a lawhna rang oen metihtluk la ahimi a thintlawhna tite lamhala a tueng sak poen.
Tawngha thli kah awl thui khaw he kah awl oen vai u. Caciim lawng a thui angla,
‘Bawipa lawngah, he coengah koep kava meel vetih Devid kah ram te ka thawh koep ai. Aka rawk thli te ka sak koep vetih acakla ka pai sak koep ai.
Tecoengah thlaangphun boeih lawng ka tengla law u vetih kamah kah thlaang la awm hamla ka khue Gental thlaang thli khaw law u ai.
Te tila yan veng kalawng he awl aka mingsakkung Bawipa lawng a thui.’ a tina.
Jeem lawngkhaw a thui pe tih, ‘Pathen benla kaw aka thaw Gental thlaang thli he mami lawng raina peek ham awm nawh tila ka poek.

Te lak atah, kutsaimuei bokna ah a nawn u dawngah phung alam ben ah aka caih nawh caak awkk te caak nawh ham; hutaa oen tawngpa thawlhna dawngah kuemsuem ham, rawn khak ramsa te caak nawh ham, sathi khaw caak nawh hamla ca mah pat pe u sih.
Metihtiah sinakok bok-im ah n'cui veng kalawng Mosi kah Phung awl te Sabbath khawhin roekk ah a tae poepa u tih khaw tawm ah ahih awl te khaw a phawng u poen.” a tina.

Tecoengah celtuih thli, ahaamca thli oen khrihcabu lawng Pawl oen Barnabas oen ah Antiok khaaw la tuih haih ham amami bu khuikah thlaang khatsut te tuek hamla awl a tloek u. Ahimi lawngah oengca boeih lawng a hinyah u thlaang pahih Barnabas a ti u Judas oen ah Silas te a tuek u.

Ahih rawi kut ah te a dangkah angla ca a pat pe u: “Nangmi kah maya manau la aka awm kaimi celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli lawng Antiok, Siria oen Cilicia ah aka awm Gental phun maya manau thli te kan toei u.
Kaimi tim-kah thlaang khatsut aka law lawngah nangmi te raina m'peek u tih ahimi kah awlthui lawngah ngaihangtum la nangmi te n'khueh u tite ka yaak u. Tede ahimi te kaimi kah mingpueina awm nawh.
Tedawngah kaimi tun ka huh u tih laipai tuek u silang tah mami lawng n'lungna Barnabas oen Pawl oen ah nangmi tengla tuih haih sih tila boeih ka kaw vai u.
Pawl oen Barnabas tah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah bii dawngah duek oen hing khaw aka maa nawh thlaang ni.
Tedawngah ca oen kavan thut u he nangmi tengah thui pe hamla Judas oen Silas he kavan tuih u.
He kah angoe phung alam coengah atloe thalrih khatca khaw nangmi sawah tloeng nawh hamla Ciim Muithla oen kaimi ka kaw vai u poen:

kutsaimuei tengah a nawn caak awkk te ca u boel; sathi ca u boel; rawn khak ramsa te ca u boel; hutaa oen tawngpa thawlh u boel. He ang thaihu boeih he nangmi lawng sai nawh ham na kuemsuem u atah theen mai poen. Na sa ding u seh.” tila a thut pe u.
Laipai thli te a tuih u tih Antiok khaaw la te cet u, tela te a pha u atah oengca thli te vai at la a tun sak tih capat te ahimi kut ah a peek u.
Ahimi lawng ca te a tae u vengah thathlue thakawna awl dawngah te a kaw hoe u tangkiik.
Judas oen Silas khaw tawngha la a awm hih dawngah ahimi tengah thathluena awl oen thapeekna awl asanhlangla a thui pe hih.
Ahih rawi tah te ah te akhoek anoen a awm hih coeng atah oengca thli lawng sading ngaimawng la a thak u tih aka tuihkung thli tengla koep meel hih.
(Tede Silas tah te ah te awm hamla kamthlah.)
Pawl oen Barnabas tah Antiok khaaw ah asanhlang awm hih tih thlaangtloe hue oen Bawipa awl te a phawng u tih a cang puei u.

Te ah te a awm ran hih coeng atah Pawl lawng Barnabas nala te, “Bawipa awl mahih lawng n'thuina khaaw boeih ah te cet silang tah maya manau thli te hip lah sih, metila nuem a awm kai, hiil-adawng lah sih.” a tina.
Barnabas lawngtah Johan Mark te ceh puei ham a ngaih,
Tede ahih tah te rawi kah biibina aboet toe ah baang poe nawh tih ahih rawi te Pamfilia ah a ceh taak tih a meel koep dawngah Pawl lawngtah ahih te ceh puei hamla theen nawh tila a poek.
Te kawngah awl puung hih tih ahih rawi tah pek ahih: Barnabas lawng Mark te a khue tih Saipras la tuisangphaw oen cet hih.
Pawl lawngah Silas te a tuek tih oengca thli lawng Pathen kah lungvatna dawngah a nawn u coengah cet hih van.
Ahih tah Siria oen Cilicia ben kalawng poe cet tih khrihcabu thli te tha a thlue sak.
Pawl tah Derbe kalawng Listra khaaw la te cet, te ah te khrihca thlaang pakhat Timote aka miingna te awm. A manu tah khrihca van tih Judah thlaangphun la awm, tede ana pa tah Krik thlaangphun ni.
Listra oen Ikoniam kah oengca boeih lawng Timote te a koeh u.

Pawl lawng Timote te ceh puei a ngaih dawngah yahhuivuen a reet sak. Ahih lawng te tila a sai sak te tah te kah aka awm Judah thlaang boeih lawng Timote kah ana pa te Krik thlaang phun tila a ming u dawngah ni.
Ahimi lawng a cehna khaaw tawm ah te Jerusalem ah Celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli kah awltloekna phung alam a sai u te a thuicaih pe tih te kah phung te ahimi lawng vai hamla a thui pe u.
Tedawngah khrihcabu thli tah oengna ben ah a tha ra u tih khawhin roekk ah puung tare hang.
Ahimi te Ciim Muithla lawng Asia ram khuiah awlthang a phawng sak nawh dawngah Frikia ram oen Galati ram la te poe cet u.
Misia ramri a pha u veng atah Bitinia ram khuila ceh ham a yawm u, tede Jesuh kah Muithla lawng ahimi te ceh taak u nawh.
Tedawngah Misia ram kalawng Troas khaaw la poe cet u.
Khaw yiin atah Pawl lawng huhthlaam pakhat a huh tih te kah a huh na dawngah te Macidonia thlaang pakhat pai tih, “Macidonia ram la law u langtah kaimi he m'bawm u lah!” tila a bih.

He kah huhthlaam he Pawl lawng a huh coeng atah Macidonia ram la ceh ham pahoei ka kamthlah u, metihtiah te kah aka awm thlaang thli tengah Awlthang Theen thui hamla Pathen lawng n'khue ka ti u dawngah ka kamthlah pahoei u.
Kaimi tah Troas kalawng Samotarek la tuisangphaw oen ka cet u tih avuen ah Neapolis ka pha u.
Te kalawng ah Macidonia peng, lamhacuek khawpui Filipi la te lan lawngpui kalawng ah ka cet u. Te kah khawpui te tah Rom ram uk khuiah awm. Te ah te khawhin sanhlang ka awm u.

Sabbath khawhin ah khawpui avooel ben-kah tuivakeeng la ka cet u, te ah te Judah thlaang thli kah thangthui tunna ahuen awm ai tila ka poek u. Kaimi ka ngawl u tih te ah aka tun hutaa thli tengah awl ka thui pe u.

Ahimi timkah hutaa pakhat himbai lingdiik aka yoeikung Tiatira khaaw kah Lidia lawngah kaimi awl te a hutung. Ahih tah Pathen aka bok hutaa pakhat la awm tih Pawl kah awl thui te hutung nguenthuen ham Pathen lawng a thinkaw a awng pe.

Amah oen a imkhuikaw thlaang boeih lawng baptisma a huh u coeng atah, “Kai he Bawipa ah oengca taktak la nan poek u atah law u lang ka im ah pah uh.” tila n'ceel u. Tecoeng atah a im la ceh ham kaimi te n'tongnolh u.

Hin at atah thangthuina huen la kaimi ka ceh u vengah raaithe aka khueh sal hutaaca khat oen ka huh u. Ahih te raaithe lawngah hailamben ah aka thoeng ham koei te a thui sak thai. Ahih lawng hailamben thaihu kawng thuina rang oen a bawi thli ham tangka moen a dang pe.

Ahih te kaimi oen Pawl hu ah law tih, “He kah thlaang thli he tah Tloeng Khoelh Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli ni! Nangmi lawngah thlawnna te metila na dang u thai ai tite ahimi lawng avan thui ai!” tila paang.

Te tila te khawhin sanhlang ahih tah paang khiing, Pawl te thinsabat la a khueh aih dawngah a hu la maang dak tih raaithe nala te, “Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah ahih kaw khui kalawng co loeih kan tina he!” a tina. Tevengca roe ah ahih kaw khui kalawng raaithe te co pahoei.
Hutaaca kah a bawi thli lawng ahimi kah tangka dangna tah awm tlaih nawh tite a ming u veng atah Pawl oen Silas te a tuuk u tih rangpui a tunna huen ah aana khuehkung thli tengla te a mawt u.
Ahimi lawngah te rawi te Rom ram ukbawi thli tengla a khuen u tih, “He rawi he Judah thlaangphun ni, mami kah khawpui khuiah awlpuungna a sai hih.
Ahih rawi lawngah mami kah phung oen aka kalh u phung te a cang puei hih; kaimi tah Rom thlaang la ka awm u dawngah he ang phung he ka do u nawh vetih ka vai u manawh.” tila a thui u.
Tevengah thlaangping hue lawngkhaw Pawl oen Silas te sulh a cuuk thil u. Tecoeng atah Rom ram ukbawi thli lawng Pawl oen Silas kah himbai te a pit pe u tih cungpoelh oen bawh hamla awl a peek.
A bawh doetthloet u coeng atah ahih rawi te thongim khuiah a uup u, ahih rawi te longkhon buen sak tih piin rap hamla thongim toetkung thli te awl a peek.
Awlpeek te a dang coeng atah thong ukbawi lawng te rawi te thongim a khuicok la a uup u tih longkhon a rih khuethluek te a khow dawngah a buen u.
Yiinthuem tang yunyan atah Pawl oen Silas lawng thangthui hih tih Pathen koehna laa a sak hih, atloe thongtla thli lawng ahih rawi kah laa sak awl te a hutung u.
Tevengah bawtbet khawlai maiah likluei law khuengdeng tih thongim te lungdangsuem toela hinghuen. Kawlkalh maiah thawhka boeih te awng u phengvel tih thongtla thli a khihna thiirui te thlam u boeih.
Thong ukbawi te tho hang tih thong thawhka boeih a awng u te a huh vengah thongtla boeih tah co boeih poen cawini tila a poek; tedawngah a samsen te a suh tih amah oen amah te ka ngawn u ai ti.
Tede Pawl te paang khalau tih, ‘Namah oen namah nganbawh pe u boel! Kaimi boeih he ah ka awm u!” a tina.
Thong ukbawi lawng haithoei a tawh sak coengah thongim khuila te toklek la kuun phai tih Pawl oen Silas kah a khowkung ah rih oen thuen ruila te buekuep.
Tecoengah ahih rawi te adaubenla a ceh puei tih, “Ka bawipa rawi, thlawnna ka dangna ham n'tu ka sai ai?” tila a doet.
Ahih rawi lawngah, “Bawipa Jesuh te tangna lah, namah oen na imkhuikaw lawng thlawnna na dang u ai.” a tina.
Ahih rawi lawngah Bawipa awl te ahih oen a im kah thlaangtloe boeih tengah a thui pe hih.
Amah yiin vengah te thong ukbawi lawng ahih rawi te a ceh puei tih a boengha thli te a silh pe; ahih oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng baptisma te pahoei a dang u.

Tecoengah thong ukbawi lawng amah im la Pawl oen Silas te a ceh puei tih caak awkk te a do adan. Tahe atah ahimi lawng Pathen te a tangna u poen dawngah amah oen a imkhuikaw boeih tah awmngaih tangkiik u.
Avuen mincang ah Rom thlaang aana khuehkung thli lawng palik bawi thli te awl a peek tih a tuih, “Te rawi te ceh sak loeih” a tina.
Tevengah thong ukbawi lawng Pawl nala te, “Bawi thli lawngah nang oen Silas te thlah hamla thlaang avan tuih poen. Tedawngah na cet thai hih poen, ngaimawng ngaitoe la cet hih loeih.” a tina.

Tede Pawl lawngah palik bawi nala te, “Kai hih kah thawlhpalhna te hu u nawh de rangpui haiah cungpoelh oen n'bawh u, kaihih he Rom thlaang de lah koen! Tecoengah thong n'thlaak u. Tahe ah ahimi lawng kaihih he ahuepla tuih ham a ngaih u. He tila sai ham tuueng nawh! Rom ram ukbawi thli amami te he la law selang kaihih he n'thlah seh.” a tina.
Palik bawi thli lawng he awl he Rom ram ukbawi thli tengah a thui pe u; Pawl oen Silas te Rom thlaang ni tila a yaak u veng atah a rih u.
Tedawngah ahih rawi tengla ahimi te cet u tih reenna a bih u, tecoeng ahimi lawngah te rawi te thongim khui kalawng a thlah u tih khawpui khui kalawng ceh loeih hamla reenna a bih u.
Pawl oen Silas lawng thongim te a thawh taak hih tih Lidia im la cet hih. Te ah te ahih rawi lawng oengca thli oen huh u tih ahimi tengah thathluena awl a thui pe coengah a ceh taak.
Pawl oen Silas te Amfipolis oen Apollonia kalawng poe cet hih tih Tesalon khaaw te a pha, te ah te sinakok bok-im pakhat awm.
Pawl lawng a ceh nooek angla sinakok la te cet. Te ah te Sabbath khawhin hin thum khuiah thlaangping oen awl a thui,

Caciim dawngkah awl te a thoel alang u tih a thui ngawng u, Messiah tah khawdeng patang a khang vetih duekna kalawng tho koep ai tite a thui caih pe. Pawl lawngah, “Nangmi tengah kavan phawng Jesuh he tah Messiah poen ni.” tila a thui pe.
Ahimi timkah khatsut lawngtah a yaakming u tih Pawl oen Silas te a bawngyawng u; tedawngah nu mawtkung thli oen Pathen aka bok Krik thlaang thli broe lawngkhaw a bawngyawng u van.

Tede Judah thlaang thli lawngtah a uett a ee u tih lawngteng lawngvai kah boethe halang thlaang thli te a cawi tun tih thlaangping la a tingtun sak. Ahimi lawngah khawpui khuiah cumplaam la tho u, Jason kah im te a muk u tih Pawl oen Silas te thlaangping tengah khuen hamla a tlap u.

Tede ahih rawi te a huh u nawh veng atah ahimi lawng Jason oen atloe oengca thli khatsut te akhup athalla avan mawt u tih te khawpui kah aana khuehkung thli tengah, “Khaaw tawm ah rai-acangna aka thoeng sak thlaang rawi te tahe tah mami khaw khuila avan pha poen!
tede Jason lawng te rawi te a im ah a thuh. Ahih rawi lawngah sengpahrang sangluel kah phung boeih khaw a phe hih, sengpahrang atloe awm tih Jesuh a miingna tila a thui.” tila paang u.
Te tila ahimi lawng a paang u dawngah thlaangping oen khawpui khuiah aana khuehkung thli kah thinkaw a phawh.
Aana khuehkung thli lawng Jason oen atloe hue te thlahna ham aamahkhanna tangka ahimi tengah a lawh u, tecoengah a thlah u.
Khaw a yiin thuk atah oengca thli lawng Pawl oen Silas te Berea khaaw la pahoei a tuih u. Ahih rawi lawng a pha atah sinakok bok-im la cet hih.

Te kah thlaang thli tah Tesalon ah aka awm thlaang thli lak ah a poekna kau bet. Ahimi lawng thinkaw thluembuek oen awl te a hutung u tih Pawl lawng a thui te soeng tang kai nuem ti u tih hin roekk ah Caciim te ahimi lawng athoel alang u.
Ahimi timkah thlaang broe lawngah a tangna u tih hinyah koei Krik hutaa thli oen Krik thlaang tawngpa broe lawngkhaw a tangna u.
Tede Tesalon ah aka awm Judah thlaang thli lawng Pawl lawngah Berea ah khaw Pathen awl a phawng tite a yaak u vengah tela te law u tih thlaangping te a ceemtuh u tih awl puungna a sai sak u.
Tedawngah oengca thli lawng Pawl te tuitunlii keeng la te pahoei a tuih u; tede Silas oen Timote tah Berea khaw ah te awm hih.
Pawl aka thak thlaang thli te Aaten khaw toela haih cet u tih Berea khaaw la a meel koep u vengah Silas oen Timote te Pawl amah tengla law yue seh tila awl a uen.
Pawl lawng Silas oen Timote te Aaten khaaw ah a ring vengah te kah khawpui tah kutsaimuei oen abehuepla a awm te a huh tih a kaw the tangkiik.

Tedawngah Judah thlaang thli oen khawseh, Pathen aka bok Gental thlaang thli oen khaw sinakok ah awl a thui u poepa tih, rangpui tunna huen ah khaw, cet thuk cet hang thlaang thli oen khawhin roekk ah awl a thui u.

Epikuras kah cangpueina aka vai thli kah cangpueikung hue oen khaw, Stoik a ti u cuihna te aka cangpueikung hue oen khaw ahih tah oelhtaih u. Ahimi tim-kah khatsut lawngah, “He kah thlaang koeih pavaih nawh lawng he n'tu nuem a thui van ca?” ti u. Thlaangtloe hue lawngah, “Ram tloe kah pathen kawng ni a thui muema he.” a tina u. Pawl lawngah Jesuh kawng oen a thawhkoepna kawng a thui dawngah ni ahimi lawng te tila te a tina u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng Pawl te Areopakas a ti u awlcekna khonsil ah a ceh puei u tih, “Nang lawng akawng alam na thui cangpueina a thaai te ming hamla ka ngaih u.
Na thui thaihu thli he kaimi haa yaak atah alakloela awm tih te ang thli thui ngaihna te ming ham ka ngaih u.” a tina.
(Aaten khaaw kah thlaang thli oen te ah aka awm kamyin kamlai thli lawngah hukhueng la a yaak u thaihu thaai kawng te doet adap tih awl hutungna la atue atang te a hawna u.)
Pawl lawngah te khawpui kah awlcekna khonsil bawi thli haiah pai tih, “Nangmi Aaten thlaang thli he bokna ben ah na tlungmu u tite ka ming.

Metihtiah na vang khuiah ka yingyawi tih nangmi lawng na bokna ahuen boeih te ka bueh vengah asawah, “Ming Nawh Pathen Hamla” tila na thut u bokna-thaang pakhat te ka huh. Nangmi lawng ming heet muehla na bok u te ni tahe ah nangmi teng kavan thui.
Dilai oen a khuiah aka awm thaihu soeprep saikung, vaan oen dilai kah Bawipa te tah thlaanghing kut oen a sak tempal bok-im ah awm nawh.
Ahih tah thlaang boeih tengah hingna oen hillsang yilh oen ah thaihu cungkuem pekung la a awm dawngah mami lawngah ahih ham bii te bi pe tih do adan hamla khatca khaw ngoe mai nawh.
Thlaang pakhat dawng kalawng thlaangphun boeih te a sai tih dilai pumpui ah a awm sak. Amah lawngah ahimi kah atue atang oen a awmna ham ahuen amawl te oepsoehla a nuen pe sut poen.
Ahih lawng tila a sai he tah ahimi lawng angaai ahuett u tih amah te a tlap u atah a huh thaina ham ni. Ataktang atah Pathen he mami a-u khat oen khaw thla aih nawh.

Thlaang pakhat lawng, ‘Amah dawngah mami n'hing u, amah dawngah n'awm u tih n'tatvuet u.’ tila a thui angla te awm. Namami kah tingtoenglung aka thlaak hue lawngkhaw, ‘Mami khaw ahih kah cadil van ni’ tila a thui angla te awm.
Mami tah Pathen kah ca-anau la n'awm u dawngah thlaanghing kah cuihna, thoemthaina oen a sai muei asam sui, ngun, lungto kutsaimueime oen ah Pathen he lo u tila mami lawng poek ham awm nawh.

Pathen amah te thlaanghing lawng a ming nawh vengkah atue atang te n'tu la khaw poek asam nawh, tede tahe atah khaaw tawm ram tawm kah thlaang boeih kah the-arana boeih te mangthawng taak hamla awl a peek poen.

Metihtiah amah lawng a tuek oepsoeh thlaang pakhat rang oen ah dilai pumpui he doengna oen awlcek hamla atue khawhin a nuen poen. Ahih lawng te thlaang te duekna kalawng a thawh sak rang oen thlaang boeih tengah asoengna te a tueng sak!” tila a thui.

Duekna kalawng thawhkoepna kawng Pawl lawng a thui te ahimi lawng a yaak u vengah thlaang khatsut lawng ahih te a nuihna u, tede thlaangtloe lawngtah, “He kah akawng alam na thui he yaak koep ham ka ngaih u.” a tina.
Tecoeng atah tunna kalawng Pawl te cet poen.

Thlaang khatsut tah Pawl oen te bawngyawng u, khonsil ah aka thuum van, ahimi khuikah thlaang pakhat Dionisias lawngkhaw Damaris aka miingna hutaa pakhat oen thlaang-tloe khatsut hue lawngtah a tangna u.
He coeng atah Aaten khaaw te Pawl lawng a thawh taak tih Kawrin khaaw la cet.

Sengpahrang sangluel Klaudias lawng Rom kalawng ah Judah thlaang boeih te a hek dawngah Itali ram kalawng a yu Priscilla oen haih aka law pek Pontas ram kah Akuila aka miingna Judah thlaang pakhat oen te ah te huh u. Pawl te ahih rawi yuvaa tengah te laiawm,
Pawl khaw ahih rawi yuvaa angla saphaw riim-im saina oen tangka a dang van dawngah ahih rawi yuvaa tengah awm tih bii haih a bi u.
Ahih lawngah Sabbath khawhin roekk ah sinakok bok-im ah te awl a thui poepa, Judah thlaang oen Krik thlaang thli lawng a yaakming tih a tangna thai hamla te a yawm.
Macidonia kalawng Silas oen Timote avan pha hih atah Pawl lawng atue atang boeih te awlthang phawngna ham a hawna tih Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila Judah thlaang thli teng ah acairaula a thui pe.

Pawl te ahimi lawng a oel khaklal u tih ahih kawng te athela a thui u vengah a himbai dawngkah laidiik te a khoek thil tih, “Nangmi lawng na ha-ata u atah namami kah thebuh la awm seh! Ka sawah thoeng boel seh. Tahe kalawng tah Gental thlaang thli tengla ka cet poen ai.” a tina.
Tedawngah ahimi te a ceh taak tih Pathen aka bok Gental thlaang pakhat Titias Jastas aka miingna im ah awm hamla cet; ahih im tah sinakok bok-im a huben ah te awm.
Sinakok bok-im uktemkung Krispas oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng-tah Bawipa te a tangna u; Kawrin khaaw kah thlaangtloe thli lawngkhaw awlthang te a yaak u, a tangna u tih baptisma te a dang u.
Yiin at atah Pawl lawng huhthlaam a huh tih te kah huhthlaam dawngah Bawipa lawng, “Rih boel, toeng tlaih ohla awlthang te poe thui,
metihtiah kai lawng kan awm puei dawngah a-u lawngkhaw nang te nganbawh n'yawkk sak manawh, he khawpui khuikah yahawh ngaai he tah kamah kah thlaang la ni a awm u.” a tina.
Tedawngah Pawl tah kum at coeng kum vaang te ah te awm tih thlaangping te Pathen awl a cang puei.
Akhaia ah Kallio te Rom ram ukbawi la a awm veng atah Judah thlaang thli lawng cawitun u tih Pawl te a tuuk u coeng atah awlcekna yungim la te a khuen u.
Ahimi lawngah, “He kah thlaang lawngah phungawl oen a kalh u la Pathen bok ham thlaangping te a suek ahalh!” a tina u.

Pawl lawng awl ka thui ai a ti vengah Kallio lawngah Judah thlaang thli nala te, “He he athe ara lumlai pakhat mai aw, tinawh atah thawlhpalhna lumlai pakhat mai kawinih nangmi Judah thlaang thli sawah kawdaw thinsanna oen kaw ka poek ham theen.
Tede he tah awllung thli, miing thli oen namami kah phungawl kawngah awlpuungna la a awm dawngah namami lawng thui uh. Kai lawng he ang thaihu thli dawngah awl ka cek manawh!” a tina.
Tecoeng atah awlcekna yungim kalawng ahimi te a hek poen.
Ahimi boeih lawng sinakok uktemkung Sostenes te a tuuk u tih awlcekna yungim haiah te a bawh u. Tede Kallio lawngtah tete n'tu la khaw ngaai pe nawh.

Pawl he Kawrin khaaw ah khawhin sanhlang oengca thli oen a awm coengah ahimi te a ceh taak u tih Priscilla oen Akuila oen ah Siria khaaw la tuisangphaw oen cet haih u. Kenkhria khaaw kalawng tuisangphaw oen a ceh thlan ah awlkamna a sai dawngah a luu te bithliingla a vawkk.
Efesa khaaw te a pha u atah Pawl lawngah te ah te Priscilla oen Akuila te a ceh taak. Amah tah sinakok bok-im khuila cet tih Judah thlaang thli oen awl a thui u.
Te kah thlaang thli lawngtah asan hlang awm hamla a thlawh u de ahih lawng a thana.
Aceh tawm atah, “Pathen lawng angaih atah nangmi tengla ka law koep ai.” a tina. Tecoeng atah Efesa khaaw kalawng tuisangphaw oen cet.
Sisaria khaaw te a pha coeng atah Jerusalem la phaat cet tih khrihcabu te a voem a toei, tecoengah Antiok la poe cet.
Te ah te asanhlang a awm coeng atah te kalawng Galati peng oen Frikia peng la cet tih oengca boeih te thathluena awl a thui pe.
Tevengah te Alekzandria khaaw kah Apollos aka miingna Judah thlaang pakhat te Efesa khaaw la va law. Ahih tah awlthui a thoem tangkiik tih Caciim dawngkah awl te acek aneh la a ming.
Ahih lawngah Bawipa kah Lawngpui thuinuetna te a cang heet poen dawngah Jesuh kawng te asoeng akamla a cang puei tih thathluela a thui. Tede ahih lawngah Johan kah baptisma bueng te ni a ming.
Sinakok bok-im ah raltheenla awl a thui. Priscilla oen Akuila lawng ahih awlthui te a yaak hih vengah ahih te im la a ceh puei tih Bawipa kah Lawngpui te asoeng tare la a thuicaih pe hih.

Tecoengah Apollos tah Akhaia la ceh ham kamthlah, tedawngah Efesa kah oengca thli lawng Akhaia kah oengca thli tengah ca a thut pe u tih ahih he uem u langtah dodan uh a tina. Ahih te a pha veng atah Pathen kah lungvatna rang oen oengca la aka awm hue ham ah bawmcemkung theen koek la awm.
Rangpui haiah awl a oelh u vengah Caciim dawngkah awl te ahih lawng a thoel tih Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila a oelh tangtang atah Judah thlaang thli te a taa.
Kawrin khaaw ah Apollos a awm veng te ah, te kah peng te a hiil adawng tih Efesa khaaw te a pha. Te ah te hubang thli khatsut te a huh tih,
Te atah, ‘Nangmi lawng oengca la na coengg u vengah te Ciim Muithla na dang u poen aw? tila ahimi te a doet. Tevengah ahimi lawng, “Ciim Muithla awm tite a yaak pateng khaw ka yaak u moenih.” ti u.
Tevengah Pawl lawngah, “Tetih atah nangmi lawng me ang baptisma na dang u?” a tina. Ahimi lawngah, “Johan kah baptisma ni ka dang u.” a tina.
Pawl lawngah, “Johan kah baptisma tah thawlhna aka yut thlaang thli ham ni, ahih lawng Israel thlaang thli tengah, ‘Ka hu ah aka law te na tangna u ham awm’ tila a thui te tah, Jesuh te ni.” a tina.
Ahih lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Bawipa Jesuh miing ah baptisma te a dang u.
Pawl lawng ahimi sawah a kut a tloeng atah Ciim Muithla te ahimi sawah va law; ahimi lawngah ming nawh awl la cal u tih Pathen awl te khaw a phawng u.
Ahimi tah a pum boeih la thlaang paha thlaihih yun tah awm u.

Pawl tah sinakok bok-im la te cet tih thla thum khui puet ah raltheenla thlaangping tengah awl a thui, ahimi oen ah awl a thui u pakcal tih Pathen Ram kawng te ahimi lawng a yaakmingna thai ham a yawm.

Tede khatsut tah amangkhak thlaang la a awm u dawngah tangna u nawh tih thlaang rangpui haiah Pathen kah Lawngpui along a-im te athela a thui u. Tedawngah ahimi te a ceh taak tih oengca thli te a ceh puei, hin roekk ah Tirannas cacangna im ah awl a thui pe.
He tila te kum hih khui a sai tih Asia ram ah aka awm thlaang boeih Judah oen Gental thlaang thli lawng Bawipa awl te a yaak u.
Pathen lawng Pawl rang oen ah aka awm nooek nawh kawpoekrai miknoekna te a sai.

Ahih kah a hawna kut thuutna baaipeen oen a raang dahna himbaica thli pateng khaw thlaangtlo thli tengla a khuen u vengah ahimi kah tlawhnatna hoeih tih raaithe aka khueh thlaang thli kah a kaw khui kalawng raaithe thli te co u.

Judah thlaang khatsut raaithe hek hamla aka yingyo thlaang thli lawngkhaw Jesuh miing te hawna ham a yawm u. Ahimi lawng raaithe thli nala te, “Pawl lawng a phawng Jesuh miing oen ah awl kan peek, co u loeih,” a tina.
Judah thlaang Khawsoeih Bawi Skeva capa thli pasarih lawngah he tila a sai u.
Tede raaithe lawng ahimi nala te, “Jesuh te ka ming, Pawl khaw ka ming; tede, nangmi he a-u?” a tina.
A kaw khuiah raaithe aka awm thlaang te lawngah ahimi te a hah doet thloet tih boeih a taa. Boengha a caak u tih hinaak himbai pawnsawi la ahih im kalawng heeng u.
Efesa ah aka awm Judah thlaang oen Gental thlaang boeih lawng he kawng he a yaak u vengah a rih tangkiik u tih Bawipa Jesuh miing te a hinyah tare u.
Oengca thli khuikah thlaang broe lawngah law tih ahimi lawng a sai thli te rangpui haiah a phawng u.

Caam thoemthaina te aka hawna thlaang broe lawngah amami kah cabu thli te avan khuen tih rangpui haiah te hai dawngah a phum u. Ahimi lawng cabu phu te atoek asam u vengah apum boeih la ngun tangka thong sawm ngaa a pha.
He tila te Bawipa awl tah puung tare tih roeng hang.
He ang thaihu thli a awm hang coengah Pawl lawngah Macidonia ram oen Akhaia ram kalawng Jerusalem la ceh poe hamla kamthlah. Ahih lawngah, “Tela te ka ceh coengah Rom khawpui la ka cet ai.” ti.
