Tedawngah amah bawmcemkung thlaang pahih Timote oen Erastas te Macidonia la a tuih, amah tah Asia ram khuiah atue san hlang a hawna.
Tevengah te Bawipa kah Lawngpui kawng dawngah Efesa khaaw ah awl puungna awm.
Demetrias aka miingna ngun thiidekung lawng rai pathennu Artimis kah tempal bok-im muei-ame thli te ngun oen a sai, ahih kah biibina oen ah biibikung thli lawng tangka a dang u.

Tedawngah amah kah bii aka bi thlaang thli oen amah angla bii tloe aka sai thli te khaw a khue tun tih ahimi nala te, “Nangmi u, mami kah khuehtoen thaihu tah he kah biibina dawng kalawng ni n'dang u tite na ming u.

Tahe ah Pawl lawng a sai te nangmi lawng na huh thai tih na yaak thai u. Ahih lawngah, ‘Thlaanghing lawng a sai pathen thli he pathen tangtang nawh ni’ tila a thui tih Efesa khaaw oen Asia ram pum kah thlaang boeih te a yaakming sak poen.

Tedawngah mami kah biibina he miingthe a dang poen ai tite lakueng ham awm. Te bueng nawh tih Asia ram oen dilai pumpui kah thlaang lawng a bok rai pathennu Artimis kah bawilenna khaw yok vetih ahih kah tempal bok-im khaw apoeila awm poen ai tite lakueng ham awm!” a tina.
He awl he thlaangping lawng a yaak u vengah a thin sa soeh u tih, “Efesa khaaw kah Artimis tah bawilen duet ni” tila te paang u.
Te tila te khawpui khuiah cumplaam la tho u. Thlaangping lawngah Pawl oen yin aka cet haih Macidonia nam thlaang pahih Kaia oen Aristarkas te a tuuk u tih poei sai laamna-im la te aathamala a mawt u.
Pawl amah khaw thlaangping haiah te ceh ham a ngaih de oengca thli lawng ceh sak nawh.
Te peng kah aana khuehkung a paya khatsut hue lawngkhaw poei sai laamna-im la te ceh nawh hamla awl a tah u.

Te kah thlaangping thli te ngaihangtum luukiil haven la awm u: ahimi timkah thlaang yahawh ngaai lawngtah n'tu kawngah he tila ka tun u ti khaw a ming u nawh dawngah thlaang vaang lawng atloela paang u, atloe thlaangvaang lawng athloekla paang u.

Judah thlaang thli lawng Alekzandar te thlaangping hai la a ceh sak tih thlaang khatsut lawngtah ahih lawng ni awlpuungna he a thoeng sak cawini tila a poek u. Tecoeng atah Alekzandar lawng thlaangping te sap duem hamla a kut oen noekna a sai pe tih amah phungtuna awl te thui ham a yawm.
Tede ahimi lawng ahih te Judah thlaang ni tila a noek u vengah: “Efesa khaaw kah Artimis tah bawilen duet ni!” tila te khawnoek pahih khui puet ah ruek ruek paang u.

Hukhueng atah te kah khawpui ah aana aka khueh cathutkung lawng thlaangping te a duem sak thai. Ahih lawng, “Ka puei, Efesa thlaang thli, Efesa khaaw he tah alenduet Artimis tempal bok-im oen vaan kalawng aka tla thuk lungto cuem te doenkung la na awm u tite thlaang boeih lawng a ming u.
A-u lawngkhaw he tah oelh thai manawh. Tedawngah nangmi lawng duem na awm u ham awm tih poek muehla thaihu khat khaw sai ham awm nawh.
He rawi lawngah he tempal bok-im te khaw rot nawh tih mami kah pathennu kawng khaw athela thui nawh de ahih rawi he nangmi lawng he la navan khuen u.

Demetrias oen bii aka bi haih thlaang hue lawng a-u khaw tayacawi ham a khueh atah, aana khuehkung thli oen awlcekna yung oen ah awlcekna khawhin khaw mami lawng n'khueh u dawngah taya na cawi u thai ta.
Tede, apuehla na ngaih u atah pilnam rangpui tunna ah awl cek ham awm.
Tihin ah aka thoeng thaihu dawngah he, mami lawng ni awl puungna a thoeng sak tila m'peel hau ai ti he rih ham awm tih he tila a awm he akawng alam khaw atheenla n'thui u tang manawh.” a tina.
He awl he a thui coeng atah thlaangping te a meel sak.
Awlpuungna te aboet coeng atah Pawl lawng oengca thli te a khue tun tih thathluena awl a thui pe coeng atah sading ngaimawngla an awm uh a tina. Tecoeng atah Makedonia ram la te cet.
Ahih lawngah te kah peng te a hiil adawng tih thathluena awl a thui pe, tecoeng atah Akhaia ram la te cet tih te ah te thla thum awm.
Siria ram la ceh ham cai de, Judah thlaang thli lawng ahuepla ngawn ham a teeng u tite a ming tih Macidonia ram benla ceh koep hamla te kamthlah.
Berea khaaw kah Piras capa Sopatar, Tesalon khaaw kah Aristarkas oen Sekunda; Derbe khaaw kah Kaia; Asia ram kah Tukhikas oen Trofimas mi te Timote lawng a ceh puei u.
Ahimi te lamhala cet u tih Troas khaaw ah kaimi te n'ring u.
Tawlru thuum nawh Takawi Poei a boeih coengah Filipi kalawng Kaimi khaw tuisangphaw oen ka cet u tih hin ngaa coengah ahimi oen Troas ah ka huh u, te ah te khawhin hin rih ka cam u.
Yarh khat khuikah lamhacuek khawhin ah beroep lopaangna thlembuh veel haih hamla ka tun u. Avuen hin ah ceh ham a kamthlah u dawngah Pawl lawng thlaangping tengah yiinthuem toe ah awl a thui.
Kaimi ka tunna asaw im han ah haiim te moen a vaang u.

Cadawng pakhat Jutikas aka miingna te bangbuerh ah ngawl, Pawl lawng awl a thui lii vengah te ahih tah a mik kuu tih ngaam, ahula tah ip muelh tih im han apathumna kalawng dilai la tla thuk. Ahimi lawngah duek rawkk la a ruh u.
Tede Pawl te rum thuk tih ahih te koe a sambai, ayuh ayam tih a pooem. Ahih lawngah, “Lakueng u boel, hing hun he!” a tina.
Tecoengah im han la koep cet, takawi a eh tih a caak u. Ahimi oen mincang khawthaih toe asanhlang awl a thui u coengah Pawl te cet.
Ahimi lawngah cadawng te sading la amah im la te a ceh puei u tih ahimi boeih tah a ngaimawng u.
Kaimi te tuisangphaw oen lamhala Asos khaaw la te ka cet u, te kalawng tuisangphaw oen Pawl oen ah ceh haih hamla ka kamthlah u. Amah tah lan lawngpui kalawng a law dawngah te tila sai ham avan thui.
Asos khaaw ah kaimi oen ka huh u tih tuisangphaw dawngah ka luui sak u, tecoengah Mitilin khaw la ka cet u.
Te kalawng ah tuisangphaw oen ka cet u tih avuen hin ah Khios tuisanglak ka pha u. Tecoeng awmvai hin atah Samos tuisanglak ka pha u tih awmvaivuen hin atah Militas khaaw te ka pha u.
Pawl lawngah Asia ram khuiah poei-apah ham ngaih nawh tih Efesa khaaw te kaan tih tuisangphaw oen ceh phaat ham kamthlah. Acoeng thai atah Pentikos khawhin vengah Jerusalem te aloela pha ham a ngaih.
Pawl lawngah Militas kalawng Efesa la thlaang a tuih tih khrihcabu ahaamca thli te ahih oen huh u hamla law u lah seh, tila awl a tah.
Ahimi te avan pha u veng atah Pawl lawng, “Asia ram kavan pha peek kalawng nangmi teng ka awm khui puet ah atue khawhin metila ka hawna tite na ming u.
Judah thlaang thli lawng ngawn hamla n'teeng poepa u dawngah rai-acangna ka teng ah a pai vengah khaw, Bawipa kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm van angla kawdaw thinsan oen ah bii ka bi.
Thlaang rangpui haiah khaw, namami im ah khaw, nangmi kah hoeikhangna koei te khatca khaw thuh phah muehla ka thui tih kan cang puei u te na ming u.
Pathen haiah na thawlhna yut tih mami kah Bawipa Jesuh te na tangna u ham Judah thlaang oen Gental thlaang khaw avan at la ngaithuenna rep kan peek u poen.
Tahe atah Ciim Muithla kah awl te ka ngaai tih Jerusalem la ka cet ai, te ah te ka sawah n'tu thaihu aka thoeng ai tite ka ming nawh.
Ka phana boeih khaaw roekk ah Ciim Muithla lawng ah ngaithuenna m'peek tih thongtlaak oen raina lawng kai he n'ring khuep ti bueng he ni ka ming.

Tede ka hingna he n'tu la khaw ka ngaai mai nawh; kai ham avan thloem bii oen ah kai lawng sai hamla Bawipa Jesuh lawng m'peek bii te coeng ham bueng ni ka ngaih. Te tah Pathen kah lungvatna kawng Awlthang Theen phawng ham he ni.
Kai lawngah nangmi boeih te khok kan hiil tih Pathen ram kawng te kavan thui u. Tede tahe kalawng tah a-u khat lawngkhaw kai he koep nan hu u tlaih manawh tite ka ming.
Tedawngah tihin nangmi tengah ataktang kavan thui; nangmi timkah pakhat khat khaw na ha-ata u mai atah ka sawah tla boel seh.
Metihtiah Pathen kah a kamthlahna te thuh phah muehla apum boeih la nangmi tengah biit kavan thui poen.

Tedawngah namah oen namah te ngaithuen u langtah nangmi lawng na doen hamla Ciim Muithla lawng m'peek tuu thli te doen-acaang u lah. Pathen lawng amah Capa duekna rang oen amah koe la a khueh Pathen Khrihcabu tuudoen la te awm u lah.
Kai ka ceh coeng atah nangmi tim ah metaang tluung thli te law u vetih ahimi lawng tuuca thli te a sa sueng sak manawh tite ka ming.
Namami tim kah thlaang khatsut lawngah oengca thli te amami ben la mawt ham a ngaih dawngah hoem awl a thuina atue te a pha ai.
Tedawngah ngaithuen uh, kum thum khui puet ah khawyiin khawdaai mikphi oen kan cang puei u te hilh u boel.

Tahe tah nangmi he Pathen kah doencangna oen amah kah lungvatna awlthang khuiah kan peek u poen, te lawngah nangmi te n'roeng sak vetih amah kah thlaang boeih hamla a toen oepsoeh yotheen kam-awmna te m'peek ai.
Kai lawngah a-u kah sui khaw, ngun khaw, hinaak himbai khaw ka naai nawh.
Ka paya laikoei thli oen kamah kah ngoe ngaihna boeih te dang hamla kamah lawng ka kut oen bii ka bi te nangmi lawng na ming u.

Mami lawng voetna aka awm thlaang thli te bawmcemna ham bii te bi ham awm tite soeprep boeih ah kan huh sak poen. Bawipa Jesuh amah lawng, ‘Dangna lak ah peekna he yo-akam awm ngaai’ tila a thui awl te hilh u boel.” a tina.
Pawl lawng awl a thui coeng atah ahimi oen haih khuklu oen cuengkueng u tih thangthui u.
Ahimi boeih lawng rap u tih Pawl te khak a kawp u, a mok u tih sadingla cet ne, a tina u.
Pawl lawng ahimi nala te, ‘Kai he koep nan hu u tlaih manawh’ a tina dawngah a kaw the u. Tecoeng atah Pawl te tuisangphaw a awmna la a thak u.

Kaimi lawngkhaw ahimi nala te sadingla awm uh ka tina coeng atah ka cet u. Tuisangphaw oen phaat ka cet u tih Kos tuisanglak te ka pha u; avuen hin atah Rodis tuisanglak ka pha u; te kalawng Patara la ka cet u.
Te ah te Fonicia la aka cet tuisangphaw pakhat ka huh u tih te oen ah te ka cet u.
Saipras tuisanglak a tuengna huen te ka pha u atah adang ben kalawng ka reel u tih Siria la te ka cet u. Turon khaaw atah lan la ka rum u, te ah te tuisangphaw dawngah thaihu a phueih te a sat u.
Te ah te oengca thli thlaang khatsut ka huh u tih ahimi tengah hin rih ka awm u. Pawl te Jerusalem la ceh nawh hamla ahimi lawng Muithla kah huham tharana oen a thui pe u.
Tede ahimi tengah khawhin hih rih ka awm u coeng atah ka cet u. Ahimi boeih oen a yu a ca thli lawng khawpui adauben tuikeeng toe la n'thak u, te ah te khuklu oen ka cuengkueng u tih ka thangthui u.
Tecoeng atah khat oen khat kut ka tuuk u coeng atah kaimi tah tuisangphaw dawng ka luui u, ahimi tah im la koep meel u.
Turon kalawng ka cet u tih Tolimas te ka pha u. Te ah te oengca thli oen ka voem ka toei u tih ahimi tengah hin at ka cam u.
Avuen khawhin ah ka cet u tih Sisaria khaaw te ka pha u. Te ah te, Jerusalem ah bawmkung la a tuek u thlaang pasarih khuiah aka thuum van awlthang phawngkung Filip im ah ka pah u.
Ahih lawng Pathen awl aka phawng a canu hulaa palii a khueh.
Te ah te asanhlang ka cam u coengah Akabas aka miingna tawngha te Judia ram kalawng avan pha.

Ahih te kaimi tengla law tih Pawl kah cihin te a lawh, a kut oen a khow te a piin tih, “Ciim Muithla lawng tila avan thui: He kah cihin khuehkung he Jerusalem ah Judah thlaang thli lawng he tila a piin vetih Gental thlaang thli kut ah a peek ai.” tila a thui.
He awl he kaimi lawng ka yaak u veng atah kaimi oen te kah aka awm thlaangtloe hue lawng Jerusalem la ceh nawh ham Pawl te ka thlawh u.

Tede ahih lawng, “Me tih na ti u, he tila na rah u he ka thin navan hoepp sak u! Jerusalem ah piin ayeen ham bueng oepsoehla ka awm nawh, te ah te Bawipa Jesuh kawngah duek ham pateng khaw oepsoehla ka awm poen.” a tina.
Kaimi lawng ahih te ka thlawh u thai tlaih nawh, ka toeng u tih, “Bawipa kawngaih hawn seh.” ka tina u.
Te ah te kawlkalh ka cam u coeng atah kamami kah thaihu te ka roek ka bah u tih Jerusalem la te ka cet u.

Sisaria khaaw kah hubang thli khatsut khaw kaimi oen ka cet haih u tih kaimi lawng ka pahna koei Manason im la te n'ceh puei u. Ahih tah Saipras khaaw kah thlaang, acuekca kalawng oengca la aka awm poen ni.
Jerusalem la te kaimi ka pha u atah oengca thli lawng awmngaihcala n'do u.
Avuen atah Jeem te huh hamla Pawl oen kaimi haih ka cet u; Khrihcabu ahaamca boeih khaw te ah te awm u.
Pawl lawng ahimi te kut a tuuk tih amah kah biibina rang oen Gental thlaang tim ah Pathen lawng a sai thaihu boeih te biit a thui pe

Ahih awl te a hutung u coeng atah ahimi boeih lawng Pathen te a thangpawm u. Tecoengah ahimi lawng, “Maya Pawl, Judah thlaangphun toeklek nawh oengca la awm u poen tih ahimi lawng Phungawl a thintlawhna mangkhak te na ming poen.

Gental ram ah aka awm Judah thlaang boeih te Mosi kah Phungawl te hoett hamla, a ca thli te yahhuivuen reet nawh ham khaw, Judah phung alam te khaw vai tlaih nawh hamla nang lawng na cang puei tila ahimi lawng a thui u.
He la nang navan pha khaw a ming u poen cawini. Te tih atah me tih ni n'ti u lah ai?
Kaimi lawngtah he tila na sai ham ka ngaih u. He ah he awlkamna aka sai thlaang palii awm.

Ahimi he ceh puei langtah bokna benkah ciimcaihna siing te sai puei van, nang lawngah tangka te kawnn peh, te atah ahimi lawng a luu te a vawkk bling thai ai. He tila na sai atah ahimi lawng nang kawng a thui u te atak tang nawh ni tila thlaang boeih lawng a ming u vetih namah khaw Mosi kah Phung awl angla ni khaw a sak van tite a ming u ai.

Tede oengca la aka awm Gental thlaang thli ham tah ahimi lawng kutsaimuei bokna ah a nawn u khatsut caak awkk te caak nawh ham, sathi caak nawh ham, ramsa rawn khak sa te caak nawh ham, ahimi lawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna te kuemsuem hamla mami kah awl tloekna ca te ahimi tengah m'pat pe u poen.” a tina u.

Tedawngah avuen atah te kah thlaang thli te Pawl lawng a ceh puei tih ahimi oen bokna siing angla ciimcaihna te a sai u. Tecoengah Pawl te Tempal bok-im la cet tih ciimcaihna atue atang he aboet toe ah khawhin meyoeh a awm ai, ahimi pakhat rip ham luciik nawnna atue te mevengah n'sai ai tite oepsoehla a thui pe.
Tede khawhin hin rih te aboet tawm veng atah Asia ram kalawng aka law Judah thlaang thli lawng Tempal bok-im khuiah Pawl te a huh u. Ahimi lawngah thlaangping te a ceemtuh u tih Pawl te a tuuk u.

Ahimi lawngah, “Israel thlaang thli, n'bawm u lah! Ahih he khaaw tawm ah cet tih Israel thlaang thli khaw, Mosi kah Phungawl oen Tempal bok-im he khaw Oelhtaih hamla thlaang boeih te a cang puei. Tecoengah tahe ah Gental thlaang khatsut te Tempal bok-im khuila avan law puei tih he huen ciim he a hok a aih” tila paang u.
(Efesa khaaw kah Trofimas oen Pawl te khawpui khuiah a huh haih u tih Pawl lawng ahih te Tempal bok-im khuila avan law puei tila a poek u dawngah te tila paang u.)
Khawpui pum te tokcaliik la tho u, thlaang boeih lawng heeng u, Pawl te a tuuk u tih Tempal bok-im adaubenla aathamala a mawt u. Tempal bok-im thawhka te pahoei a khaih u.
Tokcaliik la aka tho thlaangping lawng Pawl te ngawn ham kamthlah u, Jerusalem khawpui pum ah cumplaam la tho khuengdeng u poen tite Rom raalbawipa lawng a yaak.
Raalbawipa lawng raalkap bawi oen raalkap thli oen ah aathamala pahoei cet u. Thlaangping lawng raal bawipa oen raalkap thli te a huh u vengah Pawl a bawh u te a toeng u.
Raalbawipa te Pawl tengla cet, a tuuk tih thiirui pahih oen a khih sak. Tecoengah ahih lawng, “He kah thlaang he a-u, n'tu thawlhna a sai?” tila a doet u.

Thlaangping khatsut lawng atloela paang u tih, khatsut lawng athloekla paang u van. Thlaangping kah paang awl dawngah awlpuungna taktak te Raalbawipa lawng a ming thai nawh dawngah Pawl te raaltoetna vawngup khuila khuen hamla raalkap thli te awl a peek.
Thlakkung te a pha tawm u atah thlaangping te tlungsa soeh aih tih raalkap thli lawng Pawl te a pawm hang u.
Thlaangping lawng a hu ah avan vai u tih, “Ngawn uh.” tila te ruek paang u.
Raalkap thli lawng Pawl te raaltoetna vawngup khuila a khuen tawm u atah Raalbawipa nala te, “Na tengah awl ka thui thai ai aw?” a tina. Raalbawipa lawngah, “Krik awl na cal thai aw?” a tina tih,
“Tetih atah n'hu vengah thlaang thonglii awva oen ceem la a thawh puei tih ramhum rammawl la aka ceh puei Iyipt thlaang te nang nawh macawi?” a tina.
Pawl lawng awl a thung pe tih, “Kai tah Judah thlaang ni, Cilicia ram, Tarsas khawpui miing thaang kah thlaang ni. Reenna oen thlaangping tengah awl n'thui sak lah.” a tina.

Raalbawipa lawng awl a thui sak. Te atah Pawl te thlakk dawng pai tih thlaangping te sap duem ham a kut oen noekna a peek. Thlaangping lawng awl a phah sap u coeng atah ahimi tengah Hebru awl la Pawl lawng awl a thui pe.
“Maya manau thli oen a pa hue, nangmi haiah kamah ka phungtuna awl he hutung u lah!” a tina.
Ahimi tengah Hebru awl la a thui pe te a yaak u vengah awl a phah dingri u; Pawl lawngah:

“Kai he Cilicia ram Tarsas khaaw kah Judah thlaang ni, tede, Jerusalem ah he ka roeng hang tih Gamaliel kah sengcamoe la ka awm. Kai lawng mami patuer hue kah Phungawl oen thuituen-na te ka dang tih tihin ah he kah aka awm nangmi boeih angla Pathen tengah ka tlungmu van.
Kai lawngah he kah lawngpui aka vai thlaang thli te ka heem ka tek tih ka ngawn. Kai lawng hutaa khaw tawngpa khaw ka tuuk tih thong ah ka thlaak.

Kai lawng awltak ka thui tite Khawsoeih Bawi oen awlcekna Khonsil ah aka thuum boeih aka mingkung sausi la awm. Ahimi lawngah Damaskas khaw kah Judah thlaang thli tengah a thut pe u ca te khaw kai lawng ka lawh, tecoeng atah te kah thlaang thli te tuuk hamla, ahimi te thiirui oen khih tih dan tat ham Jerusalem la koep van khuen hamla te ka cet.” a tina.
Damaskas khaaw la ka cet tih ka pha tawm veng hingthun ah te vaan kah aangna pakhat lawng n'thue ploeng tih ka teng ka vaai te aang rawngtheng.
Dilai ah ka tlim tih awl pakhat lawng, ‘Sawl, Sawl! N'tu ah kai he nan heem nan tek aih?’ tila a thui awl te ka yaak.
Kai lawngah, ‘Bawipa, nang te a-u?’ ka tina. Ahih lawngah, ‘Kai tah nang lawng nan heem nan tek Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh ni’ tila avan thui.
Kai oen ka cet haih thlaang thli lawng aangna te a huh u de ka tengah awl aka thuikung kah awl te tah ya u nawh.

Tevengah kai lawng, ‘N'tu ka sai ai, Bawipa!’ tila ka doet tih Bawipa lawngah, ‘Tho langtah Damaskas la cet, te ah te nang lawng na sai ham koei Pathen lawng avan khueh thaihu boeih te avan thui ai.’ tila avan thui.
Te kah aangna lawng ka mik avan tueng sak tlaih nawh dawngah ka cet haih ka puei thli lawng Damaskas khaaw la te a kut oen m'mawt u.
Te khawpui khuiah Ananias aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm, ahih tah bokna ben ah tlungmu tih mami kah Phungawl te a vai, te ah aka awm Judah thlaang boeih lawng a hinyah tangkiik u.
Ahih te law tih ka tengah pai, ‘Ka manau Sawl, na mik tueng loeih seh!’ n'tina. Teveng roe te ah ka mik tueng pahoei tih ahih te ka huh.
Ahih lawng, ‘Mami patuer hue kah Pathen lawng amah kawngaih te ming hamla amah kah aka doeng tuihyoeihthlaang te huh sak ham oen ah amah awl roe oen a thui awl te yaak hamla nang he n'tuek poen.
Metihtiah nang lawng na huh tih na yaak boeih te thlaang boeih tengah thui hamla nang he a hih ham aka mingkung sausi la na awm ai.
Tahe ah n'tu na ring khiing? Tho langtah baptisma te dang loeih, amah tengah thangthuina rang oen na thawlhna boeih te sil loeih’ tila avan thui.
“Jerusalem la te koep ka cet tih Tempal bok-im khuiah ka thangthui vengah huhthlaam pakhat ka huh,

te kah huhthlaam dawngah Bawipa te ka huh tih ahih lawngah, ‘He kah aka awm thlaang thli lawng kai kah kawng alam na thui he a do u nawh dawngah Jerusalem he ceh taak loeih, uelh tlaih boel.’ tila avan thui.
Tevengah kai lawng, ‘Bawipa, Sinakok boeih ah ka cet tih nang aka tangna thlaang thli te ka tuuk tih ka bawh te ahimi lawng atheenla a ming u.
Tecoengah nang kah sausi la aka awm Stefen te a ngawn u vengah te kamah khaw ka awm, ahih te ngawn ham ka ngaih puei van tih ahih aka ngawnkung thli kah hi-acuu te ka khoem pe.’ ka tina.
Bawipa lawngah, ‘Cet loeih, athla hlang la aka awm Gental thlaang thli tengla nang he kan tuih ai.’ n'tina” tila a thui pe.
He toe ah Pawl lawng awl a thui te tah thlaangping lawng a hutung u de, tecoeng atah awl a huer u tare tih, “Te kah thlaang te thip uh! Ngawn loeih! Ahih te hing paa nawh ni!” tila paang u.
Ahimi lawngah paang u, a him-bai thli te a thlek u tih laidiik te vaan la a heh u.
Judah thlaang thli lawng paang u tih a oel khaklal u te ming ham ah ahih te raaltoetna vawngup la khuen ham oen ah cungpoelh oen tam hamla a raalkap thli te awl a peek.

Tede ahih te cungpoelh oen bawh hamla ahimi lawng a piin u vengah te Pawl lawng te kah aka pai raalkapbawi nala te, “Rom thlaang pakhat he awl na cek thlan ah na bawh praap he upadi phung poen aw?” a tina.
He awl he raalkapbawi lawng a yaak vengah raalbawipa tengla cet tih, “Ahih he Rom thlaang ni! Metila ka sai ai na ti?” tila a doet.
Te atah raalbawipa lawng Pawl tengla cet tih a doet, “Nang he Rom thlaang aw? Van thui lah.” a tina. Pawl lawngah, “Oeih, kai tah Rom thlaang ni” a tina.
Raalbawipa lawng, “Kai lawngtah tangka ka peek tih Rom thlaang la ka coengg” a tina. Pawl lawngah, “Kai tah Rom thlaang roe la ka thang” a tina.
Tevengah Pawl te awl ka doet ai aka ti thlaang thli te pahoei nawng u; Pawl he Rom thlaang ni tite raalbawipa lawng a ming vengah thiirui oen a khih hau te caalla lakueng.

Judah thlaang thli lawng Pawl he thawlh a peel u te acek aneh la raalbawipa lawng ming ham a ngaih; tedawngah avuen hin atah Pawl a piinna thiirui te a thlam pe, khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli te ngawlh tun ham awl a peek. Tecoeng atah Pawl te ahimi haiah a pai sak.

Pawl lawng Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli te a bueh rangpatang tih, “Ka puei, Israel thlaang thli! Kai tah tahe toe ah khaw ka sakna dawngah athe atheen mingna thinkaw he Pathen haiah ciim.” a tina.
Khawsoeih bawi Ananias lawng Pawl tengah aka pai thlaang thli nala te, ‘Pawl te a kaa ah bel pingmal uh,’ a tina.

Tevengah Pawl lawng ahih nala te, “Nang, abawk vuut vawngpui, Pathen lawng namah te m'bel malcal seh! Nang lawngah kai he Phungawl angla awl cek hamla te ah te na ngawl van de kai he bel hamla awl na peek dawngah Phungawl te na phe poen!” a tina.
Pawl tengah aka pai thlaang thli lawng ah te, “Nang lawngah Pathen kah Khawsoeih Bawi na sal na phaam!” a tina u.
Pawl lawng, “Ka puei, Israel thlaang thli, ahih he Khawsoeih Bawi ni tite ka ming nawh dawngah ni. Caciim lawngah, ‘Na thlaang phun ukkung te athela thui boel,’ tila a thui ta” a tina.

Te kah thlaangvaang te Sadusi thlaang tih thlaang vaang te tah Farasi thlaang ni tite Pawl lawng a huh vengah awlcekna Khonsil ah te paang tih, “Ka puei, Israel thli, Kai he Farasi thlaang pakhat ni, Farasi thlaang thli kah capa ni. Thlaang duek thli tho koep ai tite ngaiuepna ka khueh dawngah ni he ah he awl n'khee u.” tila a thui.
He tila a thui coeng khoeng atah Farasi thlaang thli oen Sadusi thli te awl puung u tih pahih la pek u.

(Sadusi thlaang thli lawngtah thlaang duek thli he koep tho tlaih nawh tih vanthlaang khaw, muithla khaw awm nawh tila a thui u; tede Farasi thlaang thli lawngtah te ang thli boeih te awm tangtang tila a tangna u.)

Ahimi kah awlpuungna awl te san tare hang tih Farasi thlaang timkah cangpueikung khatsut te pai u tih: “He kah thlaang dawngah he a thawlhna khat khaw ka hu u nawh! Muithla pakhat lawngkhaw, vanthlaang lawngkhaw a thui pe thai mai ta” tila a oelh khaklal u.

Awlpuungna te solaan tare hang tih Pawl te petpet a doek u hau mai ai ti tih lakueng u. Tedawngah raalkap thli te thlaangping tengla a tuih tih, ‘Pawl te ceh puei u langtah raaltoetna vawngup la khuen uh’ a tina.
Te kah khawyiin ah te Bawipa tah Pawl tengah pai tih, “Rih boel! Jerusalem ah he kai ham sausi la na pai angla Rom khawpui ah khaw he tila na pai hun ai.” a tina.
Avuen mincang atah Judah thlaang khatsut te tun huh u tih, khaw a khaan u. Ahimi lawngah Pawl te ngawn thlan roekk atah caak awkk khaw caak nawh hamla awl a taap u.
He tila khaw aka khaan thlaang thli te sawmlii thlai awm u.

Tecoengah ahimi lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang ahaamca thli tengla cet u tih, “Kaimi lawng Pawl he ka ngawn u thlan khui roekk tah thaihu khat khaw caak nawh ham athe ka phoei u tih awl ka taap u poen.

Tedawngah nangmi oen Khonsil ahaamca thli lawng ahih kawng te acek aneh la doet tare ham aka ngaih angla te sa u langtah nangmi tengah Pawl te avan khuen u thai ham Rom raalbawipa te yaak sak uh. He la he avan pha thlan ah ngawn hamla oepsoehla ka awm u ai” tila a thui pe u.
Tede Pawl ngannu kah a capa lawng te tila a teeng u kawng te a yaak; raaltoetna vawngup la cet tih Pawl tengah a thui pe.
Tecoengah Pawl lawng raalbawi pakhat te a khue tih, “Raalbawipa tengla cadawng he cet puei, pakhat khat thui pe ham a khueh cawini” a tina.
Raalbawi lawng ahih te raalbawipa tengla a ceh puei tih, “Thongtla Pawl lawng, ‘he kah cadawng lawng he nang tengah awl thui ham a khueh, ceh puei,’ a ti dawngah kavan law puei” a tina.
Raalbawipa lawng a kut ah a mawt tih atloela a ceh puei, “Kai tengah n'tu awl thui ham na khueh?” a tina.

Ahih lawngah, “Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli lawng, Pawl kawng he acek aneh la ming heet ham aka ngaih angla te sa u silang Pawl te Khonsil ah van khuen thuk ham thangvuen ah bih hamla Judah aana khuehkung thli a kaw vai u poen.

Ahimi awl te ngaai pe boel; metihtiah thlaang sawmlii thlai lawng thuh u tih ahih te a mah u. Ahimi lawng Pawl te a ngawn thlan khui caak awkk khaw caak nawh ham awl a taap u poen. Ahimi lawng sai hamla oepsoehla awm u poen tih nang kah awl ni doek a lamtoen u poen” a tina.
Raalbawipa lawng, “Ka tengah navan thui he a-u khat tengah khaw thui boel.” a tina tih cadawng te koep a tuih.

Tecoengah raalbawipa lawng raalkapbawi pahih te a khue tih, “Raalkap yahnih, marang raalkap sawmsarih, cai aka pawm raalkap yahnih te khue langtah n'tu yiin khawnoek pakua ah Sisaria la ceh ham kamthlah oepsoeh uh.
Pawl lawng a cit ham marang pakhat ah roekbah pe langtah ram ukbawi Filik tengla ading asuekla pha sak uh” a tina.
Tecoengah raalbawipa lawng adangkah angla ca a thut tih a pat:
“Klaudias Lisias lawng Hinyah koei ram ukbawi Filip tengah ca kavan pat:
Judah thlaang thli lawng he kah thlaang he a tuuk u tih a ngawn dalh u. Ahih he Rom thlaang ni tila ka ming u dawngah raalkap thli oen ka cet u tih ka thlawn u.
Ahimi lawng thawlh a peel u te ming ham ka ngaih tih amami kah awlcekna Khonsil la ka ceh puei.
Ahih lawngah duekna koei oen thongtlaakna koei khat khaw sai nawh tite ka huh; ahih he thawlh a peel u tah amami kah phungawl kawng alam ni.
Ahih he ngawn hamla a teeng u tite ka yaak vengah, nang tengah tuih pahoei ham ka poek. Ahih he taya aka cawi hue te nang tengah taya cawi ham ka thui pe poen. Na sa ding seh.” tila a thut pe.
Raalkap thli lawng a thui pe angla te a sai u. Ahimi lawngah te yiin ah te Antipatris toela Pawl te a ceh puei u.
Avuen hin atah cai aka pawm raalkap thli oen raalkap yahnih te tah raaltoetna vawng up la meel u tih marangcit raalkap thli lawng Pawl te poe a ceh puei u.
Ahimi lawngah Sisaria te a pha u atah ram ukbawi te ca a peek u tih ahih kut ah Pawl te a tloeng pe u.
Ram ukbawi lawng ca te a tae coeng atah Pawl nala te, ‘Nang he ame ram kah’ tila a doet. Cilicia ram kah thlaang ni tite a ming coeng atah,

Ahih lawngah, “Nang te taya aka cawikung thli avan pha u vengah nang kah lumlai he kavan thui badai” a tina. Tecoengah Pawl te ram ukbawi amah kah yungimpui ah khueh tih raalkap thli lawng toet hamla awl a peek.

Khawhin hin ngaa a awm coeng atah Khawsoeih Bawi Ananias tah Judah thlaang khatsut hue oen thlaangcal Tertullas oen haih Sisaria la cet u. Ahimi te ram ukbawi Filik tengla cet u tih Pawl te taya a cawi u.

Pawl te a khue u tih thlaangcal Tertullas lawng adangkah angla thawlhpeelna te a thui: “Hinyah koei ram ukbawi! Nang lawngah cuihna oen nan mawt u dawngah roeproeina asanhlang la awm tih ram theenna ham ah tlaih pan ham angoena boeih te na tlaih poen.
Ame huen ah khaw te tila na sai dawngah kaimi ka awmngaih tih kan uem u tangkiik.
Nang kah atue atang te asan-hlang hawna ham ka ngaih nawh, tede atoila ka thui he na hutung hamla reenna kavan bih.
Kaimi lawng he kah thlaang he thlaang teekyaakkung la ka huh u: ahih lawng he dilai pum kah Judah thlaang thli tengah awlpuungna a sai tih Nazarin bu kah mawtkung la awm,
Tempal bok-im khaw hok-aih hamla a yawm vengah te ka tuuk u. (Kaimi lawng kamami kah Phungawl angla awl cek ham ka kamthlah u,
tede raalbawipa Lisias law tih ahih he kaimi kut dawngkah a rot.
Tecoengah ahih he taya aka cawikung thli te nang tengla law ham awl a peek.) He kah thlaang he nang lawng awl na doet atah kaimi lawng thawlh ka peel boeih te namah lawng na ming badai.” a tina.
Judah thlaang thli lawng-khaw ruek kawhuui u tih thawlh a peel he asoeng tang tang ni tila a thui u.

Ram ukbawi lawng Pawl te awl thui ham noekna a peek tih Pawl lawngah, “Nang tah he thlaangphun sawah kum san hlang awlcekkung la na awm poen tite ka ming, kamah phungtuna awl he na haiah nan thui sak dawngah ka awmngaih.
Jerusalem la Pathen bok ham ka cet, hin ha thlaihih pateng awm nawh hun tite nang lawng na ming thai ai.

Tempal bok-im khuiah thlaang pakhat khat oen ka tawh ka thaam u khaw, khawpui khui ame ang huen ah khaw, Sinakok bok-im khuiah khaw, kai lawng thlaangping ka ceemtuh tite Judah thlaang thli lawng hu manawh.
Tahe ah ahimi lawng ka sawah thawlhpeelna he asoengna tangtang te nang tengah van thui u tang manawh.

Ka sai tangtang tila nang tengah ka thui tah he ni: Ahimi lawng soeng nawh a ti u, Lawngpui te ka vai tih kamami patuer hue kah Pathen te ka bok. Tede kai lawngkhaw Mosi kah Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cabu dawng a thut boeih te ka tangna. Thlaangthe khaw, thlaang theen khaw, duekna kalawng tho koep ai tite ahimi angla kai lawngkhaw ka ngaiuep van.
Ahimi lawngah thlaang boeih he thlaangdoeng oen thlaangthawlh khaw duekna kalawng tho ai tila Pathen ah ngaiuepna a khueh u te ang van ni kai lawngkhaw ka khueh van.
Tedawngah Pathen oen thlaanghing haiah athetheen mingna kawpoek ciim khueh hamla ka sai thai khui tah ka sai poepa.
Kum san hlang Jerusalem kalawng athlana la awm coengah ka thlaangphun thli hamla tangka thak ham, luciik nawn hamla te la te ka cet.

Bokna siing angla ciimcaihna te ka sai boet coengah Tempal bok-im khuiah luciik thawthuengna ka sai vengah kai he ahimi lawng n'huh u. Tevengah te ka tengah thlaangping khaw awm nawh, awlpuungna khaw awm nawh.
Tede, te ah te Asia ram kalawng aka law Judah thlaang khatsut tah awm; ahimi lawng kai he oelhtaih ham a ngaih u atah tayacawi hamla amami man nang tengah a law u ham awm de ta.
Tetih atah he kah aka awm thlaang hue lawngah Khonsil ahaamca thli haiah ka pai vengah kai lawng ka sai thawlh a huh u te van thui u seh.

Kai lawng ahimi haiah ka pai vengah: ‘Thlaangduek thli he tho koep ai tila ka tangna dawngah tihin ah nangmi lawng taya nan cawi u he.’ tila ka thui pakhat bueng he nawh atah atloe a awm atah van thui u seh.” a tina.
Filik lawngtah lawngpui a ti u te a ming heet dawngah awl thuina te a toeng sak tih, ahimi nala, ‘Raalbawipa Lisias avan pha vengah nangmi kah Lumlai he kavan tloek badai.” a tina.
Ahih lawng Pawl aka toet raalkapbawi te ahih he atheenla toet, tede ahoerpoengla awm sak langtah angoe angaih thli te khaw a paya thli lawng pe seh.’ a tina.
Khawhin meyoeh yun nuem a awm coeng atah Filik he a yu Judah nu Drusilla oen va law hih. Ahih lawng Pawl te a khue tih Pawl lawng Jesuh Khrih ah oengna kawng a thui te a hutung hih.

Tede Pawl lawngah theenna kawng, mah oen mah kuemsuemna kawng oen Awlcekna Khawhin a lawna kawng te a thui vengah Filik lawng caalla a rih tih, “Tahe tah cet de ne. Ka hoeng vengah kan khue sak koep badai.” a tina.
Te ah te ahih lawngah Pawl lawng he tangka m'peek ai tila a ngaiuep, tedawngah ni ahih lawng Pawl te a khue sak poepa tih awl a thui puei.
Khaw kum hih a awm coeng atah Filik te Porcias Fitas lawng avan thaw tih ram ukbawi la awm. Filik lawng Judah thlaang thli te a kaw hoe sak ham a ngaih dawngah Pawl te thong khuiah poe a khueh.
Fitas te hin thum a awm coeng atah te ram la te avan pha tih Sisaria kalawng Jerusalem la cet,
te ah te khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang mawtkung thli lawng Pawl thawlh a peelna te a thui u.
Pawl te lawngpueng ah ngawn ham khawkhanna a khueh u dawngah ahih te Jerusalem la khuen pe ham Fitas tengah reenna a bih u.
Fitas lawng, “Pawl he Sisaria thong khuiah awm, kai khaw tela te yue ka meel koep ai.
Namami kah mawtkung thli he kai ka ceh vengah law u selang tah te kah thlaang lawng te thawlhpalhna a sai atah taya cawi u seh” a tina.
Fitas te ahimi tengah khawhin reet nuem, hin ha nuem awm tih tecoengah Sisaria la te cet. Avuen hin atah awlcekna ah ngawl tih Pawl te van law puei uh a tina.
Pawl te avan pha atah Jerusalem kalawng aka law Judah thlaang thli lawng Pawl te a veel khoep u tih thawlh broela a pup u, te tila thawlh a pup u te soeng tang tang tila ahimi lawng thui u thai nawh.
Tecoengah Pawl lawng amah phungtuna awl te a thui: “Kai lawngah Judah thlaang thli kah Phungawl te khaw Tempal bok-im khaw, Rom sengpahrang sangluel sawah khaw thawlhpalhna ka sai nawh.” a tina.
Tede Fitas lawng Judah thlaang thli kah haitheen peek te a ngaih dawngah Pawl nala te, “Jerusalem la cet tih he kah lumlai he ka haiah thui ham na ngaih aw?” a tina.
Tevengah Pawl lawng, “Sengpahrang sangluel kah awlcekna yungim ah ni thui ham ka ngaih. Namah lawng na ming angla Judah thlaang sawah thawlhpalhna ka sai nawh.

Kai lawng phungawl te ka phe tih pakhat khat ka sai dawngah duekna koei dantatna te awm kawinih loeih hamla kavan bih manawh. Tede ahimi kah thawlh peelna he asoeng nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw kai he ahimi kut ah pe thai manawh. Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuu ka khaan ai.” a tina.
Tecoeng atah Fitas lawng amah kah khawkhankung thli oen a doet u coeng atah, “Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuu khaan ham na ngaih dawngah ahih tengla na cet ai.” a tina.
Te kalawng a awm khueng coeng atah Sengpahrang Akrippa oen Berni tah Fitas tengah uemna awl thui pe ham Sisaria la cet hih.
Te ah te khawhin san hlang a awm hih coeng atah Fitas lawng Pawl kawng te sengpahrang tengah a thui pe: “He ah he Filik lawng thong a thlaak pakhat awm,
Jerusalem la ka ceh veng te ah Judah thli kah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang ahaamca thli lawng thawlh a peel u tih ahih te dan tat ham ka tengah avan bih u.

Tede kai lawngah, taya a cawi u thlaang pakhat te taya cawikung thli oen haitang u tih thawlh a peelna boeih dawngah amah oen amah phungtuna awl a thui thlan atah a-u khat khaw thlaang kut ah peek hamla Rom thlaang thli kah phung alam nawh ni ka tina.
Tecoengah he la he ahimi a law u vengah uelh muehla avuen hin ah awlcekna yungim ah ka ngawl tih te thlaang te ka khue sak.
Ahih taya aka cawi hue te pai u tih a thui u, tede ka poekna angla athe arana khat khaw peel u tangtang nawh.
Ahimi boeih lawng awlpuungna a thui he tah amami kah bokna kawng oen aka duek tangte Jesuh aka miingna thlaang kawng te mai ni; tede Pawl lawngtah ahih te hing tila a thui.
He kah awlpuungna kawng he metila awlceet ka yaak thai lah ai tite ka ming nawh, tedawngah Pawl te Jerusalem la cet tih thawlhpeelna thli he te ah te thui sak ham na ngaih aw ka tina.

Tede Pawl lawng ayuu akhaan; ahih lawngah amah te atheenla toet ham oen ah amah kah lumlai te Sengpahrang sangluel lawng awl van tloek seh tila a bih. Tedawngah Sengpahrang sangluel tengla tuih thlantoe ahih te atheenla toet ham awl ka peek.” a tina.
Akrippas lawng Fitas nala te, “Ahih kah awl thui te kamah lawng yaak rep ham ka ngaih a tina. Fitas lawngah, “Thangvuen ah na yaak badai” a tina.

Avuen khawhin atah Akrippa oen Berni tah a bawilen phawlip oen ruep-awm tangkiik la thoekcau u heet tih raalbawi thli oen khawpui khuikah mawtkung ahaamca thli oen ah rangpui tunna impui la te haih kuun u. Fitas lawng awl a thlaw a peek tih Pawl te avan law puei u.

Fitas lawng, “Akrippa Sengpahrang oen he ah aka awm boeih Judah thlaang boeih boeih, he kah aka awm lawngkhaw, Jerusalem ah aka awm lawngkhaw, he kah na huh u thlaang he kai tengah taya a cawi u. Ahimi lawng, ahih he hingpaa nawh ni tila paang u.
Tede ahih lawngah duekna koei dantat ham tangtang a sai khat khaw ka hu nawh. Tede amah lawngah Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuukhaan ham a ngaih tih te la te tuih hamla ka poek poen.

Tede ahih kawng he Sengpahrang sangluel tengah acek aneh la ca thut ham ka khueh nawh. Tedawngah he ah he nangmi boeih oen awlpui la Sengpahrang Akrippa haiah kavan law puei! Ahih kah lumlai he thuikhaan coeng atah cathut koei khat khaw awm ai aw ka ti mai dawngah ni.
Metihtiah thongtla thlaang pakhat taya a cawina akawng alam te atheenla tueng sak ohla tuih ham tah alawng-ala awm nawh.” tila a thui.
Akrippa lawng Pawl nala te, “Namah kawng te na thui thai poen.” a tina. Pawl lawng a kut te a phawh, tecoengah adangkah angla amah oen amah phungtuna awl te a thui:
“Sengpahrang Akrippa! Tihin na haiah, Judah thlaang thli kah thawlh peelna boeih dawngah kamah oen kamah ka phungtu u he yotheen tang poen ni tila ka poek.
He tila ka poek he nang lawngtah Judah thlaang thli kah phung oen awlpuungna te atheenla na ming dawngah ni. Tedawngah lunghoeihla ka awl thui he na hutung ham reenna kavan bih.
Kai he ka camaw veng kalawng metila ka awm ka ih ti he Judah thlaang boeih lawng a ming u. Kai he lamhacuek ah kamah ram khuiah khaw ka sak tih tecoengah Jerusalem ah ka awm te ahimi lawng a ming u.
Ahimi lawng kai he asan hlang m'ming u poen, acuekca veng kalawng kai tah kamami kah bokna ben ah arai koek Farasi thlaang pakhat la ka awm te a ngaih u atah a thui u thai.
Tahe veng awlcek ham he ah ka pai he tah Pathen lawng kamami kah patuer hue tengah awlkamna a sai ngaiuepna te ka khueh van dawngah ni.

Te ngaiuepna te tah kamami thlaangphun paha thlaihih lawng yiin, daai Pathen a bok u vengah dang hamla a ngaiuep u te ni. Hinyah kap Bawipa, te kah ngaiuepna kawngah ni Judah thlaang thli lawng kai he taya n'cawi u!
Pathen lawng thlaangduek a thawh sak ti he he kah aka awm thlaang thli lawng n'tu kawngah tangna ham awm nawh na ti u?
Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh kawng te oelhtaih thai khui tah ka sai ai tila kamah roe lawngah kaw ka poek.

Jerusalem ah te tila te ka sai. Kai lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengkah saithaina aana te ka dang tih Pathen kah thlaang yahawh hlang mai te thong ah ka thlaak; Ahimi te a ngawn u vengah khaw ngawn ham roe la kai lawng ka ngaih puei van.
Sinakok bok-im ah khaw ahimi te dan ka tat sak u tih amami kah oengna te hoett sak hamla ka yawm. Ahimi sawah ka thin sa soeh tih ahimi te heemtek hamla ram tloe kah khawpui toela ka pan.
“Te tila ka kamthlah dawngah khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengkah awlpeekna aana oen Damaskas khaaw la te ka cet.
Hinyah kap Bawipa, te tila hingthuntaang lawngpueng ka ceh vengah, khawmik lak ah aka aang ngaai aangna pakhat lawngah kamah khaw, ka cet haih thlaang thli khaw vaan kalawng n'thue rawngtheng u.

Kaimi boeih te dilai ah ka tlim drek u tih, ‘Sawl, Sawl! N'tu kawngah kai he nan heem nan tek aih ca? Vaitaw taal lawngah amah khuehkung kah cungpoelh te a peh atah a tam doetthloet angla namah oen namah te nganbawh na pe u khoeng’ tila Hebru awl la avan thui te ka yaak.
Kai lawngah, ‘Bawipa, nang te a-u?’ ka tina. Tevengah Bawipa lawng, ‘Kai tah nang kah heem atek Jesuh ni.

Tede tho langtah pai hang lah. Nang he kamah kah tuihyoeihthlaang la khueh ham na tengah ka phumpho. Tihin ah kai nan huh he khaw hailamben kah kan huh sak ham koei te khaw thlaangtloe tengah aka thui ham ni.
Kai lawngah nang he Israel thlaang thli kut dawng kalawng khaw, Gental thlaang tengah khaw kan tuih vetih ahimi kut dawng kalawng khaw kan thlawn ai.

Nang lawng ahimi te a mik na daai sak vetih yiinna kalawng aangna la, Seitan kah tharana khui kalawng Pathen tengla na mang sak ai, te dengah ni ahimi lawng kai he oengna rang oen ah thawlh khawdawp ngaaina te a khueh u vetih Pathen kah thlaangtuek thli tim ah ahuen amawl a dang u van ai’ tila avan thui” a tina.
“Tedawngah, Sengpahrang Akrippa, vaan kah huhthlaam ka huh te ngailaakna muehla ka awm ma-nawh.

Lamhacuek la Damaskas oen Jerusalem ah, tecoengah Judia ram pum oen Gental thlaang boeih tengah ahimi lawng thawlhna te yut u tih Pathen benla a mang u hamla, ahimi lawng a thawlh yutna te tueng sakna thaihu sai hamla ka phawng pe.
He kawng dawngah ni Judah thlaang thli lawng Tempal bok-im ah ka awm vengah te n'tuuk u tih ngawn hamla a yawm u.

Tede tihin toe ah Pathen lawng n'bawm, tedawngah thlaang yitt thlaangbo nangmi boeih haiah he ka pai tih awl ka thui. Tawngha thli oen Mosi lawng a thui oepsoeh aka thoeng ham koei thaihu te ni kai lawng ka thui:

te tah Judah thlaang thli oen Gental thlaang thli tengah thlawnna aangna te phawng hamla, Messiah lawng patang a khang coengah duekna kalawng lamhacuek aka tho koep thlaang la awm ai a ti te ni ka thui.” a tina.
Te tila Pawl te amah oen amah a phungtu u vengah Fitas lawng, “Pawl na cuih taal poen! Cuihna asangsang na cangna lawng ng'ngau sak poen.” a tina.
Pawl lawngah, “Bawipa, ka ngau moenih! Aka soeng awltak ni ka thui.

Sengpahrang Akrippa! Nang lawng he kah thaihu kawng he na ming dawngah ni na tengah tong-aa ohla ka thui. He tah ahuep ahel, akel acawng ah aka thoeng thaihu nawh tih he ang thli boeih he nang lawng na ming tangte poen ni tite ka tangna.
Sengpahrang Akrippa, tawngha thli kah ca thut te na tangna aw? Nang lawng na tangna tite ka ming!” a tina.
Akrippa lawng Pawl nala te, “Kai he atue soetca khuiah khrihca la ka coengg sak thai ai tila na poek aw?” a tina.

Pawl lawngah, “Atue soetca ah khaw, asan hlang ah khaw, he kah thiirui he tah thui muehla nang oen tihin ah ka awlthui aka hutung nangmi boeih he kai angla awm van ham Pathen tengah ka thangthui!” a tina.
Tecoeng atah sengpahrang khaw, ram ukbawi khaw, Berni oen atloe boeih te tho u tih,
a ceh u coeng atah ahimi khat oen khat lawngah, “He kah thlaang lawng he duekna koei oen thongtlaakna koei khat khaw sai nawh de ni.” tila a thui u.
Te atah Akrippa lawng Fitas nala, “Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuukhaan nawh kawinih he thlaang he thlah hamla awm de ni.” a tina.

Kaimi he Itali ram la tuisangphaw oen ceh ham awl a khueng u coeng atah, “Sengpahrang sangluel kah Raalkapbu” a ti u Rom raalkapbu kah raalbawi Julias kut ah Pawl oen atloe thongtla khat sut te a peek u.

Asia ram kah tuisangphaw duemdawngna roekk ah aka cet tawm Adramitiam khaaw kah tuisangphaw pakhat dawngah ka luui u tih te oen ah ka cet u. Macidonia ram Tesalon khaaw kah Aristarkas khaw kaimi oen haih ka cet u.
Avuen atah Sidon ka pha u. Julias lawng Pawl te a reen dawngah a paya thli tengla a ceh sak tih angoe te avan peek u.
Te kalawng kaimi ka cet u de khawthlii lawng n'haang khoep u dawngah yilh uepna ben Saipras tuisanglak ben ka lawng ka cet u.
Tecoengah Cilicia oen Pamfilia ayaawnna tuueng tuitunlii ah te ka law u phai tih Licia peng kah Mira khaaw te ka pha u.
Te ah te Alekzandria kalawng aka law Itali ram la aka cet ham koei tuisangphaw pakhat te raalbawi lawng a huh tih te dawngah te n'luui sak u.

Khawhin sanhlang ahiing ayaaila ka cet u tih aboetna atah ahar abat la Nidas khaaw te ka pha u. Te ben kalawng ah ceh hamla yilh lawng m'maam khoep u tih yilh uepna ben Krit tuisanglak ben kalawng ka cet u tih Salmon Ngocou tengah te poet ka cet u.
Tuikeeng ah te poe ka cet u tih Tuisangphaw duemna Huen theen a ti u te ahar abat la ka pha u. Te tah Lasea khawpui kalawng thla aih tlaih nawh.
Te ah te asan hlang ka cam u tih Thawlh thlamna Khawhin khaw athloei poen dawngah tuisangphaw oen khawlawng thla ceh ham arih awm poen. Tedawngah Pawl lawng ahimi te ngaithuenna awl a thui pe:
“Nangmi u, he kalawng ah mami khawlawng ceh he arih ham awm tangkiik tila ka huh; thaihu thaiha khaw, tuisangphaw khaw, hingna toe khaw sungduehna awm khuengdeng ai.” a tina.
Tede raalbawi lawng tuisangphaw kungmah oen aka mongkung kah awl te a ngaai tih Pawl kah awlthui tah tula khaw toeh pe nawh.

Te kah tuisangphaw duemna huen te sikding khui puet ah awm ham theen nawh; tedawngah thlaang yahawh lawngah a coeng thai atah Finik la te cet ngala tih te ah te sikding khui puet awm ham a ngaih u. Finik he tah Krit tuisanglak kah tuisangphaw duemna huen la awm tih khawtlaak akakk ben oen khawtlaak aluen ben la te maang.
Akakk ben kalawng yilh te hiip hiip law tih amami kah kamthlahna angla coeng thai ai a ti u dawngah thiilungdue te a doek u tih Krit tuisanglak te ayoeii rep la poe ka hawng u tih ka cet u.
Tede raih a awm coeng atah, “Khawcuuk Aluen ben khawthlii” a ti u te tuisanglak ben kalawng ah thlii khuengdeng.
Tuisangphaw te khawthlii lawng avan haang tih khawthlii tim ah tuisangphaw te hoei tloel la awm poen, tedawngah ka thlah sut u tih khawthlii lawng a yawng aroeh mai poen.
Kauda tuisanglak ayiitca akaak ben te ka pha u atah khawthlii te avan oel tih hoeikhang. Te ah te tuisangphaw dawngkah lowng te ahar abat la ka soem ka sai u.

Ahimi lawngah lowng te ahanla a thooeng u coeng atah tuisangphaw dawngah rui oen a ven haih tih rap a piin u. Libia tuikeeng tuidang kah divin langdai te a tawh moek hau ai a ti u dawngah baiyaan te a doek u tih tuisangphaw te khawthlii lawng a khuenna roekk ah a ceh sak u.
Thlipui te a thawh toengtoeng dawngah avuen atah tuisangphaw dawngkah thaihu te thoem a voeih u.
Athum hin atah tuisangphaw dawngkah a hawna pawmcunghaiha thli te khaw thoem a voeih u.
Khawhin sanhlang khawmik khaw, aisi thli khaw, ka hu u tlaih nawh, khawthlii te duem nawh tih atlawhla thlii toengtoeng. Aboetna atah ka deem u hun ai tila ka ngaiuep u tlaih nawh poen.

Te kah thlaang thli te caak awkk khaw caak mueh la asanhlang a awm khiing u poen dawngah Pawl lawng ahimi nala te, “Nangmi u, ka awl thui te nangmi lawng navan ngaai u kawinih Krit tuisanglak kalawng ah te n'cet u nawh vetih he tila sung adeuhna oen arai asa he n'tawng u nawh sui.
Tede tahe ah na kaw boet sak u boel! Nangmi khuikah a-u khat khaw ha-ata manawh; tuisangphaw bueng ni n'sung ai.
Metihtiah n'thlem yiin ah kai he a thlaang la khuehkung, kai lawng ka bok Pathen kah vanthlaang te ka tengla law tih,
‘Pawl, lakueng boel! Sengpahrang sangluel haiah na pai ngaikhoek ai. Pathen he na sawah atheen dawngah nang oen aka cet haih thlaang boeih kah hingna te a thlung poen’ tila avan thui.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng na kaw boet sak u boel! Metihtiah kai tah Pathen te ka uepna khak tih a thui angla te coengg ngai ai.
Tede tuisanglak pakhat khat kah tuikeeng ah ngoen tah n'khoe ngai badai” a tina.

Hin ha thlailiina yiin atah kaimi te Meditarenian tuitunlii yunyan ah thlipui lawng n'yawng u. Yiinthuem tang yun atah tuisangphaw dawngkah biibikung thli lawng lan benla voehvoeh yoeii poen tite a ming u.

Tedawngah ahimi lawng tuitahna dawngah thaihu rih te a baang u tih a thlaak thuk vengah tuilii te pe yakhat pakul dung tila a ming u; a awm bawt coengah ahimi lawng a tah koep u vengah pe sawmkua dung tila a ming u.
Tuisangphaw lawng lungsong a sut hau ai a ti u dawngah tuisangphaw kah ahu ben kalawng thiilungdue palii te a thlaak thuk u tih thangthuina oen khawthaih ka ring u.

Te vengah te tuisangphaw dawngkah biibikung thli lawng tuisangphaw te ceh taak sut ham a yawm u; ahimi lawngah a hai ben kalawng thiilungdue aka thlaak angla te sa u tih lowng te tui dawng la a thlaak u.
Tede Pawl lawngah raalbawi oen raalkap thli tengah a thui pe tih, “Tuisangphaw dawngah biibikung thli a awm nawh atah na loeih u tang manawh” a tina.
Tedawngah raalkap thli lawng lowng piinna rui te a tloek tih lowng te tuidang la a thlaak dingkang.
Khaw thaih tawm atah ahimi boeih te caak awkk te caak hamla a thui pe tih, “Nangmi buhmueh buhpawng la na awm u te tahe tah hin ha thlailii law poen, he veng khui puet ah n'tu khat khaw na ca u nawh.
Na hinglung thloetna ham caak awkk ca u de. Na luu dawngkah samthaam pakhat pateng ha-ata manawh.” a tina.
He tila a thui pe coengah Pawl lawng takawi te thoem a lawh tih ahimi haiah Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui, takawi te a eh tih a caak.
Ahimi tah a ngaai mawng u tih caak awkk khaw a caak u.
Tuisangphaw dawng aka awm boeih te thlaang yahnih sawm sarih paruk ka awm u.
Thlaang boeih lawng caak awkk te ahahla a caak u coeng atah tuisangphaw te a yaanghoep betna ham sangvut cang boeih te tuitunlii ah batt a voeih u.

Khaw athaih hang atah tuisangphaw dawngkah bii aka bi thlaang thli lawngah ame hue kah tuitunlii keeng ti khaw ming u nawh de tuitunlii acaawng ben ah langdai te a huh u tih acoengg thai atah te ah te tui aboenna ah tuisangphaw te duem sak ham a poek u.

Tedawngah thiilungdue a kiingna rui thli te a tloek u tih tuilii ah a thlaak u, tecoengah tuisangphaw hoei-alena tapaih piinna rui te a thlam u. Tecoengah tuisangphaw te yilh lawng a khuen thaina ham tuisangphaw a hai ben ah baiyaan te a tai u tih langdai benla te cet u.

Tede tuisangphaw lawng divin langdai a tawh tih tingtai sut; tuisangphaw a hai ben tah divin a tawh moek tih a tat thai tlaih nawh vengah te ahu ben te tah tuiphu tuilet lawng avan deng tih rek phawngg poen.
Thongtla thlaang thli te tui yo vetih lan la heeng boeih ai a ti dawngah raalkap thli lawng ngawn hamla kamthlah u.
Tede raalbawi lawng Pawl te deem sak ham a ngaih tih te tila sai nawh ham a khaang pe. Lamhacuek ah tui aka yo thai hue te tuisangphaw dawng kalawng sungpung tih lan la tui yo ham awl a peek;
Thlaangtloe hue lawngtah thingdeep khaw, tuisangphaw dawng-kah aka tlot thingboeng thingdeep te khaw ka tuuk u tih ahimi hu ah te ka yo u. He tila he kaimi boeih tah ading apuek la lan ka pha u.
Kaimi boeih asuengcala lan ka pha u atah te kah tuisanglak te Malta tuisanglak tila ka ming u.
Te kah aka awm khawkung thlaang thli lawng kaimi te n'reen tangkiik u. Khaw tlan tih khaw sik, ahimi lawng hai avan toeih u tih hai ka aawm u.
Pawl lawng thing pok at a lawh tih a toeih, tevengah hailing a yaak tih ruul pakhat te co, a kut te a lengven pe tih hoer bat.
Te kah khawsakung thlaang thli lawng Pawl kut ah ruul a bat te a huh u vengah, “Ahih he thlaang aka ngawn cawi ni, tuitunlii dawng kalawng loeih de Khaw lawngah hing sak manawh” tila a thui u.
Tede Pawl lawng ruul te hai dawngah a khek tih nganbawh khaw ya nawh.

Ahimi lawngtah phiing kueng ai, tihnawhtah tlim pahoei vetih duek ai tite ni a ring u mai poen. Tede asanhlang a ring u coeng atah ngan bawh tehca khaw a yaak nawh te a huh u veng atah ahimi te a kawpoek thawleng u tih, “Ahih he pathen ni” tila a thui u.
Te kalawng ayoeica ah tuisanglak ukkungbawi Pubilia kah lo te awm. Ahih lawng kaimi te beroep lopaangla n'khue u tih khawhin hin thum khui kaimi te buh n'kok u.
Pubilia kah ana pa te tlo tih ral, thimthe khaw tlo. Pawl te ahih a awmna la te cet, a kut te a sawah a tloeng pe coeng atah hoeih.
He tila a awm te a yaak u veng atah tuisanglak kah thlaangtlo te law u tih boeih hoeih u.
Ahimi lawng kutdo moen m'peek u, ka ceh u vengah khaw lawngpueng ah kaimi kah angoe koei thaihu te tuisangphaw dawng avan khueh u.
Thla thum coeng atah, Alekzandria kalawng aka law, te kah tuisanglak ah sikding khui puet aka awm “Pathen Caphee” a ti u tuisangphaw oen ka cet u.
Sirakas khawpui te ka pha u tih hin thum ka cam u.
Te kalawng ka cet u tih Rekium khawpui te ka pha u. Avuen hin atah akakk ben kalawng khaw thlii tih hin hih khuiah Puteoli khawpui ka pha u.
Te ah te oengca thli awm u tih ahimi te yarh khat tah awm puei hamla n'ceel u. Te kalawng tah Rom khawpui la ka cet u.

Rom khawpui kah oengca thli lawng kaimi kawng te a yaak u vengah Appias khawpui kah Thaihu yoeihna oen Reh-im Pathum a ti u khawpui toe ah te n'do u. Pawl lawng ahimi te a huh vengah Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil a thui tih a tha la khuek awm.
Rom khawpui te kaimi ka pha u atah Pawl te raalkap pakhat lawngah a toet tih amah poek ah awm thai na te a peek u.

Hin thum a awm coengah Pawl lawng te kah aka awm Judah thlaang mawtkung thli te tun a khue. Ahimi te a tun u atah, Pawl lawng ahimi nala te, “Ka puei Israel thlaang thli, kai lawngah mami Judah thlaang puei khaw, mami kah patuer hue teng kalawng n'dang u phung khaw ka oelh ka taih nawh de Jerusalem thongim ah n'thlaak u tih Rom thlaang thli kah kut dawngah m'peek u.
Kai he Rom thlaang thli lawngah awldoetna a khueh u coeng atah kai lawngah duekna koei thaihu khat khaw ka sai nawh te a huh u tih thlah ham a ngaih u.
Tede Judah thlaang thli lawngah kai he thlah ham te ngaih u nawh, ka thlaangphun thli te thawlh peel ham nawh de, sengpahrang sangluel tengah thui khaan nawh atah coeng thai nawh.
He dawng mai ah ni nangmi oen huh u tih thui hamla kan khue u. Kai he thiirui oen he tila n'khih u he tah Israel thlaang thli lawng a ngaiuep u tih a ring oel u thlaang kawng dawngah ni.” a tina.
Ahimi lawngah, “Nang kah kawng alam he Judia ram benkah capat khat khaw ka hu u nawh, te ben kalawng awlthang aka van khuen khaw, nang kawng te athela aka thui boenhui khat khaw law nawh.
Tede peng tawm ah he bu he athela a thui u dawngah namah kah poekna te kaimi lawng yaak ham ka ngaih u.” a tina.

Tedawngah ahimi lawng Pawl oen khawhin a tuntah u tih thlaang broe te tuntahna khawhin ah Pawl a pahna im la te cet u. Mincang kalawng thlemben toe Pathen ram kawng awlthang te a thui pe, tecoengah tawngha thli kah cathut oen Mosi Phungawl khuikah te athoel alaang pe tih Jesuh kawng te ahimi lawng a yaakming na ham a thui pe.
Thlaang khatsut lawngtah ahih kah awl thui rang oen a yaakming u de thlaangtloe hue lawngtah tangna nawh.
Ahimi te oelh u khiing tih Pawl lawng he awl pakhat he a thui pe coeng atah meel u; a thui pe awl tah: “Ciim Muithla lawng tawngha Isaiah rang oen ah na patuer hue tengah a thui te soeng tangtang!

Ahih lawng a thui tah, “Cet langtah he kah thlaang thli he thui pe lah: Na yaak u vetih na hutung u suide, na yaakming u tangtang manawh; Nangmi lawng na bueh u vetih na dan u suide na hu u tang manawh,

metihtiah he thlaangphun thli kah thinkaw lungbui tah mong sut tih ahimi lawng a haa te a buem khoep tih a mik khaw a yiin khoep u. Te tila sai u nawh kawinih ahimi kah mik lawng a huh sui tih a haa thli lawng a yaak sui, ahimi kah thinkaw lawng a yaakming sui tih Ka tengla va meel koep u sui, ahimi te ka hoeih sak sui,’ tila Pathen lawng a thui te ni” a tina.
Pawl lawng awlcuina la a thui tah: “Tedawngah Pathen kah thlawnna awlthang tah Gental thlaang thli te a peek poen tite ming uh. Ahimi lawng a hutung u ai!” a tina.
(Pawl lawng he awl he a thui coeng atah Judah thlaang thli te awlpuung kaa caan doe ah meel u.)
Pawl lawng im a vat tih kum hih khui te ah te awm. Amah tengla aka law boeih te atheenla a do.
Ahih lawng thincakna oen yalpawla Pathen Ram kawng te a thui tih Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kawng te a cang puei.
Khrih Jesuh kah tuihyoeihthlaang, Pathen lawng Awlthang Theen phawng hamla n'tuek tih n'khue celtuih Kai Pawl lawng ca kavan pat.
Te Awlthang Theen tah yan veng kalawng Pathen lawngah tawngha thli rang oen awl a kam tih Caciim dawngah a thut tangte te ni.
Te tah Pathen Capa mami kah Bawi Jesuh Khrih kawng te ni. Thlaanghing pumsa ben atah ahih he Devid cadil la awm.
Pathen la a awmna oen ciimna ben atah huham tharana oen duekna kalawng a thawhna rang oen ah Pathen Capa la a awm te a tueng sak.
Ahih rang oen Pathen lawng celtuih la awmna m'peek tih thlaangphun boeih lawng oengna oen awlngaaina a khueh thaina ham oen ah mawt ham kai he n'tuih.
Te kah Rom khawpui ah aka awm nangmi khaw Jesuh Khrih kah a koe la awm ham Pathen kah khuena ah na thuum u van.

Tedawngah Pathen lawng a lungna tih a thlaang la coengg ham a ceel Rom khawpui ah aka awm nangmi boeih tengah he ca he kavan pat. Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna oen ngaimawngna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh.
Dilai pum ah nangmi kah oengna kawng te a yaak boeih u poen dawngah Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen tengah lamhacuekla awmngaih ciil ka thui.
A Capa kawng Awlthang Theen te ka thinkaw lungbui boeih oen ka thui tih a bii ka bi he soeng tila Pathen tah kai kah sausi la awm. Ka thangthui roekk ah nangmi kan poek yoeyah te Pathen lawng a ming.
Pathen kawngaihna a awm atah vai at mai khaw nangmi tengla law ham Pathen tengah ka bih.
Metihtiah nangmi oen muithla ben yotheenna te veel haih tih tharana awm sak ham ka ngaih dawngah nangmi te huh ham ka ngaih tangkiik.
Ka thuingaihna tah kai kah oengna lawng nangmi te bawm ham tih nangmi kah oengna lawng kai he bawm patoeng ham ni.

Ka maya manau boeih, he he van ming u lah, nangmi tengla law ham ka kamthlah taitu poen de thaihu pakhat khat lawng n'kang poepa. Atloe Gental thlaang tim ah kawthawna ka khueh sak angla nangmi tim ah khaw kawthawna aka khueh awm sak ham ka ngaih tangkiik.
Metihtiah thlaangphun boeih tengah laiba ka khueh; Thlaang cuih oen thlaang cuih nawh tengah khaw, cathoem oen cathoem nawh tengah khaw bii bi ham laiba ka khueh.
Tedawngah ni Rom khawpui ah aka awm nangmi tengah khaw Awlthang Theen phawng ham ka ngaih tangkiik.
Awlthang Theen tah ka uepna rapsaat; aka tangna thlaang boeih thlawnna hamla Pathen kah tharana ni. Lamhacuekla Judah thlaangphun ham tih tecoengah Gental thlaangphun hamla khaw awm.

Pathen lawng thlaanghing he metila thlaangdoeng la a khueh tite Awlthang Theen lawng a tueng sak. “Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh thlaang te lawngtah oengna oen hing ai.” tila Caciim lawng a thui angla te doengna tah acuekca veng kalawng aboet toe oengna rang oen ni.
Pathen kah thinsana lawngtah thlaanghing boeih kah athe-arana oen thawlhna boeih te a oel tih vaan kalawng va tueng poen. Te athe-arana lawng awltak te yaakming thai nawh ham a kang khoep.
Thlaanghing lawng Pathen he ming thai koei la awm ti he aciimla a tueng poen dawngah Pathen lawng ahimi te dan a peek; metihtiah Pathen amah roe lawng a tueng sak ni.

Pathen lawngah dilai a suen cuek veng kalawng huh thai nawh la aka awm dungyan a tharana oen dungyan Pathen la a awmna tah aciimphanla tueng poen. Pathen kah thaihu sai dawngah ahimi lawng a huh thai. Tedawngah thlaanghing lawng a thawlhna te thuh phah thai manawh.
Ahimi lawng Pathen te a ming u de thangpawm koeila thangpawm u nawh, awmngaih ciil khaw thui u nawh. Ahimi kah poekna boeih tah apoeila coengg, a lung mong sut u tih yiinna oen betoet.
Ahimi lawng te ka cuih ti u, tede ahimi tah cuih u nawh.
Dungyan aka hing Pathen te bok ohla aka duek thai koei thlaanghing, va oen ramsa oen ah aka cawlh thaihu hing oen aka lo u kutsai mueime te lat a bok u.
Tedawngah Pathen lawng te ang thlaang hue te amami kawngaih tuiileh kap thaihu sai ham a peek tih khat oen khat sawah yahpawh koei thaihu a sai u.
Ahimi lawng Pathen kawng awltak te thailatna awl oen a thaw u. Saikung Pathen te bok ohla a sai thaihu te a bok u tih bii a bi pe u. Saikung Pathen te ni thangpawm yoeyah ham a awm: Amen.

Tedawngah Pathen lawng thlaang-hing he yarau pawh koeila aka awm pumsa cuk-halhna dawngah a thlah phaam sut. Hutaa hue lawng pateng khaw asoeng akam awmna ham koei hutaa phung te asoeng nawh la a hawna u tih khat oen khat thawlhna a sai u.

Tih van toengtoengla tawngpa hue lawngkhaw asoeng akam la hutaa oen pawlneengna te a hoett tih pumsa cuk-halhna dawngah tawngpa lawng khat oen khat yahna koei thaihu the thawlhna a sai u dawngah thaihu the a sai phu te ahimi lawng a dang u van.

Pathen kawng cuihna taktak te thlaanghing lawng a thinkaw khuiah khueh ham a ngaih u nawh dawngah aciimcaih nawh thinkaw lungbui khueh ham Pathen lawng a thlahphaam. Tedawngah sai koei nawh athe thaihu a sai u.
Ahimi tah soeprep athe-arana athe thaihu cungkuem, apueh ngaihna, thawlhna oen betoet u tih uett-eena, thlaang ngawnna, tawhsina, thailatna, kawnehna oen be u.
Rengse kawkhah phukhue awl thuina, khat oen khat thuitheetna, Pathen thina, thekhana, oekthloenna, halangna, athe sai ham poekna thli oen ah nu apa awl khaw ngaai u nawh.
Khawboe ramlang theen u nawh, awlkaa cak u nawh, thlaangtloe sawah reenna, lungna khueh u nawh.
He tila aka hing thlaang thli tah duek ham awm tila Pathen phungawl lawng a thui te a ming u. Tede he ang thaihu amami kah sai bueng ohla thlaangtloe lawng a sai u te khaw a kawtlaak puei u.

Tedawngah ka paya, a-u nang khaw thlaangtloe sawah awl na cek vengah namah oen namah te na thlipdah u thai nawh. Metihtiah thlaangtloe awl na cek vengah ahimi angla nang lawngkhaw thawlhna na sai van dawngah namah oen namah ni awl na cek u.
He tila thaihu the aka sai thli Pathen lawng awl a cek vengah asoeng thaihu a sai tite na ming u.
Tede ka puei, thlaang lawng thaihu the a sai tih awl na cek vengah nang lawng awl na cek thlaangtloe angla namah khaw na awm van. Pathen kah awlcekna kalawng ka loeih ai tila na poek aw?
Tihnawhtah Pathen kah alentloe reenna, khawdawp ngaaina, kawdawna thli te tula khaw na sak u nawh aw? Pathen kah lungvatna te thawlh yutna ham lawngpui nuehkung ni tite ataktangla na ming u.
Tede nangmi tah na thin thah u tih thawlh na yut u nawh: tedawngah Pathen kah thinsana oen aka doeng awlcekna Khawhin a pha vengah namami kah dantatna abo tare ham ni na sai khoeng u.
Pathen lawng thlaang boeih te amami kah a sai taring ah kutdo a peek ai.
Thlaang khatsut lawng thaihu theen te a sai u tih ruep-awmna, hinyahna oen dungyan hingna te a tlap u; ahimi te Pathen lawng dungyan hingna te a peek ai.
Thlaang khatsut lawngtah amami ham bueng a poek u tih asoeng thaihu te a hoett, thaihu the saina te a vai u; Pathen lawng thinsana oen thinlingna te ahimi sawah a hok pe ai.
Athe-arana aka sai boeih lawng khawdeng lungmana oen patang tlawhna te a dang u ai, Lamhacuekla Judah thli lawng a dang vetih Gental thli lawngkhaw a dang van ai.
Tede thaihu theen aka sai boeih tengah Pathen lawng ruep-awmna hinyahna oen ngaimawngna a peek ai. Lamhacuekla Judah thlaang hue lawng a dang vetih Gental hue lawngkhaw a dang van ai.
Pathen lawngtah thlaang boeih avanpila awl a cek ai.
Gental hue lawng Mosi kah Phungawl khueh u nawh; a thawlh u atah phungawl ohla ha-ata u. Judah hue lawng Phungawl a khueh; A thawlh u atah Phungawl angla awlcekna a dang u.
Thlaanghing he Pathen haiah thlaangdoeng la a awmna tah Phungawl te yaakna rang oen nawh tih Phungawl lawng sai a ti te saina rang oen ni.
Gental hue lawng Phungawl khueh u nawh; Tede Phungawl khueh u nawh mai cakhaw Phungawl lawng sai a ti te lungbui cuihna oen a sai veng roekk-ah ahimi ham Phungawl la awm.

Phungawl lawng sai a tite a thinkaw ah thut la awm poen tila amami kah khawboe ramlang lawngah a tueng sak. Amami kah poekna lawngah meveng ah nuem tah ahimi te a pai puei vengah soeng tila amami kah athetheen pekbona thinkaw oen a tueng sak.
Tedawngah Awlthang Theen ka phawng angla awlcekna Hin ah Pathen lawng Jesuh Khrih rang oen thlaanghing boeih kah ahuepla poekna thli te awl a cek ai.
Tetih atah nangmi Judah hue metila? Judah thlaangphun la ka awm tila namah oen namah na ti u; nangmi tah phungawl te na uepna u tih Pathen te na oekthloenna;
Pathen lawng nangmi sai sak ham a ngaih te na ming u tih aka soeng te tuek ham khaw Phungawl dawngkah na cang u poen;
Mikpum thli te lawngpui nuehkung, yiinna khuikah thlaang thli ham aangna la ka awm na ti u;
Thlaang halang thli thuituenkung oen n'tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang thli cangpueikung la ka awm na ti u; Phungawl dawngkah aka soep cuihna oen awltak te aka khueh la na ngaai u.
Thlaangtloe tah na cang puei u, n'tu kawngah namah oen namah tah na thuituen u nawh? “Huen boel” tila phung tah na thui u; namami tah na huen u aw?
“Samphaih boel” na ti u; namami tah na samphaih u? Kutsai pathen tah na tuii na leh u? tede kutsai pathen bok-im kah thaihu te na rot mangkhak u?
Pathen kah phungawl ka khueh na ti u tih na oekk u van, tede phungawl na phe u tih Pathen te yah na bai u?
Caciim lawngah, “Nangmi Judah thlaang thli kawng dawngah Gental thlaang lawng Pathen te thaang athe sak,” tila a thut.
Nangmi lawng Phungawl na vai u atah yahhuivuen na reet u te aphu awm tang tang, tede Phungawl te na vai u nawh atah yahhuivuen aka reet nawh oen na lo u.
Yahhuivuen aka reet nawh Gental thlaang lawng Phungawl lawng a kuek te a vai atah Pathen lawng yahhuivuen a reet angtoekla poek nawh ai aw?

Tedawngah Judah thlaang thli, Phungawl khaw thut tangte la na khueh u tih yahhuivuen khaw na reet u poen de Phungawl te na phe u dawngah Gental thlaang thli tah pumsa ben ah yahhuivuen reet nawh mai cakhaw Phungawl te a vai u dawngah ahimi lawng nangmi te thawlh n'peel u poen ai.
Ataktang atah a-u nuem Judah thlaang taktak tih yahhuivuen aka reet tangtang? Ahan atah Judah thlaang la awm tih yahhuivuen reetna te pumsa ah sai la a awm atah Judah thlaang tangtang nawh ni.

Akhuiben ah Judah thlaang la awm tih thinkaw khuiah yahhuivuen aka reet te ni Judah thlaang tangtang a miingna. Te ngoen tah kut oen thut Phungawl kah bii saina nawh tih Pathen Muithla kah bii bina ni. Te ang thlaang te tah thlaanghing ben kah nawh tih Pathen benkah thangtheenna aka dang thlaang ni.
Tetih atah Judah thlaang lawng Gental thlaang lak ah a hoeikhangna awm bet aw? Yahhuivuen reetna te pakhat mai khaw aphu awm aw?
Asoep arepla hoeikhangna awm. Lamhacuek ah Pathen lawng awlthang theen Judah thlaang thli a kuem sak.
Tede Judah thlaang thli khatsut hue lawng uep-awm nawh la a awm atah metila a awm ai? Pathen khaw ahimi tengah uep-awm nawh la awm van ai aw?

Tih nawh ni, Thlaang boeih lawng hoem awl thui mai cakhaw Pathen tah soeng tih uep-awm la awm toeng toeng. Caciim lawng, “Awl na thui vengah na awlthui te soeng tila na tueng sak vetih awlcek la na awm vengah taya cawina te na taa ai,” tila a thui.

Tede nangmi kah thaihu the saina dawngah Pathen kah thaihu sai a soeng te a tueng sak atah metila a awm ai? Pathen lawng mami te thawlh m' peel tih dan n'tat atah Pathen he soeng nawh n'ti ai aw? (Thlaanghing poekna oen thui atah).
Tetih nawh ni; Pathen he doeng nawh kawinih metila dilai awl a cek thai ai?
Tede kai kah doengna nawh lawng Pathen kah doengna te aciimla a tueng sak rang oen Pathen te ruep-awmna a peek tare atah metila kai he thawlh peel la ka awm khak ai?

Tedawngah, “thaihu theen a tuengna hamla thaihu the sai u sih” n'ti u nawh kai? Tetih roe la awl na thui tite khatsut hue lawng thawlh n'peel u tih ka thaang a the sak u. Te ang thlaang hue te thawlh peel tuueng la a awm dawngah thawlh peel la awm ai.

Tetih atah mami Judah thlaang ta Gental thlaang lak ah bet atheenna n'tu aka awm? Atheen tloe moenih! Aciimphanla ka tueng sak tangte angla Judah thlaang oen Gental thlaang khaw avan at la thawlhna tharana huiah boeih awm u.
Caciim lawng tila a thui, “Thlaangdoeng a-u khat khaw awm nawh;
thlaangcuih pakhat khaw awm nawh, Pathen aka tlap khat khaw awm nawh.
Thlaang boeih lawng Pathen te a mangthawng taak; ahimi boeih tah lawngpui a hang u poen; doengna aka sai khat khaw awm nawh, pakhatca khaw awm roe nawh.
Ahimi kah awl tah duekna koei thailatna oen betoet; a laai dawng kalawng athe hoem awl thoeng; ahimi kah huikaa khui lawng rih koei saringrup awl ruul sue angla va thoeng;
ahimi kah awlthui tah kawsi awlkha runkhuen pansi awl oen be.
Ahimi tah thlaang nganbawh yaak sak ham oen ngawn tih thip hamla tah a tat loe thakbat u;
a cehna roekk-ah rawkna oen patang raina a thoeng sak u.
Ahimi lawng ngaimawngna lawngpui te ming u nawh.
Pathen rih ham roe te ahimi lawng ming u nawh” ti.

Phungawl khuiah aka awm awl soeprep he Phungawl huiah aka awm thlaang boeih sawah hawna ham ni tite tahe ah m'ming u, te tila a awm te tah thlaang boeih lawng peelnangna te a toeng tih dilai pum he Pathen kah awlcekna huiah a phana ham ni.
Phungawl vaina rang oen Pathen haiah a-u khat khaw thlaangdoeng la awm nawh. Phungawl kah bii sai tah thlaang lawng thawlhna a sai te ming sak ham mai ni.

Tede, tahe ah Pathen lawng thlaanghing he amah oen haih thlaangdoeng la a khuehna lawngpui tah a tueng sak poen. Te kah doengna te Mosi kah Phungawl oen tawngha thli lawng sausi a deng u de phungawl oen tuhkai u nawh.
Jesuh Khrih te oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh. Khrih aka tangna boeih hamla doengna te Pathen lawng a sai dawngah a-u tengah khaw alangna roe awm nawh:
thlaanghing boeih lawng thawlhna a sai u dawngah Pathen teng kalawng athlathloeila awm u poen.
Tede, Pathen kah ayoe peek reenna kutdo Jesuh Khrih mami boeih loeihsakkung rang oen thlaang boeih he thlaangdoeng la a khueh.

Pathen lawng Jesuh Khrih he a thisen rang oen thawlh khawdawp ngaaina saikung la a khueh tih te khawdawp ngaaina tah Jesuh Khrih oengna rang oen ni. Pathen lawng he tila thawlh khawdawp ngaaina a sai he tah a doengna te tueng sak a ngaih dawngah ni. Yan veng atah a kaw daw tih thlaanghing thawlhna te hu nawh angla awm;

tede, tahe tue veng atah amah kah doengna te a tuengna ham thlaanghing thawlhna te a pho sak. He-tila Pathen lawng amah thlaangdoeng la a awmna a tueng sak tih Jesuh aka oeng boeih tah thlaangdoeng la a khueh.
Tedawngah he kawng dawngah oekthloenna koei awm aw? Awm roeroe nawh? N'tu kawngah? Phung-awl n'vai u dawngah aw? Nawh ni! Mami lawng n'tangna dawngah ni.
Thlaanghing he Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh he phungawl vaina rang oen nawh tih oengna rang oen ni.
Pathen he Judah thlaang thli bueng kah Pathen la awm aw? Gental thlaang thli kah Pathen la tah awm nawh aw? Gental thlaang thli kah Pathen la khaw awm.
Pathen tah pakhat ni, Judah thlaang khaw a oengna rang oen thlaangdoeng la a khueh tih Gental thlaang khaw a oengna rang oen thlaangdoeng la a khueh.
Tetih atah, oengna oen Phungawl he hoett la awm ti ngaihna aw? N'hoett moenih, Phungawl te n'cak sak dai ni.
Tetih atah mami kah patuer Abraham kawng he metila n'thui lah ai? ahih lawng n'tu nuem a tawng?
Thaihu theen saina rang oen Pathen haiah doengna dang kawinih oekthloen ham koei la awm suide, tede Pathen haiah oekthloenna koei n'tu khaw awm nawh.
Caciim lawngah, “Abraham lawng Pathen te a tangna tih a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng ahih te thlaangdoeng la a khueh” tila a thui.
Bii aka bi tah thapang a dang, te thapang te kutdo tila poek ham awm nawh. A thatlawh phu ni a dang.
Tede biibina ohla a oengna dawngah pangtung tih thlaangthawlh te thlaangthawlh nawh la aka toehkung Pathen te aka tangna tah a oengna te Pathen lawng doengna la a khueh pe.
Biibina khat khaw thuum muehla Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm thlaang pakhat kah awmngaihna te Devid lawng a thui vengah a thui-ngaihna tah he tila awm:
“Athe saina te khawdawp a ngaai pe tih thawlhthlahna aka dang tah yotheen aka dawng ni.
“Bawipa lawng a thawlhna te thawlhna la a toeh pe nawh thlaang tah yotheen aka dawng ni.

Devid lawng a thui yotheenna he yahhuivuen aka reet hue ham bueng aw? Moenih ta! Yahhuivuen aka reet nawh hue hamla khaw awm. Caciim n'thui tangte angla, “Abraham lawng Pathen te a oeng tih a oengna rang oen ahih te Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm.”
Te tila Pathen lawng Abraham thlaangdoeng la a pawm te Abraham lawng yahhuivuen a reet coengah aw? a reet thlan ah aw? Yahhuivuen a reet coengah nawh tih a reet thlan ah ni.

Abraham lawng thlaangdoeng la a awm coengah yahhuivuen a reet, ahih kah yahhuivuen reet he tah a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm te a tuengna ham miknoek ni. Tedawngah yahhuivuen reetna ohla Pathen a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm thlaang boeih kah Muithla ben ah Abraham tah Pahaam la awm.

Ahih tah yahhuivuen aka reet hue kah Pahaam la khaw awm toengtoeng, metihtiah yahhuivuen reet bueng ohla Abraham lawng yahhuivuen a reet thlan vengah oengna oen a hing angla ahimi lawng oengna oen ah a hing u van dawngah ni.

Pathen lawng Abraham oen a cadil thli tengah dilai he nang kah koeva la awm ai, tila awl a kam vengah Abraham lawngah Phungawl a vai dawngah moenih ta, tede ahih lawng a tangna tih Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm dawngah ni.
Pathen awlkam he Phungawl aka vai hue lawng paang thai kawinih thlaanghing kah oengna he a hong la awm vetih Pathen kah awlkam tah apoeioep la ni a awm ai.
Phungawl lawngtah Pathen thinsana avan khuen, phungawl a awmna nawh huen atah phungawl eekna khaw awm van nawh.

Tedawngah te kah awlkamna tah oengna dawngah akung asut tih Abraham cadil boeih tengah Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo la awm, phungawl aka vai hue ham bueng nawh tih Abraham angla aka oeng thli boeih khaw awm van. Metihtiah Abraham tah Muithla ben ah mami boeih kah Pahaam la a awm dawngah ni.

Caciim lawng, “Nang tah nam tawm thlaangphun kah Pahaam la kan sai poen” tila a thui angla awm. Tedawngah he awlkam he tah Pathen haiah theen tih Abraham lawng a oeng Pathen tah thlaangduek thawhsakkung oen awm nawh te awmsakkung ni.
Abraham lawng ngaiuep ham n'tu khaw a awm nawh maiah pateng a oeng tih a ngaiuep dawngah “Nam tawm thlaangphun kah Pahaam la coeng,” Caciim lawng, “Na cadil aisi yoeh la yahawh ai,” tila a thui.
Abraham tah a kum yakhat cup tawmca poen tih thlaangduek angla a pumsa a awmna oen Sarah khaw ca-anau cuun thai tlaih nawh koeila a awm kawng te a poek khuep vengah a oengna tah yok roeroe nawh.
A oengna te hoett sut nawh tih Pathen kah awlkam te khaw uepvoet baal nawh; a oengna tah tharana oen be tih Pathen te a thangpawm.
Ahih lawngtah Pathen lawng awl a kam coengthloeih te a sai ngaikhoek ai tila a tangna mangkhak.
Tedawngah Abraham tah a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm.
“Ahih tah thlaangdoeng la a pawm” ti he Abraham bueng ham a thut tila awm nawh.
Jesuh Khrih mami Bawipa duekna kalawng koep aka thawhsakkung te oengna rang oen thlaangdoeng la a pawm mami ham khaw a thut van.
Mami kah thawlhna phu ah ahih tah duek tih Pathen oen mami roeproeina ham a thawh sak koep.
Tahe ah tah oengna rang oen mami tah Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la n'khueh u poen tih mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen oen ah n'roep u poen.
Ahih lawngtah oengna rang oen mami he Pathen kah lungvatna khuila n' kuun puei u poen, te lungvatna khuiah tahe n'awm u. Tedawngah Pathen bawilenna n'bur haih u ai tila ngaiuepna oen n'tha thlue u.
Raina n'tawng vengah khaw tha n'thlue sak u, metihtiah raina lawngah uehthaina m'peek tila m'ming u tih,
uehthaina lawngah Pathen kaw tawngna oen Pathen kaw tawngna lawngah ngaiuepna a thoeng sak tite m'ming u.
Pathen lawng a lungna te mami thinkaw khuiah Pathen amah kah kutdo Ciim Muithla oen ah avan toi poen dawngah he ngaiuepna lawng mami he kawpoek boet sak nawh.
Mami lawng n'tu khaw n'sai thai nawh vengah Pathen lawng atue atang a nuen tih mami thlaangthawlh hamla Khrih Jesuh tah duek.
Thlaangdoeng pakhat hamla thlaang pakhat duek ham rai tangkiik. Thlaang theen ham tah aka duek ngam khaw awm mai ai.
Tede, thlaangthawlh la n'awm vengah Khrih tah mami ham a duekna oen Pathen lawng mami he metila n'lungna tite a tueng sak poen.
Amah kah thisen oen tahe atah mami he Pathen oen ah n'roep u poen. Ahih rang oen Pathen kah thinsana kalawng metihtlukla n'thlawn tare ai!

Mami tah Pathen kah raal la ni n'awm u, tede a Capa duekna rang oen mami he paya laikoei la n'sai poen. Tahe atah Pathen kah paya laikoei la n'awm u poen dawngah Khrih hingna lawng mami he metihtlukla n'thlawn tare ai.
Te bueng nawh tih tahe ah Pathen kah paya laikoei la mami saikung mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen kah thaihu sai dawngah n'awmngaih u.

Thawlhna tah thlaang pakhat rang oen he dilai ah law tih ahih kah thawlhna lawng duekna avan khuen. Metihtiah thlaang boeih tah a thawlh dawngah thawlhna phu ah thlaangphun boeih te duekna lawng a khuk.
Phungawl a awm thlan ah dilai dawng thawlhna awm poen; tede phungawl a awmna nawh huen ah thawlhna te thawlh la toeh pe nawh.

Tede Adam dung veng kalawng Mosi dung toe ah duekna lawng thlaanghing boeih te a uk, Adam lawng Pathen kah awlpeek te vai nawh tih a thawlh angla aka thawlh nawh thlaang thli khaw duekna lawng a uk boeih. Adam tah aka law ham koei thlaang pakhat te huhsakna ni.

Tede thlaang pahih te vai ahih nawh; metihtiah Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo tah Adam kah thawlhna oen lo u nawh, te thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna dawng maiah thlaang yahawh duek ti he tah soeng ta-ngak. Tede Pathen kah lungvatna tah, te thlaang kah athe-arana lak ah apueh ngaaila bo tih tetih van toengtoengla thlaang pakhat Jesuh Khrih lungvatna rang oen thlaang yahawh ham aka thoeng Pathen kutdo tah bo tare ai.

Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo oen thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna tah lo u nawh. Thlaang pakhat a thawlh coengah awltloekna tah “Na thawlh” ti he ni; tede thawlhna yahawh sawah atingtawkk nawh kutdo aka law tah “Na thawlh nawh!” tila awltloekna he ni.

Thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna rang oen duekna lawng uk ham akung a tongnan ti he soeng tangtang. Te cakhaw thlaang pakhat Jesuh Khrih kah sai tah metihtlukla a bo ngaai. Pathen kah asoepbir lungvatna aka dang thlaang boeih tah ayoela amah oen roeproei u tih Khrih rang oen a hing khuiah taana oen hing u ai.
Tedawngah thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna dawngah thlaang boeih tah thlaangthawlh la awm, tetih van angla thlaang pakhat kah adoeng saina rang oen thlaang boeih a loeih sak tih ahimi te hingna a peek.

Thlaang pakhat kah awlngaaina nawh lawng thlaang boeih te thlaangthawlh la a coeng sak, tetih van angla thlaang pakhat kah awlngaaina rang oen thlaang boeih te Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh ai.
Phungawl he tah thawlhpalhna a puungna ham ni, tede thawlhna apuungna huen ah Pathen kah lungvatna khaw puung tare.
Tedawngah thawlhna lawngtah duekna te a hawna tih a uk, tetih van angla doengna lawngtah Pathen kah lungvatna oen a uk tih mami kah Jesuh Khrih rang oen mami te dungyan hingna benla n'ceh puei u.
Tetih atah metila n'ti u lah ai? Pathen kah lungvatna apuungna tare ham thawlhna te n'sai poepa ai aw?
Te tih moenih! Thawlhna ah n'duek u poen, metila thawlhna dawngah n'awm khuep thai ai?
Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah mami baptisma n'dang vengah te a duekna ah baptisma n'dang haih poen tite ataktangla na ming u.

Tecoengah mami baptisma n'dang vengah mami tah ahih oen up haih la awm tih a duekna ah n'duek haih u, Khrih tah Pa kah ruep-awmna huham lawng duekna kalawng a thawh sak koep angla mami khaw hingna athaai oen hingna van ham ni.
A duekna ah amah oen n'duek haih atah a thawhna ah amah oen n'tho haih van ai.

Mami kah hing ruem te Jesuh Khrih oen thinglam dawngah khiing haih la awm poen tite m'ming u. Te tila a khiing haih he tah thawlhna oen aka be pumsa hing ruem te phe boeih tih thawlhna sal la awm tlaih nawh ham ni.
Metihtiah mami n'duek vengah thawlh tharana khui kalawng n'loeih u.
Khrih oen mami n'duek haih veng kalawng mami khaw amah oen n'hing haih van ai tila n'tang na.
Khrih tah duekna kalawng tho koep poen tih duek koep tlaih manawh tite m'ming u, duekna lawng a sawah ukna aana khueh roe tlaih manawh.
Te tila Khrih tah a duek poen dawngah thawlhna lawng a sawah huham khueh tlaih nawh; Tahe a hingna he tah Pathen oen pawlneengna ah hing poen.
Tetih van angla nangmi lawngkhaw thawlhna ah thlaang duek la ka awm u tih Khrih Jesuh rang oen ah Pathen oen pawlneengna khuiah ka hing u poen tila poek uh.
Nangmi lawng na pumsa ngaihna te vai hamla aka duek thai nangmi pum te thawlhna lawng uk tlaih boel seh.

Tecoengah na pumvaang ame ang mai te khaw thaihu the saina ah hawna hamla thawlhna ah pe u tlaih boel. Te lak atah duekna kalawng hingna ah n'thawh sak koep angla doengna sai ham na pum boeih te Pathen te pe u hawn.
Thawlhna he nangmi kah bawi la awm tlaih boel seh; metihtiah nangmi tah phungawl khuiah na awm u tlaih nawh tih Pathen lungvatna khuiah na awm u poen.
Tetih atah mami he phungawl huiah n'awm tlaih nawh tih Pathen lungvatna huiah n'awm u dawngah thawlhna n'sai ai aw? N'sai manawh!

Thlaang pakhat khat kah awl te ngaai pe ham na pum na peek vengah te a awl na ngaai pe bawi kah sal la na awm tite ataktangla na ming u, tetih angla thawlhna awl te na ngaai u atah thawlhna sal la na awm u tih thawlhna phu tah duekna ni; tetih van toengtoeng la Pathen awl na ngaai u atah, te awlngaaina phu tah nangmi te thlaangdoeng la n'khueh ai.
Tede Pathen te uem u lah! Anoekbuet atah nangmi he thawlhna sal la na awm u de, tahe tah cangpueina dawngah na huh awltak na dang u te na thinkaw lungbui tak oen na vai u poen.
Nangmi tah thawlhna kalawng na loeih u poen tih doengna sal la na awm u poen.

(Nangmi lawng yaakmingna pumsa ben ah na khueh u nawh dawngah yaakming thai koei tihinhang kah awl ka hawna) N'cui veng atah nangmi lawng athe sai hamla aciimcaih nawh oen athe-arana ah na pum te sal la na peek u rapcaat. Tetih van la tahe tah aciimcaih saina hamla na pum te doengna sal la pe u rapcaat loeih.
Nangmi tah thawlhna sal la na awm u vengah te doengna khui kalawng na loeih u.
Tahe ah nangmi lawng na yah puei thaihu na sai u te hoeikhangna awm aw? Te thaihu thli kah aphu tah duekna ni!
Tede tahe tah nangmi he thawlhna kalawng na loeih u poen tih Pathen kah sal la ni na awm u poen, Nang kah hoeikhangna tah na hingna te amah tengah na peek biit tih aphu tah dungyan hingna te ni.
Thawlh phu tah duekna ni. Tede Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo tah mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah dungyan hingna te ni.

Maya manau thli, nangmi lawng yuvaa la awmna phung he acek aneh la na ming u poen dawngah nangmi tengah ka thui ham koei he khaw na ming u badai. Thlaanghing he a hing khui bueng ni yuvaa la awmna phung lawng a uk.
