Thuina maiah, vaa aka sa hutaa pakhat he a vaa a hing khui bueng ni yuvaa la awmna phung lawng a piin. A vaa te a duek atah yuvaa la a awmna hih phung kah piinna kalawng loeih poen.

Tedawngah te hutaa lawng a vaa a hing hun maiah thlaangtloe vaana kawinih te hutaa te samphaih n'ti ai. Tede a vaa te a duek coeng atah te hutaa tah thlaanghoeng la a awm poen dawngah vaa a sak atah samphaih miingna tlaih nawh.

Maya manau thli, nangmi khaw te tila na awm u van. Nangmi tah Khrih kah pum vaang la na awm u poen dawngah Phungawl kah ukna khuiah hingna te na hoett u poen. Mami he Pathen kah biibina ah aphu aka awm la coeng ham tahe atah duekna kalawng aka tho koep Khrih kah thlaang la na awm u poen.
Thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna oen n'hing u vengah Phungawl lawng a bawnghorh dawngah thawlh sai ngaihna lawng mami pum khuiah bii a bi tih mami te n'duek sak.

Tede tahe tah Phungawl kah piinna thong khuiah te n'duek u poen dawngah Phungawl dawng kalawng n'loeih u poen. Tahe atah ca oen a thut phungawl lawngpui ruem ah bii m'bi u tlaih nawh tih Muithla ben kah lawngpui thaai ah ni bii m'bi u poen.

Tetih atah Phungawl amah roe he thawlh n'ti u thai ai aw? Thawlh n'ti thai manawh! Tede thawlhna he aka mingsakkung tah Phungawl ni. Phungawl lawng, “Thlaang kah thaihu naai boel,” tila van thui nawh kawinih thaihu naaina ti he ka ming manawh.
Tede he tila thawlhna lawngtah awlpeek dawngah bii a bi tih ka pumsa dawngah ngaihna soeprep te a bawnghorh, Phungawl a awmna nawh atah thawlhna he aka duek thaihu ni.
Kai kamah roe he n'cui vengah Phungawl ohla khaw ka sak, tede awlpeek te a law vengah tah thawlhna lawng hing tih kai tah ka duek.
Hingna aka pe ham koei awlpeek lawng he duekna avan thoeng puei lat.
Thawlhna lawng atue theen a dang tih awlpeek te a hawna vetkat tih n'thai n'latna; te awlpeek oen kai te ng'ngawn.
Tedawngah Phungawl tah ciim tih awlpeek khaw ciim, doeng tih theen.

Tetih atah athe thaihu lawng Kai ham duekna avan thoeng sak ti ngaihna aw? Tetih moenih. Te tila aka thoeng sak te tah thawlhna ni; Thawlhna lawng thawlhna tangtang la a awmna te a tuengna ham atheen thaihu te a hawna tih kai ham duekna te avan khuen. Tedawngah thawlhna he mueirihtamyiin thawlhna ni tila awlpeek rang oen tueng tare.
Phungawl he muithla ben thaihu ni tite mami lawng m'ming u; tede kai tah thawlhna tengla sal angla a yoeih thlaang ni.
Kai lawng ka sai he ka yaakming nawh; sai ham ka ngaih te ka sai nawh tih ka ngaih nawh dai te ka sai lat.
Sai ham ka ngaih nawh te ka sai vengah Phungawl te soeng tila ka kawtlaak puei van.
Tedawngah he thaihu aka sai tangtang he kai nawh tih ka khuiah aka awm thawlhna te ni.
Ka khuiah he thlaanghing la ka coenggna ah atheen awm nawh tila ka ming. Ka khuiah atheen sai ngaihna awm mai cakhaw atheen te ka sai thai nawh.
Sai ham ka ngaih atheen te ka sai nawh; sai hamla ka ngaih nawh athe te lat ka sai.
Kai lawng sai ham ka ngaih nawh te ka sai atah, te aka saikung tah kai tlaih nawh tih ka khuiah aka awm thawlhna lawng ni a sai tite thui ka ngaih.
Tedawngah he phungawl lawng bii a bi tila ka ming: atheen sai ham ka ngaih vengah kai lawngtah athe bueng te ka tuek.
Ka khui benkah thlaanghing lawngtah Pathen kah phungawl dawngah te awmngaih.

Tede ka pum khuikah phungawl tloe lawng bii a bi he ka ming, te phungawl te tah ka thinkaw lawng a ngaih phungawl te aka oel mangkhak awm. Te phungawl lawngah ka pum khuiah bii aka bi thawlhna phungawl khuiah thongtla angla te n'sai.
Ngaihang khawbing la ka awm mah aw! Duekna la aka ceh puei he kah ka pum dawng kalawng a-u lawng n'thlawn lah ai?

Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen thlawnna saikung Pathen te uem u lah! Tedawngah ka coenggna tangtang tah he ni: Kamah ben atah ka thlaanghing coenggna lawngah thawlhna phungawl te a vai vengah ka kawpoek bueng oen Pathen phungawl te ka vai thai.
Tahe tah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla aka awm thli ham tah thawlh awlcekna awm tlaih nawh.
Metihtiah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla hingna ah mami aka ceh puei Muithla kah phungawl lawng duekna oen thawlhna phungawl khui kalawng mami te n'loeih sak poen.

Thlaanghing pumsa a tha ayoek dawngah Phungawl lawng a sai thai nawh te Pathen lawng a sai. Thlaanghing pumsa ah aka awm thawlhna te a Capa avan tuihna rang oen a phe poen. Thawlhna taa hamla thlaanghing kah thawlhna pumsa angla va law.
Pathen lawng he tila a sai he tah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna angla nawh tih Muithla ngaihna angla aka hing mami pum dawngah Phungawl lawng akuek doengna te asoepna ham ni.
Amami kah pumsa ngaihna angla aka hing thlaang tah pumsa ngaihna lawng a thinkaw te a uk. Muithla kah ngaihna angla aka hing thlaang tah Muithla ngaihna lawng a thinkaw te a uk.
Pumsa ngaihna ah khawsak phu tah duekna ni. Muithla ngaihna ah khawsak phu tah hingna oen ngaimawngna ni.
Tedawngah thlaanghing lawng amami pumsa ngaihna angla a awm a tah Pathen raal la awm; ahimi lawng Pathen kah phungawl te vai nawh, ahimi lawngah vai khaw vai thai roe nawh.
Amami kah pumsa ngaihna aka vai thli lawngtah Pathen te a kaw hoe sak thai nawh.

Tede nangmi tah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna ah na awm u nawh, Pathen Muithla nangmi khuiah ataktangla a awm atah Muithla kawngaih angla na awm u. A-u khaw Khrih Muithla aka khueh nawh tah Khrih amah koe la awm nawh.
Tede Khrih te nangmi khuiah a awm atah thawlhna dawngah na pum te duek mai cakhaw nangmi tah Pathen oen na roep u poen dawngah nangmi kah muithla tah hing.

Jesuh te duekna kalawng aka thawh sak Pathen Muithla te nangmi khuiah a awm atah, Khrih te duekna kalawng aka thawh sak Pathen Muithla nangmi khuiah a awm dawngah nangmi kah aka duek ham koei pum te hingna a peek van ai.
Tedawngah maya manau hue, mami lawng sai ham koei n'khueh u, tede mami kah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna angla hing ham awm nawh.
Nangmi lawng thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna angla na hing u atah na duek u ai; tede nangmi lawng thawlhna na sai thli te Muithla oen na ngawn atah na hing u ai.
Pathen Muithla lawng a mawt thlaang thli tah Pathen kah ca-anau la awm.

Metihtiah Pathen lawng m'peek u Muithla tah nangmi te sal la coengg sak ham oen ah birih ngaihuet sak ham nawh tih; te Muithla lawngtah nangmi te Pathen kah ca-anau la sai ham ni. Te Muithla kah tharana rang oen Pathen te, “A Pa! a Pa!” tila n'khue thai.
Mami he Pathen amah kah ca-anau la n'awm tite thui ham Pathen kah Muithla amah roe te mami kah muithla oen tuhkai haih hih.

Mami tah amah kah ca-anau la n'awm u veng kalawng a thlaang hue ham a khueh pe kam-awm yotheenna te n'dang van ai. Pathen lawng Khrih ham a khueh pe te mami lawngkhaw m'paang van ai; metihtiah Khrih kah patangraina te n'cuut u atah, mami lawng amah kah ruep-awmna te khaw m'paang van ai.
Tahe veng mami kah patang palai khangna he hai benkah mami tengah aka thoeng ham koei ruep-awmna oen ah nuehtah koei nawh ni tila ka poek.
Pathen lawng a ca-anau thli tengah a tueng sak ham koei te a thaihu suen boeih lawng ngaiuep tangkiik oen a lamtoen u.
Pathen lawng a thaihu suen boeih te apoei apit la awm ham dan a peek. Te tila a awm he thaihu suen thli amami kah kawngaih dawngah nawh tih Pathen amah kawngaih ni. Tede ngai-uepna tah awm hun.
Te ngaiuepna tah hin at vengah ngoen a thaihu suen boeih lawngah rawkna koei sal piinna kalawng loeih vetih Pathen ca thli kah loeihna ruep-awm te a dang u van ai.
Tecoengah a suen thaihu lawng tahe tue toe ah camoe awm tawm vengkah a tlawh angla tlawhna oen kopaang u tite mami lawng m'ming u.
Te tila a suen thaihu bueng lawngah kopaang u nawh, Muithla te lamhacuek Pathen kutdo la aka dang mami pum he loeih sak ham aka ring mami boeih khaw kawdaang ah ng'kopaang u van.
Metihtiah ngaiuepna oen thlawn la n'awm u. Tede mami lawng n'ngaiuep u te n'huh atah tete ngaiuepna tangtang moenih. Mik huh tangte te a-u lawng a ngaiuep nooek kai?
Tede mik huh nawh te n'ngaiuep u atah mami lawng kawdaw oen n'ring u.

Te tila mami tha a yoek dawngah mami bawmcem hamla Muithla tah va law. Mami lawng metila thangthui ham koei ti khaw m'ming u nawh dawngah awl oen thui thai nawh kopaangna oen Muithla lawng mami ham Pathen tengah avan bih.
Mami kah thinkaw aka ming Pathen lawng Muithla kah kawpoek te khaw a ming; metihtiah Muithla lawngtah Pathen amah kah kawngaih angla a thlaang thli yuengah a bih pe dawngah ni.
Pathen lawngtah amah aka lungna thli ham oen amah lawng a kamthlahna angla a khue thlaang thli lawng atheenna ham thaihu boeih he a sai pe tila m'ming u.

Pathen lawng a tuek tangte thlaang thli te amah Capa angla a coenggna ham a thloekcala a thloeng, te tila a sai he tah amah aka oeng thlaang yahawh tim ah a Capa te ahaamkoek camiing awmthang la awm sak ham ni.
Tedawngah Pathen lawng athloekla a thloeng thlaang thli te a khue; te tila a khue thlaang thli te amah oen a roep u sak tih a ruep-awmna te khaw a paang sak.
Tetih atah he kawngah he n'tu nuem mami lawng n'thui thai ai? Pathen lawng mami he m'pai puei atah a-u lawng mami he n'raalna ai?
Pathen lawng a Capa khueh duen pateng haih ohla mami ham m'peek! Mami hamla a Capa pekung lawng soeprep boeih he ayoela mami peek muehla awm ai aw?
Pathen lawng a tuek thlaang te a-u lawng thawlh a peel thai ai? Pathen amah lawngah na thawlh nawh a tina poen.
Tedawngah ahimi te a-u lawng thawlh a peel thai ai? Khrih Jesuh lawngkhaw thawlh peel manawh; Ahih tah duek, tede tho koep, Pathen bantang ben ah ngawl tih mami hamla reenna avan bih.
Tedawngah a-u lawng mami he Khrih kah lungna dawng kalawng m'pekbo thai ai? Raina, heemtekna, khawkhana, khawdengna, mueirihtamyiin duekna lawngah m'pek thai ai aw?
Caciim lawngah, “Nangmi kawngah kaimi tah mueirihtamyiin duekna oen ah saringrupla khawyungkhun ka awm u; Ngawn ham a teeng mangkhak tuu angla kaimi he ka awm u” tila a thui angla awm tangtang.
N'tu lawngkhaw, pek thai manawh, he ang raina thaihu thli boeih he mami aka lungnakung rang oen mami lawng n'taa boeih ai.

Metihtiah n'tu thaihu lawngkhaw amah kah lungna dawng kalawng m'pekbo thai manawh tite aciimphanla ka ming: duekna oen hingna lawngkhaw, vanthlaang thli oen vaan kah ukkung thli tha-awm tharana lawngkhaw, tahe kah atue atang oen hailam ben atue-atang lawngkhaw,

dilai sawah aka awm thaihu, dilai dangah aka awm thaihu lawngkhaw mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen kah lungna dawng kalawng, a thaihu suen boeih khuikah me ang lawngkhaw m'pek thai roe manawh.
Awltak tang ka thui; Khrih kah thlaang la ka awm tih hoem awl ka thui nawh. Ciim Muithla lawng a uk athe atheen ka mingna lawngkhaw hoem awl ka thui nawh te a ming.
Ka thlaangphun ka thi ka sa la aka awm thli hamla ka kaw the tangkiik tih ka thinphatna lawng boet nawh.
Ahimi hamla atheen koei atah kai lawng Pathen kawsi yawkk tih Khrih oen pek u ham pateng ka ngaih ngaai.

Ahimi tah Pathen thlaangtuek ni: a ca la a khueh tih ahimi tengah a ruep-awmna te a tueng sak. Ahimi tengah awlkamna te a sai tih Phungawl thli te a peek u, ahimi lawng aka soeng bokna te a khueh u, Pathen kah awlkamna te a huh u,

Ahimi tah Hebru thlaangphun cuunkung patuer miingthang thli kah cadil la awm u, thlaanghing ben atah Khrih pateng ahimi kah a phun ni. Soeprep boeih ukkung Pathen tah yoeyahla a thaang theen hawn seh! Amen.

Israel thlaang thli he apumboeihla Pathen thlaangtuek la a awm aih nawh dawngah Pathen awlkam tah apoei-oep poen ni tila ka thui ngaihna nawh ni. Metihtiah Israel thlaang boeih he khaw Pathen kah thlaang boeih aih nawh ni.
Abraham cadil hue khaw apumboeihla Pathen cadil la awm boeih aih nawh. Pathen lawng Abraham te, “Kai lawng awl ka kam cadil nauha te Isak rang oen ah na khueh ai,” a tina.
A thuingaihna tah thlaanghing phung mailai oen cuun la aka awm ca-anau boeih he Pathen kah ca-anau la awm luem nawh. Pathen awlkam heet angla a cuun ca-anau te ni cadil nauha taktak la a khueh.
Pathen lawng awl a kam tah, “Atue atang a tluep vengah kava meel koep vetih Sarah lawng capa a cuun ai,” a tina te ni.
Tecoengah, he bueng nawh hun, Rebekka capa rawi lawngkhaw mami kah patuer Isak te ni anna pa na hih van.
Caciim lawng, “Jakob tah ka lungna tih Esau tah ka thina,” a ti angla ni.
Tetih atah Pathen he tuueng-aleng roe nawh n'ti thai ai aw? N'ti manawh.
Metihtiah Mosi tengah, “Kamah lawng ka ngaih te ka reen vetih; kamah lawng ka ngaih te tah ka thintlawhna ai,” tila a thui.
Tedawngah soeprep he mami thlaanghing kawngaih oen saina dawng nawh tih Pathen kah reenna rang oen ni.
Pathen lawng Iyipt sengpahrang nala, “Kai kah tharana huham oen ah dilai pum ah ka miing aka thang sak ham roe la nang tah sengpahrang la kan khueh,” tila caciim lawng a thui.
Tedawngah Pathen lawng amah ngaih te tah a reen tih amah lawng a ngaih te tah a thin a haam sak mai poen.
Tede nangmi tim kah thlaang pakhat mai lawngah, “He tila a awm oh atah a-u lawngah Pathen kawngaih te a oelh ataih thai ai,” na ti u mai ai.
Ka paya, nang ta a-u la na awm aih tih Pathen te awl na thung ngam? Dilai am lawng ambawpkung te, “N'tu ah he tila nan sai,” tila doet nawh.
Ambawpkung lawngah amlai te a lawh tih amah ngaih angla a sai thai tih amlaiboeng pakhat te am pahih la a sai tih pakhat te tah awmthoet ah hawna am mailai oen ah pakhat te tah tuisii-am la a sai.

Tetih van la te Pathen thaihu sai khaw awm. A thinsana oen a tharana te tueng sak ham a ngaih, tede ahih kah thinsana a yawkk dawngah rawk tih phe ham koeila aka awm thli sawah thinsan kawdawna a khueh.
Tecoengah amah kah aka soep ruep-awmna te tueng sak a ngaih tih amah kah reenna aka dang mami sawah a ruep-awmna te avan toi, mami he a ruep-awmna dang hamla a roek a bah tangte poen ni.
Mami tah a thlaangkhue la ng'awm u, Judah thlaangphun timkah bueng nawh tih Gental thlaangphun timkah khaw a khue.
He tah Hosi cabu khuiah a thui te ni: “Ka thlaang la ka awm nawh thli te ‘Ka thlaang,’ ka tina ai. Ka lungna nawh thlaangphun te, ‘Ka lungna thlaangphun,’ ka tina ai.
‘Nangmi tah ka thlaang la na awm u nawh' a tina huen roe ah nangmi tah aka hing Pathen kah ca-anau thli ni a tina ai,” tila a thui.
Israel thlaangphun kawngah Isaiah lawng, “Israel thlaangphun he tuitunlii keengkah divinlai yoeh maila pateng yahawh cakhaw ahimi timkah thlaang a yawlca bueng lawng ni thlawnna a dang ai;
Metihtiah, dilai he amah kah athe atheenna angla Bawipa lawng awl a cek yue ai,” tila a thui.

He veng thlan ah Isaiah lawng, “Tharakoek Bawipa lawng mami kah cadil nauha khatsut te thlung nawh kawinih mami he Sodom angla n'coengg vetih, Gomorrah angla ni ng' awm poen ai” tila a thui oepsoeh poen.
Tedawngah kaimi lawng ka thui tah Pathen oen roeproei ham aka yawm nawh Gental thlaangphun lawngah oengna rang oen ah Pathen oen roeproei u poen;
Tede Pathen oen roeproeina hamla phungawl aka tlap khiing Pathen kah thlaangphun lawngah roepna te dang u nawh.
N'tu ah a dang u nawh? Ahimi lawng oengna dawngah pangtung nawh tih amami kah saina te a uep apaangna dawngah ni. Te tila “Ploengna lungto dawngah ploeng u tih,

Caciim lawngah, “Bueh lah! Zaion ah lungto pakhat ka khueh, te lungto lawng thlaang thli te a ploeng sak vetih, te lunghiim lawngah ahimi te a tlim sak ai. Tede a-u khaw ahih te a tangna atah yaraula awm tlaih manawh,” tila a thui.
Maya manau thli, ka thlaangphun lawng thlawnna dang u seh tila thinkaw tak oen ka ngaih tangkiik! Ahimi ham metihtlukla Pathen tengah ka thangthui.
Ahimi lawng a thinkaw te Pathen a peek tangtang tila nangmi tengah ka thui rapcaat thai; tede ahimi kah thinkaw a peek he cuihna taktak dawngah kung asut moenih.

Pathen lawng thlaang he me ang along a-im oen amah oen ah a roep u sak ti he ahimi lawng ming u nawh, amami kah lawngpui te sai ham a yawm u dai, tedawngah Pathen lawng amah oen thlaanghing roepna a sai lawngpui te paang u nawh.
Jesuh Khrih lawng Phungawl te aboet sak poen dawngah a-u khaw aka tangna thlaang boeih tah Pathen oen roeproeina a dang poen.
Mosi lawngtah Phungawl vaina rang oen Pathen oen ah roepna kawng te a thut: “A-u khaw Phungawl lawng sai a tite aka sai boeih tah hing ai,” ti.

Tede Caciim lawng, oengna rang oen Pathen oen ah roeproeina kawng a thui tah tila ni: “Nang lawngah, a-u nuem vaan la aka luui hang ai?’ tila namah oen namah te doet u boel,” (te tah Khrih te aka rum puei ham tila thuingaihna ni.)
“A-u nuem celkhui khaw la aka cet thuk ai? tila khaw ti boel?. (te tah Khrih te duekna kalawng thawh sak ham tila thuingaihna ni.)
A thui awl lawngtah, “Pathen awl tah na tengah awm, na huui na kaa dawngah na thinkaw khuiah awm” a tite tah kaimi lawng ka phawng u oengna awlthang he ni.
Jesuh tah Bawipa ni tila na phawng u tih Pathen lawngah ahih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak koep tila thinkaw oen na tangna u atah thlawn la na awm ai.
Metihtiah mami lawng oengna rang oen Pathen oen ah roeproeina n'huh; kaa oen m'phawng tih thlawnna n'dang u.
Caciim lawng, “A-u khaw amah aka tangna boeih tah yarau yahdengla awm manawh” ti.

Metihtiah Judah oen Gental thlaangphun pekthlena a awm tlaih nawh dawngah thlaang boeih thuum poen; Pathen tah thlaang boeih kah Bawipa la awm tih amah te aka khue boeih tah yotheen kawthawina yahawh hlang a lun thil.
Caciim lawng, “A-u lawngkhaw bawmna a ngaih dawngah Bawipa te a khue atah thlawnna a dang ai,” tila a thui angla te awm tangtang.

Tede ahimi lawng a tangna nawh atah bawmna dang ham metila a miing te a khue thai ai? Ahimi lawng awlthang te a yaak nawh atah metila a tangna thai ai? Awlthang te a thui nawh atah metila ahimi lawng a yaak thai ai?

A thuikung laipai te tuih la a awm nawh atah metila awlthang te a phawng ai? Caciim lawng, “Awlthang Theen van khuenkung laipai thli kah a khow tah theen tangkiik hlang mah aw!” tila a thui angla awm tangtang.
Tede thlaang boeih lawng Awlthang Theen te do u nawh. Isaiah amah lawngkhaw, “Bawipa, kaimi lawng ka phawng u awlthang he a-u lawng a tangna?” tila a thui.
Tedawngah oengna tah awlthang yaakna dawng kalawng va law tih awlthang tah Khrih te thuina dawng kalawng va law.

Tede awldoet ka ngaih tah: ahimi lawng awlthang he ya u nawh tangtang aw? A yaak u ta; Metihtiah Caciim lawng, “Ahimi kah paang awl lawng dilai pum ah thaang khok tih ahimi awl tah dilai boetna toe kheng a pha,” tila a thui.

Koep kan doet lah ai: Israel thlaang-thli lawng yaakming u nawh aw? Lamhacuekla awl aka thung ham tah Mosi amah ni. Ahih lawng, “Ka thlaangphun te uett-ee hamla, thlaangphun la toeksam nawh te ka hawna vetih, thlaang ngau paathuu phun rang oen ka thlaangphun te a thin ka sa sak ai,” tila a thui.
Tong-aa ohla Isaiah lawng thincakla a thui tah, “Kai aka tlap nawh thlaang thli lawng ng'huh u; Kai he aka thoel-alang nawh thlaang thli tengah ka phumpho pe,” tila a thui.
Tede Israel thlaangphun kawng oen tuhkaila tah, “Awl ngaai nawh tih ceem raal la aka tho thlaang thli te do hamla khawyungkhun kut ka son,” tila a thui.
Tetih atah Pathen lawng a thlaang thli te a hoett poen aw? Hoett roe roe nawh! Kai kamah khaw Israel thlaang, Abraham cadil, Benjamin phun ni.
Pathen lawng acuekca kalawng a tuek tangte a thlaang thli te hoett sut nawh. Caciim dawngkah awl, Elijah lawngah Israelca thli sawah a kaw a lawna nawh Pathen tengah a thui te nangmi lawng na ming u:
Elijah lawng, “Bawipa, nang kah tawngha thli te a ngawn u tih nang kah bokna-thaang khaw a phe boeih u; kai bueng he ka deem de, kai khaw ngawn ham n'teeng u” a tina.
Pathen lawng n'tu awl a thui pe? “Baal pathen rawlrap aka bok nawh thlaang thong sarih kamah hamla ka paih hun” a tina.
Tetih toeng la ni tahe khaw a awm: Pathen lawng a lungvatna dawngah a tuek tangte ayawl tah awm van hun.

Pathen kah tuekna tah ahimi kah saina dawngah nawh tih amah kah lungvatna dawngah ni kung asut. Pathen kah tuekna he thlaanghing kah saina dawngah kung asut atah ahih kah lungvatna te lungvatna tangtang la awm manawh.
Tetih atah metila a awm? Israel hue lawng a tlap te hu u nawh. Pathen lawng a tuek ayawlca bueng lawng ni a huh; atloe hue tah a haa pang malhtalh tih Pathen kah khuena awl te ya nawh.
Caciim lawngah, “Pathen lawng ahimi kah thinkaw oen lungbui te a mong sak; tihin toe ah ahimi lawng hu thai nawh tih ya thai u nawh,” tila a thui angla awm tangtang.
Tecoengah Devid lawng, “Amami kah poei khuiah tu selang dong dawngah man u seh; Ahimi te ploeng u selang dan tat u seh!.
Ahimi lawng a huh thaina nawh ham a mik thli te pum sak selang; patang raina thalrih phueih uett ah a uen te khun roepsoet u seh,” tila a thui.

Tetih atah awl kan doet u lah ai: Judah thlaang thli lawng a tlim u vengah rawk poe taktak poen aw? A rawk tang aih moenih. Ahimi lawng a thawlh u dawngah Gental thlaang thli tengah thlawnna te va law. Tedawngah Judah thlaang thli lawng uett-eena ahimi sawah a khueh u.

Judah thlaang thli kah thawlhna lawng dilai ah yotheen kam-awmna yahawh avan khuen tih ahimi kah sung-adeuhna lawng Gental hue hamla yotheen kam-awmna yahawh hlang avan khuen. Tecoengah Judah thlaang yahawh lawng asoepcala a thuum u van veng atah yotheen kam-awmna te metihtlukla asoep tare ai!
Tahe tah Gental thlaang thli nangmi tengah awl kavan thui. Gental hue nangmi tengah celtuih la ka awm khui roekk tah bii ka bina dawngah ka thangpawm u ai.
Ka thlaangphun thli te uett-eena thinkaw a khueh sak he tah thlaangvaang mai khaw thlawn thaina ham ni.

Metihtiah ahimi te hoett sut la a awm vengah thlaangtloe boeih te Pathen kah raal la awmna kalawng a paya laikoei la a sai. Tedawngah ahimi Judah thlaangphun te a do koep veng atah metila a awm tare ai? Thlaangduek thli ham hingna la coengg ai.

Takawi lamhacuek la thluem at te Pathen teng a nawn atah takawi boeih amah koe la awm poen; tecoengah thingkung ayung te Pathen tengah na nawn poen atah a beek-athleeng boeih te ahih kah akoe la awm poen.

Olif thingkung a liing u a beek thli khatsut te a tloek u tih te kah thingngaw dawngah te olif thingkung rawlrap a beek thli te oen a cong u. Te tila nangmi Gental thlaangphun khaw olif thing rawlrap angla na awm u tih, tahe tah Judah thlaangphun thli kah muithla ben hingna tharana te na bawn u van poen.

Tedawngah olif thingbeek tloek poet angla aka awm thli te huhsit u boel. Metila nangmi lawng na oekthloen thai lauh? Nangmi tah a beek mai ni; nangmi lawng akungpui te na cawm na cah moenih, nangmi te ni akungpui lawng n'cawm u.
Tede nangmi lawng, “Kaimi awmna hamla ni a beek thli te a tloek” na ti u mai ai.
Te ngoen tah soeng tangtang. Ahimi lawng a oeng u nawh dawngah a tloek tangtang, nangmi tah na oeng u dawngah na awmna huen ah te na awm u. Tede he kawngah oekthloen u boel lang rih lat u hawn.
Thingkung kah a beek tangtang la aka awm Judah hue pateng Pathen lawng a thlung nawh atah nangmi te n'thlung ai tila na poek aw?

He ah he Pathen kah thlaang reenna kaw a poekna oen rih koei la a awm te n'huh u. Aka tlim thli ham tah rih awm tangkiik tede nangmi te tah n'reen u, nangmi lawng a reenna khuiah na awm u poe atah reenna kaw avan poek ai, tede na awm u nawh atah nangmi khaw tloek poet la na awm u van ai.
Judah thlaangphun lawng a oengna nawh paihuen te a ceh taak u atah acuek kah a awmna paihuen ah te a khueh koep ai, Pathen lawngtah khueh koep thaina nawl a khueh.

Nangmi Gental thlaang thli tah, ramhum ah amah poek aka po olif thingkung dawngkah a beek thli a tloek poet tih olif thingkung tang dawngah a cong tlap oen na lo u. Judah thlaang thli tah olif thingkung tang oen lo u tih olif thingkung tang dawng-kah a tloek poet a beek thli te akungpui tang dawngah cong koep hamla Pathen ham tah yoeica mai.

Ka maya manau thli, nangmi lawng ka cuih ka hoe heet poen tila na poek u nawh ham nangmi te ming sak ka ngaih awlhuep pakhat awm. Te awlhuep tah he ni. Israel thlaang thli a thin a haam khaklal he aboet toe ham nawh ni, Gental thlaang thli Pathen tengah asoepcala apha thlan khui ham bueng ni.
Tecoengah Israel thlaang boeih thlawn la a awm na ham tah he tila ni. Caciim lawng, “Zaion kalawng Thlawnkung tah law vetih Jakob cadil thli kah athe arana boeih te a voeih ai.
Ahimi kah thawlhna te ka lawh pe boeih vengah he awlkamna he ahimi oen ka sai ai,” tila a thui.

Awlthang Theen a hoett u dawngah Judah hue tah Pathen kah raal la awm u. Te tah nangmi Gental thlaang thli theenna ham ni. Tede Pathen kah tuekna ben atah ahimi tah amami kah patuer thli rang oen Pathen kah paya laikoei la awm u.
Pathen lawngtah a tuek thlaang thli oen yotheen kam-awm a peek thlaang thli kawngah a kawpoek thloet nawh.
Nangmi Gental thli lawng anoekbuet atah Pathen awl te na ngaai u nawh, tede tahe ah Judah thlaang thli lawng a awl a ngaai pe u nawh dawngah nangmi lawng Pathen reenna te na dang u.
Tetih van angla nangmi lawng na dang u reenna te ahimi lawngkhaw Pathen reenna te tahe ah a dangna u van ham Judah thli lawng tahe toe ah Pathen awl te ngaai pe u nawh.
Pathen lawng thlaang boeih he awl ngaai nawh thongtla thlaang la a sai he tah ahimi boeih tengah a reenna te tueng sak ham a ngaih dawngah ni.
Pathen tah len kueng tangkiik mah aw! A cuihna oen a mingna tah dung tangkiik mah aw! A awltloekna he a-u lawng a thuicaih thai ai? A thaihu sai along a-im he a-u lawng a yaakming thai lek ai?
Caciim lawng, “Bawipa kah thinkaw te a-u lawng a ming? a-u lawngah poekna a peek thai?
Ahih lawng sah koep hamla a-u lawngah thaihu a peek?” tila a thui angla te awm.
Thaihu boeih he amah lawng a sai, thaihu boeih amah rang oen awm tih amah ham ni. Pathen tengah ayoeyahla ruep-awmna awm hawn seh! Amen.

Tedawngah maya manau thli, Pathen lawng mami he n'reen tangkiik dawngah amah bii bina ah amah kah kawtlaak la aka hing luciik angla na pum te Pathen tengah nawn uh tila nangmi te kan ceel u. He tah aka soeng bokna tih nangmi lawng na peek ham koei bokna te ni.

He dilai khawsak siing angla khaw sa u tlaih boel, tede Pathen lawng nangmi thinkaw a khui ben te asoepbirla van thaw pan hawn seh. Te atah aka theen thaihu, aka soep thaihu oen amah kawtlaak te nangmi lawng na ming u thai ai, he tah Pathen amah kawngaih ni.

Pathen kah lungvatna kutdo ka dangna rang oen he awl he nangmi boeih tengah ka thui: Namah oen namah te atuueng aleng lak ah asang la poek u aih boel. Te lak atah Pathen lawng oengna m'peek taring ah namah oen namah te nainawng u lah.
Mami lawng pum pakhat dawngah abeek yahawh n'khueh u tih, he a beek thli lawng bii atloe tloe rip a khueh u.

Tetih van la mami khaw thlaang yahawh mai de Khrih ah pumkhatla awmna rang oen pumkhatla n'coengg tih pum dawngkah abeek tloe tloe he pakhat oen pakhat a tuhkai u van angla mami khaw khat oen khat m'pha u boeih.

Tedawngah kutdo aphun tloetloe n'dang rip u tah Pathen kah peek lungvatna kutdo n'dang taring ah hawna u sih. Pathen kah awl te thui thaina kutdo te n'dang u atah oengna n'khueh taring ah hawna ham awm;
thlaangtloe ham bii bi koei atah bi ham awm; cang puei koei atah cang puei ham awm;

Thlaang te thapeek koei atah tha peek ham awm; khuehtoen thaihu te thlaangtloe rekra koei atah moeihoeihna oen rekra ham awm. Saithaina aana te n'dang atah bii yawm ham awm; thlaangtloe tengah thintlawhna tueng sak ham koei atah reenna oen tueng sak ham awm.
Nangmi kah lungna te thinkaw tak oen na lung u ham awm. Athe te thina uh, atheen te phoeih mangkhak uh.
Pakhat oen khat Khrihca maya manau angla lung u the lang thinkaw tak oen ah pakhat oen khat hinyahna te tueng sak uh.
Na tha rang sak uh, tha-ngak la awm u boel. Bawipa bii te na thinkaw tak oen bi uh;
Na ngaiuepna na khuehna dawng teah na tha thlue sak uh; raina na tawng u vengah thinsan kawdaw oen awm u lang thangthui yoeyah uh.
Khrihca na puei na paw thli kah a voetna ah te dodan u lang na im ah kamyin te pah sak uh.
Nangmi heemtekkung thli ham Pathen tengah kam-awm yotheenna bih pe uh; Oe, yotheen kam-awmna bih pe uh; tapvoep u boel.
Awmngaih thlaang thli tengah awmngaih u van. Rungrah oen aka awm thlaang thli tengah rap u van.
Pakhat oen pakhat roeproei patoeng uh. Oekthloen u boel; tede huhsit koei bii te khaw bi uh. Namah oen namah te thlaangcuih la poek u boel.
Nangmi sawah thlaang lawng athe a sai atah ahih te athe oen thung u boel. Thlaang boeih lawng theen tila a poek te sai hamla yawm.
Thlaang boeih oen roeproeicala awm ham soeprep boeih te acoengg thai khui sai u lah.
Ka puei thli mevengah khaw luu lo u boel, te lak atah Pathen thinsana lawng sai ngoen seh. Caciim lawngah, “Kai lawng luu ka lo ai, kai lawngah kut ka thung ai, Bawipa lawng ti,” tila a thui.
Te tih atah, “Na raal te a bung a pawng atah buh van cah, tui a halh atah tui van awkk sak; he tila na saina oen ah nang lawng ahih te yah na bai poen ni” tila caciim lawng a thui angla te sai uh.
Nangmi te athe lawng n'taa boel seh; Atheen saina oen athe te taa hamla yawm uh.
Thlaang boeih lawngah ram ukbawi thli te hinyah uh, metihtiah Pathen kah hatlaakna a awm nawh atah ukkung bawi khaw awm nawh tih tahe vengkah ukkung thli khaw Pathen lawng a khueh ukkung hue ni.
A-u khaw tahe vengkah ukkung thli aka oel khak tah Pathen kah awlthlaw te aka oelkung ni, a-u khaw te tila aka sai te tah amah sawah awlcekna a thoeng sak ai.

Theenna aka sai hue lawngtah ukkung bawi thli he rih hamla awm nawh, tede athe aka sai thli lawng ni rih ham a awm. Nang lawng aana khuehkung thli te rih ohla awm ham na ngaih atah theenna te sai lah, nang te ahih lawng n'koeh ai.

Metihtiah ahih tah Pathen kah tuihyoeih-thlaang tih nang ham theenna aka sai hamla ni. Tede nang lawng athe te na sai atah ahih te rih hawn, Metihtiah dantat thaina aana te a khueh tangtang. Ahih tah Pathen kah tuihyoeih-thlaang la awm tih athe-arana aka sai boeih sawah Pathen yuengah dantatna aka thoengsakkung ni.
He kah akawng alam dawngah nang lawng ukkung thli kah awl te ngaai peh, Pathen kah dantatna na rih u dawngah a awl ngaai pe mai ohla athe atheen pekbona kawpoek theen oen a awl ngaai pe uh.
Mangmu na peek u khaw he kawngah ni, metihtiah ukkung thli lawng bii a bi u te Pathen ham ni a bi.
Tedawngah ahimi na peek ham koei te tah pe uh; namah kah pumpakla peek ham koei mangmu oen kaawn-ava phu mangmu te khaw pe u langtah ahimi boeih te mik-hai yahna lang hinyah uh.
A-u tengah khaw laiba khueh u boel, nang lawng laiba na khueh tah khat oen khat lung u ham he ni. A-u khaw a thlaangpuei te a lungna atah Phungawl te a vai poen.

Phungawl lawngah, “Samphaih boel, thlaang ngawn boel, huuen boel, thlaang kah thaihu naai boel,” a ti boeih oen ah he thloei kah atloe awlpeek boeih tah, namah oen namah te na lungna u van angla na imbe te lungnah,” a tina dawngah te cui boeih poen.
Thlaang pakhat te na lungna atah meveng khaw a sawah athe te na sai roe manawh; tedawngah Phungawl boeih asoepla vaina he tah lungna ni.

Nangmi lawng he tah na sai u ham awm, metihtiah nangmi ham na ihduhna kalawng hinghang hamla atue avan pha poen tila na ming u. Metihtiah mami he thlawn la awmna ham atue atang tah mami lawng oengna n'khueh cuek vengkah lak ah tahe ah yoeii tare poen.
Yiinna tah boet tawm poen, khaw daai hang poen ai. Yiinna thaihu sai te toeng u poen silang tah aangna khuiah raal kahna awva te lo u sih.

Hingthun khawse ah aka awm thlaang thli angla mami lawng akoeih avaihla hing u sih, khawpaw rang au la awm u boel, yuuruui buh hah oen awm tlaih u boel, hutaa tawngpa thawlhna, boethe halangna awm boel seh, tawhsina oen uett-eena awm boel seh.
Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah awva te lo uh, na pumsa kah thawlh sai ngaihna oen thawlhna kah kawkhuekna te toeng u loeih.
Oengna ben ah tha aka yoek thlaang thli te van do u lah, tede ahimi kah pumpakla a poek akawng alam dawngah ahimi oen oelhtaih u boel.
Thlaang pakhat lawngtah a oengna oen me ang khaw a caak boeih, tede oengna tha aka ra nawh lawngtah tawi-an bueng te a caak.

Soeprep aka ca thlaang lawngah te tila aka ca nawh te huhsit hamla awm nawh; soeprep aka ca thlaang te khaw tawi-an bueng aka ca thlaang lawngkhaw huhsit van boel seh. Metihtiah Pathen lawng ahih te a do poen.

Nang ta a-u la na awm aih tih thlaangtloe kah tuihyoeihthlaang te awl na cek thai? Te tuihyoeihthlaang lawng a bi thai, bi thai nawh tila awl-khuengkung tah amah kah Bawipa te ni. Ahih lawng a bi thai ai, metihtiah Bawipa lawng a bi sak thai ai.

Thlaang khatsut lawng atloe khawhin boeih lak ah khawhin hin at te awlpui bet la a poek, atloe pakhat lawngtah khawhin boeih he vai u tila a poek. Pakhat rip lawng a thinkaw ah a soengna te khueh seh.

A-u khaw, khawhin hin at te alue koek la a poek atah Bawipa te a hinyahna ni. A-u lawngkhaw soeprep boeih a caak atah Bawipa te a hinyahna ni. Metihtiah ahih lawng caak awkk dawngah te Bawipa tengah awmngaih ciil a thui. Caak awkk te aka yeh khatsut lawngkhaw Bawipa te hinyahna la a yeh van tih Bawipa tengah awmngaih ciil a thui.
Mami tim ah he a-u khaw mah ham bueng n'hing nawh tih mah ham bueng la n'duek nawh baal.
Mami lawng hing atah Bawipa ham n'hing u tih, duek ah khaw Bawipa ham ni duek u. Tedawngah mami tah n'duek ah khaw seh, hing ah khaw seh Bawipa kah thlaang ni.
Metihtiah thlaang duek oen thlaanghing boeih kah Bawipa la awm ham Khrih tah duek tih tho koep poen.

Tedawngah nangmi tawi-an bueng aka ca thli lawng n'tu hamla na maya manau te na coel khuep u? Tetih atah nangmi acungkuem aka ca lawng n'tu ah na maya manau te na hep na hap u? Mami boeih he Pathen haiah m'pai vetih amah lawng awl n'cek ai.

Metihtiah Caciim dawngah, “Kai tah aka hing Pathen la ka awm tangtang van angla Thlaang boeih lawng ka haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng ai, Kai he Pathen ni tila a phawng u ai, tila Bawipa lawng ti,” tila a thui.
Tedawngah mami boeih lawngah mah kah saina boeih te Pathen haiah m'phawng ai.
Tedawngah pakhat oen pakhat coelna he toeng u poen sih. Te lak atah, na maya manau a tlimna ham oen thawlhna khuiah a tlaakna koei te metuek khaw sai nawh ham tha huer uh.

Bawipa Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna lawngah aciimphanla m'ming sak tah amah poek ah aciimcaih nawh caak awkk he a awm moenih ti he ni; tede thlaang pakhat lawngah khatsut caak awkk te caih nawh tila a poek atah te caak awkk tah ahih ham ciim-acaih nawh.

Nang lawng caak awkk pakhat khat oen na maya manau te a kaw na hoe sak nawh atah, te tah lungna dawngkah aka thoeng saina tlaih nawh ni. Ahih hamla Khrih tah a duek dawngah nang kah caak awkk oen ahih te tlim sak boel.
Nangmi lawng theen na ti u te miing the dangna hamla coeng sak boel.
Metihtiah Pathen kah Ram tah caak awkk dawng awm nawh tih Ciim Muithla kah peek doengna, ngaimawngna oen awmngaihna dawngah ni a awm.
He tila Khrih kah bii te aka bi lawngtah Pathen te a awmngaih sak tih thlaang lawngkhaw a koeh.
Tedawngah ngaimawngna taktak aka thoeng sak thaihu thli oen khat oen khat thara sak koei bawmcemna te mami lawng mengteng yoeyah ham awm.
Caak awkk dawng maiah Pathen kah sai tangte te phe u boel. Caak awkk boeih he caak koei ni, tede thlaang pakhat khat thawlhna ah aka tlim sak koei caak awkk he tah thawlhna ni.
Asoeng thaihu sai ham tah, na maya manau aka tlim sak thaihu saina, meh caakna, misuryuu awkkna te na kuemsuem u ham awm.

He kawng tah namah lawng na tangna angla te awm selang tah Pathen oen namah laklaw kah tuhkaina la khueh hawn. A-u khaw soeng a ti angla pakhat khat te a sai tih thinkaw a ciim atah yotheen aka dawng ni!

Tede caak awkk te a caak vengah ngaithliwhna a khueh atah Pathen lawng ahih te dan a tat ai. Metihtiah ahih lawng a sai te oengna dawngah akung a sut nawh dawngah ni. Thaihu boeih he oengna dawngah akung a sut nawh atah thawlhna ni.
Mami oengna tha aka ra hue lawngah amami kah thalrih phueih ham tha aka yoek thli te talawng takai ham awm. Mami lawng mah bueng kah ngaikhuekna te sai ham awm nawh.
Te lak ah, mami kah maya manau lawngah theenna koei, oengna ah a roengna koei te mami boeih lawng sai ham awm.
Metihtiah Khrih lawngkhaw amah kah ngaikhuekna te sai nawh. Te lak ah, Caciim lawng, “Nang salphaamna awl te ka sawah tla poen,” a ti angla te awm.

Caciim dawngah a thut soeprep boeih tah mami he cangpueina ham oen toelthaamna ham ni. Te tila a thut te tah, Caciim lawng mami m'peek uehthaina oen thincakna rang oen ah mami lawng ngaiuepna te khueh ham ni.
Khrih Jesuh kah lawngpui huh sakna te na vaina rang oen thinkaw khat la khueh thai ham ueh-thaina oen thincakna kungmah Pathen lawngah nangmi te n'bawmcem hawn seh.
Te atah nangmi boeih lawng thik at la awlkaa pakhat la te mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ana Pa oen Pathen te na thangpawm thai ai.
Khrih lawngah nangmi n'do van angla Pathen kah ruep-awmna a tuengna ham nangmi khat oen khat do u van lah.

Tedawngah nangmi tengah kavan thui tah Judah thlaang thli yuengla Khrih tah tuihyoeihthlaang la coengg, Te tah Pathen lawng ahimi kah patuer thli tengah awl a kam te asoepna ham oen ah Pathen tah uep-awm ni tite tueng sak ham tih,

Gental thlaangphun lawng-khaw Pathen amah kah reenna te a thangpawmna thai ham ni. Caciim lawngah, “Tedawngah Gental thlaangphun tim ah nang te kan thangpawm ai, Nang koehna laa ka sa ai” tila a thui.
A thui koep baal tih, “Gental thlaangphun Pathen kah thlaang thli oen awmngaih u lah.”
Koekthoek ah, “Gental thlaang boeih lawng Bawipa te thangpawm uh; thlaang boeih lawng Bawipa te thangpawm uh,” tila a thui.
Tecoengah Isaiah lawng, “Jesi kah cadil pakhat law ai; ahih tah Gental thlaangphun uk hamla law vetih ahimi lawng ahih dawngah ngaiuepna a khueh u ai,” tila a thui.

Ciim Muithla tharana oen nangmi kah ngaiuepna te roep poepa ham ngaiuepna kungpui, Pathen lawngah amah te na oengna rang oen awm-ngaihna oen ngaimawngna boeih oen ah nangmi te abetoetla n'toi hawn seh.
Maya manau thli: Nangmi tah theenna oen na be u, Cuihhoena na khueh u tih pakhat oen pakhat na cang puei patoeng u thai tite kamah roe lawng atheenla ka ming.
Tecakhaw, he capat dawngah kan ming sak koep ham ka ngaih akawng alam khatsut te raltheenla oen ka thut. Ka raltheenna tah Pathen lawng Gental thlaangphun ham bii aka bi la,

Khrih Jesuh kah tuihyoeihthlaang la awmna te m'peek dawngah ni. Gental thlaangphun lawngah Pathen kah do koei luciik la a awmna ham oen ah Ciim Muithla rang oen Pathen tengah nawn koei thaihu la awmna ham Pathen tengkah, Awlthang Theen ka phawng vengah he khawsoeih angla bii ka bi.
Tedawngah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhat-la awmna rang oen Pathen bii ka bi he ka pawmsang u.
Gental thlaangphun te mawt ham oen Pathen awl te a ngaaina u ham awlkaa oen khawseh, saina oen khawseh,
kawpoek rai saina oen khawseh, kawpoek rai tharana oen khawseh, Pathen Muithla tharana oen khawseh, Khrih kah a sai bueng te ni raltheenla ka thui ai.
Ka kamthlahna poepa tah Khrih kawng a yaakna nawh ahuen amawl ah Awlthang Theen phawng ham he ni, thlaangtloe lawngah imtuung a sut tangte sawah im sak ham nawh ni.
Caciim lawngah, “Ahih kah akawng te aka thui noek nawh hue lawng a huh u vetih aka ya noek nawh thli lawng a yaakming u ai,” tila a thui angla te awm.
He dawngah ni nangmi tengah law heem te kanghalh la ka awm poepa.
Tede, tahe atah he peng yunyan ah bii ka coeng poen tih nangmi tengah law hamla kum yahawh hlang ka cai puet angla,

tahe tah nangmi tengah ka law thai poen ai tila ka ngaiuep. Sping ram la yin ka ceh vengah nangmi oen huh u ham ka ngaih tih nangmi tengah kawlkalh ka cam coengah tela te ceh ham tah nan bawm u ham ka ngaih.
Tede tahe tah kawlkalh ah Jerusalem khawpui la ka cet de silang te kah Pathen thlaang thli ham bii ka bi pe de ai.
Macidonia ram oen Akhaia ram kah Khrihcabu lawng Jerusalem ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli timkah khawdeng lungma thli te kawthawh oen bawm hamla awl a tloek u tih thaihu peek a khueh u.

Te tila awltloekna a khueh u te tah amami kah kawthawh oen ni; tede ataktang atah ahimi lawng-khaw, khawdeng thli bawm ham te a sai koei bii van ni. Judah thlaangphun lawng Muithla ben kah yotheenna te Gental hue tengah arek ara van angla Gental hue lawngkhaw amami kah thaihu thaiha yotheenna a dang te oen Judah thlaangphun te a bawm van ham awm.
He bii he ka coeng tih ahimi ham a cawi pe tangka boeih te ahimi kut ah ka tloeng pe boeih coengah Sping ram la ka cet vetih nangmi tengah ka law pahoei ai.
Nangmi tengla ka law vengah Khrih kah yotheenna asoepbir oen ka law ai tila ka ming.
Maya manau thli, mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih oen Muithla kah peek lungna oen ah kai hamla kamah oen haih Pathen tengah thinkaw thluembuekcala thangthui ham kan ceel u.
Judia ram kah aka oeng nawh hue teng kalawng ading asuekla ka awmna ham oen Jerusalem ah bii ka bi te, te kah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli lawng awmngaih oen a do thaina ham thangthui u lah.
Tedawngah Pathen kawngaih atah awmngaih oen nangmi teng ka law vetih nangmi tengah kamyin la ka law he kawhoena oen thadueng thaai dangna la awm ai.
Mami ngaimawngna kungpui Pathen tah nangmi boeih tengah awm hawn seh. Amen.
Kenkhria khaaw kah Khrihcabu ah bii aka bi mami kah ngannu Fibi te nangmi tengah ming sak ham ka ngaih.

Pathen thlaang thli tah pakhat oen khat na do tueng van angla Bawipa miing oen ah ahih te do u lang angoe boeih te nangmi lawng van bawm uh; ahih tah thlaang yahawh ham paya theen la awm tih kai hamla khaw awm van.
Khrih Jesuh kah bii bina dawngah bii bi haih Priscilla oen Akuila te kavan toei.
Ahih rawi lawng kai hamla duek ngam hih. Ahih rawi te ka uem tangkiik, kai bueng nawh tih Gental Khrihcabu boeih lawngkhaw a uem u.
Ahih rawi im ah aka pum Khrihcabu te khaw kan toei u. Asia ram ah Khrih aka oeng lamhacuek, ka lungna ka paya Epenetas khaw kan toei.
Nangmi ham bii aka yawm Meri khaw ka toei.

Andronikas oen Junias te khaw ka toei, ahih rawi tah kai oen thong aka tla haih Judah thlaangphun ni. Ahih rawi te celtuih thli lawngkhaw atheenla a ming u. Kai lak ah lamhala Khrihca la aka awm hih ni.
Bawipa oen pawlneengna ah ka lungna paya theen Ampliatas khaw kan toei.
Khrih kah bii dawngah biibipuei Urbanas oen ka lungna paya Stakhis khaw kan toei hih.
Khrih ah uep-awm Apellis khaw kan toei. Aristobulas imkhuikaw khaw kan toei u.
Kamah kah Judah thlaangphun Herodion oen Nasisas imkhuikaw Khrihca maya manau khaw kan toei u.
Bawipa bii aka bi Traifina oen Traifosa khaw kan toei hih tih, Bawipa ham bii yahawh ngaai aka bi ka lungna ka paya Persis khaw kan toei.
Bawipa kah bii dawngah tha aka huer Rutas oen kai he a ca angla dodankung a manu te khaw kan toei hih.
Asinkritas, Flekon, Harmis, Patrobas, Harmas, ahimi oen ah aka awm haih atloe Khrihca maya manau boeih te kan toei u.
Filolokas oen Julia, Nirias oen a ngannu Olimpas oen ah ahimi oen aka awm haih Pathen kah thlaang boeih te kan toei u.
Nangmi pakhat oen khat maya manau angla toei u lah. Khrih kah Khrihcabu boeih lawng nangmi te n'toei u.

Maya manau thli: pekbona aka thoeng sak thli oen oengna te aka thumhang sak oen ah nangmi lawng na cang u tangte cangpueina aka oelh-taih thli te ngaithuen ham kan uen u: Ahimi teng kalawng thloeng uh.

Metihtiah te ang thaihu aka sai hue te tah mami Bawipa Khrih kah bii aka bi nawh ni, amami kawngaih ni a sai u. Ahimi lawngah awlding awltheen oen koehna awl oen ah tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang-thli te athai alatna u.

Nangmi lawng awlthang theen dawngah ueppang koeila na awm u te thlaang boeih lawng a yaak u, tedawngah he kawngah he nangmi sawah ka kaw hoe tangkiik. Nangmi te theenna ben atah thlaangcuih la awm ham, tede athe ben atah tu khaw aka ming nawh angla awm sak ham ka ngaih.
Mami kah ngaimawngna kungpui Pathen lawngah Seitan te nangmi kah khowtang ah a neet yue poen ai. Mami Bawipa Jesuh kah lungvatna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh.
Kai oen biibipuei Timote lawng nangmi te n'toei u; Judah phun ka paya Lucias, Jason oen Sosipater mi khaw kan toei u.
He capat aka thut pe kai Tertias lawngkhaw nangmi te Khrihca thli kah toeina angla kan toei.
Kai dodankung oen ka pahna imkung Kaias khaw nangmi te Khrihca thli kah toeina angla kan toei.
Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh. Amen.

Pathen te thangtheen sak u sih! Awlthang Theen dawngkah angla, kai lawng ka phawng Jesuh Khrih kawng oen yan veng san broela a thuh a elh awltak awlhuep avan phawng te oen ah Pathen lawng nangmi te na oengna dawngah acakla m'pai sak thai ai.

Tede, tahe ah te kah awl tah tawngha thli kah cathut rang oen avan pha sak poen; thlaang boeih lawng awltak te a oeng tih a vai thaina ham dungyan Pathen kah awlpeek rang oen thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng poen.
Pakhat bueng la aka awm tih cuihna boeih oen aka soep Pathen tah Jesuh Khrih rang oen dungyan toe ruep-awmna awm hawn seh! Amen.
Pathen kawngaihna oen Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih la awm ham khue la aka awm Kai Pawl oen mami kah manau Sostenes lawng -

Pathen kah thlaangciim la awm ham khue la aka awm tih Jesuh Khrih oen tuhkaina rang oen ah amah kah a koe la aka awm Kawrin khaaw kah Pathen Khrihcabu, mami oen ahimi kah Bawipa la aka awm Jesuh Khrih te a bok tih khaaw tawm ram tawm ah aka awm thlaang thli tengah khaw, naangmi tengah khaw ca kavan pat u:
Mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawi-pa Jesuh Khrih lawng lungvatna, ngaimawngna te nangmi m'pe u hawn seh.
Khrih Jesuh rang oen lungvatna te nangmi m'peek dawngah Pathen tengah awmngaih awl ka thui poepa.
Metihtiah Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah awlcal thingkaa oen thoemthai cuihna boeih ah khaw soeprep boeih ah na bawireng soeh u poen.
Khrih kawng awlthang te nangmi kaw khuiah acakla awm poen tih,
mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih te na lamtoen u vengah he yotheen kam-awmna pakhatca khaw avoetna na khueh nawh.
Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih khawhin ah cawttbauh kap awm nawh hamla amah lawng aboet toela nangmi te n'cak sak ai.
A Capa Jesuh Khrih mami Bawipa oen pawlneeng haih hamla khuekung Pathen tah uep-awm ni.

Maya manau thli, mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah saithaina aana oen nangmi boeih tengah reenna kavan bih u, nangmi tim ah pekbona a awmna nawh ham awlthui kaalai dawngah na kaw vai u sak. Poekna pakhat, mengtengna pakhat oen ah awm uh.
Maya manau thli nangmi tim ah tawhsina awm tih Khloe kah imkhuikaw thlaang pakhat lawng avan thui.

Ka thui ngaih tah he ni: Nangmi pakhat rip lawngah athloek athloekla na thui u. Pakhat lawngah “Kai tah Pawl kah hubang ni” ti tih atloe khat lawngah, “Kai tah Apollos kah hubang ni,” ti, atloe khat lawngah, “Kai tah Piter hubang ni,” ti tih atloe khat lawng, “Kai tah Khrih hubang ni.” tila a thui u ti he ni.
Khrih he bu la pekbo u aw! Nang ham thinglam dawngah Pawl aw aka duek! Nangmi he Pawl kah hubang la awm ham aw baptisma na dang u?
Krispas oen Kaias bueng nawh atah nangmi tim kah a-u khat khaw baptisma ka peek nawh dawngah Pathen te ka uem tangkiik.
Tedawngah kamah kah hubang la awm ham baptisma ka dang tila a-u khat lawngkhaw thui thai manawh.
(Aw, Stetanas oen a imkhuikaw te baptisma ka peek; tede atloe baptisma ka peek te ka ming nawh.)
Khrih lawngah kai he baptisma aka pe hamla n'tuih nawh. Thinglam dawngah Khrih kah duekna te ahongla a coenggna nawh ham thlaanghing kah cuihna te hawna ohla Awlthang Theen thui hamla ni n'tuih.
Metihtiah thinglam dawngah Khrih kah duekna kawng awlthang he ha-ata lii thlaang thli hamla tah awlpoei la awm de, mami thlawn la aka awm lii hue ham tah Pathen kah tharana ni.
Caciim lawngah, “Thlaangcuih thli kah Cuihna te ka phe vetih thoemthaina aka khueh thlaang thli kah mingna te khaw ka hoett pe bangtlang ai.” tila a thui.

Tedawngah thlaangcuih thli te mela a awm ai? Thoemthaina aka khueh thlaang thli te mela a awm u? He dilai han kah calthai thli mela a awm u? He dilai dawngkah cuihna he tah ngau-athuuna ni tite Pathen lawng a tueng sak poen!

Thlaanghing lawng amah kah cuihna oen Pathen te a ming thaina nawh ham amah lawng a cuihna oen a sai poen. Kaimi lawng ka phawng, “ngau-athuuna” a ti u awlthang he aka tangna thlaang te thlawn hamla Pathen lawng awl a khueng.
Judah thlaang thli lawng kawpoek rai miknoekna te a ngaih u tih Krik thlaang thli lawngtah cuihna te a tlap u.
Kaimi lawngah thinglam dawngkah a ngawn u Khrih te ka phawng u tih te awlthang te Judah thlaang thli ham tah tlimna lungto la awm tih Gental thlaang thli ham tah awlpoei la awm;
tede Gental thlaang khaw, Judah thlaang khaw seh Pathen lawng a khue thlaang thli ham tah te awlthang te tah Pathen kah cuihna oen tharana la aka awm Khrih te ni.
Metihtiah Pathen kah ngau-athuuna tah thlaanghing cuihna lak ah apuehla cuih ngaai tih Pathen kah thayokna he tah thlaanghing kah tharana lak ah a tha ra ngaai.

Maya manau thli, Pathen lawng nangmi n'khue vengah metila na awm u tite tahe ah poek u lah. Thlaanghing kah huhna atah nangmi he thlaangcuih khaw, huham tharana aka awm thlaang khaw, hinyah koei thlaang khaw yoehca mai ni na awm u.

Thlaangcuih thli te yah pawh sak ham dilai lawngah n'tu tamu nawh la a poek te Pathen lawng a tuek tih huham tharana aka khueh thlaang thli te yah phueih sak ham dilai lawng tha aka ra nawh thlaang la a poek te a tuek.
Dilai lawng awlpuila a poek te phe hamla dilai lawng dapsitla a huh thlaang, thlaangnuih pariing la aka awm, thlaang la khaw a toehtham nawh thlaang te Pathen lawngtah a tuek noeng roe ni.
He ngoen tah Pathen haiah a-u khaw oekthloen u thai nawh ti ngaihna ni.

Tede nangmi tah Pathen lawng Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla n'awm sak poen tih Pathen lawng Khrih he mami kah cuihna la avan sai poen. Ahih rang oen ah mami tah Pathen oen roeproeina awm poen; mami tah Pathen kah a thlaangciim la n'coengg u tih mami he n'loeih sak poen.
Tedawngah Caciim lawng, “A-u khaw oekthloen u ham a ngaih atah Bawipa kah thaihu sai dawngah oekthloen u seh,” tila a thui.
Maya manau thli, nangmi tengah Pathen kah awlhuep awltak te phawng hamla ka law vengah te yaakming ham aka rai awllung thli oen cuihna awl te ka hawna nawh.
Metihtiah nangmi oen n'awm haih u vengah te awlpuila thinglam dawngah Jesuh Khrih kah a duekna kawng nawh atah soeprep boeih te hilh bangtlang tih thui tlaih nawh ham thinkaw ka melh rap poen.
Tedawngah nangmi teng ka law vengah te ka tha yoek sut tih rihna oen ka thuen,
Nangmi kan cangpueina oen awlthuina dawngah thlaanghing kah cuihna calthaina oen ka phawng nawh tih Pathen Muithla kah tharana oen ni ka phawng.
Tecoengah nangmi kah oengna he thlaanghing cuihna dawngah akung te sut u nawh tih Pathen tharana dawngah ni akung te a sut u.
Te cakhaw muithla ben ah poekna aka soep thlaang thli teng atah cuihna awl te ka thui pe. Tede te awl te tah he dilai dawngkah cuihna nawh ni, he dilai ukkung thli kah aka khum tharana te nawh ni.

Kai lawng ka phawng cuihna te tah Pathen kah cuihna awlhuep thlaanghing tengah pho sak ohla thuh khak la aka awm tih dilai a suen thlan veng kalawng mami kah ruep-awmna ham avan khueh tangte cuihna te ni.
He dilai ukkung thli a-u khat lawngkhaw cuihna he ming u nawh. Ahimi lawng ming u kawinih ruep-awmna Bawipa te thinglam dawngah ngawn u manawh.

Tede Caciim lawng a thui angla, “A-u lawng vaikhat khaw hu nawh tih ayaak nooek nawh, a-u lawngkhaw coengg thai ai tila poek nooek nawh te amah aka lungna thlaang thli hamla soeprep te Pathen lawng a roek a bah pe poen,” tila a thui.
Tede a awlhuep te amah Muithla rang oen ah mami he Pathen lawng m'ming sak poen. Muithla lawngtah soeprep boeih Pathen kah kamthlahna adungkoek thuh elh la aka awm te pateng khaw pheng a tlap.
Thlaang pakhat kah a kawng alam he amah khuiah aka awm a muithla bueng lawng ni a ming; tetih van angla Pathen kawng he khaw Pathen Muithla bueng lawng ni a ming.
Mami lawng he dilai dawngkah muithla te n'dang u moenih; Pathen lawng mami m'peek boeih te mingna ham Pathen lawng avan tuih Muithla te ni mami lawng n'dang u.
Tedawngah Muithla aka khueh thlaang thli tengah muithla ben awltak ka thuicaih u vengah he thlaanghing cangpueina awl oen te thui thai la awm nawh tih Muithla kah cangpueina awl oen ni ka thui.

A-u khaw Muithla aka khueh nawh te tah Pathen Muithla dawng kalawng aka law kutdo te dang thai manawh. Te ang thlaang lawngtah yaakming thai tang manawh; ahih hamla tah apoeila ni a awm, metihtiah Muithla ben kah kutdo thli te tah Muithla bueng oen ni ming thai la a awm.
Muithla aka khueh thlaang lawng atah soeprep boeih kah aphu te apek abo thai, tede ahih te tah a-u khat lawngkhaw pekbo thai nawh.
Caciim lawngah, “Bawipa thinkaw te a-u lawng a ming? A-u lawngah ahih te poekna a peek thai ai?” tila a thui. Tecakhaw kaimi tah khrih kah thinkaw te ka khueh u.

Maya manau thli, atak tang atah Muithla aka khueh thlaang thli tengah awl ka thui angla nangmi teng atah ka thui thai nawh; he dilai thlaang thli angla Khrihca oengna dawngah camaw angla ni nangmi tengah awl kavan thui.
Nangmi lawng buh haam na caak u thai thlan dawngah suuktui ni kan tuul u hun ai. Tahe ah pateng khaw buh haam na ca u thai thlan hun,

metihtiah nangmi tah tahe toe he dilai thlaang thli angla ni khaw na sak u hun. Nangmi tim ah uett-eena awm tih khat oen khat na tawh na thaam u vengah te nangmi tah dilai thlaang la na awm u tih dilai phung la khaw na sak u tite tueng sak nawh aw?
Nangmi lawngtah, “Kai tah Pawl kah hubang ni na ti u tih akhat lawngah, “Kai tah Apollos kah hubang ni,” tila na thui u te he dilai thlaang angla na sai u nawh aw?

Ataktang atah Apollos he a-u? Pawl he ta a-u? Kaimi he tah nangmi lawng Pathen te na tangna u hamla mawtkung Pathen kah thlaang thli mai ni. Kaimi lawngah Bawipa lawng sai hamla m'peek bii te ni ka bi u.
Kai lawngah ati-amu te ka tue tih Apollos lawng tui a suep, tede athing aka po sak tah Pathen ni.
Amu-ati tuekung oen tuisuepkung te awlpui nawh ni. Athing aka posakkung Pathen ni awlpui.
Amu-ati tuekung oen tuisuepkung tah alakloena awm nawh; A bina taring ah Pathen lawng kutdo rip a peek ai.
Metihtiah kaimi he tah Pathen ham bii aka bi haih la ka awm u tih nangmi te tah Pathen kah lo la ni na awm u. Nangmi tah Pathen kah impui la khaw na awm u.
Pathen kah peek kutdo te ka hawna tih im sak aka thoem tangkiik angla bii ka bi tih lungdang ka suem, te sawah te thlaangtloe lawng im a sak. Tede metila ka sak u tite a-u khaw ngaithuen rip u seh.
Metihtiah Pathen lawngtah Jesuh Khrih pakhat bueng te ni lungdang la a suem tih atloe lungdang te suem thai koei la awm tlaih nawh.

Thlaang khatsut lawngtah te kah lungdangsuem sawah sui oen khaw, ngun oen khaw, lungto phutlo oen khaw impui te a sak u mai ai; thlaangtloe hue lawngtah thing oen khaw, khawpawl oen khaw, caangying oen khaw a sak mai ai.

Ahimi pakhat rip kah biibi thoemthaina te tah Khrih Khawhin ah tueng peng vetih n'huh ai. Metihtiah te Khawhin atah thlaang boeih kah biibi te hai oen ah a tueng sak ai; hai oen ah a noek adak vetih thoemthaina taktak te tueng ai.
Lungdangsuem sawah a sak im lawngah hai te a khoeng atah imsakung lawng kutdo a dang ai.
Tede a-u khaw im a sak te a ung thloep atah ahih tah sung ai; tede amah ngoen tah hai dawngkah aloeih atah thlawn la awm ai.
Nangmi tah Pathen tempal bok-im la na awm u tih Pathen Muithla nangmi kaw khuiah a awm te ataktang la na ming u!

Tedawngah a-u lawngkhaw Pathen kah tempal bok-im te a phe atah Pathen lawng ahih te a phe van ai. Metihtiah Pathen kah tempal bok-im tah ciimcaih tih nangmi roeroe he ahih kah tempal bok-im la na awm u.

A-u khaw amah oen amah te thai alat u boel seh. Nangmi tim kah a-u lawngkhaw amah oen amah te he dilai siing angla thlaangcuih la a poek u atah thlaangcuih tang tang la a awm thaina ham thlaangngau-paathuu la coengg seh.
Metihtiah he dilai lawng cuihna tila a poek te Pathen mik huh atah a poei-oep mai ni. Caciim lawngah “Pathen lawngtah thlaangcuih thli te amami kah dongtung dawngah a man sak.” tila a thui,
tecoengah atloe caciim lawngah, “Bawipa lawngtah thlaangcuih thli kah poekna he apoeioep ni tila a ming” tila te a thui baal.
Tedawngah a-u khaw thlaanghing kah saithaina akawng alam dawngah oekthloen u ham awm nawh. Ataktang atah soeprep boeih he nangmi kah koe-ava la ni a awm:
Pawl, Apollos oen Piter khaw, he dilai khaw, duekna oen hingna khaw, tahe san he khaw, hai ben kah aka law koei san khaw seh he thli boeih he nangmi kah koe-ava ni,
Nangmi tah Khrih kah koe-ava la na awm u tih Khrih tah Pathen koe la awm.
Nangmi lawngah kaimi he Pathen kah awlhuep awltak khoembelkung, Khrih kah tuihyoeih-thlaang la nan poek u ham awm.
Te ang tuihyoeih-thlaang ham awlpui pakhat tah a bawipa tengah uep-awm la awm ham te ni.
Tahe ah nangmi lawngkhaw, thlaangtloe lawngkhaw kai kah kawng he thlaanghing siing angla na thui u atah n'tu la khaw ka ngaai mai nawh; kamah lawng pateng khaw ka thui thai nawh.
Ka kawpoek tah ciim acaih ngoen ta, tede te tila ka thui te ka thawlh nawh tila thuingaihna nawh ni. Bawipa khat bueng lawng ni ka sawah awl a cek thai ai.

Tedawngah atue a pha thlan ah nangmi lawng a-u khaw awl cek u boel. Hukhueng awlcekna tah Bawipa a law vengah ni a awm hun ai; ahih lawngtah thlaanghing thinkaw ah ahuepla a poek thli te a pho sak vetih yiinna khuikah awlhuep thli te aangna dawngah a tueng sak ai. Teveng atah thlaang boeih lawng amah kah a taring ah Pathen kah koehna te a dang ai.

Maya manau thli, nangmi kah theenna hamla he ang boeih he Apollos oen kamah he nuehtahna la ka hawna tih kavan thui. He tila ka thui he tah, “Phung-alam te pooeng voelh boel” tila a thui te nangmi lawng na mingna ham ni. Nangmi a-u khat lawngkhaw pakhat te tah koeh pakcal boel langtah atloe pakhat te tah thuitheet soeh aih boel.
Nangmi te thlaangtloe lak ah asangluelh la a-u lawng n'sai? Na khueh soeprep boeih he Pathen peek nawh aw? Na khueh na toen u te ayoe peek kutdo nawh angla metila na oekthloen u thai?

Nangmi lawng na ngoe soeprep boeih te na khueh tang tang u poen aw? Na bawi na len u tangtang aw? Kaimi tah sengpahrang la ka coengg u nawh de nangmi ta sengpahrang la na coengg u poen aw? Nangmi oen haih kaimi khaw sengpahrang la coengg thaina ham nangmi te sengpahrang la na coengg u tangtang ham ka ngaih.

Metihtiah kaimi celtuih thli he rangpui haiah ngawn ham koei thlaang, dilai oen vaan kah vanthlaang thli oen thlaangphun boeih lawng dan mailai ham a hukhueng koek la Pathen lawng n'khueh tila ni ka poek poen.

Kaimi he Khrih hamla thlaangngau la ka awm u; tede nangmi tah Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah thlaangcuih la na awm u! Kaimi tah ka tha yoek sut, tede nangmi tah na tha ra u! Kaimi tah thlaang kah hep-ahap la ka awm u, nangmi tah hinyah koei la na awm u!
Tahe vengah khaw buhpawng tuihalh oen ka rera u; hinaak himbai pawn sawi ka buen ka naak u; thlaang lawngah kaimi n'tam u; ahuen atloe tloe la ka pooeng reroe u;
thatlawh thaboep la bii ka bi u tih ka buen ka naak u. Thlaang lawng n'tap-voep vengah yotheen kam-awmna oen ka phuehsawm u; thlaang lawng n'heemtek vengah sut ka duen pe u;
Thlaang lawng thekha la n'sai vengah awlding oen ka thung pe u. Kaimi tah he dilai kah kawhnot vaiking la ka awm u; Tahe toe khaw he dilai ah thlaang kah tuiilehkap thlaang la ka awm u!
Nangmi he yah sak hamla ka ngaih dawngah nawh tih ka lungna ca-anau angla toelthaam ham ka ngaih dawngah ni kavan thut.

Metihtiah nangmi kah Khrihca khawsakna dawngah doenkung thli thongha na khueh u mai cakhaw na Pa tah pakhat bueng ni na khueh u. Metihtiah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla na hingna dawngah Khrih Awlthang Theen nangmi tengah kavan khuenna rang oen na pa tah kai ni.
Tedawngah kai kah khawboe ramlang he na oett u hamla kan ceel u.

He tila ka kamthlah u dawngah ni Timote he kavan tuih, ahih tah Khrihca khawsakna dawngah ka lungna uep-awm ka capa ni. Ahih lawng atah kai lawng ka vai tih peng tawm khrihcabu tengah ka cang puei Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah hingna athaai atungpui te avan thui koep ai.
Thlaang khatsut lawngtah kai lawng nangmi te n'hill adawng tlaih manawh tila na poek u tih na oekk u.
Tecakhaw Bawipa lawng a ngaih atah nangmi tengla yue ka law vetih te kah aka oekthloen u thlaang thli lawng a thui awl bueng muehla huham tharana a khueh u te khaw kamah lawng ka huh ai.
Metihtiah Pathen Ram he tah awlhong paikaa mai nawh tih huham tharana ni.
Nangmi tengah cungpoelh oen aw ka law ai? tih nawh atah lungna, kawdawna oen aw ka law ai? Ame ang na ngaih u?
Nangmi tim ah te lukih thlaang thli lawng pateng khaw a yahna koei rih awm tangkiik mai hutaa tawngpa thawlhna awm tila ka yaak. Thlaang pakhat lawngtah a manuthawn oen ip haih tila avan thui u!
Tedawngah metila nangmi na oekk u thai dai lauh mai? Tetih ohla nangmi tah na kaw the u vetih te ang thaihu aka sai thlaang thli te namami kah bu khui kalawng na hek u ham awm de ta.
Bawipa khawhin ah a muithla lawng thlawnna a dangna ham a pum te phe hamla te thlaang te Seitan kut ah pe uh.
Nangmi lawngah na oekthloen u ham awm roe nawh! Nangmi lawngah, “Tawlru yoehca lawng ta-ekk hawl at te a rawi sak.” a ti awl te na ming u.

Nangmi lawngah aciimthlaula na awmna u ham thawlhna tawlru ruem te hoett uh. Te atah tawlru aka thuum nawh takawi thaaithikla na awm u ai, te tila nangmi na awm tangtang tite ataktangla ka ming. Metihtiah mami kah Kaantaak Poei te oepsoeh la awm poen, mami kah Kaantaak Poei tuuca Khrih te Luciik la thawthueng u poen tih mami kah Kaantaak Poei sai ham oepsoeh la awm poen.
Tedawngah mami kah Kaantaak Poei te thawlhna tawlru ruem oen athe-arana te thuum ohla tawlru aka thuum nawh takawi, aciim acaih awltak takawi oen ah sai u sih.
Nangmi tengah kavan thut ca-pat dawngah te thlaanghalh paadak thlaang thli oen pawlneeng nawh ham kavan thui poen.

Te tila ka thui te thlaanghalh paadak thlaang, apueh asawm aka ngaih thlaang, thlaanghuuen paacaan thlaang thli, kutsaimuei aka bok thlaang thli oen pawlneeng u boel tila ka thuingaihna nawh ni. Te ang thlaang thli teng kalawng thloeng u sih ti mai kawinih he dilai he ceh taak ngala ham ni a awm poen ai.

Ka thuingaihna tah khrihca la ka awm ti van de thlaanghalh paadak, apueh asawm aka ngaih moek, kutsaimuei aka bok, thlaang thuitheet thlaang, yuuruui thlaang, thlaanghuuen paacaan thlaang la aka awm hue oen ah pawlneeng haih u boel tila ka thuingaihna ni. Te ang thlaang oen tah caak awkk ham pateng ngawl haih u roe boel.
Nangmi khat oen khat Khrihca paya oen awlpuungna a awm vengah lumlai te Pathen thlaang thli thui sak ohla metila lukih thlaang awlcekkung thli tengla na ceh u?
Pathen thlaang thli lawngah dilai he awl a cek ai tite na ming u nawh aw? Te tila te dilai he awl cek hamla na awm u maiah lumca laaica mai te awl na tloek thai u nawh aw?
Mami lawng vanthlaang thli te awl cek ham awm tite na ming u nawh aw? Tedawngah he dilai hing khuikah thaihu tah awlcek tare ham awm ta!
Te ang lumlai te a awm atah Khrihcabu oen aka betpha u nawh thlaang tengla te na cet u vetih na thui sak u ai aw?
Na yak u nawh aw! Khrihca pueipaw khat oen khat laklaw ah awlpuungna a awm vengah lumlai aka thui thai namami bu khuiah thlaangcuih pakhat tah awm macawi.
Khrihca khat oen khat taya na cawi u tih oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang te lumlai na tloek sak u aroeh mai!

Nangmi lawng upadi oen tuhkaina ben ah awlpuungna na khueh u dawngah te na dok dingri poen tite a tueng sak. Ka dok poen na ti u mai kawinih namami ham theen nawh ai aw? Na thaihu van rot batt u cakhaw nangmi ham theen bet nawh ai aw?
Tetih ohla nangmi lawngtah namami kah maya manau pakhat teng mai ah khaw athe ara te lat na sai u tih pakhat kah thaihu te na rot pe u!

Pathen Ram te thlaangthe lawngtah paang manawh tite ataktangla na ming u ta. Namami oen namami te thailat u khoeng boel: Thlaanghalh paadak thli, kutsaimuei aka bok thlaang thli, samphaih thlaang thli, hutaa puei oen tawngpa puei oen ah aka thawlh thlaang thli,
thlaang kah thaihu aka rot thli, apueh asawm aka ngaih moek thlaang thli, yuu aka ruui thlaang thli, thlaang aka theet thli, thlaanghuen thli tah a-u khaw Pathen Ram te pang manawh.

Thlaang khatsut tah te tila te thoem na awm u. Tede nangmi tah na thawlhna avan ciim sak poen; Nangmi ngoen tah Pathen tengah na tlungmu u poen; Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen kah Muithla rang oen ah nangmi tah Pathen oen na roeproei u poen.

Thlaang khatsut lawngah, “Kai lawngtah me ang thaihu khaw ka sai thai” na ti u. Na sai thai u ngoen ta, tede nangmi hamla soeprep boeih he theen luem nawh. Kai lawng me ang thaihu khaw ka sai thai tila ka thui thai van ta, tede kai tah me ang thaihu lawngkhaw sal la n'sai thai manawh.

Thlaang khatsut lawng atah “Caak awkk he bungpui hamla awm tih bungpui he tah caak awkk hamla ni.” na ti u. Soeng mai ngoen ta; tede Pathen lawngtah aboetna te a pha sak bok ai. Thlaanghing pum he cuk-halh thawlhna ah hawna ham nawh ni, Bawipa biibina ah hawna ham ni, Bawipa lawng ni pum he a cawm acah.
Pathen lawng Bawipa te duekna kalawng a thawh sak tih mami khaw amah kah huham tharana oen n'thawh sak van ai.
Nangmi kah pum he tah Khrih kah pum vangg ni tite na ming u. Kai lawngah Khrih kah pum vangg te ka lawh vetih pum yooei thlaanghalhnu la ka sai ai aw? Ka sai roe manawh!
Pum yooei thlaanghalhnu tengah tabaw thlaang te tah ahih oen pumtaksa pakhatla awm tite na ming u nawh aw? Caciim lawngah, “Ahih rawi tah pumtaksa pakhat la awm ai,” tila aciimphanla a thui.
Tede Bawipa oen aka tuhkai u thlaang tah muithla ben ah Bawipa oen pumkhatla awm.
Cuk-halh thawlhna te kuemsuem uh. Atloe thawlhna lawngtah thlaang kah a pum te rawk sak aih nawh; tede cuk-halh thawlhna aka sai thlaang lawngtah amah pum roe te a thawlh sak poen.

Nangmi kah pum te tah namami kaw khuiah aka awm Pathen kah peek Ciim Muithla a awmna tempal bok-im ni tite na ming u nawh aw? Nangmi tah namami kah koe la na awm u nawh tih Pathen kah koe la ni na awm u;
nangmi te aphu oen ni n'lai u. Tedawngah na pum te Pathen kah ruep-awmna ham hawna uh.
Ka tengah capat oen nan doet u akawng alam te tahe ah kavan thui ai. Tawngpa pakhat he yu lawh muehla a awm te theen.
Tede cuk-halh thawlhsaina ayahawh aih dawngah tawngpa boeih lawng yu a khueh ham theen tih hutaa boeih lawngkhaw vaa a khueh ham theen.
Tawngpa lawng vaa pakhat la a awmna te soep sak selangtah hutaa lawngah yu pakhat la awmna te soep sak seh, te tila te pakhat kah ngoena dawngah pakhat lawng ngai-khuekna pe seh.
A yu lawngah amah pum kah bawi la awm nawh, tede a pum kah bawi tah a vaa te ni; tetih van angla a vaa lawngah amah pum kah bawi la awm nawh tih a pum kah bawi tah a yu te ni.

Nangmi lawng kawlkalh thangthuina ham ah kawvaina na khueh u atue bueng te nawh atah namami khat oen khat kah ngaihna te thana u boel; tecoeng atah na awm nooek la te awm koep uh. Te atah na kuemsuem thai u vetih Seitan kah suek-halhna te na taa u thai ai.
He tila kavan thui he awlpeek aana angla ka thui nawh, tede nangmi kawngaihna vai angtoekla ni ka thui.
Atak tang atah nangmi boeih he kai angla na awm u atah ka ngaih ngaai; tede thlaang boeih lawngah Pathen tengkah kutdo lakloe te rip a khueh u.
Tahe ah a yu, a vaa aka khueh nawh thlaang thli oen huhai patal la aka awm thlaang thli tengah kavan thui tah kai angla namah bueng poe na awm u atah namami ham theen bet ai.
Tede namami kah ngaihna te na kuemsuem thai u nawh atah na yu lo u lang vaa sa uh. Cuk-halh hurthok la awm lak atah yu lawh vaa sak te theen bet.
Yu khueh, vaa khueh thlaang thli ham thui hamla awlpeek ka khueh, te tah kamah tengkah nawh tih Bawipa kah awlpeek ni: A yu lawngah a vaa te maa boel seh;
tede a vaa te a maa atah vaa sak tlaih ohla poe awm seh, tetih nawh atah a vaa oen ah roep hih koep seh; a vaa lawngkhaw a yu te thlaak roe boel seh.

Thlaangtloe hue tengah kavan thui tah (kamah lawng ni ka thui, Bawipa lawng nawh ni): Khrihca tawngpa pakhat lawng oengca la aka awm nawh a yu te a khueh tih a yu lawngah ahih oen awm poe ham a ngaih atah thlaak boel seh.
Tecoengah Khrihca hutaa pakhat lawng oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang te a vaana tih a vaa lawngah ahih oen awm poe ham a ngaih atah maa boel seh.

Metihtiah oengca la aka awm nawh a vaa te a yu oen tuhkaina rang oen ah Pathen lawng a do tih oengca la aka awm nawh a yu te Khrihca a vaa oen tuhkaina rang oen ah Pathen lawng a do. Tetih nawh kawinih a ca thli te lukih ca anau thli angla awm u hau ai; tede te tila a awm u dawngah ahimi te Pathen lawng a do poen.

Te cakhaw oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang pakhat lawngah Khrihca a yu mai khaw, a vaa mai khaw maa ham a ngaih atah maa mai seh. He ang kawng atah Khrihca a yu lawng mai khaw, a vaa lawng mai khaw yalpawla sai seh. Nangmi ngaimawng ngaitoe la awm ham ni Pathen lawng n'khue u.
Khrihca la aka awm hutaa nang, ka vaa he ka thlawn thai manawh tite metila na thui thai? Khrihca la aka awm tawngpa nang ka yu he ka thlawn thai tlaih manawh tite metila na thui thai?
A-u khaw Bawipa lawng kutdo a peek tih Pathen lawng a khue vengkah angla te a awm u ham awm. He tah Khrihcabu boeih ah ka cang puei phung-alam ni.

Yahhuivuen aka reet thlaang te Pathen lawng a khue atah yahhuivuen reet la a awmna miknoekna te hoett boel seh; yahhui-vuen aka reet nawh thlaang te Pathen lawng a khue atah yahhui vuen te reet han boel seh.
Metihtiah yahhuivuen reet oen reet nawh te n'tu la khaw coengg nawh; Pathen kah awlpeek vai he ni awlpui la a awm.
Thlaang boeih lawngah Pathen lawng n'khue u vengkah angla te awm uh.
Pathen lawng nang n'khue vengah sal la aw na awm? N'tu poei aih nawh; tede loeih ham atawng aleeng atah loeih ham sai.
Metihtiah Bawipa lawng a khue Sal pakhat he Bawipa kah thlaangcuem la awm poen; tetih van angla thlaangcuem a-u khaw Khrih lawng a khue atah ahih kah saltamnaa la ni a awm.
Pathen lawng nangmi te aphu oen n'lai poen dawngah thlaanghing kah saltamnaa la te awm u boel.
Maya manau thli, nangmi te amah lawng n'khue coeng vengkah na awm u angla te pakhat rip lawng Pathen oen pawlneeng uh.

Tahe ah thlaanghoeng la aka awm thli kawng ca thut oen nan doet u te kavan thui ai. Bawipa tengkah awlpeek tah ka khueh nawh, tede Bawipa kah reenna rang oen uep-awm thlaang pakhat la ka awm van angla ka poekna he kan peek u.
Tihin hang kah raina he poek vengah tawngpa hue ham tah tahe veng-kah angla a awm u atah theen bet tila ka poek.
Na yu na lawh poen aw? Tetih atah na yu oen te pek hih boel. Na yu na lawh thlan atah na yu tlap hanlan boel.

Tede na yu na lo mai cakhaw thawlhna na sai moenih; hutaa thlaanghoeng lawng vaa sa mai cakhaw thawlhna a sai moenih. Tede yu aka lo, vaa aka sa thlaang thli lawng hin roekk ah a tawng u patang raina dawng kalawng nangmi te loeih sak hamla ka ngaih dawngah ni.
Maya manau thli, ka thuingaihna tah he tila ni: atue san hlang awm hang tlaih manawh, tedawngah tahe kalawng tah yu khueh thlaang lawngah yu khueh nawh thlaang angla awm seh;

aka rap thlaang thli lawng kawthe nawh thlaang angla awm seh; aka nui thlaang thli te kawhoe nawh thlaang angla awm seh; thaihu aka lai thlaang thli lawng a lai thaihu te ka koe nawh ni a ti angla te awm seh;
dilai thaihu aka hawna thlaang thli lawngah aka hawna nawh angla awm u seh. Metihtiah he dilai he tahe vengkah angla asan awm tlaih manawh.
Nangmi he lakuengna kalawng loeih sak hamla ka ngaih. Yu aka lo nawh thlaang pakhat lawngtah Bawipa kah kawhoe bueng te a yawm dawngah Bawipa bii dawngah te ngaithuen.
Tede yu aka lo thlaang lawngtah a yu te awmngaih sak ham a ngaih tih dilai thaihu dawngah nguenthuen;

Tedawngah ahih te kawngaihna pahih lawngah a doek. Vaa aka sa nawh hutaa, tihnawhtah hulaa cuem lawngtah a pum oen muithla pahih bok la peek ham a ngaih dawngah Bawipa kah bii dawngah nguenthuen; tede vaa aka khueh hutaa tah a vaa te kawhoe sak ham a ngaih dawngah dilai thaihu dawng nguenthuen.

Nangmi te bawm ham ka ngaih dawngah ni he he kavan thui. Kai lawng nangmi te khaang khak hamla ka yawm nawh. Te lak ah aka doeng tih aka soeng te nangmi sai sak ham ka ngaih tih atloe-abang awm tlaih ohla Bawipa kah bii dawngah namah oen namah te na peek u ngala ham ni.

Yuvaa hih hamla a kang tangte te yuvaa nawh ham a poek atah he tila awm seh: tawngpa lawng hutaa te yuna ham tuueng aleng nawh tila a poek de, te kah hulaa a ngaihna te tlo aih tih yuna ham a poek atah a ngaihna angla yuvaa hih seh. He dawngah thawlhna awm nawh.

Tede te tila sai ham ngah ngah tongnolh muehla tawngpa lawng yu lawh nawh ham a kaw a melh rap tih a ngaihna a thinkaw te a taa thai tih sai ham koei te anepla a poek heet ngoen poen atah te hutaa te a yuna nawh ah theen.
Tedawngah a kang tangte hutaa te aka yuna thlaang lawngah thaihu theen ni a sai, tede akang tangte te aka yuna nawh thlaang lawng atheen ngaai te a sai.

Vaa aka sa hutaa pakhat he a vaa te a hing khui atah hoerpoengla awm nawh; tede a vaa te a duek atah amah kawngaih tawngpa te ahoerpoengla a vaana thai, tede ca tah a vaa te Khrihca la a awm atah theen.
Tecakhaw a awm noek angla amah bueng a awm atah awmngaih bet ai. Te tah kamah kah poekna ni, kai khaw Pathen Muithla ka khueh tila ka poek.

Kutsaimuei tengah a nawn u caak awkk kawng cathut oen nan doet u te tahe ah kavan thui ai. Ahimi lawngah, “Mami boeih he cuihhoena n'khueh,” tila a thui u te soeng ngoen. Te cakhaw te ang cuihhoena lawngtah thlaang te a oekk athloen sak tih a halang sak, tede lungna lawngtah thlaang te asoem asai tih a roeng sak.
A-u khaw ‘Ka ming van poen’ tila aka poek u lawngah a ming ham koei te ming tangtang nawh.
Tede Pathen aka lungna thlaang te tah Pathen lawng a ming.

Tedawngah kutsaimuei tengah a nawn caak awkk kawngah te: kutsaimuei he tah aka awm tangtang nawh thaihu yuengah a khueh u tite mami lawng m'ming u; Pathen pakhat bueng ni a awm tite mami lawng m'ming u.
Vaan ah khaw dilai ah khaw “pathen thli,” a ti u te awm mai cakhaw, tecoengah “pathen thli” oen “bawipa thli,” awm moen mai cakhaw,

mami ham tah Pathen pakhat bueng ni a awm, ahih tah soeprep boeih saikung la awm tih ahih hamla mami tah n'hing u; tecoengah Jesuh Khrih Bawipa pakhat bueng te awm, ahih rang oen ah soeprep tah sai la awm tih ahih rang oen mami he n'hing u.

Tede thlaang boeih lawng awltak he ming u nawh. Thlaang khatsut tah tihin toe ah kutsaimuei bokna lawng a ceeng khak poen dawngah te ang caak awkk te a caak u vengah kutsaimuei kah buh, an la te ahimi lawng tahe toe ah a poek mangkhak u hun; ahimi kah athe athetheen mingna thinkaw te a tha yoek sut tih te kah caak awkk lawng ahimi te ciim acaih sak nawh tila a poek u.
Tecakhaw caak awkk lawngah Pathen oen mami tuhkaina te roeng sak nawh; mami lawng n'ca nawh cakhaw mami kah sungna khat khaw awm nawh, mami lawng n'ca oe cakhaw mami ham athawnna khat khaw awm nawh.
Tede nangmi kah yalpawna lawng oengna tha aka yoek thlaang thli te thawlhna khuiah a tlimna la a coeng hau nawh ham ngaithuen uh.

Thuina mai ah athe atheen pekbona thinkaw tha aka yoek thlaang pakhat lawngah nangmi ‘Cuihhoena’ aka khueh hue lawng kutsaimuei bokna tempal khuiah na caak na awkk u te hu kawinih kutsaimuei tengah a nawn u caak awkk te caak ham thapeek angla awm nawh ai aw?
Tedawngah tha aka yoek thlaang na maya manau, Khrih lawng a duek thil thlaang thli te nangmi kah ‘Cuihhoena’ lawngah te a rawk sak poen ai!
He tila te Khrihca maya manau thli sawah thawlhna na sai u tih athe-theen pekbona thinkaw tha aka yoek thlaang thli te boengha na caak sakna rang oen Khrih sawah thawlhna na sai la awm.
Tedawngah caak awkk lawng maya manau thli te a thawlh sak atah maya manau thli thawlhna dawngah a tlim u nawh ham luciik sa te metuek ah khaw ka ca koep tlaih manawh.
Kai he yalpaw thlaang nawh aw? Kai lawngah mami kah Bawipa Jesuh te ka hu nawh aw? Nangmi he ta, Bawipa dawngah kai kah biibi phu athaih apaai thli nawh aw?

Thlaangtloe lawng atah kai he celtuih pakhat la poek u nawh mai cakhaw nangmi lawngtah celtuih la nan poek u. Metihtiah Bawipa oen pum-khatla na hing u dawngah kai he celtuih pakhat van ni tite nangmi lawngah na tueng sak u.
Kai he thlaang kah coel-acaa la ka awm vengah kamah oen kamah ka phungtuna tah he ni:
Bii ka bi dawngah he caak awkk te ka dang van ham tuueng nawh aw?
Kai lawngah atloe celtuih thli oen Bawipa kah a manau oen ah Piter mi angla yin ka cehna ah Khrihca la aka awm yu-aca te ka ceh puei thai van nawh ai aw?
Barnabas oen kai bueng lawngah aw ka hingna ham bii ka bi hih ai?
A-u lawng nuem amah tangka oen raalkap bii a bi? Lotoen thlaang a-u nuem a lo khuikah misur thaih te caak ohla aka awm? Tuudoen a-u nuem amah kah tuu suuktui te awkk muehla aka awm?
Kai lawngah he ang thli he hin roekk kah huhna oen nuehtahna ka thui nawh, metihtiah Phungawl lawngkhaw hetih toeng toeng la ni a thui.
Mosi kah Phungawl dawngah, “Vaitaw taal pakhat te caang na tiil sak vengah a kaa te khuem pe rap boel” tila a thui. Pathen lawng vaitaw taal kawng aw a thui?
Te tila a thui te kaimi he thuingaihna tang tang nawh aw? Kaimi ham ni a thut. Laithawl aka sai thlaang oen caang aka aat thlaang lawngah a huh ham tuueng caangthaih te a ngaiuep tih a bi u.
Kai hih lawngah muithla caangti te nangmi tim ah ka tuh poen. Nangmi tengkah thaihu apuung ataai te kaimi lawng ka ah u te yahawh aih aw?

Thlaangtloe lawng nangmi tengkah te ang thaihu te dang hamla a ngaiuep u atah kaihih lawngah yahawh ngaai te ka ngaiuep nawh ai aw? Tede kaihih lawng te tila saithaina te ka hawna hih nawh. Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen lawngpui ah kanghalh-na khat khaw a awmna nawh ham soeprep boeih ah ka ueh hih.
Tempal bok-im khuiah bii aka bi lawng Tempal bok-im kah caak awkk te a dang u van tih bokna-thaang dawngah luciik buulna aka nawn thlaang lawngkhaw luciik sa te thoem a bawn van tite na ming u.
Tetih van angla awlthang theen aka thui thlaang thli lawngkhaw awlthang theen phawngna dawng kalawng bung-khuutna dang hamla Bawipa lawng a khueh.

Tede he saithaina he khatca khaw kai lawng ka hawna nawh, te ang sai thaina te kamah ham tahe ah ka ngaih dawngah ca kavan thut moenih. Te lak atah duek lamha ka ngaih ngaai! Ka thangpawmna u he a-u lawngkhaw awl poeila a sai ham te ka ngaih nawh!

Awlthang Theen ka thui dawng maiah ka thangpawm u ham awm nawh. Atak tang atah awlthang theen phawng ham roe la ni awl m'peek. Kai lawng awlthang theen ka phawng nawh kawinih metihtlukla kai ham mueirihtamyiin la a awm!
Kamah lawngah bii he ka tuek tih ka bi kawinih aphu dang hamla ka ngaiuep suide; he bii he bi hamla Pathen lawng m'peek dawngah ka bi ham koei roe la ka bi.
Te atah thapang n'tu ka dang? Ka bii phu te tah thapang lawh ohla Awlthang Theen ka phawng thaina oen awlthang theen bii ka bi dawngah kamah ham dang koei te ka bih nawh he ni.
Kai tah a-u kah saltamnaa la khaw ka awm nawh, kai tah thlaangcuem ni; tede thlaang yahawh te ka doek thaina ham kamah oen kamah thlaang boeih kah sal la ka awm.

Judah thlaang thli tengah bii ka bi vengah ahimi te lawh thaina ham Judah thlaang angla ka awm; tecoengah Mosi kah Phungawl huiah aka awm thlaang thli tengah bii ka bi vengah ahimi te lawh thaina ham, Phungawl huiah ka awm tlaih nawh de aka awm angla te ka awm van.

Tetih van la te Judah thlaang thli kah Phungawl dau ah aka awm Gental thlaang thli te lawh thai ham ahimi angla ka awm. He tila ka awm he Pathen kah phungawl te ka vai nawh ka tila thuingaihna moenih; ataktangla Khrih kah phung awl huiah ka awm.

Oengna tha aka yoek thlaang thli tengah bii ka bi vengah ahimi te lawh thaina ham ahimi tha aka yoek sut angla ka awm. Metila khaw acoengg thai khoem atah avaang athal mai khaw thoem ka thlawn ai nuem ka ti dawngah thlaang boeih tengah ahimi angla ka awm van.
He ang thli boeih he awlthang theen kawngah ni ka sai, awlthang theen dawngkah yotheen kam-awmna te rek-ara thaina ham ni.
Loehlang heengna poei ah thlaang yahawh lawngah loeh u de pakhat lawng ni kutdo a dang tite na ming u. Tedawngah kutdo huh hamla heeng u lah.

Loehlangna hengna poei ah thuum ham aka ngaih boeih lawngah atlawh hlangla amah oen amah phep u, aka cak poe nawh raipai lumuek te dang hamla te tila a sai u; tede mami lawngtah tlumtloei thai nawh dungyan aka cak poe te dang hamla ni n'sai u.
Tedawngah kai tah mengtengna lansak te pha ham adoengla ka heeng phaat; thoekna poei ah kut thluem oen thlaang phak phak aka thoek thlaang angla ni ka awm.
Thlaangtloe te loehlangna ah thuum ham ka ceel coengah loehlangna ah kamah he n'thoek hau nawh ham ka pum he atlawhla ka phep oepsoeh.

Maya manau thli, Mosi hu aka vai mami kah patuer thli tengah thaihu aka thoeng te na poek u hamla ka ngaih. Ahimi boeih te muui lawngah a thiing khoep tih Tuitunlii Seen ah te ading asuekla kaa u thai.
Ahimi lawngah Mosi kah hubang la muui oen ah tuitunlii khuiah baptisma a dang u.
Ahimi boeih lawng muithla takawi te a caak u tih,
muithla tui te a awkk u. Ahimi oen haih aka cet muithla lungnu dawngkah tui te a awkk u; te lungnu te tah Khrih amah te ni.
Tede ahimi tim kah thlaang yahawh sawah Pathen tah a kaw hoe nawh, tedawngah ahimi kah rawkk te divinlangre ah a darh u khonghak.
Te ang thli boeih te tahe ah mingna miknoek la awm. Ahimi lawng thaihu the te a ngaih u angla mami lawngtah ngaih nawh ham;

ahimi timkah thlaang vaang lawng kutsaimuei te a bok u angla mami lawngtah bok nawh ham ngaithuen sakna ni. Caciim lawngah, “thlaang thli lawng caak awkk hamla poei ah te ngawl u tih yuu awkkna, cuk-halh thawlhna poei la te a coengg sak u.” tila a thui.
Ahimi timkah thlaang vangg lawng hutaa tawngpa thawlhna a sai u van angla mami lawngtah sai ham awm nawh, te tila a sai u dawngah thlaang thongkul thongthum hin at ah duek drek u.
Mami lawng Bawipa te noekdak hamla awm nawh, thlaang vangg lawng te tila a sai u dawngah ruul lawngah a tuk dingkang tih duek u.
Thlaangvaang lawng angla te mami lawng a caitoek ham awm nawh, te tila a caitoek u dawngah ahimi te Duekna Vanthlaang lawng a ngawn u.
