Te kah thaihu boeih ahimi tengah aka thoeng te thlaangtloe thli kah noekna ham oen mami kah ngaithuenna ham ni ahimi lawng a thut. Metihtiah atue aboet tawm vengah he mami n'hing u dawngah ni.
A-u khaw acakla ka pai ngoen tila aka poek thlaang lawngah a tlim thawlh nawh ham ngaithuen seh.

Nangmi sawah aka law noekna te thlaang boeih tengah aka thoeng noekdakna van mai ni. Tede Pathen tah awlkam cak tih nangmi lawng na taa thai nawh toe atah noekna te van thoeng sak aih manawh; nangmi tengah noekdakna avan pha vengah ueh thaina ham tharana te m'peek vetih loeihna hamla lawngpui avan roek ai.
Tedawngah ka lungna ka puei thli, kutsaimuei te bok u boel;
Nangmi tah kaw aka poek thai thlaang la na awm u dawngah ni kavan thui u; kavan thui he namami lawng pekthlee uh.

Mami lawng Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil n'thui tih Bawipa Thlembuh veelna ah boengloeng n'hawna tih te khui-kah misurtui n'awkk te Khrih thisen dawngah mami n'cuutna ni. Tecoengah mami lawng takawi te n'eh tih n'caak u te mami lawng Khrih pum dawngah cuutna ni.
Takawi thluem at awm tih, te takawi thluem at te n'cuut u dawngah mami he thlaangmi la tah yahawh mai cakhaw pumkhatla ni n'awm u.
Israel thli te poek u lah; Luciik la a nawn te aka ca boeih tah Pathen kah bokna-thaang dawngah biibina ah te thuum u.
He tila ka thui he kutsaimuei, tihnawhtah kutsaimuei tengah a nawn caak awkk te atheenna khaw awm van tila ka thuingaihna aw?

Tetih nawh ni! Kai lawng ka thui ngaihna tah he ni. Lukih thli kah bokna-thaang dawngah Luciik thawthuengna te tah raai thli tengah a nawn u ni, Pathen tengah a nawn nawh ni. Nangmi te raai thli oen tuhkai sak ham te ka ngaih nawh.
Nangmi lawngah Bawipa kah boengloeng oen raai kah boengloeng te khaw na aw renten thai nawh vetih Bawipa kah caboi oen raai thli kah caboi te khaw vai at la na veel thai manawh.
Mami lawng Bawipa te thatlai sak ham n'ngaih u aw? Ahih lak ah tha-awm thara ngaai la aw m'mah oen m'mah he m'poek u?

Ahimi lawngah, “Me ang thaihu khaw kaimi lawng sai thai koei ni,” ti u. Soeng ngoen ta, tede soeprep boeih sai he tah theen luem nawh. “me ang thaihu khaw kaimi lawng sai thai koei ni.” ti u, tede soeprep boeih he hoeikhangna awm luem nawh.
A-u khaw amah kah theenna ham bueng te tlap boel selang thlaangtloe kah theenna te khaw tlap seh.
Athetheen mingna kawpoek cawm-aam dawngah awl doet re muehla meh dawr kah a yoeih meh boeih te badipla ca u hawn.
Metihtiah Caciim lawngah, “Dilai oen dilai dawng aka awm thaihu boeih he Bawipa koe ni.” tila a thui.
Oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang lawng buh pan la n'khue tih na ceh atah awl kaa doet muehla na haiah avan toen boeih te kammueh la ca hawn.
Tede thlaang pakhat khat lawngah, “He tah kutsaimuei tengah a nawn u luciik thawthueng sa ni,” a ti atah aka thuikung kah athetheen mingna kawpoek acaihna ham te kah caak awkk te ca mai boel,

Athe atheen mingna kawpoek ka ti te nangmi kah kawpoek nawh tih thlaang kah kawpoek ni ka ti. Thlaang khatsut lawngah, “Te tih atah thlaangtloe kah athe atheen pekbona kawpoek lawng ka yalpawna he n'tu hamla avan kang khak ai?
Kai lawng caak awkk, hamla Pathen tengah awmngaih awl ka thui tih te kah awm ngaih awl ka thuina caak awkk kawngah te a-u lawng kai he athela a thui ai? tila nan doet u mai ai.
Theen ngoen ta, na sai boeih te khaw, na caak na awkk te khaw seh apum boeih la Pathen ruep-awmna ham sai uh.
Judah thlaang khaw, Gental thlaang khaw, Pathen Khrihcabu khaw, awlpuung kaacaan thuitheetna a awmna nawh ham te tila te na khawsakna te awm sak uh.
Ka sai angla sai u van; ka sai boeih he thlaang boeih kah kawhoena ham ni ka yawm, kamah ham theenna te ka poek nawh tih thlawnna te a dangna u thai ham thlaang boeih kah theenna te ni ka poek.
Tedawngah kai lawng Khrih kah khawboe ramlang te ka oett van angla nangmi lawngkhaw kai kah khawboe ramlang he oett u van lah.
Nangmi lawng kai he nan poek khuep u tih na kut dawngah kan peek cangpueina te na vai u dawngah kan koeh u.
Tede nangmi te ming sak ham ka ngaih tah Khrih tah tawngpa boeih kah a luu la awm, a vaa he tah a yu kah a luu la awm tih Pathen tah Khrih kah a luu la awm ti he ni.
Tedawngah tawngpa lawngah rangpui lawng Pathen a bokna ah a thangthui vengah khaw, Pathen awlthang a phawng vengah khaw a luu te a muui atah Khrih te thaang a the sak.

Tecoengah hutaa pakhat lawngah rangpui lawng Pathen a bokna ah a thangthui vengah khaw, Pathen awlthang a phawng vengah khaw a luu te a muui nawh atah a vaa te thang a the sak; te ang te tah luu-ngong hutaa oen atloe-abangna awm nawh.
Hutaa lawng a luu te a muui nawh atah a sam te luu-ngawng la vawkk ngala seh. Hutaa ham tah sam vawkk khaw, luu-ngawng khaw yahna koei la a awm dawngah hutaa lawng a luu muui seh.
Tawngpa he tah Pathen kah muei-asam oen ruep-awmna te tuengsakkung la a awm dawngah tawngpa lawng a luu muui hamla ngoe nawh.
Metihtiah tawngpa he hutaa pum dawngkah sai nawh tih hutaa ni tawngpa pum dawngkah a sai.
Tawngpa he hutaa hamla sai nawh tih hutaa he ni tawngpa hamla a sai.
Tedawngah vanthlaang thli te hinyahna la hutaa he a vaa kah ukna aana khuiah awm tite tuengsakna ham hutaa lawng a luu te muui seh.
Tecakhaw Bawipa ah mami hingna dawngah hutaa he amah poek ah tawngpa ohla awm thai nawh tih tawngpa khaw amah poek ah hutaa mueh la tah awm thai nawh.
Metihtiah hutaa he tawngpa dawngkah a sai, tetih van angla tawngpa khaw hutaa lawng ni a cuun van; soeprep boeih he a sai tih aka awmsakkung tah Pathen ni.
Hutaa he rangpui lawng Pathen a bokna ah a luu a muui muehla Pathen tengah a thangthui te hutaa pakhat ham roeproei aw tite namami lawng poek uh.
Dilai khawsakna dawngah tawngpa lawng asanla sam a thlung te; yaraula awm tih,
tede hutaa lawng sam asanla a thlung te a thlaang theenna la awm. A sam sanhlang te a luu muina ham ni a peek.
Tede a-u lawngkhaw he kawngah awl oelh ham a ngaih atah kaimi lawngkhaw, Pathen Khrihcabu thli lawngkhaw, Pathen bokna ah phung alam atloe khueh thloei nawh.
He tila kavan thui u vengah he nangmi te kan koeh thai nawh, metihtiah nangmi lawng Pathen bok ham na pum u te atheenna lak ah athe ni a thoeng sak ngaai.
Lamhacuek ah nangmi lawngah Pathen bok ham na pum u vengah te bu la pekbona awm tila te ka yaak tih te tah soeng mai cawini ka ti.
(Asoengna ben ah aka awm thlaang thli te aciimla huhna ham ah nangmi tim ah pekbona a awm te soeng mai.)
Nangmi lawngah thik at la na pum u vengah nangmi lawng na caak na awkk u te Bawipa Thlembuh nawh ni.
Metihtiah na caak u vengah te namah kah buh an te na caak na awkk u tih khatsut tah a bung a pawng vengah khatsut tah yuu te ruui u poen.

Nangmi lawng na caak na awkk na ham im na khueh u nawh aw? Te tila na awm u te Pathen kah Khrihcabu te yah bai ham na ngaih u tih voetna aka awm thlaang thli te yahpawh sak ham na ngaih u aw? He kawngah he nangmi tengah kai lawng n'tu avan thui ai tila na ngaiuep u? Nangmi te kan koeh ai aw? Kan koeh roeroe nawh mue!
Metihtiah Bawipa teng kah ka huh te ni nangmi te patoeng kan cang puei u. Thlaang kut ah a peekna yiin ah te Bawipa Jesuh lawng takawi te a lawh tih,
Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui coengah takawi te a eh tih, “He tah ka pum ni, nangmi ham ni. Kai he poe nan mingna poepa u ham he tila sai uh.” tila a thui.

Te tih van angla thlembuh a caak u coeng khoeng ah boengloeng te a lawh tih, “He boengloeng he tah ka thisen oen ka cak sak Pathen kah awlkam paipi athaai ni. Nangmi lawng na awkk u veng roekk ah kai he nan ming poena ham sai uh.” tila a thui.
He kah thuingaihna tah takawi te na caak u veng roekk ah, boengloeng dawngkah te na awkk u veng roekk ah amah a law thlantoe Bawipa kah duekna te na phawng u tila thuingaihna ni.
Tedawngah amah te hinyahna ohla pakhat khat lawng Bawipa kah takawi te a caak tih a boengloeng dawngkah te a awkk atah Bawipa kah pum oen a thisen sawah thawlhna ni a sai.
Tedawngah thlaang boeih lawng lamhala amah oen amah te noem acai u seh, tecoengah takawi te ca selang tah boengloeng dawngkah te khaw aw seh.
Metihtiah takawi te a caak tih boengloeng dawng-kah te a awkk vengah Bawipa kah pum a thuingaihna te a ming nawh atah amah sawah awlcekna te a caak a awkk haih.
Tedawngah ni nangmi thlaang yahawh tengah tlawhnat la thoeng tih thlaang yahawh hlangla na duek u lawt.
Mami lawng m'mah oen mah te lamhala n'noem acai u atah Pathen kah awlcekna mami sawah van pha manawh.
Tede mami tah he dilai oen phe haih nawh hamla Bawipa lawng mami he awl n'cek tih dan m'peek u.
Tedawngah maya manau thli, nangmi lawng Bawipa Thlembuh veel hamla thik at la na pum u vengah pakhat oen khat riing uh.
Tecoengah te tila na pum u vengah te Pathen kah awlcekna ah na phana u nawh ham bungpawng thlaang a awm atah amah im ah buh ca seh. Atloe abang thli ngoen tah kamah ka law vengah kavan thui u badai.
Ciim Muithla kutdo kawng cathut oen nan doet u te tahe ah kavan thui ai. Maya manau thli, he kawngah he awltak na ming u hamla ka ngaih.
Nangmi lukih la na awm u vengah te hingna aka khueh nawh kutsaimuei bokna lawnghang na vai u te na ming.

Nangmi ming sak hamla ka ngaih tah Pathen Muithla lawng a mawt thlaang a-u khat lawngkhaw “Jesuh te kawsi yawkk seh.” ti nawh vetih Ciim Muithla lawng a mawt thlaang nawh atah a-u khat lawngkhaw “Jesuh tah Bawipa ni,” tila thui tang manawh.
Muithla benkah kutdo he aphun atloetloela awm, tede te kutdo te Muithla pakhat lawng ni a peek.
Biibina he lawngpui atloetloela awm, tede Bawipa pakhat kah bii te ni m'bi u.
Bii bina ham thoemthaina atloetloela awm, tede ating atawkk la bii bina ham thoemthaina te Pathen lawng ni a peek.
Thlaang pakhat rip kaw khuiah Muithla a awm te lawngpui atloetloela tueng tih te tah thlaang boeih kah theenna ham ni.
Muithla lawng thlaang pakhat te cuihna oen aka betoet awlthang te a peek tih thlaang pakhat te tah mingna oen abetoet awlthang te Muithla lawng a peek.
Te kah Muithla pakhat te lawng ni thlaang pakhat tengah oengna a peek tih atloe pakhat teng atah thlaangtlo hoeih sak thaina huham tharana te a peek.

Thlaang pakhat teng atah kawpoek rai saithaina huham tharana te Muithla lawng a peek tih atloe teng atah Pathen awlthang thui thaina kutdo te a peek; tecoengah atloe khat teng atah kutdo thli he Muithla ben kah aka law aw, Muithla ben kah aka law nawh aw tite pekbona ham thoemthaina te a peek. Thlaang pakhat teng atah mingnawh awl cal hamla thoemthaina te a peek tih atloe pakhat teng atah mingnawh awl te thuicaih thaina te a peek.
Tede he thaihu boeih he aka saikung tah Muithla pakhat lawng ni a sai; amah kawngaih la thlaang pakhat rip te kutdo atloetloe a peek.
Khrih tah pum dawngah a beek thli moen aka awm pum pakhat oen lo u. Pum te a beek thli atloetloe moen awm de pum tah pakhat ni.
Tetih van angla mami boeih he tah Judah oen Gental thlaang khaw, sal oen thlaangcuem khaw, Muithla pakhat lawng pum pakhat dawngah baptisma m'peek tih awkk koeila Muithla pakhat te ni mami m'peek u.
Pum he a beek pakhat bueng oen sai nawh tih a beek yahawh hlang oen a sai.
Khow lawngah, “Kai tah kut la ka awm nawh tih pum dawngah ka thuum nawh,” ti kawinih, te tila a ti dawngah pum dawngkah a beek la a awmna te toeng sak manawh.
Tecoengah haa lawngah, “Kai tah mik la ka awm nawh tih pum dawngah ka thuum nawh” ti kawinih te tila a thui dawngah pum dawngkah a beek la a awmna te toeng sak manawh.
Pum boeih he mik la awm biit kawinih metila awl te n'yaak thai ai? Tecoengah haa bueng la awm boeih kawinih abaw-ava te metila huuem thai ai?
Tede Pathen lawngtah pum dawngkah a beek thli he amah lawng a khueh ngaihna ah atloetloela a khueh.
Pum he a beek pakhat bueng la awm kawinih pum la te awm thai manawh!
Te tila te a beek tah awm moen mai de pum tah pakhat ni.
Tedawngah kut lawngah mik te, “Nang he kan ngoe nawh” tina thai nawh. Luu lawngah khaw khow nala te, “Nang he kan ngoe nawh.” tina thai nawh.
Atak tang atah tha aka khueh nawh angla aka awm pum dawngkah a beek thli muehla tah coengg thai nawh;
Mami lawng a phu aka awm nawh la m'poek u a beek thli te mami lawng awlpuila thabuei thabahna ngaai u; pum dawngkah huh theen nawh a beek thli te n'thoei n'caam u,
aka theen tangte a beek thli te tah thoei acaam hamla ngoe nawh. Te kah a beek thli lawng hinyahna te a dang tarena ham te tila te Pathen amah lawng pum he te tila a sai.
Tedawngah pum dawngah he pekbona awm nawh, a beek atloetloe lawngah khat oen khat kah theenna te a sai u.
Pum dawngkah a beek pakhat lawng nganbawh a yaak atah a beek boeih nganbawh a yaak puei u; a beek pakhat te thangpawm la a awm atah atloe boeih lawng a awmngaih puei u.
Nangmi boeih tah Khrih kah pum la na awm u tih a beek la rip na awm u.

Khrihcabu khuiah he ang thli boeih he Pathen lawng a khueh; lamhacuek ah celtuih he a khueh, pahihna ah tawngha thli a khueh tih a pathumna ah cangpueikung thli te a khueh; tecoengah kawpoek rai aka sai thlaang thli te a khueh tih thlaangtlo hoeih sak thaina aka dang thlaang thli, thlaang aka bawmcemkung thli, thlaang uktemkung thli oen ming nawh awl aka cal thlaang thli lawng a thoei u.
Ahimi te celtuih la awm boeih nawh, tawngha la khaw awm boeih nawh tih cangpueikung la khaw awm boeih u nawh. Thlaang boeih lawng huham tharana khaw khueh rip nawh tih
thlaangtlo hoeihsakna khaw, ming nawh awl cal khaw, ming nawh awl te thuicaih thaina khaw khueh rip u nawh.
Tedawngah awlpui ngaai kutdo dawngah na thinkaw te khueh uh. Te ang thli boeih lak ah atheen koek te kavan thui ai.
Kai lawngah thlaanghing kah awlcawm awlcee oen vanthlaang awl pateng ka cal thai cakhaw lungna ka khueh nawh atah ka awl-thui he curumngang la awl aka riing mong oen tlaklak awl angla ni a awm mai.

Kai lawngah thlaang kawthawhna awl te thui thaina kutdo te ka khueh cakhaw; kai lawngah cuihna boeih ka khueh tih awlhuep boeih te yaakming thaina ka khueh cakhaw, kai lawngah tlaang sawm thoeih sak thaina oengna boeih te ka khueh cakhaw lungna ka khueh nawh atah kai he ahong la ni ka awm.
Kai lawngah ka khueh thaihu boeih he khawdeng harah te ka rek ka ra boeih mai tih ka pum he luciik la thawthueng ham ka pe mai cakhaw lungna ka khueh nawh atah kai dawngah atheenna roe awm nawh.
Lungna lawngtah khawdawp a ngaai tih reenna a khueh; lungna lawngtah uett-eena khaw, halangna khaw, Oekthloenna khaw khueh nawh;
lungna tah khawboe the nawh, amah ham bueng poek nawh, a thin toi nawh; lungna lawngtah thlaang kah thawlhpalhna te poek khuep nawh;
lungna tah athe dawngah awmngaih nawh tih awltak dawngah awmngaih.
Lungna tah a kaw boet nawh tih oengna, ngaiuepna a khueh, a thin san tih a kaw daw.
Lungna tah dungyan toela cak. Tawngha awl te thui thaina awm cakhaw kawlkalh ah boeih ai; ming nawh awl cal thaina awm cakhaw boet ai; cuihhoena awm cakhaw khum kang ai.
Metihtiah mami kah cuihhoena kutdo oen tawngha awl thui thaina he avaang athal mai ni;
tede asoepbirna te avan pha veng atah avaang athal la aka awm boeih he tah ha-ata boeih ai.
Camaw la ka awm veng atah camaw angla awl ka thui, camaw angla ka kaw thlawp tih camaw angla kaw ka poek; tahe atah tawngpataang la ka awm poen tih camaw moeiboe te ka hawna tlaih nawh.

Tahe ah mami lawng thaihu n'huh u he tah thlalang dawngah arui araila muei ame aka tueng angla ni a awm; vuenvai ah ngoen tah haitang heet la n'hu poen ai. Tahe ah kai lawng ka ming he avaang athal mai ni; Pathen lawng kai m'mingna he asoepbir van angla vuenvai ah ngoen tah asoepcala ka ming van ai.
Awlpui thaihu pathum awm: te tah oengna, ngaiuepna oen lungna he ni, he thli boeih khuiah lungna he abokoek ni.
Tecoengah lungna he hawna ham yawm u lah. Muithla ben kah kutdo dawngah na thinkaw te khueh uh, awlpuila Pathen awlthang phawngna kutdo te khueh hamla yawm uh.

Ming nawh awl aka cal thlaang pakhat lawngah thlaangtloe tengah awl thui nawh tih Pathen tengah ni a thui, metihtiah ahih awl te a-u lawngkhaw yaakming pe nawh. Ahih lawng Muithla kah huham tharana rang oen awlhuep awltak te ni a thui.
Tede Pathen kah awlthang te aka phawng lawngtah thlaangping tengah bawmcemna awl, thapeekna awl, thloepthloeina awl te a thui.
Ming nawh awl la a cal te tah amah bueng lawng ni a hoeikhangna, tede Pathen awlthang a thui te tah khrihcabu boeih lawng a hoeikhangna.

Nangmi boeih he ming nawh awl la cal sak ham ka ngaih; tede Pathen awl phawngna te na khueh u ham ka ngaih ngaai. Metihtiah Pathen awlthang aka phawngkung tah ming nawh awl aka cal lak ah aphu awm ngaai. Khrihcabu kah hoeikhangna hamla a awl thui te aka letkung a awm nawh atah aphu awm nawh.

Tedawngah maya manau thli, nangmi tengla ka law vengah mingnawh awl la ka cal kawinih nangmi hamla kai he hoeikhangna awm ai aw? Awm tang manawh! Pathen tengkah awlphawng pakhat mai khaw, cuihna mai khaw, tawngha kah awlthang mai khaw, cangpueina mai khaw kavan khuen nawh atah nangmi ham hoeikhangna awm nawh.
Hingna aka khueh nawh riingding thaihu phiviit khaw, tingtoeng khaw a awl te atheenla a thoeng nawh atah lum-alaa te me ang a tum u tite metila thlaang lawng a ming thai ai?
Pengsara aka tum lawngkhaw acairaula a tum nawh atah a-u ceem tloek ham a kamthlah ai?
Tetih van angla ming nawh awl oen ah mingtungplau nawh la awlthang na thui u te a-u lawngah nangmi kah awl thui akawng alam te a yaakming ai? Nangmi kah awl te yilh dawngah ni a ha-ata mai ai!
Dilai dawngah awl lakloe moen awm tih te awl boeih te a thuingaihna aka awm nawh awl khat khaw awm nawh.
Tede kai lawng ka yaakming nawh awl thuikung thlaang te kai ham tah thlaangphun tloe la awm tih kai khaw ahih ham tah thlaangphun tloe la ka awm van.
Nangmi lawngah muithla kutdo te khueh hamla na thinkaw a thluembuek u van angla atloe boeih lak ah khrihcabu roengna aka bawm thai ngaai te khueh ham yawm uh.
Tedawngah ming nawh awl aka cal thlaang lawngah amah kah awl thui kutdo te thuicaih thaina ham thangthui seh.
Metihtiah he tila ka thangthui vengah ka muithla tah thangthui ngoen de ka thinkaw tah te dawngah te awm nawh.
Tetih atah me tih ka ti ai? Kai lawng ka muithla oen ka thangthui vetih ka thinkaw oen khaw ka thangthui ai; ka muithla oen laa ka sak vetih ka thinkaw oen khaw laa ka sak ai.

Nang lawng muithla bueng oen Pathen teng awmngaih awl na thui vengah nangmi kah pumna ah aka thuum van thlaang thoet mailai lawngah nangmi kah awmngaih ciil thui thangthuina ah te metila “Amen” tila a thui thai ai? Nangmi kah awl thui te ahih lawng a ming moenih ta.
Nangmi kah awmngaih ciil thui thangthuina te theen hlang cakhaw thlaangtloe hamla hoeikhangna awm nawh.
Nangmi boeih lak ah ming nawh awl la yahawh ngaai ka cal dawngah Pathen ka uem tangkiik.
Tede khrihcabu lawng Pathen a bokna ah ming nawh awl oen athong asang thui lak ah thlaangtloe cangpueina ham tah yaakming thai awllung lung ngaa te ka thui bet dai ai.
Maya manau thli, kawpoekna dawngah camaw angla awm u boel; the-arana nawh ben atah camaw la awm uh, kawpoekna ben atah poekna aka soep lungcuih thlaang la awm uh.

Caciim dawngah, “Awl lakloe aka cal thlaang thli rang oen ah, ka thlaangphun thli tengah awl ka thui ai. Thlaangphun tloe thli kah hui-kaa oen ah awl ka thui pe ai, te pateng khaw ka thlaangphun thli lawng ka awl he hutung u nawh baal hun ai, tila Bawipa lawng a thui.” tila te a thut.

Tedawngah ming nawh awlcal kutdo he tah oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang thli ham noekna ni, oengca la aka awm thlaang thli ham nawh ni, Pathen awlthang phawngna kutdo he tah oengca thli kah noekna ni, oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang thli ham nawh ni.

Tecoengah khrihcabu lawng khat la kang na pum u tih thlaang boeih lawng ming nawh awl la na cal pluep vengah te thlaang thoet mailai khaw tihnawhtah oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang te va kuun mai kawinih nangmi te cuih taal thlaang thli ni ti nawh ai aw?

Tede nangmi boeih lawng Pathen kah awlthang na phawng u vengah oengca la aka awm thlaang khaw, thlaang thoet mailai khaw pakhat khat te va kuun mai kawinih awl a yaakna rang oen a thawlhna te ahih lawng a ming ai. A yaak awl boeih lawng a thinkaw te a phoel pe vetih,
ahuepla a poek boeih te a tueng pe pheng ai, tecoeng atah buekuep vetih Pathen te a bok van vetih, “Nangmi tim ah he Pathen awm tangtang!” tila te a thui van ai.

Maya manau thli ka thuingaihna tah he tila ni. Nangmi lawngah Pathen bok hamla na pum u vengah te pakhat lawngtah laa sak hamla na khueh, pakhat lawngtah cang puei ham na khueh, pakhat lawngtah Pathen tengkah awlphawng thui ham na khueh, pakhat lawngtah ming nawh awl oen awlthang thui ham na khueh tih pakhat lawngtah ming nawh awl thuicaih thaina te na khueh u mai ai. Soeprep boeih te Khrihcabu hoeikhangna ham sai uh.
Mingnawh awl oen thui ham aka ngaih te a awm atah yahawh koek ah pahih lawng aw, tih nawh atah pathum lawngah pakhat coeng pakhat thui u selang tah pakhat khat lawngah awl te thuicaih pe seh.
Tede te ah te awl aka let thai thlaang pakhat khaw a awm nawh atah ming nawh awl la aka cal thlaang te awm duem mai selang tah amah bueng Pathen tengah thui mai seh.
Thlaang pahih lawng aw, nawh atah pathum lawng aw Pathen awlthang te a thui vetih ahimi kah awl thui te atloe hue lawngah asoeng oen asoeng nawh khaw nai-anawng u seh.
Tede pumna ah aka ngawl thlaang pakhat lawngah Pathen tengkah awlthang a dang te thui ham a khueh atah awl aka thui lii te toeng sak ham awm.
Thlaang boeih lawng thuituenna awl te a yaak tih tharana te a dangna ham nangmi boeih lawng pakhat coeng pakhat Pathen awlthang te phawng uh.
Pathen awlthang phawng ham kutdo aka dang awlthuikung lawngah a kuemsuem u ham awm.
Metihtiah mami he khawpaw rang-au la awm ham Pathen lawng ngaih nawh, roeproeina oen ding asuek la awm sak ham ni a ngaih.

Khrihcabu boeih ah Pathen thlaang thli kah awm ih van angla pumna ah te hutaa lawng ading asuekla awm u seh. Ahimi te awl thui sak boel; Judah thlaang thli kah Phungawl lawngah a thui angla ahimi te teemkung la awm u boel seh.
Ahimi lawngah thaihu pakhat khat kawng te ming ham a ngaih u atah a vaa thli te im ah doet adap u seh. Khrihcabu pumna ah hutaa pakhat lawng awl a thui he yaraula awm.
Pathen kah awl he nangmi teng kalawng aw a law? Nangmi teng bueng ah aw avan pha?
Thlaang pakhat lawngah amah oen amah Pathen kah laipai la ka awm tila khaw, muithla ben kah kutdo ka khueh tila khaw a poek atah nangmi tengah ca kavan thut he Bawipa kah awlpeek ni tite ming seh.
Tede ca kavan thut he n'tula a sak nawh atah ahih te n'tula khaw ngaai u van boel.
Tedawngah maya manau thli, Pathen awlthang phawng ham te ngaih ngaai u lah, tede ming nawh awl cal te khaw khang u boel.
Thaihu soeprep boeih he along a-im ah anep-anoeila sai ham awm.
Maya manau thli, Nangmi tengah kavan phawng Awlthang Theen, nangmi lawng na do u tih oengna ah acakla na paina u te tahe ah nangmi ming sak koep ham ka ngaih.

Te tah nangmi tengah kavan phawng awlthang theen te ni. Nangmi lawng acakla na phoeih khak u atah te kah awlthang theen rang oen nangmi thlawnna na dang u, te tih nawh atah nangmi kah oengna te ahong la ni a awm.
Kai lawng ka dang tih nangmi kan peek patoeng he tah awlpui tangkiik ni, te tah Caciim dawngah a thut angla Khrih tah mami kah thawlhna dawngah ni a duek;
tecoengah a up u tih Caciim dawngah a thut angla athum hin ah tho koep;
Piter tengah te phumpho tih tecoengah celtuih paha thlaihih tengah te a phumpho pe.
Tecoengah a hubang thli ya-ngaa thlai tengah vai at a phumpho pe, thlaang vangg tah duek u poen, akuum ngaai tah hing u hun.
Tecoengah Jeem tengah a phumpho coengah celtuih boeih tengah te a phumpho pe.
Hukhueng atah thangyah angla aka awm kai thlaangtueng thlaangtaa nawh tengah khaw phumpho van.
Metihtiah celtuih boeih khuiah kai tah cawmthawk nawh koek la ka awm, kai lawng Pathen khrihcabu te ka heem ka tek dawngah celtuih ti ham pateng ka koeih nawh.

Tede Pathen lungvatna rang oen tahe kah ka awm angla he ka awm tih lungvatna m'peek te khaw apoei-oepla ka khueh van nawh. Atloe celtuih hue lak ah kai tah apuehla bii ka bi ngaai, tede kai lawng ka bi ti ham awm nawh tih ka tengkah Pathen lungvatna lawng ni a bi.
Tedawngah kai teng kalawng aka law te khaw, ahimi teng kalawng aka law te khaw, he ni kaimi boeih lawng ka phawng u tih he ni nangmi lawng na tangna u.
Tahe vengah he Khrih tah duekna kalawng tho koep tite kaimi lawng kavan phawng u lal maiah nangmi timkah thlaang khatsut lawng thlaangduek he tho koep tang manawh na ti u thai?
Tete asoeng tangtang atah Khrih he tho nawh ti ngaihna ni.
Khrih he duekna kalawng a thawh koep nawh atah kaimi lawng phawng ham koei n'tu khaw ka khueh u nawh vetih nangmi lawngkhaw tangna ham koei n'tu khaw awm van manawh.

Thlaangduek thli thawhkoepna awm nawh tite soeng taktak kawinih Khrih he thawh sak koep manawh, Khrih he duekna kalawng tho koep tite kaimi lawng ka thui u dawngah kaimi tah Pathen kawng hoempaw aka thui la ni ka awm u poen ai.
Metihtiah thlaangduek he tho nawh kawinih Khrih khaw tho manawh.
Tecoengah Khrih a thawh koep nawh atah nangmi kah oengna te khaw thailatna mailai la awm vetih tahe toe ah mami thawlhna khuiah na ha na taa lii u hun.
Tecoengah Khrih ah aka duek oengca thli khaw ha-ata boeih ti ngaihna poen ni.
Khrih ah mami kah ngaiuepna he tihin hang hingkhui bueng hamla theen doek kawinih vawva mai poen ni, dilai dawngah mami lak ah he tamreen tamvaih thlaang a-u khaw awm tlaih nawh.
Tede awltak tah duekna kalawng Khrih a thawh he tah duekna khuiah aka ip muelh thlaang thli ham khaw thawhkoepna aamahkhan la awm.
Metihtiah thlaang pakhat rang oen duekna he va law, tetih van angla duekna kalawng thawhkoepna he khaw thlaang pakhat rang oen va law.
Metihtiah Adam oen tuhkaina rang oen ah thlaang boeih he duekna lawng a khuk dulh, tetih van angla Khrih oen tuhkaina rang oen thlaang boeih he hingna ah tho koep ai.
Tede thlaang boeih he amah kah aitleng lawng a pha vengah tho rip ai; lamhacuek ah Khrih he tho poen, tecoengah amah a law vengah amah kah thlaang thli te tho ai.
Tecoeng atah atue boetna te a pha poen ai; Khrih lawngah ukkung muithla the boeih, ukna aana khuehkung thli oen huham tharana boeih te a taa vetih Pa Pathen tengah Ram ukna te a peek ai.
Metihtiah raal boeih te a taa tih amah khowtang ah a khueh thlanatah Khrih lawngah a uk ai.
Hukhueng koek taa ham raal te tah duekna ni.

Metihtiah Caciim lawng, “Pathen lawng soeprep boeih he amah khowtang ah a khueh” tila a thui. “Thaihu boeih” ti vengah Khrih khowtang ah soeprep khuehkung Pathen amah he tah thuum nawh ti he tah ciim ngoen.

Tede soeprep boeih he Khrih kah ukna huiah a khueh coeng atah soeprep boeih ahih khowtang ah khuekung Pathen kah ukna huiah a Capa amah he awm van vetih thaihu cungkuem soeprep boeih te Pathen lawng a uk poen ai.

Tetih atah thlaangduek yuengla baptisma aka dang thlaang thli te ta metila a awm ai? Ahimi lawng n'tu a ngaiuep u tih a sai u? Thlaangduek thli he tho nawh tite khatsut hue kah thui angla asoeng tangtang atah n'tu hamla ahimi lawngah thlaangduek hamla baptisma te a sai u kai?
Te atah, mami lawng ta, n'tu ham khawhin roekk ah rih awm patang raina he n'khang khiing u?

Maya manau thli, kai tah khawhin roekk ah pacil pahaai duek thlipit la ka awm poepa! Nangmi he tah mami kah Bawipa Khrih Jesuh oen pum khat la awmna ah ka pawmsangna la na awm u dawngah he tila ka thui ni.

Kai lawngah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna ben oen ah he Efesa khaaw ah “Satluung thli” oen ka khoelh u mai kawinih n'tu ka dang ai? Tede thlaangduek thli he hingna ah a thawh pai atah, “Thangvuen ah n'duek u poen ai, ca u silang tah aw u sih,” tila a thui angla te awm u van sih aw!
Ngau-athuu u boel, “Thlaangthe lawng thlaang theen a poeih” ti de lah koen.
Na thinkaw te caihpan sak u langtah thawlhna te toeng u loeih. Khatsut lawngtah Pathen khaw na ming u nawh tih yak uh ka ti dawngah ni tila ka thui.
Thlaang pakhat lawngah, “Metila thlaangduek he hingna ah a thawh koep ai? Me ang pum araw la a awm ai? tila awldoetna awm mai ai.
Nangmi thlaangngau hue! Nang lawng dilai dawngah caangti na tuh vengah a duek nawh atah a thing po thai nawh.
Nang lawngah caangti mai khaw, khatsut atloe amu-ati mai khaw na tuh vengah amu-ati ni na tuh, athing aka roeng hang tangte na tuh moenih ta.
Pathen lawng te kah amu-ati te amah kawngaih la akung te acoeng sak; ati-amu boeih te amami kah akung te rip a peek.
Tecoengah aka hing boeih kah asa-ataai he vai u rip nawh; thlaanghing lawng asa-ataai phun tloe a khueh, ram sa lawng phuntloe a khueh, va lawng phun tloe a khueh tih nga lawngkhaw phun tloe a khueh.
Tecoengah vaan benkah pum awm tih dilai benkah pum khaw awm; vaan benkah pum lawng a khueh a thlaang theenna te atloela awm tih dilai ben kah pum lawng a khueh a thlaang theenna te atloela awm.

Khawmik lawng amah kah a thlaang theenna a khueh, thla lawngkhaw a thlaang theenna atloe a khueh tih aisi thli lawng a thlaang theenna alakloe a khueh; tecoengah aisi khuiah pateng khaw a thlaang theenna a phunphun alakloe rip a khueh u.
Thlaangduek thli khaw hingna ah a thawh koep u vengah he tila ni a awm van ai. Pum he up la a awm vengah aka duek thai la awm tih, a thawh koep vengah aka duek thai nawh la awm.
Pum he vui la a awm vengah te a thlaangthe tih a tha khueh nawh, a thawh koep vengah tah a thlaang theen tih a tha ra.
Pum he vui la a awm vengah dilai pumsa la awm tih a thawh koep veng atah muithla benkah pumsa la awm ai. Dilai, pumsa khaw awm tih muithla ben kah pumsa khaw awm.
Metihtiah Caciim lawngah, “Lamhacuek tawngpa Adam te thlaanghing la a sai.” ti, tede hukhueng Adam te tah hingna pekung Muithla ni.
Muithla benkah pum he lamhacuek la law nawh tih dilai ben kah pum he ni aka law, tecoengah ni muithla ben kah pum he a law hun.
Adam lamhacuek te dilai a sai tih dilai dawng kalawng va law; Adam apabena tah vaan kalawng ni a law.
Dilai koe la aka awm thlaang tah dilai oen a sai thlaang te oen ah lo u tih vaan kah thlaang tah vaan kalawng aka law thlaang oen ah lo u.
Dilai oen a sai thlaang kah muei asam oen ah mami n'khuk adah u van angla vaan ben thlaang kah muei-asam oen ah te mami n'khuk adah u van ai.
Maya manau thli ka thuingaihna tah thi-asa oen a sai pum lawngah he Pathen Ram te paang thai manawh, tecoengah aka duek thai lawngah aka duek thai nawh te khueh thai manawh.
Awlhuep awltak he hutung u lah: Mami he boeih n'duek u manawh, tede hukhueng koek pengsara te a tum vengah kawlkalh mikkhah palap ah n'thaw u poen ai.
Metihtiah pengsara te a tum veng atah thlaang thli te tho u vetih metuek ah khaw duek u tlaih manawh, mami boeih he n'thaw pan u poen ai.
Metihtiah a rong-ing la aka awm thai he rong-ing thai nawh la thaw u pan vetih aka duek thaihe aka duek thai nawh la pan thaw u poen ai.

Tedawngah rong-ing thai koei la aka awm te rong-ing thai koei nawh la pan thaw u vetih duek thai la aka awm te duek thai nawh la a thaw u pan veng atah,” Duekna te a phe poen; Taana tah soepbir poen!”
“Duekna, mela muem na taana te a awm? Duekna, mela nuem na tharana sue te a awm?” tila caciim lawng a thui te atak tang la thoeng poen ai.
Duekna lawng tharana sue te thawlhna dawng kalawng a dang tih thawlhna lawngah tharana te Phungawl dawngkah a dang.
Tede mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen mami taana pekung Pathen tengah thangtheenna awm hawn seh!

Tedawngah ka lungna maya manau thli, paihuen net lang acakla pai uh. Bawipa kah bii na bi u te metuek ah khaw apoei-oepla awm nawh tih ahong-ahii nawh ni tite na ming u dawngah Bawipa bii na bina dawngah te tokthlue poepa uh.
Judia ram ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli bawmna hamla tangka cawi ham kawng ca navan thut te tah: Galati peng kah khrihcabu thli tengah ka thui pe angla te sai u van.
Yarh roekk kah lamhacuek khawhin ah nangmi pakhat rip lawngah tangka na dang taring ah ayawl ayet khaw tungsep uh; te atah kai ka law vengah tangka cawi ham ngoe tlaih manawh.
Kai ka law coengah nangmi lawng na tuek thlaang thli te awl uenna ca ka peek vetih ahimi te nangmi kah kutdo thak hamla Jerusalem la ka tuih ai.
Kai khaw ceh van hamla angoena a awm atah ahimi oen kamah he haih ka cet u ai.
Macidonia ram he hiil-adawng ham a awm dawngah Macidonia ram hiil-adawng coengah ni nangmi tengla ka law hun ai.
Nangmi tengah te ka awm khiing la koeih mai, sikca khui puet tah ka awm maila koeih, tecoengah ka ceh ngaihna ah yin la koekthoek ka cehna ham te nan bawm u thai ai tila ka ngaiuep.
Nangmi tengah kawlkalh ah pah tih nangmi te huh doek ham mai tah ka ngaih nawh; Bawipa lawngkhaw akhan atah nangmi tengah asan hlang awm ham ka ngaiuep.
Efesa khaaw ah he pentikos khawhin toe ah ka awm ai.
Kai he aka oelhtaih thlaang yahawh awm de, he ah he bii bi thaina atue theen awm.
Nangmi tengla Timote he avan pha vengah a awmdamna nawh hamla nangmi lawng atheenla ngawlh pai puei uh, ahih he kai angla Bawipa kah bii ni a bi.

Nangmi a-u khat lawngkhaw ahih te dapsit la van hu u boel, ngaimawng ngaitoela yin la thoeng thoeng cet tih ka teng avan pha koep thaina hamla bawmcem uh, kai oen maya manau thli lawng ahih avan pha koep ham te ka ngaiuep u.

Tecoengah manau Apollos kawng tah: atloe maya manau thli oen haih nangmi tengah ceh hamla ka thui pe poepa de tahe veng atah coengg thai thlan ai tila a poek. Te cakhaw a hoeng atoeih vengah law badai.
Ngaithuen huertue uh, oengna dawngah acakla pai uh, na thin cak sak uh, na tha thloet u boel.
Na sai boeih te lungna oen sai uh.
Nangmi lawngah Stefanas oen a imkhuikaw te na ming u; Ahimi tah Akhaia khaw ah lamhacuek khrihca la awm u tih Pathen thlaang thli ham bii bina dawngah tlungmu u,
he ang thlaang thli kah mawtna te vai u lang bii aka bi thlaang boeih oen bawng-yawng u langtah bii bi uh.
Stefanas, Fotunatas oen Akhaikas mi he a law u dawngah ka awmngaih. Nangmi na awm u nawh ah khaw ahimi lawng n'hilh u sak.
Nangmi te na kaw avan hoe sak u van angla te kai khaw ka kaw avan hoe sak u. He ang thlaang thli he tah koeh ham awm.
Asia ram khuikah khrihcabu thli lawng nangmi te n'toei u; Akuila, Priscilla oen ahimi im ah aka pum khrihcabu lawng nangmi te n'toei u.
He kah aka awm maya manau boeih lawng n'toei u. Nangmi khat oen khat maya manau angla aciim kuttuukna oen toei uh.
Kai Pawl lawngah voemtoeina ca he kamah kut roeroe oen kavan thut.
Bawipa te aka lungna nawh thlaang tah kawsi yawkk seh! Marana tha. Kaimi Bawipa, law hawn loeih!
Bawipa Jesuh kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh.
Kai kah lungna he Khrih Jesuh ah aka awm nangmi boeih sawah awm seh.

Pathen kawngaihna rang oen Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih la aka awm kai Pawl oen mami kah manau Timote lawng Kawrin khaw kah Pathen khrihcabu oen Akhaia peng pum ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli tengah ca kavan pat u.
Mami na Pa Pathen oen Bawi-pa Jesuh Khrih lawng lungvatna ngaimawngna te nangmi m'pe hawn seh.
Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ana Pa oen Pathen, thlaang reenkung mami na Pa, bawmcemna boeih a lawna kungpui Pathen te thangpawm u sih.

Raina phun soeprep aka tawng thlaangtloe te bawm thaina ham mami kah raina boeih ah amah lawng mami he m'bawm, te tila thlaangtloe te mami lawng m'bawm vengah Pathen tengkah n'dang u bawmna te n'hawna.
Mami lawngah Khrih kah patang khangna te n'dang u van angla Khrih rang oen ah mami lawng Pathen kah bawmna alentloe te khaw n'dang u van.

Kaimi lawng patang ka khang u atah nangmi te bawmna ham oen thlawnna ham ni; kaimi lawng bawmna ka dang atah nangmi lawngkhaw kaimi angla bawmna te na dang u van vetih kaimi kah patang khangna, te ang van te nangmi lawngkhaw kawdawna oen ah na ueh thaina ham tharana te m'peek u.
Tedawngah nangmi sawah ka ngaiuep-na te tah cak; kaimi kah patang khangna te nangmi lawng na khang u van tih kaimi lawng ka dang u bawmna te khaw na dang u van.

Maya manau thli, Asia peng ah kaimi lawng ka tawng u te nangmi ming sak hamla ka ngaih u. Kaimi sawah thalrih avan khueng u te bo aih tih arih aih tangkiik dawngah hing ham pateng ka ngaiuep tlaih nawh poen.
Kaimi he duek sak hamla awl a tloek u poen tila ni ka poek u. Tede he tila a awm he tah mami lawng mah oen mah te uepna ohla, thlaangduek aka thawh sak Pathen te uepna ham ni.
Nangmi lawngah kaimi he thangthuina oen nan bawm u van angla, rih awm tangkiik duekna kalawng kaimi he amah lawng n'thlawn tih hailam ben ah khaw n'thlawn baal hun ai.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng kaimi ham na thangthui poepa u te Pathen lawng avan thung vetih kaimi he yotheenna n'peek ai, thlaang yahawh lawng a awl a huer u vetih kaimi ham awmngaih ciil a thui u ai.

Kaimi lawng ka thangpawmna u tah he dilai dawng hing vengah awlpuila nangmi oen tuhkaina ah he thlaanghing kah cuihna nawh tih Pathen kah lungvatna huham tharana oen ah Pathen kah peek thinkaw ciimna oen thinkaw doengna oen ah ukna he athe atheen pekbona thinkaw oen m'ming sak he ni.
Ca kavan thut u he tah nangmi lawng na tae thai tih na yaakming thai koei ni kavan thut.

Tede tahe ah nangmi lawng kaimi nan ming u he tah avaang-athal mai ni, nangmi lawng kaimi he asoep heet la nan ming u ngai ai tila ka ngaiuep, mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khawhin atah nangmi lawng na thangpawmna u tah kaimi vetih, kaimi lawngkhaw ka thangpawmna u tah nangmi van ai.
He ang thli he ka tangna khaklal dawngah nangmi lawng yotheenna arepla na dangna u ham lamhacuekla nangmi tengah yin hamla ka kamthlah.
Judia ram ka ceh vengah nangmi tengkah bawmna ka dangna ham ah Macidonia la ka ceh ah te nangmi tengla ka law silangtah ka mel ben ah khaw ka law koep ai tila ka kamthlah.
He tila kamthlah he thinkaw coep-hoeh la aw a awm kai? Ka kamthlah vengah he mah ham bueng poekna thinkaw khueh tih, “Oeih, oeih” ti oen ah, “Moenih, moenih” tila vai at maiah aka thui la ka awm aw?
Pathen tah uep-awm la awm tih awltak a thui angla nangmi tengkah ka awlkam he khaw, “Oeih,” ti oen ah, “Nawh ni” tila kawpoek thlumthle awl nawh ni.

Metihtiah, Silas, Timote oen kamah lawngkhaw nangmi tengah kavan phawng u Pathen Capa Jesuh Khrih te tah “Oeih” ti oen ah, “Nawh ni” tila thlumthle awl aka thui nawh ni. Tetih ohla ahih tah Pathen kah, “Oeih” tina ni.
Metihtiah ahih tah Pathen awlkam boeih dawngah “Oeih” tina ni. Tedawngah Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen kah ruep-awmna ham mami lawng, “Amen”, tila n'thui u.
Kaimi oen nangmi he thik at la a sai tih Khrih oen ah pumkhatla aka hing sak tah Pathen amah ni; mami he athloekla aka thloeng tih,
amah koe la awmna miknoekna te mami sawah a deng tih mami ham a toen oepsoeh boeih te aamahkhanna ham mami thinkaw ah Ciim Muithla pekung tah Pathen amah ni.
Pathen tah kai ham sausi la awm, amah lawng ka thinkaw a ming! Kawrin khaaw la law nawh ham kaw ka poek he tah nangmi na sa a suengna ham ni.

Nangmi lawng me ang na tangna ham koei tite nangmi tengah thui ham ka yawm u nawh; nangmi tah oengna dawngah acakla na pai u tite kaimi lawng ka ming. Tedawngah namami kah awmngaihna ham ni nangmi oen bii m'bi haih u.
Tedawngah nangmi na kaw kavan the sak koep nawh hamla nangmi tengah law nawh ham thinkaw ka melh poen.
Metihtiah nangmi te na kaw kavan the sak kawinih kai he ka kaw aka hoe sak a-u aka awm hun oh ai? Kai lawng kaw kavan the sak nangmi bueng lawng ni kaw navan hoe sak u.

Tedawngah ni ca ka thut tih nangmi tengla kavan pat. Kai he kaw aka hoe sak nangmi lawng kawtheboepla na awm u lak atah nangmi tengah law nawh hamla te ka ngaih. Metihtiah kai ka awmngaih atah nangmi boeih khaw na awmngaih u van tite ka ming.

Nangmi tengah lakuengna oen thinphatna oen ah mikphi oen ni ca te ka van thut. Kai lawng mengtengna tah nangmi te kawthe sak ham nawh tih nangmi boeih te kai lawng metihtlukla kan lungna tite ming sak ham ni.

Tahe ah a-u lawngkhaw thlaang pakhat khat te kaw a the sak atah kai bueng he ka kaw the sak nawh tih nangmi tim kah thlaang khatsut te khaw kaw avan the sak van. (He tila ka thui he tah ahih te atlawh khathlakla sai ham ka ngaih nawh dawngah ni.)
Nangmi thlaang yahawh lawng ahih dan na tat u te khoek poen.
Ahih te a kaw the malcal tih kawmoetkawma la a awmna nawh ham tahe atah nangmi lawng a sawah khawdawp na ngaai u vetih tha na peek u ham awm poen.
Nangmi lawngah ahih na lungna tangtang te ming sak uh tila reenna kavan bih u.
N'hu vengkah nangmi tengah ca kavan pat te tah noekdakna na tawng u vengah metihtlukla acakla na pai tih kan thuituenna awl te vai ham oepsoeh la na awm aw tite ming ham ka ngaih dawngah ni.

Nangmi lawng thlaang pakhat khat kah thawlh a sai te khawdawp na ngaai pe u atah, kai lawngkhaw khawdawp ka ngaai pe van. Metihtiah khawdawp ka ngaai vengah khawdawp ngaai ham thaihu te a awm tangtang atah nangmi rang oen ah Khrih haiah khawdawp ka ngaai.
Te tila khawdawp n'ngaai u he tah Seitan lawng mami he n'taa boel seh tila n'ngaih dawngah ni; metihtiah Seitan kah kamthlahna boeih te mami lawng m'ming u.
Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen te thui hamla Troas khaaw ka pha vengah, bawipa lawng te ah te bii bi ham lawngpui avan roek te ka huh.
Tede mami kah manau Titas te ka huh nawh dawngah ka lakueng tangkiik. Tedawngah te kah aka awm thlaang thli te sadingla ne ka tina tih Macidonia la poe ka cet.

Tecakhaw Pathen tengah thang-theenna awm hawn seh! Metihtiah Khrih oen pumkhat la awmna rang oen ah Khrih kah taana ah aka cet thlaangping tim ah thongtla thlaang angla Pathen lawng mami he m'mawt u. Khrih kawng mingna te riimtuui baw angla ram tawm ah a puungna ham mami he Pathen lawng n'hawna.
Tedawngah mami tah Khrih lawng Pathen tengah a nawn baw aka tuui riimtuui oen n'lo u, te riimtuui tah thlawn la aka awm lii thlaang tengah khaw, aka auh lii thlaang thli tengah khaw a pha.

Aka auh lii thlaang thli hamla tah te riimtuui te ahimi aka ngawn, baw aka the duekna la awm tih thlawn la aka awm thlaang thli ham tah, te riimtuui te hingna aka pe baw aka tuui riimtuui la awm. Tedawngah he ang bii he a-u lawngah a bi thai ai?

Kaimi tah Pathen kah awl te aphu aka awm nawh thaihu thaiha la aka sai thlaangtloe hue oen ka lo u nawh; tede Pathen lawng kaimi he n'tuih u dawngah, Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm u van angla Pathen haiah te thinkaw ciimna oen ka thui.

He tila ka thui he kamami kawngah mah oen mah koeh koep angla awm ai aw! Thlaangtloe khatsut angla kaimi lawngah nangmi peek hamla, tihnawhtah nangmi tengkah lawh hamla mingpueina cathut ka ngoe u aw?
Nangmi he kaimi kah cathut la na awm u poen. thlaang boeih lawng ming ham oen ah tae hamla kaimi kah thinkaw lungbui ah thut la na awm u.

He ca he tah Khrih amah lawng a thut tih kaimi tah daakphuei mai ni tite aciimla tueng. He ca he tah catui cahaang oen thut nawh tih, aka hing Pathen kah Muithla oen a thut ni, lungpeel dawngah thut nawh tih thlaanghing lungbui ah ni a thut.
Kaimi lawng he tila ka thui ngam he tah Khrih rang oen Pathen te ka uepna u dawngah ni.
He bii he kaimi lawng ka bi thai tila thui ham koei n'tu khaw awm nawh. Kaimi lawng bi thaina ka khueh he tah Pathen teng kalawng ni a law;

awlkam thaai bii he kaimi aka bi sak thai tah Pathen amah ni. Te awlkam thaai te tah ca oen thut la aka awm phungawl nawh tih Muithla te ni. Ca oen a thut phungawl lawngtah duekna te a thoeng sak tih Muithla lawngtah hingna te a peek.

Phungawl te lungpeel dawngah ca la a tarik tih peek la a awm vengah Pathen kah ruep-awmna te tueng. Mosi mik-hai dawngkah aka aang rawngtheng te yum khap u thuk poen de, aangna te atak aih hun dawngah Israel thlaang thli lawng ahih te rangpatang la bueh thai nawh. Duekna aka thoeng sak Phungawl pateng khaw te tila ruep-awmna oen a law atah,
Muithla kah biibina ruep-awm tare tah metihtlukla a lentloe tare ai!
Thlaanghing awlcekna avan khuen te te tila ruep-awm tangkiik atah thlawnna akavan khuen bii saina te tah metihtlukla ruep-awm tare ai.
N'cui veng kah aka aang tangkiik ruep-awmna te tah tahe vengkah aka aang ruep-awmna lawngah a thue rawngtheng poen dawngah khum poen n'ti ai.
Metihtiah atue soetca khuiah aka cak pateng khaw tetih aih la ruep-awmna a khueh atah dungyan aka cak ham koei lawngtah metihtlukla ruep-awmna te a khueh tare ai.
Mami lawng he ang ngaiuepna n'khueh u dawngah n'thin cak u.
Kaimi tah Mosi angla ka awm u nawh, Mosi lawng a mik-hai dawngkah aangna yum khap u tih a khum yip te Israel thlaang thli lawng a huh nawh ham ah a mik-hai te bailoeng oen a dah khoep.

Ahimi kah thinkaw tah khai u khoep tangtang tih tihin toe ah khaw awlkam ruem cabu te a tae u veng roekk ah a thinkaw tah te kah bailoeng lawng te a khuk toengtoeng hun. Thlaang he Khrih oen a tuhkai u deng bueng ah ni te bailoeng te a thlih hun.
Tihin toe ah pateng khaw Mosi kah Phungawl te a tae u veng roekk ah ahimi kah thinkaw te bailoeng lawng a dah hun.
Tede te tah thlih thai la awm, Mosi kawng te caciim lawng, “Mosi lawng Bawipa benla a mang vengah a bailoeng te a thlih,” tila a thui.
Tahe ah he awl dawngah, “Bawipa” a ti he tah Muithla ti ngaihna tih; Bawipa Muithla awmna huen atah loeihna awm.

Tedawngah mami boeih tah mik-hai aka dah khoep tlaih nawh dawngah Bawipa kah ruep-awmna te aka tueng sak thlaang poen ni; te ruep-awmna tah Muithla la aka awm Bawipa teng kalawng law tih mami he amah oen aka lo u ruep-awm tare la n'sai.
Pathen lawng reenna oen he kah bii he bi hamla kaimi m'peek dawngah kaimi tah ka kaw boet nawh.

Kaimi lawng ahuepla thaihu sai boeih oen yarau saina boeih te ka hoett u poen; kaimi lawng thailatna ka sai u nawh, Pathen kah awl khaw asoeng a kam nawh la ka thui u nawh. Kaimi tah Pathen mik huh ah awltak aangna dawngah ka hing u tih thlaang boeih kah athetheen mingna kawpoek te atheenna ham kamami oen kamami he phep u ham ka yawm u.
Kaimi lawng ka phawng u awlthang theen he thuh la a awm atah aka auh lii thlaang thli ham ni thuh la a awm ai.

He dilai kah raaibawi pathen lawng ahimi kah thinkaw te yiinna khuiah a khueh dawngah ahimi lawngah tangna u nawh. Ahih lawngah Pathen oen aka lo u tangtang Khrih kah ruep-awmna kawng Awlthang Theen dawng kalawng aka thoeng aangna, ahimi sawah aka vangg aangna te huh nawh ham a dah khoep.
Kaimi lawng kamami kawng he ka thui u nawh; kaimi lawng Jesuh Khrih tah Bawipa ni tila ka thui u tih Khrih hamla kaimi he nangmi kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm u.

Khrih kah mik-hai dawngah aka aang Pathen kah ruep-awmna te ming thaina ham mami kah lungbui khuiah amah kah aangna te aka vaang sak Pathen oen ah “Yiinna khui kalawng aangna te vaang ai!” tila aka thui te atloe nawh tih Pathen amah toeng toeng ni.
Tede Pathen tengah saithaina asang koek te awm tih mami tengah awm nawh tite a tuengna ham Muithla ben ro thaihu khuehkung mami he tah dilai-am mailai la ni n'awm mai.
Mami lawng patang raina tah n'tawng poepa de n'rek tang tang aih nawh; alak avai atah kawpoek cawm-am sut de kawpoek boet dingri aih nawh;
raal-asa broela awm de, paya khatca khaw khueh muehla tah n'awm aih nawh; mami he nganbawh tah broela n'yawkk sak u poen de a duek tah n'duek u aih nawh.
Mami kah pum dawngah amah kah hingna te a tueng thaina ham Jesuh kah duekna te mami kah aka duek thai pum dawngah n'khuen poepa.
Mami kah aka duek thai pum dawngah amah kah hingna te a tueng thaina ham Jesuh hamla mami lawng hingkhui puet ah duek thlipit la n'awm u poepa.
He kah thuingaihna tah kaimi pum dawngah he duekna lawng bii a bi de, nangmi pum dawng atah hingna lawng bii a bi.
Caciim lawngah, “Ka tangna tih ka thui” ti. Te ang oengna thinkaw oen ah te kaimi lawng ka tangna u dawngah ka thui van.
Bawipa Jesuh te duekna kalawng hingna ah aka thawh sak Pathen lawngah kaimi khaw Jesuh oen haih n'thawh sak vetih nangmi oen thik at la amah haiah te n'kuun puei ai tila mami lawng m'ming u.
He ang thli boeih he tah nangmi hamla ni, Pathen lungvatna lawng thlaang yahawh tengah a pha tare van angla Pathen ruep-awmna hamla ahimi lawng awmngaih ciil a thui khaw yahawh van ai.

He tila a awm dawngah metuek vengah khaw kaimi tah ka kaw boet nawh. Mami kah pumtaksa he voehvoeh ah tlum ahonn ngoen cakhaw, mami kah muithla hingna tah hin at coeng hin at athaaila coengg tare hang.
Tecoengah mami lawngah raina tehca kawlkalh ah n'tawngna lawngah he, he kah raina lak ah abo ngaai dungyan ruep-awmna te apueh asawmla m'peek ai.
Metihtiah mami lawngah mik huh thai thaihu te miktakna nawh tih mik huh nawh thaihu te ni m'miktakna. Mik huh thaihu tah kawlkalh ni a cak, tede mik huh nawh thaihu tah yoeyahla cak.
He dilai dawngah mami kah awmna mami pum riim-im he phe la awm atah, mami awmna ham Pathen amah kah sai dungyan aka cak im, vaan ah avan khueh ai tila mami lawng m'ming u.
Tahe vengah he vaan kah im te oen ah mami lawng thoekcau u hamla n'ngaih tangkiik dawngah n'kopaang u;
te im oen ah thoekcau la n'awm u atah mami he pumtliing la n'awm manawh.

He dilai riim-im ah mami n'awm vengah he thekhana yawkk oen n'kopaang u; te tila kopaang he tah mami kah he dilai n'pum he hoett hamla n'ngaih dawngah nawh ni, tede aka duek thai thaihu he hingna oen thawleng ham vaan benkah pum te khueh hamla n'ngaih u dawngah ni.
He tila thawleng ham roekbahkung tah Pathen amah ni. Mami ham avan khueh avan toen boeih te aamahkhanla Muithla te mami m'peek u.
Tedawngah mami lawng thincak oen n'awm u poepa. He pumtaksa im dawngah mami n'awm khui roekk atah Bawipa kah im oen ah n'thla u tite m'ming u.
Metihtiah mami kah hingna ham tah oengna he awlpui la awm, mik huh he awlpui nawh ni.
Mami tah thincak oen n'awm u tih pumtaksa he ceh taak tih Bawipa oen im ah awm haih hamla te n'ngaih u.
Tedawngah mami lawng he kah pumtaksa im ah n'awm ah khawseh, ke kah im ah n'awm u ah khawseh, atloe boeih lak ah amah te awmngaih sak ham ni n'ngaih u.
Metihtiah mami boeih he amah lawng awl cek ham Khrih haiah te m'pha boeih ai. Pumtaksa la hing vengah a the khaw, atheen khaw soeprep saina taring ah ating-atawkk la rip n'dang u ai.

Bawipa he rih ham awm tite thui-ngaihna ka ming u, tedawngah kaimi lawng thlaangtloe te ceel hamla ka yawm u. Pathen lawng kaimi he anep heet la m'ming tih nangmi lawngkhaw na thinkaw oen kai he atheen heet la nan ming u cawini tila ka ngaiuep.

Nangmi tengah kamah kah theenna te tueng sak koep hamla ka yawm u nawh; kaimi kawngah nangmi lawng na phoek-thloerna u ham ni ka yawm u. Te dengah ni thlaanghing khawboe ramlang te bueh ohla asaw ahan kah thlaanghing khawboe te a dan tih aka oekthloen u thlaang thli kah awl te na thung thai u ai.
Kaimi he ka ngau u tangtang kai aw? Ka ngau u oh atah Pathen ham ni. Ka ngau u nawh atah nangmi ham ni.
Thlaang boeih hamla thlaang pakhat duek tih ahih kah a duekna ah te thlaang boeih duek van tite m'ming u dawngah Khrih kah lungna lawngah mami he n'uk poen.
Khrih lawngah thlaang boeih hamla a duek he tah thlaanghing lawng a hing khuiah amah ham bueng la hing tlaih ohla ahimi ham duek tih aka tho koep thlaang hamla te hing ham ni.

Tedawngah tahe atah kaimi lawng a-u khat khaw thlaanghing siing oen ah alan atang ka thlit u tlaih nawh. N'hu veng atah Khrih he khaw thlaanghing siing angla alan atang ka thlit u de tahe atah te tila ka sai u tlaih nawh.
A-u khaw Khrih oen a tuhkai u coeng atah, ahih tah thlaang thaai poen ni; a hing ruem tah khum tih athaaila hing poen.
He ang thli boeih he Pathen lawng ni a sai; a raal la aka awm mami he Khrih rang oen Pathen lawng a paya la n'sai u tih thlaangtloe te khaw a paya la sai van ham mami he bii tungpui m'peek.

Kaimi lawng ka thui u awlthang tah Pathen lawng Khrih rang oen thlaang boeih te amah kah paya la a sai ti he ni. Pathen lawng ahimi kah thawlhna te cayin cabu khuiah khueh pe tlaih nawh; ahimi te amah paya la a saina awlthang theen te kaimi he m'peek.

Tedawngah kaimi lawng Khrih yueng la awl ka thui u; Pathen amah lawng nangmi te n'ceel angtoekla ni kaimi lawng kan ceel u. Nangmi lawngah Pathen kah raal la awmna kalawng a paya la awm u loeih tila kaimi lawng Khrih yueng ah kan ceel u.
Khrih tah a thawlhna awm nawh, tede amah oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen Pathen kah doengna te mami lawng paang thai van ham mami hamla ahih te Pathen lawng mami kah thawlhna te a paang sak.
Tedawngah kaimi tah Pathen oen bii aka bi haih la ka awm u dawngah Pathen kah lungvatna aka dang nangmi lawng te lungvatna te apoeila coeng sak u boel tila reenna kavan bih u.

Pathen awlthui he hutung u lah: ‘Nangmi te kan reenna atue atang a pha vengah nangmi awl te ka hutung poen; nangmi te thlawnna khawhin a pha vengah kan bawm u” tila a thui. Hutung u lah! Pathen kah reenna te dangna atue tah tahe poen ni; tihin he thlawnna khawhin poen ni!
Kaimi kah biibi he a-u lawngkhaw a cawtt abauh ham te ka ngaih u nawh dawngah a-u kah lawngpui ah khaw kanghalhna khat khaw ka khueh pe u nawh.
Te tila te sai ohla khawdeng mingna, raina, patang khangna boeih he kawdaw thinsan oen ka ueh u tih soeprep boeih ka saina dawngah Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awmna te ka tueng sak u.

Kaimi he cungpoelh oen n'bawh u, thong ah n'thlaak u tih rangpui kah awlpuung kaacaan la saina te ka yawkk u. Kaimi he duemdawng ohla bii n'bi sak u tih ih mueh ih naai la, buh mueh buh pawng la n'khueh u.
Kaimi lawng thinkaw ciimna, cuihhoena, kawdawna, reenna oen ah khaw, Ciim Muithla rang oen ah, lungna tang tang oen ah khaw,

awltak awlthang te phawngna oen, Pathen kah huham tharana oen ah Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awmna te ka tueng sak u. Kaimi lawng raal teekna ham khawseh, kamami pum thloetna ham khawseh, doengna te awva angla ka hawna u.
Kaimi lawng hinyahna khaw ka tawng u tih thekhana khaw ka tawng u; sal-aphaamna khaw ka tawng u tih koehna khaw ka tawng u. Kaimi he thlaangthaipalat la n'ngaai u de awltak ka thui u;
a-u lawngkhaw a ming nawh thlaang angla n'sai u de, thlaang boeih lawng m'ming u; thlaang duek angla n'poek u de, nan huh u angla ka hing u hun. Dan tah n'tat u de n'ngawn u nawh;

Kaw avan the sak u de ka awmngaih u yoeyah; kaimi khawdeng thlaang angla ka awm u de, thlaang yahawh te ka bawi sak u, thaihu khat khaw khueh nawh angla ka awm u de, atak tang atah kaimi lawng soeprep ka khueh ka toen u.
Kawrin khaaw kah ka lungna ka paya thli! Nangmi tengah acairaula kavan thui u poen; kaimi lawng lungbui thawhka akaula kavan awng u poen.
Kaimi lawng nangmi ham thinkaw thawh kavan khai khoep nawh; Nangmi lawng ni kaimi ham na thinkaw thawh na khaih khoep u.
Tahe ah nangmi he kamah kah ca anau thli angla awl kavan thui u: Nangmi tengah thinkaw ka khueh u van la te kaimi tengah khueh u van lah. Na lungbui thawhka te akaula van awng uh!

Nangmi lawng aka oeng nawh thlaang thli oen avan at la bii te bi haih ham yawm u boel, te tila bii haih ham te coeng thai nawh. Metila aka soeng oen ah aka soeng nawh te a yok u haih thai ai? Metila aangna oen yiinna te a awm haih thai ai?
Metila Khrih oen Raaibawi te a kaw a vai hih thai ai? Aka oeng thlaang pakhat lawng aka oeng nawh thlaang pakhat oen ah a khueh haih n'tu aka awm?

Metila Pathen kah tempal bok-im te aka oeng nawh kutsai mueime oen a roep hih thai ai? Metihtiah mami tah aka hing Pathen kah tempal bok-im ni! Pathen amah lawngah, “Kai lawngah ka awmna im te ka thlaang thli oen ka sak vetih ahimi tim ah ka awm ai; Kai tah ahimi kah Pathen la ka awm vetih ahimi te kai kah thlaang la awm u ai,” ti.
Tedawngah Bawipa lawng, “Nangmi lawng ahimi te ceh taak u lang ahimi teng kalawng athloekla thloeng uh. Nangmi lawng aka ciim nawh te ahimi oen sai haih u boel, te atah nangmi te kan do ai.
Kai tah nangmi kah na pa la ka awm vetih, nangmi tah ka canu oen capa la na awm u ai, tila Thara koek Bawipa lawng a thui,” ti.

Ka lungna paya thli, he awlkam boeih he mami tengah ni a sai. Tedawngah pumtaksa khawseh, muithla khawseh, aka ciim sak nawh soeprep boeih dawng kalawng mami he ciimcaih u silang Pathen hinyahna oen aciimsuekla hing u sih.
Nangmi thinkaw khuiah kaimi hamla ahuen van khueh u van lah. Kaimi lawng a-u khaw ka thena u nawh; a-u khaw ka rawk sak u nawh, a-u kah thaihu khaw atuueng nawh la lawh ham ka yawm u nawh.
He tila ka thui he nangmi te sal-aphaamna ham ka thui moenih; kaimi lawngah nangmi oen duek haih hing haih hamla ka thinkaw ah kan tleng-elh u tite n'hu vengah kavan thui u poen.
Nangmi te kan uep kan pangna tangkiik; Nangmi kawngah ka pawmsang u! Kaimi lawng raina soeprep ka tawng cakhaw thincak oen ka awm; Awmngaih kawhoena oen ka betoet.
Macidonia ka pha u vengah pateng khaw, ading asuek la ka awm u nawh. Khaw tawm ah raina awm, thlaangtloe hue oen tawhsina awm, ka kaw khuiah thluep ka luekueng.
Tede kawmoetkawma la aka awm thlaang thli te thathlue thakaw la aka awm sak Pathen lawngah kaimi tengah aka law Titas rang oen tha avan thlue sak.

Titas a law dawngah kaimi he awmngaih sak te bueng nawh tih ahih te nangmi lawng tha navan peek u dawngah khaw ka awmngaih u. Nangmi lawng kai he huh hamla na ngaih u tangkiik, metihtlukla na kaw a the u tih nangmi lawng kai he nan pai puei u tite Titas lawng kaimi tengah avan thui tih tahe ah ka awmngaih tare ngai.

Metihtiah ka capat lawngah nangmi te na kaw van the sak mai cakhaw te capat te kavan thut dawngah ka kaw the nawh. Te capat lawng kawlkalh ah nangmi na kaw avan the sak te ka ming vengah ngaaithe laat la ka awm.

Tede, tahe tah ka awmngaih poen, nangmi te kaw kavan the sak dawngah nawh tih na kawthena lawng nangmi te thinkaw avan thaw dawngah ni. Te kawthena te Pathen lawng ni a hawna, kaimi lawng nangmi te nganbawh kan peek aih moenih.

Pathen lawng ahawna kawthena lawngtah thlawnna ah aka ceh puei thinkaw thawna a thoeng sak tih te ang kawthena dawngah yutlawina ngoe nawh! Tede thlaanghing kah kawthena mai atah duekna te a thoeng sak.

Nangmi kah kawthena te Pathen lawng metila a hawna tite ming u lah: nangmi te tha avan thlue sak poen; na thawlh u nawh tite tueng sak ham metihtlukla na kaw a thluembuek u! Na thin sa u, na lakueng u, nan ngaai tangkiik u poen, doengna te sai ham na ngaih u poen; sai thawlhna te dan peek ham oepsoehla na awm u! He thaihu boeih dawngah he nangmi tah thawlhpalhna awm nawh tite namami lawng na tueng sak u poen.

Tedawngah te kah capat nangmi tengah ka thut te tah thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna, tihnawhtah, thlaang pakhat kah saithawlhna dawngah kavan thut nawh ni. Pathen mik huh ah kaimi ham ataktang la nangmi lawng pum na peek u tite tueng sak ham ni kavan thut.
Te tah kaimi kah tha-awmna ni. He dawng bueng ah ka tha thlue u nawh; Nangmi boeih lawng Titas te navan bawm u, a kaw navan hoe sak u tih ahih kah kawhoena lawngah kaimi he kaw avan hoe sak tare!

Kai lawng nangmi kawng te ahih tengah ka oekthloenna u poen, nangmi lawng kai he tha nan the sak u nawh. Kaimi lawng nangmi tengah awltak te ka thui yoeyah u tih te tila Titas tengah ka oekthloen u te khaw soeng.
Ahih kah thuituenna awl te ngaai hamla nangmi te oepsoehla na awm u tih nangmi lawngah ahih te rihna oen na thuen u tih lakueng lalapla na do u te a poek vengah nangmi n'lungna te tlo tare.
Nangmi te kan uepna rapcaat thai poen dawngah ka awmngaih tangkiik.
Maya manau thli, Macidonia ram kah khrihcabu boeih ah Pathen lungvatna lawng bii a bi te nangmi ming sak hamla ka ngaih u.
Ahimi tah patang khangna oen noekdak la awm u, tede ahimi tah awmngaih u tangkiik mai, amami ngoen khawdeng u mai de peekna ben atah a moeihoeih u tangkiik.
Ahimi lawng a peek thai koei lak ah pateng khaw yahawh ngaai a peek u tite nangmi tengah ka thui thai.
Judia ram ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli bawmna ham ah ahimi khaw bawmna a thawh ham koei te m'pe u van tila amami kawthawh oen reenna avan bih u.
He tila a sai u he kaimi lawng ka ngaiuepna lak ah yahawh khuengdeng! lamhacuek ah amami te Bawipa tengah pe u; tecoengah Pathen kawngaih la kaimi tengah atheenla pe u.
Tedawngah he bii he tongnankung Titas te he bii he bi poe hamla, lungna awlpui bii he a coeng toe ah nangmi te bawm ham ahih te ka ceel u.

Nangmi tah oengna, awlthuina, cuihhoena, thlaangtloe bawm ngaihna thinkaw, kaimi nan lungna thinkaw oen ah te na bawi u tangkiik mai. Tedawngah ni he lungna bii dawngah khaw thinkaw aka tho thlaang la na awm u van ham ka ngaih u.
Kai lawngah phung-alam khat khaw kavan sai nawh. Tede thlaangtloe kah bawm ngaihna thinkaw a thawh te ka thui he tah nangmi kah lungna te ataktang aw tite ming ham ka ngaih dawngah ni.

nangmi lawng mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna te na ming u; ahih tah bawi soeh mai de nangmi kah theenna ham khawdeng thlaang la coengg, he tila khawdeng la a awmna oen ah nangmi te kuirang thlaanglen la coengg sak ham a ngaih dawngah ni.

Nangmi lawng n'hu kum ah bii na tongnan sut u te tahe atah na coeng u poen kawinih theen ai tila ka poek. He bii dawngah he bi ham bueng ohla bi hamla ngaihna ben ah khaw thinkaw aka tho cuek la na awm u.
Tedawngah bii te toeng ohla bi u langtah coeng u loeih! Nangmi lawng bii na tong cuek vengkah angla bii coeng ham ah khaw na kaw thawh sak u langtah tahe vengah na khueh toen taring oen ah te bi uh.
Nangmi lawngah peek ngaihna thinkaw a thawh atah, na khuehtoen nawh thaihu ohla, peek hamla na toen nangmi kah kutdo te Pathen lawng a do ai.
Caciim lawngah, “Yahawh hlang aka tungsep lawngkhaw toen muep nawh tih, ayawlca aka tungsep lawngkhaw yoehca bueng khueh toen van thloei nawh” tila a thui.
Nangmi te bawmcem hamla kaimi lawng thinkaw thluembuek van angla Titas kah thinkaw aka thawh sak Pathen tengah ka awmngaih u tangkiik!
Kaimi kah ceelna awl a ngaai te bueng muehla nangmi te bawm hamla a kaw tho tangkiik tih amah kawthawh oen nangmi tengah law hamla a ngaih roe poen.
Ahih oen aka awlthang theen thuina bii a bina dawngah khrihcabu boeih lawng a hinyah tangkiik boenhui pakhat te kaimi lawng kavan tuih ai.

Te bueng nawh tih Bawipa kah ruep-awmna hamla he kah lungna bii bina dawngah khaw, kaimi lawngah nangmi te bawm ngaihna tueng sakna ah khaw, kaimi oen yin aka cet haih la ahih te khrihcabu boeih lawng a tuek u tih bii a peek u.
He tila moeihoeihna oen a peek u kutdo he kaimi lawng ka boel ka rai u vengah, cawtbauhna khatca khaw he kawngah a awmna nawh ham ka ngaithuen u.
Kaimi lawng atah Bawipa kah mik huh bueng ah nawh tih thlaanghing kah mik huh ah khaw aka doeng thaihu te ni sai hamla ka kamthlah u.

Tedawngah kaimi lawng ahih rawi oen haih ah thlaangtloe boenhui pakhat kavan tuih u; ahih te kaimi lawng ka noek ka dak khiing u tih bawmcem ngaihna thinkaw a khueh poepa tite ka huh u. Tahe ah khaw nangmi sawah ueppangna a khueh poen tih bawm hamla a tha thlue soeh poen.

Titas tah kaimi oen biibipuei haih la awm tih nangmi bawm ham kaimi oen bii aka bi haih ni; ahih oen haih aka law atloe maya manau hue te tah khrihcabu thli kah laipai la awm u tih Khrih te a thaang aka theen sak ni.
Nangmi kah akawng-alam, kaimi lawng ka phoekthloerna u te ahimi lawngkhaw, khrihcabu boeih lawngkhaw soeng tangtang tite anepla a mingna u thai ham nangmi kah lungna te ahimi tengah tueng sak uh.
Judia ram ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli tengah bawmcemna thaihu patna kawng te, ataktang atah kai lawng nangmi tengah capat thut ham ngoe nawh tila ka poek.

Nangmi lawngah bawm hamla na kaw tho tite ka ming tih, Macidonia ram kah thlaang thli tengah nangmi kawng te ka phoekthloerna poen. “Akhaia ram kah maya manau thli tah bawmna peek hamla te n'hu kum kalawng ah oepsoeh la awm u poen” ka tina. Nangmi kah thinkaw thluembuekna lawng ahimi yahawh ngaai te kaw a thawh sak poen.

Tahe atah maya manau hue he nangmi tengla kavan tuih, he tah nangmi kawngah kaimi lawng ka oekthloenna akawng alam te awlhong mai la a awm nawh ham ka ngaih dawngah ni. Tedawngah ka thui angla te na peek ham koei bawmna oen ah oepsoehla awm uh.

Tetih ohla Macidonia ram kah thlaang thli te kavan law puei tih nangmi oepsoeh la na awm u nawh te hu u mai kawinih nangmi kah yarau te ngoen thui han boel, nangmi kan uepna u dawngah te kaimi roe he mah metihtlukla yarau la ka awm u ai te!

Tedawngah nangmi lawng peek hamla na kam u kutdo te coekroek la na toen u ham ah he kah maya manau hue he kaimi ka law thlan ah nangmi tengla kavan tuih oepsoeh ham angoe tila ka poek. Tecoengah kai kavan pha vengah te coekroek la na awm u poen vetih nangmi te amangkhakla a peek sak ti ohla peek ham na ngaih u dawngah ni na peek u tite tueng ai.
He he hilh u boel; caangti ayawlca aka tuh lawngtah caangthaih yoehca ni a yuun van ai; caangti yahawh aka tuh lawngtah caangthaih yahawh a yuun van ai.

Thlaang boeih lawng amah kaw khuiah a nuen angla te pe seh, haihna thinkaw oen khaw pe boel seh, peek cingcing ham a ti dawngah khaw pe boel seh; metihtiah Pathen lawngtah awmngaihla aka pe te ni a lungna.

Tecoengah Pathen lawngtah na ngoena lak ah athloeila m'peek thai tih namami ham na ngoe boeih te na khueh na toen yoeyah vetih thaihu theen na saina boeih dawngah akhoek anoen lak ah a thloeila na dang ai.
Caciim lawngah, “Ahih lawngtah moeihoeihna oen khawdeng harah thli te a do-adan; ahih kah reenna tah dungyan toe cak,” tila a thui.

Tecoengah, caangti tuh ham oen buh caak ham pekung Pathen lawng nangmi kah ngoe boeih caangti te m'peek ai; moeihoeihla na peek u dawngah caangti aka po te athlur atawi sak vetih” caangvui caangthaih te avan puung sak ai.
Nangmi lawng moeihoeihla na peek poepa ham ah nangmi te kuirang thlaanglen la n'coeng sak ai. Nangmi kah kutdo peek te kaimi kut dawng kalawng patoeng aka do thlaang thli lawng Pathen te a koeh u ai.
Metihtiah nangmi lawng he bii he na saina oen ah Pathen thlaang thli kah a voetna dawngah na bawmcemna bueng te nawh tih Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil thuina awl khaw a thoeng sak.

Nangmi lawng he bii he na bina rang oen ah Khrih kah awlthang theen te acakla na phoeih u tih na pai u thai dawngah khawseh, nangmi lawng thlaangtloe thli oen ahimi te moeihoeihna oen na peek u dawngah khawseh, thlaang yahawh lawngah Pathen te a koeh u poen ai.
Tedawngah Pathen lawng a lungvatna te acoeih pawk la nangmi tengah avan lun poen dawngah ahimi lawng nangmi te n'thintlawhna vetih nangmi ham thangthui u poen ai.
Thui lek thuinaa nawh aphu aka tlo amah kah kutdo peek dawngah Pathen teng awmngaih ciil thui u sih.
Mami oen ng'awm haih veng atah awl kaa khaw thui nawh, athlathloei la a awm atah tluung-athang mai na ti u kai Pawl lawngah Khrih kah boe-ngaaina, kawdawna thinkaw oen ah reenna kavan bih u.
Nangmi teng kavan pha vengah te tluung-athaang ham koei la n'sai u boel; kaimi kah bii he dilai pumsa hue-ngaihna thinkaw oen a sai tila aka thui thli te tah awl tlawh oen ka tlung mai ai.
Kaimi he dilai dawngah ka awm u ti he tah soeng tangtang, tede kaimi lawngah dilai dawngah pumsa hue-ngaihna thinkaw oen raal ka kah moenih.
Kaimi lawng raal kahna ham ka hawna awva he tah dilai dawngkah awva nawh ni. Asoeng akam nawh awlpuungna te ka phe u,
Pathen kah cuihna te kanghalhkung la aka awm oekthloenna boeih boeih te ka phe u; thlaanghing kah poekna boeih te tamnaa angla ka tuuk u tih Khrih awl te ka ngaai sak u.
Nangmi lawngah uep-awm tangtang la na awm u te na tueng sak u coeng atah uep-awm nawh la saina boeih te dan tat ham oepsoehla ka awm ai.

Nangmi lawngtah thaihu boeih te asaw ahan ah ni na dan u. Te ah te pakhat khat lawng amah oen amah te Khrih kah thlaang la ka awm tila aka thui awm aw? Theen, a awm atah amah kawng te poek koep de lah seh, metihtiah ahih te Khrih thlaang la a awm van angla kaimi khaw ka awm van.
Bawipa lawngah kaimi m'peek saithaina aana akawng alam te apueh asawmla ka oekthloenna cakhaw ka yak nawh, te kah saithaina aana tah nangmi te phena ham nawh tih nangmi lawng na roengna ham ni.
Kai lawngah nangmi te capat oen hih-ahuut hamla a yawm tila na poek u ham te ka ngaih nawh.

Thlaang khatsut lawng atah, “Pawl lawng he a capat dawngah ngoen tah awl phawh tlo tih akhing awm mai, tede mami oen awm haih veng atah birih sut tih a ralthe, a awl thui khaw alawng-ala awm nawh,” ti u mai ai.
Te ang thlaang lawngah a ming ham tah, athlahlang kalawng kavan thut capat oen ah, nangmi tengah ka awm vengah ka sai ham koei te atloe-abangna awm nawh tite ming seh.

Amah oen amah te asang luelh la aka poek u thlaang hue oen te kaimi tah ka thumvan u nawh tih nuehtah ngam ham khaw ka mueinai u nawh. Ahimi tah ngau tangkiik mah aw! Ahimi lawngah amami oen amami te tahna hamla amami kah alan-atang te a sai u tih amami kah alan-atang oen ah te nuem-anai u.

Te cakhaw kaimi kah oekthloenna lawngtah ari-amawng voel te poeng voelh aih manawh; Pathen lawng kaimi ham bii avan nuenna ari-amawng khuiah ni a awm ai, te kah ari-amawng te tah nangmi tim ah kaimi kah biibina he khaw thuum.
Nangmi tah te kah ari-amawng khuiah na awm u dawngah Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen te nangmi tengla kavan khuen tih ka law u veng ah te te kah ari-amawng voel ah te kaimi ka cet u nawh.

Tedawngah Pathen lawng kaimi ham ari-amawng avan helhna voel ah thlaangtloe lawng bii a bina tangte kawngah te ka oekthloen u nawh. Te lak atah Pathen lawng ari-amawng a helhna khuiah te nangmi tim ah bii akau ngaaila ka bi thai u vetih nangmi kah oengna te roeng hang ai ti he ni ka ngaiuep u.
Tecoengah kaimi lawng nangmi ram voel kah thlaangtloe ram ah te Awlthang Theen ka phawng thai u ai, thlaangtloe kah lo khuiah, bii a saina tangte dawngah te kaimi oekthloen u ham ngoe nawh.
Tede caciim lawngah, “A-u lawngkhaw thangpawm u ham a ngaih atah Bawipa kah saina dawngah thangpawm u seh,” tila a thui.
Metihtiah Bawipa amah lawng thlaang theen la a pawm te ni a do, amah oen amah aka thangpawm u thlaang te tah do nawh.
Kai he ka ngau bet cakhaw khawdawp na ngaai u ham ka ngaih. Khawdawp van ngaai u hawn!
Pathen a thatlai van angla kai khaw ka thatlai van; Nangmi he Khrih amah bueng oen ah te yuvaa la awm ham kan kang sut hulaa cuem oen na lo u.
Evi te ruul lawngah asuek ahalh tih athai alatna angla te nangmi khaw na thinkaw thaw u vetih Khrih na uepna khaklal te na toeng u hau ai tila ka lakueng.

Metihtiah, thlaang pakhat lawng nangmi tengah law tih kaimi lawng ka thui nooek nawh atloe Jesuh te avan thui u vengah nangmi lawng na uemdoeh tih awmngaihla khawdawp na ngaai u. Nangmi lawngah kaimi teng kalawng na dang u Muithla oen awlthang theen oen ah aka vai u nawh muithla oen awlthang te na do u!
Nangmi lawngah, “Celtuih” tangtang na ti u thlaang hue lak ah te soetca khaw ahemla ka ngaai u nawh!
Kai he awlcal thingkaa tah ka thoem nawh mai ai, tede mingna ben tangtang atah ka voet roe nawh; He he nangmi tengah acaihla mevengah khaw thaihu soeprep ah kavan tueng sak u poen.
Pathen Awlthang Theen nangmi tengah kavan thui u vengah te kai lawng aphu kavan bih nawh; Nangmi te pawmsang hamla ka ngaih tih kamah tah adangla ka awm. Te tila ka awm te thawlh aw?
Nangmi tengah bii ka bi vengah atloe khrihcabu thli lawngah kai he m'bawm u. Nangmi bawm hamla kai lawngah ahimi tengkah te ka rot pe n'ti ai ta.

Tecoengah nangmi tengah ka awm vengah te tangka ka ngoe ah khaw bawmna kavan bih nawh; Macidonia kah aka law maya manau thli lawngah ka ngoe thaihu boeih te kai ham avan khuen u. N'hu vengkah ka awm angla ni hailam ben ah khaw ka awm ai: Nangmi ham thalrih la ka awm aih manawh.
He tila ka oekthloenna he Akhaia ram tawm ah a-u lawngkhaw khang khak thai manawh tite ka kaw khuikah Khrih kah awltak oen ah awl ka kam.
Nangmi te kan lungna nawh dawngah aw he tila ka thui? Nangmi kan lungna te Pathen lawng a ming!
“Celtuih” la ka awm u van aka ti hue lawngah te, ahimi kah a bi angla kaimi lawngkhaw ka bi thai van tila a oekthloenna thai nawh hamla tahe kah ka sai he poe ka sai ai.
Te ang thlaang thli te celtuih tangtang nawh ni, ahimi tah celtuih rawlrap thli ni, amami kah biibina kawngah hoem a thui u tih Khrih kah celtuih tangtang angla aka sa u mai ni.
Te tah kawpoek rai ham awm nawh! Seitan lawng pateng vanthlaang aka ang rawngtheng angla sa u thai van!
tedawngah ahih kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli lawngah doengna biibikung angla a sa u te kawpoek rai ham awm nawh. Aboetna atah ahimi lawngah amami kah saina angla ating atawk te a dang u ngaai ai.
Ka thui koep lah ai: a-u lawngkhaw thlaangngau la m'poek u boel seh. Tede nangmi lawng te tila na poek u atah ka oekthloenna bet van hamla thlaangngau angla te n'do u mai hawn.
Tahe ah kai lawng ka thui he, Bawipa lawng n'thui sak nawh ni; Oekthloenna ben atah thlaangngau angla awl ka thui taktak poen.
Tede thlaanghing kah akawng-alam mailai dawngah te thlaang yahawh lawng a oekthloen u dawngah kai khaw te tila ka oekthloen u van lah ai.
Nangmi ngoen tah na cuih u, tedawngah thlaangngau thli te awmngaihcala khawdawp na ngaai u thai!

Nangmi lawng ngoen tah, asoeng nawh la nangmi aka uk thli khaw, nangmi te thailatna tih apueh aka ca thli khaw, namami kah awlthuina dawngah khup lat la aka sai thli khaw, nangmi te huhsit thlaang thli khaw, na mik-hai te aka bel thli khaw, khawdawp na ngaai u thai ngoen ta.

Te ang thli te sai hamla kaimi tah ka tong-aa sut tih ka dok poen ti ham khaw ka yak sut oh poen! Tede, thlaangngau angla awl ka thui lah ai, a-u khaw thaihu pakhat khat dawngah a oekthloen u ngam atah kai khaw ka oekthloen u ngam van.

Ahimi te Hebru thlaangphun aw? Kai khaw Hebru thlaangphun van ni. Ahimi te Israel thlaangphun aw? Kai khaw Israel thlaangphun van ni. Ahimi te Abraham kah cadil thli aw? Kai khaw Abraham cadil van ni.

Ahimi te Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang aw? tede kai tah ahimi lak ah atheen ngaai tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm tite thlaangngau angla ka thui! Kai tah bii rai yahawh ngaai ka bi; thong ah ka tla poepa, cungpoelh oen voei yahawh hlang la m'bawh u, alak avai atah duek dalh la ka awm.
Judah thlaang thli lawng cungpoelh oen ah voei sawmthum pakua toe voei nga m'bawh u;

Rom thlaang thli lawng cungpoelh oen voeithum n'bawh u; lungto oen ah vai n'de u. Tuitunlii ah tuisangphaw lawngah voeithum m'plet, voei khat atah daai hin at, yiin yiin at khui puet ah tui dawngah ka awm.

Khawlawng tloe la yin ka cehna ah tuiliw rih awm ka tawng, thlaanghuuen pacaan thli tengkah, ka thlaangphun Judah thli tengkah, Gental thlaangphun thli tengkah raina rih awm te ka tawng; ramhum rammawl ah khaw, khawpui khuiah khaw, tuitunlii dawngah khaw, paya thlaangthaipalat thli tengkah khaw, rih awm raina te ka tawng.

Thatlawh thaboepla bii sai ham koei awm, ih mueh ih naai la ka awm taitu; buhpawng tuihalh la ka awm poepa; kuepyingna im khueh mueh la, caak awkk khoeknoen khaw khueh ohla, nakbai khaw khueh ohla ka awm poepa.
Atloe thli te thui ohla khrihcabu boeih kah hailamben ham kaw ka poek veng roe ah he hin roekk ah thalrih angla n'naam.
Thlaang pakhat khat a tha a yoek sut vengah kai khaw ka tha poei yoek van; thlaang khatsut a thawlh vengah kawtheboepla ka awm.
Kai lawngah ka oekthloen u atah, kamah kah tharana nawh aka tueng sak thaihu dawngah ni ka oekk-thloen u ai.
Bawipa Jesuh kah Pa oen Pathen tah yoeyahla a miing thangtheenna awm hawn seh; hoem awl ka thui nawh he amah lawng a ming.
Damaskas khaaw ka awm vengah kai he tuuk hamla Sengpahrang Aritas kah ram ukbawi lawng khawpui vawng thawhka ah raalkap thli te a khueh.
Tede kai te vueihang khuiah n'sang u coengah vawngkulh bangbuerh kalawng ah n'thlaak thuk u tih ahih kut dawng kalawng ka loeih.
Oekthloenna lawng he thaihu theen khat khaw sai nawh de, ka oekk u de lah ai. tede tahe ah Bawipa kah peek huhthlaam oen awlphawng te ka thui lah ai.

N'hu kum thlailii vengah khrihca thlaang pakhat vaan asang koek la a pawmsang hang te ka ming (He tila apawmsang hang te a taktang kai aw, tihnawhtah huhthlaam aw ka huh kai, ka ming nawh - Pathen lawng ni a ming).
Tedawngah te thlaang kawng te ka oekthloenna lah ai. Tede, kamah kah ka tha ayoekna te aka tueng sak thaihu nawh atah, kamah kawng alam dawng atah ka oekk u manawh.

Kai lawng oekthloen ham ka ngaih atah thlaangngau la tah ka awm aih manawh, metihtiah awltak ni ka thui ai. Tede ka oek u manawh, metihtiah ka saina he a huhna oen ah ka awlthui a yaakna lak ah asangla kai he a poek u hamla ka ngaih nawh.

Tede kawpoekrai thaihu yahawh hlang ka huh dawngah oekthloenna oen pawmsangna kanghalhna ham aka tlo tangkiik nganbawh te ka pumsa dawngah m'peek, te tlawhna lawngah Seitan kah laipai angla bii a bi tih oekthloenna dawng kalawng kai he bawhna ham oen kanghalhna hamla a hawna.
He kawngah he Bawipa tengah voeithum ka thangthui tih tlawhna he avan lawh hamla ka bih.

Tede ahih lawngah, “Kan lungvatna tah nang hamla khoek, metihtiah nang na tha a awm nawh vengah kai kah huham tah a tha ra ngaai” tila awl avan thung. Tedawngah Khrih kah huham tharana lawng kai he n'thlipdah tite mingna ham kamah kah tharana nawh voetna dawngah ka oek u tih ka awmngaih tare poen.
Khrih rang oen atah ka tha a yokna dawngah, thekhana dawngah, raina dawngah, heemtekna oen patang khangna dawngah ka awmngaih poen. Metihtiah ka tha a awm nawh vengah ni ka tha a ra.

Thlaangngau angla ni ka thawh ka tat poen he - nangmi lawng kai he nan ngau sak u. Nangmi lawngah ni kai hamla ngaikhuekna na van sai u ham a awm de. Kai he metila khaw ka awm aih nawh de nangmi lawng “Celtuih” na ti u thlaang hue lak ah te soetca khaw ka heem thloei nawh.
Celtuih pakhat la ka awmna te nangmi tengah kawdaw thinsanna oen kawpoekrai miknoekna, kawpoekrai thaihu yahawh hlang saina oen ka tueng sak poen.

Khrihcabu atloe boeih lak ah metila nangmi te athe-eep la kan sai? Tangka oen nan bawm u ham kavan bih nawh bueng te de lah koen? Te tila thuum van nawh hamla kan sai u dawngah reenna oen khawdawp van ngaai u mai hawn.

Tahe avoeithumna ah nangmi hip hamla te oepsoehla ka awm poen, nangmi tengah n'tu khaw kavan bih manawh. Nangmi kah tangka te ka ngaih nawh tih namami te ni kan ngaih u. Ataktang atah ca-anau thli lawngah a manu oen ana pa te cawmcah nawh, tede nu a pa lawng ni ca-anau thli te a cawm a cah.
Nangmi bawmna ham tah ka khuehtoen boeih oen ka pum he khaw awmngaihla hawna ham ka ngaih. Nangmi te kan lungduetna dawngah kai nan lungna u te phoen ai aw?

Kai he nangmi ham thalrih la ka awm nawh tite namami lawngkhaw soeng na ti u van cawini. Tede khatsut lawngtah, kai lawngah nangmi te kan thaina doelh tih hoem awl oen khup plet la a thai alatna ti u mai ai.
Metila kan thai kan latna? Nangmi tengla kavan tuih laipai pakhat khat te hawna oen nangmi kah apueh alawila ka lawh aw?

Titas te nangmi tengah ceh hamla ka ceel tih ahih oen haih atloe khrihca maya manau te kavan tuih. Titas lawngah nangmi tengkah apueh alawila a lawh na ti u ai aw? Ahih oen kai tah mengtengna kawpoek thik at oen moeiboe thik at oen ah bii ka bi hih nawh aw?

Nangmi haiah kamami kah thlip adahna hamla a yawm puet tila khaw nan poek u mai ai. Tetih nawh ni! Khrih lawngah kaimi thui sak hamla a ngaih angla te Pathen haiah ka thui u, ka lungna ka paya thli, kaimi lawng ka sai boeih he nangmi bawmna ham ni ka sai u.

Tede nangmi teng kavan pha vengah te nangmi huh hamla ka ngaih tih ka ngaiuepna angla te kan hu u nawh hau vetih, nangmi lawngkhaw kai he huh na ngaih ngaiuepna angla te nan hu u nawh hau ai tite ka lakueng. Tawhsina oen uett-eena, thintoina oen mah ham bueng ngaihna, thlaang sal-aphaamna oen theetna, oekthloenna oen awlpuung kaacaanna thli te ka huh hau ai tila ka lakueng.

Nangmi tengla ka law koep vengah te ka Pathen lawng nangmi haiah yaraula n'khueh hau vetih n'hu vengah aka thawlh thlaang thli oen thinkaw ciimcaihna nawh boeih oen amami kah a sai pumsa hue-ngaihna, hutaa tawngpa thawlhna a yut u nawh dawngah te ka rap hau ai tite ka lakueng.

Nangmi tengla ka law tih kan hip u ham te tahe kah he a voeithumna la awm ai. Caciim lawngah, “Thawlh peelna boeih tah sausi thlaang pahih nawh atah, te lak ah yahawh lawngah a khee dengah ni a cak ai” a ti angla te awm ai.

Nangmi n'hu vengah thawlhna aka sai thli oen thlaangtloe boeih tengah thui ham ka ngaih: a voeihihna nangmi kan hip vengah te ka thui poen, tede tahe ah athlahlangla ka awm de, ka thui koep ai; ka law koep vengah ngoen tah a-u khaw dantatna na loeih manawh.

Khrih lawng kai hawna rang oen awl a thui tangtang aw tila ming ham na ngaih asoengna boeih te na huh ai. Khrih oen nangmi tuhkaina a awm vengah te ahih tah a tha yoek sut nawh; nangmi tim ah amah tharana ni a tueng sak dai.

Metihtiah a tha a yoek dawngah thinglam ah ngawn la awm tih duek cakhaw Pathen kah huham tharana oen hing poen. Ahih oen pumkhatla awmna ah mami khaw n'tha yoek u; tede nangmi oen kaimi tuhkaina tah Pathen kah tharana te ahih kah hingna dawngah mami lawng n'cuut u haih.

Oengna dawngah na hing oen na hing nawh te mingna hamla namami oen namami te noem acai u langtah noekdak u lah. Khrih Jesuh te nangmi thinkaw ah a awm tangtang te na ming u ai! A awm nawh tangtang atah noekdakna dawngah na tlim dingri u poen ai.
Kaimi tah noekdakna dawngah ka tlim u nawh tite nangmi lawng na ming u ai tila ka ngaiuep.

Nangmi lawng thawlhpalhna te na sai nawh ham Pathen tengah ka thangthui u, kaimi lawng noekdakna te ka taa tite tueng sak ham nawh ni, tede kaimi he aka tlim dingri angla ka awm mai cakhaw nangmi lawngtah asoeng thaihu te na saina ham ni.
Metihtiah awltak te kaimi lawng ka oel e-tla vetih thaihu khat khaw ka sai manawh, tede awltak ham bueng ni ka tlungmu u dai poen ai.
Kaimi ka tha a yoek u vengah nangmi tah na tha a ra u dawngah ka awmngaih. Tedawngah nangmi thlaangsoep la na awmna thai ham kaimi lawngkhaw nangmi hamla ka thangthui u.
