Nangmi tengah he capat he athlahlang kalawng kavan thut he, nangmi teng kavan pha vengah te Bawipa kah peek saithaina aana te nangmi sawah atlawh hlang la hawna ka ngaih nawh dawngah ni, te kah saithaina aana tah nangmi te phena ham nawh tih nangmi lawng na roengna ham ni.

Maya manau thli, tahe atah sading-la anna awm uh! Thlaangsoep la awm ham tha huer uh; reenna kavan bihna awl he ngaai u lah; pakhat oen khat roeproei uh; ngaimawngna oen awm uh. Te atah lungna oen ngaimawngna Pathen te nangmi tengah awm ai.
Nangmi khat oen khat aciim mokna oen toei u lah. Pathen thlaang boeih lawng nangmi te n'toei u.
Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna, Pathen kah lungna oen ah Ciim Muithla kah beroepna tah nangmi boeih tengah awm hawn seh.
Mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh lawngah lungvatna, ngaimawngna te nangmi m'pe hawn seh.
Mami he tahe vengkah atue the khui kalawng loeih sak ham mami kah Pa Pathen kawngaihna te a vai tih mami kah thawlh dawngah Khrih lawng amah oen amah te pe u.
Pathen tengah dungyan toela ruep-awmna tah awm hawn seh! Amen.
Ka kawpoek rai tangkiik mah aw! Khrih kah lungvatna oen nangmi khuekung te bawtbet khawlai kawl-kalhca maiah na hoett u tih awlthang theen atloe te na do u.
Ataktang atah, “awlthang theen atloe” awm nawh, tede he tila ka thui he tah, nangmi te ngaihangtum la n'khueh tih Khrih kah awlthang theen te thawveel hamla aka yawm thlaang khatsut a awm dawngah ni.

Tede kaimi lawngkhaw, vaan kah vanthlaang lawngkhaw, nangmi tengah awlthang theen te van thui u mai cakhaw kaimi lawng ka thui tangte oen aka lo u nawh awlthang theen te aka thui tah hell ah kawsi yawkk seh!
Kaimi lawng kavan thui u poen de tahe ah ka thui koep ai: nangmi lawng na do tangte awlthang theen oen aka lo u nawh awlthang theen te aka thui tah hell ah kawsi yawkk seh!

He tila ka thui he thlaanghing kawkhuekna dang ham aka yawm angla ka awm aw? Te tila dang ham ka yawm nawh! Pathen kah kawkhuekna te ni ka ngaih. Thlaanghing teng kah mik-hai theen te dang ham ka yawm aw? kai lawng te tila dang ham ka yawm khiing atah kai he Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm manawh.
Maya manau thli, nangmi teng-ah kavan thui awlthang theen he thlaanghing teng kalawng akung tong la awm nawh tite kavan thui u ai.
Te awlthang theen te kai lawngah thlaanghing tengkah ka dang nawh tih a-u lawngkhaw kai he n'cang puei nawh. Te tah Jesuh Khrih amah lawng ka tengah avan phawng ni.
Kai lawng Judah bokna dawngah ka tlungmu veng kah ka hingna te nangmi lawng na ming u poen, kai lawng reenna khueh muehla Pathen kah khrihcabu te ka heem ka tek tih amilh amoeng hamla ka sai.
Judah bokna phung-alam vaina ben ah ka thawnpuei Judah hue lak ah ka cawh ngaai tih mami patuer thli kah awlro te khaw alawnla ka vai ngaai.
Tede Pathen lawng a lungvatna oen ah ka thang thlan veng kalawng n'tuek poen tih amah kah bii bi hamla n'khue.
Gental thlaangphun tengah amah kawng Awlthang Theen phawng hamla amah capa te kai tengah avan tueng sak vengah te a-u tengah khaw poekna bih ham ka cet nawh.
Kai he celtuih la ka awm thlan ah lamhala aka awm thli te huh ham Jerusalem la ka cet nawh. Arabia la te ka cet pahoei tih tecoengah Damaskas la koep ka law.
Kum thum coeng dengah Piter tengah hin ha thlai-ngaa ka awm.
Bawipa amah kah a manau Jeem bueng te ka huh tih atloe celtuih a-u khaw ka hu nawh.
Ka thut boeih he aka soeng ni. Hoem ka thui nawh he Pathen lawng a ming!
Tecoengah Siria oen Cilicia la te ka cet.
Tevengah te Judia ram kah khrihcabu thlaang thli lawng kai he pumpakla m'ming u nawh.
Ahimi lawngah a ming u tah, “Mami heemtekkung thlaang lawngah te n'cui ah phe ham a yawm oengna te ni tahe atah a thui poen!” tila thlaangtloe thli kah awlthui te ni a ming u.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng kai kawngah te Pathen a thangpawm u.
Kum ha thlailii coengah Barnabas oen Jerusalem la koep ka cet, Titas khaw ka ceh puei.

Pathen lawngah na ceh ham awm tila avan thui dawngah ka cet. Mawtkung thli oen pumpakla ka huh u vengah te Gental thlaangphun thli tengah awlthang theen ka phawngna kawng te ka thui pe. N'hu veng kah bii ka bi te khaw, tahe ah bii ka bi he khaw apoeila coengg sak ham ka ngaih nawh.
Kai oen bii bi haih Titas he Krik thlaangphun la a awm dawngah thlaang khatsut lawngtah yahhuivuen reet sak ham a ngaih u de, a-u lawngkhaw amangkhakla kuek nawh.

Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla mami awmna rang oen loeihna n'khueh u te ming hamla thlaang khatsut tah aka oeng tangtang van angla sa u tih raalyam angla mami bu khuiah ahuepla va kuun u. Ahimi lawngah mami he saltamnaa la te sai ham a ngaih u.
Tede, nangmi hamla awlthang theen awltak te a sa sueng tih acakna yoeyah ham kaimi lawngah ahimi te kawlkalhca khaw ka thlahphaam u nawh.

Tede mawtkung ni tila ka poek thlaang hue lawngah te poekna atheen kai he m'pe u thloei nawh. Mawtkung la ka poek thlaang thli te metila awm u mai cakhaw kai ham tah awlpui mai nawh. Metihtiah Pathen lawngtah thlaang he asaw ahan kah huhna oen awl khueng nawh.

Poekna atheen peek ohla Piter te Judah thlaangphun tengah awlthang theen phawng ham bii a peek van angla te Gental thlaangphun tengah kai lawng awlthang theen phawng hamla Pathen lawng bii m'peek te a huh u dai.
Piter te Judah thlaangphun ham celtuih la a sai van angla kai khaw Pathen lawngah amah kah tharana oen Gental thlaangphun ham celtuih la n'sai van.

Mawtkung la ka poek Jeem, Piter oen Johan mi lawngah Pathen lawng biitungpui kai m'peek te acak sak u; tedawngah ahimi lawng mami boeih he biibipuei ni tila noekna la kai oen Barnabas te kut n'tuuk u. Barnabas oen kai tah Gental thlaangphun tim ah bii bi ham tih amami tah Judah thlaangphun tim ah bii bi hamla ka kaw vai u.
Ahimi boeih lawng kai tengah reenna avan bih u tah khawdeng thlaang thli te hilh nawh ham ni. Te thaihu te ni sai hamla kai khaw thinkaw a thluembuek van.
Antiok khaw la Piter a law vengah, rangpui haiah ahih te ka kaana, metihtiah ahih tah aciimphanla a palhna awm.

Jeem lawngah avan tuih thlaang thli te avan pha thlan veng atah Piter lawng Gental maya manau thli oen ah buh haih a caak u. Tede te thlaang thli te avan pha coeng atah, Gental thlaang thli te yahhuivuen reet sak ham aka ngaih thlaang thli te a rih u dawngah nawng tih Gental thlaang thli oen buh ca haih tlaih nawh.
Atloe Judah phun maya manau thli khaw riyawp u van tih Piter oen ahula poei nawng u van poen.

Awlthang theen awltak lawngdoeng ah cet u nawh tila ka ming vengah Piter te rangpui haiah, “Nang he Judah thlaang balboel tah Gental thlaang angla khaw na sak tih Judah thlaang angla khaw na sa nawh. Tetih atah, metila Gental thlaang thli he Judah thlaangphun angla khaw a sakna ham na yawm mangkhak thai ai?” ka tina.
Mami tah n'cuunna roe ah Judah thlaangphun tangtang tih, “Gental thlaangthawlh phun” a ti u te nawh ni.

Tede thlaanghing he Jesuh Khrih oengna bueng oen ah Pathen oen roeproeina awm tih Phungawl lawng a kuek te saina oen nawh ni tite mami lawng m'ming u. Mami khaw Phungawl lawng a kuek te saina rang oen nawh tih mami lawng Khrih oengna rang oen Pathen oen ah roeproeina a awmna ham Jesuh Khrih te n'oeng u.

Tecoengah mami lawng Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah Pathen oen roeproeina a awmna ham mami lawng n'yawm vengah he Gental thlaangphun angla thlaangthawlh la n'awm tite n'huh u, tete Khrih khaw thawlh saina ah thuum van ti ngaihna aw? Te tila ti ngaihna nawh ni!
Kai lawng ka phe tangte Phungawl kah alawng-a im te ka sak koep atah Phungawl phekung tah kamah ni tite ka tueng sak.
Tecakhaw Phungawl ben atah Phungawl amah lawng n'ngawn tih ka duek, te tah Pathen hamla te ka hing thaina ham ni. Amah kah thinglam dawngah Khrih oen kai tah ngawn haih la ka awm poen,
tedawngah aka hing he tah kai tlaih nawh tih ka khuiah aka hing tah Khrih poen ni. Tahe kah hingna he tah kai n'lungna tih hingna pekung Pathen Capa oengna rang oen ka hing.
Pathen kah lungvatna te hoett hamla ka ngaih nawh. Tede thlaanghing oen Pathen he Phungawl rang oen roeproeina awm kawinih Khrih kah duekna tah apoei ni tila thui ngaihna ni.
Nangmi Galati thlaangngau hue! Nangmi te a-u lawng a sii oen n'phueng u? Thinglam dawngah Jesuh Khrih kah a duekna te na mikthlaam ah aciimphanla tueng poen!
He thaihu khat he van thui u lah: Nangmi lawng Pathen Muithla te Phungawl lawng a kuek te na sai u dawngah aw na dang u, tih nawh atah awlthang theen te na yaak tih na oeng dawngah aw na dang u?
Metila tila he na ngau u tangkiik aih mai! Nangmi lawng Pathen Muithla oen na tongnan u tih tahe ah namami kah tharana oen boet sak ham na ngaih u aw?
Nangmi lawng na huh na tawng boeih te ahong-ahii la aw a awm kang aih poen? Ahong-ahii la tah awm boeih nawh!
Pathen lawng nangmi te Muithla m'peek u tih nangmi tim ah kawpoek rai a sai te, Phungawl lawng a kuek te na sai u dawngah aw, te tihnawhtah awlthang theen te na yaak u tih na tangna u dawngah aw?
Abraham lawng a huh a tawng thli boeih te poek u lah; caciim lawngah, “Abraham lawng Pathen te a tangna tih Pathen te a oeng dawngah ahih te thlaangdoeng la a khueh” tila a thui.
Tedawngah oengna aka khueh thlaang thli he ni Abraham cadil tangtang la a awm ti he nangmi lawng na ming u ham awm.

Gental thlaangphun he a oengna rang oen ah Pathen amah oen roeproei u poen ai tila a thui sut poen. Tedawngah caciim lawng Abraham tengah Awlthang Theen te a phawng pe poen: Caciim lawngah, “Thlaangphun boeih he nang rang oen ah Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awmna a peek ai,” ti.
Abraham lawng a oeng dawngah yotheenna te a dang; tedawngah aka oeng boeih tah Abraham angla yotheenna a dang.

Phungawl vaina dawngah aka pangtung u boeih tah tapvoepna huiah awm u. Caciim lawngah, “Phungawl cabu dawngah a thut boeih te a-u lawngkhaw a vai nawh atah Pathen kah tapvoepna huiah awm!” tila a thui.

Caciim lawng, “Thlaang he oengna oen ah Pathen oen roeproeina aka khueh bueng te ni a hing ai,” a ti dawngah, tahe atah a-u khaw Phungawl vaina rang oen ah Pathen oen roeproeina awm nawh tite aciimla tueng poen.
Tede Phungawl oen oengna tah tuhkaina awm nawh. Caciim lawngah, “Phungawl lawng akuek boeih te aka sai boeih tah hing ai” ti.

Caciim lawng, “Thing dawngah a tai thlaang te tah Pathen kah tapvoepna huiah awm,” tila a thui angla Khrih tah mami hamla tapvoepna kawsi aka yawkk thaang la va coengg tih Phungawl lawng avan thoeng puei tapvoepna dawng kalawng mami he n'tlang poen.

Khrih lawng tila a sai he tah, Pathen amah lawng Abraham tengah a awlkam yotheenna te Khrih Jesuh rang oen Gental thlaangphun tengah peek ham oen ah mami lawngkhaw oengna rang oen Pathen lawng peek ham awl a kam Muithla te dang van ham ni.

Maya manau hue, khawhin roekk khawsakna dawngkah nuehtahna khat ah ka thui lah ai, lumlai pakhat dawngah thlaang pahih lawng kawvaina awlkam te a sai hih vengah thlaang pakhat lawng te kah awlkamna te phe thai nawh tih tawm athap thai nawh.

Pathen lawng awl a kam te tah Abraham oen a cadil tengah ni awl a kam. Caciim lawngah thlaang yahawh thuingaihna awl “Cadil nauha thli” tila thui nawh, tede thlaang pakhat bueng thuingaihna awl, “Cadil nauha” tila ni a thui tih te tah Khrih ni.

Ka thuingaihna tah Pathen lawng Abraham oen paipi a sai tih te paipi te vai hamla awl a kam. Kum yalii sawmthum coengah Phungawl he peek la awm tih te lawngah paipi te phe thai nawh tih Pathen awlkam te khaw hoett thai nawh.
Metihtiah Pathen kah kutdo he Phungawl dawngah pangtung kawinih amah kah awlkam dawngah pangtung thai manawh. Tecakhaw Pathen lawng Abraham te kutdo a peek te tah amah lawng awl a kam dawngah ni.

Tetih atah Phungawl kah kam-thlahna he ta n'tu kai? He tah thawlhna he ame ang kai tite tueng sak ham a tawm athap tih te tah awlkamna aka dang Abraham cadil a law thlantoe ah aka cak ham mai ni. Phungawl he tah vanthlaang lawngah laipai thlaang pakhat tengah patoeng avan peek.
Tede thlaang pakhat bueng lawng bii a bi atah laipai ngoe nawh; metihtiah Pathen tah pakhat bueng ni.

Tetih atah Phungawl lawngah he Pathen awlkam te a oelh a taih ti ngaihna aw? Nawh ni, oelhtaih nawh! Metihtiah hingna aka pe thai phungawl te thlaanghing lawng dang kawinih te phungawl te vaina rang oen ah Pathen oen thlaanghing boeih he roeproeina awm ai.
Tede Caciim lawngah, ‘dilai pumpui he thawlh tharana huiah awm; tedawngah Jesuh Khrih oengna dawngah akung asut awlkam kutdo te aka oeng thlaang tengah a peek’ tila a thui.
Tede, oengna atue atang te avan pha thlan vengah Phungawl lawngah te thongtla thlaang angla ng'uup khak tih n'khawh roep; te tah oengna te a tueng thlantoe ni.
Tedawngah oengna rang oen ah Pathen oen mami roeproeina hamla Khrih a law thlantoe Phungawl he mami phungtukung la awm.
Tahe tah oengna atue atang te avan pha poen dawngah Phungawl he mami phungtukung la awm tlaih nawh.
Khrih Jesuh ah pumkhatla awmna dawngah nangmi boeih lawng Pathen kah ca-anau la na awm u he tah oengna rang oen ni.
Nangmi tah Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah baptisma na dang u poen tih tahe atah Khrih amah hingna oen na khuk na dah u poen.

Tedawngah Judah oen Gental laklaw ah khaw, saltamnaa oen thlaangcuem laklaw ah khaw, hutaa oen tawngpa laklaw ah khaw pekbona awm tlaih nawh; nangmi boeih tah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah pakhatla na awm u poen.
Nangmi lawng Khrih kah thlaang la na awm u atah nangmi tah Abraham kah cadil nauha la na awm u tih Pathen awlkam te na paang u ai.
Tede tahe ah ka thui de lah ai; Capa pakhat, ana Pa kah kaawn-ava ro thaihu aka pang koei te thaihu boeih khuehkung la awm mai cakhaw camaw la a awm veng atah saltamnaa angla ni a awm.
Camaw la a awm vengah ana pa lawng atue-atang anuen te apha thlantoe atah ahih te doenkung thli oen kaawn-ava oen ah thaihu boeih khoemdoenkung thli lawngah te a tahu tabem u.
Tetih van angla mami khaw muithla ben ah kawpoeksoepna n'khueh thlan vengah te khawhipuempa aka uk muithla kah saltamnaa la n'awm u.
Tede aboetna ah atue atang anuen te apha khuek vengah tah Pathen lawng a Capa te avan tuih. Thlaanghing hutaa kah capa angla te law tih Judah Phungawl huiah te khaw a sak,
te tah Phungawl huiah aka awm thlaang thli te tlang ham oen ah mami he Pathen kah ca-anau la coengg sak ham ni.
Amah kah a ca-anau la awmna te a tuengna ham Pathen lawng a Capa kah Muithla te mami kah thinkaw lungbui khuiah avan tuih tih te Muithla lawngah, “Apa, Apa” tila paang.

Tedawngah nangmi tah saltamnaa la na awm u tlaih nawh tih a ca la ni na awm poen. Nangmi tah a ca la na awm u poen dawngah Pathen lawng amah kah ca-anau thli hamla a khueh pe boeih te nangmi m'peek ai.
N'hu veng atah nangmi lawng Pathen te na ming u nawh tih pathen rawlrap hue kah saltamnaa la na awm u.

Tede tahe atah nangmi lawng Pathen te na ming u poen, tihnawhtah he tila ka ti ai ta, Pathen lawng nangmi te m'ming u poen, tetih atah n'tu hamla tha aka awm nawh tih tula khaw aka coengg nawh muithla benla te mel koep ham na ngaih u? N'tu hamla ahimi kah saltamnaa la te awm koep ham na ngaih u?
Nangmi lawng khatsut khawhin oen thla, atue-atang oen kum te awlpuila na khueh tih na yeh u.
Nangmi ham ka lakueng tangkiik mah aw? Kai lawng nangmi ham ka bi boeih te apoeila awm poen ai aw?
Maya manau thli, kai angla na awm u van ham reenna kavan bih u. Kai khaw nangmi angla ni ka awm. Nangmi lawng ka sawah thawlhpalhna na sai u nawh.
Nangmi tengah awlthang theen ka thui cuek vengah te sading nawh la ka awm tite na ming u.

Tede kai kah pumsa sadingna nawh te nangmi ham noekdakna la awm cakhaw kai he tula khaw poek ohla na awm u nawh tih nan hoett sut u nawh. Kai he Pathen kah vanthlaang pakhat angla te nan do u tih Khrih Jesuh angla te nan do u.
Te vengah te nangmi na awmngaih tangkiik u! Tahe ah me tih na ti u? Coengg thai kawinih na mik pateng khaw koeih pak tih kai he peek hamla na ngaih u tite ka thui thai.
Nangmi tengah awltak he kavan thui dawngah tahe tah na raal la ka awm oh poen aw?

Thlaangtloe hue lawngah nangmi sawah te thinkaw thluembuek tangkiik u mai, tede ahimi kah poekna te tah theen nawh. Ahimi lawng nangmi sawah thinkaw a thluembuek angla nangmi lawngkhaw ahimi sawah thinkaw thluembuek van ham ah nangmi oen kai he pekbo hamla ahimi boeih lawng a ngaih u.
Poekna theen oen thinkaw a thluembuek u atah theen khoet ai. Te ang thinkaw thluembuekna te nangmi tengah ka awm bueng vengah nawh tih khueh poepa ham theen.
Ka lungna ka ca ka nau thli! Nangmi kah thinkaw ah Khrih moeiboe a awm thlantoe tah hutaa lawng camoe a awm vengah tlawhna a ming angla te ka ming koep hun ai.
Nangmi sawah kawpoek khaw ka thloet thaina ham tahe vengah he nangmi oen n'awm haih kawinih ka ngaih de ta. Nangmi ham ka lakueng tangkiik mai.
Phungawl huiah awm ham aka ngaih nangmi te kan doet lah ai: Phungawl lawng a thui te na ya u nawh aw?
Phungawl lawng a thui tah Abraham lawng a capa pahih a sak tih pakhat te tah a salnu oen ah a cuun, akhat te tah thlaangcuem hutaa oen a cuun tila a thui.
A salnu oen a cuun a capa te tah awmthoet kah ca sak mailai la awm, tede thlaangcuem nu oen a cuun a capa te tah Pathen awlkamna rang oen ni a cuun.

He thaihu he nuehtahna ah yaakming koei la awm: hutaa pahih rawi he awlkam paipi pahih yuengla awm. Hutaa pakhat, Hagar lawngtah a ca thli te saltamnaa la a cuun tih Sinai Tlaang ah a sai paipi nuehtahna yuengah Hagar te awm.
Hagar tah Arabia ram kah Sinai Tlaang yuengla awm tih ahih tah tahe veng Jerusalem Khawpui khuikah thlaang boeih oen saltamnaa thli nuehtahna la awm.
Tede vaan benkah Jerusalem khawpui tah ahoerpoengla awm tih ahih tah mami kah nuhaam la awm.

Caciim lawngah, “Ca aka yaaw hutaa nang, awmngaih lah! Nang ca awm tlawhna aka ming nooek nawh, awmngaihna oen vupaang lah! Metihtiah, a vaa lawng a lunghoel hutaa lawngah a vaa oen aka awm haih hutaa lak ah a ca anau yahawh ngaai a khueh ai” tila a thui.
Maya manau thli, Isak angla te nangmi khaw Pathen awlkamna rang oen tahe tah a ca la na awm u.
Tevengah te thlaanghing siing angla a cuun a capa te lawngah Pathen kah Muithla rang oen a cuun Capa te a heem atek. Tahe khaw te tila ni a awm.
Tede caciim lawng metila a thui? “Salnu oen a capa te ceh sak; metihtiah, salnu kah capa lawngah thlaangcuem nu kah capa oen ah ana pa te paang haih manawh.” tila a thui.
Tedawngah maya manau thli, mami tah salnu kah a ca-anau nawh tih thlaangcuem nu kah a ca-anau thli ni.
Mami tah n'loeih poen, Khrih lawng n'loeih sak poen! Tedawngah aka loeih thlaang la na awm u van angla acakla pai u langtah namah oen namah te saltamnaa la coengg koep u boel.
Hutung u lah! Kai Pawl lawng kavan thui tah nangmi lawngah na yahhuivuen te reet ham na ngaih u atah nangmi boeih hamla Khrih tah aphu awm nawh ti ngaihna ni.
A-u lawngkhaw yahhuivuen te a reet atah Phungawl te a pum boeih la a vai ham awm tite ngaithuenna kan peek koep u.
Phungawl vaina oen ah Pathen oen roeproei hamla aka yawm thli tah namah oen namah Khrih oen na pek u poen. Nangmi tah Pathen kah lungvatna adau benla ni na awm poen.
Mami lawngah ngaiuep u tah Pathen lawng mami he amah oen roeproeina avan sai ai, mami kah oengna rang oen ah Pathen Muithla kah tharana oen a sai ai tite n'lamtoen u.
Khrih Jesuh oen mami pumkhatla ng'awm u atah yahhuivuen reet khaw, reet nawh khaw athloeina awm nawh; awlpui tah lungna oen bii aka bi oengna te ni.
Nangmi lawng atheenla na sai u ngoen ta! Nangmi lawng awltak na vai u te a-u lawng n'toeng sak u?
Nangmi khuekung Pathen lawngah a sai nawh ni.
“Tawlru ayawlca lawng ta-ekk hawl at a rawi sak” tila a thui u te soeng tangtang.

Tede nangmi kawngah te tahetoe ka ngaitluep hun. Mami kah hingna Bawipa oen pumkhatla awmna lawngah he nangmi te poekna tloe n'khueh sak tang manawh tila ka ngai a tluep sak tih a-u khawseh nangmi te khup pletla aka sai te tah Pathen lawng dan a tat ai.

Tede maya manau thli, kai lawngah yahhuivuen reet he angoe khaklal tila ka thui hun atah n'tu hamla thekha heemtekna patang he ka khang khiing kai? Tete asoeng tangtang atah Khrih kah thinglam kawng ka thuina lawng he raina m'pe manawh.
Nangmi te akhupplet la aka sai thlaang thli lawngah aboet toela lawngpui te a vai phaat ham ka ngaih de ta; vai poe u selang tah a til tleh ngala u seh!
Maya manau thli, nangmi te loeih sak hamla ni n'khue u. Tede, te loeihna te namami kah pumsa hue-ngaihna a dipna ham hawna u boel. Te lak atah lungna oen ah nangmi khat oen khat bawmcem uh.
Metihtiah Phungawl boeih he, “Namah oen namah te na lungna u van angla na imbe lovaai te lungna lah” tila a thui awlpeek pakhat dawngah cui boeih poen.
Tede nangmi lawngah ramsa aka sann angla na awm u tih khat oen khat te na ngeet u tih na khoelh u atah, an noek mai lah, namami oen namami te na phe u kang poen ai.
He tila kavan thui u: Na hingna te Muithla lawngah thuinuet selang tah thlaanghing pumsa kah hue-ngaihna dawngah ngaikhuek thindeeng la awm u boel.

Metihtiah, mami thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna tah Muithla kah ngaihna lawng a oel tih Muithla kah ngaihna te khaw mami kah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna lawng a oel van. He rawi pahih he tah raal hih tih thui ngaihna tah sai ham na ngaih te na sai thai nawh tina ni.
Nangmi te Muithla lawng m'mawt atah nangmi tah Phungawl huiah na awm u tlaih nawh.
Thlaanghing pumsa kah a sai tah tuengkoer mai. Te ang thli te tah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna, tuiilehkap oen boethe halang na;
Kutsaimuei bokna oen runkhuenna, thlaang ruunna, khat oen khat thina, tawhsina; uett-eena, thinsana, loehlangna, athloekla phengterna, bu pekbona;

Lung-oena, yuuruuina, yuuruui buh hah oen hutaa tawngpa thawlhna; oen ah he ang atloe athe thaihu boeih te ni. N'hu vengah kavan thui u poen angla tahe ah koep kavan thui u: he ang thaihu aka sai te tah Pathen kah Ram te pang thai manawh.
Tede Muithla lawng a thoeng sak tah lungna, awmngaihna, ngaimawngna, kawdawna, reenna, theenna, uep-awmna,
boe-ngaaina oen mah oen mah kuemsuemna he ni. He ang thaihu thli oen a kalh u Phungawl awm nawh.
Tecoengah Khrih Jesuh kah thlaang la aka awm lawngtah amami kah thlaanghing coenggna dawngkah athe ngaihsoehna oen pumsa hue-ngaihna boeih te thinglam dawngah a ngawn poen.
Muithla lawngah mami he hingna n'peek poen; ahih lawng mami kah hingna he khaw a mawt ham awm.
Mami lawngah oekthloen ham awm nawh, khat oen khat te thinsa sak ham awm nawh, khat oen khat uett-ee u ham awm nawh.

Maya manau thli, thlaang pakhat lawngah thawlhpalhna pakhat te a sai hau atah, nangmi Muithla ah aka awm thlaang thli lawng lawngpui doeng ah na khueh koep ham awm; te tila na sai vengah te kawdaw thinsan oen na sai u ham awm. Namami khaw suek-halhna ah na thuum u van nawh ham ngaithuen uh.
Pakhat oen pakhat thalrih phueih te talawng takai u langtah, te tila te Khrih kah phungawl te vai uh.
A-u khaw, me tih khaw a ti aih tang nawh maiah amah oen amah te asangluepla aka poek u tah amah oen amah ni athailat u khoeng mai.
Thlaang pakhat rip lawng amah kah saina te noem-acai ham awm. Bii a sai te atheen atah thlaangtloe kah saina oen nuehtah tlaih ohla amah kah saina dawngah oekthloen u thai ai.
Metihtiah thlaang boeih lawng amah kah thalrih te a phueih rip ai.
Khrih kah awlthang aka cang thlaang pakhat lawngah thaihu theen a khueh toen boeih te ahih cangpueikung saya te pe lem seh.
Namah oen namah mai te thailat u boel; Pathen te a-u lawngkhaw thailatna thai nawh. Thlaang lawngah a tuh van angla a ah ca-ngai ai.
Thlaanghing lawng amah pumsa ngaihna lo ah caangti te a tuh atah ahih lawng duekna te a ah van ai; Muithla lo ah caangti te a tuh atah dungyan hingna te a ah van ai.
Tedawngah theenna te saina ben ah tha the sak u boel sih; toeng ohla n'sai u atah caangthaih yuunna atue te avan pha badai.
Tedawngah atue theen n'dang veng roekk ah thlaang boeih tengah theenna te sai u silang tah awlpui ngaaila oengna ben ah mami kah imkhuikaw la aka awm tengah sai u sih.
Kamah kut roeroe oen calung abohlangla nangmi tengah ca kavan thut he bueh u lah!

Nangmi te yahhuivuen reet sak ham mangkhakla aka yawm thli te tah asaw ahan kah akawng-alam dawngah oekthloenna tueng sak ham aka ngaih hue mai ni. Tede he tila a sai u he tah ahimi lawngah Khrih thinglam kawngkah heem-atek patang khangna te ahimi lawng khang van nawh ham mai ah ni.

Yahhuivuen aka reet thlaang thli lawng pateng khaw Phungawl te vai u nawh; ahimi lawngah yahhuivuen reet sak ham a ngaih u te tah, nangmi lawngah pumsa dawngah noekna a ngaih u tite ahimi lawng oekthloenna thaai ham mai ni.
Tede, kai tah mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah thinglam bueng ni ka oekthloenna ai; metihtiah kai ham tah Khrih thinglam rang oen ah dilai he duek poen; kai khaw dilai ham tah ka duek poen.
Thlaang pakhat lawng yahhuivuen reet oen reet nawh he awlpui tlaih nawh ni; thlaang thaai la awm he ni awlpui poen.
Amami kah hingna dawngah he phung-alam aka vai thlaang thli tengah ngaimawngna oen reenna te awm hawn seh, Pathen thlaang thli boeih tengah khaw awm seh.
Awlcuina ah: a-u khatca lawngkhaw kai he raina m'pe u tlaih boel, metihtiah ka pum dawngkah boengha-ngaw lawng Jesuh kah saltamnaa la ka awm he a tueng sak poen.
Maya manau thli, mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh. Amen.

Pathen kawngaihna oen Khrih kah celtuih pakhat la aka awm kai Pawl lawngah, Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah aka hing tih uep-awm la khaw aka sa Efesa khaaw kah Pathen thlaang thli nangmi tengah ca kavan pat u.
Mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawngah nangmi te lungvatna, ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh.
Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ana Pa oen Pathen te koeh u lah sih! Metihtiah Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna ah vaan ben kah Muithla yotheen kam-awmna soeprep peekna oen mami he yotheenna m'peek u.

Mami he amah haiah aka ciim tih cawttbauh kap nawh la awm ham, Khrih oen mami pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah amah koe la awm ham ah dilai he a suen thlan vengah, Pathen lawng mami he n'tuek poen. Amah lawng n'lungna dawngah,
Jesuh Khrih rang oen mami he a ca la sai ham Pathen tah cai oepsoeh poen, te tah amah kah awmngaihna oen a kamthlahna ni.
Amah kah ruep-awm lungvatna oen a lungna a Capa dawng kalawng mami he ayoela kutdo m'peek dawngah Pathen te thangpawm u sih!
Metihtiah Khrih kah duekna rang oen mami n'loeih u, te tah mami kah thawlhna boeih khawdawp a ngaai poen tina ni. Pathen lungvatna tah metihtlukla a bo,
ahih lawng mami m'peek te tah lentloe maimah aw;
Pathen lawng a cuihna boeih oen a ming athaina oen ah a kamthlahna te a sai tih Khrih rang oen soep sak ham a ngaih ahuep khawkhanna te mami m'ming sak poen.
Pathen lawng atue akhoek vengah soep sak ham a ngaih tah vaan oen dilai dawngah aka awm soeprep a sai boeih te thik at la cawitun tih Khrih te a luu la khueh sak ham te ni.

Thaihu soeprep boeih he Pathen kah khawkhana oen awltloekna angla ni boeih a awm; Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah Pathen lawng amah kah a thlaang la awm ham mami he n'tuek poen, te tah a cuekca veng kalawng amah kah kamthlahna khawkhannna poen ni.
Tedawngah Khrih ah ngaiuepna lamhacuekla aka khueh mami lawngah Pathen ruep-awmna te thangpawm u sih!

Te tila te nangmi khaw thlawnna avan khuenkung Awlthang Theen awltak awlthang te na yaak u vengah Pathen thlaang la na awm u poen. Nangmi lawngah Khrih te na oeng u tih amah thlaang la na awmna miknoekna te Pathen lawng nangmi sawah thawhcang a heen poen; te tah amah lawng awl a kam tangte Ciim Muithla te nangmi m'peekna rang oen ni.

Muithla he tah Pathen lawng a thlaang thli tengah awl a kam te mami lawng n'dang ngai ai tila aamahkhan la awm tih amah kah thlaang thli tengah loeihna aka soep te Pathen lawng a peek ai tila mami kah ngaitluepna la khaw awm. Mami lawngah amah kah ruep-awmna te thangpawm u lah sih!
Nangmi lawng Bawipa Jesuh na oengna, Pathen kah thlaang boeih na lungna u kawng te ka yaak cuek veng kalawng,
Pathen tengah nangmi ham awmngaih ciil thui he ka toeng nawh. Ka thangthuina dawngah nangmi te kan hilh nawh,

mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah Pathen, mami kah ruep-awm m'Pa tengah nangmi te Muithla m'peekna hamla ka bih poepa, te Muithla lawngtah nangmi te n'cuih sak vetih Pathen te nangmi tengah avan tueng sak ai, te atah Pathen te na ming u ai.
Nangmi te me ang ngaiuep sak ham n'khue tih a thlaang thli hamla a kam pe kawpoek rai yotheen kam-awmna te metihtlukla a yahawh tih,

aka oeng mami khuiah bii aka bi a tharana te metihtlukla a bo tite na mingna thai hamla nangmi kah thinkaw te avan awng tih amah kah aangna te na dangna hamla ka bih. Mami kah akhui ben ah bii aka bi tharana he tah,
Khrih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak tih vaan ram ah amah kah bantang ben ah a ngawlh sak vengah Pathen lawng a hawna huham tharana te ni.

Te huen atah vaan kah ukkung boeih, saithaina aana aka khueh boeih, huham tharana boeih oen ah bawi boeih sawah te Khrih lawng a uk. He dilai oen aka law ham koei dilai ah khaw saithaina aana aka khueh miing boeih sawah ahih kah miing tah miinglue koek la awm.
Pathen lawng soeprep boeih he Khrih kah khowtang ah a khueh tih Khrih tah khrihcabu kah a luu la te a sai, thaihu boeih sawah sawsangkoek Bawi la awm.
Khrihcabu he tah soeprep boeih aka soepsakkung amah roe te asoepbirna Khrih kah a pum ni.
Anoekbuet atah nangmi lawng awl na ngaai u nawh tih na thawlh u dawngah muithla ben ah na duek u.

Te veng tue ah te nangmi lawng dilai han kah athe lawngpui te na vai u; khawhi dawngah aka awm muithla benkah tharana ukkung awl te na ngaai pe u; te muithla lawngah te Pathen awl aka ngaai nawh thli te tahe ah a uk.

Ataktang atah mami boeih he ahimi angla ni ng'awm u van tih mami lawng pumsa ngaihna angla khaw n'sak u, mami thinkaw oen pumsa lawng ahue angaih boeih te n'sai u. Mami khaw m'mah kah awm ih angla te thlaangtloe angla Pathen thinsana aka yawkk ham koei ni.
Tede Pathen kah reenna tah yahawh tih mami n'lungna te tah abo tangkiik dawngah,
Mami lawng awl n'ngaai nawh dawngah muithla ben ah n'duek vengah te Khrih oen haih mami he n'hing sak. Nangmi thlawn la na awm u he tah Pathen kah lungvatna rang oen ni.
Mami lawng Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah vaan ram ah te amah oen haih uktem van hamla mami he amah oen n'thawh sak haih poen.
He tila a sai he tah Khrih Jesuh dawngah mami ham a lungna avan tueng sak lungvatna tah atloe boeih lak ah bo ngai tite yoeyahla tueng sak a ngaih dawngah ni.
Mami Khrih Jesuh ah pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah thaihu theen sai hamla mami he n'sai poen. Mami lawng sai hamla aroek abah oepsoeh thaihu theen saina oen hing hamla mami he n'sai koep poen.

Nangmi Gental thlaangphun te Judah thlaangphun lawngah, “yahhuivuen aka reet nawh thlaang” ti u. Judah phun lawng amami tah, “Yahhuivuen aka reet thlaang” ti u. (Yahhuivuen reet tite tah pumsa dawngah tueng sak na mai ni). N'hu vengah nangmi metila na awm u tite poek uh.

Tevengah te nangmi tah Khrih oen na thla u. Nangmi tah thlaangphun tloe la na awm u tih Pathen kah thlaangtuek khuiah na thuum u thai nawh. Pathen lawng a thlaang thli tengah a awlkamna dawngah akung asut awlkam paipi oen ah te na bet na pha u nawh tih he dilai dawngah ngaiuepna aka khueh nawh oen Pathen khueh nawh la khaw na sak u.
Tede tahe tah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah athlathloeila aka awm nangmi te Khrih kah duekna rang oen amah teng na pha u poen.
Judah oen Gental thlaangphun he pumkhatla a saina rang oen ah Khrih amah he mami kah roeproeina la awm. Ahimi te a pek abo tih raal la aka coeng sak vawngkulh te amah pum oen a phe poen.

Judah Phungawl te awlpeek thli oen phung-alam thli te khaw boeih a phe; te tila a sai te tah amah oen pumkhat la awmna ah thlaangphun pahih te thlaangphun thaai pakhatla sai tih roeproeina te awm sak ham a ngaih dawngah ni.
Khrih lawngah thinglam dawng a duekna oen ahimi khat oen khat a raal u the te a phe pe; thinglam oen ah thlaangphun pahih te pumkhat la a sai tih ahimi te Pathen tengla avan law puei koep.
Tedawngah Khrih tah va law tih Pathen oen athlathloeila aka awm nangmi Gental hue tengah khaw, thlaang boeih tengah ngaimawngna Awlthang Theen te a thui.
Khrih rang oen ah Judah thlaang khaw, Gental thlaang khaw mami boeih lawngah Muithla pakhat dawng kalawng Pathen haiah m'pha thai u.

Tedawngah nangmi Gental thlaangphun tah thlaangphun tloe tlaih nawh tih khawlawng thlaang la na awm u tlaih nawh; tahe ah nangmi tah Pathen thlaang thli oen haih ah ram khui thlaang la na awm u poen tih Pathen imkhuikaw kah thlaang poen ni.
Nangmi khaw celtuih thli oen tawngha thli lawng lungdang a suem tangte dawngah a sak im la te na awm u van poen tih Khrih Jesuh amah te imkil lungto la awm.
Ahih tah im pumpui te haih aka caksakkung la awm tih Bawipa tengah nawn la aka awm aciim tempal bok-im la aka roeng sak ni.
Amah oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah nangmi khaw thlaangtloe hue boeih oen a sak haih Pathen lawng amah Muithla oen a awmna im la na coengg u poen.
He kawngah ni Khrih Jesuh kah thongtla Kai Pawl lawng nangmi Gental thlaangphun ham Pathen tengah ka thangthui.
Nangmi kah theenna hamla Pathen lawng a lungvatna oen he bii he bi hamla kai m'peek tite ataktangla nangmi lawng na yaak u poen.
Pathen lawng ahuep ahella khawkhanna a sai te a tueng sak tih kai he m'ming sak poen. (He kawng he atoila ka thut poen tih,
Kai lawng ca ka thut te na tae u atah Khrih kah awlhuep kai lawng ka ming tite nangmi lawng na yaakming u thai ai.)
Yan veng atah he awlhuep he thlaang thli te ming sak nawh, tede tahe tah Pathen lawng amah Muithla oen amah kah aciim celtuih thli oen tawngha thli tengah a tueng sak poen.

Te awlhuep tah awlthang theen rang oen Gental thlaangphun lawng Judah thlaangphun oen haih Pathen kah yotheen kam awmna te a dang poen; ahimi tah pumkhat dawngah aka thuum haih van poen tih Jesuh Khrih rang oen ah Pathen kah awlkam te a dang poen.
Awlthang theen biibikung la ka awm he Pathen kah kutdo ni, he tah amah kah huham tharana oen a sai tih m'peek ni.
Kai tah Pathen kah thlaang boeih lak ah huhsit koek la ka awm de, Khrih kah thuilek thuina nawh a bawilenna kawng Awlthang Theen te Gental thlaangphun tengah thui hamla,

Pathen lawng ahuepla khaw akhan te metila ataktangla a thoeng hang tite thlaang boeih ming sak ham biitungpui te kai m'peek. Thaihu soeprep Suenkung Pathen lawng n'hu veng atah amah kah awlhuep te a thuh a elh,
te tila a thuh te tah khrihcabu rang oen ah vanthlaang ukkung thli oen vaan kah huham tharana boeih lawng Pathen kah cuihna soeprep cungkuem te a mingna ham ni.
Pathen lawng amah kah dungyan kamthlahna angla a sai tih mami kah Bawipa Khrih Jesuh rang oen a coeng poen.
Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah mami lawng oengna oen ah Pathen tengla uepna oen tong-aa ohla n'cet u.
Tedawngah nangmi ham patang ka khang dawngah na kaw boet sak u mai boel tila reenna kavan bih; he ang thli he nangmi kah theenna ham boeih ni.
He kawngah he Pathen haiah khuklu oen ka cuengkueng tih ka buekuep yoeyah,
ahih teng kalawng dilai oen vaan ah aka awm imkhuikaw boeih lawng amami kah miing tak te a dang u.
Nangmi kah akhuiben thinkaw tharana ham amah Muithla rang oen ah a ruep-awm bawilenna dawngkah tharana te nangmi m'peekna ham ka bih tih,
oengna rang oen ah nangmi kah thinkaw lungbui ah Khrih lawng a im te sa seh tila ka thangthui. Nangmi lawng lungna dawngah akung na liing tih thlengyung na thlaakna ham khaw ka thangthui,
te atah Pathen thlaang thli oen thik at la Khrih kah lungna metihtlukla adung tih asang, akau tih asan tite nangmi lawng na ming u ai.
Ahih kah lungna te meveng khaw asoepla ming thai koeila awm nawh de, nangmi lawng a lungna te na ming u ngai ai, tedawngah Pathen pumsa soepna boeih oen nangmi na betoet u ham ka thangthui.
Mami kaw khuiah biibikung a huham tharana rang oen mami kah bihna oen poekna lak ah yahawh ngaai aka sai,
Pathen tengah khrihcabu rang oen Khrih Jesuh rang oen ah yoeyahla dungyan toe ruep-awmna awm hawn seh! Amen.
Tedawngah, Bawipa bii ka bi dawngah thongtla kai lawngah awl kan uen u: nangmi te Pathen lawng n'khue veng kah a taring van ah te adoengla khaw sa uh.
Boe ngaai yoeyah uh, amueltuett la awm uh, na kaw daw sak uh. Nangmi lawng lungna te khat oen khat reenna oen tueng sak uh.
Nangmi te pakhatla aka piin roeproeina oen ah Muithla kah peek pumkhatla awmna te phoeih mangkhak uh.
Pathen lawng nangmi n'khue vengah te ngaiuepna pakhat a awm van angla pum pakhat oen Muithla pakhat ni a awm.
Bawipa pakhat, oengna pakhat, baptisma pakhat awm:
thlaang boeih kah ana Pa oen Pathen pakhat awm tih soeprep boeih kah Bawi, soeprep boeih dawng kalawng bii a bi tih soeprep boeih dawngah awm.
Mami pakhat rip lawngah Khrih kah peek alakloe kutdo te ating-atawk la ng'khueh u.
Caciim lawngah, “Ahih lawng asangna huen la a luui hang vengah, raal lawng a khawh khak thlaang thli te a ceh puei; thlaang thli te kutdo a peek” tila a thui.
Tahe ah “luui hang” a ti he n'tu a thuingaihna kai? Thuingaihna tah lamhacuekla dilai ahemna koek ah law thuk ti he ni.
Tedawngah aka rum thuk oen aka luui hang te tah vai ahih tih vaan asawben avooel la luui hang a ti he tah amah he khawhipuempa ah betoetna ham ni.

Thlaang he kutdo aka pe khaw amah ni; Ahih lawngah khatsut te celtuih la a khueh; khatsut te tawngha la a khueh; khatsut te awlthang theen thuikung la a khueh; khatsut te pastor oen cangpueikung la khueh.
He tila a sai he tah Khrih kah pum te a roengna ham Pathen kah thlaang boeih lawngah Khrihca bii te bi hamla roekbahna ni.

Tedawngah mami boeih lawng oengna dawngah khaw, Pathen capa mingna dawngah khaw pakhatla te avan-at la ng'awm u ai; mami lawng poekna aka soep thlaang la ng'awm vetih Khrih kah asoepna tangtang asang koek te m'pha van ai.

Te atah thlaangtloe te thawlhpalhna benla aka mawt, thlaang thailatna ham suen coplap hoem awl oen ah thlaangthaipalat thli kah cangpueina tuiphu lawng a khuen tih thlihueng lawng a yawng camoe angla te ng'awm u tlaih manawh.
Mami lawng lungna thinkaw oen awltak thuina oen ah luu la aka awm Khrih dawngah te soeprep ah roeng ham awm.

Ahih kah khawl-acuuina oen pum dawngkah atloe boeih te a bawlcawm kang tih ruhcong boeih oen pum te tuhkai u haih tih bawmcem u. Tedawngah pum dawngkah atloe boeih lawng a bi ham koei te a sai u tih pum lawngah lungna oen roeng hang.

Tedawngah Bawipa miing oen nangmi te ngaithuenna kan peek u: nangmi lawng Pathen aka bok nawh lukih thlaang thli angla awm u tlaih boel, ahimi kah poekna tah apoei-oepla awm tih a thinkaw tah khawyiin khoep.
Ahimi lawngah mingna tehca khaw khueh u nawh tih a thin a haam khaklal dawngah Pathen kah peek hingna te dang ham koei la awm nawh.
Ahimi lawngah yahna roe khaw khueh u nawh; thawlhna dawngah amami oen amami te bawl-aneeng u tih kuemsuem u tlaih ohla soeprep te a sai u.
Khrih kawng na cang u te te tila nawh ni!
Nangmi lawng ahih kawng te na yaak tangtang u poen tih amah kah hubang la na awm u van angla Jesuh dawngah aka awm awltak te nangmi lawng na cang u poen.
Tedawngah pumsa ngaihna lawng thailatna oen phe la aka awm na hing ruem te tah hoett u loeih.
Nangmi kah thinkaw oen lungbui te tah athaai, sai pan la awm ham awm.
Nangmi lawngah hingna athaai oen ah thoekcau uh, te tah Pathen kah mueisam oen aka lo u la a sai tih aka doeng tih aciim hingna tangtang a tuengna ni.
Tedawngah hoemthui thlaang awm tlaih boel seh! Thlaang boeih lawng aka oeng paya laikoei tengah awltak tang te thui seh; metihtiah mami boeih tah Khrih pum dawngah thik at la aka thuum boeih ni.
Nangmi na thin a sa atah na thinsana lawng thawlhna khuila m'mawt boel seh, khawyungkhun na thin sa sak boel.
Seitan te atue theen pe u boel.
Aka huen lawngah huen-caanna te toeng loeih selang tah amah kah hingna ham adoengla bungkhutna te a dangna ham oen ah khawdeng thlaang te bawmcem thaina ham bii bi seh.
Awl na thui u vengah awlthe te thui u boel; thlaang hamla hoeikhangna aka awm tih angoena ah theenna aka thoeng sak, nangmi kah awlthui aka ya hue lawng theenna te a saina ham awltheen te thui uh.

Pathen kah Ciim Muithla te a kaw the sak u boel; Metihtiah Muithla te tah, nangmi te Pathen kah thlaang la na awm u tite miknoekna la awm tih Pathen lawng nangmi loeih sakna Khawhin a pha ai tina kah aamahkhan ni.
Thunkha-thunthlimna, thinso-kawsana, thinsana te hoett u loeih. Pakhat oen khat tlungna oen sal-aphaamna, khat oen khat thina thinkaw awm tlaih boel seh.
Te ang thli lak atah pakhat oen khat reenna oen komyomna kawpoek te khueh u langtah Pathen lawng Khrih rang oen ah nangmi sawah khawdawp a ngaai van angla te khat oen khat sawah khawdawp ngaai uh.
Nangmi tah Pathen lawng a lungna a ca anau la na awm u dawngah amah oen lawh u van ham yawm u lah.
Khrih lawng mami he n'lungna tih a hingna te mami ham abaw aka tuui huihthlutna oen Pathen kawhoena luciik la a nawn u van angla nangmi kah hingna te lungna lawng uk seh.
Nangmi tah Pathen kah thlaang la na awm u dawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna, apueh ngaihna, tuiilehkap aka ciim nawh kawng te nangmi tim ah thui ham pateng khaw awm nawh.
Yahna koei awl, awlhang kaahang phawhna, awlthe awlkha te nangmi lawng na thui ham koeih tlaih nawh ni. Te lak atah nangmi lawng awmngaihna awl te Pathen tengah na thui u ham awm.

Nangmi lawng na ming ceet ham tah a-u khaw hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai, tuiilehkap aciim nawh awl aka thui, apueh aka ngaih tah Khrih oen Pathen kah Ram ah adang ham koei te dang manawh tite ming uh (apueh asawm ngaihna he kutsaimuei bokna pakhat van ni).
Nangmi te awlpoei awlpit oen a-u lawngkhaw n'thailatna boel seh; he ang kawngah he amah awl te aka ngaai nawh tah Pathen thinsana te a yawkk ai.
Tedawngah te ang thlaang oen te pawl u roe boel.

Namami roe khaw n'hu vengah yiinna khui khawsakna ah na hing u poen, tede nangmi lawng Bawipa kah thlaang la na awm u coeng kalawng tah aangna khuiah na awm u poen. Tedawngah aangna khuiah aka awm thlaang angla te khaw sa uh.
Metihtiah te tila khawsakna lawngtah athaih-apai theenna phun soeprep, doengna phun soeprep oen awltak phun soeprep te a thoeng sak.
Bawipa kah kawhoena te sai hamla yawm u lah.
Yiinna khuiah aka awm thlaang thli lawng a sai thaihu, aphu aka awm nawh thaihu te sai u boel. Te ang thaihu te aangna dawngah daih lang tueng sak uh.
(Ahimi lawngah ahuep-ahella thaihu a sai kawng te thui ham pateng yah ham awm tangkiik).
Thaihu boeih te aangna ah pho sak la a awm veng atah te thli kah acoenggna tangtang te aciimphanla tueng;
Metihtiah aciimphanla aka tueng thaihu boeih tah aangna la te thoeng hang. Tedawngah, “Aka ip thli tho u loeih, duekna dawng kalawng tho uh, Khrih tah na sawah aang poen ai” tila a thui.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng khawsak ramsakna dawngah atheenla ngaithuen uh. Tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang angla awm u boel, thlaangcuih angla awm uh.
Tahe kah atue khawhin he tah san the la a awm dawngah nangmi lawng atue theen na khueh boeih te atheenla hawna uh.
Nangmi lawngah thlaangcuih nawh angla awm u boel, Bawipa lawng nangmi sai sak ham a ngaih te dang hamla yawm uh.
Yuu te ruui u boel, yuu tah nangmi te aka rawk sak khoeng ni, te lak atah Muithla oen betoet u lah.
Nangmi pakhat oen khat te saam laa dawngkah awl, koehna laa dawngkah awl, laa ciim dawngkah awl oen ah voemtoei uh. Bawipa te na thinkaw tang oen koehna laa, saam laa oen ah thangpawm uh.
Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah soeprep boeih dawngah Pa Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil thui yoeyah uh.
Nangmi lawng Jesuh Khrih te na hinyah u dawngah nangmi pakhat oen khat awl ngaai u lah.
Yu-aca thli, Bawipa awl te na ngaai u van angla na vaa thli kah awl te ngaai u lah.
Khrih lawngah khrihcabu sawah aana a khueh angla vaa-aca lawng khaw yu-aca sawah aana a khueh tih Khrih tah amah pum la aka awm khrihcabu kah thlawnkung la awm.
Tedawngah khrihcabu lawng Khrih kah awl a ngaai angla yu-aca thli lawngah ataktang la a vaa-aca thli kah awl te ngaai seh.
Vaa-aca thli, Khrih lawngah khrih-cabu te a lungna tih a hingna te a peek angla yuu-aca thli te lungna uh.
Ahih lawngah he tila a sai, khrihcabu te tui oen aciimla a silh coengah a awl oen Pathen tengah a peek.
Te tila khrihcabu tah atheenna boeih boeih oen aka awm tih thawlhna aka awm nawh, atloe soepna nawh oen angaw-aha, aru-arii oen cawttbauh aka awm nawh la te amah tengah peek ham angaih dawngah ni.
Tawngpa hue lawngah amami pum te a lungna u van angla a yu-aca thli te a lungna ham awm. A yu te aka lungna tawngpa tah amah pum te aka lungna thlaang ni.
A-u lawngkhaw amah pum te thina nawh. Khrih lawngah khrihcabu te a doen acaang tih a cawm acah angla amah pum te thina ohla a doen acaang tih a cawm acah van.
Metihtiah mami tah amah pum dawngah aka thuum van ni.
Caciim lawngah “Tedawngah tawngpa lawng a manu oen ana pa te a ceh taak vetih a yu oen pumkhatla awm ai, ahih rawi tah pakhatla coengg ai” tila a thui.
He caciim dawngah aka tueng ataktang awlhuep aka dung te awm tih te tah Khrih oen khrihcabu he thuinuetna ni tila ka yaakming.
Tede nangmi oen khaw tuhkai u: vaa-aca boeih lawng amah pum te a lungna angla a yu-aca te lungna selang tah yu-aca boeih lawngkhaw a vaa-aca te hinyah van seh.
Ca-anau thli, na nu oen na pa awl te ngaai uh, te tah nangmi khrihca thli lawng na vai ham koei aka soeng thaihu ni.
“Na nu oen na pa te hinyah uh” a ti he tah lamhacuek awlpeek la awm tih,
“te tila na vai atah nangmi ham soeprep te theen vetih dilai han ah na hinglung vaang ai” tila a thap.
Nu-apa thli, nangmi lawng na ca na nau thli te a thinsa sak boel. Te lak atah khrihca moeiboe oen thuituen uh.
Nangmi sal thli, namami kah thlaanghing bawi thli te birih haitawk oen a awl ngaai pe uh; Nangmi lawng Khrih kah bii aka bi angla thinkaw tak oen a bii te bi pe uh.

Ahimi lawng nangmi te bii a bi ti seh tila na ngaih u dawngah ahimi kah mik huh bueng ah te bii sai u boel, tede Khrih kah sal la na awm u van angla Pathen kawngaih la na thinkaw lungbui boeih oen sai uh.
Thlaanghing kah bii ni ka bi tila poek ohla Bawipa kah bii aka bi angla thathlue thakaw oen bi pe uh.
Bawipa lawngah thlaang boeih he sal khawseh, thlaangcuem khawseh, amami kah atheen saina dawngah kutdo a peek ai tite poek uh.

Bawi thli, tetih van la te na sal thli tengah sai u van langtah hih-ahuut oen tluung-athangna te toeng u loeih. Nang oen sal thli lawng vaan ah aka awm, thlaang boeih te avanpila awlcekkung bawi kah thlaang la ka awm tite ming uh.
Aboetna ah amah kah tha-awm tharana rang oen ah Bawipa oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah na tharana te cak sak uh.
Seitan kah athe thailatna te padauh thaina ham Pathen kah peek phawlip acungkuem oen ah thoekcau u lah.
Metihtiah mami lawng thlaanghing te n'teek u nawh tih vaan benkah muithla the kah tharana, ukkung thli, saithaina aana khuehkung thli, tahe yiinna san kah khawhipuempa tharana huham oen ni n'teek u.

Tedawngah Pathen kah phawlip oen tahe ah thoekcau u lah! Te ah ni athe khawhin te avan pha vengah nangmi lawng ceemraal thli kah teek-ayakkna kalawng na deem u vetih ceemraal tloekna aboet toe ah acakla na pai poe u ai.
Tedawngah ngaithuen oepsoeh uh, awltak te cihin angla na hingcen dawng-ah acakla na lah, doengna te kahkawng angla daan langtah,
roepna Awlthang Theen phawng hamla ngaithuen oepsoehna te khawmuek angla muek uh.
Oengna te phring angla pawm yoeyah uh; metihtiah te phawlip oen Seitan kah kahna haialh pla boeih te na thih u thai ai.
Thlawnna te thiilumuek angla muek u langtah muithla kah peek, Pathen awl te samsen angla pawm uh.

He ang boeih he thangthuina oen sai u lang Pathen kah bawmcemna te bih uh. Muithla kah mawtna angla me ang atue atang vengah khaw thangthui uh. Tedawngah ahuertuela awm uh, thathepakla awm u boel; Pathen thlaang boeih ham thangthui yoeyah uh.

Kai khaw awl thui hamla oepsoehla ka awm vengah ka thui ham koei awl te Pathen lawng m'peekna ham khaw, raltheenna oen ka thuina ham khaw, awlthang theen kah awlhuep te tueng sak thaina ham ah kai ham khaw thangthui uh.
Tahe ah kai he thong khuiah ka awm de, he awlthang theen ham laipai la ka awm. Ka thui ham tuueng awlthang theen kawng te raltheen oen ka thuina ham thangthui uh.
Mami lawng n'lungna manau, Bawipa kah bii kawngah uep-awm la aka awm Taikhikas lawng metila ka awm tite nangmi lawng na mingna u hamla kamah kawng-alam awlthang boeih te avan thui ai.
Kaimi boeih metila ka awm u tite thui ham oen ah nangmi te tha thlue sak hamla ahih te nangmi tengla kavan tuih.
Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawngah khrihca maya manau boeih tengah ngaimawngna oen lungna, oengna te m'pe hawn seh.
Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih te aka duek nawh lungna oen ah aka lungna boeih sawah Pathen lungvatna awm hawn seh.
Khrih Jesuh kah tuihyoeihthlaang Pawl oen Timote lawng, Khrih Jesuh ah pumkhat la aka awm Filipi khaaw kah Pathen thlaang boeih khrihcabu mawtkung hue oen bawmkung boeih tengah ca kavan pat.
Mami kah Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawng lungvatna, ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh.
Nangmi kan poek vengah nangmi ham awmngaih awl ka thui poepa;
nangmi boeih ham ka thangthui vengah awmngaihna oen ka thangthui,
Metihtiah awlthang theen bii bina ah a tong cuek kalawng tahe toe nangmi lawng nan bawm u dawngah ni.
Tedawngah nangmi tim ah he ang bii theen aka tongkung Pathen lawng Khrih Jesuh Khawhin a pha toe he bii he a bi poe ai tila ka tangna.

Nangmi he kan thintlawhna ni! He tila nangmi tengah thinkaw ka khueh he khueh ham tueng roe ni. Metihtiah kai he nangmi lawng nan lungduetna tih tahe thong ka tlaak vengah khaw, awlthang theen te yalpawla ka pai puei tih acakna ham bii ka bi vengah khaw Pathen kah peek bii dawngah he nangmi boeih khaw na thuum u van.
Khrih Jesuh lungbui dawngkah aka law boeih oen nangmi he kan thintlawhna ka ti vengah he awltak ka thui tih Pathen tah mingpueikung la awm.
Nangmi lawng atheen koek te na tuek thaina ham, nangmi kah lungna lawng cuihhoena tangtang oen ah nuemnai thaina oen haih a roeng tare hamla ka thangthui.
Te dengah ni Khrih Khawhin ah ciimna nawh boeih oen thawlhpeelna boeih kalawng na loeih u ai.
Pathen thangpawmna ham oen a ruep-awmna a tuengna ham Jesuh Khrih bueng lawngah peek thai la aka awm moeiboe theenna tangtang oen nangmi kah hingna te betoet ai.
Maya manau thli, ka tengah aka thoeng thaihu he awlthang theen a puungna ham aka bawmcem tangtang la coengg ti he nangmi ming sak ka ngaih.
He kawngah he, sengpahrang impui aka toet raalkapbu boeih oen he kah thlaangtloe boeih lawngah, Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm dawngah thong ka tlaak he a ming u.
Tecoengah thong ka tlaakna lawngah he maya manau yahawh ngaai kah Bawipa a uepna te tare acak pe sak, tedawngah ahimi lawng a raal theen tare u tih rih ohla awlthang theen te a thui u.
Thlaang khatsut lawng atah uet-eena thinkaw oen, khatsut lawngtah tawhthaam ngaihna kawpoek oen Khrih awlthang theen te a thui u tangtang, tede khatsut lawngtah thinkaw ciim oen a thui u.
Ahimi lawngtah lungna oen a thui u, metihtiah awlthang theen paipueina bii he Pathen lawng kai m'peek te a ming u dawngah ni.

Thlaangtloe hue lawng atah lungna tangtang oen Khrih kawng te thui u nawh tih amami ham ngaihna kawpoek oen a thui u; ahimi lawng atah thong ah kai ka awm vengah he kai ham raina te sai tare hamla te a poek u.
Tete awlpui nawh ni! Ka awmngaih tangkiik mai ta; asoeng nawh kawpoek oen khaw, asoeng poekna oen khaw, me tih benla khawseh, Khrih kawng te a thui u mak atah ka awmngaih poepa ai.
Metihtiah nangmi kah thangthuina rang oen Jesuh Khrih kah Muithla dawng kalawng aka law bawmna oen ka loeih ngai ai tila ka ming dawngah ni.

Ka ngaihna oen ka ngaiuepna tah bii ka bi he meveng khaw tlawlh nawh ham ni, tede me ang atue atang ah khaw, tahe vengah khaw raltheenna oen betoet tih ka duek ka hing ah khaw, Khrih hinyahna hamla ka pum oen ka hingna boeih peek ham he ni.
Hingna he n'tu nuem? Kai ham tah hingna he Khrih ni. Tedawngah kai ham tah duekna he tharana ni.
Tede kai lawng ka hingna rang oen aphu aka awm bii te ka bi thai koei atah ame ang nuem ka tuek lah ai ka ngaai hang sut.
He pahih lawngah kai he n'doek. He hingna he ceh taak tih Khrih oen awm haih ka ngaih tangkiik, te tah atheen ngaai thaihu ni;
tede ka hing hun kawinih awlpuila nangmi ham tare theen.
He kawngah he ka uep u, ka hing hun ai tila ka ming. Nangmi lawng oengna dawngah na roengna ham awmngaihna te tawm athap hamla nangmi boeih te kan hing puei hun ai,
tedawngah nangmi tengah ka awm koep veng atah Khrih Jesuh ah nangmi kah hingna pumkhatla a awm dawngah kai rang oen ah nangmi lawng mik-hai theenna na khueh u tare ai.

Tahe ah awlpui tah Khrih kah awlthang lawngah a kuek angla nangmi lawng na hing u ham awm, nangmi tengla ka law thai tih kan huh u vengah khawseh, ka law thai nawh tih kan huh u nawh vengah khawseh, mengtengna pakhat oen acakla na pai u tih awlthang theen oengna dawngah kawngaihna pakhat oen thik at la raal na teek u tite yaak ka ngaih.
Nangmi lawng na raal te rih u boel; na thin cak sak uh, te lawngah te ahimi a sung sak vetih nangmi lawng na taa u te a ming sak ai, metihtiah nangmi taana te pekung tah Pathen ni.
Tedawngah amah te oeng doek ham bueng nawh tih ahih hamla patang khang ham khaw Khrih kah bii te nangmi m'peek u poen.
Tahe ah nangmi tah raal kahna huen ah kai oen bawngyawng haih thai poen. N'cui vengah kai lawng raal ka teek na huh u te ang te, nangmi lawng na yaak u angla tahe toe ah raal ka teek khiing hun.

Nangmi Khrih ah na hingna lawng tha a ra sak tih a lungna lawng nangmi kaw te a reem ahaal sak. Nangmi lawng Muithla oen pawlneengna na khueh u tih pakhat oen khat sawah lungna oen reenna te na khueh u.
Tedawngah nangmi te he tila kan uen, poekna pakhat la khuehna, pakhat oen khat lungna, thinkaw lungbui khat la khuehna oen ah ka awmngaihna te soep sak u lah.
Nangmi lawngah mah ham bueng poekna, oekthloen ngaihna mai oen ah thaihu khat khaw sai boel, thlaangtloe he nangmi lak ah theen ngaai tila poek poepa langtah pakhat oen khat boe-ngai uh.
Namami ham bueng te huh thai ohla thlaangtloe ham theenna khaw huh thai van ham awm.
Khrih lawng a khueh kawpoek te nangmi lawngkhaw khueh ham awm.
Ahih tah Pathen pumsa oen soep yoeyah, tede Pathen oen avan at la awm ham te yawm mangkhak ham poek nawh.
He lak atah a khueh boeih te amah kawthawhna oen a hoett tih tuihyoeihthlaang la awmna te a lawh Ahih tah thlaanghing angla coengg tih thlaanghing muei-asam la va tueng.
Ahih tah boe-ngaai tih duek toela awlngaaina lawngpui te a vai tih thinglam dawngah te duek.
Tedawngah Pathen lawng ahih te asaw sang koek huen ah a pawmsang tih miing tloe boeih lak ah miing luekoek a peek.
Tedawngah Jesuh miing hinyah peekna la vaan ah aka awm boeih, lai han ah aka awm oen dilai dangah aka awm boeih lawngah khuklu oen cuengkueng boeih u vetih,
Pa Pathen ruep-awmna ham Jesuh Khrih tah Bawipa ni tila boeih a phawng u ai.

Tedawngah ka lungna ka paya thli, nangmi oen haih ka awm vengah ka awl na ngaai u poepa angla te tahe athla hlang la ka awm vengah khaw, ka awl he na ngaai u ham awlpui koek la awm. Nangmi kah thlawnna asoepna ham birih haitawk oen bii te bi yoeyah uh,
metihtiah amah kah mengtengna te vai thai ham oen vai ngaihna thinkaw khueh ham Pathen lawng na kaw khuiah bii a bi poepa.
Soeprep boeih te caitoek ohla, oelhtaih u muehla sai uh,

te tila te he dilai dawngah aka awm thlaangthe thli oen thlaangthawlh thli lakli ah Pathen kah thlaangsoep ca anau angla thawlhna aka awm nawh, aciim acaih thlaang la nangmi tah na awm u ai, hingna awl te ahimi na peek vengah te ahimi tim ah vaan ah aka vaang aisi angla aang u lah.
Te tila na sai u atah Khrih khawhin ah nangmi rang oen mik-hai theen ka dang ai, metihtiah kai lawng ka yawmna boeih oen ka bi boeih te apoei-oep nawh ni tite na tueng sak ni.
Nangmi lawng oengna oen na nawn thaihu angla Pathen tengah na nawn u luciik dawngah ka hingna thisen he duei mai cakhaw ka awmngaih vetih nangmi boeih oen haih ka awmngaih ai.
Tetih van la te nangmi khaw na awmngaih u vetih kai oen haih na awmngaih u van ai.
Nangmi kawng awlthang te yaakna oen ka tha a thluena ham Bawipa lawng a kawngaih atah nangmi tengla Timote he kavan tuih yue ai tila ka poek.
Ahih bueng oen ah ka kawpoek cah ahih tih nangmi tengah a ngaai huett tangtang.
Tlaang tloe hue tah amami kah bii bueng te a khuituuk u, Jesuh Khrih kah bii te bi u nawh.
Ahih lawngtah bii te a palki tih kai oen Paca angla awlthang theen ham bii ka bi hih te nangmi lawng na ming u.
Tedawngah kamah kah kawng alam he metila a awm tite ka ming pahoei coeng atah ahih te nangmi tengla kavan tuih ai tila ka ngaiuep.
Bawipa uepna oen kamah khaw nangmi tengla ka law yue ai tila ka ngaiuep.
Mami kah manau Epafroditas he nangmi tengla tuih ham angoe tila ka poek, ahih tah kai oen biibipuei, ceem raal aka tloek haih van tih kai he bawmkung la nangmi lawng na van tuih laipai ni.
Ahih lawng nangmi te n'ngaai tangkiik u tih a sa ding nawh tila na yaak u dawngah te a kaw hoe nawh.
Ahih tah duek dalh toela tlo tangtang. Tede Pathen lawng a reen, ahih bueng nawh tih kai khaw n'reen van tih ka tengah kawthena bohlang aka law ham koei dawng kalawng ka sa avan sueng sak.
Tedawngah ni a hih he nangmi tengla tuih ham ka ngaih tangkiik tih, na huh u vengah na awmngaih u vetih kai kah kawthe khaw dip ai.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng ahih te Bawipa ah boenhui pakhat angla awmngaih oen van do uh. Ahih angla aka awm thlaang boeih te van hinyah uh,
metihtiah nangmi lawng nan peek thai nawh bawmcemna te ahih lawng peek hamla, Khrih kah bii dawngah duek khaw maa ohla duek dalh toela bii a bi.

Maya manau thli, awlcuina ah thui ka ngaih tah Bawipa oen pumkhat la awmna dawngah awmngaih u lah. Acuek ah kavan thut tangte te thut koep he n'tu la ka poei sak mai nawh, he tila kavan thut koep he tah nangmi na deemna ham ni.
Athe thaihu aka sai thli, pumsa yahhuivuen reetna aka thui mangkhak thlaang thli ui hue te ngaithuen uh.

Asoeng akam taktak yahhuivuen aka reet tah ahimi nawh tih mami he ni, metihtiah mami lawngtah amah kah Muithla oen ah Pathen n'bok u tih Khrih Jesuh ah pumkhatla awmna hingna dawngah te n'awmngaih u. Mami lawngtah asaw ahan kah saina dawngah uepna n'khueh u nawh.

Atak tang atah te ang thaihu thli te kai lawngkhaw ka uepna thai van ta. Asaw ahan kah saina te ka uepna thai tila thlaang pakhat khat lawng a poek atah te tila poek ham koei la kai lawng akawng alam yahawh ngaai ka khueh.
Kai tah hin reetna khawhin ah yahhuivuen reet la ka awm, thlaangphun ben ah Israel thlaang, Benjamin phun, Hebru thlaangciim la ka awm. Judah hue kah Phungawl vaina ben ah Farasi la ka awm,
Kai tah ka tha thlue akcak tih khrihcabu te ka heem ka tek. Phungawl dawngkah awlpeek thli te vaina rang oen thlaangdoeng la awmna ben ah kai tah thawlhna roe awm nawh.
Tede he thaihu boeih he kai ham thaawnna ni tila ka poek koei te tahe tah sungna ni tila Khrih rang oen ah ka poek poen.

Te thaihu thli bueng nawh tih; ka Bawipa Khrih Jesuh kah cuihhoena aphu aka awm ngaai rang oen soeprep cungkuem te sungna ni tila ka poek boeih poen. Amah rang oen ah soeprep boeih te ka hoett kang poen; te ang thli boeih te tah kaw-hnot vaiking la ni ka poek mai poen, Khrih ah ka thawnna ham oen ah,

amah oen pumkhatla awmna ham ni. Tahe ah kai lawng Phungawl vaina rang oen thaawnna kamah kah doengna te ka khueh tlaih nawh. Tahe tah Khrih oengna rang oen m'peek doengna, oengna dawngah akung asut Pathen tengkah aka law doengna ni ka khueh poen.
Kai lawng ka ngaih tah Khrih te ming ham oen ah amah thawhkoepna huham tharana te ming van ham amah kah patang khang te khang van ham oen ah amah angla duek van ham ni.
Te tila te kamah roe he duekna kalawng hingna ah thawh koep van ham ka ngaiuep.
He ang thli dawngah he taana ka khueh poen, thlaangsoep la ka awm poen tina nawh ni. Khrih Jesuh lawng amah hamla kai he n'tuuk khak poen tih kai hamla avan khueh kutdo te dang hamla tha ka huer.
Maya manau thli, kai lawng te ang thli boeih te ka dang poen tila khaw ka poek nawh; tede kai lawng ka sai pakhat tah ka hu benkah thaihu te hilh tih ka hai ben ah aka awm te pha hamla ka yawm.
Tedawngah kutdo dang hamla lansak benla te adoengla poe ka heng, te kutdo tah sawben hingna ah Khrih Jesuh rang oen Pathen kah khuena te ni.

Mami boeih muithla ben ah kawpoek soep la aka awm lawngtah he ang kawpoek he khueh roe hamla awm, tede nangmi timkah thlaang khatsut lawng poekna tloe na khueh u atah te poekna te Pathen lawng nangmi tengah aciimphanla avan tueng sak ai.
Me tih khawseh, mami lawng tahetoe ah n'vai u phung alam angla te hai benla cet u lah sih.
Maya manau thli, ka hingna he nangmi lawng oett u lah. Kai lawng nangmi ham kavan khueh oett koei theenna aka vai thlaang thli te dan u lah.
He kawng he n'hu vengah khaw kavan thui poepa u poen de, tahe ah mikphi oen kavan thui koep: Thinglam dawngah Khrih kah duekna te a hingna oen ah aka raalna thlaang yahawh awm.

Ahimi tah hell ah a lawngpui boet ai, metihtiah ahimi kah pathen tah amami kah pumsa ngaihna te ni. Ahimi lawngah yahna koei thaihu dawngah te oekthloen u tih dilai thaihu koeva thli bueng he a poek u.
Tede mami tah vaan ram thlaang la n'awm u tih mami Thlawnkung Bawipa Jesuh Khrih vaan kalawng a law thuk te huerh n'lamtoen u.

Amah lawngtah mami kah tha aka awm nawh, aka duek thai pum he avan thaw vetih amah kah ruep-awm pum angla avan sai ai, te tila a sai vengah te thaihu soeprep boeih amah ukna huiah aka pha sak huham tharana te a hawna ai.

Tedawngah ka lungna maya manau thli, kan lungduetna u tih kan ngaai u tangkiik! Nangmi kawngah ka kaw hoe tih ka awmngaih tangkiik! Ka lungna maya manau thli, Bawipa dawng na hingna ah te acakla pai uh.
Eodia oen Sintikhe, reenna kavan bih, Bawipa ah boeinau la na awm hih van angla thinkaw thik-at ham yawm hih.

Tecoengah, uep-awm biibipuei, thli nangmi lawngkhaw, he hutaa rawi he na bawm u hamla ka ngaih; metihtiah Klimen oen atloe biibipuei haih, Pathen kah hingna cabu khuiah a miing aka thuum thli boeih oen awlthang theen a puungna ham kai oen haih tha a huer hih tih bii aka bi rawi ni.
Bawipa oen pumkhatla na awm u dawngah awmngaih poepa u lah. Koep ka thui; awmngaih u lah!
Thlaang boeih tengah nangmi kah kawdawna te tueng sak uh. Bawipa tah law yue poen ai.
Me ang thaihu kawngah khaw lakueng u boel, na thangthui veng roekk ah na ngoe boeih te Pathen tengah bih uh; amah tengah uemna thinkaw tang oen bih yoeyah uh.
Te tila na bih atah thlaanghing kah yaakmingna voel ah aka awm Pathen ngaimawngna lawng Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhat la awmna rang oen ah nangmi kah thinkaw oen lungbui te ading-apuek la avan khueh ai.

Aboetna ah ka boenhui thli, nangmi lawng na thinkaw te aka theen tih thangpawm koei ataktang thaihu, aphu aka awm thaihu, aka soeng tih aciim thaihu, lungna koei thaihu, hinyah koei thaihu oen be sak uh.
Kai tengkah na cang u tih na dang u te ka awlthui dawngkah khawseh, ka saina dawngkah khaw pahih bokla sai u van. teahtah mami ngaimawngna pekung Pathen te nangmi oen haih awm ai.

Atue san hlang a awm coengah nangmi lawng kai he nan do nan dan koep u tih bawipa oen ah pumkhatla awmna rang oen ka awmngaih tangkiik. Nangmi lawng kai nan dodanna te na toeng pak u ka ti ngaihna nawh ni, nangmi lawng dodanna te tueng sak ham atue theen na dang u nawh ka ti ngaihna ni.
Nangmi lawng kai he nan ngaai nan laakna tlaih nawh tila ka poek dawngah he tila ka thui moenih, metihtiah kai tah ka khueh duen oen ka ngaai atluepna thai ham ka cang poen dawngah ni.

Voetna oen awm khawseh, acoeihpokla khueh toen khawseh me ang nuem tite ka ming poen. Tedawngah ame huen ah khaw, metuek vengah khaw, ka bung ahah ah khawseh, buh mueh la ka awm ah khaw seh, yahawh hlang ka khueh ah khaw, ayawlca ka khueh ah khaw ngaikhuek la awm thai ham he ang ahuep ahel he ka cang poen.
Khrih kah peek huham tharana oen me ang thaihu khaw taana hamla tharana ka khueh poen.
Tede raina ka tawng vengah nan bawm u he nangmi kah theenna ni.

Nangmi Filipi khaaw kah thlaang thli lawng atheencala na ming u, Macidonia kalawng ka cet tih Awlthang Theen ka thui cuek vengah te nangmi khrihcabu bueng lawng ni bawmna nan peek u, nangmi bueng lawng ni ka thawnna oen ka sungna khaw nan talawng u.
Tesalon khaaw ka awm vengah bawmna ka ngoe vengah te te vaikhat bueng nawh mai bawmna te navan pat u.
Kai lawng kutdo dang ngaih bueng maiah nawh tih; nangmi kah cayin cabu dawngah khaw athawnna, apuung ataaina te huh hamla ka ngaih.

Tecoengah nangmi kah thaihu pat boeih tite kavan thut tih akhoek anoen lak ah yahawh ngaaila navan pat u! Nangmi kah kutdo boeih te Epafroditas lawng avan khuen tih tahe atah ka ngoe boeih te ka khueh poen. Te ang thli boeih te Pathen lawng a ngaih tih a do luciik, Pathen tengah nawn la aka awm riimtuui angla awm.
Kai kah Pathen lawng amah kah bawilen kuirangna oen nangmi kah ngoena boeih te Khrih Jesuh rang oen ah m'peek ai.
Mami kah Pa oen Pathen tengah ruep-awmna tah dungyan toe awm hawn seh! Amen.
Khrih Jesuh kah a koe la aka awm, Pathen kah thlaang nangmi pakhat rip te kan toei u. He ah he kai oen aka awm haih boenhui hue lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u,
He ah aka awm Pathen kah thlaang boeih lawng n'toei u tih awlpuila Sengpahrang sangluel impui ah aka awm thli lawngkhaw n'toei u.
Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh.
Pathen kah kawngaihna oen Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih pakhat la aka awm kai Pawl oen mami kah manau Timote lawng-
Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna ah uep-awm maya manau Kolosa khaw kah Pathen thlaang thli tengah ca kavan pat: Mami kah Pa Pathen lawng lungvatna ngaimawngna te nangmi m'pe hawn seh.
Nangmi ham ka thangthui u vengah mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ana Pa tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui u poepa.
Metihtiah Khrih Jesuh ah nangmi kah oengna Pathen kah thlaang boeih na lungna u te ka yaak u dawngah ni.

Awlthang Theen asoeng taktak te nangmi teng avan pha cuek vengah ngaiuepna m'peek kawng te nangmi lawng na yaak u. Tedawngah nangmi kah oengna oen lungna tah vaan ram ah nangmi ham a khueh ngaiuepna dawngah akung asut.

Nangmi lawng Pathen kah lungvatna kawng na yaak cuekca kalawng te lungvatna te ataktangla na ming u veng atah nangmi tim ah apuung ataai van angla te awlthang theen tah dilai pum ah puung khonghak tih yotheen kam-awmna te m'peek.
Nangmi lawng Epafras teng kalawng Pathen kah lungvatna te na ming u, Ahih tah kaimi lawng ka lungna biibipuei haih kaimi yuengah uep-awm la Khrih kah biibikung ni.
Muithla lawngah nangmi lungna m'peek te ahih lawng kaimi tengah avan thui.

Tedawngah nangmi kawng ka yaak cuek veng kalawng nangmi ham ka thangthui poepa u. Amah Muithla lawng m'peek cuihna boeih oen yaakmingna, amah kawngaih mingna oen nangmi na betoetna u ham Pathen tengah ka bih u.

Tedawngah Bawipa kah ngaihna angla nangmi lawng na ming thai vetih amah kawhoena te na sai poepa u thai ai. Nangmi kah hingna lawng thaihu theen soeprep boeih a sai vetih Pathen mingna dawngah te na roeng u ai.
Soeprep boeih te thinsan kawdaw oen na ueh thaina ham Pathen ruep-awmna huham dawng kalawng aka law tharana boeih oen n'cak sak u seh.
Tedawngah a aangna ram ukna khuiah Pathen lawng a thlaang thli ham oepsoehla a khueh thaihu te nang lawng paang thai koei la saikung Pa te awmngaih oen koeh uh.
Amah lawng mami he yiinna thara huham khui kalawng n'thlawn tih a lungna a Capa ram khuiah ngaimawngla te n'kuun poen;
a Capa rang oen mami tah n'loeih u tih mami thawlhna boeih te khawdawp avan ngaai poen.
Khrih tah huh thai nawh Pathen kah huh thai mueisam ni. Ahih tah a Capa camiing la awm tih a sai thaihu boeih lak ah asangluet la awm.

Metihtiah Khrih rang oen Pathen lawng vaan oen dilai dawngah aka awm thaihu boeih he a sai, huh thai oen huh thai nawh thaihu boeih, Muithla ben ah tharana thli, bawi thli, ukkung thli oen saithaina aana khuehkung boeih te a sai. Pathen lawng khawhipuempa dawngah aka awm boeih Khrih rang oen Khrih amah ham a sai.
Khrih tah thaihu soeprep boeih a awm thlan ah awm poen tih amah oen pumkhatla awmna ah thaihu soeprep boeih lawng amami awmna huen te rip a khueh.

Khrih tah amah kah pum la aka awm khrihcabu kah a luu ni; Ahih tah pum kah hingna kungpui la awm. Ahih tah camiing la awm tih thaihu boeih dawngah ahih bueng lawng lamhacuekla awmna huen a khuehna ham duekna kalawng a thawh sak poen.
A Capa lawng amah khuiah Pathen pumsa soepbir a khueh he Pathen amah kah awltloekna rang oen ni.

Tecoengah Pathen lawng a Capa rang oen khawhipuempa boeih he amah tengla doek koep hamla a ngaih. Pathen lawng a Capa thinglam dawngah a duekna rang oen roeproeina a sai tih vaan oen dilai ah aka awm thaihu boeih te amah tengah a doek koep.
N'cuiveng atah nangmi lawng athe thaihu thli na sai u tih, na poek u dawngah Pathen oen na thla u.

Tede tahe tah a Capa kah thlaanghing pumsa la a duekna rang oen Pathen lawng amah paya theen la n'sai poen. Te tila a sai he tah amah haiah nangmi te ciimcaih tih cawttbauh aka kap nawh la lawh ham ni.

Tedawngah, nangmi lawng thincak oen ayung na pengnelna dawngah te oengna oen acakla pai uh, awlthang theen na yaak vengkah na khueh u ngaiuepna dawng kalawng namah oen namah te thoeihnawng tlaih boel. He awlthang theen he dilai pum kah thlaang boeih tengah a phawng u tih he awlthang theen hamla Kai, Pawl khaw tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm.

Tahe ah nangmi ham patang palai ka khangna dawngah he ka awmngaih, metihtiah Khrih lawng amah kah pum la aka awm khrihcabu ham patang khang hamla aka awm hun te asoepna ham ka pumsa patang khangna oen a yueng ka theng pe.
Tedawngah, Pathen lawng Khrihcabu kah tuihyoeihthlaang la kai he n'khueh poen tih bii m'peek he tah nangmi theenna ham ni. Te bii tah amah kah awlthang asoepla phawng ham te ni;
te awlthang te yan veng atah thlaangphun boeih tengah phawng ohla a thuh, tede tahe tah a thlaang thli tengah a phawng poen.

Pathen kah mengtengna tah thlaang boeih hamla a khueh pe lenna oen ruep-awm tangkiik awlhuep te a thlaang boeih tengah phawng hamla ni. Te awlhuep tah nangmi khuiah aka awm Khrih te ni, thuingaihna tah Pathen kah ruep-awmna te nangmi lawng na khueh u van ai tina ni.

Tedawngah kaimi lawng thlaang boeih tengah Khrih kawng he ka thui u. Thlaang boeih lawng Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna ah pakhat rip te thlaangsoep la Pathen haiah pha puei ham cuihna boeih oen ngaithuenna ka peek u tih ka cang puei u.
He bii ka bi vengah he Khrih kah peek, ka khuiah bii aka bi tha-awm tharana te hawna oen ka tho ka tat tih bii rai he ngah ngah ka bi.
Nangmi ham khaw Laudisia khaaw kah thlaang thli ham khaw, kai he pumpakla aka ming nawh thlaang boeih ham khaw patang palai ruila metila bii ka bi he nangmi lawng na ming u ham ka ngaih.

He tila ka bi he nangmi lawng raltheenna oen na betoet u vetih lungna dawngah pakhat oen khat beroep u ham, aka soeng yaakmingna lawng a thoeng sak ngaitluep ngaimawngna aka soep te na khuehna u thai ham ka ngaih dawngah ni. He tila nangmi lawngah Pathen kah awlhuep te na ming u thai ai, te awlhuep tah Khrih amah he ni.
Khrih tah Pathen kah cuihna oen mingna kaawn thuh la aka awm boeih te awngna caabi ni.
Tecoengah he he kavan thui u, metila asoeng tangkiik angla awm mai cakhaw, aka soeng nawh cal thai oelhtaihna oen nangmi te a-u lawngkhaw n'thaina u boel seh.

Kai he ka pum tah nangmi oen athlahlangla ka awm de Muithla atah nangmi oen haih ka awm tih nangmi lawng Khrih na oengna dawngah thinkaw melh tih thin at kaw at oen thik at la na pai u te ka huh vengah ka awmngaih.
Khrih Jesuh te Bawipa la na pawm u poen dawngah amah oen pumkhatla awm uh.
Amah khuiah na yung te adungla thlaak langtah amah dawngah na hingna te im angla sa u lang nangmi te n'cang puei u poen angla na oengna te cak sak u lah. Tecoengah awmngaih ciil thuina oen betoet uh.

Tecoengah Khrih tengkah ohla thlaang kah cangpueina patoeng oen khawhipuempa ukkung Muithla teng kalawng ah aka law, aphu aka awm nawh thlaanghing kah cuihna oen a-u lawngkhaw nangmi te sal la n'sai u nawh ham ngaithuen uh.
Metihtiah Khrih thlaanghing pumsa dawngah Pathen kah pumsa asoepbirla awm tih,
amah oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah hingna aka soep te nangmi m'peek u poen. Ahih tah muithla boeih ukkung oen saithaina aana aka khueh boeih sawah sawsang koek la awm.

Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah nangmi lawng yahhuivuen-reetna u, thlaanghing kah sai yahhuivuen na reet u nawh tih Khrih kah sai yahhuivuen-reetna oen ni. Te tah he pumsa kah thawlh tharana kalawng loeihna te ni.

Metihtiah nangmi lawng Baptisma na dang u vengah te Khrih oen haih up la na awm u poen tih duekna kalawng Khrih thawhsakkung Pathen kah huham tharana te nangmi lawng na oengna rang oen ah Khrih oen na tho haih u van poen.

Yan atah nangmi he phungawl khueh nawh Gental thlaang la na awm u tih namami kah thawlhna dawngah Muithla ben ah na duek u. Tede tahe tah Pathen lawng nangmi te Khrih oen haih ng'hing sak poen. Pathen lawng mami kah thawlhna boeih te khawdawp a ngaai poen.
Mami kah laiba thutna cabu oen a khuiah aka awm piinna phung te thinglam dawngah biit a hen tih aphe boeih poen.
Tecoengah Khrih lawng Muithla ukkung hue oen saithaina aana khuehkung hue kah tharana te thinglam dawng a hen boeih tih, rangpui kah huh la a sai, taana oen laam-eetna ah raalkhuen sal angla a mawt.
Tedawngah nangmi kah na caak oen na awkk kawngah khaw seh, khawhin ciim oen Thla Thaai Poei oen ah Sabbath kawngah khaw seh, a-u lawngkhaw phung-alam van sai boel seh.
Te ang thaihu thli boeih tah hai ben ah aka thoeng koei mueithlip mai ni; ataktang tah Khrih ni.

Huhthlaam sangthloei ka huh ti u tih thlaangtloe lak ah asangla aka ngaai u thlaang thli, asoeng nawh komyomna, m'mah kah pum he phep hamla awm aka ti thlaang thli a-u lawngkhaw nangmi te n'sal'phaam boel seh. Te ang thlaang thli tah thuingaihna tangtang aka awm nawh thlaanghing poekna angla a poek te oen ah oekthloen u.

Pum kah luu la aka awm Khrih phoeih mangkhak te a toeng u. (Khrih kah khoemdoenna oen pum lawngah cawmcah u tih ruh-rawng dakda oen tharui lawng a tawm malh coengah Pathen lawng roeng sak ham a ngaih angla te coengg.)
Nangmi tah Khrih oen na duek haih u tih khawhipuempa kah muithla boeih ukkung teng kalawng na loeih u poen. Teahtah, n'tu ah he dilai hingna angla na hing khuep u?
N'tu hamla nangmi lawng “He he tek boel, tete teng-alai boel, atloe te nen boel,” aka ti phung alam te na vai u?
Te ang phung boeih te tah vai-at hawna coeng atah tula khaw thuumhawm tlaih nawh poen; te ang thli te thlaanghing kah sai phung alam oen cangpueina ni.

Vanthlaang amangkhakla bokna, asoeng nawh komyom kawdawna, atlawhhlangla pum patang peekna, he ang phung alam thli he cuihna dawng kalawng aka thoeng angla awm mai ai; tede pumsa ngaihna te taana hamla tah hoeikhangna tangtang awm nawh.
Nangmi tah Khrih oen hingna benla na tho haih u poen, tedawngah Pathen bantang ben ah Khrih lawng a bawi ngawlhcoen dawng a ngawlhna huen, vaan ram kah thaihu dawngah na lungbui te khueh uh.
He dilai sawkah thaihu dawngah thinkaw khueh ohla vaan ah aka awm thaihu dawngah na thinkaw te arapcatla khueh uh.
Metihtiah nangmi tah na duek u poen tih nangmi kah hingna tah Khrih oen haih Pathen dawngah thuh u poen.
Nangmi kah hingna tangtang tah Khrih ni, amah a law veng atah nangmi khaw amah oen haih na phumpho u vetih amah kah ruep-awmna te na dang u van ai.

Tecoengah dilai pumsa ngaihna nangmi kaw khuiah bii aka bi hutaa tawngpa thawlhna, ciimcaih nawh khawsakna, halhna, athe ngaihsoehna, apueh ngaihna, he ang thli boeih he na duek sak ham awm. (Metihtiah apueh ngaihna he kutsaimuei bokna pakhat van ni)
He ang thaihu the aka sai tih Pathen awl aka ngaai nawh sawah te Pathen kah thinsana pai ai.
Anoekbuet ah nangmi kah hingna khaw pumsa ngaihna lawng uktem la a awm vengah namami khaw he ang pumsa ngaihna angla khaw na sak u.

Tede tahe tah he ang thaihu thli thinsana, thinthena oen thlaang thina boeih te nangmi lawng na hoett boeih ham awm. Thlaang thekhana awl, tapvoepna awlthe awlkha he na hui na kaa dawng kalawng thoeng boel seh.
Nangmi lawng thlaangruem hingna oen thlaangruem moeiboe te na dul u tih thlaang thaai hingna oen na khuk u poen dawngah pakhat oen khat te thailat u patoeng boel.
He thlaang thaai hingna saikung Pathen lawng amah mueime oen aka lo u tare ham boet ohla athaai sak poepa. Te tila athai sak he tah nangmi lawng amah te atheenla na mingna ham ni.

Te tila mingna dawng atah Gental oen Judah, yahhuivuen reet oen reet nawh, thlaangngau paathuu, n'tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang, sal oen thlaangcuem tila ahimi laklaw ah pekbona awm tlaih nawh; Khrih tah soeprep tih soeprep dawngah Khrih tah awm.

Nangmi tah Pathen thlaang la na awm u; amah lawng nangmi te n'lungna tih amah hamla nangmi te n'tuek. Tedawngah thlaang kah hailam poekna, reenna, komyomna, boe-ngaaina, kawdawna oen ah khukdah u lah.

Nangmi pakhat oen khat kawlawna nawh a awm atah khat oen khat reen u langtah khawdawp ngaai uh. Bawipa lawng nangmi sawah khawdawp a ngaai van angla nangmi khaw thlaangtloe sawah khawdawp ngaai u van.
Tecoengah he thaihu boeih sawah lungna oen thap uh, metihtiah lungna lawngtah thaihu boeih he asoepcala pakhatla kang a tingtun tih a roep u sak.

Khrih kah peek ngaimawngna tah nangmi lawng awltloekna na saina ah nangmi te lawngpui aka tueng sak ham ni; metihtiah he ngaimawngna khuiah awm haih hamla Pathen lawng pum pakhat dawngah nangmi te n'khue u. Tedawngah awmngaih uh.

Khrih kah awl acungkuem ah aka soep te nangmi kaw khuiah awm seh. Cuihna aka awm boeih oen nangmi khat oen khat tuukkiik u lang toelthaam uh. Saam laa, Koehna laa oen laa ciim te sa uh; Na kaw khuikah awmngaihna laa oen Pathen te koeh uh;
Pathen tengah Khrih rang oen awmngaihna na thui u angla soeprep boeih na sai khaw, na thui khaw Bawipa Jesuh miing oen sai uh.
Yu-aca thli na vaa thli kah awl te ngaai uh, te tah Khrih thlaang la na awm u dawngah na sai ham koei ni.
Vaa-aca thli na yu ruk-awm thli te lungna u lang ahimi te awltlawh oen voemtoei u boel.
Ca-anau thli, Khrih thlaang la na awm u dawngah na nu oen na pa te yoeyahla hinyah uh, te tah Pathen kah kawngaih ni.
Nu-apa thli, na ca thli te a thin sa sak u boel, tetih atah ahimi te a kaw boet u hau ai.

Sal thli aw, soeprep boeih ah dilai hankah na manghai bawi hue kah awl te ngaai pe uh. Nangmi lawng ahimi kah kawtlaakna te na ngaih dawngah a mik-huh bueng ah a awl te ngaai mai ohla Bawipa hinyahna oen ah na thinkaw tangtang oen a awl ngaai pe uh.
Bii na sai roekk ah thlaanghing ham nawh tih Bawipa ham ni ka bi ti u langtah na thinkaw tangtang oen bi uh.
A thlaang thli ham a khueh pe kutdo te Bawipa lawng nangmi m'peek ai tite hilh u boel. Bii na bi pe Manghai Bawi tangtang tah Khrih ni.
Tedawngah a-u khaw athe aka sai boeih tah athe thaihu sai phu te a dang van ai, metihtiah Pathen lawngtah thlaang boeih te avanpila awl a cek dawngah ni.
Manghai Bawi hue, na sal thli te asoengla, adoengla aphangla, voemtoei uh. Nangmi khaw vaan ram ah Manghai Bawi na khueh u van te hilh u boel.
Thangthuina dawngah tlungmu u lang, na thangthui u vengah huertuela awm uh. Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil thui uh.

Te tila na thangthui u vengah Khrih awlhuep phawngthaina ham, Pathen tengkah atue theen ka dang thaina u hamla kaimi ham khaw thangthui u van. Tahe thong ah ka tlaak he khaw awlhuep ka phawng dawngah ni.
Tedawngah awlthang ka phawng ham koei te aciimphanla ka phawng thaina ham thangthui uh.
Aka oeng nawh thlaang thli tengah cuihna oen tho tat u lang atue theen na khueh boeih te hawna uh.
Nangmi kah awlthui boeih te yaak ngaih koei oen thinkaw thluembuek koeila awm selang thlaang boeih kah awl doetna te metila ka thung pe ai tite na ming u ham awm.
Kaimi lawng ka lungna ka manau, Bawipa kah bii dawngah uep-awm bii bikung, bii aka bi puei Taikhikas lawng kai kah kawng awlthang boeih he avan thui ai.
Tedawngah nangmi thathluena ham, kaimi kah khawsakna boeih aka thui hamla ahih te nangmi tengla kavan tuih.
Ahih oen haih Onisimas khaw va law van ai. Onisimas he ka lungna tih ka uepna ka manau, nangmi tim ah aka thuum van ni. He kah thaihu boeih aka coengg hang he ahih rawi lawng avan thui ai.

Kai oen thong ka tla haih Aristarkas lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u; tecoengah Barnabas kah nganca Mark lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u. (Mark he nangmi tengla a law atah anepla dodan ham kan uenna te na huh u poen)

Jastas aka miingna Joshua lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u. He kah thlaang pathum hue he Judah thlaang, thinkaw a thaw u tih Pathen ram ham kai oen bii aka bi haih thlaang la awm u tih ahimi lawng kai he yahawh hlang n'bawm u.

Khrih Jesuh kah tuihyoeihthlaang, namami kah paya laikoei Epafras lawng n'toei u. Ahih lawngah thinkaw tak oen nangmi ham thangthui poepa tih nangmi acakla na paina u ham, Khrihca thlaangsoep la na awmna u ham oen ah na oengna te aciimphanla na mingna u ham, Pathen kawngaih te asoepla na vaina u hamla a bih poepa.
Ahih lawngah nangmi ham khaw Laudisia oen Herapolish khaw kah thlaang thli ham khaw biirai a bi te kamah roe he aka mingkung la ka awm.
Mami lawng n'lungna Siibawi Luka oen Demas lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u.
Laudisia khaw kah maya manau thli oen Nimfa oen a im ah aka tun Khrihcabu tengah kaimi lawng n'toei u tila van thui pe uh.
He capat he na tae u coengah Laudisia khaw kah Khrihcabu hue khaw tae sak u van. Tetih van la nangmi lawng na tae ham capat te Laudisia khaw kah maya manau thli lawng nangmi ham avan pat van ai.
