Tecoengah, Arkhipas te, “Bawipa kah bii dawngah nang m'peek bii te a coeng toe van bi seh tila van thui pe uh.”
Pawl lawng kan toei u ti he kamah kut roe oen he capat he ka thut. Thiirui oen n'khih u he van hilh u boel! Pathen lungvatna nangmi sawah awm hawn seh.
Pawl, Silas oen Timote lawngah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah thlaang la aka awm Tesalon khaw kah khrihcabu tengah ca kavan pat u. A lungvatna, ngaimawngna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh.
Nangmi boeih ham Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui u poepa tih ka thangthuina u vengah khaw nangmi te kan poek u yoeyah.

Metihtiah, nangmi lawng na oengna te biibina dawngah na tuengsakna, namami kah lungna lawngah bii ruh m'bi sakna, mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih ah aka cak ngaiuepna na khueh u te Pa Pathen haiah ka hilh u nawh.
Maya manau thli, Pathen lawng nangmi n'lungna tih amah kah thlaang la awm ham n'tuek u poen.

Metihtiah Awlthang Theen te nangmi tengla kavan khuen u vengah awl bueng nawh tih huham tharana oen Ciim Muithla khaw, awltak asoengna te asoepa kavan khuen haih poen. Nangmi tengah ka awm u vengkah kaimi kah khawsakna te na ming u poen; te tah nangmi lawng na theenna ham ni.
Nangmi lawng kaimi oen Bawipa kah moeiboe te na oett u, patangraina yahawh hlang na tawng u vengah khaw, Ciim Muithla tengkah aka law awlthang te awmngaih oen na do u.
Tedawngah nangmi tah Macidonia oen Akhaia khaw kah aka oeng thlaang boeih ham oett koeila na awm u poen.

Metihtiah nangmi teng kalawng aka cet Bawipa kawng awlthang te Macidonia oen Akhaia ram pum bueng ah nawh tih nangmi lawng Pathen na oengna kawng awlthang lawng te peng tawm ah cet khok poen. Tedawngah kaimi lawng thui ham ngoe tlaih nawh.

Nangmi tengah kamyin la ka law u vengkah kaimi metila nan do nan dan u kawng te khaw, kutsaimuei te na hoett u tih Pathen te metila na pan u tite khaw, aka soeng tih aka hing Pathen kah bii te bi ham oen ah,
Vaan kalawng aka law ham a Capa na lamtoen u te khaw ahimi boeih lawng a thui u. A Capa Jesuh tah duekna kalawng a thawh sak tih aka law ham koei Pathen thinsana kalawng mami loeihsakkung ni.
Maya manau thli, nangmi tengah yin la ka law te apoei-oep nawh ni tite namami lawng na ming u.

Tesalon khaaw ah nangmi tengla ka law thlan vengah kaimi he Filipi khaaw ah metihtlukla n'thena u tih raina mai awm cakhaw, amah teng kalawng aka law Awlthang Theen te nangmi tengah thui hamla Pathen lawng kaimi he thincakna m'peek u.
Nangmi tengah kaimi lawng reenna kavan bih u he asoeng nawh oen kawpoek ciimna nawh oen nawh tih, a-u khaw thailatna ham te ka ngaih u nawh dawngah ni.

Pathen lawng kaimi he n'noemcai tih ueppang koei, tueng-aleng a ti dawngah Awlthang Theen thui ham bii m'peek u tih amah lawng thui sak ham a ngaih angla te ka thui u. Kaimi lawng thlaang kah kawtawngna te ka yawm u nawh tih kaimi kah poekna noekdakkung Pathen kaw te tawng ham ni ka yawm u.
Nangmi lawng na ming u angla kaimi lawngah nangmi te koehna awl ka thui u nawh, apueh ngaihmoekna te dahkhoepna awl khaw ka thui u nawh, Pathen tah kaimi kah sausi la awm!
Kaimi lawng nangmi tengkah khaw, thlaangtloe tengkah khawseh koehna te dang ham ka yawm u nawh.

Khrih kah celtuih la ka awm u dawngah te ang te nangmi tengah ka thoehtham thai ngoen ta, tede nangmi tengah ka awm u vengah te a manu lawng a ca a nau thli a dawm athlai angla nangmi te kawdaw boe-ngaaina oen kan dawm u.
Kaimi lawngah nangmi te kan lungduetna dawngah Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen bueng ohla kamami kah hingna pateng khaw peek hamla te oepsoehla ka awm u. Nangmi te kan lungduetna tangkiik u mai!

Maya manau thli, kaimi lawng thatlawh thaboepla bii ka bi u te na hilh nawh cawini! Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen nangmi teng ka thui vengah te nangmi kah thalrih la ka awm nawh ham yiin, daai bii ka bi u.
Nangmi oengca thli oen kaimi kah benbaw benpangna he aka ciim, aka doeng tih thawlhpalhna a awm nawh te nangmi khawseh, Pathen khawseh kaimi kah sausi la na awm u.
Ana pa lawng a ca thli te a dawm a thlai angla nangmi pakhat rip te kaimi lawng kan dawm kan thlai u te na ming u.
Kaimi lawng nangmi te thathluena awl, ngaimawngna awl kavan thui u tih amah Ram oen ah ruep-awmna te paang hamla nangmi khuekung Pathen awmngaihna koei la na hingna u ham kan thuituen u.

Kaimi lawngah Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thuina kawng atloe awm hun. Kaimi lawng Pathen awl te nangmi tengla kavan khuen vengah thlaanghing kah awl angla nawh tih, Pathen kah awl angla te na hutung u tih na do u, te tah ataktang ni. Metihtiah aka oeng nangmi tengah Pathen lawng bii a bi.

Maya manau thli, Judia ram kah Pathen khrihcabu boeih oen Khrih Jesuh kah thlaang thli lawng a tawng u te ang van te, Judah thlaangphun lawng ahimi te a heem a tek van angla nangmi khaw namami ram khui thlaang thli kah heemtekna patang te na khang u.
Judah thlaang thli tah Bawipa Jesuh oen tawngha thli te a ngawn u tih mami heemtekkung la khaw awm u. Ahimi lawng metihtlukla kaw a the sak! Thlaang boeih kah raal la awm u.
Kaimi lawngah thlawnna awl Gental thlaang thli tengah ka thui u te toeng sak hamla ahimi lawng a yawm u. He tila te ahimi lawng thawlh poepa u tih amami kah thawlhna boeih te asoep sak u.
Maya manau thli, thinkaw lungbui oen tah m'pekbo u nawh de pumtaksa oen kawlkalh ah m'pek u vengah he kan ngaai tangkiik u tih nangmi oen huh u koep ham te ka yawm u!
Nangmi tengah law koep ham ka ngaih u. Kamah he law koep ham vaikhat cang nawh ka yawm de Seitan lawng n'kang mangkhak.
Ataktang la, a-u thlaangtloe ohla Bawipa Jesuh a law koep vengah amah haiah taana oen m'pai u vengah tah nangmi he ni kaimi kah ngaiuepna, awmngaihna oen thangpawmna la na awm u ai.
Kaimi kah ruep-awmna oen awmngaihna tangtang tah nangmi ni!
Aboetna atah ka kaw tamte u tlaih nawh tih mami bueng he Aaten khaaw ah awm u mai sih tila awl ka khueng u coengah,
Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen thuina ah kaimi oen Pathen bii aka bi haih van, mami kah manau Timote te kavan tuih u.

He ang heemtekna patang na khang u dawngah nangmi a-u khatca khaw hu benla mel koep nawh ham, nangmi te tha thlue sak ham oen ah nangmi kah oengna te cak sak hamla ahih te kavan tuih u. Mami lawng heemtekna patang n'khang he Pathen kah kawngaihna avaang athal van ni tite namami lawng na ming u.
Nangmi tengah ka awm u vengah te mami lawng heemtekna patang n'khang ai tite kavan thui oepsoeh poen; ka thui angla thoeng khoet tangtang tite na ming u.

Tedawngah ni Timote kavan tuih. Ka kaw tamte tlaih nawh tih nangmi kah oengna kawng te ming ham ka ngaih dawngah ahih te kavan tuih. Nangmi te Seitan lawng n'suek u vetih kaimi kah bii boeih te apoeila coengg hau ai tite ka lakueng.

Tahe ah Timote tah va meel koep poen tih nangmi kah oengna oen lungna kawng awlthang te avan khuen. Kaimi he atheen benla na poek poepa u tih kaimi lawng nangmi te huh kan ngaih u van angla nangmi lawngkhaw kaimi he huh ham na ngaih u van tite avan thui.
Tedawngah maya manau thli, kaimi lawng raina oen thekhana ka tawng cakhaw nangmi kah kawng lawngah ka tha avan thlue sak,
metihtiah nangmi lawngah Bawipa oen pumkhatla hingna dawngah acakla na pai u poen tih tahe ah mami he n'hing tangtang poen.
Tahe atah nangmi kawngah Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil n'thui thai poen. Nangmi kawngah awmngaihna amah haiah n'huh u dawngah amah tengah awmngaih awl ka thui.
Nangmi te pumpakla kan huh thai tih na oengna dawngah angoena te tawm athap hamla thinkaw tang oen yiin daai ka bih poepa.
Nangmi tengah kaimi ka law thaina ham mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh lawngah lawngpui van roek hawn seh!
Nangmi khat oen khat khawseh, thlaang boeih na lungna u te khawseh kaimi lawng nangmi kan lungna abo van angla Pathen lawng van roeng sak tare seh.
He tila nangmi te amah lawng tha avan ra sak vetih Bawipa Jesuh amah kah thlaang boeih oen a law vengah nangmi tah Pa Pathen haiah thlaangsoep thlaangciim la na awm u ai.

Aboetna ah maya manau thli, Pathen kawhoena ham metila na hing u ham a awm tite kaimi tengah na cang u poen. Kaimi tengkah na cang u angla te na hing u hamla awm tih yahawh ngaaila na hingna tare ham Bawipa Jesuh miing oen ah kan ceel u.
Bawipa Jesuh kah saithaina aana oen thuituenna kan peek u te na ming u.
Pathen lawng nangmi te ciim sak ham oen ah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna cipp muelmang sak ham a ngaih.
Nangmi tawngpa boeih lawngah aka ciim tih hinyah koei la na yu oen benbaw benpang ham te ming uh,
Pathen aka ming nawh thlaang hurthok angla pumsa hue-ngaihna oen hing u boel.

Tecoengah he kawngah he a-u lawngkhaw khrihca paya laikoei sawah thawlhpalhna sai boel seh, koeih vaih nawh la proeih mak boel seh. Te tila aka sai boeih tah Pathen lawng dan a peek ai tite kavan thui u tih nangmi te ngaithuenna kan peek u poen.
Pathen lawng mami he cuk-halhna dawngah bawlneeng sak hamla n'khue nawh tih aciim acaihla awm ham ni n'khue u.
Tedawngah a-u khaw he kah cangpueina he aka vai nawh tah thlaanghing te hoett nawh, tede amah kah Ciim Muithla pekung Pathen te ni a hoett poen.
Nangmi lawng aka oeng na paya laikoei thli lungna ham a kawng te capat kavan thut ham ngoe nawh. Nangmi khat oen khat lung u ham Pathen lawng namami te n'cang puei u poen.
Nangmi lawngah ataktangla Macidonia rampum kah maya manau boeih te na lungna u poen. Tedawngah maya manau thli, te tila na lungna u tare ham kan coep kan ceel u.
Kavan thui u poen angla acuep amueihla khawsak ramsak ham poek uh, namami kah bungkhutna dang ham na bii na lawh te tluep ngaithuen uh.
Te atah aka oeng nawh thlaang thli lawngah n'hinyah u vetih na ngoena boeih ah te thlaangtloe sawah pangtung ham ngoe manawh.
Maya manau thli ngaiuepna aka khueh nawh thlaang thli angla nangmi na kaw a the nawh ham aka duek thli kawng awltak te nangmi ming sak hamla ka ngaih.
Jesuh tah duek tih tho koep tite mami lawng n'tangna u, tedawngah amah te oeng ruila a ka duek boeih tah Jesuh oen haih ah Pathen lawng avan khuen koep ai tite mami lawng n'tangna.
Tahe ah nangmi kan cang puei u he tah Bawipa kah cangpueina ni. Bawipa a lawna khawhin ah mami aka hing hue lawngah he aka duek thli te n'khall lettat manawh.
Metihtiah, awlpeekna paang awl, vanthlaang ukkung kah paang awl, Pathen kah pengsara awl oen Bawipa amah te vaan kalawng va rum thuk ai Khrih oeng ruila aka duek thli te lamhala tho u vetih,
tecoengah teveng tue ah aka hing mami tah khawhi ah Bawipa oen huh u hamla muui dawngah ahimi oen n'tun haih ai. Te tila te mami tah Bawipa oen n'awm haih poe poen ai.
Tedawngah he awl oen ah he nangmi pakhat oen khat thaphawh uh.
Maya manau thli, he ang thaihu a thoengna ham atue atang oen khawhin kawng he nangmi tengah ca thut ham ngoe nawh.
Metihtiah Bawipa a lawna Khawhin tah khawyiin ah thlaanghuuen angla law ai tite nangmi lawng atheenla na ming u.

thlaang thli lawngah, “Soeprep boeih tah ding asuek tih ngaimawng ngaitoela awm,” a ti u vengah bawtbet khawlai maiah raina lawng ahimi te a tlaak thil ai! Tattloel hutaa ca-awm tlawhna lawng kawlkalh ah a pha angla te awm vetih a-u thlaang khaw deem manawh.
Tede, maya manau thli, nangmi tah yiinna khuiah na awm u nawh dawngah te khawhin lawngah nangmi te thlaanghuuen angla n'let sak manawh.
Nangmi boeih tah aangna dawngkah thlaang, khawthaih thlaang la na awm u. Mami he tah khawyiin thlaang, yiinna thlaang nawh ni.
Tedawngah mami tah thlaangtloe angla ihdut ham awm nawh, mami lawng hinghang u silang huertuela awm u sih.
Thlaang he tah khawyiin ah ni a ih u, khawyiin ah ni ahimi yuu a ruui u.
Tede mami tah khawthaih thlaang ni, huertuela awm u sih. Mami lawng oengna oen lungna te kahkawng rangphaw la daan u silang tah mami kah ngaiuep thlawnna te thiilumuek la muek u sih.
Pathen lawng amah kah thinsana patang khang sak hamla mami he n'tuek nawh, mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen thlawnna te paang ham ni n'tuek u;
amah a law vengah mami lawng duek ah khaw-seh, hing ah khaw seh amah oen hing haih ham ahih tah mami ham duek.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng tahe ah na sai u angla te khat oen khat thaphawh u langtah khat oen khat bawmcem uh.
Maya manau thli, khrihca hingna oen nangmi thuituen tih lawngpui aka nueh, nangmi tim ah bii aka bi thlaang thli te na hinyah u ham reenna kavan bih.
Ahimi kah biibina dawngah te asangla hinyahna lang lungna uh. Nangmi khat oen khat roeproeicala awm uh.
Maya manau thli, nangmi lawngah thayong thlaang te ngaithuenna pe uh, riyawp thlaang te thincakna pe uh, tha aka yoek thlaang te bawmcem uh, thlaang boeih tengah na kaw daw sak ham kan uen u.
A-u lawngkhaw athe te athe van oen thung u boel, khat oen khat sawah khawseh, thlaang boeih sawah khaw seh theenna te sai hamla poek yoeyah uh.
Awmngaih poepa u lah,
boet ohla thangthui uh,
soeprep boeih ah awmngaih ciil thui uh, Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla na hingna dawngah he tila hing hamla Pathen lawng a ngaih.
Ciim Muithla te kanghalh u boel;
Muithla kah bawnghorhna oen a thui awl te ngaai lakna ohla awm boel.
Soeprep boeih te noekdak uh, atheen te lo uh,
athe thaihu boeih te reel-aram uh.

Ngaimawngna pekung Pathen lawng soeprep ah n'ciim sak u hawn seh, mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih a law vengah nangmi kah pum boeih, na muithla, na hingna, oen pumtaksa te amah lawng kuem selang tah thawlhpalhna boeih kalawng n'loeih sak seh.
Nangmi khuekung te tah uep-awm la a awm dawngah te tila avan sai ai.
Maya manau thli, kaimi ham khaw thangthui uh.
Aka oeng boeih te boenhui angla lungna oen toei uh.
Bawipa kah saithaina aana oen ah he capat he aka oeng thlaang boeih tengah tae pe ham reenna kavan bih.
Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh.
Pawl, Silas oen Timote lawngah mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh kah thlaang thli, Tesalon khaw kah khrihcabu tengah ca kavan pat u.
Mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawngah nangmi te lungvatna, ngaimawngna m'pe hawn seh.

Maya manau thli, nangmi hamla Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui u poepa. Te tila awmngaih ciil thui te aka soeng ni, metihtiah nangmi kah oengna tah roeng hang tangkiik tih nangmi pakhat oen khat na lung u te a roeng hang tare dawngah ni.

Tedawngah nangmi kawng te Pathen kah khrihcabu thli tengah kamami roe lawng ka thangpawmna u. Nangmi lawng heemtekna oen patangraina na khang tangkiik u de na ueh thai u tih na oeng u dawngah kaimi lawng ka thangpawmna u.
He ang thli boeih lawngah Pathen kah awlcekna tah doeng tila a tueng sak tih nangmi tah Pathen Ram oen ah aphu ating-atawkk thlaang la na coengg u ai. Te ham ni nangmi lawng patangraina na khang u.
Pathen lawngtah asoeng ni a sai; nangmi patangraina aka pe thli te patangraina a peek van ai.
nangmi patangraina aka khang thli oen kaimi he khaw hoeikhangna te m'peek ai. He patangraina tah Bawipa Jesuh lawng amah kah thara vanthlaang thli oen ah,
hairawng haialh oen a law vengah, Pathen aka hoett thlaang thli oen mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen aka vai nawh thli te dan a tat ai.
Ahimi lawng dungyan rawkna, dantat patangna te a khang u ai, Bawipa lawng amah kah thlaang boeih teng kah ruep-awmna oen ah amah aka oeng thlaang boeih tengkah hinyahna te dang ham,

a lawna khawhin ah ahimi tah Bawipa teng kalawng ah thek u boeih ai. Nangmi tah kaimi lawng ka phawng awlthang te na tangna u dawngah Bawipa te ruep-awmna oen hinyahna aka pe thlaang thli tim ah na thuum u ai.

Te kawngah ni nangmi ham kaimi ka thangthui u poepa. Amah lawng nangmi n'khuena oen ating atawkk la na hingna u thai ham kaimi lawng mami kah Pathen tengah ka bih u. Pathen lawng amah kah huham tharana oen ah nangmi lawng na ngaih boeih theenna te van soep sak selangtah oengna oen bii na sai te van tluep sak seh.

He tila te mami Bawipa Jesuh miing lawngah nangmi rang oen ah ruep-awmna te a dang vetih, mami kah Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna rang oen nangmi lawngkhaw amah teng kah ruep-awmna te na dang u van ai.
Maya manau thli, mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih a lawna oen amah oen thik at la tun haihna kawngah;

yoeikooek doek la na kawpoek thumhang sak u boel, Bawipa kah Khawhin tah law coeng poen tila aka thui thli kah awl lawngkhaw nangmi te khup plet la n'sai u boel seh tila kan uen u. Te tila a thui awl te thlaang khatsut lawng kaimi kah thuisut awl angla khaw seh, kaimi kah cathut awl angla khawseh a poek u mai ai.
Nangmi te a-u lawngkhaw n'thaina u boel seh. Metihtiah aboetna koek Raal kahna apha thlantoe, hell ah aka tla ham Thlaang The Pui te avan pha thlan khui tah te Khawhin te van pha manawh.

Ahih lawngah pathen a ti boeihboeih oen bokna thaihu boeih te a oel khak vetih amah oen amah te, te thli boeih sawah awm ai. Ahih lawngah Pathen kah Tempal bok-im khuila pateng kuun vetih ngawl ai, ‘kai tah Pathen ni,’ ti ai.
Nangmi lawng na hilh poen aw? Nangmi tengah ka awm vengah he ang thli boeih he kavan thui poen de ta.
Tahe ah he he a thoeng nawh ham ah kanghalhkung pakhat awm, te tah ame ang tite nangmi lawng na ming u. Tecoengah atue apha vengah Thlaangthe Pui tah va thoeng ai.
Ahuepla Thena lawngah bii a bi poen, tede kanghalhkung te khoe la a awm thlan atah Thlaangthe Pui te va thoeng thlan ai.
Tecoengah Thlaangthe Pui te phumpho ai, Tede Bawipa Jesuh a law vengah a kaa khuikah a hill oen Thlaangthe Pui te a ngawn vetih amah kah ruep-awm aangna oen a phe ai.
Thlaangthe Pui lawng Seitan kah huham tharana oen law vetih asoeng nawh kawpoekraina oen kawpoekrai-miknoekna phun soeprep a sai vetih,
aka rawk tih ha-ata ham koei thlaang thli sawah athe soeprep thai alatna te a hawna ai. Ahimi lawngah thlawnna hamla awltak te do u nawh tih a lungna u nawh dawngah ahimi boeih tah ha-ata boeih ai.
Tedawngah asoeng nawh te ahimi lawng a tangna u hamla ahimi tim ah bii aka sai la Pathen lawngah thawlhpalhna huham tharana te a tuih pe tih asoeng nawh te ahimi lawng a tangna u.
Awltak aka tangna nawh tih thawlhna dawngah awmtheen aka boenn thlaang boeih tah awlcekna te a dang ai.

Bawipa lawng a lungna maya manau thli, nangmi kawngah kaimi lawng Bawipa tengah awmngaih awl thui poepa ham awm. Metihtiah Muithla kah huham tharana rang oen Pathen kah aciim thlaanghing la coeng ham oen ah nangmi lawng awltak te na oengna rang oen thlawnna te na dangna u ham Pathen lawng nangmi te lamhacuekla n'tuek u.
He tila thlawnna dang ham kaimi lawng kavan thui Awlthang Theen oen ah nangmi te Pathen lawng n'khue u; mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ruep-awmna te dang ham oen paang van ham ni n'khue.
Tedawngah maya manau thli, kaimi kah phungthuina dawngah khawseh, capat dawngah khawseh pahih bok dawngkah awltak kan cang puei u te phoeih mangkhak u langtah acakla pai uh.
Mami he n'lungna tih aboet nawh thincakna oen acak ngaiuepna te a lungvatna oen pekung mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih amah oen mami kah Pa Pathen lawngah,
atheen te na sai u tih awltheen te thui poepa ham thincakna oen ah tharana te m'pe hawn seh.
Aboetna ah maya manau thli, nangmi tim ah Pathen awlthang te apuung ataai van angla, aloela apuungna ham thangthui uh.
Thlaang boeih lawng awlthang te a tangna u nawh dawngah, thlaangthawlh oen thlaangthe thli kut khui kalawng kaimi he Pathen lawng n'loeih sakna ham khaw thangthui uh.
Tede Bawipa tah uep-awm thlaang la a awm dawngah nangmi te tha avan ra sak vetih Thlaang The Pui kah kut khui kalawng n'phungtu ai.
Bawipa lawng kaimi he nangmi te ueppangna ham m'peek tih kan uepna, kaimi lawng kavan thui te tahe ah na sai u angla hailam ben ah khaw na sai poe u poen ai tila ka tangna.
Nangmi lawng Pathen kah lungna te khawseh, Khrih kah peek uehthaina te khawseh yaakming tare ham ah Bawipa lawng nangmi te m'mawt hawn seh.

Maya manau thli, kaimi kah thuituenna awl te aka vai nawh tih thayong tha-ngak la aka awm maya manau boeih te nangmi lawngah relram hamla mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah kaimi lawng awl kan peek u.
Kaimi lawng bii ka bi u van angla nangmi lawng na bi u van ham awm tite namami lawng atheenla na ming u. Nangmi tengah kaimi ka awm vengah te ka tha yong sut nawh.
Kaimi lawng aphu peek ohla bawmcemna te ayoela ka lo u nawh. Thatlawh thaboepla bii ka bi u; kaimi he nangmi pakhat khat kah thalrih la awm nawh ham khawyiin khawthaih bii ka bi u.
Kaimi lawng te tila ka bi u te nangmi tengah bawmna bih thaina te ka khueh u nawh dawngah moenih ta; kaimi lawng te tila ka bi u te tah nangmi lawng oett ham oen vai hamla ni.
Nangmi teng ka awm u vengah te kaimi lawngah, “A-u khaw bii aka bi nawh tah buh cah u boel,” kan tina u.
Te tila kan tina u te tah nangmi timkah thlaang khatsut tah thayong tha-ngak la awm u tih bii khaw sai ohla thlaangtloe kah biibi te rawlraak thlaang la awm khoeng tite ka yaak u dawngah ni.
Te tila aka awm thlaang thli te acuep amueihla awm ham oen ah amami kah bungkhutna bii te bi ham Bawipa Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah ngaithuenna awl ka peek.
Tede, maya manau thli, nangmi lawngtah atheen thaihu sai te ngak u boel.
He kah capat khuiah aka awm awl he aka vai nawh thlaang khaw awm mai ai. Te ang thlaang te a awm atah noek u langtah ayah laat la a awmna ham ahih oen te benbaw benpang u boel.
Tede, ahih te raal angla tah van ngaai u aih boel; maya manau pakhat van angla te thuituen uh.
Ngaimawngna kungpui Bawipa amah lawngah metuek tue vengah khawseh along a-im phun soeprep oen ah ngaimawngna m'pe hawn seh.
He capat he kamah kut roe oen kavan thut: Kai Pawl lawngah kan toei u. Ka capat roekk dawngah he tila mik-noekna ka thut; he tah kamah kah cathut phung poen ni.
Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh.
Mami kah Thlawnkung Pathen oen mami kah ngaiuepna Khrih Jesuh rang oen ah Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih la aka awm Kai Pawl lawngah:
Oengna ah ka capa tangtang la aka awm Timote nang hamla ca kavan pat. Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawngah lungvatna, reenna oen ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh.
Macidonia ram la ka ceh vengkah awl kan uen angla te Efesa khaaw ah na awm hamla ka ngaih. Thlaang khatsut lawng Efesa khaaw ah asoeng nawh oengna a cang puei u tih ahimi te na toeng sak ham awm.

Awlpuungna bueng aka thoeng sak ciil awl thli oen aka boet nawh nukaw pakaw patuer thli thoepna te ang thli te a toengna u ham thui peh; te ang thli oen ah te oengna oen ming ham koei la aka awm Pathen khawkhanna te n'sai thai nawh.
He tila awl kan peek he mengtengna tah athetheen mingna kawpoek ciim oen oengna tangtang oen ah thinkaw ciim dawng kalawng lungna te a thoengna ham thaphawhna ni.
Thlaang khatsut lawngtah he he a hoett u tih alawng ala nawh awlpuungna benla cet u.

Ahimi lawngah Pathen kah phungawl cangpueikung la coengg ham tah a ngaih u, tede ahimi lawngah amami kah awl-thui te khaw yaakming u nawh tih aka ming ceet angla a thui thaihu kawng te khaw ming u nawh.
Phungawl he atawng aleengla hawna koei ah n'hawna atah theen tite mami lawng m'ming u.

Ming ham tah phungawl he thlaang theen thli hamla sai nawh tih phungawl phekung thli oen lumlai aka hu thli, Pathen aka ming nawh thli oen thlaangthawlh thli ham, bokna ben oen muithla ben tu la aka sak nawh thli ham, a manu oen ana pa aka ngawn thlaang thli ham, thlaang aka ngawn thli ham,

Khawboe the thlaang thli ham, hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai thlaang thli ham, tlangsum caak ngaih ah thlaang aka tu thli ham, hoem thui thli oen asoeng nawh sausi la aka pai thli ham, asoeng oengnakungpui te aka kalh thlaang thli ham ni a sai pe.
Te ang cangpueina te tah kai lawng ka thui ham koei la m'peek awlthang theen dawngah te awm tih, ruep-awm oen theenduet Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen ni.
Bii ka bina dawngah tharana pekung Khrih Jesuh mami kah Bawipa tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui. Kai he amah kah bii bi hamla tueng aleng tila a poek tih bii m'peek dawngah ka uem tangkiik.
N'cui vengah ahih te kai lawng athela ka thui, ka heem ka tek tih thekha la ka sai, kai lawng oengna ka khueh nawh dawngah n'tu ka sai ti khaw ka ming nawh, tede Pathen lawngtah kai he n'reen.

Mami kah bawipa lawngah amah kah lungvatna te yahawh hlang la ka sawah avan lun tih oengna oen lungvatna te m'peek. Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhat la awmna rang oen ah te ang thli te mami kah koe-ava la awm poen.
Khrih Jesuh tah thlaangthawlh thlawn ham dilai la va law ti he tah aka soeng tangtang awl la awm tih lawh koeloe ham koei oen tangna koei ni. Kai tah thlaangthawlh boeih lak ah athe khuet ni;

tede Pathen lawng kai he n'reen tih thlaangthawlh boeih lak ah kai aka the khuet sawah kawdawna a khueh he tah hailam ben ah amah aka oeng tih dungyan hingna aka dang ham koei thlaang boeih kah miknoekna ham ni.
Dungyan Sengpahrang, aka duek thai nawh oen mik oen huh thai nawh pakhat bueng la aka awm Pathen tengah hinyahna oen ruep-awmna tah ayoeyah la awm hawn seh! Amen.

Ka ca Timote, n'hu vengah tawngha lawng nang kah kawng a thui angla te na tengah awl kan peek. Te awl te atheenla raal kahna ham awva la hawna lang na oengna, athetheen mingna kawpoek ciim te cak sak.
Thlaang khatsut lawng athetheen mingna kawpoek te n'tu la sak u nawh tih amami kah a oengna te a phe u.

Te thlaang thli tim ah te Himanias oen Alekzandar khaw thuum hih van tih te rawi te Seitan kut ah ka tloeng tih dan ka peek poen; te tila te ahih rawi lawng Pathen thangthe la a thui te toeng hamla a cang hih ai.
Tedawngah lamhacuek la reenna oen awl kan uen tah, thlaang boeih ham thangthuina, reenbihna, awmngaih awl thuina te Pathen tengah sai uh.
Mami lawng ading asuekla awmna ham, Pathen hinyahna oen ngaimawngla khaw sak tih khawboe ramlang theenna oen awm thaina ham ah sengpahrang thli oen saithaina aana aka khueh boeih ham thangthui uh.
He tah aka theen tih mami Thlawnkung Pathen kah kawhoena ni.
Thlaang boeih he thlawn la awm sak ham oen ah awltak te ming sak hamla a ngaih.
Metihtiah Pathen tah pakhat bueng awm tih Pathen oen thlaanghing laklaw ah roeproeina saikung thlaanghing boeih tlang ham hingna pekung thlaang Khrih Jesuh pakhat bueng awm.
Te tah atue atang apha khuek vengah Pathen lawng thlaang boeih thlawn ham a ngaih te tueng sakna ni.
Tedawngah ni oengna oen awltak kawng awlthang te phawng ham oen ah Gental thlaangphun te cangpueikung celtuih la kai he n'tuih.
Pathen bokna huen roekk ah tawngpa hue lawng a thangthui u ham ka ngaih. Pathen tengah pum aka pe tawngpa hue lawngah thinsanna oen awlpuungna awm ohla thangthui vengah amami kut te a thueng u thai.

Hutaa hue lawngkhaw akhoek anoen atheen khoeng la hinaak himbai te a buen anaak u ham ka ngaih; samtoel samveh te khaw alawnha aihla thloeih athlam ohla, sui kaawntheen oen khaw, latha kaawntheen oen khaw, phutlo hi-acuu oen khaw thoekcau u aih boel seh.
Tede bokna ben ah thinkaw pengnel hutaa hue lawng a sai ham tueng angla te thaihu theen saina oen thoekcau u seh.
Hutaa hue lawng awm duem selang tah awlngaaina oen cang u seh.
Ahimi te cangpueikung la awm ham oen ah tawngpa sawah ukna aana khueh ham khaw ka ngaih nawh; Ahimi te dipsipla awm duem seh.
Metihtiah Adam te a sai lamha coengah ni Evi te a sai.
Tedawngah thailatna la aka awm te Adam nawh ni; hutaa ni thailatna la awm tih Pathen Phungawl te a phe.
Tede hutaa lawngah acuep amueih la oengna, lungna oen ciimna dawngah acakla a awm atah camoe cuunna rang oen ah thlawnna a dang ai.
Thlaang pakhat lawng khrihca mawtkung la awm ham a ngaih atah ahih lawng biibi theen a ngaih ni tila a thui te soeng tangtang.

Khrihcabu mawtkung tah thawlhpalhna aka awm nawh tih a yu khat bueng aka khueh thlaang, mah oen mah aka uk u thai thlaang, mah oen mah kuemsuem thai thlaang, adoengla khaw aka sa thlaang, hinyah koei thlaang; kamyin kamlai aka lungna thlaang, thlaangtloe te riingtuuk thaihoen thai thlaang seh.
Ahih tah yuu aka ruui nawh tih boethe halang nawh thlaang, boe-ngaai kawdaw thlaang, tangka aka ngaih soeh nawh thlaang seh,
amah imkhuikaw ham atheenla khawkhanna aka sai thai oen a ca anau thli lawng hinyahna oen awl a ngaai pe thlaang seh.
Metihtiah amah imkhuikaw ham khawkhanna metila ka sai ai tite a ming nawh atah Pathen kah khrihcabu te metila a doen acaang thai ai?
Ahih tah oengna dawngah kawpoeksoepna aka khueh thlaang seh, tetih atah Seitan angla ahih tah oekthloen u nawh vetih awlcek la awm manawh.
Ahih tah khrihcabu khuiah aka awm nawh thlaang lawngkhaw a hinyah thlaang seh, te atah a thang the nawh vetih seitan kah dong dawngah te man manawh.
Khrihcabu khuikah bawmkung thli khawseh khawboe ramlang aka theen tih kawpoek ciim aka khueh thlaang seh; ahimi tah yuu aka aw nawh tih tangka ngaihmoekna aka khueh nawh thlaang seh;
Ahimi tah athetheen pekbo thaina kawpoek ciim oen oengna awltak aka dung te acakla aka phoeih thlaang la a awm ham awm.
Ahimi te lamhacuek ah noekdak la awm vetih cawttbauh koei a awm nawh atah bi u seh.
A yu thli khaw khawboe ramlang aka theen, thlaang theet awl aka thui nawh, mah oen mah aka uk u thai, soeprep ah thlaangdoeng la aka awm thlaang seh.
Khrihcabu bawmkung tah a yu khat bueng aka khueh tih a ca anau thli oen imkhuikaw ham atheenla khawkhanna aka sai thai thlaang seh.
Amami kah bii te atheenla aka bi bawmkung thli tah a hinyah u vetih Khrih Jesuh a oengna kawng te raltheenla a thui thai ai.
Nangmi ham capat kavan thut vengah he nangmi tengah ayuela law ham oen nangmi te huh hamla ka ngaiuep.
Tede ka law haai nawh oh atah aka hing Pathen kah khrihcabu, tuungtang la aka pai tih awltak aka hing puei, Pathen imkhuikaw ah mami lawng metila khaw n'sak ai tite he capat lawngah avan thui ai.

Mami kah bokna dawngah aka awm alenduet awlhuep he a-u lawngkhaw oelhtaih thai manawh; Ahih tah thlaanghing pumsa la va thoeng, soeng tangtang tite muithla lawng a tueng sak, vanthlaang thli lawng a huh u, Ahih kawng te thlaangphun boeih tengah a thui u tih dilai peng tawm thlaang lawng a oeng u, tecoengah ahih tah vaan la luui hang poen.
Hailam ben atah thlaang khatsut lawngah oengna te a hoett u ai tila Muithla lawng aciimphanla a thui; ahimi lawngah hoem thui muithla awl te a ngaai u vetih raaithe kah cangpueina te a vai u poen ai.
Te ang cangpueina te tah thiiling haialh oen a ung sak angla athetheen pekbona kawpoek aka duek moelh sut thlaangthaipalat hoem thui hue lawngah a puung adaw sak u.

Te ang thlaang thli lawngah yu lawh vaa sak nawh ham oen khatsut caak awkk te yeh ham a cang puei u. Tede aka oeng thlaang thli oen awltak aka ming tangte thlaang thli lawngtah awmngaih oen thangthui coengah caak hamla caak awkk thli te Pathen lawng a sai.
Soeprep boeih Pathen lawng a sai he tah theen; khat khaw hoett ham awm nawh, tede soeprep boeih he awmngaih thangthuina oen do ham awm,
metihtiah Pathen awl lawngkhaw, thangthuina lawngkhaw Pathen kah do ham koeila te a sai.

He kah thuituenna thli he maya manau thli tengah na thui pe atah nang tah Khrih Jesuh kah atheen tuihyoeihthlaang la na awm ai; namah oen namah muithla ben na cawm na cah u van angla te oengna awl oen aka soeng cangpueina namah lawng na vai te hawna lah.
Tede Pathen kawng alam aka awm nawh tih thui ham koeihvaih nawh ciil awl te tah reel-aram hawn. Pathen kawngaih la hing ham namah oen namah te phep uh.
Pumsa oen cangna he aphu tah awm thoem van, tede muithla ben cangna lawngtah soeprep ah aphu awm, metihtiah, tahe veng hingna ham khaw, hailam ben hingna ham khaw pahih bok hamla awl a kam.
He tah aka soeng tangtang awl la awm tih do koeloe ham oen ah tangna khaklal ham awm.
Mami lawngah he thlaang boeih thlawnkung, awlpuila aka oeng thlaang thli kah thlawnkung aka hing Pathen dawngah ngaiuepna te n'khueh u tih mami lawng patangplai oen arai acaangla bii m'bi u.
He thuituenna oen cangpueina thli he thui peh.

Roengthaai kum no la na awm dawngah nang te a-u lawngkhaw dapsit la n'hu boel seh; tede na awlthui thingkaa khaw, na khawboe ramlang khaw, lungna, oengna oen ciimcaihna khaw aka oeng thlaang thli ham oett koei la awm seh.
Kai ka law thlantoe tah rangpui tengah Caciim teena, phungthuina oen cangpueina te yawm langtah atue na khueh boeih te hawna lah.
Tawngha thli lawng awl avan thui tih ahaamca thli lawng na sawah kut avan tloeng vengah nang lawng na dang muithla ben kutdo te dalra thlothlamna boel.
Thlaang boeih lawng nang kah na bi na lawh a roeng hang te a huhna u thai ham hawna langtah thathluela te thli te sai lah.

Namah oen namah te ngaithuen lang na cang puei te khaw ngaithuen lah. He thaihu boeih he toeng ohla sai, metihtiah nang lawng na sai atah namah oen namah khaw, na awl-thui hutung thlaang thli te khaw pahih bok la na thlawn thai ai.
Kum haam tawngpa thli te ho boel, ahimi te na pa angla hoelh amaihla voemtoei lah. Kum no tawngpa te na nau angla thloep-hoelh lang,
kum haam hutaa thli te na nu angla ngaai langtah, kum no hutaa thli te kawpoek ciim oen na ngannu angla ngaai lang voemtoei lah.
Amah bueng ah khaw aka sa huhai thli te van hinyah.

Tede huhainu pakhat khat lawng a ca thli khawseh, tihnawhtah a ca kah ca-anau thli khaw a khueh atah amami kah imkhuikaw te bokna phung angla cawmcah ham lamhacuekla cang u seh, te tila te a manu oen ana pa khaw, nu haam pahaam thli kah cuun acahna te khaw a thung pe thai ai. Metihtiah he tah Pathen kah kawhoena ni.
Amah bueng aka awm tih ahih te cawmcah hamla aka khueh nawh huhai tumtee lawngtah a ngaiuepna te Pathen ah kang a khueh tih yiin daai thangthui tih bawmna a bih.
Tede pumsa awmtheen awmyaalna aka boenn huhai tumtee thli tah hing van ruung mai de aka duek poen ni.
Ahimi te a-u lawngkhaw a thuitheet nawh ham he kah thuituenna he thui peh.
Tede thlaang pakhat khat lawng amah kah a cakaw te awlpuila amah imkhuikaw te a cawm acah nawh atah oengna te aka hoett thlaang la awm tih aka oeng nawh thlaang lak ah pateng khaw the-eep ngaai.
Huhai pakhat te a kum sawmruk a kuep thlan atah huhai tumtee thli kah cayin cabu dawngah thuum sak boel. Cayin cabu dawngah aka thuum ham tah vai khat bueng vaa aka sa huhainu te thuum seh.

Thaihu theen saina, ca-anau thli atheenla cawm-acahna, kamyin kam lai lungna, khrihca paya laikoei thli ham bii aka yawm, khawdeng lungma thlaang aka bawm, thaihu theen saina dawngah miing theenna aka dang huhainu te thuum seh.
Tede kumno huhainu thli te cayin cabu dawngah thuum sak boel; metihtiah ahimi tah amami kah pumsa ngaihna dawngah vaa sak ham a ngaih tih Khrih te a mangthawng taak u tih,
Khrih tengah amami kah awlkamcuek te a phe u.
Ahimi lawngah im khat coeng im khat yingyawi paithle u tih atue atang te a poeih alak u; te lak ah athe-eep ngaai tah thlaang a thuitheet u tih thlaang alawl ala u, thui koei nawh te a thui u.

Tedawngah mami aka raalna thlaang thli lawng mami kawng he athela thuina tue khaw a dang nawh ham kumno huhai tumtee hue lawng vaa a sak tih ca-anau khueh ham, amami kah imkhuikaw te a cawm acah u ham ka ngaih.
Metihtiah khatsut huhai tumtee lawngtah meel koep u tih Seitan hu ah bang u poen.

Tede khrihca hutaa pakhat lawng imkhuikaw ah huhai tumtee pakhat a khueh atah amah lawng cawm a cah selang tah khrihcabu kah thalrih la khueh boel seh; tetih dengah ni amah bueng aka awm huhai tumtee thli te khrihcabu lawng a tu-acaa thai ai.
Mawtkung angla bii atheenla aka bi ahaamca lawngtah thapang te arepla a dang ham awm, awlpuila phungthuina oen cangpueina aka yawm lawng thapang a dang ngaai ham awm.
Metihtiah caciim lawngah, “vaitaw te caang a tiil lii vengah a kaa cuett pe boel, ti tih bii aka bi lawng thapang te a dang ham awm, tila a thui.
Ahaamca thawlh a peel u te aka mingkung sausi pahih, pathum a awm nawh atah hutung pe boel.
Thlaangtloe hue lawngkhaw thawlh sai a rihna van ham thawlhna aka sai boeih te rangpui haiah toelthaam peh.
Na saina boeih dawngah a-u tengah khaw pekbona oen mik-hai dan muehla na sai ham, thuituenna he nang lawng na vai hamla Pathen oen Khrih Jesuh oen ah aciim vanthlaang haiah ceetceet kan uen.
Bawipa kah biibina ah pumpeekna sai ham a-u tengah khaw tot-alet la na kut van tloeng praap boel. Thlaangtloe kah thawlh saina dawngah thuum boel; nang tah acuemsuekla va awm lah.
Nang tah na sa a ding nawh taitu dawngah tui bueng te aw boel lang na bung a raawina ham misurtui te ayawl akaai tah bet ah aw mai hawn.
Thlaang khatsut kah thawlhna tah tueng pheng tih amami haiah a thawlhna lawng awlcekna ah cet doen poen; tede thlaangtloe khatsut kah thawlhna tah hu-aha dengah tueng.
Tetihvan angla thaihu theen sai he khaw tueng pheng tih huh thai koeila aka awm thlan te khaw thuh thai la awm manawh.
Sal tamnaa la aka awm thli lawngah namami kah bawimanghai thli te hinyah peek tueng koeila a poek u ham awm, te dengah ni a-u lawngkhaw Pathen miing oen kaimi kah cangpueina te athela a thui nawh ai.

Bawimanghai thli te khrihca la a awm u atah ahimi khaw mami kah maya manau la awm van poen ti u boel selang sal thli lawngah te hinyah ohla awm u boel seh. Ahimi kah bii te atheenla a bi pe tare ham awm. Metihtiah ahimi kah biibina rang oen hoeikhangna aka dang te tah ahimi lawng a lungna khrihca thli van ni.

He thaihu thli he nang lawng cang puei langtah thui peh. A-u khaw mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah aka soeng awl oen mami kah bokna phung cangpueina oen ah aka vai u nawh oengnakungpui alakloe te aka cang puei tah,

Oekk-thloen u tih n'tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang ni. Ahih lawngah awllung kawngah oelhtaih u ham oen tawhsi ngaihna kawpoek theen nawh te a khueh tih, he lawngah uett-eena, awlpuungna, thekhana, atheen nawh uepvoetna, aboet tlaih nawh awlpuungna te a thoeng sak,
he tila aka awm thli tah kawpoek soeng tlaih nawh tih awltak te aka khueh tlaih nawh thlaang poen ni. Ahimi lawngah bokna he kuirang la coenggna lawngpui la a poek u.
Thlaang lawngah amah kah a khueh duen oen ah ngaikhuekna te a awm atah bokna lawngah thlaang he kuirang thlaanglen la a coengg sak tangtang.
Mami lawng dilai dawngla n'van khuen u khat khaw awm nawh! Dilai dawngkah n'tu n'khuen thai ai? Khat khaw n'khuen thai manawh!
Tedawngah mami lawng caak awkk oen hinaak himbai n'khueh atah tete mami ham khoek mai poen.
Tede kuirang la coengg ham aka ngaih thli tah suek-halhna khuiah tla u, ngau-athuuna soeprep oen rih awm hue-ngaihna dong dawngah man u tih te lawngah ahimi te sungna oen rawkna benla te a ceh puei.

Metihtiah tangka ngaih soeh aih he tah athe phun soeprep a thoengna kungpui ni. Thlaang khatsut tah tangka khueh moek a ngaih dawngah oengna te a ceh taak u tih kawthena acungkuem oen a thinkaw lungbui a rek sak u.
Tede nang tah Pathen kah thlaang la na awm dawngah he thaihu thli boeih he rel-aram hawn. Doengna, Pathen hinyahna, oengna, lungna, uehthaina oen kawdawna te khueh hamla yawm lah.

Oengna loeh-lang taana poei ah na tha khueh boeih oen heng lang dungyan hingna te namah ham lo lah; Pathen lawng nang n'khue tih mingpueikung sausi thlaang yahawh haiah na oengna te acakcala na phawng te tah dungyan hingna te huh sak ham ni.
Thaihu boeih hingna pekung Pathen haiah khaw, Pontias Pilat haiah a oengna acakcala aka phawng Jesuh haiah nang he awl kan uen.
Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah Khawhin te a pha thlantoe awl kan peek he atheenla vai.
Amah a lawkoepna tah bawi boeih kah Bawi, sengpahrang boeih kah Sengpahrang, aka theenduet tih pakhat bueng ukkung la aka awm Pathen lawngah atue atang a khoek tluep vengah avan pha sak ai.

Ahih bueng he ni aka duek thai nawh; a-u lawngkhaw a tengah yoeii mare thai nawh aangna khuiah te awm. Ahih te a-u lawngkhaw hu vai nawh; a-u lawngkhaw hu thai manawh. Amah tengah hinyahna oen dungyan ukna aana tah awm hawn seh! Amen.

He hing khuiah thaihu thaiha khuehtoenna oen aka len muep thli te oekthloen nawh ham van thui peh. Te ang ueptapna aka awm nawh thaihu khuehtoenna dawngah ngaiuepna khueh u boel seh. Tede mami awmngaihna ham haih muehla soeprep pekung Pathen dawngah te ngaiuepna khueh u seh.
Ahimi lawngah atheen thaihu sai ham, bii theen te bina oen kuirang la awmna u ham, moeihoeihla thlaangtloe a do adan thaina u ham van thui peh.
He tila te ahimi lawngah kaawntheen te amami ham a tung asep u vetih te tah hailam ben ham akung cak ai. Te tila ahimi lawng hingna te a dang thai vetih te tah hingna tangtang la awm ai.

Timote, nang lawng khoem abeel ham na kut dawngah avan tloeng boeih te atheenla kuem. Pathen hinyahna aka awm nawh awlthuina oen ngau-athuu awlpuungna, thlaang khatsut lawng asoeng nawh la, “Cuihna” a ti u te reel-aram hawn.
Thlaang khatsut lawng atah te ang cuihna te ka khueh ti u tih oengna lawngpui te a hang u poen. Pathen kah lungvatna nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh.
Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen awl avan kam hingna mami lawng n'khueh te phawng hamla tuih la aka awm, Pathen kah kawngaihna oen Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih la aka awm kai Pawl lawngah,
Ka lungna ka capa Timote nang tengah ca kavan pat: Pa Pathen oen mami Bawipa Khrih Jesuh lawngah nang te lungvatna, reenna, oen ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh.

Patuer thli lawngah bii a bi pe angla kai lawngkhaw thinkaw ciim oen ka bi pe van Pathen tengah awmngaih awl ka thui. Yiin oen daai ka thangthuina dawngah nang te kan poek yoeyah tih awmngaih ciil ka thui.
Nang kah mikphi te ka hilh nawh tih awmngaihna oen ka betoet thaina ham nang te huh ham ka ngaih tangkiik.
Na nuhaam Loisi oen na nu Yunis lawng a khueh oengna tangtang te ang van te nang lawngkhaw na khueh van tila ka poek, tahe ah khaw na khueh tite ka tangna.
Tedawngah, na sawah kut kavan tloeng vengah Pathen kah peek kutdo te na hing sak poe hamla koep kavan thui.
Metihtiah Pathen kah peek Muithla lawngah mami he riyawp thlaang la n'sai nawh; ahih kah Muithla lawngtah mami he huham tharana, lungna, mah oen mah kuemsuemna oen ah m'betoet sak dai.

Tecoengah mami kah Bawipa kawng te thui hamla yak boel; Khrih kawngah thong aka tla kai kah kawngah khaw yak boel. Pathen lawng tharana m'peek angla te Awlthang Theen hamla khawdeng patang khang hawn.
Pathen lawng mami he amah thlaang la awm ham n'thlawn tih n'khue u, te tah mami kah saina dawngah nawh tih, a lungvatna tah atue a tong thlan veng kalawng Khrih Jesuh rang oen m'peek poen,

tede tahe tah, mami Thlawnkung Khrih Jesuh a lawna rang oen te lungvatna te avan tueng sak poen. Ahih lawng ah duekna tharana te aboet sak poen tih aka duek thai nawh hingna te awlthang theen rang oen avan tueng sak poen.
Pathen lawng Awlthang Theen phawngkung la kai he celtuih la khaw, cangpueikung la khaw n'khueh poen,

te dawngah ni kai lawngah he ang khawdeng patang he ka khang. Tede kai tah ka ngaai mawng, metihtiah kai lawngah a-u ka uepna tite ka ming tih ka kut dawngah avan tloeng thaihu te tah te Khawhin toe ah amah lawngah anepla avan kuem ai tite ka tangna.

Kai lawng kan cang puei aka soeng awl te acakla phoeih lang nang lawng na vai ham oen oett ham koeila te khueh, Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah mami kah thaihu la aka awm oengna oen lungna dawngah te acakla awm.
Mami khuiah aka hing Ciim Muithla kah tharana rang oen ah nang tengah avan tloeng thaihu theen te anepla kuem-akawl.
Asia ram khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih lawngah, Fikela oen Hamokin lawngkhaw kai he n'thlah sut u poen tite nangmi lawng na ming u.
Onisiforas lawngah boehoengla ka kaw avan hoe sak dawngah Bawipa lawng a imkhuikaw te reen hawn seh. Ahih lawngtah thong ka tlaak khaw yah puei nawh,
Rom khaaw la avan pha tih a paipuek ah kai he n'huh thlantoe n'tlap khiing.
Te khawhin ah Bawipa lawng ahih te reen hawn seh! Efesa khaaw ah kai ham metihtlukla bii a bi tite nangmi lawng atheenla na ming u.
Ka capa nang tah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhat la awmna rang oen n'dang u lungvatna dawngah acakla awm lah.
Mingpueikung Sausi boehoeng kah haiah ka thui cangpueina te na yaak poen. Thlaangtloe te patoeng aka cang puei thai van ueppangkoei thlaang tengah te thui peh.
Khrih Jesuh kah thincak raalkap la na awm van angla khawdeng patang te khang hawn.
Raalkap bii aka bi lawngtah raalbawi te a kaw hoe sak ham a ngaih tih raalkap la aka awm nawh thlaangthoet kah bii dawngah te poei apah tawmban nawh.
Loehlangna poei ah aka loeh u thlaang pakhat lawng loehlangna phung-alam te a vai nawh atah kutdo dang thai nawh.
Thatlawh thaboep la bii aka bi lotoen thlaang lawngah amah lo kah caangthaih te a caak lamha ham awm.
Awl kavan thui he atheenla poek, metihtiah he awl he boeih yaakming thaina te Bawipa lawng m'peek ai.
Awlthang theen dawngkah ka thui angla Devid cadil duekna kalawng aka tho koep Jesuh te hilh boel.
Metihtiah kai lawng Awlthang Theen ka phawng dawngah patang ka khang tih lumlai aka hu thlaanghuuen angla thiirui oen n'khih u. Tede Pathen kah awl tah thiirui oen khit thai nawh.
Tedawngah Pathen kah thlaangtuek thli lawngtah Khrih Jesuh teng kalawng aka law thlawnna te a dang u tih dungyan ruep-awmna te a pangna u ham patang raina boeih boeih he ka ueh.
Adangkah awl he aka soeng ni: “Amah oen n'duek haih atah amah oen n'hing haih van ai.
Mami lawng ueh thai mangkhak atah mami khaw amah oen haih ukkung la n'awm ai. Amah te n'hoett atah mami he n'hoett van ai.
Mami lawng uep-awm la n'awm nawh cakhaw Ahih tah uep-awm la awm yoeyah, metihtiah ahih tah amah oen amah te thai-alat u thai nawh.”

He he na thlaang thli tengah thui pe langtah awllung awllep mailai ah oelh u khiing nawh ham Pathen haiah ngaithuenna te peh. Tede atheen thaihu nawh ni, awl a hutung thlaang thli te ni a rawk sak khoeng.
Nang tah bii aka yah puei nawh, Pathen kah awltak te asoengla aka cangpueikung la na awm van angla Pathen kawtlaakna te na dangna ham yawm lah.
Pathen hinyahna aka awm nawh tih ngau-athuu awl oelhna te reel-aram lah, te ang awlkaa lawngah te Pathen teng kalawng athlathloeila ni thlaang a thak khoeng mai.
Te ang cangpueina te tah thi-asa aka rong sak vueihacang-ing oen ah lo u. Te ang thaihu aka cang puei thlaang pahih rawi te tah Himenia oen Filitas ni.
Ahih rawi lawng awltak lawngpui te a ceh taak hih tih, thawhkoepna tah awm coeng poen, tila a thui hih dawngah thlaang khatsut kah oengna te plet-plawng la a sai hih.

Tede Pathen lawng lungdang a suem te tah cak khak tih hinghuen thai nawh, te sawah te he awl he a thut: “Bawipa lawng amah kah thlaang la aka awm te a ming” tila khaw, “Bawipa kah thlaang la ka awm a ti lawngtah athe saina te a toeng ham awm,” tila te a thut.

lmpui phulum khuiah um, am thaihu acungkuem awm: khatsut te tah sui, ngun oen a sai tih atloe te tah thing oen a sai khaw awm tih amlai oen a sai khaw awm; khatsut tah khawniingtuikaa ah hawna ham tih atloe te tah awmthoet awmroelh ah hawna ham ni.

A-u khaw athe thaihu boeih te a ceh taak tih aciim acaihla aka awm tah bii phutlo dawngah a hawna ai, metihtiah ahih tah thloeng u tih thaihu theen sai ham oepsoehla aka toen u tih a bawipa kah hawna koeila a awm dawngah ni.

Roengthaai thawhthuem kah pumsa ngaihna te vai boel langtah thinkaw ciim oen Bawipa a khue tih bawmna aka bih thlaang thli oen ah thik at la doengna, oengna, lungna oen ngaimawngna dang hamla yawm lah.
Tede ngau-athuuna oen mingtung plau nawh awlpuungna te reel-aram hawn; te ang lawngtah tawhsina ni a thoeng sak tite nang lawng na ming.
Bawipa kah tuihyoeihthlaang tah tawhsi u ham awm nawh. Ahih tah thlaang boeih aka reen, kawdaw thlaang, cangpueikung saya theen la awm ham ni,
amah aka ngaih nawh thlaang thli te lunghoeih lungpaih la toelthaam ham awm. Tetih atah ahimi te Pathen lawngah thawlh yutna atue theen a peek vetih awltak te a ming u ai.
Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng a cuih a khueh u vetih ahimi te aka tu khak tih amah kah kawngaih vai sak ham aka saikung Seitan kah dong dawngah man nawh vetih loeih ai.
Hukhueng koek khawhin tah raina atue poen ni tite hilh boel.

Thlaang lawngah he, amah ham bueng poekna, ngaihmoekna, a khueh u vetih oekthloenna oen amah oen amah pawmsang u ai; ahimi tah thlaang thekhana, a manu oen ana pa awl aka ngaai nawh, lungvatna aka ming nawh tih bokna ben tula aka ngaai nawh thlaang la awm u ai;
ahimi tah reenna aka khueh nawh, thlaangtlung-pathang, thlaang thuitheet thlaang, boethe halang thlaang, halang cingpoh thlaang la awm u vetih ahimi lawng thaihu theen te a thina ai;
ahimi tah awl aka cak nawh thlaang, maru-marat thintoi thlaang, kawpoek sang oen aka hoell u thlaang la awm u vetih; Pathen te lungna lak ah awmtheen awmyaal boenn-atlaak te a lungna ngaai ai,
ahimi lawngah bokna phung he asaw ahan ah a phoeih u, tede akhuiben kah tharana tangtang te tah a hoett u. Te ang thlaang thli te tah reel-aram hawn.

Ahimi khatsut lawngah thlaang im thlaang lo ah kuun u tih a kaw aka cak nawh hutaa-tumphai, amami kah thawlhna thalrih lawng a namm tih pumsa ngaihna phun soeprep lawng a mawt hutaa hue te tah doelh a thloeih tih a tuuk u thai,
te hutaa hue lawng awltak te cang hamla a yawm poepa u, tede ahimi tah awltak te metuek khaw aka ming thai tlaih nawh poen ni.

Janni oen Jambri lawng Mosi te a oelh a taih hih angla he thlaang thli lawngkhaw awltak te a oelh a taih u, ahimi tah a kawpoek lawng bii aka bi tlaih nawh lungmong thlaang la awm u tih oengna ben ah dok u poen.
Tecakhaw ahimi kah saina te tah athlathloeila pha manawh, metihtiah thlaang boeih lawngah ahimi metihtlukla a ngau-athuu u tite a ming ai. Janni oen Jambri khaw te tila ni a awm hih van.
Tede nang lawngtah kai kah cangpueina, khawboe ramlang oen ka hingna dawngah ka mengtengna te na vai poen. Nang lawngtah ka oengna, kawdawna, lungna, uehthaina,

heem-atek la ka awmna oen patang ka khangna boeih te na ming poen. Antiok, Ikoniam oen Listra khaaw ah mueirihtamyiin, khawdeng patang heemtekna ka sawah aka thoeng te nang lawngah boeih na ming. Tede Bawipa lawng te ang thli boeih dawng kalawng n'loeih sak.
A-u khaw Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen Pathen kawngaih la hing ham aka ngaih tah heemtekna patang te a khang ai;
tede thlaang the thli oen thlaangthaipalat thli kah the-arana tah khuet la khuet ai; thlaangtloe te athai alatna vetih amah te khaw a thai alatna u van ai.
Tede nang tah, na cang tangte tih acakla na oeng awltak dawngah te awm poe lah. Nang cangpueikung thli a-u tite namah lawng na ming;
Na camaw veng kalawng ah Aciim Baibal awl na ming poen tite hilh boel. Te Caciim lawngah Khrih Jesuh oengna rang oen thlawnna benla mawtkung cuihna te m'peek thai.
Caciim boeih he Pathen hillsang la awm tih awltak cangpueina ham, toelthaamna ham, thawlhpalhna te tlaihvawngna ham, asoengla khawsakna ham ah thuituenna la aphu awm,
te ah ni Pathen bii aka bi thlaang lawngah thoemthaina soep vetih thaihu theen phun soeprep sai hamla phawlip te asoepcala a khueh ai.
Thlaangduek oen thlaanghing awl aka cek ham koei Khrih Jesuh oen Pathen haiah awl ceetceet kan uen. Metihtiah ahih tah Sengpahrang angla uk ham law koep ai.

Tedawngah awlthang te thui lah, (atue atang alawlh amaih ah khaw, alawlh amaih nawh ah khaw) awlthang te thui ngaikhoek. A yaakming thaina ham thui peh, toel-thaam ham angoe atah siim langtah, thaphawh ham angoe atah thathluena awl thui peh, kawdaw thinsan oen cang puei.

Thlaang rangpui lawngah asoeng oengnakungpui cangpueina te hutung ngaih nawh la a awmna atue atang te apha ai, tede amami kah ngaihna te a vai vetih amami kah yaak ngaih bueng te aka thui hamla cangpueikung yahawh hlang te amami ham a cawi ai.
Ahimi lawng awltak te hutung ohla a mangthawng taak vetih ciil awl mailai te hutung ham a ngaih u ai.

Tede nang tah me ang akawng alam dawngah khawseh namah oen namah te kuemsuem uh, patang palai te ueh hawn, Awlthang Theen phawngkung la na awmna bii te bi langtah Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang la na awm van angla na bi koei boeih te sai.
Kai ham tah ka hingna he luciik la thawthueng ham atue apha poen; he dilai hingna he ceh taak ham tahe ah atue khoek poen.
Loehlangna poei ah khaw ka tha khueh boeih oen ka yawm poen, athla hlang aboet kheng toela ka heeng poen; oengna te ka phoeih rapsaat poen.

Tahe tah, adoengla aka hing thli a peek taana kutdo lawng te kai he n'ring poen, te kutdo te tah, Bawipa lawngah, te Khawhin ah te m'peek ai, kai bueng he m'pe manawh, amah a lawna te lungna oen a lamtoen thlaang boeih te a peek ai.
Ka tengah ayuela law ham van yawm.
Dema lawngtah dilai he a thintlawhna dawngah kai he n'ceh taak tih Tesalon khaw la cet poen. Kresen tah Galati ram la cet tih Titas tah Dalmatia ram la cet.
Luka bueng he ka tengah awm. Mark te van law puei, ahih tah kai he bii aka bawmkung ni.
Taikhikas tah Efesa khaaw la ka tuih.
Na law vengah Troas khaaw kah Karpas im ah ka ceh taak angki dung te van khuen; cabu thli te khaw van khuen, awlpuila saphaw oen a sai te van khuen.
Thiide Alekzandar lawngah ka sawah raina avan sai; amah kah a saina angla Bawipa lawng kutdo a peek ai.
Ahih tengah te namah oen namah ngaithuen uh, metihtiah ahih lawngah mami kah awlthang te a oelh khaklal.
Lamhacuek awlcekna ah kamah oen kamah ka phungtu u vengah te a-u khat lawngkhaw m'pai puei nawh; n'ceh taak boeih u. Ahimi sawah athela Pathen lawng poek mai boel seh!
Tede kai lawngah awlthang asoepla ka phawng thaina ham oen ah Gental thlaang boeih lawng a yaakna ham Bawipa lawng n'awm puei tih tharana m'peek, tedawngah duekna dawng kalawng ka loeih.
Bawipa lawng athe-arana boeih kalawng n'loeih sak tih amah kah vaan Ram ah te adingsuekla n'ceh puei ai. Amah tengah ruep-awmna dungyan toe awm hawn seh! Amen.
Priscilla oen Akuila khaw, Onisitoras cakaw khaw kan toei u.
Erastas tah Kawrin khaaw ah awm tih Trofimas tah atlawh dawngah Militas khaaw ah ka ceh taak.
Sikding a pha thlan ah law hamla van yawm. Jubulas, Puden, Linu oen Klaudia mi lawngkhaw atloe khrihca boenhui boeih lawng nang te n'toei u.
Bawipa tah na thinkaw lungbui ah awm seh. Pathen lungvatna nangmi boeih sawah awm seh.

Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang oen Jesuh Khrih kah celtuih kai Pawl lawng ca kavan pat. Pathen lawng a tuek thlaang thli kah oengna cak sak ham oen mami kah bokna oen awltak cangna ah ahimi te mawt hamla tuek la ka awm tih n'tuih.
Mami kah bokna tah dungyan hingna ngaiuepna dawngah kung a sut. Hoem awl aka thui nawh, Pathen lawng dilai a suen thlan veng kalawng he hingna he mami peek ham awl a kam poen tih;
atue akhoek tluep vengah te dungyan hingna te amah lawng awlthang dawngah avan tueng sak. Kai he ng'uepna dawngah bii he m'peek tih mami thlawnkung Pathen kah awlpeek angla kai lawng ka phawng.
Mami cuutna u oengna dawngah ka ca taktakla aka awm Titas, nang tengah ca kavan pat. Pa Pathen oen mami thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih lawngah lungvatna, ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh.
Krit tuisanglak ah kan ceh taak he tahe toe sai ham angoe thaihu thli te sai ham oen khaaw roekk ah khrihcabu ahaamca khueh sak ham ni. Awl kan uen te hilh boel.

Ahaamca tah cawtbauh aka awm nawh thlaang seh; ahih tah a yu khat bueng aka khueh thlaang, a ca thli khaw Pathen aka oeng thlaang la awm u vetih cingpoh halang oen awl ngaaina nawh ben ah miing aka tueng nawh thlaang la awm seh.

Metihtiah Khrihcabu mawtkung tah Pathen kah biitungpui khuehkung la a awm dawngah cawttbauh aka kap nawh thlaang seh. Ahih tah amah oen amah thoemthai koek la aka ngaai u nawh, thin aka toi nawh, yuu aka aw nawh, khawpaw rang-au la aka awm nawh, tangka ngaihmoekna aka khueh nawh thlaang seh.
Ahih tah kamyin aka lungna oen thaihu theen aka ngaih thlaang seh. Ahih tah amah oen amah kuemsuem thai, thlaangdoeng, thlaangciim oen khawboe aka theen thlaang seh.

Oengnakungpui oen avai u la ueppang koei, awlthang te acakla aka phoeih thlaang seh. Teah ni ahih lawng aka soeng cangpueina oen tha a peek thai vetih asoeng cangpueina aka oelhtaih thli kah thawlhpalhna khaw a tueng sak thai ai.
Metihtiah, awlpuila Judah bokna kalawng Khrihca la aka kuun thli tim ah awlhong awlhii oen thlaangtloe te a oelh ataih tih thlaang aka thailatna yahawh ngaai awm.

Te ang thlaang thli te awlthui toeng sak ham angoe; metihtiah, ahimi lawng cang puei koei nawh te a cang puei dawngah imkhuikaw boeih te a thek u, te tila a cang puei boeih te yaraula aka awm tangka dang ngaih maiah ni.
Amah Krit thlaang, amami kah tawngha thli khuikah pakhat awltak aka thui lawng a thui vengah “Krit thlaang thli tah hoem aka thui poepa athe satluung oen thayong thlaang, caruutpui thli ni”
tila a thui he soeng tangtang. Tedawngah, he kawng ah he ahimi te atlawh ngaaila toelthaam lah, tetih atah ahimi lawng sa aka ding oengna te a khueh u vetih,
Judah thli kah ciil awl mailai oen awltak aka hoett thli tengah aka thoeng thlaanghing awlpeek thli te pawm u tlaih manawh.
Thlaangciim hamla tah soeprep boeih he ciim, tede tuiilehkap thlaang thli oen oeng nawh thlaang thli hamla tah a lungbui oen athe atheen mingna thinkaw tuiilehkap lawngah te n'tu khaw ciim sak nawh.
Amami lawngtah Pathen ka ming ti u de a saina oen a hoett u, thaihu theen khat khaw sai ham aka koeih tlaih nawh thlaang thli poen ni.
Tede nang lawngtah asoeng oengna-kungpui oen avai u la cang puei.
Tawngpa kum haam hue te amah oen amah kuemsuem uh, asoeng oengna dawngah awm uh, lungna oen uehthaina khueh uh, tila te thuituen.

Tetih van la te kum haam nunu thli te khaw hutaa kah awm ih phung angla aciim hingna oen aka awm hutaa la awm ham thuituen. Ahimi lawng thlaang theetkung oen yuu kah saltamnaa la awm u boel seh. Ahimi lawng thaihu theen te cang puei seh,
hutaa kum no nunu thli te a vaa a ca thli te a lungna ham,

amah oen amah kuemsuem u ham oen aciim acaihla awm ham, a vaa thli kah awl aka ngaai, imkhuikaw khuutcemkung thai hutaa theen thli la a awm u thai ham thuituen. Teahtah Pathen tengkah aka law awlthang te a-u lawngkhaw athela thui manawh.
Tetih van la te kum no tawngpa thli te khaw amah oen amah kuemsuem u thai ham thaphawh lah.
Soeprep boeih ah namah roeroe he khawboe ramlang theen ben ah oett koeila awm. Hinyah koei la awm lang na cangpueina dawngah ataktangla awm.
Oelhtaih thai nawh aka soeng awl te hawna lah, te tih atah mami kawng he athela thui ham khat khaw khueh nawh vetih na raal thli te yah-laat la awm ai.
Sal thli lawngah a bawipa thli kah awl ngaai pe selang soeprep boeih ah ahimi te a kaw hoe sak seh. Ahimi lawng a bawi thli kah awl te thung u boel seh,

a thaihu thli khaw huen pe u boel seh. Te lak atah ahimi lawng thlaang theen la a awmna, ueppang koeila a awm u te tueng sak u seh, teah ni ahimi kah saina boeih dawngah mami thlawnkung Pathen kawng cangpueina te a thangpawm u ai.
Metihtiah, Pathen lawng thlaang boeih kah thlawnna hamla a lungvatna te avan tueng sak poen.

Te lungvatna lawngtah Pathen tula sak ohla hingna, dilai thaihu ngaihmoekna te hoett ham, mah oen mah kuemsuemna, doengna oen he dilai dawngah Pathen kawngaih la hingna oen awm ham mami te n'thuituen.
Te tila te mami kah bawilen Pathen oen thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih kah ruep-awmna va tueng ngai ai tila n'ngaiuep awmngaihna Khawhin te n'ring u.

Mami he athe-arana boeih dawng kalawng thlawn ham oen mami he thlaang ciim la sai tih amah bueng kah koe la awm ham oen ah theenna te thinkaw thluembuek oen aka sai ham, amah kah hingna roe te mami hamla a peek.
He awlkaa thli he cang puei langtah na awlthui hutung thli te tha na peek tih na toelthaam vengah saithaina aana na khueh boeih te haw nah. Nang te a-u lawngkhaw dapsit la n'hu roe boel seh.
Na thlaang thli lawng ukkung thli oen aana khuehkung thli kah awl a ngai u tih ahimi te a hinyahna u ham oen thaihu theen sai ben ah oepsoehla a awm poepa ham thui peh.
Ahimi lawng a-u kah athe-arana khaw thui nawh ham, tede adingsuekla roeproeicala awm tih thlaang boeih tengah kawdawna te tueng sak poepa ham thui peh.

Metihtiah n'hu vengah mami khaw ng'ngau u tih awl ngaai nawh lawnghang la ng'awm u. Pumsa ngaihna oen awmtheenna soeprep kah sal la ng'awm u. Mami kah hingna he uett-eena oen thaihu naai ah mami lawng n'hawna; Mami te thlaang tloe lawng n'thina tih ahimi te mami lawng n'thina van.
Tede, mami thlawnkung Pathen kah lungna oen reenna te a tueng veng kalawng tah,

mami he ahih lawng n'thlawn poen. Te tah mami kah thaihu theen saina dawngah nawh tih a lungna oen ni mami he ahih lawng n'thlawn. Ciim Muithla rang oen athaaila cuunna oen athaaila hingna pekung lawng n'silh dawngah ni.
Pathen lawng mami thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih rang oen mami sawah acoeihpokla Ciim Muithla te avan toi tih,
a lungvatna rang oen Pathen oen mami roeproei ham oen ah mami kah ngaiuep dungyan hingna te khueh thaina ham ni.

He awl tah awltak ni. He kah awl he awlpuila na khueh ham ka ngaih, Pathen aka oeng thlaang thli lawngtah thlaang boeih boeih ham thaihu theen saina ben ah amami kah atue atang te a hawna ham awm, te tah aka theen tih aphu aka awm ni.
Tede tula aka coeng nawh awlpuungna patuer hue kah phunthoepna, tawhsina oen phungawl kawngah oelhtaihna te reel aram lah. Te ang thli te tula aka coeng nawh tih aphu aka awm nawh ni.
Pekbona aka sai thlaang te ayawlkoek ah voei hih ngaaithuenna pe lang tecoeng atah ngaaina tlaih boel.
Te ang thlaang te tah thlaangthe ni tila na ming tih a thawlhna thli lawng ahimi kah asoeng nawh te a tueng sak.
Artima nuem, nawhtah, Tikhikas nuem na tengla kavan tuih vengah Nikopolis khaw ah ka tengla va lawh. Te ah te sikca khui puet ah awm ham ka kamthlah.
Thlaangcal Zenas oen Apollos te khawlawng la a cehna hih ah atheenla bawm lang te rawi kah ngoena boeih te soepsa peh.
Mami kah thlaang thli te bii theen a bi tih angoe taktak dangna ham cang puei uh. Ahimi lawng poei-oepla awm mailai u boel seh.
Kai oen aka awm haih boeih lawng nang te n'toei u. Pathen kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih tengah awm seh.
Khrih Jesuh kawngah thongtla kai Pawl oen mami kah manau Timote lawng puei paw oen bii bi haih la aka awm Filemon oen,
Na im ah aka tun Khrihca thli oen ngannu Apphia oen raalkap puei Arkhipas tengah ca kavan pat.
Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawng a lungvatna, ngaimawngna m'pe u hawn seh.
Ka manau Filemon, ka thangthui veng roekk ah nang kawng ka thui tih ka Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui.
Metihtiah Pathen kah thlaang boeih na lungna oen Bawipa Jesuh na oengna kawng ka yaak dawngah ni.

Ka thangthuina tah aka oeng thlaang la ng'awm u angla nang oen kaimi kah pawlneengna lawng Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawng mami hingna ah aka awm yotheenna cungkuem te a dung ngaai la yaakmingna khueh ham ni.
Ka lungna ka manau, nang kah lungna lawng awmngaihna yahawh hlang m'peek tih ka tha avan thlue sak. Pathen kah thlaang boeih te nang lawng a kaw na hoe sak poen.
Tedawngah he kawng ah he Khrih ah na maya la ka awm van angla na sai koei te sai ham tong-aa muehla nang he awl kan peek thai mai de ta.
Tede, kan lungna dawngah reenna kavan bih. Jesuh Khrih kah laipai, tahe Jesuh Khrih kawng ah thongtla kai Pawl lawng reenna kavan bih.
Tedawngah, thong ka tlaak vengah he Muithla ben ah ahih kah anna pa la ka awm tih Khrih ah ka capa la aka awm Onisimas yuengla na tengah reenna kavan bih.
N'hu vengah tah nang hamla ahih he cawmthawkk nawh, tede tahe tah nang oen kai ham la cawmthawkk poen.
Tahe ah namah tengla ahih he kavan tuih koep de ka thinkaw tah ahih tengah awm.
Awlthang theen kawngah thong ka tlaak veng he ah nang yuengah kai bawmcemkung la ahih he ka tengah awm sak ka ngaih.
Tede, nang te amangkhakla kai he bawmcem sak ham ka ngaih nawh, te lak ah namah kawthawh oen sai sak ham ni ka ngaih. Tedawngah namah kah kawtlaak nawh atah n'tu khaw ka sai manawh.
Onisimas he nang teng kalawng a phengter kawlkalh he thik at la namah tengah awm poe ham mai cawi ni.

Tahe ah ahih tah sal mailai tlaih nawh ni, tede ahih tah sal lak ah atheen ngaai Khrih ah mami kah lungna boenhui la ni a awm poen. Kai hamla tah ahih he aphu awm tangkiik, nang ham tah sal pakhat la khaw Khrih ah boenhui pakhat la khaw metila aphu a awm tare ai.
Tedawngah kai he biibipuei la na poek atah kai nan do ham koei angla te ahih he do koep lah.
Na sawah ahih lawng thawlhpalhna a sai tih laiba mai khaw a awm atah kai kah laiba la khueh mai hawn.
He he kamah kut roe oen kavan thut, Kai Pawl lawng kan sah koep badai. (Na hingna roe nan peek ham na ba te thui koep ham ngoe mai nawh)
Tedawngah ka manau, Bawipa mik-hai te yahna mai lang kavan bih he tah reenna oen van sai mai; Khrih ah boenhui pakhat angla ka kaw van hoe sak mai.
He ca dawngah ka thut angla kavan bih he na sai ngaai ai tila ka tangna tih yahawh ngaai pateng na sai tangtang ai tila ka ming.
Tecoengah kai hamla a huen pakhat ah pahoei roekbah oepsoeh, nangmi boeih kah thangthuina te Pathen lawng avan thung vetih kai he nangmi tengla m'pha sak koep ngai ai tila ka ngaiuep dawngah ni.
Jesuh Khrih kawng ah kai oen thong aka tla haih Epafras lawngkhaw nang te n'toei,
Te tila te kai kah biibipuei Mark, Aristarkas, Demas oen Luka mi lawng nang te n'toei u.
Yan veng atah Pathen lawng patuer thli tengah voei yahawh hlang aphunphun la tawngha thli teng kalawng awl a thui.

Tede, tahe atue boetna ben atah a capa rang oen mami tengah awl avan thui. A Capa rang oen ah khawhipuempa he Pathen lawng a sai tih aboet lam ah thaihu soeprep khuehkung la ahih te Pathen lawng a tuek.

Ahih tah Pathen kah ruep-awmna aangna aka tueng sak tih Pathen amah coenggna oen aka lo u taktak ni. Huham tharana aka awm awl oen khawhipuempa he a khawl acuui tih a cak sak. Thlaanghing ham thawlh khawdawp ngaaina oen thawlh ciimna a sai coengah, vaan ah Huham Thara sangkoek Pathen kah bantang ben ah te ngawl.
Pathen lawng a Capa miing a sak he tah vanthlaang thli kah miing lak ah asang van angla a capa khaw vanthlaang thli lak ah bawilen ngai.

Pathen lawngah a vanthlaang a-u khat khaw, “Nang tah ka Ca la na awm tih tihin ah Kai tah nang kah na Pa la ka awm poen” tina vai nawh. Tecoengah me ang vanthlaang khaw “Kai tah ahimi kah ana Pa la, ka awm vetih ahimi tah ka Ca la awm ai,” tina vai nawh.
Tede Pathen lawng a Capa camiing awmthang dilai dawng avan tuih vengah, “Pathen kah vanthlaang boeih lawng ahih te a bok u ai” tila a thui.
Tede vanthlaang kawng tah, “Pathen lawng amah kah vanthlaang thli te yilh la a sai tih, a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te haialh angla a sai,” tila a thui.
A Capa kawng tah Pathen lawng: “Aw Pathen, namah kah ram tah dungyan toe cak ai! Nang lawngtah na thlaang thli te doengna oen na uk ai.

Nang lawngtah adoeng te na ngaih tih aka soeng nawh te na thina. Tedawngah nang kah Pathen la aka awm Pathen lawng nang te n'tuek tih na paya laikoei thli a peek lak ah hinyahna oen awmngaihna te nang m'peek tila a thui.
Tecoengah Ahih lawng “Bawipa, nang lawng acuekca ah dilai he na suen tih namah kut oen vaan khaw na sai.
Te thaihu tah khum boeih cakhaw, nang tah na cak yoeyah ai; Te thli boeih tah himbai angla pawn boeih ai.
Nang lawngah te thli te angki angla na tliim vetih himbai angla te thli tah thawleng u boeih ai. Tede nang tah amah moepoela na awm tih Na hinglung khaw boet tlaih nawh” tila a thui.
Pathen lawng a vanthlaang thli te: “Na raal thli he na khowpha huiah khowtloengna la ka khueh thlantoe ka bantang ben ah ngawl” tina vai nawh.
Tetih atah, vanthlaang thli he a-u te ang kai? Ahimi tah Pathen kah bii aka bi muithla la awm tih thlawnna aka dang ham koei thli te bawm hamla Pathen kah a tuih thlaang thli ni.
Tedawngah atloe abang la mami lawng m'phelh nawh ham n'yaak tangte awltak te acak tare la phoeih mangkhak ham awm.
Vanthlaang teng kalawng mami kah patuer thli tengah a peek awlthang te tah aka soeng awl ni tite tueng tih, te awl te ngaai nawh tih aka vai nawh boeih tah ating atawkk la dantatna te a dang ai.

Te atah hetih aihla aka lenduet thlawnna he mami lawng n'tu la n'sak nawh atah metila mami he sa a sueng ai? Bawipa amah lawng he thlawnna he lamhacuekla a phawng tih aka ya boeih lawngah soeng tila mami tengah a tueng sak poen.
Te tila te ahimi kah sausi te soeng tila a tuengna ham Pathen lawngah miknoekna oen kawpoekrai phun soeprep te a sai tih Ciim Muithla kah kutdo thli te amah kawngaih angla a rek ara.
Mami lawngah n'thui u dilai, hailam ben ah aka law ham koei dilai thaai te uk hamla Pathen lawng vanthlaang he khueh nawh.
Caciim dawngah ahuen pakhat ah, “Aw, Pathen thlaanghing he metih nuem a ti aih tih na poek khuep; Thlaang mailai he metila nuem a awm tih na doen na cang?
Vanthlaang thli lak ah aheem bet la kawlkalh ah na khueh; ruep-awmna oen hinyahna lumuek te na muek sak,

thaihu boeih sawah ukkung la na sai” tila a thui lat. Pathen lawng thlaanghing he, “thaihu boeih ukkung la a sai” tila awm. Thaihu boeih ti vengah me ang thaihu khaw thuum poen. Tede tahe ah thlaanghing lawng thaihu boeih ukkung la awm nawh ti he huh thai la awm.

Tede mami lawngah Pathen kah lungvatna oen thlaang boeih ham duek hamla vanthlaang thli lak ah ahem bet la aka awm Jesuh te n'huh u. Te tila te duekna patang a khangna rang oen tahe atah ruep-awmna oen hinyahna lumuek te a muek poen tite n'huh u.

Thaihu soeprep boeih a sai tih doenkung Pathen lawng amah kah ruep-awmna te a ca thli lawng a paangna hamla Jesuh te patang khangna oen thlaangsoep la a sai te tah tueng tang tang. Metihtiah Jesuh tah thlawnna dang ham aka mawtkung ni.

Jesuh lawngtah thlaang kah thawlh-na te a ciing sak tih thawlhna ciingsakkung oen amah lawng thawlhna a ciing pe sak thlaang boeih te lawng ana Pa pakhat ni a khueh u. Tedawngah Jesuh lawng te thli te amah kah maya manau tila khue hamla yak nawh.
Ahih lawng Pathen tengah, “Nang lawng na sai te maya manau thli tengah ka thui ai, Ahimi a tunna ah nang te kan thangpawm ai,” tila a thui.
Tecoengah ahih lawng, “Pathen te ka uepna ai” ti. Tecoeng baal ah, “Pathen kah peek ca-anau thli oen he ah he haih ka awm” tila khaw a thui.

Te tila ca-anau a tina thlaang thli te tah thi-asa oen aka awm thlaang thli ni. Jesuh amah khaw ahimi angla thi-asa oen awm tih ahimi kah thlaanghing pumsa coenggna angla awm van. Te tila a awm te tah amah kah duekna rang oen duekna sawah huham tharana khuehkung Raaibawi te phe ham tih,
duekna te a rih u dawngah hingkhui puet ah sal la aka awm thli te a loeih sak.
Te tila te ahih lawng vanthlaang thli te bawmcem nawh tite aciimphanla a tueng sak. Caciim lawngah, “Abraham kah cadil thli te a bawm,” tila a thui lat.

Tedawngah soeprep boeih ah maya manau angla awm ham roe la angoe tih te tila a awm te tah thlaang boeih kah thawlhna te khawdawp ngaai hamla Pathen bii a bina ah uep-awmna oen reenna aka khueh Khawsoeih Bawi la awm ham ni.
Amah roeroe lawng suek-halhna oen patang khangna te a tawng poen dawngah tahe ah suek-halhna aka tawng thli te a bawm thai.
Pathen kah thlaangkhue, Khrihca thlaangciim maya manau thli! Mami kah bokna phung ben ah Khawsoeih Bawi la awm ham Pathen lawng avan tuih Jesuh kawng te poek u lah.
Mosi lawng Pathen kah im ah amah kah bii bina dawngah uep-awm la a awm van angla Jesuh khaw he bii he bi hamla tuekkung Pathen tengah uep-awm la awm.
Imsakung lawng im lak ah hinyahna te a huh. Te tila te Mosi lak ah Jesuh lawngah asang ngaai hinyahna te a dang ham tuueng.
Im boeih he tah thlaang lawng a sak, thaihu boeih he tah Pathen lawng a sak.
Mosi tah tuihyoeihthlaang la a awm van angla Pathen im khuiah uep-awm biibikung la awm tih Pathen lawng hailam ben ah a thui ham te khaw a thui thai.
Tede Khrih tah Pathen im khuiah ukkung uep-awm a Capa la awm. Mami lawng ngaiuepna dawngah thincakna n'khueh tih uepvoetna a awm nawh atah mami tah amah kah im ni.
Tedawngah Ciim Muithla lawng avan thui angla, “Te hin ah Pathen awl te, na yaak u atah, na thin thah sak u boel;
Na patuer hue lawngah Pathen te a oelh ataih u tih Ramhum huhang ah a noek adak u van angla te awm u boel;
Pathen lawng, “Kum sawm lii khui puet ah ka sai thaihu thli te a huh u de, teah te kai n'noekdak u tih n'oelhtaih u;
Tedawngah ahimi sawah ka thinsa tih, ‘Ahimi tah, a awl cak u nawh tih ka awlpeek khaw vai hamla a thana.
Kai tah ka thin a sa dawngah awl ka taap tih: “Ahimi lawng mevengah khaw kai lawng ka peek duemna ram la te kuun manawh!’ ka tina” tila a thui.

Oengca maya manau hue, nangmi tim ah aka hing Pathen te mangthawng taak ngaihna thinkaw lungbui the khueh nawh ham oen tangna hamla aka ngaih nawh thlaang khatca khaw na awm hau nawh ham ngaithuen uh.

Te lak atah, nangmi te thawlhna lawng thai a latna nawh ham, thinthah la na awm u nawh hamla, caciim lawngah, “Tihin,” a ti te mami oen tuhkaina a awm khui atah hin roekk ah pakhat oen khat bawmcem yoeyah uh.
Metihtiah mami lawng acuekca veng kah ngaikhuekna n'khueh te aboettoe acakla m'phoeih rapsaat atah mami boeih tah Khrih oen bii bi haih la ng' awm u.
Caciim lawngah, “Tihin ah Pathen awl te na yaak u atah na thin thah sak u boel, Na patuer hue lawngah Pathen awl a eek u van angla awm u boel” ti.
A-u lawng Pathen awl te a yaak coengah ahih awl te a eek kai? Ahimi tah Iyipt ram kah Mosi lawng a mawt thlaang thli te ni.
A-u sawah Pathen he kum sawmlii khui a thin a sa? Thawlhna a sai u tih ramhum huhang ah aka duek thli sawah ni.
Pathen lawngah awl a taap tih. “Kai lawng ka peek ham koei duemna ram la te ahimi lawngah meveng khaw kuun u manawh” a tina vengah te a-u hue a tina kai? Awl aka ngaai nawh hue te ni a tina.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng duemna ram khuiah a kuun thai nawh he tah ahimi lawng a tangna u nawh dawngah ni tila m'miing u.
Tahe atah, Pathen lawng duemna huen a thui te pha thaina ham awlkamna m'peek poen. Te kah awlkam sut duemna khuiah te pha ohla awm hau nawh ham ngaithuen u sih.
Metihtiah ahimi lawng a yaak u angla, mami lawng Awlthang Then te n'yaak u poen. Tede, Ahimi lawng a yaak u awlthang te oengna oen a do u nawh dawngah ahimi ham hoeikhangna awm nawh.

Tede mami lawngtah n'tangna tih Pathen lawng a kam duemna te n'huh u. Pathen lawng, “Ka thin sa tih, ‘kai lawng ka peek ham koei duemna ram ah te ahimi lawng meveng khaw kuun manawh!’ tila awl ka taap tih ka thui.” a ti angla te awm tangtang. Dilai a suen cuek vengah bii a coeng boeih poen de ahih lawng te tila te a thui.
Metihtiah Caciim dawng ahuen pakhat ah khawhin hin rihna kawng te “Arih hin ah Pathen tah bii boeih te a coeng tih duem” tila a thui.
Asawkah akawng angla a thui koep tah: Kai lawng ka peek ham koei duemna ram ah te meveng khaw kuun manawh” ti.
Awlthang Theen te lamhala aka ya hue lawng a tangna u nawh dawngah duemna te dang u nawh. Tede, thlaangtloe aka dang hamla thlaang awm.

He kawngah Pathen lawng, “Tihin” tila a thui te, khawhin tloe pakhat a khueng pe tite a tueng sak. Kum yahawh a awm coengah asawkah thui la aka awm te caciim dawngah a awm van angla Pathen lawng Devid hawna oen, “Tihin ah Pathen awl na yaak u atah, na thin thah sak mangkhak u boel,” tila a thui.
Pathen kah awlkam duemna te Joshua lawng thlaangping te pe kawinih Pathen lawng atloe khawhin kawng te thui manawh.
Tedawngah, Pathen tah arih hin ah a duem van angla Pathen thlaang thli hamla duemna khawhin, hin at awm hun.
Pathen tah amah bii bina kalawng a duem van angla te Pathen awlkam duemna te aka dang boeih tah amah kah bii bina kalawng duem van ai.
Tedawngah awlkam duemna te dang thaina ham atlawh ngaaila tha huer u sih. Ahimi lawng oengna a khueh u nawh dawngah duemna a dang nawh angla te mami tah pakhat khaw te tila awm u boel sih.

Pathen kah awl tah hing tih bii a bi, voeivaang aka hatt samsen lak ah khaw hatt ngaai. Hingna oen muithla a humna toe, ruhcong oen thling athawkk a humna toela a pek abo thai. Thlaanghing lungbui kah ngaihna oen poekna boeih te khaw a ming thai.
Pathen haiah thuh phah thai thaihu khat khaw awm nawh; Pathen thaihu sai boeih lawng amah mik huh ah daih u vetih tueng pheng ai. Mami lawng m'mah kah sai boeih te a tengah n'thui ai.
Tedawngah mami lawng oengna te acakla phoeih rap u sih. Metihtiah, Pathen Capa Jesuh tah mami kah aka lenduet Khawsoeih Bawi la awm tih Pathen a awmna la te cet poen.

Mami kah Khawsoeih Bawi he mami kah tharana nawh dawngah reenna aka khueh thai nawh khawsoeih aih moenih ta. Mami kah khawsoeih Bawi he mami angla suekna phun soeprep aka tawng van ni, tede thawlhna tehca khaw sai nawh.
Tedawngah, lungvatna a awmna huen Pathen kah bawingawlh coen tengla cawh u sih. Te huen atah n'ngoe vengah mami bawm ham lungna oen lungvatna te n'dang ai.
Khawsoeih Bawi boeih he tah a tawngpa puei timkah a tuek tih amami yuengah Pathen bii bikung la a khueh. Ahih lawng thawthuengna oen thawlh huihthlutna te a sai.
Amah khaw asoepna nawh a phun phun a awm van dawngah cuihhoena aka khueh nawh thlaang thli oen thawlhpalhna aka sai thlaang thli sawah kawdawna a khueh thai.
Te tila te amah khaw voetna a khueh van dawngah thlaangping kah thawlhna bueng ham ohla amah kah thawlhna dawngah khaw luciik buulna thawthueng ham angoe.

A-u khaw amah oen amah te hinyah koei khawsoeih bawi la tuek u thai nawh. Aaron te Pathen lawng a khue tih Khawsoeih Bawi la a awm van angla Pathen kah khuena bueng oen ni khawsoeih bawi la a coengg thai.
Tetih van la te Khrih lawngkhaw amah ngaih ah hinyah koei khawsoeih bawi la coengg nawh. Pathen lawng ahih nala te, “Nang tah ka Capa la na awm; tihin ah Kai tah na Pa la ka awm poen” a tina.
Tecoeng huentloe pakhat ah, “Nang tah Melkhizedek kah bii te tomthlepkung dungyan khawsoeih la na awm ai” a tina.

Jesuh lawng dilai dawng a hing veng-ah duekna kalawng amah aka thlawn-thaikung Pathen tengah rung-arap tih mikphi haapcang ruila thangthuina oen a bih. Ahih tah boe a ngaai tih pum a peek dawngah a thangthuina te Pathen lawng a yaak.
Tecakhaw Pathen Capa la awm de, Pathen awl aka ngaai thlaang la coengg ham ah patang khangna oen a cang.
Ahih lawngah thlaangsoep la a awm coengah amah awl aka vai thlaang boeih ham dungyan thlawnna a kungpui la awm tih,
Pathen lawng, “Melkhizedek kah bii tomthlepkung khawsoeih bawi la na awm poen,” a tina.
He kawng he thui hamla yahawh hlang awm mai de, nangmi lawng yaakming thaina na khueh u nawh tih thuicaih ham rai tangkiik.

Nangmi he tahe vengah cangpueikung saya la pateng na awm u ham khoek thlai poen de, Pathen kah awl te akungcuek kalawng nangmi cang puei ham thlaangtloe te tahe toe na ngoe u hun. Nangmi lawngah buh tangtang te na caak u thai ham awm poen de tahe toe ah suuktui na awkk u khaak hun.
A-u khaw suuktui aka aw hun te tah camoe la awm hun tih asoeng oen asoeng nawh mingna khueh thai thlan hun.
Buh aka haam te tah kum haam thlaangsoep ham ni; ahimi lawngtah tuukkiik u tih athe atheen te a pek abo thai.

Tedawngah haila cawh u sih, lamhacuek kah khrihca kawng cangna te ceh taak u poen silang tah aka soep cangna ben la te cawh u sih. Aphu aka awm nawh bii ceh taak tangte te khaw, Pathen oengna te khaw, akung kalawng tong koep tlaih boel sih;
baptisma kawng cangna oen kuttloengna kawng, thlaang-duek thawhkoepna kawng oen dungyan awlcekna kawng thli te akung kalawng tong koep tlaih boel sih.
Haila cawh u sih! Pathen lawng sai a ti atah: te ang boeih te n'sai badai.

Amami kah oengna aka hoett thli te metila thawlhna a yut koep ai? Ahimi tah Pathen kah aangna khuiah awm u poen, vaan kutdo te khaw ateng alai u poen tih ahimi lawng a huh koei Ciim Muithla khaw a dang u poen;
Ahimi lawngah Pathen awl a tuui-athlim khaw a ming tih aka law ham koei atue atang san kah tharana te khaw a ming u poen.

Te tila a ming u lal maiah ahimi lawng oengna te a hoett u! Ahimi te thawlh yut sak koep ham coengg thai tlaih nawh, metihtiah ahimi lawng Pathen capa te thinglam dawng a ngawn koep u tih thlaangtim paalak ah yah a pawh sak u.
Rawtui khawtlan a yawn tih lotoen thlaang thli hamla aphu aka awm cangphung aka tawi sak dilai te tah Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awmna a peek.
Tede, thliing-ahang oen bel hawng aka po sak dilai te tah aphu awm nawh; Pathen lawng a tap avoep vetih hai dawngah a phum ai.
Ka paya thli he tila nangmi tengah awl kavan thui de nangmi kawngah ka ngai mawng, nangmi lawng yotheen kam-awmna atheen ngaai thlawnna na khueh u te kaimi lawng ka ming.

Pathen he atuueng aleeng nawh Pathen aih nawh ni. Nangmi lawng bii na bi u te khaw, amah na lungna u te tueng sak ham Khrihca na puei na paw bawmna na peek u tih tahe toe ah na do na dan u te khaw Pathen lawng hilh manawh.
Nangmi lawng na ngaiuep u te ataktang la acoenggna ham nangmi lawng bawmcem ngaihna thinkaw thluembuekna te aboettoe khueh poe uh tila ka ngaih.
Thayong thlaang la na awm u ham ka ngaih nawh, tede oengna, reenna a khueh tih Pathen lawng a kam pe te aka dang thlaang thli angla ni awm sak ham ka ngaih u.
Pathen lawng Abraham tengah awlkamna a sai vengah amah awlkam te sai hamla awl a taap. Te tila awl a taap vengah te amah lak ah alenduet khat khaw a awm nawh dawngah amah miing te a hawna.
Ahih lawngah Abraham nala, “Nang tengah awl ka kam, yotheen kam-awmna kan peek vetih na cadil nauha ka puung ka daw sak ai” a tina.
Abraham lawng kawdaw thinsan oen a ring tih Pathen lawng awl a kam te a dang.
Thlaang pakhat lawng awl a taap vengah amah lak ah aka lenduet thlaang pakhat khat kah miing te a hawna atah te awltaapna lawng awlpuungna boeih te a dip a der sak.
Pathen lawng a mengtengna te thlauh tlaih nawh tite amah kah awlkamna aka dang ham koei thlaang thli tengah aciimphanla tueng sak ham a ngaih, tedawngah a awlkam te awltaap oen a cak sak.

Tecoengah, he thaihu pahih awlkamna oen awltaap he tah thlauh thai koei nawh tih he kawngah Pathen lawng a hoem thui thai nawh. Tedawngah amah tengah ngaimawng ngaitoela aka awm mami lawng, mami haiah avan toen ngaiuepna te acakla phoeih ham n'tha thlue u.

He ngaiuepna tah mami lawng hingna hamla thiilungdue angla awm. Te ngaiuepna tah mami ham kuepyingna oen ngaimawngna la a awm dawngah vaan tempal bok-im kah baiyaan te a pooengvoelh tih huen ciim koek alungkir la te kuun.
