Pathen lawng yan vengah a awl oen ah vaan oen dilai a suen ti he ahimi lawng aka ming nawh angla awm u. Dilai he tui khui kalawng tui oen a sai tih,
te dilai ruem te tui toengtoeng tuiliw tui oen a phe.
Tede tahe ah aka awm vaan oen dilai he hai oen phe hamla Pathen lawng a awl oen a thlung hun ni. Pathen tula aka sak nawh thlaang thli awlcek tih phena khawhin veng ham te thli te a thlung hun.
Tede ka lungna ka paya thli, he thaihu pakhat he hilh u boel! Bawipa huh atah hin at he kum thong khat angla awm tih kum thong khat he hin at angla awm.

Thlaang khatsut lawng a poek angla Bawipa he amah awlkamna soep sak ham a tat a hiing aih moenih, Nangmi te amah lawng n'reen u dawngah ni. Metihtiah ahih lawngtah khatca khaw phe ham ngaih nawh tih thlaang boeih lawng a thawlhna yut u seh ti he a ngaih.

Tecakhaw Bawipa Khawhin tah thlaanghuuen angla law ai. Te Khawhin atah vaan lawng vupaang awl oen auh ai, vaan khawhi kah aka awm boeih khaw ung vetih a phe boeih ai, dilai oen dilai dawng aka awm boeih te kawlkalh ah auh poen ai.
He tila thaihu boeih he phe ham a awm dawngah nangmi lawng me ang thlaang la na awm u lah ai? Nangmi tah hingna aka ciim tih Pathen tengah pum aka pe thlaang la na awm u ham awm.
Vaan te ung tih phe la a awmna oen vaan khawhi te a lingsona oen atui la atleena khawhin Pathen Khawhin te ayuela law ai tila nangmi lawng na lamtoen u vengah he te tila awm hamla na yawm u ham awm.
Tede mami lawngtah Pathen awlkam vaan thaai oen dilai thaai doengna a awmna im te n'lamtoen u.
Tedawngah ka paya thli, te Khawhin te na lamtoen u vengah Pathen huh ah aka ciim tih cawttbauh kap ohla awm ham yawm u lang amah oen roeproeicala awm uh.

Mami lawng n'lungna maya Pawl lawng, Pathen kah peek cuihna te hawna oen nangmi tengah ca avan pat angla Bawipa lawng mami sawah kawdawna a khueh he tah mami he thlawn ham a ngaih dawngah atue atang avan soeng ni tila poek uh.

He kawng he a thut roekk ah a capat boeih boeih dawngah te he ni a thui. Ahih kah capat dawngah akawng alam khatsut tah yaakming ham rai tih cuihhoena aka khueh nawh oen kawthlawp thlaang thli lawngtah, Caciim dawngkah awl te atloetloe la a thui u angla te asoeng akam nawh la a thuicaih u. Tedawngah ahimi lawngah amami kah rawkna te a thoeng sak u.

Tede ka paya thli, nangmi lawngtah he kawng he na ming u poen. Tedawngah phung awl tula aka sak nawh thli kah thawlhpalhna lawng nangmi te m'mawt thawlh nawh ham oen ah namami kah aka cak paihuen dawng kalawng na thoeih na nawng u nawh ham ngaithuen uh.
Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lungvatna oen mingna dawngah roeng hang uh. Amah tengah ruep-awmna tah tahe kalawng ayoeyah awm hawn seh. Amen.
Acuekca veng kalawng aka awm tangte hingna Awl kawng te nangmi tengah ca oen kavan thut u. Te kawng te kaimi lawng ka yaak u, mik oen ka huh u tih ka kut oen ka tek u.
He hingna he huh thai la ava coengg vengah kaimi lawng ka huh u, tedawngah Pa oen aka awm haih tih mami tengah avan tueng sak dungyan hingna kawng te nangmi tengah kavan thui u.

Kaimi lawng ka huh u tih ka yaak u te nangmi tengah khaw kavan phawng u. Pathen oen a Capa Jesuh Khrih oen ah kaimi lawng ka khueh pawlneengna dawngah nangmi khaw na thuum thaina ham kaimi lawng ka huh tih ka yaak te nangmi tengah khaw kavan phawng u.
Kaimi kah awmngaih asoepna hamla he ca he kaimi lawng kavan thut u.
Tahe ah, a Capa teng kalawng ka yaak u tih nangmi tengah kavan phawng u awl tah he ni: Pathen tah aangna la awm tih ahih dawngah yiinna roeroe awm nawh.
Tecoengah mami lawng ahih oen pawlneengna ka khueh n'ti u tih yiinna khuiah ng'awm u atah mami tah awlkaa oen khawseh, saina oen khawseh, hoem awl ni n'thui u.
Tede ahih tah aangna la a awm angla mami lawng aangna ah ng'awm u atah pakhat oen pakhat pawlneengna mami lawng n'khueh u tih a Capa Jesuh thisen oen soeprep thawlhna kalawng mami n'silh poen.
Mami lawng thawlhna ka khueh nawh n'ti u atah m'mah oen mah he, thailatna u tih mami khuiah awltak awm nawh.

Tede mami lawng thawlhna boeih te Pathen tengah m'phawng u atah ahih tah a awlkam cak tih thaihu doeng a sai dawngah mami thawlhna boeih te khawdawp a ngaai vetih mami kah sai thawlh boeih te avan ciim sak ai.
Mami lawng ka thawlh nawh n'ti u atah Pathen te hoem thui la n'sai u tih amah awl te khaw mami khuiah awm nawh.

Ka ca ka nau thli nangmi lawng thawlhna na sai u nawh hamla he ca he kavan thut; tede pakhat khat lawng thawlhna a sai hau atah, Pa, tengah mami yuengla aka bih ham thlaangdoeng Jesuh Khrih n'khueh u.
Metihtiah, Khrih amah roe he mami kah thawlh khawdawp ngaaina Luciik la awm tih mami kah thawlhna bueng nawh tih thlaang boeih kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai.
Mami lawng Pathen kah awlpeek te n'vai atah amah te m'ming u tite aciimla m'ming.
Thlaang pakhat khat lawng ahih te ka ming ti de, a awlpeek te a vai nawh atah te ang thlaang tah hoem aka thui tih ahih dawngah awltak awm nawh.
Tede, a-u khaw a awl te a vai atah Pathen kah lungna oen ahih te soep tangtang poen. Pathen oen mami pumkhatla ng'awm tite mingna tah he tila ni,
a-u lawngkhaw Pathen oen pumkhatla ka awm a ti atah Jesuh Khrih angla awm van ham awm.
Ka lungna ka paya thli, nangmi tengah kavan thut awlpeek he athaai nawh ni; acuekca kalawng nangmi lawng na khueh tangte awlpeek ruem te ni. Te awlpeek ruem te tah na yaak tangte awl te ni.

Tede nangmi tengla kavan thut awlpeek he athaai ni; metihtiah he tah athaai ni tila asoengna tah Khrih ah huh la awm tih nangmi dawngah khaw huh la awm. Metihtiah yiinna tah khum tih aangna tangtang te aang poen.
A-u khaw aangna khuiah ka awm ti tih, a maya manau te a thina atah tahe toe ah yiinna khuiah awm hun.
A-u khaw a maya manau te a lungna atah aangna khuiah awm tih thlaangtloe thawlh sak ham ahih khuiah tu tehca khaw awm nawh.
Tede a-u khaw a maya manau te a thina atah yiinna khuiah awm hun; yiinna khuiah yingyawi tih te yiinna lawng mik a pum pe sak dawngah meben la ka ceh ti khaw ming nawh.
Ka ca ka nau thli Khrih rang oen nangmi kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai poen dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut.
Papa thli aw, acuekca kalawng aka awm ahih te na ming u dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut. Cadawng caloe thli nangmi lawng Raaibawi te na taa u poen dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut.

Ka ca ka nau thli nangmi lawng Pa te na ming u poen dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut. Papa thli, acuekca kalawng aka awm ahih te na ming u dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan pat. Cadawng caloe thli nangmi tah na tha a ra u dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan pat. Pathen awl te nangmi khuiah awm tih Raaibawi te na taa poen.
Dilai oen dilai thaihu he khat khaw thintlawhna u boel. Dilai he na thintlawhna u atah Pa te na thintlawhna u nawh.
Dilai thaihu soeprep, pumsa ngaihna, thlaang lawng a huh tih a ngaih thaihu, he dilai dawngkah thaihu soeprep thlaang lawng a phoekthloerna khatca mai khaw Pa teng kah aka law thaihu nawh ni.
Dilai oen dilai thaihu thlaanghing lawng a ngaih he tah khumpel boeih, tede Pathen kawngaih aka sai tah dungyan hing ai.
Ka ca ka nau thli atue boetna yoeii poen! Khrih kah raal law ai tila na yaak u; tahe ah Khrih kah raal thli yahawh hlang thoeng poen, tedawngah atue boetna yoeii poen tila mami lawng m'ming u.

He thlaang thli he mami kah pawlneengna khuiah aka awm tangtang nawh ni, tedawngah mami he ahimi lawng n'ceh taak u poen; ahimi te mami pawlneengna khuikah tangtang kawinih mami tengah awm poe van ai. Tede ahimi tah khatca khaw mami pawlneengna ah aka awm tangtang nawh ni tite aciimphanna ham mami he n'ceh tak u.
Tecakhaw nangmi tah Khrih lawngah Ciim Muithla te na sawah avan toi u poen, tedawngah nangmi boeih lawng awltak te na ming u.

Tedawngah nangmi tengah ca kavan thut he awltak te na ming u nawh dawngah nawh tih, nangmi lawng awltak te na ming u tih awltak dawng kalawng hoem awl va thoeng vai nawh tite nangmi lawngkhaw na ming u van dawngah ni.
Tetih atah a-u nuem hoem-thuikung? Jesuh tah Messiah nawh ni tila aka thui te hoemthuikung la awm. Te ang thlaang te tah Khrih kah raal ni, Pa oen Capa te aka hoett thlaang ni.
A-u khaw Capa aka hoett tah Pa te khaw a hoett: A-u khaw Capa te aka do tah Pa te khaw a do.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng acuekca kalawng na yaak u awl te na kaw khuiah khueh uh. Te awl te na khueh u atah Capa oen Pa oen ah pumkhatla nangmi poe na awm u ai.
He tah Khrih amah roe lawng mami peek ham awl a kam dungyan hingna he ni.
Nangmi thailatna ham aka yawm hue kah akawng te nangmi tengah kavan thut.

Tede nangmi ham tah Khrih lawngah a Muithla te nangmi sawah avan toi poen. Nangmi kaw khuiah a Muithla te a awm atah, nangmi cang puei ham a-u khat khaw na ngoe u tlaih nawh. Metihtiah amah Muithla lawngah soeprep boeih kawng te nangmi n'cang puei u tih te cangpueina tah soeng taktak, aka thawlh nawh ni.
Ka ca thli, amah oen pumkhatla awm uh, metihtiah amah a tueng vengah mami tah raltheenna oen m'be u vetih amah a lawna Khawhin ah ayahtoela a teng kalawng thuh-elh u ham ngoe tlaih manawh.
Nangmi lawng Khrih tah thlaangdoeng tila na ming u; tedawngah a-u khaw thaihu doeng aka sai tah Pathen kah a ca thli ni tite na ming u ham awm.

Pathen lawng ningmi n'lungna tangkiik he poek u lah! A lungna tah bo tangkiik tih mami he Pathen amah kah Ca-anau ti poen, te tila te awm tangtang. He kawng ah ni dilai lawng mami he m'ming u nawh: Pathen khaw ming u nawh.

Ka lungna ka paya thli, tahe ah mami tah Pathen kah ca-anau la ng'awm u poen, tede hai ben ah mami he n'tu oen n'lawh u ai ti he tah m'ming thlan hun. Tede Khrih a law vengah Khrih amah oen n'lo u ai tila m'ming u, metihtiah ahih tah amah roeroe la te mami lawng n'huh ai.
A-u khaw Khrih ah he ang ngaiuepna aka khueh lawngtah Khrih aciimcaih van angla amah oen amah te aciimcaihla awm van.
A-u khaw thawlhna aka sai tah Pathen kah phungawl te a phe, metihtiah thawlhna tah phungawl phena he ni.
Khrih tah thawlhna ciim sak hamla law tite na ming u, ahih dawngah thawlhna roe awm nawh.
Tedawngah Khrih oen pumkhatla aka awm thlaang boeih lawngtah thawlhna sai taitu nawh; tede a-u khaw thawlhna aka sai poepa lawngtah ahih te hu nawh tih aka ming nawh ni.
Ka ca thli, nangmi te a-u khat lawngkhaw n'thaina boel seh! Khrih tah thlaangdoeng la a awm angla a-u khaw doengna aka sai boeih tah thlaangdoeng van ni.
A-u khaw thawlhna aka sai poepa tah Seitan thlaang ni, metihtiah Seitan tah acuek veng kalawng thawlhna a sai roe poen. He kawng ah he Seitan kah sai boeih te phe ham ni Pathen Capa tah a law.

A-u khaw Pathen kah ca-anau la aka awm tengah Pathen kah pumsa tah ahimi dawngah awm tih thawlhna te sai poepa nawh. Metihtiah Pathen tah ahimi kah ana Pa la a awm dawngah ahih lawng thawlhna sai taitu nawh.

Pathen kah ca-anau thli oen Seitan kah ca-anau thli a lawhna hih nawh noekna tah he tila ni: a-u khaw asoeng thaihu aka sai nawh boeih, thlaangtloe te aka lungna nawh boeih tah Pathen kah ca-anau thli nawh ni.
Acuekca veng kalawng na yaak u awl te tah he ni: mami pakhat oen khat lung u sih ti he ni.

Mami he Kain angla awm ham nawh ni; ahih tah Raaibawi kah thlaang la awm tih a manau kheet Abel te a ngawn. N'tu ah Abel te Kain lawng a ngawn? Metihtiah ahih lawng thaihu te athawlhla a sai, tede a manau lawngtah thaihu te adoengla a sai dawngah ni.
Tedawngah maya manau thli dilai thlaang lawng nangmi te n'thina u atah na kawpoek rai sak u boel.

Mami tah duekna n'ceh taak u poen tih hingna khuila n'kuun poen tite m'ming u; te tila m'mingna tah mami lawng maya manau n'lungna dawngah ni. A-u khaw lungna aka khueh nawh tah duekna khuiah ni a awm hun.
A-u khaw a maya manau te a thina atah thlaang aka ngawn ni, thlaang aka ngawn thli tah a khuiah dungyan hingna awm nawh tite na ming u.
Lungna he me ang nuem tila m'mingna tah he tila ni: Khrih lawng mami hamla a hingna te a peek. Tedawngah mami lawngkhaw maya manau thli hamla hingna he peek van hamla awm!
Thlaanglen kuirang lawng a maya manau kah a voetna te a huh vengah a thinkaw a khaih khoep atah metila Pathen ka lungna a ti thai ai?
Ka ca ka nau thli mami kah lungna he tah awlkaa hong mai ohla bii lawh thawhtatna dawngah aka tueng lungna taktak la a awm ham awm.
Tedawngah mami lawng awltak dawngah ka awm tite he tila m'ming u ai. Pathen haiah khaw ngaitluepla n'awm u ai.
Mami kah athetheen mingna thinkaw lawng mami te n'salphaam mai cakhaw Pathen tah mami kah athetheen mingna thinkaw lak ah bo ngaai tih ahih lawngtah soeprep boeih a ming tite mami lawng m'ming u.
Tedawngah ka lungna ka paya thli, mami he m'mah kah athetheen mingna thinkaw lawng n'salphaam nawh kawinih mami tah Pathen haiah raltheenna n'khueh u.
Mami lawng amah kah awlpeek te n'vai tih a kawngaih te n'sai dawngah mami lawng amah tengkah m'bih boeih te n'dang u.
Te a awlpeek tah a Capa Jesuh Khrih te mami lawng n'tangna tih mami tengah Khrih amah awlpeek angla pakhat oen khat n'lung u he ni.

A-u khaw Pathen kah awlpeek te aka vai tah Pathen oen pumkhatla awm tih Pathen khaw ahih oen ah pumkhatla awm. Te tila mami tengah Pathen kah peek Muithla rang oen ah Pathen tah mami oen pumkhatla awm tite m'ming u.

Ka lungna ka paya thli, Muithla ka khueh tila aka thui boeih te tangna u boel, tede ahimi kah Muithla khueh te Pathen tengkah aka law tang aw tite noekdak uh. Metihtiah, tawngha rawlrap thli, yahawh hlang dilai han ah yingyo u poen.
Pathen benkah Muithla ni tila ming thaina ham tah he tila ni; a-u khaw Jesuh Khrih tah thlaanghing pumsa la va law tila aka ti boeih lawngtah Pathen tengkah aka law Muithla te a khueh.

Tede, a-u khaw Jesuh kawngah te tila aka pawm nawh tah Pathen tengkah Muithla te khueh nawh. Ahih kah khueh muithla te tah Khrih raal tengkah ni; nangmi lawng te ang te va law ai tila na yaak u poen tih tahe dilai dawngah awm poen.

Tede ka ca ka nau thli nangmi tah Pathen thlaang la na awm u tih tawngha rawlrap thli te na taa u poen, metihtiah nangmi khuiah aka awm Muithla tah dilai koeva la aka awm thlaang thli kah muithla lak ah ahu-aham a awm ngaai dawngah ni.
Te kah tawngha rawlrap thli lawngtah dilai thaihu thli kawng he a thui u tih dilai koeva la a awm u dawngah dilai lawng a awl te a hutung.

Tede mami tah Pathen thlaang ni. A-u khaw Pathen aka ming lawngtah kaimi awl he a hutung u, a-u khaw Pathen thlaang la aka awm nawh lawngtah kaimi awl he hutung u nawh. He tila he awltak Muithla oen thawlhpalhna muithla laklaw kah alakloena te mami lawng n'thui thai u.
Ka lungna paya thli, lungna tah Pathen teng kalawng a law dawngah mami pakhat oen pakhat lung u sih. A-u khaw lungna aka khueh tah Pathen kah a ca la awm tih Pathen te a ming u.
A-u khaw lungna aka khueh nawhtah Pathen te ming nawh, metihtiah Pathen tah lungna ni.
Pathen lawng a Capa khueh duen khat bueng te mami ham dilai la avan tuihna rang oen a lungna te a tueng sak tih ahih rang oen mami lawng hingna khuehna ham ni.
Lungna ti he tah he tila ni: mami lawng Pathen n'lungna te nawh ni, tede amah lawng mami he n'lungna tih mami kah thawlhna khawdawp ngaaina ham a Capa avan tuih he ni.
Ka lungna ka paya thli, he tih aih la mami he Pathen lawng n'lungna atah mami khaw pakhat oen khat lung u van ham awm.
Pathen te a-u lawngkhaw hu noek nawh, tede pakhat oen khat n'lung u atah Pathen tah mami oen pumkhatla awm tih a lungna tah mami dawngah soep.
A Muithla te mami m'peek poen dawngah mami tah Pathen oen pumkhatla ng'awm u tih amah khaw mami oen pumkhatla awm tite aciimphanla m'ming u.
Ana Pa lawngah a Capa te dilai thlawnkung la avan tuih te hukung oen thlaangtloe tengah thuikung tah kaimi ni.
A-u khaw Jesuh tah Pathen Capa ni tila a phawng atah ahih te Pathen oen pumkhatla awm tih Pathen khaw ahih oen ah pumkhatla awm.

Te tila Pathen lawng mami n'lungna te kamami roeroe lawng ka ming u tih ka tangna u. Pathen tah lungna ni, a-u khaw lungna dawngah aka awm tah Pathen oen pumkhatla awm tih Pathen khaw ahih oen pumkhatla awm.
Awlcekna Khawhin ah mami lawng raltheenna khueh thaina hamla lungna tah mami dawngah avan soep sak poen; he dilai ah mami hingna tah Jesuh kah hingna oen avai u dawngah te raltheenna te ng'khueh ai.

Lungna dawngah rihsakna awm nawh. Aka soep lungna lawngtah rihna boeih te biit aha-ata sak. Tedawngah rihsakna aka khueh thlaang tah lungna asoepbir te khueh thlan hun. Metihtiah rihna lawngtah dantatna oen bawngyawng haih.
Pathen lawng mami n'lungna lamha dawngah mami lawngkhaw n'lungna van.

A-u lawngkhaw Pathen ka lungna ti de a maya manau te a thina mangkhak atah hoem aka thui thlaang ni. Amik oen a huh maya manau pateng khaw a lungna nawh maiah ahih lawng a huh thai nawh Pathen te lungna thai manawh.
Khrih lawng mami tengah m'peek a awlpeek tah “A-u khaw Pathen te a lungna atah a maya manau te lungna seh” a ti te ni.
A-u khaw Jesuh Khrih tah Messiah ni tila aka tangna tah Pathen kah a ca ni. A-u lawngkhaw ana Pa te a lungna atah, ana Pa kah a ca thli te khaw a lungna.
Mami lawng Pathen kah ca-anau thli n'lungna tite mingna tah he tila ni; mami lawng Pathen amah te n'lungna tih a awlpeek n'vai he ni.
Metihtiah mami lawng Pathen n'lungna tila thuingaihna tah a awlpeek thli n'vai he ni. Ahih kah awlpeek te tah mami ham rai aih mai nawh,
metihtiah Pathen kah ca-anau boeih lawngtah dilai a taa thai. Mami lawng oengna rang oen dilai n'taa u.
A-u lawng dilai a taa thai? Jesuh tah Pathen Capa ni tila aka tangna thlaang bueng lawngah a taa thai.

Jesuh Khrih tah amah kah Baptisma huhna tui oen a duekna thisen oen ah aka law ni. Ahih tah tui bueng oen law nawh tih pahih bok la tui oen thisen oen ah va law. He tah soeng tangtang tila Muithla amah roe lawng sausi a deeng, metihtiah Muithla tah awltak la a awm dawngah ni.
He kawngah sausi pathum awm.
Te tah Muithla, tui oen thisen he hue ni. He pathum hue lawng avan at rip la sausi a deeng u.
Mami lawngtah thlaang kah sausi deeng te n'tangna u; tede Pathen kah sausi deeng tah a tha ra ngaai tih a Capa kawng te Pathen amah lawng sausi a deeng poen.

A-u khaw Pathen Capa aka tangna boeih lawngtah he sausi he lungbui khuiah a khueh; tede a-u khaw Pathen te aka tangna nawh lawngtah Pathen lawng a Capa kawng a thui te a tangna nawh dawngah Pathen te hoemthuikung la a coengg sak.
Te sausi tah he ni: Pathen lawng mami he dungyan hingna m'peek poen tih te hingna tah a Capa dawngah awm.
A-u khaw a Capa te aka khueh lawngtah hingna te a khueh; a-u khaw Pathen Capa te aka khueh nawh tah hingna te khueh nawh.
Pathen Capa aka tangna nangmi lawng dungyan hingna na khueh u te na mingna u ham he kah ca he nangmi tengah kavan thut.
Mami lawng amah kawngaih angla me ang thaihu khaw m'bih u atah a hutung tite aciimphanla m'ming u dawngah Pathen haiah raltheenna mami lawng n'khueh u.
Mami lawng amah tengah m'bih vengah a hutung tangtang tila m'ming u veng kalawng tah amah tengah m'bih boeih te khaw m'peek tila m'ming u baal.

Na maya manau lawng duekna toe aka mawt nawh koei thawlhna a sai te na huh u atah nangmi lawng Pathen tengah thangthui pe uh. Pathen lawng ahih te hingna a peek ai. He tah duekna toe aka pha sak nawh thawlhna aka sai thli ham ni. Tede duekna toe aka pha sak thawlhna awm, te kawngah te nangmi lawng Pathen tengah thangthui uh ka ti nawh.
Sai thawlh boeih he thawlhna ni, tede duekna toe aka pha sak nawh thawlhna awm.
Pathen kah ca-anau la aka awm lawngtah thawlhna sai poepa nawh tite m'ming u, metihtiah Pathen Capa lawng a hih te ading asuekla a khueh tih Raai Bawi lawngah raina pe thai nawh.
Dilai pum he Seitan kah ukna khuiah awm de mami tah Pathen kah thlaang la ng'awm tite m'ming u.

Pathen Capa tah va law tih Pathen tangtang te mami lawng mingna hamla mami tengah yaakmingna te m'peek poen tite m'ming u. A Capa Jesuh Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah Pathen taktak oen mami pumkhatla m'awm u. Ahih tah aka soeng Pathen taktak la awm tih dungyan hingna la awm.
Ka ca ka nau thli aka soeng nawh pathen thli teng kalawng tloeng u lah.
Ahaamca teng kalawng- Ka lungna hinyah koei Nutakhong oen a ca thli tengah: Kai bueng lawng kan lungna nawh tih awltak aka ming boeih lawngtah n'lungna,
Metihtiah awltak tah mami khuiah awm tih mami tengah ayoeyah awm ai.
Pa Pathen oen Pa kah Capa Jesuh Khrih lawng lungvatna, reenna oen ngaimawngna te m'pe selang awltak oen lungna tah mami tengah awm yoeyah seh.
Pa lawngah mami awl m'peek angla na ca thli khatsut tah awltak dawngah a hing u te ka huh vengah ka awmngaih tangkiik.
Tedawngah ka lungna Nutakhong pakhat oen khat boeih lung u sih. He he awlpeek thaai kavan thut moe nih; he tah acuekca veng kalawng yaak tangte awlpeek te ni.

He kah lungna tila ka thui ngaihna tah Pathen kah awlpeek te vai tih mami lawng hing ham awm ti ngaihna ni. Te awlpeek te tah acuekca veng kalawng boeih na yaak u poen angla lungna oen awm boeih uh ti he ni.
Jesuh Khrih tah thlaanghing pumsa la law tila aka tangna nawh thlaang, thlaangthaipalat thli dilai pum ah cet khonghak poen. Te ang thlaang te tah thlaangthaipalat oen Khrih kah raal ni.
Tedawngah nangmi lawng ngaiuepna oen na bi u te sungdeuh nawh ham oen ah na mami kah kutdo te asoepla na dang thaina ham ngaithuen lang awm uh.
A-u khaw Khrih kah cangpueina dawngah aka awm nawh tih te voel ah aka cet lawngtah Pathen te khueh nawh. A-u khaw cangpueina dawngah aka awm khak tah pahih bokla Pa oen Capa te a khueh.
Tedawngah a-u khaw pakhat khat nangmi tengah law tih he kah cangpueina he avan khuen nawh atah na im ah pah sak u boel; “Na sawah ngaimawngna awm seh” tila khaw tina boel.
Metihtiah a sawah ngaimawngna awm seh tila aka ngaih tah ahih kah thaihu the saina dawngah bii bi puei la aka thuum van poen ni.

Nang tengah awl thui ham yahawh tangkiik awm de caram dawng catui cahaang oen ka thut nawh vetih mami awmngaih kawhoena asoepna ham ah nangmi oen pumpakla awlthui ham kamyin la nangmi teng law ham ka cai.
Na lungna na nau kah a ca thli lawng nang te n'toei u.
Ahaamca teng kalawng- Ka lungna Kaia, ataktangla ka lungduet tengah:
Ka lungna ka puei, soeprep boeih te anepnoeila a awmna ham oen sadingla na awm thaina ham ka thangthui. Muithla ben ah sadingla na awm tila ka ming.
Nang tah awltak ben ah ueppangla na awm tih awltak dawngah na awm yoeyah tila khatsut Khrihca maya manau thli a law u vengah avan thui u tih ka awmngaih tangkiik.
Ka ca thli te awltak dawngah awm u tila ka yaak thloei ah kai awmngaih sak tare ngai atloe awm nawh.
Ka lungna ka puei, Nang tah na pueipaw Khrihca thli ham Bii na bina ah ahimi mingtung mingnawh mai ham khaw ueppang tangtang la na awm.
Nang kah lungna kawng te ahimi lawng he kah Khrihcabu tengah a thui u poen. Ahimi khawlawng la poe a cehna u ham Pathen kah kawtlaakla bawmcem u de.
Ahimi lawng Khrih kah bii bina ah khawlawng ceh a tongcuek u vengah aka oeng nawh thli tengah bawmcemna thaihu khat khaw lawh ohla khawlawng cet u.
Tedawngah ahimi kah awltak bii he aka bi puei thlaang la awm van ham mami Khrihca thli lawng khaw he ang thlaang hue he tah bawmcem ham awm.
Khrihcabu tengah ca atoica kavan thut; tede ahimi kah mawtkung la awm ham aka ngaih Diotrifi lawngtah ka awlthui he n'tu la khaw ngaai manawh.

Tedawngah kai ka law atah a sai thaihu boeih oen mami kawng a thui boeih te oen a hoem thui boeih te ka daih pe badai. Tecoengah he bueng muehla Khrihca maya manau thli a law ah khaw ahih lawng do nawh, ahimi te do ham aka ngaih thli te khaw a khang pe tih Khrihcabu khui kalawng ahimi te hek hamla a yawm mangkhak.
Ka lungna ka puei, athe thaihu te oett boel lang atheen thaihu te oett lah. A-u khaw thaihu theen aka sai tah Pathen thlaang la awm; A-u khaw thaihu the aka sai tah Pathen te hu nawh.
Demetrias kah theenna he thlaang tawm lawng a thui; awltak roe lawng ahih kah theenna he a thui. Mami lawngkhaw atheenna te n'thui u tih kai lawng ka thui he soeng tila na ming u.
Nang tengah awl thui ham yahawh tangkiik awm, tede caram dawng catui cahaang oen thut ham ka ngaih nawh.
Nangmi te ayuela huh ham ka ngaih, tevengah pumpakla mami lawng awl n'thui u badai.
Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh. Kaimi kah paya boeih te pumpakla rip van toei.
Jesuh Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang oen Jeem kah manau Juda lawng Pathen lawngah a khue thlaang-thli, Jesuh Khrih lawng a thlipdah tih Pa Pathen kah lungna khuiah aka awm thli tengah:
Reenna, ngaimawngna oen lungna tah asoepbirla nangmi kah koeva la awm hawn seh.

Ka lungna ka paya thli, mami lawng n'dang rip thlawnna kawng he nangmi tengah ca oen thut hamla ka yawm. Pathen lawng a thlaang thli tengah vaikhatla khoekkoeng ham a peek oengna dawngah acakla pai ham nangmi tengah ca thut pahoei tih thaphawh ham ka poek.

Metihtiah Pathen n'tu la aka sak nawh thlaang khatsut ming mai muehla mami tim ah ahuepla va kuun u tih amami kah cuk-halhna te thlipdahna ham Pathen kah lungvatna kawng awlthang te akhuppalet la a thui u tih mami kah pakhat bueng bawimanghai oen Bawipa la aka awm Jesuh Khrih te a hoett u. He ang thlaang thli tah dan a tat ai tila caciim lawngah aruem veng kalawng a thui oepsoeh poen.

He ang thli boeih he na ming u poen de, Bawipa lawng Israel thlaang thli he metila Iyipt ram kalawng vai khat tah a loeih sak tih, tede hukhueng atah aka tangna nawh thlaang thli a duek sak boeih te ming sak koep ham ka ngaih.

Amami kah awmna huen a hoett tih, amami kah khuehtoen saithaina ari amawng khuiah aka awm nawh vanthlaang thli te poek u lah: Pathen lawng awlcekna Khawhin pui ah ahimi te dantatna peek ham dungyan thiirui oen a piin tih yiinna khuiah a khueh.

Sodom oen Gomorrah oen ah a tengvaai kah khawpui thli, te kah aka awm thlaang thli lawngkhaw vanthlaang thli angla thawlh u tih hutaa tawngpa thawlhna, asoeng nawh hutaa puei oen, tawngpa puei oen ah a thawlh u te poek uh: Ahimi kah dungyan hai dantat patang khang te thlaang boeih ham ngaithuenna la awm.

Tetih toengtoengla, tahe kah thlaang thli lawngkhaw mang ka man ti u tih amami pum dawngah thawlhna a sai u; ahimi lawng Pathen kah aana te a hadalhna tih vaan asawsang kah ruep-awm thli te a thuitheet u.

Vanthlaang ukkung Maikal lawng pateng he tila sai nawh. Mosi rawkk te a-u lawng a lawh ai tila Seitan oen oelhtaih u tih a tawh athaam u vengah awlthe awlkha oen Seitan te Maikal lawng tapvoep ngam nawh, tede “Bawipa lawng nang ng'ho” a tina.
Tede he kah thlaang thli lawngtah amami kah yaakming nawh pakhat khat te the a phoei thil u; ramsa angla amami kah thang puei cuihna oen a ming u thaihu thli lawngah ahimi te a phe u poen.

Ahimi ham khawmap tangkiik! Kain kah lawngpui te ahimi lawng a vai u poen. Tangka ngaih dawngah Balaam kah thawlh saina te ang van ah te amami oen amami phuum u. Korah kah ceem raal thawh angla tho u tih ahih angla phe u boeih poen.

Ahimi lawng yahtaal pawk-arh la a caak a awk u tih nangmi kah lungna poeibuh veelna ah aka ciim nawh muenmawi oen lo u. Amami bueng ham te a poek u. Ahimi tah yilh lawng a yawng mailai khawtlantui aka awm nawh khawmai oen lo u. Atue atang ah pateng khaw aka thaih nawh thingkung thli oen lo u, ayung ruila phuk bangtlang tih aka duek roepsoet thingkung oen lo u.

Ahimi tah tuitunlii kah tuiphu oen lo u, ahimi kah yahpawhna thli te tuihawm angla pho. Ahimi tah aka cet mailai aisi oen lo u tih ahimi hamla Pathen lawng adungkoek yiinna ah dungyan huen a khueh pe poen.
Adam kalawng a pasarihna cadil Enok lawngah ahimi kawng te yan veng ka lawng he tila a thui oepsoeh poen:

“Thlaang boeih te awlcek hamla, Pathen tula ka sak nawh thlaangthawlh boeih oen Pathen tula sak ohla a sai thawlhna boeih oen ah Pathen te tula sak ohla saringrup awl oen asal aphaamna boeih sawah dantat hamla Bawipa tah amah kah aciim vanthlaang toeklek toekna yahawh oen law ai” tila ti.

He thlaang thli lawng caitoek khuep u tih thlaangtloe te a theet u; amami kah athe kawngaih te a vai u; amami oen amami te pawmsang u tih amami ngaihna dang ham tah thlaangtloe te thluethlue a koeh u.
Tede, Ka paya thli, mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah celtuih thli lawng n'hu vengah nangmi tengah avan thui u te hilh u boel.
Ahimi lawng avan thui tah “Atue boetna khawhin apha veng atah nangmi nuihbu kamring la aka thui thlaang thli, Pathen te tula sak ohla amami kawngaih aka vai thlaang law ai,” tila a thui te ni.
He ang thlaang thli he tah pekbona saikung amami kah pumsa ngaihna oen aka piin u tih Muithla aka khueh nawh thlaang thli ni.
Tede ka paya thli, nangmi tah namami kah aciim oengna dawngah namami oen namami tawm athap patoeng uh. Aciim Muithla tharana oen thangthui uh.
Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawng reenna rang oen dungyan hingna m'peek ham te na ring u van angla Pathen kah lungna dawngah awm uh.
Uepvoetna aka khueh thlaang thli tengah reenna khueh uh;
Hai khuikah thlaang thli te rot u langtah thlawn uh; thlaangtloe tengah te rihna oen reenna khueh uh, tede ahimi kah pumsa ngaihna thawlh noknakna himbai te tah thina uh.
Nangmi na tlim nawh hamla aka doen thai, nangmi thawlhna a ciing sak tih awmngaihna oen amah Bawilen ruep-awmna haiah kuun thaina pekung;

Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen pakhat bueng la aka awm Pathen, mami thlawnkung sawah acuekca kalawng khawseh, tahe ah khawseh ruep-awmna, tharana oen saithaina aana tah dungyan toela awm hawn seh. Amen.

He cabu he tah Jesuh Khrih lawng a phawng thaihu kawng thutna ni. He awlphawng tah aka thoeng yue ham koei te a tuihyoeihthlaang thli tengah tueng sak ham Pathen lawng a peek. Khrih lawngah he thaihu thli he a tuihyoeihthlaang Johan te ming sak hamla vanthlaang te a tuih tih,
Johan lawng a huh thaihu boeih te a thui. Pathen tengkah awlthang oen Jesuh Khrih lawng a phawng awltak tah he ni.

He cabu aka tae thli tah a kam awm phoeih tih tawngha kah awlthang awl aka hutung thli oen he cabu khuiah a thut he aka vai tah yotheen a dawng u. Metihtiah he thaihu boeih a thoengna ham atue tah yoeii tengkek poen.
Johan teng kalawng, Asia ram khuiah aka awm Khrihcabu pasarih tengah: Aka awm lii, aka awm poen tih aka awm poe ham koei Pathen teng kalawng amah ngawlhcoen hai kah Muithla pasarih teng kalawng,

duekna kalawng lamhacuekla aka tho, thincak sausi la aka awm, dilai sengpahrang boeih ukkung la aka awm Jesuh Khrih teng kalawng lungvatna oen ngaimawngna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh. Mami n'lungna tih a duekna oen mami he thawlhna kalawng aka loeih sak tih,
ana Pa oen Pathen kah bii te bi thai ham mami he sengpahrang la khawseh Khawsoeih la khaw seh aka saikung Jesuh Khrih tengah ruep-awmna oen huham tharana tah dungyan toe awm yoeyah hawn seh! Amen.

Bueh lah! ahih tah muui dawng kalawng va rum thuk! thlaang boeih lawng a huh ai, amah te cai oen aka thun hue lawngkhaw a huh u ai, Dilai sawkah thlaang boeih lawng rungrap u ai. Te tila awm roe hawn seh.
“Kai tah lamhacuek, oen hukhuengkoek ni tila aka awm lii, aka awm coeng poen tih aka awm poe ham koei Thara koek Bawipa Pathen lawng a thui.

Kai tah nangmi kah maya Johan ni. Jesuh kah hubang la ka awm van angla a Ram khuiah aka awm hue kah patang khangna aka ming haih na puei na paw van ni. Pathen kah awl oen awltak, Jesuh lawng a phawng te ka thui dawngah Kai he Patmos tuisanglak ah n'khueh.
Bawipa Hin ah Muithla lawng ka sawah n'tlaak thil tih pengsara awl angla angaihhlangla aka riing awl te ka hu ben ah ka yaak.

Te awl lawng, “Na huh thli he ca oen thut lang na thut cabu te he kah khawpui pasarih Efesa, Samarna, Perkamum, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia oen Laudisia ah aka awm Khrihcabu hue tengah pat peh,” tila a thui.
Te tila awl aka thui te huh hamla ket ka maang tih ka bueh vengah sui haivangna pasarih ka huh.
Te haivangna pasarih laklaw ah thlaanghing oen aka lo u pakhat pai, a khowsai toe aka pha baidung te a bai tih a raang dawngah sui cihin oen yeen u.
Ahih kah sam tah tuumul angla rawsawng angla bawk tih a mik tah hai angla alh;
a khow rawi tah hai dawng a thloei ruhum tuicii, a thuut heet angla thlupthlup pang tih a awl tah liksaituitlaak tuenn awl angla riing.
Ahih lawng a bantang kut ah aisi pasarih a pawm tih a kaa dawng kalawng voeivaang aka hatt samsen va thoeng. A mik-hai tah hingthun khawmik angla aang.
Ahih te ka huh vengah thlaangduek angla a khowkung ah ka tlim. A bantang kut te ka sawah a tloeng tih, “Rih boel! Kai tah lamhacuek oen hukhuengkoek la ka awm:
Kai tah aka hing ni! Kai tah ka duek, tede tahe ah kai tah dungyan toe yoeyahla ka hing poen. Kai lawng duekna oen thlaangduek khaaw celkhui sawah ukna aana ka khueh.
Tedawngah nang lawng na huh thaihu boeih tahe ah aka awmlii thaihu thli oen hai ben ah aka thoeng ham koei thaihu thli pahih bok la thut lah.

Ka bantang kut dawngah na huh aisi pasarih oen sui haivangna pasarih kah thuingaihna awlhuep tah he tila awm: aisi pasarih hue he tah Khrihcabu thli pasarih kah vanthlaang tih haivangna pasarih tah Khrihcabu pasarih ni.
“Efesa khaaw, Khrihcabu tengah he tila thut lah: A bantang kut ah aisi pasarih aka pawm tih sui haivangna pasarih tim ah aka yingyawi kah awl te tah he tila ni.

Kai lawng na sai boeih te ka ming; Metila thatlawh boep la bii na bi tih kawdaw oen na awm te khaw ka ming. Nangmi lawng thlaangthe sawah Khawdawp na ngaai thai nawh te ka ming tih celtuih la awm nawh de celtuih la ka awm aka ti te na noek na dak u tih, thlaangthaipalat ni tila na huh u te ka ming.
Nang tah na kaw daw, kai kawngah nang lawng patang na khang te na kaw boet nawh.
Tede ka kaw a lawna nawh pakhat awm: nang lawngah acuekca kah nan lungna angla tahe ah nan lungna tlaih nawh poen.

Metihtlukla adangla na tlaak thuk te poek lah! Na thawlhna te yut u lang acuekca kah na sai angla te sai lah. Nangmi lawng na thawlhna te na yut u nawh atah Nangmi tengla ka law vetih nangmi kah haivangna te huen tloe la kavan pawng poen ai.
Tede koeh ham pakhat tah awm: Nikolas hubang hue lawng a sai u te kai lawng ka thina van angla nangmi lawngkhaw na thina u van.

“Tedawngah yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Muithla lawng Khrihcabu hue tengah a thui he ya hawn seh! “Taakung la aka awm thli tah Pathen dum khuikah hingna thingthaih te caak thaina nawl ka peek ai” ti.
“Smarna khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah: “Lamhacuek oen hukhueng koek la aka awm; duek tih aka tho koep kah awl uen tah he tila awm.

Patang raina na tawng te ka ming; na khawdeng te khaw ka ming, tede nang tah kuirang tangtang! Judah thlaang nawh de, Judah thlaang la ka awm aka ti hue lawng na thaang a the sak u te ka ming; Ahimi tah Seitan kah thlaang ni!

Nang lawng patang khang ham koei me ang khaw rih boel. Hutung lah! Seitan lawng nangmi noekdakna ham thlaangvaang te thong ah a thlaak ai; nangmi kah patang khangna te hin ha khuiah boet ai. Duek toela kai ham uep-awm la awm lah; taana kutdo la hingna kan pe ai.
“Yaakna haa aka khueh lawng atah Muithla lawngah Khrihcabu thli tengah a thui awl he ya hawn seh! “Taakung la aka awm thli tah voeihih duekna kalawng loeih poen ai,” ti.
Perkamum khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah: “He awl tah voei vang aka hatt samsen khuehkung kah awl ni.

Ame huen ah na awm tite ka ming; Seitan lawng a bawi ngawlhcoen a khuehna huen ni. Ka sawah uep-awm la na awm dawngah kai hamla uep-awm sausi la aka awm Antipas te Seitan a awmna huen ah a ngawn u vengah pateng kai nan oengna te na hoett nawh.

Tede na sawah ka kaw a lawna nawh thaihu ayawlca awm: te tah nangmi tim ah Balaam kah cangpueina aka vai thlaang khatsut awm; Israel thlaangphun te thawlhna khuila mawt ham kutsai-muei thawthuengna caak awkk te caak ham hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen ah thawlh hamla Balaam lawngah Balak te a cang puei.
Tetih van angla Nikolas kah cangpueina aka vai thlaang khatsut nangmi tim ah awm.
Tedawngah tahe ah thawlhna yut u loeih! Thawlhna na yut u nawh atah nang tengah ka law yue vetih te thlaang hue te ka kaa khui kalawng aka thoeng samsen oen ka tloek ai.

“Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl he ya hawn seh! “Taakung la aka awm thli tah thuh elh la aka awm manna takawi te ka peek ai. Ahimi boeih te lungto abawk pakhat ah rip ka peek ai, te dawngkah a thut miing athaai te a-u lawngkhaw thuingaihna ming nawh vetih te lungto aka dang hue bueng lawng ni a ming ai.
Tiatira khaaw Khrihcabu kah van-thlaang tengah he tila thut lah! “Pathen Capa, a mik rawi hai angla alh tih a khow rawi tah ruhum thuut heet angla thlup aka pha kah awl uen tah he tila awm.
Kai lawng na sai boeih te ka ming. Lungna na khueh te ka ming. Acuek vengkah lak ah atlawh ngaaila tahe ah na bi te khaw ka ming.

Tede na sawah ka kaw a lawna nawh tah he ni: amah oen amah Pathen kah celtuih la ka awm aka ti hutaa Jezebel te nang lawng na thlahphaam sut te ni. Ahih lawng a cangpueina rang oen ka thlaang thli te hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen kutsaimuei thli thawthuengna caak awkk te caak hamla a mawt thawlh.
A thawlhna yut ham atue ka peek, tede ahih lawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna kalawng thawlh yut ham ngaih nawh.

Tedawngah ahih te ihkhun dawngah ka voeih sut vetih te ah te ahih oen samphaih haih thlaang thli te anat ngaaila patang a khang ai. Ahimi lawngah te hutaa oen athe thaihu a sai te a yut u nawh atah tahe roe ah patang ka khang sak ai.

Ahih kah a hubang hue te khaw ka ngawn boeih vetih tevengah kai tah thlaang boeih kah poekna oen kawngaihna mingkung tila Khrihcabu boeih lawng a ming ai. Nangmi pakhat rip he na saina taring ah kan thung ai.

“Tede Tiatira khaaw kah thlaang-tloe hue lawngtah athe cangpueina te na vai u nawh tih thlaangtloe hue lawngah Seitan kah awlhuep dung a ti u te khaw na cang u nawh. Nangmi te atloe thalrih khatca khaw phueih sak ham ka ngaih nawh.
Tede na khueh u tangte te kai ka law toe acakla phoeih uh.
“Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl te ya hawn seh.” a tina.

Sardis khaaw Khrihcabu kah van-thlaang tengah he tila thut lah: “Pathen kah Muithla pasarih oen aisi pasarih khuehkung kah awl tah he tila awm. Nang lawng na sai te ka ming; nang tah aka hing angla na thaang theen, tede nang tah na duek tite ka ming!
Tedawngah hinghang langtah na khueh hun thaihu thli te a duek boeih taktak thlan ah na tha thlue sak koep uh. Nang lawng na sai thaihu te ka Pathen haiah soep thlan hun tite ka ming.

Tedawngah nang n'cang puei tangte thli oen na yaak tangte thli te hilh boel; te thli te vai langtah na thawlhna yut loeih. Nang lawng na hinghang nawh atah thlaanghuuen angla na teng ka law vetih ka lawna atue pateng na ming manawh.
Tede Sardis khaaw ah aka awm thlaang ayawl lawngtah na himbai te aciimcala na khueh u hun. Himbai bawk bai oen kai oen ah n'yingyawi haih u ai.
Taakung la aka awm hue lawngtah he ang himbai bawk a bai u vetih ka thlaang ni ka tina ai.
“Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl he ya hawn seh!

“Filadelfia khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah: “He awl he tah aka ciim tih ataktang la aka awm tengkah awl ni. Ahih tah Devid kah caabi tukung la awm tih, ahih lawng thawhka a awng veng atah a-u lawngkhaw khai khoep thai nawh vetih ahih lawng thawhka a khaih khoep atah, a-u lawngkhaw awng thai manawh.

Nang lawng na sai te ka ming; nang lawng tha-awm tharana yoehca ni na khueh de kai lawng kan cang puei te na vai tih uep-awm la kai ham na awm te kan ming. Na haiah thawhka pakhat kavan awng poen, te tah a-u lawngkhaw khai khoep thai manawh.

Hutung lah! Judah thlaang la ka awm ti u tih Judah thlaang tak nawh hoem thui hue te tah Seitan kah thlaang thli te nangmi haiah kavan law sak vetih na khow kungah ka buekuep sak ai. Nang kan lungna te ahimi boeih lawng a ming ai.
Thinsan kawdaw oen ueh hamla awl kan peek te na vai u dawngah, dilai sawkah thlaang boeih noekdakna hamla dilai dawngah aka law ham koei patang raina atue ah kan loeih sak ai.
Kai tah ka law yue ai. Nang kah taana kutdo te a-u lawngkhaw avan rot nawh ham na khueh thaihu te atheenla kuemkawl uh.

Taakung la aka awm tah ka Pathen kah tempal bok-im tuung la ka liing vetih ahih lawng tempal bok-im te metuek vengah khaw thoeih taak manawh. Vaan kah ka Pathen teng kalawng aka law, Jerusalem thaai ka Pathen kah khawpui miing thaai oen ah ka Pathen kah a miing te ahih pum dawngah ka thut ai. Ahih pum dawngah ka miing a thai te khaw ka thut baal ai.
“Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui he ya hawn seh!

“Laudisia khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah: “Pathen lawng a suen thaihu boeih kah akungcuek la aka awm tih uep-awm oen ah ataktang sausi la aka awm Amen teng kah awl uenna tah he tila awm.
Nang lawng na sai boeih te ka ming; Nang tah ading khaw na ding nge nawh tih aling khaw na ling nge nawh te kan ming. Nang he ading tihnawhtah aling pakhat khat la na awm ham ka ngaih!
Tede nang tah aling khaw na ling nge nawh, ading khaw na ding nge nawh tih pawl-oep la na awm dawngah nang tah ka kaa khui kalawng kan tha poen ai!

Nang lawngah, “Kai tah ka bawi ka len tih ka voetna awm nawh; ka ngoe boeih te ka khueh’, na ti. Tede nang tah metihtlukla na khawdeng tih reen kap la na awm te na ming nawh! Nang tah na khawdeng, atliing ayaal la na awm tih na mik pum de lah koen.

Tedawngah bawilen kuirang taktang la na awmna ham kai teng kah sui tuiciil te lai hamla poekna theen kan peek. Atliing ayaal yaraula na awm te khukdahna ham oen ah na buen ham khaw, na mik a tuengna ham miksii te khaw lai baal.
Kai lawngtah ka lungna thlaang boeih te ka toel ka thaam tih dan ka tat. Tedawngah na tha thlue sak lang na thawlhna yut lah.
Hutung lah! Thawhka ah ka pai tih ka khooek; a-u lawngkhaw ka awl a yaak tih thawh a awng atah, a im khuila ka kuun vetih ahih oen buh ka caak haih vetih ahih khaw kai oen ah buh a caak haih van ai.
Kai tah taakung la ka awm tih tahe ah a Pa kah a bawingawlhcoen tengah ka ngawlh van angla, taakung la aka awm thli te ka bawingawlhcoen sawah kai oen haih ngawlhna nawl te ka peek ai.
“Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl he ya hawn seh!”

He coengah atloe huhthlaam ka huh tih vaan ah thawhka aka awng u pakhat te ka huh. Acuek vengkah ka yaak tih awl akavan thui pengsara awl tuen angla aka riing awl lawngah, “He la he law hang lah, he coengah aka thoeng ham koei te kan huh sak ai.” tila a thui.
Kawlkalh ah Muithla lawng pahoei ng'awm puei tih vaan ah bawi ngawlhcoen pakhat awm, te ngawlhcoen dawngah thlaang pakhat ngawl.
Ahih kah mik-hai tah lungto phutlo jaspa oen karnelian angla aang tih bawi-ngawlhcoen tengvaai ah te emaral lungto araawng angla aka awm malpacung te awm.
Te kah bawingawlhcoen te atloe bawi ngawlhcoen pakul palii lawng a veel, te kah bawingawlhcoen dawngah himbai bawk a bai tih suilumuek aka muek ahaamca pakul palii ngawl u.
Bawi-ngawlhcoen dawng kalawng khaw thlappha tih khawhumm awl oen rekk tlaak awl va thoeng. Bawingawlhcoen haiah haithoei pasarih aka vang te awm tih te haithoei tah Pathen Muithla pasa-rih ni.

Bawingawlhcoen haiah tuikhal angla ciil tih thlalang tuilii oen aka lo u te awm. Te kah bawingawlhcoen a teng avai ah ramsa hing palii lawng a veel khoep tih te ramsa hing tah a hu a haiah a mik hooeng la awm.

Ramsa hing lamhacuek pakhatna te tah sathueng oen lo u, apahihna tah vaitaw oen lo u tih a pathumna te tah thlaanghing mik-hai oen aka lo u mik-hai a khueh tih apaliina te tah aka sawng lii tuhuum oen lo u.

Ramsa hing palii boeih lawngah phe paruk rip a khueh u tih akhui oen adau ah mik hooeng la betoet. Ahimi lawngah yiin oen daai toeng tlaih ohla: “Aciim, aciim, aciim tah Bawilen koek Bawipa Pathen ni, Ahih tah aka awm poen, aka awm lii oen aka awm poe ham koei ni,” tila laa a sak u.
Ramsa hing palii lawng bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl tih dungyan dungyan toe aka hing te ruep-awmna, hinyahna oen awmngaihna oen ah a thangpawm u.

Te tila a thangpawm u vengah ahaamca pakul palii lawng bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl haih te buekuep u tih dungyan dungyan toe aka hing te a bok u. A suilumuek thli te bawi-ngawlhcoen haiah a tloeng u tih,

“Kaimi kah Bawipa oen Pathen! Nang lawngah ruep-awmna, hinyahna oen huham tharana te dang hamla tuueng ta-ngak, Metihtiah soeprep thaihu he nang lawng na sai tih na kawngaih angla, te thli te na awm sak tih na hing sak,” tila a thui u.
Bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl lawng a bantang kut ah cayaawl pakhat a pawm te ka huh. Te cayaawl tah khatben khatbang ah ca a thut boeih tih tacik pasarih oen a heen.
Tecoengah tha aka ra tangkiik vanthlaang pakhat ka huh tih te vanthlaang lawng, “A-u nuem he thawhcang heen aka phe tih cayaawl thlam ham aka tuueng?” tila angaihhlangla a paang awl te ka yaak.
Tede te cayaawl te thlam tih akhuiben bueh ham koei vaan ah khaw, dilai dawngkhaw, dilai dangah khaw a-u khatca khaw awm nawh,
Te cayaawl te aka thlam ham oen akhuiben aka bueh ham khatca khaw a huh u nawh dawngah thloekthloek ka rap.

Tevengah ahaamca pakhat lawng, “Rap boel, Bueh lah! Judah phun khuikah Sathueng, Devid cadil aka lenduet lawngah taana a khueh poen tih thawhcang pasarih te a phe thai tih cayaawl te a thlam thai.” tila avan thui.

Tecoengah tuuca pakhat bawingawlhcoen alungkir ah pai tih ramsa hing palii oen ahaamca thli lawng a veel khoep te ka huh. Te tuuca tah ngawn tangte angla awm. Te tuuca lawng ki pasarih oen mik pasarih a khueh tih; te mik pasarih tah dilai pum ah tuih la aka awm Pathen Muithla pasarih te ni.
Tuuca lawng cet tih bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl kah bantang ben kut ah a pawm cayaawl te a lawh.

Te tila a lawh vengah te ramsa hing palii hue oen ahaamca hue pakul palii tah tuuca haiah buekuep u. Pakhat rip lawngah tingtoeng pakhat rip a khueh u tih riimtuui oen ah aka bepir sui boengloeng pakhat rip a pawm u, te riimtuui tah Pathen thlaang thli kah thangthuina ni.

Ahimi lawng, “Nang tah cayaawl te lawh ham oen tacik te phe tih thlam hamla na tuueng roe. Metihtiah n'ngawn u tih nang kah Luciik duekna oen thlaangphun soeprep, awlcawm awlcee, ram tawm oen namtawm te Pathen ham na lai poen.
Nang lawng ahimi te mami kah Pathen bii aka bi ham khawsoeih la khaw sengpahrang la khaw na sai poen dawngah ahimi lawng dilai he a uk u poen ai,” tila laa thaai te a sak u.
Tecoeng ka bueh koep vengah vanthlaang toeklek toekna nawh kah awl te ka yaak! Ahimi lawngah bawingawlhcoen te khaw, ramsa hing palii oen ah ahaamca hue te a veel tih pai u,
angaihhlangla laa a sak u tih: “A ngawn u Tuuca lawngah Huham tharana oen kuirangna, Cuihna oen tharana, hinyahna oen ruep-awmna oen ah thangpawmna tah dang hamla tuueng ta-ngak,” ti u.

Tecoengah vaan ah aka awm boeih oen dilai dawngah khaw, dilai dangkah aka awm boeih, tuitunlii ah aka awm boeih oen Khawhipuempa kah aka hing boeih lawng: “Bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl tuuca tengah thaangtheenna oen hinyahna, ruep-awmna oen tharana tah yoeyahla dungyan toe awm hawn seh,” tila laa a sak te ka yaak.
Ramsa hing palii hue lawngah te, “Amen!” tila a thui u tih ahaamca hue lawng buekuep u tih a bok u.
Tecoengah tuuca lawng tacik deng pasarih khuikah lamhacuek tacik deng a awng te ka huh tih ramsa hing palii khuikah pakhat lawng khawhumm awl angla aka humm awl oen “Law lah” a ti awl te ka yaak.
Ka bueh vengah marang bawk pakhat ka huh. Te marang aka cit lawngah li pakhat a pawm, ahih te bawilumuek pakhat a peek u. Taakung la aka awm lawng taa hamla aka cet angla te cet.
Tecoengah tuuca lawng tacik deng pahihna te a awng tih ramsa hing pahihna lawng, “Law lah” a ti awl te ka yaak.
Tecoengah atloe marang seen pakhat va thoeng. Marang aka cit tengah te thlaanghing pakhat oen khat ngawn u the ham, dilai ah raal thawh sakna aana te khaw a peek. Ahih te samsen bo hlang a peek.

Tuuca lawngah tacik deng pathumna te a awng vengah ramsa hing pathumna lawng, “Law lah” a ti awl te ka yaak. Ka bueh vengah marang muuem pakhat ka huh. Marang aka cit lawng te a kut dawngah cawi a pawm.
Ramsahing palii tim kalawng awl aka thoeng pakhat ka yaak tih, “Hin at kah thapang phu ah sangvut tah suum at, balii tah suum thum peek la awm. Tede olif thingkung oen misur dum thli tah phe boel ti.
Tecoengah Tuuca lawng tacik deng apaliina te a phe tih a awng, ramsa hing apaliina lawng, “Law lah” a ti awl te ka yaak.

Ka bueh vengah marang pawlvawkk pakhat te ka huh. Te marang aka cit te Duekna a miingna tih a hu ah Hell lawng a vai tawkkhak. Ahimi te dilai thloep lii ah thloep at te raalpui oen khaw, khawkha oen khaw, tlawhnatna oen khaw, ngawn hamla ukna aana a peek.
Tecoengah Tuuca lawng apa-ngaana tacik deng te a awng. Pathen awl a phawng u tih uep-awm sausi la a awm dawngah a ngawn u thlaang thli kah Muithla thli te bokna-thaang huiah ka huh.
Ahimi lawng angaihhlangla pang u tih, “Aka ciim tih aka doeng Thara koek Bawipa! Kaimi aka ngawn dilai thlaang thli he awlcek nawh tih dan tat ohla metuek toe nuem na awm hun ai” ti u.
Ahimi te baidung bawk pakhat rip a peek tih, ahimi angla ngawn ham aka awm biibipuei thli oen maya manau thli asoep thlantoe kawlkalh ah duem hamla a thui pe u.
Tecoengah Tuuca lawng tacik deng parukna te a awng te ka huh. Likluei angaih-hlangla hinghuen tih khawmik khaw himbai pawn amuuem angla muuem tih thla khaw apum boeih la thisen angla ling.
Thlipui lawng a hinghoek tih thaidut thaih munkang a thing dawngkah a rul angla vaan kah aisi thli khaw dilai la tla.
Vaan khaw cayaawl angla yaawl u tih ha-ata boeih oen tuisanglak boeih khaw a awmna huen kalawng thoeih boeih u.

Tecoengah dilai han sengpahrang boeih ukkung thli boeih oen raalbawi boeih, kuirang thlaanglen thli oen huham tharana boeih oen ah thlaangtloe boeih, saltamnaa oen thlaangcuem boeih lawngah tlaang kah lungnu thlip oen lungkaw khuiah thuh u boeih.
Ahimi lawngah tlaang oen lungnu nala te “kaimi he n'naam langtah bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl kah mik huh oen Tuuca kah thinsana kalawng ng'thlip u lah!
Ahimi kah thinsana rih awm khawhin tah avan pha poen, a-u lawng a ueh thai ai?” tila paang u.

Tecoengah dilai akil palii ah aka pai vanthlaang palii te ka huh. Ahimi lawng dilai saw oen tuitunlii ah khaw, thingkung thlii dawngah khaw, khaw-athli nawh ham dilai a kil palii kah yilh te khak a tuuk u.

Tecoeng ah aka hing Pathen kah tacik deng aka pawm vanthlaang pakhat lawng khawcuuk ben kalawng a law hang te ka huh. Ahih lawng dilai oen tuitunlii sawah patang khang sak thaina aka khueh vanthlaang palii hue te angaihhlangla paang tih a khue.

Te kah vanthlaang lawng, “Ka Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli kah a tal ah thawhcang ka heen thlan ah nangmi lawng dilai oen tuitunlii oen ah thingkung thli sawah raina pha sak u boel de,” tila a thui.
Tecoengah Pathen kah thawhcang oen a heen thlaangmi tah thong yakhat coeng thong sawmlii coengah thong lii a awm te avan thui. Te thli tah Israel thlaangphun paha thlaihih khuikah tih,

Tecoeng atah ka bueh vengah a-u lawngkhaw a toek lek nawh thlaangping te ka huh. Ahimi tah awlcawm awlcee aka thui nam tawm oen phun soeprep peng tawm ram tawm kah aka law boeih tih Ahimi lawng himbai bawk bai oen samtoe a pawm u tih bawingawlhcoen oen Tuuca haiah pai u.
Ahimi lawng, “Thlawnna tah bawingawlh-coen dawng aka ngawl Pathen oen Tuuca teng kalawng ni a law” tila paang u.
Vanthlaang boeih lawng bawingawlhcoen oen ahaamca hue oen ah ramsahing palii te a veel khoep tih pai u. Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen haiah buekuep u tih Pathen te a bok u tih,
“Amen! Thaangtheenna, ruep-awmna, cuihna, awmngaihkoehna, hinyahna, huham tharana oen tha-awmna tah Pathen kah koeva la dungyan dungyan toe awm hawn seh! Amen!” tila a thui u.
Ahaamca thli tim kah pakhat lawngah, “Himbai bawk aka bai hue he a-u hue kai? ahimi he ame kalawng a law u?” tila kai te n'doet.

Kai lawng, “Ka ming nawh, Bawipa, Nang lawng ni na ming,” ka tina. Ahih lawngah, “He kah thlaang hue he tah mueirihtamyiin heemtekna kalawng aka loeih thli ni, Ahimi lawng Tuuca thisen oen a himbai te a suk u tih aciim sak u poen.
Tedawngah ahimi lawng Pathen kah bawingawlhcoen haiah pai u tih yiin oen daai tempal bok-im ah bii te a bi pe u. Bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl lawngah ahimi te a awm puei vetih a thlip adah poen ai.
Ahimi lawngtah buhpawng tuihalh khaw ming koep u tlaih manawh; ahimi te khawling lawngkhaw kaang nawh vetih aling a-alh lawngkhaw daw yet tlaih manawh.

Metihtiah bawingawlhcoen alungkir ah aka awm Tuuca te tah ahimi doenkung tuudoen la awm vetih hingna tuibaap la te a ceh puei ai. Pathen lawngah ahimi kah mikphitui boeih te a huih pe poen ai,” tila avan thui.
Tuuca lawng tacik deng pasa-rihna te a awng vengah vaan ah khawnoek tentan yunyan dipsiditla awm.
Tecoengah Pathen haiah aka pai vanthlaang pasarih te ka huh tih pengsara pasarih te a peek u.

Atloe vanthlaang pakhat riimtuui huihthlutna pakhat aka pawm te law tih bokna-thaang tengah te pai. Bawingawlhcoen haiah aka awm sui oen a sai bokna-thaang dawngah Pathen thlaang boeih kah thangthuina oen nawn haih ham riimtuui yahawh hlang ahih te a peek.
Huihthlutna haikhu tah Pathen haiah aka pai vanthlaang kut dawng kalawng Pathen thlaang thli kah thangthuina oen ah asawla luui haih.
Tecoengah vanthlaang lawngah riimtuui beeldung te a lawh tih bokna-thaang dawngkah haialh te akhuila a sang coengah dilai la a voeih. Khaw humm tih rekk tla, khaw thlappha tih likluei hinghuen.
Tecoengah vanthlaang pasarih lawng pengsara pasarih tum hamla kamthlah u.

Lamhacuek vanthlaang lawng pengsara te a tum vengah thisen oen aka thoekk u hai oen reel te dilai la tla. Dilai thloep thum ah thloep at, thingkung thloep thum ah thloep at oen ramtliim khaw ung boeih.
Vanthlaang pahihna lawng pengsara te a tum vengah tlaang angla aka bo thaihu pakhat te tih hai angla aka alh te tuitunlii khuila tla. Tuitunlii thloep thum ah thloep at te thisen la coengg boeih tih,
tuitunlii khuiah aka hing boeih thloep thum ah thloep at te duek boeih tih tuisangphaw thloep thum ah thloep at te rawk boeih.
Tecoengah vanthlaang pathumna lawng pengsara a tum vengah haithoei hairawng angla aka alh aisi pakhat vaan kalawng tuiva oen sawkca thloep thum thloep at dawngah tla.
(Te aisi tah “Khahiik” a miingna) Tui thloep thum ah thloep at tah tuikha la coeng boeih tih, te tila khahiik aih dawngah tui aka aw thlaang boehoengla duek.

Tecoengah vanthlaang apaliina lawng pengsara a tum vengah khawmik thloep thum ah thloep at tah see tlaih nawh tih thla khaw thloep thum ah thloep at, aisi thloep thum ah thloep at vaang tlaih nawh. A aangna thloep thum ah thloep at auh boeih. Yiin thloep thum ah thloep at, daai thloep thum ah thloep at ah aangna te awm tlaih nawh.

Tecoeng ka bueh vengah vaan asanghlang khawhi ah aka sawng tuhuum pakhat lawng angaihhlangla, “khawmap! khawmap! vanthlaang atloe pathum hue lawng pengsara a tum veng atah dilai thlaang boeih hamla metihtlukla khaw amap ai” tila a paang awl te ka yaak.
Tecoengah vanthlaang pa-ngaana lawng pengsara a tum vengah vaan kalawng dilai la aisi pakhat a tlaak thuk te ka huh, te kah aisi tengah aka boet nawh ungrawmdung awngna caabi te a peek.
Ungrawmdung te aisi lawng a awng vengah haikhu te vahhai haikhu angla thoeng hang. Te haikhu lawng khawmik oen yilh te a yiin sak khoep.
Te kah haikhu khui kalawng khaurang thli va thoeng tih dilai la rum thuk, te kah khaurang thli te celkhui ta-ai angla tharana te a peek.

Te kah khaurang thli te dilai han kah ramtliim khaw thingkung rawkung oen atloe thingkung khaw, phe ham awl pe nawh tih a tal ah Pathen kah tacik deng aka awm nawh thlaang thli bueng ni te thli lawng a phe thai ai.
thlaang thli he ngawn hamla tah khaurang thli te awl pe nawh. Tede thla ngaa khuiah ngan bawh tah a peek vetih celkhui ta-ai kah atah tlawh angla tlo ai.
Te kah thla ngaa khuiah thlaang thli lawng duekna te a tlap u ai, tede duekna te dang u manawh; duek ham a ngaih u suide ahimi te duekna lawng a reel ai.
Te khaurang thli tah raal kah ham, kamthlah oepsoeh marang oen lo u; te thli tah a luu dawngah suilumuek oen aka lo u te a muek tih a mik-hai thli tah thlaanghing mik-hai angla awm.
Te thli kah a sam tah hutaa kah sam oen lo u tih a naw thli tah sathueng naw oen lo u.
A raang dawngah thii-rangphaw oen aka lo u te a daan tih a phe humm awl tah raaltukna ah aka cet marang-lengg thli kah tuenpau awl oen lo u.
Te kah khaurang thli lawng celkhui ta-ai kah a mai angla aka sum pikyik te a khueh tih thla ngaa khuiah thlaang nganbawh yaak sak thaina a sue awm.

Ahimi lawng ukkung sengpahrang a khueh u tih te ukkung tah boet nawh ungrawmdung ukkung vanthlaang te ni. A miing tah Hebru awl la Abaddon a miingna tih Krik awl la tah Apollion a miingna. (thui ngaihna tah “phekung” tina ni.)
Lamhacuek kah mueirihtamyiin pakhatna tah boeih poen; He coengah mueirihtamyiin pahihna law hun ai.
Tecoengah aparukna vanthlaang lawng pengsara te a tum vengah Pathen haiah aka awm sui oen a sai bokna-thaang kah akil palii kalawng awl pakhat aka law te ka yaak.
Te awl lawngah pengsara aka tum vanthlaang aparukna te, “Yufratis tuivapui ah a khawh mangkhak vanthlaang palii hue te thlah loeih,” a tina.
Vanthlaang palii hue te a thlah u. Ahimi te he kum, he thla, he khawhin kah atue atang roe ah dilaipum kah thlaangmi thloep thum ah thloep at te ngawn hamla aka awm oepsoeh thlaang hue poen ni.
Marang aka cit raalkap tah apum boeih la millian yahnih awm tila avan thui.

Huhthlaam ka huhna dawngah marang thli oen marang aka cit thli lawng hai angla a lingduuk, safaiar lungto phutlo khawcil angla a hiing, kat angla engpawn la aka awm rangphaw a khueh u te ka huh. Marang luu thli tah sathueng luu oen ah lo u tih te thli kah a kaa khui kalawng hairawng, haikhu oen kat haialh va thoeng.
Marang thli kah kaa khui kalawng aka thoeng hai, haikhu oen kat haialh tlawhtahaw pathum lawngah thlaanghing thloep thum ah thloep at te a ngawn boeih.
Marang thli kah huham tharana tah a kaa oen a mai dawngah awm. A mai thli tah ruul angla a luu awm tih te a mai te thlaang nganbawh peekna ham a hawna.

He kah tlawhtahaw ah aka duek nawh tih aka deem thlaang hue lawngah amami kah sai cawplap thaihu te hoett u nawh. Ahimi lawng raaithe a bok te khaw toeng nawh tih mik aka tueng nawh, haa aka pang, aka tatvuet thai nawh sui, ngun, ruhum, lungto, thing oen a sai kutsaimuei a bok te khaw toeng u nawh.
Ahimi lawngah thlaang ngawnna, mu-uih caakna, hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen huencaanna te khaw yut u nawh.

Tecoengah tha aka ra vanthlaang atloe pakhat vaan kalawng a rum thuk te ka huh. Ahih lawngah muui oen yaawl u tih a luu te malpacung oen a yeen; A mik-hai tah khawmik oen lo u tih a khow rawi tah aka alh hai tuung angla awm.
A kut dawngah cayaawl ayiit pakhat a dai phak tih a pawm. A bantang khow oen tuitunlii te a caawt tih a voei khow oen dilai te a caawt,
Sathueng kaawk awl angla angaihhlangla te paang. Te tila a paang coengah khawhumm awl pasarih lawng avan roei.
Khawhumm pasarih kah awlthui te thut hamla ka kamthlah vengah vaan kah awl lawngah “khawhumm pasarih kah awl te awlhuep la khueh, thut boel de!” a ti te ka yaak.

Tecoengah tuitunlii oen dilai dawngah aka pai vanthlaang ka huh te lawngah a bantang kut te vaan benla a phawh tih, dungyan, dungyan toe aka hing tih vaan, dilai oen tuitunlii oen ah soeprep thaihu saikung,
Pathen miing oen ah awlkamna a sai. Vanthlaang lawngah, “Diw aih tlaih manawh!
Pathen lawng amah kah tuihyoeih tawngha hue tengah a thuisut angla Vanthlaang pasarih lawng pengsara a tum vengah a kamthlahna awlhuep te soep badai” tila a thui.
Tecoengah vaan kah awl ka yaak pakhat lawngah avan thui koep baal tih “Cet langtah dilai oen tuitunlii sawah aka pai vanthlaang kut dawngkah cayaawl a dai phak te lo lah” n'tina.
Vanthlaang tengla te ka cet tih, cayaawl yiitca te m'peekna ham ka bih. Vanthlaang lawng, “lo langtah ca lah; na bung khui atah khahiik vetih na kaa dawng tah khawitui angla didip ai” ti.
A kut dawngkah cayaawl yiitca te ka lawh tih ka caak, ka kaa dawngah khawitui angla didip tih ka bung khui atah khahiik sut.
Tecoengah van-thlaang lawng “Pathen lawng peng tawm ram tawm thlaangphun boeihboeih awlcawm awlcee oen ah sengpahrang thli kawng a thui awl te nang lawngah na thui pe koep ham awm,” tila avan thui.
Tecoengah tahna cungkui angla aka awm caapu thing pakhat te kai m'peek tih, “Cet lang Pathen kah tempal bok-im oen bokna-thaang te tah lah, tempal bok-im khuiah Pathen aka bok thli te khaw toek lah.
Tede tempal bok-im adauben kah talawng te hooep de, tah boel, metihtiah te huen te thlaangphun tloe thli a peek tih, ahimi lawng Aciim Khawpui te thla sawmlii thla hih khui a khow oen a caawt u ai.
Kai lawng sausi la thlaang pahih ka tuih ai, ahih rawi lawng tlamhi te a bai hih vetih khawhin thongkhat yahnih sawmruk khui Pathen awl te a phawng hih ai.” tila a thui.
Te sausi pahih te tah dilai Bawipa haiah aka pai olif thing pahih oen haiim pahih te ni.

A-u lawngkhaw te sausi pahih te nganbawh peek ham aka ngaih tah ahih rawi kah kaa khui kalawng aka thoeng hai oen a raal thli te boeih a ngawn; a-u lawngkhaw te rawi te nganbawh peek ham aka yawm boeih te tah he tila a ngawn boeih ai.

Ahih rawi lawngah Pathen awl a phawng vengkah atue atang khuiah khawtlan nawh ham ah vaan te khaihkhoep ham aana a khueh. Ahih rawi lawng sawkca tuiva tui khaw thisen la coengg sak ham aana a khueh; Te rawi lawngah amah ngaih vengah dilai he tlawhtahaw phun soeprep oen tlawh sak ham aana a khueh baal.
Te rawi lawng Pathen kah awlthang te a phawng hih coeng atah aka boet nawh ungrawmdung khui kalawng satluung te thoeng hang vetih te rawi te a teek ai. Te rawi te a taa vetih a ngawn ai.
ahih rawi kah a rawkk te a bawipa a ngawnna khawpui kah noekna a miing tah Sodom, tih-nawhtah Iyipt tila awm.
Ram boeih, thlaangphun boeih, awlcawm awlcee aka cal oen nam tawm lawngah hin thum coeng hin vaang toe ah ahih rawi kah a rawkk te a bueh u vetih up hamla a khang khak u ai.

He tawngha pahih lawng thlaanghing sawah patang khangna broela a thoeng sak dawngah, he tawngha pahih a duek dawngah dilai thlaang thli tah awmngaih u ai, pakhat oen khat kutdo pe u the vetih taana poei a sai u ai.

Khawhin hin thum coeng hin vaang adiw coengah Pathen tengkah hingna hill law tih te rawi kah a kaw khuiah kuun, te rawi lawng tho tih pai hih. Te rawi te aka hu boeih tah a phuu hluih tho tih caalla a rih u.
Tecoengah tawngha rawi lawng, “He la va luui hang!” tila angaihhlangla a tina awl te a yaak hih. A raal thli kah mik huh roe maiah muui dawngah te vaan la luui hang.

Teveng tue roe ah te likluei angaihhlangla hinghuen tih khawpui thloep ha ah thloep at tah rawk boeih tih thlaang thongsarih duek. Aka awm hun thlaang thli lawng lakueng u tih vaan ah aka awm Pathen kah alenna te a thangpawm u.
Mueirihtamyiin pahihna tah boeih poen; Tede apathumna mueirihtamyiin, te va thoeng yue ai.

Tecoengah pasarihna vanthlaang lawng pengsara a tum tih angaihhlangla aka humm vaan kah awl lawng, “Dilai ukna huham tharana tah mami kah Bawipa oen amah kah Messiah tengah tahe ah awm poen tih dungyan toela a uk poen ai!” tila a thui.
Tevengah bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl ahaamca pakul palii hue lawngah buekuep u tih Pathen te a bok u,
“Thara koek Bawipa Pathen, Nang tah tahe ah aka awm lii oen aka awm coeng la na awm! Na bawilenna huham thara te na hawna tih uk hamla na tong poen dawngah kan uem tangkiik!

Tahe kah atue he tah na thinsa a lawna atue tih thlaangduek thli awlcekna atue la a awm dawngah, Pathen a ka bok nawh thli tah a thinsa tangkiik. Tahe kah atue he tah na tuihyoeih tawngha thli oen na thlaang thli boeih, nang aka hinyah ayiit abo boeih kutdo peekna atue ni. Dilai aka phekung thli phena ham atue tah avan pha poen!” tila a thui.
Tevengah vaan ah aka awm Pathen tempal bok-im te awng u tih Tempal bok-im khuikah Awlkam Kong te tueng. Tecoengah khaw thlappha tih rekk tla, khaw humm, likluei hinghuen tih reelnu thoei.
Tecoengah vaan dawngah kawpoekrai noekna bohlang pakhat va tueng. Hutaa pakhat lawng khawmik te himbai la a bai, thla te a khow oen a caawt tih aisi paha thlaihih aka awm bawilumuek te a muek.
Camoe awm tawm-alel tih ca awm tlawh oen paang.
Vaan ah atloe kawpoekrai noekna pakhat va tueng. Ruultluung bohlang alingduuk pakhat, luu pasarih oen ki paha thlaihih a khueh tih a luu dawngah bawilumuek pakhat rip a muek.
Ahih lawngah vaan kah aisi thloep thum ah thloep at te a mai oen ah a khawl tih dilai la a voeih. Ruultluung lawngah camoe te a awm atah doelh pahoei hamla a ca awm tawm-alel hutaa haiah te pai.
Tecoengah thlaangphun boeih te thii cungpoelh oen uk hamla a capa te hutaa lawng a cuun. Tede camoe te a rot pe tih Pathen oen a bawingawlhcoen tengla a khuen.
Te hutaa tah Pathen lawng aroek abah pe sut ramhum huhang la te viil u vik. Te huen ah ahih te khawhin thongkhat yahnih sawmruk khui a cawm acah u.
Tecoengah vaan ah raalpui tho. Maikal oen a vanthlaang thli lawng Ruultluung te a teek u tih ruultluung lawngah khaw, ahimi te a vanthlaang thli oen a teek u van;
Tede ruultluung tah sung tih amah oen a vanthlaang thli lawng vaan ah awm ham dang u tlaih nawh.
Dilai pum thailatnakung Seitan, tihnawhtah Raaibawi aka miingna suenyan kah ruultluung bohlang te a vanthlaang thli oen dilai la avan thlaak haih.

Tecoengah vaan ah angaihhlang paang awl te ka yaak tih, “Pathen kah thlawnna tah tahe ah law poen! Pathen lawng sengpahrang angla amah huham tharana te a tueng sak poen! Tahe tah Messiah lawng amah aana te a tueng sak poen! Metihtiah Pathen haiah pai tih yiin, daai ah mami kah maya manau thli thawlh aka peelkung te vaan adaubenla a voeih poen.
Mami kah maya manau thli lawng Tuuca kah thisen rang oen amami lawng a thui awltak oen khaw Seitan te a taa poen; ahimi lawng a hingna peek tih duek ham toe a hep u poen.

Tedawngah nangmi vaan oen vaan ah aka awm boeih lawng awmngaih u lah! tecakhaw dilai oen tuitunlii hamla tah khawmap tangkiik mah aw! Metihtiah Raaibawi tah nang hih tengla va law thuk tih atue soetca bueng ni a awm tite a ming vengah a thin so sut poen.” tila a thui.
Ruultluung lawng, kai he dilai la dawng thuk la ka awm poen tila a ming vengah, a ca tawngpa aka cuun hutaa te a hu ah khek a vai.
Te hutaa lawng a awmna ramhum huhang la a sawng thaina ham tuhuum bohlang kah a phe pahih te a peek, ruultluung lawng a teek thai nawh ham te huen ah te kumthum coeng kum vaang doencang la awm.
Tecoengah ruultluung lawngah hutaa te tui yawh sak ham a kaa khui kalawng tuiliw te nawl a tha.
Tede dilai lawngah a kaa angg tih ruultluung kaa khuikah aka law tuiliw te a doelh boeih tih hutaa te a bawm.
Ruultluung tah hutaa sawah te a thin sa soeh tih hutaa kah cadil aka deem hue, Pathen kah awlpeek boeih aka vai oen Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak acakla aka phoeih boeih te teek hamla cet.
Ruultluung tah tuitunliikeeng ah te pai.

Tecoengah tuitunlii khuikah sa-tluung aka thoeng hang te ka huh. Te satluung lawngah ki paha oen luu pasarih a khueh tih ki pakhat dawngah bawilumuek pakhat rip a muek u tih a luu dawngah Pathen asal aphaamna miing pakhat rip awm.

Te satluung tah kaithleng oen lo u, a khow thli tah vawm khow oen lo u tih a kaa tah sathueng kaa oen lo u. Ruultluung lawngah kaithleng te amah kah tharana, a bawingawlhcoen oen aka bo koek ukna aana te a peek.
Satluung kah a luu pakhat tah duek puei koei boengha a caak angla awm de a boengha te hoeih koep poen. Dilai thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tih satluung hu ah bang u.

Ruultluung tah amah kah aana te satluung tengah pekung la a awm dawngah thlaang boeih lawng ruultluung te a bok u. Ahimi lawngah, “Satluung oen a-u nuem aka lo u? A-u lawng nuem ahih te a teek thai ai?” ti u tih satluung te khaw a bok u.
Te satluung lawng oekthloenna oen Pathen salphaam ham khaw, thla sawmlii coeng thla hih khui aana khueh ham te a dang.
Ahih lawngah Pathen oen Pathen miing te khaw, a awmna ahuen amawl oen vaan ah aka awm hue te khaw a tap avoep.
Pathen kah thlaang thli te teek ham oen ahimi te taa hamla khaw, thlaangphun boeih, ram tawm boeih, awlcawm awlcee oen namtawm sawah ukna aana te khaw a peek.
Dilai a suen thlan ah miing thut la aka awm tih ngawn la aka awm tuuca kah hingna cabu khuiah a miing aka thuum nawh dilai thlaang boeih lawngah satluung te a bok u ai.
Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah ya hawn seh!

A-u khaw sal la khuen ham aka awm te tah a khuen ngaikhoek ai; a-u khaw samsen oen ngawn hamla aka awm te tah a ngawn ngaikhoek ai. He vengah Pathen kah thlaang thli lawng ueh thaina khueh tih uep-awm la awm ham angoe.
Tecoengah atloe satluung dilai khui kalawng a thoeng hang te ka huh. Te lawngtah tuu ki oen aka lo u ki pahih a khueh tih ruultluung angla awl a thui.

Ahih lawng lamhacuek satluung kah ukna aana boeih te amah hai roe ah te a hawna. Duek puei koei boengha a caak tih aka hoeih koep lamhacuek kah satluung te amangkhakla dilai thlaang thli te a bok sak.
Satluung pahihna lawngah kawpoekraina alentloe te a sai. Thlaang boeih kah mik huh roe ah vaan kalawng dilai la hai a tlaak sak.

Ahih lawngah lamhacuek kah satluung haiah sai sak ham a peek kawpoekraina te a saina rang oen dilai han thlaang boeih te athai alatna. Samsen oen tloek la awm tih boengha a caak de aka hing lamhacuek satluung te hinyah peekna la ahih kah kutsaimuei pakhat dilai thlaang thli te a sai sak.
Kutsaimuei lawng awl a thui thaina ham oen amah te aka bok nawh thli a duek sak thaina ham ah apahihna satluung lawng lamhacuek satluung kah kutsaimuei te hill sang thaina te a peek.

Te satluung lawngah thlaangyiit oen thlaangbo khaw, kuirang thlaanglen oen khawdeng harah khaw, saltamnaa oen thlaangcuem khaw, thlaang boeih te a tal ah, tihnawhtah a bantang kut ah noekna te amangkhakla a khueh sak.
Te noekna te aka khueh nawh tah a-u khaw thaihu te lai thai nawh tih yoeih thai la khaw awm nawh. Te noekna tah satluung miing tihnawhtah satluung miing yuengla a hawna nambar ni.

He dawngah he cuihna hawna ham angoe. Cuihna aka khueh thli lawngtah satluung nambar kah thuingaihna te a toek asam thai ai. Te nambar tah thlaang pakhat kah miing yuengla a hawna tih te nambar te tah yaruk sawmruk paruk ni.

Tecoengah ka dan hang vengah Zaion Tlaang ah tuuca aka pai te ka huh; ahih kah miing oen ana Pa kah miing a tal ah aka thut thlaang thong yakhat coeng thong sawmlii palii hue tah tuuca oen awm haih u.
Khawhumm awl angla liksaituitlaak awl angla aka riing, vaan kah awl pakhat te ka yaak. Te awl tah tingtoeng aka tum thai thli kah tingtoeng awlding oen lo u.

Te kah thlaang ting yakhat coeng thong sawmlii palii hue lawngah bawingawlhcoen haiah khaw, ramsa hing palii oen ahaamca thli haiah te pai u tih ahimi lawng laa thaai te a sak u. Thlaang boeih timkah tlang tangte la aka awm thlaang bueng nawh atah te kah laa thaai te thlaang tloe a-u lawngkhaw sa thai nawh.

Te thli tah amah oen amah kuemsuem u tih hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai nawh cadawng cuem la awm u tih tuuca a cehna roekk ah a vai u. Ahimi te tah thlaang boeih tim kah tlang tangte la awm u tih Pathen oen Tuuca tengah a nawn lamhacuek ni.
Ahimi tah hoem awl thui vai nawh; cawttbauh roe kap nawh.

Vaan alaklung ah atloe vanthlaang pakhat aka sawng te ka huh. Ahih lawngah dilai thlaang boeih nam tawm boeih oen thlaangphun boeih, awlcawm awlcee oen ram tawm boeihboeih ah phawng hamla dungyan awlthang theen a phueih tih,

Ahih lawngah angaih-hlangla, “Pathen te hinyah lang a alenna te koeh uh! metihtiah ahih lawng thlaangphun boeihboeih awlcekna atue tah a pha poen. Vaan oen dilai, tuitunlii oen ah sawkca tuiva saikung te bok uh! tila a thui.
Vanthlaang pakhatna te a pahihna vanthlaang lawng avan thoei tih, “Hutaa te tlim poen! Aka lentloe Babilon khawpui te tlim poen! cuk-halhna misur yuusang te thlaang boeih a tuul poen! tila a thui.
Tecoengah atloe vanthlaang pathumna lawng acuek kah pahih rawi te avan thoei tih, “A-u khaw satluung oen ahih kah kutsaimuei te aka bok tih a kut dawngah tihnawhtah a tal ah noekna aka khueh tah,

Pathen kah thinsana misuryuu, a thinsana boengloeng khuiah tharana abepirla a thloen misuryuu te a awkk ai! Aka aw boeih te tah aciim vanthlaang thli oen tuuca haiah kat haialh dawngah a heem atek ai.

Te heemtekna haikhu tah boet ohla asaw la luui hang. Satluung oen ahih kah kutsaimuei aka bok tih satluung kah noekna miing aka khueh boeih ham tah khawyiin khawdaai aphoengna roe awm manawh.” tila angaihhlangla a thui.
Pathen kah awlpeek aka vai thli oen Jesuh tengah uep-awm la aka awm Pathen thlaang thli lawngah tahe vengah ueh thaina khueh angoe.

Tecoengah vaan kah awl pakhat ka yaak tih, “He he thut lah! tahe kalawng atong vetih Bawipa kah bii te a bi dawngah aka duek tah yotheen aka dawng thlaang ni” tila a thui. Muithla lawngkhaw, “Oeih, soeng tang tang! Bii rai bina kalawng duem u poen ai. Metihtiah a biibi phu tah ahimi oen awm haih poen ai,” tila a thui.
Tecoengah ka dan vengah muui bawk aka yaal te ka huh, te muui sawah thlaanghing oen aka lo u te ngawl, a luu dawngah suilumuek te a muek tih a kut dawngah vin hatt te a pawm.

Tecoeng atah atloe vanthlaang pakhat tempal bok-im khui kalawng va thoeng tih muui dawngah aka ngawl tengah te “Na pawm vin hatt te hawna lang caang te aat loeih; dilai dawngkah caang hiin boeih poen!” tila angaihhlangla a thui.
Tecoengah mui sawah aka ngawl lawngah a pawm vin hatt te dilai dawngah a vawkveek tih caang te a ah.
Tecoengah atloe vanthlaang pakhat vaan kah tempal bok-im khuikah law tih ahih lawngkhaw vin hatt a pawm te ka huh.

Tecoengah hai aka ukkung atloe vanthlaang pakhat bokna-thaang ben kalawng va law. Ahih lawngah vin hatt aka pawm vanthlaang nala te “Na vin hatt te hawna lang dilai dawngkah misur dum khuiah aka awm misur te aat loeih, metihtiah misur thaih tah mun boeih poen!” tila angaihhlangla te a tina.
Tedawngah vanthlaang lawng a pawm vin hatt te dilai sawah a vawkveek tih misurdum khuikah misur thaih te a ah tih Pathen kah thinsana misurtui suina khuiah a sang.
Misur thaih te khawpui adauben kah misurtui suina ah a neet tih misurtui suina khui kalawng thisen va thoeng, meng yahnih toela laawng tih pe ngaa yunyan dung.

Tecoengah vaan ah atloe kawpoek rai noekna bohlang tlawhtahaw pasarih te vanthlaang pasarih lawng avan khuen te ka huh. Te kah tlawhtahaw tah hukhuengna poen tih Pathen kah thinsana aboetkoek a tuengna poen ni.

Tecoengah hai oen aka thoekk u tih thlalang tuitunlii oen aka lo u thaihu te ka huh. Satluung oen ahih kah kutsaimuei oen ah a miing yuengah nambar aka khueh boeih aka taakung thli te ka huh. Ahimi tah thlalang tuitunlii tengah pai u tih Pathen lawng a peek tingtoeng te a pawm u.

Ahimi lawngah Tuuca kah laa oen Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang Mosi kah laa te a sak u: “Bawipa Pathen Thara koek, metihtlukla na Lenduet tih na thaihu sai he kawpoek rai la a awm, Thlaangphun boeih kah sengpahrang, nang kah lawngpui tah metihtlukla asoeng tih adoeng!

Bawipa, nang te rih ohla a-u nuem aka awm tang ai! Na lenna te phawng hamla a-u lawng nuem a thana tang ai? Nang bueng ni na ciim, Na sai boeih tah doeng tih thlaang boeih lawng a huh dawngah thlaangphun boeih na haiah law vetih nang te m'bok u ai.” tila Laa a sak u.
Tecoengah vaan ah tempal bok-im awng u tih a khuiah Pathen awlkamna aka awm Riim-im te ka huh.
Vanthlaang pasarih, tlawhtahaw pasarih a pawm tih tempal bok-im khui kalawng va law, ahimi lawngah aciimbiitla aka awm thling thling aka aang himbai te a bai tih a raang te sui cihin oen a yeen u.
Tecoengah ramsahing palii khuikah pakhat lawngah dungyan aka hing Pathen kah thinsana oen aka be suibeeldung pasarih te vanthlaang pasarih te a peek.

Tempal bok-im tah Pathen kah ruep-awmna oen huham tharana haikhu oen betoet tih vanthlaang pasarih lawng avan khuen tlawhtahaw pasarih te aboeih thlantoe a-u khaw tempal bok-im khuila te kuun thai nawh.
Tecoengah tempal bok-im khuikah awl lawngah vanthlaang pasarih nala te, “Cet langtah Pathen kah thinsana beeldung pasarih te dilai dawngah hok thuk!” a tina te ka yaak.

Tecoeng atah lamhacuek vanthlaang lawng cet tih amah kah beeldung te dilai dawngah a hok. Satluung kah noekna tacik deng aka khueh thli oen ahih kah kutsaimuei aka bok tengah rih awm tangkiik buthlut tlawh la thoeng.
Apahihna vanthlaang lawngah amah kah beeldung te tuitunlii sawah a hok. Tui te thlaangduek kah thisen angla coengg tih tuitunlii ah aka hing boeih te duek.
Apathumna vanthlaang lawngah amah kah beeldung te tuiva boeih oen sawksipp boeih ah a hok tih thisen la boeih coengg.
Tui ukkung vanthlaang lawngah, “Aka awm lii oen aka awm poen, Aw, Aciim Pathen, nang kah awlcekna tah doeng!” tila a thui te ka yaak.
Ahimi lawngah Pathen thlaang thli oen tawngha thli kah thisen a laawng sak, tedawngah ahimi lawng a awkk hamla thisen te na peek poen. Ahimi lawng a dang ham koei te ni a dang u van!” tila a thui.
Tecoengah bokna-thaang dawngkah awl lawngah, “Bawipa Pathen Tharakoek! Nang kah awlcekna boeih he tah soeng tih doeng!” tila a thui te ka yaak.
Apaliina vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te khawmik sawah a hok tih khawmik lawng thlaang thli te alingna oen ung sak thaina te a dang.

Khawmik lawng alingsona oen ahimi te a ung sak tih ahimi lawng he ang tlawhtahaw sawah aana khuehkung Pathen miing te a tap avoep u. Tede ahimi lawng thawlhna te yut u nawh tih Pathen bawilenna te koeh u nawh.

Tecoengah pa-ngaana vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te satluung kah bawingawlhcoen dawngah a hok. Satluung kah ram pum te yiinna lawng a khuk muelh tih te ram kah thlaang thli lawng patang a khang uett ah a lai te a kueh u.
Ahimi lawng patang a khang, buthlut a tlawh u dawngah Pathen miing te a tap avoep u. Tede ahimi lawngah athe lawngpui te hoett u nawh.
Tecoengah aparukna vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te Yufratis tuivapui dawngah te a hok. Tuivapui te kak rup tih khawcuuk ben kalawng aka law sengpahrang thli ham lawngpui a awng pe.
Tecoengah aciim nawh muithla ukong oen aka lo u pathum te ka huh. Te thli tah ruultluung kaa khui kalawng, satluung kaa khui kalawng, tawngha rawlrap kaa khui kalawng ah va thoeng.

Te thli tah raaithe kah muithla la awm u tih kawpoekraina te a sai u. He kah muithla pathum hue tah Thara koek Pathen Khawhin pui ah thik at la raal tuk ham, dilai pum kah sengpahrang boeih tengla ceemphawh hamla cet.

“Hutung lah! Kai tah thlaanghuuen angla ka law ai! Thlaangtim paalak ah yah pawh nawh ham oen atliing ayaalla a yingyawina nawh ham ahuertuela awm tih a hinaak himbai te aka kuem tah yotheen aka dawng ni.
Tecoengah muithla hue lawng sengpahrang thli te thikat la a tun sak tih te huen te Hebru awl la tah Amekidon ti u.
Apasarihna vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te yilh dawngah a hok. Tempal bok-im khui, bawingawlhcoen dawngkah angaihhlangla awl pakhat va thoeng tih, “Boeih poen!” tila a thui.

Tecoeng atah khaw thlappha tih, khaw humm, rekk tla tih likluei angaihhlangla hinghuen. Thlaanghing sai cuek veng kalawng he ang likluei he hinghuen nooek nawh; he ngoen tah likluei boeih lak ah aka tlo koek ni!

Aka bo koek khawpui te thloep thum la rek tih ram boeihboeih kah khawpui thli tah rawk kang poen. Pathen lawng Babilon khawpui te a hilh dam tih amah boengloeng dawngkah misuryuu, a thinsana misuryuu te a awkk sak poen.
Tuisanglak boeih tah auh tih tlaang boeih khaw ha-ata boeih poen.
Vaan dawng kalawng cawi yakhat tluk aka rih reel bohlang lawngah thlaanghing sawah te tla. Rih-awm tangkiik tlawhtahaw reelnu a tlaak dawngah Pathen te thlaanghing lawngah a tap avoep u.

Tecoengah beeldung pasarih aka pawm vanthlaang pasarih timkah pakhat te ka tengla law tih, “Law lah, tuivapui tengah a sak, aka lentloe khawpui miingthang thlaanghalhnu te metihtlukla dantat la a awm ai ti te kan huh sak ai.
Dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli lawng ahih oen samphaih u tih dilai thlaang boeih lawng ahih kah cuk-halhna misuryuu te a awkk u” tila a thui.

Muithla rang oen vanthlaang lawngah kai te ramhum huhang la n'ceh puei. Te huen ah satluung seen awrh dawng aka ngawl hutaa te ka huh. Satluung kah a pum tawm ah Pathen asal aphaamna ca te a thut. Te satluung lawngah luu pasarih oen ki paha a khueh.

Te hutaa lawngah alingdiik oen alinghuih himbai te a bai a naak tih sui, ngun, lungto phutlo, latha oen thoekcau u. A kut dawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna phu tuiilehkap thaihu oen samphaih raamna oen ah aka bepir sui boengloeng te a pawm.
A tal ah, “Dilai dawngkah thawlh tuiileh-kap oen thlaanghalhnu boeih kah a manu, Babilon Khawpui,” tila thuingaihna awlhuep miing te a thut.
Te hutaa lawng Pathen thlaang thli kah thisen oen Jesuh ah thincakla a awm dawngah ngawn la aka awm hue kah thisen a ruui u te ka huh. Te hutaa te ka huh vengah kawpoek la rai tangkiik.
Vanthlaang lawngah, “N'tu ah na kawpoek a rai? Te hutaa oen hutaa lawng a cit luu pasarih oen ki paha aka awm satluung thuingaihna awlhuep te kavan thui ai.

Nang lawng na huh satluung te n'cui atah hing de, tahe tah hing tlaih nawh; Ahih tah boetna aka awm nawh ungrawm khui kalawng thoeng hang vetih ngawn la awm ai. Dilai he a suen thlan veng kalawng hingna cabu khuiah miing aka thuum nawh dilai han thlaang thli lawng, n'hu vengah hing de tahe ah aka hing tlaih nawh tih aka hing koep ham koei satluung te a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai u ai.
He dawngah cuihna oen ming thaina angoe. Luu pasarih he tah hutaa lawng a ngawlhna tlaang pasarih ni. Sengpahrang pasarih te khaw a thuingaihna ni.
