Ahimi khuikah pa-ngaa tah tlim poen, tahe ah pakhat lawng a uk tih atloe pakhat te tah va law thlan; ahih te law cakhaw kawlkalh ni a uk ai.
N'hu vengah hing tih tahe aka hing tlaih nawh satluung tah apareetna sengpahrang la awm. Sengpahrang pasarih khuiah thuum van tih ahih tah duek hamla te va thoeng.
Nang lawng na huh ki paha he tah ukna aka khueh thlan sengpahrang paha ni; tede ahimi tah satluung oen thik at la khawnoek pakhat khuiah uk rip van hamla aana aka dang thlaang thli ni.
He kah sengpahrang paha boeih lawng mengtengna khat bueng kang a khueh u tih ahimi lawng satluung tengah amami kah tharana huham oen aana te a peek u.

Ahimi lawngah Tuuca te a teek u ai, tede tuuca oen amah lawng a khue tih a tuek thlaang thli oen uep-awm hubang thlaang thli lawngah ahimi te a taa ai, metihtiah ahih tah bawi boeih kah Bawipa oen sengpahrang boeih kah Sengpahrang la awm,” tila te a thui.
Vanthlaang lawngah, “kai tengah Thlaanghalhnu lawng a ngawlhna tui he tah pengram boeih, thlaang boeih, thlaangphun boeih oen awlcawm awlcee ni.

Nang lawng na huh satluung oen ki paha lawngah thlaanghalhnu te a thina u ai; Ahimi lawngah thlaanghalhnu kah a khuen boeih te a rot pe u vetih atliing ayaalla a ceh taak u ai; ahih kah a thi asa te a caak u vetih hai dawngah a tih ai.

Metihtiah Pathen kah awl asoep thlantoe tah, ahimi lawng amami kah thara huham ukna te satluung tengah kaw at la a peekna u thai ham Pathen lawng ahimi kah thinkaw khuiah amah kah kawngaihna te a khueh pe.
Nang lawngah hutaa na huh te tah dilai sengpahrang boeih ukkung alentloe khawpui ni,” tila a thui.
He coengah atloe vanthlaang pakhat vaan kalawng a rum thuk te ka huh. Ahih lawng saithaina aana bo hlang a khueh tih a aangna lawng dilai pum a thue rawngtheng.

Ahih lawng angaihhlangla paang tih: “Hutaa te tlim poen! Babilon khawpui tah tlim poen! Te khawpui tah raaithe thli oen muithla ciimcaih nawh thli awmna ahuen la tahe tah coeng poen; tuiilehkap oen thina koei va phun soeprep a khuiah awm u.

Metihtiah thlaangphun boeih lawng ahih kah misuryuu te a awkk u poen, ahih kah cuk-halhna misuryuusang te a awkk u poen. Dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli lawng ahih oen ah cuk-halh samphaihna a sai u tih a kuemsuem u thai nawh apueh ngaihna lawng dilai dawngkah thaihu yoeikung thli te a len sak poen,” tila a thui.
Tecoengah vaan kah awl tloe ka yaak, “Law uh, ka thlaang thli aw! Ahih teng kalawng law u loeih! Ahih kah thawlhna dawngah baawl u boel; Ahih kah yawkk ham koei dantatna dawngah thuum u boel!
Metihtiah ahih kah thawlhna tah khat sawah khat tlingtloen u tih vaan angla sang; Ahih kah tharana te Pathen lawng a poek khuep.

Ahih lawng nangmi thekhana angla ahih te thekhana u van; A saina boeih dawngah arepla thung pe uh. Nangmi lawng na awkk ham te athiipla a sai van angla ahih lawng a awkk ham boengloeng te khuibok ah athiipla sai pe u van.

Amah oen amah thangpawm u tih a awmtheenna taring ah patang raina oen kopaangna te pe u van. Metihtiah a kaw dang oen ah, ‘Sengpahrang bawinu la ka ngawl, Kai tah huhainu nawh ni Kawthena mevengah khaw ka ming roe manawh,’ ti.

He tila a ti dawngah hin at maiah ahih te tlawhtahaw lawng a tlaak thil ai, tlawhnatna, kawthe rungrahna oen khawkhana lawng a tlaak thil ai. Ahih awlcekkung Bawipa Pathen tha aka ra lawng ahih te hai dawng a tih ai.” ti.

Dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli, ahih oen hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen ah cuk-halhna dawngah aka baawlneeng haih hue lawng ahih a ungna hairawng dawngkah haikhu te a huh u vengah, te khawpui te a rah u ai.

Ahih kah patang khangna te ahimi lawng a rih u dawngah athlahlangla pai u. Ahimi lawng, “Khawmap tangkiik! Rih awm tangkiik mah aw! Aka lenkoek oen tha aka ra koek Babilon khawpui! khawnoek pakhat khui maiah dantat la na awm poen!” ti u.
Dilai saw kah thaihu yoeikung thli lawngkhaw ahih te a rah u tih lungnat a yaak u, metihtiah ahimi kah thaihu te a-u khatca lawngkhaw lai tlaih nawh.

Ahimi kah, sui, ngun, lungto phutlo oen latha; hisa haldoel oen kut tah hi-acuu himbai hinguih, pu hisa oen himbai lingdiik; thingcang phutlo phun soeprep, vueinaw oen a sai thaihu cungkuem oen ah thingphutlo, ruhum, thii oen ah lungto abawk oen a sai thaihu,
Thingsa thing, brue, huihthlutna riimtuui, mura oen farankinsen; misuryuu oen olifsitui, sangvutvaai, vaitaw, panaa oen tuu, marang oen ranglengg thli, saltamnaa oen thlaanghing khaw lai u thai nawh.

Thaihu yoeikung thli lawng ahih nala te, “Nang lawng khuehtoen ham na ngaih kaawn theen boeih tah ha-ata kang poen tih na bawina oen awmtheenna boeih tah khum poen, meveng khaw te ang kaawn theen te na dang koep tlaih manawh!” a tina u.
Te khawpui khuiah tangthung tangleng tih kuirang la aka coeng thaihu yoeikung thli lawng ahih kah patang khang te a rih u vetih athlahlangla pai u ai.

Ahimi lawng rap u vetih lungphit laithai ruila, “Khawmap tangkiik! Aka lentloe khawpui, Nang ham rih awm tangkiik mah aw! Hisa haldoel himbai hinguih oen himbai lingdiik na bai na naak tih sui awi-anaak, lungto phutlo awi-anaak oen latha oen ah na thoek na cau u!

Tede khawnoek khat khui maiah na bawi na rengna tah ha-ata boeih poen!” tila rap ai. Tuisangphaw boeih uktemkung thli oen khawlawng cet thli tuisangphaw dawngah bii aka bi boeih tuitunlii ah biibina oen bungpui riilcang aka khuut boeih lawng a thlahlangla pai u tih,
te khawpui a ungna hai-alh haikhu te a huh u vengah, “He ang alentloe khawpui angla atloe khawpui awm nooek nawh!” ti u.

Ahimi lawng a luu dawngah laivaai oen phull u tih rungrah oen lungphit laithai ruila, “Khawmap mai poen! He khawpui ham rih awm tangkiik mah aw! Tuitunlii ah tuisangphaw oen thaihu aka yooei boeih lawng ahih kah bawina oen kuirang la coengg u! tede khawnoek pakhat khui maiah a bawi a rengna a auh boeih mai,” ti u.
Vaan nang, te khawpui rawk dawngah awmngaih lah! Pathen kah thlaang thli oen celtuih thli oen ah tawngha thli awmngaih u lah! Nangmi sawah a saina boeih dawngah Pathen lawng ahih te awl a cek poen!

Tecoengah thara tangkiik van-thlaang pakhat lawng caang a neetna lungto sumngawl teh van aka bohlang lungto pakhat te a lawh tih tuitunlii khuila a dawng thuk, “He tila Babilon khawpui tah dawng thuk la awm vetih meveng khaw huh koep la awm tlaih manawh.
Riingding tingtoeng awlding oen laa sak awl theen, a tum phiviit awlding oen ah pengsara tum awl te meveng khaw yaak la awm tlaih manawh!

Hai-im dawngkah haivang te metuek khaw na khuiah hu u koep tlaih manawh; Cadawng yulokung oen tuemnu hulaa vaa sak awmtheen awl meveng khaw na khuiah ya tlaih roe manawh. Nang kah tangthung tangleng thli tah dilai pum ah huham thara aka awm koek ni, aka soeng nawh miklet thoemna oen dilai pum ah huham tharana aka awm koek ni, aka soeng nawh miklet thoemna oen dilai thlaang boeih na thai na latna poen.
Tawngha thli oen Pathen thlaang thli oen ah dilai dawngah a ngawn thlaang boeih kah thisen te khawpui khuiah a huh u dawngah Babilon tah dan a tat poen.
Tecoengah vaan ah thlaangping kah vupaang awl angla ka yaak tih, “Pathen tah koeh u lah! Thlawnna, ruep-awmna oen tharana tah mami kah Pathen amah koe ni.

Ahih kah awlcek tah doeng tih soeng. Dilai he cuk-halhna oen aka phekung thlaanghalhnu te ahih lawng dan a tat poen. Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang boeih te a ngawn dawngah ahih te dan a tat poen,” tila vupaang u.
Ahimi lawng paang u koep tih, “Pathen tah koeh u lah! Khawpui a ungna hairawng dawngkah haikhu tah ayoeyahla dungdung tho hang,” ti u.
Ahaamca kulpalii hue oen ramsa hing palii hue lawng buekuep u tih bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl Pathen te a bok u. Ahimi lawng, “Amen! Pathen tah koeh u lah!” ti u.
Tecoengah te kah bawingawlhcoen dawng kalawng awl pakhat va law tih, “Amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli oen a thlaang boeih ayiit abo, amah aka hinyah thlaang boeih, mami kah Pathen te koeh u lah!” ti.

Tecoengah thlaangping kah paang awl angla liksaituitlaak awl angla, khawhumm rekk tlaak awl angla ka yaak. “Bawipa tah koeh u lah! Mami kah Bawipa, Thara Pathen tah Sengpahrang la a awm dawngah koeh u lah!
Awmngaih u silang tah awmtheen boenn u lah sih; alenna te koeh u lah sih! Tuuca kah yului poei atue tah khoek poen, a lawh ham koei tuemnu hulaa lawngkhaw coekroekla thloeihthlam u poen.
Ahih lawng a buen anaak ham thlipthlip aka aang hisa haldoel te khaw a peek poen,” ti u. (Hisa-haldoel ti he tah Pathen thlaang thli kah thaihu theen a sai te ni)
Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng ka tengah, “He he thut lah; Tuuca yului poei kah a ceel thlaang hue tah yotheen aka dawng thlaang ni,” n'tina.

Ahih te bok ham a khow kungah ka buekuep, tede ahih lawng, “He tila sai boel! Kai tah nang oen atloe aka oeng hue oen ah Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak aka phoeih rapsaat hue angla tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat van ni. Pathen mah bok lah!” n'tina. Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak lawng ni tawngha thli kawthawhna a peek.
Tecoengah vaan aka awng u te ka huh tih, te ah te marang bawk pakhat awm. Te marang bawk aka cit te tah Uep-awm oen Awltak a miingna; doengna oen awl a cek tih ceemraal khaw a tloek.
Amik rawi tah haialh oen lo hih tih a luu dawngah bawi-lumuek yahawh hlang te a muek. Amah bueng lawng a ming doek tih thlaangtloe a-u lawngkhaw thuingaihna a ming nawh miing te a pum dawngah a thut.
Ahih lawng thisen oen a nok baidung te a bai. A miing tah “Pathen Awl” a miingna.
Vaan raalkap thli lawng hisa haldoel aciimbiit abawk te a bai u tih, marang bawk te a cit u tih a hu ah a vai u.

A kaa dawng kalawng samsen aka hatt pakhat va thoeng, te oen ah ram boeihboeih te a taa ai. Ahih lawngah thii cungpoelh oen ahimi te a uk vetih Bawilen Pathen thinsana misur neetna khuiah misur te a neet ai.
A himbaidung oen a phai dawngah: “sengpahrang boeih kah Sengpahrang oen bawi boeih kah Bawi,” tila a thut.
Tecoengah vanthlaang pakhat khawmik dawngah aka pai te ka huh. Ahih lawng khawhi ah aka sawng va boeihboeih te, “Law u lah, Pathen kah bawilen buhlawi veel hamla va tun u lah!

Law u langtah sengpahrang thli, raalbawi thli oen raalkap thli kah thiasa te ca u lah, marang thli oen marang aka cit thli kah thiasa oen ah thlaang boeih kah thiasa, saltamnaa oen thlaangcuem thli kah thiasa, thlaang yiit thlaang bo boeih kah thiasa te ca u lah!” tila angaihhlangla paang.
Tecoengah marang aka cit thlaang oen ah a raalkap thli te teek hamla satluung oen dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli oen ah a raalkap thli a tun kueng te ka huh.

Satluung oen ah ahih kah haiah kawpoekraina aka sai tawngha rawlrap te a tuuk haih tih thong ah a thlaak u. (Te kah tawngha rawlrap tah satluung miknoekna aka khueh thli oen satluung kah kutsaimuei aka bok thli te kawpoekrai saina oen aka thailatnakung te ni) Satluung oen tawngha rawlrap te pahih bokla kat hai-alh khuiah a hing sailapla a dawng.
Marang aka cit thlaang kah a kaa dawng kalawng aka thoeng samsen oen ahimi kah raalkap boeih te a ngawn; Va boeih lawng ahimi kah thiasa te ahahla a caak u.
Tecoengah vanthlaang pakhat lawng boetna aka awm nawh ungrawm dung te awngna caabi oen thiirui arih hlang a kut dawng a pawm tih a rum thuk te ka huh.
Ahih lawng-ah suenyan kah ruultluung Raaibawi tihnawhtah Seitan te a tuuk tih kum thong khat khui khawh hamla thiirui oen a piin.

Vanthlaang lawngah ruultluung te aboetna aka awm nawh ungrawm khuila a voeih tih ungrawm te a khaih khoep, kum thongkhat aboeih thlan atah nam tawm thlaang thli te thailatna tlaih nawh ham tacik a deng rap poen. Tecoeng atah kawlkalhca a thlah koep ai.

Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen thli te ka huh tih, te bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl hue tah awlcekna aana a peek te ka huh. Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak oen Pathen awl te a thui u dawngah a ngawn thlaang thli kah muithla boeih khaw ka huh. Ahimi lawngah satluung oen satluung kah kutsaimuei te khaw bok u nawh tih a tal ah khaw, akut dawngah khaw satluung kah miknoekna te khueh u nawh. Ahimi tah hing koep u tih Khrih oen sengpahrang angla kum thongkhat khui a uk u.
(Atloe thlaangduek thli tah kum thongkhat a boeih thlan khui tah hing u nawh hun). He tah thlaangduek thawhna lamhacuek ni.

He kah thlaangduek thawhna lamhacuek ah aka thuum thli tah awmngaih u tih yotheen aka dawng tangkiik ni. A pabe duekna lawng ahimi sawah n'tu aana tehca khaw khueh tlaih nawh; Ahimi tah Pathen oen Khrih kah khawsoeih la awm u vetih Khrih oen kum thongkhat khuiah ukkung la awm haih poen ai.
Kum thongkhat te a boeih coengah, Seitan te thong khui kalawng a thlah u ai,

dilai pum khawboet ram boet ah aka darh u thlaangphun boeih te thailatna ham cet ai, te tah Gog oen Magog te ni. Seitan lawngah ahimi te apum boeih la ceem thawh sak ham a cawi vetih te thli tah tuitunlii keeng kah divin lai yoeh la yahawh.
Ahimi tah dilai pum ah darh khonghak tih Pathen thlaang thli a awmna huen oen Pathen lawng a lungna khawpui te a veel khoep u. Tede vaan kalawng hai tla thuk tih ahimi tah ung thloep.
Tecoengah ahimi aka thailatna Raaibawi te satluung oen tawngha rawlrap thli a voeihna huen kat hai-alh khuila a dawng; te huen ah ahimi tah dungyan toela yiin oen daai patang a khang ai.
Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen abawk bohlang oen te kah bawi-ngawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl thlaang te ka huh. Dilai oen vaan tah ahih teng kalawng aloela thoeih nawng tih khum boeih poen.

Tecoengah thlaangduek ayiit abo bawingawlhcoen haiah a pai u te ka huh. Cabu thli te a daih, tecoengah cabu tloe hingna cabu te a daih u. Te cabu dawngah amami kah saina khawboe ramlang a thut pe van angla thlaangduek thli te awl a cek u.
Tecoengah tuitunlii lawng amah khuiah aka duek te a peek. Duekna oen celkhui khaw lawngkhaw thlaangduek a tuuk te a peek. Thlaangduek boeih te amami kah a saina angla awl a cek.
Tecoengah duekna oen celkhui khaw te haialh khuila a voeih. (He kah haituilii tah apabe duekna ni.)
Hingna cabu dawngah a miing a thut nawh thlaang boeih te tah haituilii khuila a voeih u.
Tecoengah vaan thaai oen dilai thaai ka huh, lamhacuek kah vaan oen dilai tah khum poen tih tuitunlii khaw awm tlaih nawh.
Aciim khawpui Jerusalem thai tah a vaa oen huh u hamla roekbah u tih coekroekla aka thloeihthlam u tuemnu hulaa angla Pathen tengkah vaan kalawng a law thuk te ka huh.

Bawingawlhcoen dawng kalawng awl angaihhlangla a thui te ka yaak: “Tahe tah Pathen im te thlaanghing tengah awm poen! Pathen tah ahimi oen awm haih vetih ahimi tah Pathen kah thlaang la awm poen ai. Pathen amah roe te ahimi oen awm haih vetih ahimi kah Pathen la awm poen ai.

Ahimi kah mikphi boeih te Pathen lawng a huih pe poen ai. Te huen atah duekna roe awm tlaih nawh vetih kawthe lungnat yaakna, rungrahna oen tlawhnatna khaw awm tlaih manawh. Thaihu ruem boeih tah khum kang poen,” ti.

Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl lawngah te, “Tahe tah thaihu cungkuem soeprep te athaaila ka sai pan boeih poen, he kah awl he thut lah, metihtiah he awl boeih he tah soeng tangtang tih uepna koei awl ni,” tila a thui.
Tecoengah ahih lawngah, “Bii ka coeng poen! Kai tah lamhacuek oen hukhueng koek, atongcuekna oen aboetna koek ni. A-u khaw tui aka hall tah hingna tuibaaptui te ayoela ka awkk sak ai.
Taakung la aka awm boeih lawngtah ka tengkah thaihu he a dang ai: Kai tah ahimi kah Pathen la ka awm vetih ahimi tah kai kah ca anau la awm ai.

Tede riyawp thlaang thli, paipi aka thleep thlaang thli, tuiilehkap thinkaw aka khueh thli, Thlaang aka ngawn thli, thlaanghalh paadak thli, Caamna oen mu-uih caakna aka hawna thli, kutsaimuei aka bok thli oen ah hoem awl aka thui boeih hamla ahuen amawl te tah kat hai-alh te ni, te tah apabe duekna ni,” tila a thui.
Vanthlaang pasarih timkah pakhat, tlawhtahaw aboetna koek pasarih oen aka bepir beeldung pasarih aka pawm te ka tengla law tih, “Law lah, Tuuca kah a yu, tuemnu hulaa te kan huh sak ai” n'tina.
Muithla rang oen ah vanthlaang lawng kai te tlaang sang cungcikdik la te n'ceh puei. Ahih lawngah Jerusalem Aciim Khawpui Pathen tengkah vaan kalawng aka law thuk,
Pathen kah ruep-awmna oen aka aang te n'huh sak. Te khawpui tah lungto phutlo Jaspa angla aang tih Kristol angla ciil.
Te khawpui tah thawhka paha thlaihih oen vawngkulh asanghlang awm tih thawhka toetkung vanthlaang paha thlaihih awm. Te thawhka dawngah te Israel thlaangphun paha thlaihih hue kah miing te a thut.
Te vawngkulh te khawcuuk ben ah thawhka pathum, aluen ben ah thawhka pathum, akaak ben ah thawhka pathum, khawtlaak ben ah thawhka pathum rip awm.
Khawpui kah vawngkulh te tah lungto paha thlaihih dawngah lungdang a suem tih Tuuca kah celtuih paha thlaihih kah miing te a thut.
Ka tengah awl aka thui vanthlaang lawng khawpui oen thawhka thli oen ah vawngkulh te tahna hamla, tahna sui cungkui pakhat a pawm.
Te khawpui tah ateng palii oen akil palii awm tih ayoei adang van-at la awm. Vanthlaang lawngtahna cungkui oen a tah vengah ayoei adang oen asang tah meng thongkhat ya-ngaa rip awm.
Vanthlaang lawng amah kah a pawm tahna oen vawngkulh te khaw a tah tih asang te pe yahnih thlairuk awm.
Vawngkulh te Jaspa lungto phutlo oen a sai, khawpui te tah suituicii oen a sai tih thlalang angla ciil.

Khawpui a thungna vawngkulh lungdangsuem lungto te tah lungto phutlo phun soeprep oen a thoek acau. Lamhacuek lungdangsuem lungto tah Jaspa lungto tih, apabena tah sapfaiar lungto; apathumna tah aakat lungto, apaliina tah imaral lungto;

apa-ngaana tah onik lungto, aparukna tah karnelian lungto, pasarihna tah krisolaih lungto, pareetna tah beril lungto, pakuana tah topas lungto, pahana tah khalsidoni lungto, thlaikhatna tah tarta lungto, thlaihihna tah ametis lungto phutlo oen a sai.
Thawhka paha thlaihih te latha paha thlaihih oen a sai tih thawhka pakhat te latha pakhat oen a sai. Khawpui khuikah lawngpui tah suituicii oen a sai tih thlalang angla ciil.
Te khawpui khuiah tempal bok-im ka hu nawh, metihtiah Thara koek Bawipa Pathen oen Tuuca tah te kah tempal bok-im la awm poen.
Te khawpui dawngah khawse oen thlavaang khaw ngoe tlaih nawh, metihtiah Pathen kah ruep-awmna te aang poen tih tuuca te haivang la awm poen.
Dilai dawngkah thlaangphun boeih lawngah te aangna oen ah yingyawi u vetih dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli lawng amami kah khawh-rang kaawn thli te khawpui khuila a khuen u ai.
Khawpui kah thawhka thli te tah khawyungkhun a awng; te khawpui ah khawyiinna a awm tlaih nawh dawngah thawhka te khai manawh.
Thlaangphun boeih lawngah a ruep-awmna oen a bawilenna boeih te khawpui khuila te a khuen u.

Tede, te khawpui khuiah aka ciim nawh tah khatca khaw kuun thai manawh, yarau thaihu aka sai thli oen hoem awl aka thui boeih khaw kuun thai manawh. Tuuca kah hingna cabu khuiah miing aka thuum thli bueng khawpui khuiah kuun thai ai.

Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng hingna tui a laawngna tuiva te khaw n'huh sak. Te tuiva tah thlalang angla ciilrikla awm tih Pathen oen Tuuca kah bawingawlhcoen dawng kalawng va laawng tih khawpui khui alaklung ah te laawng.

Te tuiva keeng khatben khatbang ah hingna thingkung te awm, kum khat ah voei thlaihih thaih tih thla khat ah voei khat thaih poepa tih te thingkung kah aram te tah thlaangphun boeih kah hoeihna la awm.

Pathen lawngah a tap avoep thaihu khatca khaw te khawpui khuiah awm manawh. Pathen oen Tuuca kah bawingawlhcoen tah te khawpui khuiah awm tih amah kah a tuihyoeih-thlaang thli lawngah ahih te a bok u.
Ahimi lawngah Pathen mik-hai te a huh u vetih ahih kah miing te a tal ah a thut ai.

Khawyiin awm tlaih nawh tih ahimi lawngah hai-im khaw, khawse khaw ngoe tlaih nawh, metihtiah Bawipa Pathen te ahimi kah aangna la awm vetih ahimi tah sengpahrang angla dungyan dungyan toe ukkung la awm poen ai.

Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng ka tengah, “He awl tah awltak tih ueppangna koei awl ni. Tawngha thli te amah Muithla oen aka be sak Bawipa Pathen lawng adiw thlan ah aka thoeng koei thaihu te amah kah tuihyoeih-thlaang thli tengah aka thui hamla vanthlaang thli avan tuih poen,” tila a thui.
Jesuh lawng, “Hutung lah! Kai ka law yue poen ai: He cabu khuikah tawngha awl aka vai thli tah yotheen a dawng u!” tila a thui.
Kai Johan lawngah he thaihu boeih he ka yaak tih ka huh poen. Te thli te ka yaak tih ka huh coengah he thaihu boeih huhsakkung vanthlaang te bok hamla a khow kungah ka buekuep.
Tede ahih lawngah, “Te tila sai boel! Kai khaw nang oen nang kah maya manau tawngha thli oen ah he cabu khuikah awl aka vai thlaang boeih kah pueipaw van ni. Pathen te mah bok lah!” tila a thui.
Tecoengah ahih lawng, “He ang thli boeih he a thoengna ham atue ayoeica poen dawngah he cabu khuikah tawngha awl he ahuepla khueh boel.

Thlaangthe lawngah therana te sai poe mai de selang tah tuiilehkap thlaang te tah kawlot-thahnai la awm poe mai de seh; Thlaangdoeng te tah doeng poe mai de selang tah, aka ciim thlaang te tah ciim poe mai de seh.” tila a thui.
Jesuh lawng, “Hutung lah! Kai tah ka law yue poen ai! Thlaang boeih te a saina taring ah peek rip hamla Kai lawng kutdo kavan khuen ai.
Kai tah lamhacuek oen hukhueng koek, atongcuekna oen aboetna koek la ka awm,” tila a thui.
Amami kah himbai te aciimla aka suk tah yotheen a dawng u, ahimi tah hingna thingthaih te a caak thai vetih khawpui thawhka khuiah kuun thai u ai.

Te cakhaw cet thawlh lawnghang thli, caam oen mu-uih caakna aka hawna thli, hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai thli, thlaang aka ngawn thli, kutsaimuei aka bok thli, saina oen khawseh, hoem awl thui oen khawseh thlaangthaipalat thli tah khawpui adauben ah awm u ai.
“Kai Jesuh lawng Khrihcabu khuiah aka awm nangmi tengah he thaihu boeih he aka hoe la kamah kah vanthlaang te kavan tuih poen. Kai tah Devid cadil tih aka aang tumpa ni.” tila a thui.

Muithla oen tuemnu hulaa lawng-ah, “Law lah!” tila a thui. A-u khaw he awl aka ya boeih lawngtah, “Law lah!” tila thui van seh. A-u khaw tui aka hall tah law uh; A-u khaw aka ngaih boeih tah hingna tui he ayoela lo uh.

He cabu dawngkah tawngha awl aka ya thlaang boeih te kai Johan lawng arapcatla ngaithuenna kan peek u: a-u lawngkhaw he cabu dawngkah tawngha awl he khatca khaw a tawm athap atah, he cabu khuiah a thui tlawhtahaw te Pathen lawng ahih sawah dantatna la a hawna ai.

A-u lawngkhaw he cabu dawngkah tawngha awl he khatca khaw a hoett atah he cabu khuiah a thui ahih kah dang ham koei hingna thingthaih caak thaina oen Aciim Khawpui khuiah kuun thaina te Pathen lawng a hoett pe van ai.
He thaihu boeih sausi dengkung lawng, “Oe, Ataktang! Kai tah ka law yue poen ai!” tila a thui. Tetih mai hawn seh. Bawipa Jesuh, law mai hawn loeih!
Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah thlaang boeih sawah awm seh. Amen.
